[I,1,i_I,1,ii]	atha atas dharma jijñāsā loke yeṣu artheṣu prasiddhāni padāni tāni sati sambhave tad arthāni eva sūtreṣu iti avagantavyam na adhyāhāra ādibhiḥ eṣām parikalpanīyaḥ arthaḥ paribhāṣitavyaḥ vā evam hi veda vākyāni eva ebhiḥ vyākhyāyante itarathāḥ veda vākyāni vyākhyeyāni sva padārthāḥ ca vyākhyeyāḥ tat yatna gauravam prasajyeta 
[I,1,iii]	tatra loke ayam atha śabdaḥ vṛttāt anantarasya prakriyā arthaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ na ca iha kiñcid vṛttam upalabhyate bhavitavyam tu tena yasmin sati anantaram dharma jijñāsā avakalpate tathā hi prasiddha padārthakaḥ sa kalpitaḥ bhavati tat tu veda adhyayanam tasmin hi sati sā avakalpate na etat evam anyasya api karmaṇaḥ anantaram dharma jijñāsā yuktā prāk api ca veda adhyayanāt 
[I,1,iv]	ucyate tādṛśīm tu dharma jijñāsām adhikṛtya atha śabdam prayuktavān ācāryaḥ yā veda adhyayanam antareṇa na saṃbhavati katham veda vākyānām anekavidhaḥ vicāraḥ iha vartiṣyate api ca na eva vayam iha veda adhyayanāt pūrvam dharma jijñāsāyāḥ pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ na hi etat ekam vākyam purastāt ca veda adhyayanāt dharma jijñāsām pratiṣedhiṣyati parastāt ca ānantaryam prakariṣyati bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam anyā hi vacana vyaktiḥ asya purastāt veda adhyāyanāt dharma jijñāsām pratiṣedhataḥ anyā ca parastāt ānantaryam upadiśataḥ vedān adhītya iti ekasyām vidhīyate anūdya ānantaryam viparītam anyasyām artha ekatvāt ca eka vākyatām vakṣyati kim tu adhīte vede dvayam āpatati guru kulāt ca samāvartitavyam veda vākyāni ca vicārayitavyāni tatra guru kulāt mā samāvartiṣṭa katham nu veda vākyāni vicārayet iti evam arthaḥ ayam upadeśaḥ 
[I,2,i_I,2,ii]	yadi evam na tarhi veda adhyayanam pūrvam dharma jijñāsāyāḥ evam hi samāmananti vedam adhītya snāyāt iti iha ca vedam adhītya snāsyan dharmam jijñāsamānaḥ imam āmnā ayam atikrāmet na ca āmnāyaḥ nāma atikramitavyaḥ tat ucyate atikramiṣyāmaḥ imam āmnā ayam anatikrāmantaḥ vedam arthavantam santam anarthakam kalpayema dṛṣṭaḥ hi tasya arthaḥ karma avabodhanam nāma na ca tasya adhyayana mātrāt tatrabhavantaḥ yājñikāḥ phalam samāmananti yat api ca samām anantī iva tatra api dravya saṃskāra karmasu para artha tvāt phala śrutiḥ artha vādaḥ syāt iti artha vāda tām vakṣyati na ca adhīta vedasya snāna ānantaryam etat vidhīyate na hi atra ānataryasya vaktā kaścid śabdaḥ asti pūrva kāla tāyām hi ktvā smaryate na ānantarye 
[I,2,iii]	dṛṣṭa artha tā ca adhyayanasya ānantarye vyāhanyeta lakṣaṇayā tu eṣaḥ arthaḥ syāt na ca idam snānam adṛṣṭa artham vidhīyate kim tu lakṣaṇa yāsnānādi niyamasya paryavasānam veda adhyayana sama kālam āhuḥ vedam adhītya snāyāt guru kulāt mā samāvartiṣṭa iti adṛṣṭa artha tā parihārāya eva tasmāt veda adhyayanam eva pūrvam abhinirvartya ānanataram dharmaḥ jijñāsitavyaḥ iti atha śabdasya sāmarthyam na brūmaḥ anyasya api karmaṇaḥ anantaram dharma jijñāsā na kartavyāḥ iti kim tu vedam adhītya tvaritena na snātavyam anantaram dharmaḥ jijñāsitavyaḥ iti atha śabdasya arthaḥ 
[I,3,i]	atas śabdaḥ vṛttasya apadeśakaḥ hetu arthena yathā kṣema subhikṣaḥ ayam deśaḥ atas aham asmin deśe prativasāmi iti evam adhītaḥ vedaḥ dharma jijñāsāyām hetuḥ jñātaḥ anantaram dharmaḥ jijñāsitavyaḥ iti atas śabdasya sāmarthyam dharmāya hi veda vākyāni vicārayitum anadhīta vedaḥ na śaknuyāt atas etasmāt kāraṇāt anantaram dharmam jijñāsitum icchet iti atas śabdasya arthaḥ 
[I,3,ii]	dharmāya jijñāsā dharma jijñāsā sā hi tasya jñātum icchā sa punar katham jijñāsitavyaḥ kaḥ dharmaḥ kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ kāni asya sādhanāni kāni sādhana ābhāsāni kiṃparaḥ ca iti tatra kaḥ dharmaḥ kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ iti ekena eva sūtreṇa vyākhyātam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti kāni asya sādhanāni kāni sādhana ābhāsāni kiṃparaḥ ca iti śeṣa lakṣaṇena vyākhyātam kva puruṣa para tvam kva vā puruṣaḥ guṇa bhūtaḥ iti etāsām pratijñānām piṇḍasya etat sūtram atha atas dharma jijñāsā iti 
[I,3,iii_I,3,v]	dharmaḥ prasiddhaḥ vā syāt aprasiddhaḥ vā sa ced prasiddhaḥ na jijñāsyaḥ atha aprasiddhaḥ natarām tat etat anarthakam dharma jijñāsā prakaraṇam athavā artha vat dharmam prati hi vipratipannāḥ bahu vidaḥ kecid anyam dharmam āhuḥ kecid anyam saḥ ayam avicārya pravartamānaḥ kaṃcid eva upādadānaḥ vihanyeta anartham ca ṛcchet tasmāt dharmaḥ jijñāsitavyaḥ sa hi niḥśreyasena puruṣam saṃyunakti iti pratijānīmahe tat abhidhīyate 
[I,3,vi_I,3,vii]	codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ codanā iti kriyāyāḥ pravartakam vacanam āhuḥ ācārya coditaḥ karomi iti hi dṛśyate lakṣyate yena tat lakṣaṇam dhūmaḥ lakṣaṇam agneḥ iti hi vadanti tayā yaḥ lakṣyate saḥ arthaḥ puruṣam niḥśreyasena saṃyunakti iti pratijānīmahe codanā hi bhūtam bhavantam bhaviṣyantam sūkṣmam vyavahitam viprakṛṣṭam iti evaṃjātīyakam artham śaknoti avagamayitum na anyat kiṃcana indriyam 
[I,4,i_I,4,ii]	nanu atathābhūtam api artham brūyāt codanā yathā yat kiṃcana laukikam vacanam nadyāḥ tīre phalāni santi iti tat tathyam api bhavati vitatham api bhavati iti ucyate vipratiṣiddham idam abhidhīyate bravīti ca vitatham ca iti bravīti iti ucyate avabodhayati budhyamānasya nimittam bhavati iti yasmin ca nimitta bhūte sati avabudhyate saḥ avabodhayati yadi ca codanāyām satyām agnihotrāt svargaḥ bhavati iti avagamyate katham ucyate na tathā bhavati iti atha na tathā bhavati katham avabudhyate asantam artham avabudhyate iti vipratiṣiddham 
[I,4,iii]	na ca svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti atas vacanāt saṃdigdham avagamyate bhavati vā svargaḥ na vā bhavati iti na ca niścitam avagamyamānam idam mithyā syāt yaḥ hi janitvā pradhvaṃsate na etat evam iti sa mithyā pratyayaḥ na ca eṣa kāla antare puruṣa antare avasthā antare deśa antare vā viparyeti tasmāt avitathaḥ tasmāt avitathaḥ 
[I,4,iv]	yat tu laukikam vacanam tat ced pratyayitāt puruṣāt indriya viṣayam vā avitatham eva tat atha apratyayitāt puruṣāt anindriya viṣayam vā tat puruṣa buddhi prabhavam apramāṇam aśakyam hi tat puruṣeṇa jñātum ṛte vacanāt aparasmāt pauruṣeyāt vacanāt avagatam iti ced tat api tena eva tulyam na evaṃjātīyakeṣu artheṣu puruṣa vacanam prāmāṇyam upaiti jāti andhānām iva vacanam rūpa viśeṣeṣu 
[I,4,v_I,5,i]	nanu aviduṣām upadeśaḥ na avakalpate upadiṣṭavantaḥ ca manu ādayaḥ tasmāt puruṣāḥ santaḥ viditavantaḥ ca yathā cakṣuṣā rūpam upalabhyate iti darśanāt eva avagatam ucyate upadeśaḥ hi vyāmohāt api bhavati asati vyāmohe vedāt api bhavati api ca pauruṣeyāt vacanāt evam ayam puruṣaḥ veda iti bhavati pratyayaḥ na evam ayam arthaḥ iti viplavate khalu api kaścid puruṣa kṛtāt vacanāt pratyayaḥ na tu veda vacanasya mithyātve kiṃcana pramāṇam asti nanu sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam bhaviṣyati pauruṣeyam vacanam vitatham upalabhya vacana sāmānyāt veda vacanam mithyā iti anumīyate 
[I,5,ii]	na anya tvāt na hi anyasya vitatha bhāve anyasya vaitathyam bhavitum arhati anya tvāt eva na hi devadattasya śyāma tve yajñadattasya api śyāma tvam bhavitum arhati api ca puruṣa vacana sādharmyāt veda vacanam vitatham iti anumānam pratyakṣaḥ tu veda vacane pratyayaḥ na ca anumānam pratyakṣa virodhi pramāṇam bhavati tasmāt codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ śreyaskaraḥ evam tarhi śreyaskaraḥ jijñāsitavyaḥ kim dharma jijñāsayā ucyate yaḥ eva śreyaskaraḥ saḥ eva dharma śabdena ucyate katham avagamyate yaḥ hi yāgam anutiṣṭhati tam dhārmikaḥ iti samācakṣate yaḥ ca yasya kartā sa tena vyapadiśyate yathā pācakaḥ lāvakaḥ iti tena yaḥ puruṣam niḥśreyasena saṃyunakti saḥ eva dharma śabdena ucyate na kevalam loke vede api 
[I,5,iii_I,5,v]	yajñena yajñam ayajanta devāḥ tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan iti yajati śabda vācyam eva dharmam samānanti ubhayam iha codanayā lakṣyate arthaḥ anarthaḥ ca kaḥ arthaḥ yaḥ niḥśreyasāya jyotiṣṭoma ādiḥ kaḥ anarthaḥ yaḥ pratyavāyāya śyenaḥ vajraḥ iṣuḥ iti evamādiḥ tatra anarthaḥ dharmaḥ uktaḥ mā bhūt iti artha grahaṇam katham punar asau anarthaḥ hiṃsā hi sā sā ca pratiṣiddhā katham punar asau anarthaḥ kartavyatayā upadiśyate ucyate na eva śyena ādayaḥ kartavya tayā vijñāyante yaḥ hi hiṃsitum icchet tasya ayam abhyupāyaḥ iti hi teṣām upadeśaḥ śyenena abhicaran yajeta iti hi samāmananti na abhicaritavyam iti 
[I,5,vi_I,6,i]	nanu aśaktam idam sūtram imau arthau abhivaditum codanā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ na indriya ādi lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ ca dharmaḥ na anarthaḥ iti ekam hi idam vākyam tat evam sati bhidyeta ucyate yatra vākyāt eva arthaḥ avagamyate tatra evam tat tu vaidikeṣu na sūtreṣu anyatas avagate arthe sūtram evam artham iti avagamyate tena ca eka deśaḥ sūtryate iti sūtram tatra bhinnayoḥ eva vākyayoḥ imau eka deśau iti avagantavyam athavā arthasya sataḥ codanā lakṣaṇasya dharma tvam ucyate iti eka artham eva iti 
[I,6,ii_I,6,iv]	tasya nimitta parīṣṭiḥ uktam asmābhiḥ codanā nimittam dharmasya jñānam iti tat pratijñā mātreṇa uktam idānīm tasya nimittam parīkṣiṣyāmahe kim codanā eva utā anyat api iti tasmāt na tāvat niścīyate codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti tat ucyate 
[I,6,v_I,6,vii]	sat saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma tat pratyakṣam animittam vidyamāna upalaṃbhana tvāt idam parīkṣyate pratyakṣam tāvat animittam kim kāraṇam evaṃlakṣaṇakam hi tat sat saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma tat pratyakṣam sati indriya artha saṃbandhe yā puruṣasya buddhiḥ jāyate tat pratyakṣam bhaviṣyan ca eṣaḥ arthaḥ na jñāna kāle asti sataḥ ca etat upalambhanam na asataḥ atas pratyakṣam animittam buddhiḥ vā janma vā saṃnikarṣaḥ vā iti na eṣām kasyacid avadhāraṇa artham etat sūtram sati indriya artha saṃprayoge na asati iti etāvat avadhāryate anekasmin avadhāryamāṇe bhidyeta vākyam pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvāt ca anumāna upamāna artha apattīnām api akāraṇa tvam abhāvaḥ api na asti yatas 
[I,7,i_I,7,ii]	autpattikaḥ tu śabdasya arthena saṃbandhaḥ tasya jñānam upadeśaḥ avyatirekaḥ ca arthe anupalabdhe tat pramāṇam bādarāyaṇasya anapekṣa tvāt autpattikaḥ iti nityam brūmaḥ utpattiḥ hi bhāvaḥ ucyate lakṣaṇayā aviyuktaḥ śabda arthayoḥ bhāvaḥ saṃbandhena na utpannayoḥ paścāt saṃbandhaḥ autpattikaḥ śabdasya arthena saṃbandhaḥ tasya agnihotra ādi lakṣaṇasya dharmasya nimittam pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ anavagatasya katham upadeśaḥ hi bhavati upadeśaḥ iti viśiṣṭasya śabdasya uccāraṇam avyatirekaḥ ca bhavati tasya jñānasya na hi tat utpannam jñānam viparyeti yat ca nāma jñānam utpannam na viparyeti na tat śakyate vaktum na etat evam iti yathā vijñāyate na tathā bhavati yathā etat na vijñāyate tathā etat iti anyat asya hṛdaye anyat vāci syāt evam vadataḥ viruddham idam avagamyata asti na asti ca iti tasmāt tat pramāṇam anapekṣa tvāt na hi evam sati pratyaya antaram apekṣitavyam puruṣa antaram vā svayaṃpratyayaḥ hi asau bādarāyaṇasya idam matam kīrtyate bādarāyaṇam pūjayitum na ātmīyam matam paryudasitum 
[I,7,iii_I,8,i]	vṛtti kāraḥ tu anyathā imam grantham varṇayāṃcakāra tasya nimitta parīṣṭiḥ iti evamādim na parīkṣitavyam nimittam pratyakṣa ādīni hi prasiddhāni pramāṇāni tad antargatam ca śāstram atas tat api na parīkṣitavyam nanu vyabhicārāt parīkṣitavyam nimittam śuktikā hi rajata vat prakāśate yatas tena pratyakṣam vyabhicarati tad mūla tvāt ca anumāna ādīni api tatra aparīkṣya pravartamānaḥ arthāt vihanyeta anartham ca āpnuyāt kadācid na etat evam yat pratyakṣam na tat vyabhicarati yat vyabhicarati na tat pratyakṣam kim tarhi pratyakṣam tad saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma sat pratyakṣam 
[I,8,ii^1]	yat viṣayam jñānam tena eva saṃprayogaḥ indriyāṇām puruṣasya buddhi janma sat pratyakṣam yat anya viṣayam jñānam anya saṃprayoge bhavati na tat pratyakṣam katham punar idam avagamyate idam tad saṃprayoge idam anya saṃprayogaḥ iti yat na anya saṃprayoge tat tad saṃprayoge etad viparītam anya saṃprayogaḥ iti katham jñāyate yadā hi śuktikāyām api rajatam manyamanaḥ rajata saṃnikṛṣṭam me cakṣuḥ iti manyate bādhakam hi yatra jñānam utpadyate na etat evam mithyājñānam idam iti tat anya saṃprayoge viparītam tad saṃprayogaḥ iti prāk bādhaka jñāna utpatteḥ katham avagamyate yadā na tad kāle saṃyak jñānasya mithyājñānasya ca kaścid viśeṣaḥ 
[I,8,ii^2_I,8,iii]	yadā kṣudh ādibhiḥ upahatam manaḥ bhavati indriyam vā timira ādibhiḥ saukṣmya ādibhiḥ vā bāhyaḥ viṣayaḥ tatas mithyājñānam anupahateṣu saṃyak jñānam indriya manortha saṃnikarṣaḥ hi jñānasya hetuḥ asati tasmin ajñānāt tad antargataḥ doṣaḥ mithyājñānasya hetuḥ duṣṭeṣu hi jñānam mithyā bhavati katham avagamyate doṣa apagame saṃpratipatti darśanāt katham duṣṭa aduṣṭa avagamaḥ iti ced prayatnena anvicchantaḥ na ced doṣam upalabhemahi pramāṇa abhāvāt aduṣṭam iti manyemahi tasmāt yasya ca duṣṭam karaṇam yatra ca mithyā iti pratyayaḥ saḥ eva asamīcīnaḥ pratyayaḥ na anyaḥ iti nanu sarve eva nirālambanaḥ svapna vat pratyayaḥ pratyayasya hi nirālambanatā svabhāvaḥ upalakṣitaḥ svapne jāgrataḥ api stambhaḥ iti vā kuḍyam iti vā pratyayaḥ eva bhavati tasmāt saḥ api nirālambanaḥ 
[I,8,iv]	ucyate stambhaḥ iti jāgrataḥ buddhiḥ su pariniścitā katham viparyasiṣyati svapne api evam eva su pariniścitā āsīt prāk prabodhanāt na tatra kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti ced na svapne viparyaya darśanāt aviparyayāt ca itarasmin tad sāmānyāt itaratra api bhaviṣyati iti ced yadi pratyaya tvāt svapna pratyayasya mithyā bhāvaḥ jāgrat pratyayasya api bhavitum arhati atha pratītiḥ tathā abhāvasya hetuḥ na śakyate pratyayāt ayam anyaḥ iti vaditum anyatas tu svapna pratyayasya mithyā bhāvaḥ viparyayāt avagataḥ kutas iti ced sa nidrasya manasaḥ daurbalyāt nidrā mithyā bhāvasya hetuḥ svapna ādau svapna ante ca suṣuptasya pratyaya abhāvaḥ eva acetayan eva hi suṣuptaḥ iti ucyate tasmāt jāgrataḥ pratyayaḥ na mithyā iti nanu jāgrataḥ api karaṇa doṣaḥ syāt yadi syāt avagamyeta svapna darśana kāle api na avagamyate iti ced tat na prabuddhaḥ hi avagacchati nidrā ākrāntam me manaḥ āsīt iti 
[I,9,i_I,9,iii]	śūnyaḥ tu katham artha jñānayoḥ ākāra bhedam na upalabhāmahe pratyakṣā ca naḥ buddhiḥ atas tad bhinnam artha rūpam nāma na kiṃcid asti iti paśyāmaḥ syāt etat evam yadi artha ākārā buddhiḥ syāt nirākārā tu naḥ buddhiḥ ākāravān bāhyaḥ arthaḥ sa hi bahis deśa saṃbaddhaḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyate artha viṣayā hi pratyakṣa buddhiḥ na buddhi antara viṣayā kṣaṇikā hi sā na buddhi antara kālam avasthāsyate iti utpadyamānā eva asau jñāyate jñāpayati ca artha antaram pradīpa vat iti yadi ucyeta tat na na hi ajñāte arthe kaścid buddhim upalabhate jñāte tu anumānāt avagacchati tatra yaugapadyam anupapannam 
[I,9,iv]	nanu utpannāyām eva buddhau arthaḥ jñātaḥ iti ucyate na anutpannāyām atas pūrvam buddhiḥ utpadyate paścāt jñātaḥ arthaḥ nanu utpannāyām eva buddhau arthaḥ jñātaḥ iti ucyate na anutpannāyām atas pūrvam buddhiḥ utpadyate paścāt jñātaḥ arthaḥ satyam pūrvam buddhiḥ utpadyate na tu pūrvam jñāyate bhavati hi kadācid etat yat jñātaḥ arthaḥ saḥ ajñātaḥ iti ucyate na ca artha vyapadeśam antareṇa buddheḥ rūpa upalambhanam tasmāt na avi apadeśyā buddhiḥ avyapadeśyam ca naḥ pratyakṣam tasmāt apratyakṣā buddhiḥ 
[I,10,i_I,10,ii]	api ca kāmam eka rūpa tve buddheḥ eva abhāvaḥ na tu arthasya pratyakṣasya sataḥ na ca eka rūpyam nirākārām eva hi buddhim anumimīmahe sa ākāram ca artham pratyakṣam eva avagacchāmaḥ tasmāt artha ālambanaḥ pratyayaḥ api ca niyata nimittaḥ tantuṣu eva upādīyamāneṣu paṭa pratyayaḥ itarathā tantu upādāne api kadācid ghaṭa buddhiḥ avikala indriyasya syāt na ca evam asti tasmāt na nirālambanaḥ pratyayaḥ atas na vyabhicarati pratyakṣam 
[I,10,iii]	anumānam jñāta saṃbandhasya eka deśa darśanāt eka deśa antare asaṃnikṛṣṭe arthe buddhiḥ tat tu dvividham pratyakṣatodṛṣṭa saṃbandham sāmānyatodṛṣṭa saṃbandham ca tatra pratyakṣatodṛṣṭa saṃbandham yathā dhūma ākṛti darśanāt agni ākṛti vijñānam sāmānyatodṛṣṭa saṃbandham ca yathā devadattasya gati pūrvikam deśa antara prāptim upalabhya āditye api gati smaraṇam 
[I,10,iv_I,10,vi]	śāstram śabda vijñānāt asaṃnikṛṣṭe arthe vijñānam upamānam api sādṛśyam asaṃnikṛṣṭe arthe buddhim utpādayati yathā gavaya darśanam go smaraṇasya arthāpattiḥ api dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā arthaḥ anyathā na upapadyate iti artha kalpanā yathā jīvataḥ devadattasya gṛha abhāva darśanena bahirbhāvasya adṛṣṭasya kalpanā 
[I,10,vii_I,11,i]	abhāvaḥ api pramāṇa abhāvaḥ na asti iti asya arthasya asaṃnikṛṣṭasya tasmāt prasiddha tvāt na parīkṣitavyam nimittam nanu pratyakṣa ādīni anyāni bhavantu nāma pramāṇāni śabdaḥ tu na pramāṇam kutas animittam vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt animittam apramāṇam śabdaḥ yaḥ hi upalambhana viṣayaḥ na upalabhyate sa na asti yathā śaśasya viṣāṇam upalambhanāni ca indriyāṇi paśu ādīnām na ca paśu kāma iṣṭi anantaram paśavaḥ upalabhyante atas na iṣṭiḥ paśuphalā karma kāle ca karma phalena bhavitavyam yad kālam hi mardanam tad kālam mardana sukham 
[I,11,ii]	kāla antare phalam dāsyati iti ced na na kāla antare phalam iṣṭeḥ iti avagacchāmaḥ kutas yadā tāvat asau vidyamānā āsīt tadā phalam na dattavatī yadā phalam utpadyate tadā asau na asti asatī ca katham dāsyati api ca karma kāle eva phalam śrūyate yāgaḥ karaṇam iti vākyāt avagamyate karaṇam ced utpannam kāryeṇa bhavitavyam iti pratyakṣam ca phala kāraṇam anyat upalabhāmahe na ca dṛṣṭe kāraṇe sati adṛṣṭam kalpayitum śakyate pramāṇa abhāvāt evam dṛṣṭa apacārasya vedasya svarga ādi api phalam na bhavati iti manyāmahe 
[I,11,iii_I,11,iv]	dṛṣṭa viruddham api bhavati kiṃcid vaidikam vacanam pātra cayanam vidhāya āha saḥ eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamānaḥ añjasā svargam lokam yāti iti pratyakṣam śarīram vyapadiśati na ca tat svargam lokam yāti pratyakṣam hi tat dahyate na ca eṣa yāti iti vidhi śabdaḥ evaṃjātīyakam ca pramāṇa viruddham vacanam apramāṇam ambuni majjanti alābūni grāvānaḥ plavante iti yathā tad sāmānyāt agnihotra ādi codanāsu api anāśvāsaḥ tasmāt na codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ autpattikaḥ tu śabdasya arthena saṃbandhaḥ tasya jñānam 
[I,11,v]	tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati apauruṣeyaḥ śabdasya arthena saṃbandhaḥ tasya agnihotra ādi lakṣaṇasya arthasya jñānam pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ anavagamyamānasya tathā ca codanā lakṣaṇaḥ saṃyak pratyayaḥ iti pauruṣeye hi sati saṃbandhe yaḥ pratyayaḥ tasya mithyā bhāvaḥ āśaṅkyeta para pratyayaḥ hi tadā syāt atha śabde bruvati katham mithyā iti na hi tadānīm anyatas puruṣāt avagamaḥ bravīti iti ucyata avabodhayati budhyamānasya nimittam bhavati iti śabde ced nimitta bhūte svayam avabudhyate katham vipralabdham brūyāt na etat evam iti na ca asya codanā syāt vā na vā iti sāṃśayikam pratyayam utpādayati na ca mithyā etat iti kāla antare deśa antare avasthā antare puruṣa antare vā punar avyapadeśyaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati yaḥ api anya pratyaya viparyāsam dṛṣṭvā atra api viparyasiṣyati iti ānumānikaḥ pratyayaḥ utpadyate saḥ api anena pratyakṣeṇa pratyayena virudhyamānaḥ bādhyate tasmāt codanā lakṣaṇaḥ eva dharmaḥ 
[I,12,i_I,12,ii]	syāt etat evam na eva śabdasya arthena asti saṃbandhaḥ kutas asya pauruṣeya tā vā iti katham syāt ced arthena saṃbandhaḥ kṣurama udaka śabda uccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭana pūraṇe syātām yadi saṃśleṣa lakṣaṇam saṃbandham abhipretya ucyate kārya kāraṇa nimitta naimittika āśraya āśrayi bhāva yaunādayaḥ tu saṃbandhāḥ śabdasya anupapannāḥ eva iti 
[I,12,iii]	ucyate yaḥ atra vyapadeśyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ tam ekam na vyapadiśati bhavān pratyayyasya pratyāyakasya ca yaḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ tam iti āha yadi pratyāyakaḥ śabdaḥ prathama śrutaḥ kim na pratyāyayati ucyate sarvatra naḥ darśanam pramāṇam pratyāyaka iti hi pratyayam dṛṣṭvā avagacchāmaḥ na prathama śrutaḥ iti prathama śravaṇe pratyayam adṛṣṭvā yāvat kṛtvas śrutāt artha avagamaḥ yathā cakṣuḥ draṣṭḥ na bāhyena prakāśena vinā prakāśayati iti adraṣṭṛ na bhavati 
[I,12,iv]	yadi prathama śrutaḥ na pratyāyayati kṛtakaḥ tarhi śabdasya arthena saṃbandhaḥ kutas svabhāvataḥ hi asaṃbandhau etau śabda arthau mukhe hi śabdam upalabhāmahe bhūmau artham śabdaḥ ayam na tu arthaḥ arthaḥ ayam na śabda iti ca vyapadiśanti rūpa bhedaḥ api bhavati gauḥ iti imam śabdam uccārayanti sāsnādimantam artham avabudhyante iti pṛthak bhūtayoḥ ca yaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sa kṛtakaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā rajju ghaṭayoḥ iti atha gauḥ iti atra kaḥ śabdaḥ gakāra aukāra visarjanīyāḥ iti bhagavān upavarṣaḥ śrotra grahaṇe hi arthe loke śabda śabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ te ca śrotra grahaṇāḥ 
[I,13,i]	yadi evam artha pratyayaḥ na upapadyate katham ekaika akṣara vijñāne hi arthaḥ na upalabhyate na ca akṣara vyatiriktaḥ anyaḥ kaścid asti samudāyaḥ nāma yatas artha pratipattiḥ syāt yadā hi gakāraḥ na tad aukāra ādi visarjanīyau yat aukāra visarjanīyau na tadā gakāraḥ atas gakāra ādi vyatiriktaḥ anyaḥ go śabdaḥ asti yatas artha pratipattiḥ syāt antarhite api śabde smaraṇāt artha pratyayaḥ iti ced na smṛteḥ api kṣaṇika tvāt akṣaraiḥ tulya tā 
[I,13,ii_I,13,iv]	pūrva varṇa janita saṃskāra sahitaḥ antya varṇaḥ pratyāyakaḥ iti adoṣaḥ nanu evam api śabdāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti laukikam vacanam anupapannam syāt ucyate yadi na upapadyate anupapannam nāma na hi laukikam vacanam anupapannam iti etāvatā pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ anavagamyamānaḥ arthaḥ śakyaḥ abhyupagantum laukikāni vacanāni upapanna arthāni anupapanna arthāni ca dṛśyante yathā devadatta gām abhyāja iti evamādīni daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṭ apūpāḥ iti evamādīni ca nanu ca śāstra kārāḥ api evam āhuḥ pūrva aparībhūtam bhāvam ākhyātena ācaṣṭe vrajati pacati iti upakrama prabhṛti apavarga paryantam iti yathā na śāstra kāra vacanam api alam imam artham apramāṇakam upapādayitum 
[I,14,i]	api ca na eva etat anupapanna artham akṣarebhyaḥ saṃskāraḥ saṃskārāt artha pratipattiḥ iti bhavanti artha pratpattau akṣarāṇi nimittam gauṇaḥ eṣa śabdaḥ iti ced na gauṇaḥ akṣareṣu nimitta bhāvaḥ tad bhāve bhāvāt tad abhāve ca abhāvāt atha api gauṇaḥ syāt na gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ mā bhūt iti etāvatā pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ anavagamyamānaḥ arthaḥ śakyaḥ parikalpayitum na hi agniḥ māṇavakaḥ iti ukte agni śabdaḥ gauṇaḥ mā bhūt iti jvalanaḥ eva māṇavakaḥ iti adhyavasīyate na ca pratyakṣaḥ gakāra ādibhyaḥ anyaḥ go śabdaḥ iti bheda darśana abhāvāt abheda darśanāt ca gakāra ādīni hi pratyakṣāṇi tasmāt gauḥ iti gakāra ādi visarjanīya antam padam akṣarāṇi eva na tebhyaḥ vyatiriktam anyat padam nāma iti nanu saṃskāra kalpanāyām api adṛṣṭa kalpanā ucyate śābda kalpanāyām sā ca śabda kalpanā ca tasmāt akṣarāṇi eva padam 
[I,14,ii_I,14,iii^1]	atha gauḥ iti asya śabdasya kaḥ arthaḥ sāsnādi viśiṣṭa ākṛtiḥ iti brūmaḥ nanu ākṛtiḥ sādhyāsti vā na vā iti na pratyakṣā satī sādhyā bhavitum arhati rucakaḥ svastikaḥ vardhamānakaḥ iti hi pratyakṣam dṛśyate vyamohaḥ iti ced na na asti pratyaya viparyāse vyamohaḥ iti śakyate vaktum asatī api artha antaraḥ evaṃjātīyake bhavati pratyayaḥ praṅktiḥ yūtham vanam iti yathā iti ced na asaṃbaddham idam vacanam upanyastam kim asati vane vana pratyayaḥ bhavati iti pratyakṣam eva ākṣipyate vṛkṣāḥ api na santi iti yadi evam pratyuktaḥ sa mahāyānikaḥ pakṣaḥ atha kim ākṛti sadbhāva vādī upālabhyate siddhānta antaram te duṣyati vane api te asati vana pratyayaḥ prāpnoti iti evam api prakṛtam dūṣayitum aśaknuvantaḥ te siddhānta antara dūṣaṇam nigraha sthānam āpadyate asādhaka tvāt sa hi vakṣyati duṣyatu yadi duṣyati 
[I,14,iii^2]	kim tena duṣṭena aduṣṭena vā prakṛtam tvayā sādhitam bhavati madīyaḥ vā pakṣaḥ dūṣitaḥ bhavati iti na ca vṛkṣa vyatiriktam vanam yasmāt na upalabhyate tatas vanam na asti iti avagamyate yadi vane anyena hetunā sadbhāva viparītaḥ pratyayaḥ utpadyate mithyā eṣa vana pratyayaḥ iti atas vanam na asti iti avagacchāmaḥ na ca gavā ādiṣu pratyayaḥ viparyeti atas vaiṣamyam atha vana ādiṣu na eva pratyaya viparyāsaḥ na te na santi iti tasmāt asaṃbaddhaḥ paṅkti vana upanyāsaḥ na te na santi iti tasmāt asaṃbaddhaḥ paṅkti vana upanyāsaḥ 
[I,15,i_I,15,iv]	atas upapannam jaimini vacanam ākṛtiḥ padārthaḥ iti yathā ca ākṛtiḥ śabda artha s tathā upariṣṭāt nipuṇataram upapādayiṣyāmaḥ iti atha saṃbandhaḥ kaḥ iti yat śabde vijñāte arthaḥ vijñāyate sa tu kṛtakaḥ iti pūrvam upapāditam tasmāt manyāmahe kena api puruṣeṇa śabdānām arthaiḥ saha saṃbandham kṛtvā saṃvyavahartum vedāḥ praṇītāḥ iti tat idānīm ucyate apauruṣeya tvāt saṃbandhasya siddham iti katham punar idam avagamyate apauruṣeyaḥ eṣa saṃbandhaḥ iti puruṣasya saṃbandhuḥ abhāvāt katham saṃbandhāḥ na asti pratyakṣasya pramāṇasya abhāvāt tad pūrvaka tvāt ca itareṣām 
[I,15,v]	nanu cira vṛtta tvāt pratyakṣasya aviṣayaḥ bhavet idānīntanānām na hi cira vṛttaḥ san na smaryeta na ca himavat ādiṣu kūpa ārām ādi vat asmaraṇam bhavitum arhati puruṣa viyogaḥ hi teṣu bhavati deśa utsādena kula utsādena vā na tu śabda artha vyavahāra viyogaḥ puruṣānām asti syāt etat saṃbandha mātra vyavahāriṇaḥ niṣprayojanam kartṛ smaraṇam anādriyamānāḥ puruṣāḥ vismareyuḥ iti tat 
[I,16,i]	na yadi hi puruṣaḥ kṛtvā saṃbandham vyavahārayet vyavahāra kāle avaśyam smartavyaḥ bhavet saṃpratipattau hi kartṛ vyavahartroḥ arthaḥ sidhyati na vipratipattau na hi vṛddhi śabdena apāṇineḥ vyavahārataḥ āda ecaḥ pratiyeran pāṇinikṛtim ananumanyamānasya vā tathā makāreṇa api apiṅgalasya na sarva guruḥ trikaḥ pratīyeta piṅgala kṛtim ananumanyamānasya vā tena kartṛ vyavahartārau saṃpratipadyete tena vedaiḥ vyavaharadbhiḥ avaśyam smaraṇīyaḥ saṃbandhasya kartā syāt vyavahārasya ca na hi vismṛte vṛddhiḥ ādaij iti asya sūtrasya kartari vṛddhiḥ yasya ācām ādis tat vṛddham iti kiṃcid pratīyeta tasmāt asmaraṇāt avagacchāmaḥ na kṛtvā saṃbandham vyavahāra artham kenacid vedāḥ praṇītāḥ iti 
[I,16,ii_I,16,iii]	yadi api ca vismaraṇam upapadyeta tathā api na pramāṇam antareṇa saṃbandhāram pratipadyemahi yathā vidyamānasya api anupalambhanam bhavati iti na etāvatā vinā pramāṇena śaśa viṣāṇam pratipadyemahi tasmāt apauruṣeyaḥ śabdasya arthena saṃbandhaḥ iti nanu arthāpattyā saṃbandhāram pratipadyemahi na hi akṛta saṃbandhāt śabdāt artham pratipadyamānam upalabhāmahe pratipadyeran ced prathama śravaṇe api pratipadyeran tad anupalambhanāt avaśyam bhavitavyam saṃbandhra iti manyāmahe iti ced na siddha vat upadeśāt 
[I,16,iv_I,17,ii]	yadi saṃbandhuḥ abhāvāt niyogataḥ na arthāḥ upalabhyeran tatas artha āpattyā saṃbandhāram avagacchāmaḥ asti tu anyaḥ prakāraḥ vṛddhānām sva arthena vyavaharamāṇānām upaśṛṇvantaḥ bālāḥ pratyakṣam artham pratipadyamānāḥ dṛśyante te api vṛddhāḥ yadā bālāḥ āsaṃ tadā anyebhyaḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ te api anyebhyaḥ iti na asti ādiḥ iti evam vā bhavet athavā na kaścid ekaḥ api śabdaḥ arthena saṃbaddhaḥ āsīt atha kenacid saṃbandhāḥ pravartitāḥ iti atra vṛddha vyavahāre sati na arthāt āpadyeta saṃbandhasya kārtā api ca vṛddha vyavahāra vādinaḥ pratyakṣam upadiśanti kalpayanti itare saṃbandhāram na ca pratyakṣe pratyarthini kalpanā sādhvī tasmāt saṃbandhuḥ abhāvaḥ avyatirekaḥ ca yathā asmin deśe sāsnādimati go śabdaḥ evam sarveṣu durgameṣu api bahavaḥ saṃbandhāraḥ katham saṃgaṃsyante ekaḥ api na śaknuyāt atas na asti saṃbandhā aparaḥ āha avyatirekaḥ ca 
[I,17,iii]	na hi saṃbandha vyatiriktaḥ kaścid kālaḥ asti yasmin na kaścid api śabdaḥ kenacid arthena saṃbaddhaḥ āsīt katham saṃbandha kriyā eva hi na upapadyate avaśyam anena saṃbandham kurvatā kenacid śabdena kartavyaḥ yena kriyeta tasya kena kṛtaḥ atha anyena kenacid kṛtaḥ tasya kena iti tasya kena iti na eva avatiṣṭhate tasmāt avaśyam anena saṃbandham kurvatā akṛta saṃbandhāḥ kecana śabdāḥ vṛddha vyavahāra siddhāḥ abhyupagantavyāḥ asti ced vyavahāra siddhiḥ na niyogataḥ saṃbandhrā bhavitavyam iti arthāpattiḥ api na asti syāt etat aprasiddha saṃbandhāḥ bālāḥ katham vṛddhebhyaḥ pratipadyante iti na hi dṛṣṭe anupapannam nāma dṛṣṭāḥ hi bālāḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ pratipadyamānāḥ na tu apratipanna saṃbandhāḥ saṃbandhasya kartuḥ tasmāt vaiṣamyam 
[I,17,iv_I,18,iii]	arthe anupalabdhe anupalabdhe ca devatā ādau arthe anarthakam saṃjñā karaṇam aśakyam ca viśeṣān pratipattum hi saṃjñāḥ kriyante viśeṣān ca uddiśya tat viśeṣeṣu ajñāyamāneṣu ubhayam api anavakḷptam tasmāt apauruṣeyaḥ śabdasya arthena saṃbandhaḥ atas ca tat pramāṇam anapekṣa tvāt na hi evam sati puruṣa antaram pratyaya antaram vā apekṣate tasmāt codanā lakṣaṇaḥ eva dharmaḥ na anya lakṣaṇaḥ bādarāyaṇa grahaṇam uktam 
[I,18,iv]	atha yat uktam animittam śabdaḥ karma kāle phala adarśanāt kāla antare ca karma abhāvāt pramāṇam na asti iti tat ucyate na syāt pramāṇam yadi pañca eva pramāṇāni abhaviṣyan yena yena hi pramīyate tat tat pramāṇam śabdena api pramīyate tatas śabdaḥ api pramāṇam yathā eva pratyakṣam na ca pramāṇena avagatam pramāṇa antareṇa anavagatam iti etāvatā anavagatam bhavati na ca evam śrūyate kṛte karmaṇi tāvatī eva phalam bhavati kim tu karmaṇā phalam prāpyate iti yat ca kāla antare phalasya anyat pratyakṣam kāraṇam asti iti na eṣa doṣaḥ tat ca eva hi
[I,18,v_I,18,viii]	tatra kāraṇam śabdaḥ ca iti yat tu pratyakṣa viruddham vacanam upanyastam saḥ eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamānaḥ añjasā svargam lokam yāti iti pratyakṣam śarīram vyapadiśati iti tat ucyate śarīra saṃbandhāt yasya tat śarīram saḥ api taiḥ yajña āyudhaiḥ yajñāyudhī iti ucyate āha kaḥ asau anyaḥ na enam upalabhāmahe 
[I,18,ix_I,19,ii]	nanu prāṇa ādibhiḥ enam upalabhāmahe yaḥ asau prāṇiti apāniti ucchvasiti nimiṣati ityādi ceṣṭitavān saḥ atra śarīre yajñāyudhī iti nanu śarīram eva prāṇiti apāniti ca na prāṇa ādayaḥ śarīra guṇāḥ śarīra guṇa vidharmāṇaḥ hi te ayāvat śarīra bhāvi tvāt yāvat śarīram tāvat asya guṇāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ prāṇa ādayaḥ tu sati api śarīre na bhavanti atas na śarīra guṇāḥ prāṇa ādayaḥ sukha ādayaḥ ca svayam upalabhyante na rūpa ādayaḥ iva śarīra guṇāḥ pareṇa api tasmāt śarīra guṇa vaidharmyāt anyaḥ śarīrāt yajñāyudhī iti āha kutas eṣaḥ saṃpratyayaḥ sukha ādibhyaḥ anyaḥ tadvān asti iti na hi sukha ādi pratyākhyānena tasya svarūpam upalabhāmahe tasmāt śaśa viṣāṇa vat asau na asti atha ucyate tena vinā kasya sukha ādayaḥ iti 
[I,19,iii]	na kasyacid api iti vakṣyāmaḥ na hi yaḥ yaḥ upalabhyate tasya tasya saṃbandhinā bhavitavyam yasya saṃbandhaḥ api upalabhyate saṃbandhī ca tasya ayam saṃbandhi iti gamyate na hi candramasam ādityam vā upalabhya saṃbandhi antara anveṣaṇā bhavati : kasya ayam iti na kasyacid api iti avadhāryate tasmāt na sukha ādibhyaḥ anyaḥ tadvān asti iti atha upalabdhasya avaśyam kalpayitavyaḥ saṃbandhī bhavet tatas ātmānam api anena prakāreṇa upalabhya kasya ayam iti saṃbandhi antaram anviṣyema tam api kalpayitvā anyam api kalpayitvā anyam iti anavasthā eva syāt atha kaṃcid kalpayitvā na saṃbandhi antaram api kalpayiṣyasi tāvatī eva viraṃsyasi tāvatā ca paritokṣyasi tatas vijñānaḥ eva parituṣya tāvatī eva virantum arhasi 
[I,19,iv_I,19,v]	atra ucyate yadi vijñānāt anyaḥ vijñātā na asti kaḥ tarhi jānāti iti ucyate jñānasya kartuḥ abhidhānam anena śabdena upapadyate tat eṣa śabdaḥ arthavān kartavyaḥ iti jñānāt vyatiriktam ātmānam kalpayiṣyāmaḥ iti āha devāḥ enam śabdam arthavantam kalpayiṣyanti yadi kalpayitavyam maṃsyante bahavaḥ khalu iha janāḥ asti ātmā asti ātmā iti ātma sattā vādinaḥ eva śabdasya pratyakṣa vaktāraḥ bhavanti tathā api na ātma sattām kalpayitum ghaṭante kim aṅga punar jānāti iti parokṣa śabda darśanāt tasmāt asat etat 
[I,20,i]	ucyate icchayā ātmānam upalabhāmahe katham upalabdha pūrve hi abhiprete bhavati icchā na anupalabdha pūrve yathā merum uttareṇa yāni asmad jātīyaiḥ anupalabdha pūrvāṇi svādūni vṛkṣa phalāni na tāni prati asmākam icchā bhavati no khalu anyena puruṣeṇa upalabdhe api viṣaye anyasya anupalabdhuḥ icchā bhavati bhavati ca anyedyus upalabdhe aparedyus icchā atas tena upalambhanena samāna kartṛkā sā iti avagacchāmaḥ yadi vijñāna mātram eva idam upalambhakam abhaviṣyat pradhvaste tasmin kasya aparedyus icchā bhaviṣyat atha vijñānāt anyaḥ vijñātā nityaḥ tatas ekasmin ahani yaḥ upalabdhā aparedyus api saḥ eva eṣiṣyati itaratha icchā anupapannā syāt 
[I,20,ii]	atra āha anupapannam iti naḥ kva saṃpratyayaḥ yat na pramāṇena avagatam vijñānāt tāvat anyat na upalabhāmahe yat ca na upalabhāmahe tat śaśa viṣāṇa vat eva na asti iti avagacchāmaḥ na ca tasmin asati vijñāna sadbhāvaḥ anupapannaḥ pratyakṣa avagata tvāt eva kṣaṇika tvam ca asya pratyakṣa pūrvakam eva na ca jñātari vijñānāt anyasmin asati jñāne ca anitye aparedyus icchā anupapannā pratyakṣa avagata tvāt eva no khalu api etat dṛṣṭam yaḥ eva anyedyus upalabdhā saḥ eva aparedyus eṣitā iti idam tu dṛṣṭam yat kvacid anyena dṛṣṭam anyaḥ icchati kvacid na samānāyām santatau anyaḥ icchati santati antare na icchati iti tasmāt na sukha ādi vyatiriktaḥ anyaḥ asti iti 
[I,20,iii_I,21,i]	atra ucyate na hi asmartāraḥ icchanti iti upapadyate na ca adṛṣṭa pūrve smṛtiḥ bhavati tasmāt kṣaṇike vijñāna skandha mātre smṛtiḥ anupapanna iti atra āha smṛtiḥ api icchāvat pūrva vijñāna sadṛśam vijñānam pūrva vijñāna viṣayam vā smṛtiḥ iti ucyate tat ca draṣṭari vinaṣṭe api aparedyus utpadyamānam na anupapannam pratyakṣa avagata tvāt eva anyasmin skandha ghane anyena skandha ghanena yat jñānam tat tad santati jena anyena upalabhyate na atad santati jena tasmāt śūnyāḥ skandha ghanāḥ iti atha asmin arthe brāhmaṇam bhavati vijñāna ghanaḥ eva etebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāni eva anuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñā asti iti 
[I,21,ii_I,21,iii]	atra ucyate na etat evam anyedyus dṛṣṭe aparedyus aham idam adarśam iti bhavati pratyayaḥ pratyagātmani ca etat bhavati na paratra paraḥ hi asau yaḥ anyedyus dṛṣṭavān tasmāt tad vyatiriktaḥ anyaḥ asti yatra ayam ahaṃśabdaḥ āha paratra api ahaṃśabdaḥ bhaktyā dṛśyate tat yathā aham eva putraḥ aham eva devadattaḥ aham eva gacchāmi iti 
[I,21,iv]	atra ucyate na vayam aham iti imam śabdam prayujyamānam anyasmin arthe hetu tvena vyapadiśāmaḥ kim tarhi śabdāt vyatiriktam pratyabhijñā pratyayam pratīmaḥ hi vayam imam artham vayam eva anyedyus upalabhāmahe vayam eva adya smarāmaḥ iti tasmāt vayam imam artham avagacchāmaḥ vayam eva hi o vayam eva adya iti ye ca amī hyas adya ca na te vinaṣṭāḥ atha api asmin arthe brāhmaṇam bhavati sa vai ayam ātmā iti prakṛtyām ananti aśīryaḥ na hi śīryate iti tathā avināśī vai are ayam ātmā anucchitti dharmā iti vinaśvaram ca vijñānam tasmāt vinaśvarāt anyaḥ saḥ iti avagacchāmaḥ na ca śakyam evam avagantum yathā upalabhyante arthāḥ na tathā bhavanti yathā na khalu na upalabhyante tathā bhavanti iti tathā hi sati śaśaḥ na asti śaśasya viṣāṇam asti iti avagamyeta na ca aham pratyayaḥ vyāmohaḥ iti śakyate vaktum bādhaka pratyaya abhāvāt tasmāt sukha ādibhyaḥ vyatiriktaḥ asti evam ced saḥ eva yajñāyudhī iti vyapadiśyate 
[I,22,i_I,22,ii]	āha yadi vijñānāt anyat asti vijñātṛ vijñānam apāsya tat nidarśyatām idam tat īdṛśam ca iti na ca tat nidarśyate tasmāt na tatas anyat asti iti atra ucyate sva saṃvedyaḥ sa bhavati na asau anyena śakyate draṣṭum katham asau nidarśyeta iti yathā ca kaścid cakṣuṣmān svayam rūpam paśyati na ca śaknoti anyasmai jāti andhāya tat nidarśayitum na ca tat na śakyate nidarśayitum iti etāvatā na asti iti avagamyate evam asau puruṣaḥ svayam ātmānam upalabhate na ca anyasmai śaknoti darśayitum anyasya draṣṭuḥ tam puruṣam prati darśana śakti abhāvāt saḥ api anyaḥ puruṣaḥ svayam ātmānam upalabhate na para ātmānam tena sarve svena svena ātmanā ātmānam upalabhamānāḥ santi eva yadi api para puruṣaiḥ na upalabhyante iti atha asmin arthe brāhmaṇam bhavati śāntāyām vāci kiṃjyotiḥ eva ayam puruṣaḥ ātma jyotiḥ saṃrāj iti ha uvāca iti pareṇa na upalabhyate iti atra api brāhmaṇam bhavati agṛhyaḥ na hi gṛhyata iti pareṇa na gṛhyate iti etat abhiprāyam etat kutas svayaṃjyotiṣṭvavacanāt atra api brāhmaṇam bhavati atra ayam puruṣaḥ svayaṃjyotiḥ bhavati iti 
[I,22,iii]	kena punar upāyena ayam anyasmai kathyate iti atra api upāye brāhmaṇam bhavati saḥ eṣa na iti na iti ātmā iti ha uvāca iti asau ayam evaṃrūpaḥ iti na śakyate nidarśayitum yat ca paraḥ paśyati tad pratiṣedhaḥ tasya upadeśa upāyaḥ śarīram paraḥ paśyati tena ātmā upadiśyate śarīram na ātmā asti śarīrāt anyaḥ sa ca ātmā iti śarīra pratiṣedhena ātmā upadiśyate tathā prāṇa ādayaḥ na ātmānaḥ iti tad pratiṣedhena tebhyaḥ anyaḥ upadiśyate tathā para sthāḥ sukha ādayaḥ pareṇa liṅgaiḥ upalabhyante te api na ātmānaḥ iti tad pratiṣedhena tebhyaḥ anyaḥ upadiśyate 
[I,23,i_I,23,ii]	yaḥ svayam paśyati na tatas anyaḥ puruṣaḥ iti etat api puruṣa pravṛttyā anumīyate yadā asau puruṣaḥ pūrvedyus sāmi kṛtānām arthānām pratisamādhāne śeṣa anuṣṭhāne ca yatate atas pravṛttyā avagamyate nūnam asau anityāt nityam avagacchati iti upamānāt ca upadiśyate yādṛśam bhavān svayam ātmānam paśyati anena upamānena avagaccha aham api tādṛṣam eva paśyāmi iti yathā kaścid ātmīyām vedanām parasmai ācakṣīta dahyamānasya iva me bhavati yātyamānasya iva me bhavati rudhyamānasya iva me bhavati iti atas svayam avagamyamāna tvāt asti tad vyatiriktaḥ puruṣaḥ iti 
[I,23,iii]	yat api ucyate vijñānam apāsya tat nidarśyatām iti yadi upāyam eva niśedhasi na śakyam upāyam antareṇa upeyam upetum ayam eva abhyupāyaḥ jñātavyānām arthānām yaḥ yathā jñāyate sa tathā iti tat yathā kaḥ śuklaḥ nāma yatra śukla tvam asti kim śukla tvam nāma yatra śukla śabda pravṛttiḥ kva tasya pravṛttiḥ yat śukla śabdaḥ uccarite pratīyate tasmāt na vijñānam pratyākhyāya kasyacid rūpam nidarśayitum śakyam 
[I,23,iv]	na ca niyogataḥ pratyaye pratīte pratyaya arthaḥ pratītaḥ bhavati apratīte api hi pratyaye sati arthaḥ pratīyate eva na hi vijñānam pratyakṣam vijñeyaḥ arthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti etat pūrvam eva uktam tat avaśya kartavye apahnave kāmam vijñānam apahnūyeta na arthaḥ iti etat api uktam eva tasmāt asti sukha ādibhyaḥ anyaḥ nityaḥ puruṣaḥ iti 
[I,24,i_I,24,ii]	atha yat uktam vijñāna ghanaḥ eva etebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāni eva anuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñā asti iti atra ucyate atra eva mā bhagavān moha antam āpīpadat iti paricodana uttara kāle apahnutya moha anta abhiprāyam asya vacanasya varṇitavān na vai are aham moham bravīmi avināśī vai are ayam ātmā anucchitti dharmā mātrā saṃsargaḥ tu asya bhavati iti tasmāt na vijñāna mātram tasmāt vaiṣamyam yat uktam na ca eṣa yāti iti vidhi śabdaḥ iti mā bhūt vidhi śabdaḥ svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti vacana antareṇa avagatam anuvadiṣyate tasmāt avirodhaḥ 
[I,24,iii_I,24,v]	karma eke tatra darśanāt uktam nityaḥ śabda arthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti tat anupapannam śabdasya anitya tvāt vinaṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ punar asya kriyamāṇasya arthena akṛtakaḥ saṃbandhaḥ na upapadyate na hi prathama śrutāt śabdāt kaścid artham pratyeti katham punar anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnāt uttara kālam dṛśyate yatas atas prayatna anantaryāt tena kriyate iti gamyate nanu abhivyañjyāt saḥ enam na iti brūmaḥ na hi asya prāk abhivyañjanāt sadbhāve kiṃcana pramāṇam asti san ca abhivyajyate na āsan 
[I,24,vi_I,24,vii]	asthānāt no khalu api uccaritam muhūrtam api upalabhāmahe atas vinaṣṭaḥ iti avagacchāmaḥ na ca san na upalabhyate anupalaṃbha kāraṇānām vyavadhāna ādīnām abhāve api anupalambhanāt na ca asau viṣayam aprāptaḥ ākāśa aviṣaya tvāt karṇa chidre api anupalambhanāt 
[I,25,i_I,25,ii]	karoti śabdāt api ca śabdam kuru mā śabdam kārṣīḥ iti vyavahartāraḥ prayuñjate na te nūnam avagacchanti saḥ eva ayam śabdaḥ iti 
[I,25,iii_I,25,iv]	sattva antare ca yaugapadyāt nānā deśeṣu ca yugapad śabdam upalabhāmahe tat ekasya nityasya anupapannam iti asati viśeṣe nityasya na aneka tvam kāryāṇām tu bahūnām nānā deśeṣu kriyamāṇānām upapadyate aneka deśa saṃbandhaḥ tasmāt api anityaḥ 
[I,25,v_I,25,vi]	prakṛti vikṛtyoḥ ca api ca dadhi atra iti atra ikāraḥ prakṛtiḥ yakāraḥ vikṛtiḥ iti upapadiśanti yat vikriyate tat anityam ikāra sādṛśyam ca yakārasya upalabhyate tena api tayoḥ prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ lakṣyate 
[I,25,vii_I,25,viii]	vṛddhiḥ ca kartṛ bhūmnā asya api ca bahubhiḥ uccārayadbhiḥ mahān śabdaḥ śrūyate sa yadi abhivyajyate bahubhiḥ alpaiḥ ca uccāryamāṇaḥ tāvān eva upalabhyeta atas manyāmahe nūnam asya eka ekena kaścid avayavaḥ kriyate yat pracayāt ayam mahān upalabhyate 
[I,26,i_I,26,ii]	samam tu tatra darśanam tuśabdāt pakṣaḥ viparivartate yat uktam prayatnāt uttara kāle darśanāt kṛtakaḥ ayam iti yadi vispaṣṭena hetunā śabdasya nitya tvam vaktum śakṣyāmaḥ tatas nitya pratyaya sāmarthyāt prayatnena abhivyajyate iti bhaviṣyati yadi prāk uccāraṇāt anabhivyaktaḥ prayatnena abhivyajyate tasmāt ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samam etat 
[I,26,iii_I,26,v]	sataḥ param adarśanam viṣayān āgamāt yat aparam kāraṇam uktam uccarita pradhvastaḥ iti atra api yadi śakṣyāmaḥ nityatām asya vispaṣṭam vaktum tatas nitya pratyaya sāmarthyāt kadācid upalambham kadācid anupalambham dṛṣṭvā kiṃcid upalambhasya nimittam kalpayiṣyāmaḥ tat ca saṃyoga vibhāga sadbhāve sati bhavati iti saṃyoga vibhāgau eva abhivyañjakau iti vakṣyāmaḥ uparatayoḥ saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ śrūyate iti ced na etat evam na nūnam uparamanti saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ yatas upalabhyate śabdaḥ iti na hi te pratyakṣāḥ iti yadi śabdam saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ eva abhivyañjanti na kurvanti ākāśa viṣaya tvāt śabdasya ākāśasya ekatvāt yaḥ eva ayam atra śrotra ākāśaḥ saḥ eva deśa antareṣu api iti śrughna sthaiḥ saṃyoga vibhāgaiḥ abhivyaktaḥ pāṭaliputre api upalabhyeta 
[I,26,vi]	yasya punar kurvanti tasya vāyavīyāḥ saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ vāyu āśrita tvāt vāyuṣu eva kariṣyanti yathā tantavaḥ tantuṣu eva paṭam tasya pāṭaliputreṣu anupalambhaḥ yuktaḥ śrughna stha tvāt teṣām yasya api abhivyañjanti tasya api eṣa na doṣaḥ dūre satyāḥ karṇa śaṣkulyāḥ anupakārakāḥ saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ tena dūre yat śrotram tena na upalabhyate iti na etat evam aprāptāḥ ced saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ śrotrasya upakuryuḥ saṃnikṛṣṭa vikṛṣṭa deśa sthau yugapad śabdam upalabheyātām na ca yugapad upalabhete tasmāt na aprāptāḥ upakurvanti na ced upakurvanti tasmāt animittam śabda upalambhane saṃyoga vibhāgau iti 
[I,28,i]	na etat evam abhighātena hi preritāḥ vāyavaḥ timitāni vāyu antarāṇi pratibādhamānāḥ sarvatodikkān saṃyoga vibhāgān utpādayanti yāvat vegam abhipratiṣṭhante te ca vāyoḥ apratyakṣa tvāt saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ na upalabhyante anuparateṣu eva teṣu śabdaḥ upalabhyate na uparateṣu atas na doṣaḥ atas eva ca anuvātam dūrāt upalabhyate śabdaḥ 
[I,28,ii_I,28,iii]	prayogasya param yat aparam kāraṇam uktam śabdam kuru mā kārṣīḥ iti vyavahartāraḥ prayuñjate yadi asaṃśayam nityaḥ śabdaḥ śabda prayogam kuru iti bhaviṣyati yathā gomayāt kuru iti saṃhāre 
[I,28,iv_I,28,v]	āditya vat yaugapadyam yat tu eka deśasya sataḥ nānā deśeṣu yugapad darśanam anupapannam iti ādityam paśya devānāṃpriya ekaḥ san aneka deśau asthitaḥ iva lakṣyate katham punar avagamyate ekaḥ ādityaḥ iti ucyate prāṅmukhaḥ devadattaḥ pūrvāhne saṃprati purastāt ādityam paśyati tasya dakṣiṇatas avasthitaḥ na dvau paśyati ātmanaḥ ca saṃprati na tiraścīnam devadattasya ārjave tasmāt ekaḥ ādityaḥ iti dūra tvāt asya deśaḥ na avadhāryate atas vyāmohaḥ evam śabde api vyāmohāt anavadhāraṇam deśasya yadi śrotram saṃyoga vibhāga deśam āgatya śabdam gṛhṇīyāt tathā api tāvat aneka deśa tā kadācid avagamyeta na ca tad saṃyoga deśam āgacchati pratyakṣā hi karṇa śaṣkulī tad deśā
[I,28,vi_I,28,vii]	gṛhyate vāyavīyāḥ punar saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ apratyakṣasya vāyoḥ karṇa śaṣkulī pradeśe prādurbhavantaḥ na upalabhyante iti na anupapannam atas eva vyāmohaḥ yat nānā deśeṣu śabdaḥ iti ākāśa deśaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti ekam ca punar ākāśam atas api na nānā deśeṣu api ca eka rūpye sati deśa bhedena kāmam deśāḥ eva bhinnāḥ na tu śabdaḥ tasmāt ayam api adoṣaḥ 
[I,28,viii_I,28,ix]	varṇa antaram avikāraḥ na ca dadhi atra iti atra prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ śabda antaram ikārāt yakāraḥ na hi yakāram prayuñjānāḥ ikāram upādadate yathā kaṭam cikrīrṣantaḥ vīraṇāni na ca sādṛśya mātram dṛṣṭvā prakṛtiḥ vikṛtiḥ vā ucyate na hi dādhipiṭakam dṛṣṭvā kunda piṭakam ca prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ avagamyate tasmāt ayam api adoṣaḥ 
[I,28,x_I,28,xi]	nāda vṛddhi parā yat ca etat bahubhiḥ bherīm ādhmanadbhiḥ śabdam uccārayadbhiḥ mahān śabdaḥ upalabhyate tena prati puruṣam śabda avayava pracayaḥ iti gamyate na evam niravayavaḥ hi śabdaḥ avayava bhedān avagamāt niravayava tvāt ca mahattva anupapattiḥ atas na vardhate śabdaḥ mṛduḥ ekena bahubhiḥ ca uccāryamāṇe tāni eva akṣarāṇi karṇa śaṣkulī maṇḍalasya sarvām nemim vyāpnuvadbhiḥ saṃyoga vibhāgaiḥ nairantaryeṇa anekaśas grahaṇāt mahān iva avayavavān iva upalabhyante saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ nairantaryeṇa kriyamāṇāḥ śabdam abhivyañjantaḥ nāda śabda vācyāḥ tena nādasya eṣā vṛddhiḥ na śabdasya iti 
[I,29,i_I,29,iii]	nityaḥ tu syāt darśanasya parārtha tvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ bhavitum arhati kutas darśanasya parārtha tvāt darśanam uccāraṇam tat para artham param artham pratyāyayitum uccarita mātre hi vinaṣṭe śabde na ca anyaḥ anyān artham pratyāyayitum śaknuyāt atas na para artham uccāryeta atha na vinaṣṭaḥ tatas bahuśas upalabdha tvāt artha avagamaḥ iti yuktam arthavat sādṛśyāt artha avagamaḥ iti ced na kaścid arthavān sarveṣām nava tvāt kasyacid pūrvasya kṛtrimaḥ saṃbandhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced tat uktam sadṛśaḥ iti ca avagate vyāmohāt pratyayaḥ vyāvarteta mālā śabdān mālā pratyayaḥ iva yathā gāvī śabdāt sāsnādim iti pratyayasya anivṛttiḥ tadvat bhaviṣyati iti ced na hi go śabdam tatra uccārayitum icchā na iha anya śabda uccicārayiṣā na ca ekena uccāraṇā yatnena saṃvyavahāraḥ ca artha saṃbandhaḥ ca śakyate kartum tasmāt darśanasya parārtha tvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ 
[I,29,iv_I,29,v]	sarvatra yaugapadyāt go śabdaḥ uccarite sarva gavīṣu yugapad pratyayaḥ bhavati atas ākṛti vacanaḥ ayam na ca ākṛtyā śabdasya saṃbandhaḥ śakyate kartum nirdiśya hi ākṛtim kartā saṃbadhnīyāt gopiṇḍe ca bahūnām ākṛtīnām sadbhāvāt śabdam antareṇa go śabda vācyām vibhaktām ākṛtim kena prakāreṇa upadekṣyati nitye tu sati go śabde bahu kṛtvas uccaritaḥ śruta pūrvaḥ ca anyāsu go vyaktiṣu anvaya vyatirekābhyām ākṛti vacanam avagamiṣyati tasmāt api nityaḥ 
[I,30,i_I,30,iii]	saṃkhyā bhāvāt aṣṭa kṛtvas go śabdaḥ uccaritaḥ iti vadanti na aṣṭau go śabdāḥ iti kim atas yadi evam anena vacanena avagamyate pratyabhijānanti iti vayam tāvat pratyabhijānīmaḥ na naḥ karaṇa daurbalyam evam anye api pratyabhijānanti saḥ eva ayam iti pratyabhijānānāḥ vayam iva anye api na anyaḥ iti vaktum arhanti atha matam anya tve sati sādṛśyena vyāmūḍhāḥ saḥ iti vakṣyanti tat na na hi te sadṛśaḥ iti pratiyanti kim tarhi saḥ eva ayam iti vidite ca sphuṭe anya tve vyāmohaḥ iti gamyate na ca ayam anyaḥ iti pratyakṣam anyat vā pramāṇam asti 
[I,30,iv^1]	syāt etat buddhi karmaṇī api te pratyabhijñāyete te api nitye prāpnutaḥ na eṣa doṣaḥ na hi te pratyakṣe atha pratyakṣe nitye eva hi astanasya śabdasya vināśāt anyaḥ adyatanaḥ iti ced na eṣa vinaṣṭaḥ yatas enam punar upalabhāmahe na hi pratyakṣa dṛṣṭam muhūrtam adṛṣṭvā punar upalabhyamānam pratyabhijānantaḥ vinaṣṭam parikalpayanti parikalpayantaḥ dvitīya saṃdarśane mātari jāyāyām pitari vā na āśvasyuḥ na hi anupalambha mātreṇa na asti iti avagamya naṣṭaḥ iti eva kalpayanti apramāṇa tāyām viditāyām na asti iti avagacchāmaḥ na hi pramāṇe pratyakṣe sati apramāṇa tā syāt asti iti punar avyāmohena avagamyamāne na kvacid api abhāvaḥ 
[I,30,iv^2]	na ca asiddhe abhāve vyāmohaḥ na ca siddhaḥ abhāvaḥ tasmāt asati vyāmohe na abhāvaḥ tat etat ānupūrvyā siddham tasmāt purastāt anuccāritam anupalabhamānāḥ api na vinaṣṭaḥ iti avagantum arhanti yathā gṛhāt nirgatāḥ sarva gṛha janam apaśyantaḥ punar praviśya upalabhamānāḥ api na prāk praveśāt vinaṣṭaḥ iti avagacchanti tadvat enam api na anyaḥ iti vaktum arhanti ye api sarveṣām bhāvānām pratikṣaṇam vināśam abhyupagacchanti te api na śaknuvanti śabdasya vaditum ante hi kṣaya darśanāt te manyante na ca śabdasya antaḥ na ca kṣayaḥ lakṣyate saḥ iti pratyakṣaḥ pratyayaḥ sadṛśaḥ iti ānumānikaḥ na ca pratyakṣa viruddham anumānam udeti sva kāryam vā sādhayati tasmāt nityaḥ 
[I,31,i_I,31,ii]	anapekṣa tvāt yeṣām anavagata utpattīnām dravyāṇām bhāvaḥ eva lakṣyate teṣām api keṣāṃcid anitya tā gamyate yeṣām vināśa kāraṇam upalabhyate yathā abhinavam paṭam dṛṣṭvā na ca evam kriyamāṇam upalabdhavān athavā anitya tvam avagacchati rūpam eva dṛṣṭvā tantu vyatiṣaṅga janitaḥ ayam tantu vyatiṣaṅga vināśāt tantu vināśāt vā vinaśyati iti avagacchati na evam śabdasya kiṃcid kāraṇam avagamyate yat vināśāt vinaṅkṣyati iti avagamyate 
[I,31,iii_I,31,iv]	prakhyā bhāvāt ca yogasya idam padebhyaḥ kebhyaścid uttaram sūtram nanu vāyukāraṇakaḥ syāt iti vāyuḥ udgataḥ saṃyoga vibhāgaiḥ śabdaḥ bhavati iti tathā ca śikṣā ākārāḥ āhuḥ vāyuḥ āpadyate śabda tām iti na etat evam vāyavīyaḥ ced śabdaḥ bhavet vāyoḥ saṃniveśa viśeṣaḥ syāt na ca vāyavīyān avayavān śabde sataḥ pratyabhijānīmaḥ yathā paṭasya tantu mayān na ca evam bhavati syāt ced evam sparśanena upalabhemahi na ca vāyavīyān avayavān śabda gatān spṛśāmaḥ tasmāt na vāyukāraṇakaḥ atas nityaḥ 
[I,32,i_I,32,ii]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam ca eva bhavati vācā virūpa nityayā iti anya param hi idam vākyam vācaḥ nityatām anuvadati tasmāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ 
[I,32,iii_I,32,iv]	utpattau vā avacanāḥ syuḥ arthasya ātad nimitta tvāt yadi api autpattikaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ artha saṃbandhaḥ ca tathā api na codanā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ codanā hi vākyam na hi agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti atas vākyāt anyatamāt padāt agnihotrāt svargaḥ bhavati iti gamyate gamyate tu pada trayaḥ uccarite na ca atra caturthaḥ śabdaḥ asti anyat atas pada traya samudāyāt na ca ayam samudāyaḥ asti loke yatas asya vyavahārāt arthaḥ avagamyate padāni amūni prayuktāni teṣām nityaḥ arthaḥ aprayuktaḥ ca samudāyaḥ tasmāt samudāyasya arthaḥ kṛtrimaḥ vyāmohaḥ vā na ca padārthāḥ eva vākya arthaḥ sāmānye hi padam pravartate viśeṣe vākyam anyat ca sāmānyam anyaḥ viśeṣaḥ na ca padārthāt vākya artha a agatiḥ asaṃbandhāt asati ced saṃbandhe kasmiṃścid padārthe avagate artha antaram avagamyeta ekasmin avagate sarvam avagatam syāt na ca etat evam bhavati tasmāt anyaḥ vākya arthaḥ 
[I,32,v^1]	syāt etat aprayuktāt api vākyāt asati saṃbandhe svabhāvāt artha avagamaḥ iti yadi kalpyeta śabdaḥ dharmam ātmīyam vyutkrāmet na ca eṣa śabda dharmaḥ yat aprayuktāt api śabda arthaḥ pratīyate na hi prathama śrutāt kutaścid śabdāt kecid artham pratiyanti tat abhidhīyate pada dharmaḥ ayam na vākya dharmaḥ vākyāt dhi prathama avagatāt api pratiyantaḥ artham dṛśyante na etat evam yadi prathama śrutāt avagaccheyuḥ api tarhi sarve avagaccheyuḥ padārtha vidaḥ anye ca na tu apadārtha vidaḥ avagacchanti tasmāt na etat evam nanu padārthavadbhiḥ api avagacchadbhiḥ akṛtaḥ eva vākya artha saṃbandhaḥ bhaviṣyati padārtha vedanena hi saṃskṛtāḥ avagamiśyanti yathā tam eva padārtham dvitīya ādi śravaṇena iti na iti brūmaḥ 
[I,32,v^2_I,33,iii]	yadi vākye antyaḥ varṇaḥ pūrva varṇa janita saṃskāra sahitaḥ padārthebhyaḥ artha antaram pratyāyayati upakāraḥ tu tadānīm padārtha jñānāt avakalpate tasmāt kṛtrimaḥ vākya artha pratyayaḥ vyāmohaḥ vā na padārtha dvāreṇa saṃbhavati vākya artha jñānam iti nanu evam bhaviṣyati sāmānya vācinaḥ padasya gauḥ iti vā aśvaḥ iti vā viśeṣakam śuklaḥ iti vā kṛṣṇaḥ iti vā padam antikāt upanipatati yadā tadā vākya arthaḥ avagamyate tat na na hi katham iva gauḥ iti vā aśvaḥ iti vā sāmānya vācinaḥ padāt sarva gavīṣu sarva aśveṣu ca buddhiḥ upasarpantī śruti janitā vākya anurodhena kutaścid viśeṣāt apavarteta na ca śuklaḥ iti ādeḥ viśeṣa vacanasya kṛṣṇa ādi nivṛttiḥ bhavati śabda arthaḥ na ca anarthakaḥ mā bhūt iti artha parikalpanā śakyā atas na padārtha janitaḥ vākya arthaḥ tasmāt kṛtrimaḥ pada saṃghātāḥ khalu ete saṃghātāḥ ca puruṣa kṛtāḥ dṛśyante yathā nīlotpala vaneṣu adya carantaḥ cāru saṃravāḥ nīla kauśeya saṃvītāḥ praṇaśyanti iva kādambāḥ atas vaidikāḥ api puruṣa kṛtāḥ iti 
[I,34,i_I,34,ii]	tat bhūtānam kriyā arthena samāmnāyaḥ arthasya tad nimitta tvāt teṣu eva padārtheṣu bhūtānām vartamānānām kriyā arthena samuccāraṇam na anapekṣya padārthān pārtha garthyena vākyam artha antara prasiddham kutas pramāṇa abhāvāt na kiṃcana pramāṇam asti yena pramimīmahe na hi anapekṣita padārthasya vākya antya varṇasya pūrva varṇa janita saṃskāra rahitasya śaktiḥ asti padārthebhyaḥ artha antare vartitam iti 
[I,34,iii^1]	nanu arthāpattiḥ asti yat padārtha vyatiriktam artham avagacchāmaḥ na ca śaktim antareṇa tat avakalpyate iti tat na arthasya tad nimitta tvāt bhavet arthāpattiḥ yadi asatyām api śaktau na anyat nimittam avakalpyeta avagamyate tu nimittam kim padārthāḥ padāni hi svam svam padārtham abhidhāya nivṛtta vyāpārāṇi atha idānīm padārthāḥ avagatāḥ santaḥ vākya artham gamayanti katham yatra hi śuklaḥ iti vā kṛṣṇaḥ iti vā guṇaḥ pratīte bhavati bhavati khalu asau alam guṇavati pratyayam ādhātum tena guṇavati pratyayam icchantaḥ kevalam guṇa vacanam uccārayanti saṃpatsyate eṣām yathāsaṃkalpitaḥ abhiprāyaḥ bhaviṣyati viśiṣṭa artha saṃpratyayaḥ viśiṣṭa artha saṃpratyayaḥ ca vākya arthaḥ evam ced avagamyate anyatas eva vākya arthaḥ kaḥ jātucit adṛṣṭā pada samudāyasya śaktiḥ arthāt avagamyate iti vadiṣyati api ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām etat avagamyate bhavati hi kadācid iyam avasthā mānasāt api ādhātāt yat uccaritebhyaḥ padebhyaḥ na padārthāḥ avadhāryante 
[I,34,iii^2]	tadānīm niyogataḥ vākya artham na avagaccheyuḥ yadi asya apārtha garthyam abhaviṣyat niyogataḥ tu na avagacchanti api ca antareṇa api pada uccāraṇam yaḥ śauktyam avagacchati avagacchati eva asau śukla guṇakam tasmāt padārtha pratyayaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ na asya pada samudāyena saṃbandhaḥ yat tu śrautaḥ padārthaḥ na vākya anurodhena kutaścid viśeṣāt apavartitum arhati iti satyam evam etat yatra kevalaḥ padārthaḥ prayujyamānaḥ prayojana abhāvāt anarthakaḥ saṃjāyate iti avagatam bhavati tatra vākya arthaḥ api tāvat bhavatu iti viśiṣṭa artha tā avagamyate na sarvatra evam ca sati guṇa antara pratiṣedhaḥ na śabda arthaḥ iti etat api parihṛtam bhavati api ca prātipadikāt uccarantī dvitīya ādi vibhaktiḥ prātipadikā arthaḥ viśeṣakaḥ iti āha sā ca viśeṣa śrutiḥ sāmānya śrutim bādheta yat ca ete pada saṃghātāḥ puruṣa kṛtāḥ dṛśyante iti parihṛtam tat asmaraṇa ādibhiḥ api ca evaṃjātīyake arthe vākyāni saṃhartum na kiṃcana puruṣāṇam bījam asti 
[I,35,i_I,35,ii]	loke sat niyamāt prayoga saṃnikarṣaḥ syāt laukikeṣu punar artheṣu pratyakṣeṇa artham upalabhya sanniyamaḥ sannibandhanam śakyam tatra saṃhartum evaṃjātīyakāni vākyāni nīlotpala vaneṣu adya iti tasmāt agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti etebhyaḥ eva padebhyaḥ ye arthāḥ avagatāḥ tebhyaḥ eva etat avagamyate agnihotrāt svargaḥ bhavati iti padebhyaḥ eva padārtha pratyayaḥ padārthebhyaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti 
[I,36,i_I,36,ii]	vedān ca eke saṃnikarṣam puruṣa ākhyāḥ uktam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti yatas na puruṣa kṛtaḥ śabdasya arthena saṃbandhaḥ tatra pada vākya āśrayaḥ ākṣepaḥ parihṛtaḥ idānīm anyathā kṣepsyāmaḥ pauruṣeyāḥ codanā iti vadāmaḥ saṃnikṛṣṭa kālāḥ kṛtakāḥ vedāḥ idānīm tanāḥ te ca codanānām samūhāḥ tatra pauruṣeyāḥ ced vedāḥ asaṃśayam pauruṣeyāḥ codanāḥ katham punar kṛtakāḥ vedāḥ iti kecid manyante yatas puruṣa ākhyāḥ puruṣeṇa hi samākhyāyante vedāḥ kāṭhakam kālāpakam paippalādakam mauhulam iti na hi saṃbandhāt ṛte samākhyānam na ca puruṣasya śabdena asti saṃbandhaḥ anyatas kartā puruṣaḥ kāryaḥ śabdaḥ iti nanu pravacana lakṣaṇā samākhyā syāt na iti brūmaḥ asādhāraṇam hi viśeṣaṇam bhavati ekaḥ eva hi kartā bahavaḥ api prabrūyuḥ atas asmaryamāṇaḥ api codanāyāḥ kartā syāt tasmāt na pramāṇam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti 
[I,36,iii_I,36,iv]	anitya darśanāt ca janana maraṇavantaḥ ca veda arthāḥ śrūyante babaraḥ prāvāhaṇiḥ akāmayata kusuruvindaḥ auddālakiḥ akāmayatas iti evamādyaḥ uddālakasya apatyam gamyate auddālakiḥ yadi evam prāk auddālaki janmanaḥ na ayam granthaḥ bhūta pūrvaḥ evam api anitya tā 
[I,37,i_I,37,ii]	uktam tu śabda pūrva tvam uktam asmābhiḥ śabda pūrva tvam adhyetṝṇām kevalam ākṣepa parihāraḥ vaktavyaḥ saḥ abhidhīyate 
[I,37,iii_I,37,iv]	ākhyā pravacanāt yat uktam kartṛ lakṣaṇā samākhyā kāṭhaka ādya iti tat ucyate na iyam arthāpattiḥ akartṛbhiḥ api hi enām ācakṣīran prakarṣeṇa vacanam kaṭha ādibhiḥ anuṣṭhitam syāt tathā api hi samākhyātāraḥ bhavanti smaryate ca vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ sarva śākhā adhyāyī kaṭhaḥ punar imām kevalām śākhām adhyāpayām babhūva iti sa bahu śākhā dhyāyinām saṃnidhau eka śākhā adhyāyī anyām śākhām anadhīyānaḥ tasyām prakṛṣṭa tvāt asādhāraṇam upapadyate viśeṣaṇam 
[I,37,v_I,37,vi]	param tu śruti sāmānya mātram yat ca prāvāhaṇiḥ iti tat na pravāhaṇasya puruṣasya asiddha tvāt na pravāhaṇasya apatyam prāvāhāniḥ praśabdaḥ prakarṣe siddhaḥ vahatiḥ ca prāpaṇe ikāraḥ tu yathā eva apatye siddhaḥ tathā kriyāyām api kartari tasmāt yaḥ pravāhayati sa prāvāhaṇiḥ babaraḥ iti śabda anukṛtiḥ tena yaḥ nitya arthaḥ tam eva etau śabdau vadiṣyataḥ atas uktam param tu śruti sāmānya mātram iti 
[I,37,vii_I,37,viii]	kṛte vā viniyogaḥ syāt karmaṇaḥ saṃbandhāt atha katham avagamyate na ayam unmatta bāla vākya sadṛśaḥ iti tathā hi paśyāmaḥ vanaspatayaḥ satram āsata sarpāḥ satram āsataḥ iti yathā jarat gavaḥ gāyati mattakāni katham nāma jarat gavaḥ gāyeta katham vā vanaspatayaḥ sarpāḥ vā satram āsīran iti ucyate viniyuktam hi dṛśyate paraspareṇa saṃbandha artham katham jyotiṣṭomaḥ iti abhidhāya kartavyaḥ iti ucyate kena iti ākāṅkṣite somena iti kim artham iti svargāya iti katham iti ittham iti evam avagacchantaḥ padārthaiḥ ebhiḥ saṃskṛtam piṇḍitam vākya artham katham unmatta bāla vākya sadṛśam iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
[I,38,i]	nanu anupapannam idam dṛśyate vanaspatayaḥ satram āsataḥ iti evamādi na anupapannam na anena agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti evamādayaḥ anupapannāḥ syuḥ api ca vanaspatayaḥ satram āsate iti evamādayaḥ api na anupapannāḥ stutayaḥ hi etāḥ satrasya vanaspatayaḥ nāma acetanāḥ idam satram upāsitavantaḥ kim punar vṛddhāṃsaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ tat yathā loke sandhyāyām mṛgāḥ api na caranti kim punar vidvāṃsaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ iti api ca avigītaḥ suhṛd upadeśaḥ su pratiṣṭhitaḥ katham iva āśaṅketa unmatta bāla vākya sadṛśaḥ iti tasmāt codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti siddham 
[I,39,i_I,39,ii^1]	āmnāyasya kriyā artha tvāt ānarthakyam atad arthānām tasmāt anityam ucyate saḥ arodīt yat arodīt tat rudrasya rudra tvam prajāpatiḥ ātmanaḥ vapām udakhidat devāḥ vai deva yajanam adhyavasāya diśaḥ na prājānan iti evamādīni samāmnātāraḥ samāmananti vākyāni tāni kim kaṃcid dharmam pramimate uta na iti bhavati vicāraṇā tat abhidhīyate kriyā katham anuṣṭheya iti tām vaditum samāmnātāraḥ vākyāni samāmananti tat yāni vākyāni kriyām na avagamayanti kriyā saṃbaddham vā kiṃcid evam eva bhūtam artham anvācakṣate ruditavān rudraḥ vapām uccikheda prajāpatiḥ devāḥ vai diśaḥ na prajajñiraḥ iti evaṃjātīyakāni tāni kam dharmam pramimīran atha ucyeta adhyāhāreṇa vā vipariṇāmena vā vyavahita kalpanayā vā vyavadhāraṇa kalpanayā vā guṇa kalpanayā vā kaścid arthaḥ kalpāyiṣyate iti sa kalpyamānaḥ kaḥ kalpyeta rudraḥ kila ruroda atas anyena api roditavyam 
[I,39,ii^2]	uccikhedātmavapām prajāpatiḥ atas anyaḥ api utkhidet ātmanaḥ vapām devāḥ vai deva yajana kāle diśaḥ na prajñātavantaḥ atas anyaḥ api diśaḥ na prajānīyāt iti tat ca aśakyam iṣṭa viyogena abhighātena vā yat bāṣpa nirmocanam tat rodanam iti ucyate na ca tat icchātaḥ bhavati na ca kaścid ātmanaḥ vapām utkhidya tām agnau prahṛtya tatas utthitena tu upareṇa paśuṇā yaṣṭum śaknuyāt na ca deva yajana adhyavasāna kāle kecid diśaḥ muhyeyuḥ atas eṣām ānarthakyam tasmāt evaṃjātīyakāni vākyāni anityāni iti ucyante iti saḥ eṣa vākya eka deśasya ākṣepaḥ na kṛtsnasya vākyasya nanu eka deśāt vinā sa ākāṅkṣaḥ pada samūhaḥ na paryāptaḥ svasmai prayojanāya atas ākṣiptaḥ eva iti na evam bhavati hi kaścid pada samūhaḥ yaḥ artha vādebhyaḥ vinā api vidadhāti kaṃcid artham yāni punar taiḥ saha saṃyujya artha antare vartante tāni eka deśa ākṣepeṇa ākṣipyate 
[I,40,i_I,40,ii]	śāstra dṛṣṭa virodhāt ca stenam manaḥ anṛta vādinī vāc iti evaṃjātīyakānām dharmam prati aprāmāṇyam bhūta anuvādāt vipariṇāma ādibhiḥ api kalpyamāne steyam mṛṣodyam ca kartavyam iti āpatati tat ca aśakyam steya anṛta vāda pratiṣedham abādha mānena anuṣṭhātum na ca vikalpaḥ vaiṣamyāt ekaḥ kalpyaḥ vidhiḥ ekaḥ pratyakṣaḥ 
[I,40,iii]	atha dṛṣṭa virodhaḥ tasmāt dhūmaḥ eva agneḥ divā dadṛśe na arciḥ tasmāt arciḥ eva agneḥ naktam dadṛśe na dhūmaḥ iti asmāt lokāt utkramya agniḥ ādityam gataḥ rātrau ādityaḥ tam iti etat upapādayitum idam ubhayam api dṛṣṭa viruddham ucyate tasmāt na eṣā avadhāraṇā sidhyati iti aparaḥ dṛṣṭa virodhaḥ na ca etat vidmaḥ vayam brāhmaṇāḥ vā smaḥ abrāhmaṇāḥ vā iti akriyā artha tvāt anarthakam atha ayam arthaḥ na eva etat jñāyate kim vā brāhmaṇāḥ vayam uta abrāhmaṇāḥ eva iti pratyakṣa viruddham apramāṇam aparaḥ śāstra dṛṣṭena virodhaḥ kaḥ hi tat veda yat amuṣmin loke asti vā na vā iti yadi praśnaḥ ayam akriyā artha tvāt anarthakaḥ atha anavakḷptiḥ śāstra dṛṣṭena virodhaḥ atas pratyakṣa viruddham apramāṇam 
[I,41,i_I,41,ii]	tathā phala abhāvāt garga tri rātra brāhmaṇam prakṛtyā ucyate śobhate asya mukham yaḥ evam vedaḥ iti yadi bhūta anuvādaḥ anarthakaḥ atha adhyayana phala anuvādaḥ tatas asat anuvādaḥ kāla antare phalam bhaviṣyati iti ced na hi atra pramāṇam asti vidhiḥ syāt iti ced na eṣa vidhi paraḥ dravya saṃskāra karmasu iti cintayiṣyati etat upariṣṭāt kim phala viddhiḥ uta artha vādaḥ iti iha tu kim bhūta anuvādaḥ kriyā arthaḥ vā iti āsya prajāyām vājī jāyate yaḥ evam veda iti ca udāharaṇam 
[I,41,iii_I,42,ii]	anyānarthakyāt pūrṇāhutyā sarvān kāmān avāpnoti paśu bandha yājī sarvān lokān abhijayati tarati mṛtyum tarati brahmahatyām yaḥ aśvamedhena yajate yaḥ u ca enam evam veda iti yadi bhūta anuvāda mātram anarthakam atha phala vidhiḥ itareṣām ānarthakyam na hi akṛtvā pūrṇāhutim agni hotra ādayaḥ kriyante na ca aniṣṭvā agnīṣomīyeṇa somena yajante na ca adhītya aśvamedhena yajante tat yathā pathi jāte arke madhu utsṛjya tena eva pathā madhu arthinaḥ parvatam na gaccheyuḥ tādṛśam hi tat api ca āhuḥ arke ced madhu vindeta kim artham parvatam vrajet iṣṭasya arthasya saṃsiddhau kaḥ vidvān yatnam ācaret iti 
[I,42,iii_I,42,iv]	abhāgi pratiṣedhāt ca na pṛthivyām agniḥ cetavyaḥ na antarikṣe na divi iti apratiṣedha bhāginam artham pratiṣedhanti vijñāyate eva etat antarikṣe divi ca agniḥ na cīyate iti pṛthivī cayana pratiṣedha artham ca yat vākyam bhavet cayana pratiṣedha artham eva tat atha apramāṇam na eṣa virodhaḥ bhavati katham tat pramāṇam yat vidhi antaram ākulayet svayam ca ākulam syāt na cetavyam hiraṇyam nidhāya cetavyam iti 
[I,42,v_I,42,vi]	anitya saṃyogāt anitya saṃyogaḥ ca param tu śruti sāmānya mātram iti parihṛtaḥ idānīm veda eka deśānām ākṣiptānām punar upodbalakaḥ uttiṣṭhati babaraḥ prāvāhaṇiḥ akāmayata iti 
[I,42,vii_I,42,viii]	vidhinā tu eka vākya tvāt stuti arthena vidhīnām syuḥ idam samāmnāyate vāyavyam śvetam ālabheta bhūti kāmaḥ vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyum eva svena bhāgadheyena upadhāvati saḥ eva enam bhūtim gamayati iti vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā iti atas yadi api kriyā na avagamyate kriyā saṃbaddham vā kiṃcid tathā api vidhi uddeśena eka vākya tvāt pramāṇam bhūti kāmaḥ iti evam antaḥ vidhi uddeśaḥ tena eka vākya bhūtaḥ vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā iti evamādiḥ katham eka vākya bhāvaḥ padānām sa ākāṅkṣa tvāt vidheḥ stuteḥ ca eka vākya tvam bhavati bhūti kāmaḥ ālabheta yatas vāyuḥ kṣepiṣṭha iti na ayam abhisaṃbandhaḥ vivakṣitaḥ bhūti kāmena alabdhavyam iti katham tarhi ālabheta yatas tatas bhūtiḥ iti bhinnau imau arthau ubhaya abhidhāne vākyam bhidyeta 
[I,43,i]	kim arthā stutiḥ iti ced katham roceta na unuṣṭhīyeta iti nanu prāk stuti vacanāt anuṣṭhānam bhūti kāma antāt siddham stuti vacanam anarthakam na hi yadā stuti padā saṃnidhānam tadā pūrveṇa eva vidhiḥ yadā stuti pada saṃbandhaḥ na tadā bhūti kāmasya ālambhaḥ vidhīyate yathā paṭaḥ bhavati iti paṭe utpadyate iti arthaḥ nirākāṅkṣam ca pada dvayam yadā ca tasmin eva raktaḥ iti aparam śrūyate tadā rāga saṃbandhaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ bhavati ca raktam pratyākāṅkṣā evam yadā na stuti padāni vidhi śabdena eva tadā prarocanā yadā stuti vacanam tadā stavanena nanu evam sati kim stuti vacanena yasmin sati avidhāyakam mā bhūt tat tad abhāve api pūrva vidhinā eva prarocayiṣyate iti satyam vinā api tena sidhyet prarocanam asti tu tat tasmin vidyamāne yaḥ arthaḥ vākyasya saḥ avagamyate stuti prayojanam tayoḥ tasmin avidyamāne vidhinā prarocanam iti 
[I,43,ii]	nanu satsu api stuti padeṣu pūrvasya vidhi svarūpa tvāt vidhiḥ abhipretaḥ syāt na vivakṣyeta stuti pada saṃbandhaḥ āha stuti padāni hi anarthakāni abhaviṣyan sa ākāṅkṣāṇi bhavantu anarthakāni iti ced na gamyamāne arthe avivakṣita arthāni bhavitum arhanti yaḥ asau vidhi uddeśaḥ sa śaknoti nirapekṣaḥ artham vidhātum śaknoti ca stuti padānām vākya śeṣībhavitum pratyakṣaḥ ca vākya śeṣa bhāvaḥ atas asmāt vidheḥ stutim avagacchāmaḥ 
[I,44,i]	nanu nirapekṣāt api vidhim avagamiṣyām bhavatu evam na evam sati kaścid virodhaḥ kim tu aśakyaḥ stuti pada saṃbandhe sati vidhi arthaḥ vivakṣitum vākyam hi saṃbandhasya vidhāyakam dvau ced saṃbandhau vidadhyāt bhūti kāmaḥ ālabheta ālambhena ca eṣa guṇaḥ bhaviṣyati iti bhidyeta tarhi evam sati vākyam atha yat uktam na kriyā gamyate na tad saṃbaddham vā kiṃcid iti stuti arthena vidhīnām syuḥ stuti śabdāḥ stuvantaḥ kriyām prarocayamāṇāḥ anuṣṭhātṝṇām upakariṣyanti kriyāyāḥ evam imāni sarvāṇi eva padāni kaṃcid artham stuvanti vidadhati atas pramāṇam evaṃjātīyakāni vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā iti 
[I,44,ii_I,44,iii]	tulyam ca sāṃpradāyikam atha ucyeta prāk stuti padebhyaḥ nirākāṅkṣāṇi vidhāyakāni vidhi svarūpa tvāt stuti padāni tu pramāda pāṭhaḥ iti tat naḥ evam artha avagamāt tulyam ca sāṃpradāyikam saṃpradāyaḥ yeṣām dharmāṇām sarve te vidhi padānām arthavāda padānām ca tulyāḥ adhyāyānadhyāyate guru mukhāt pratipattiḥ śiṣya upādhyāya tā ca sarvasmin evaṃjātīyake avighna arthe tulyam ādriyante smaraṇam ca dṛḍham atas na pramāda pāṭhaḥ iti 
[I,45,i_I,45,ii]	aprāptā ca anupapattiḥ prayoge hi virodhaḥ syāt śabda ārtaḥ tu aprayoga bhūtaḥ tasmāt upapadyeta api ca yā eṣā anupapattiḥ uktā śāstra dṛṣṭa virodhāt iti evamādyā sā saḥ arodīt iti evamādiṣu na prāpnoti kutas prayoge hi steya ādīnām ucyamāne virodhaḥ syāt śabda arthaḥ tu aprayoga bhūtaḥ tasmāt upapadyeta stenam manaḥ anṛta vādinī vāc iti 
[I,45,iii_I,45,iv]	guṇavādaḥ tu yat uktam vidheyasya prarocana arthā stutiḥ iti tat iha katham avakalpyeta yatra anyat vidheyam anyat ca stūyate yathā vetasa śākha yāvakābhiḥ ca agnim vikarṣati iti veta sāvake vidhīyete āpaḥ ca stūyante āpaḥ vai śāntāḥ iti tat ucyate guṇavādaḥ tu gauṇaḥ eṣa vādaḥ bhavati yat saṃbandhini stotavye saṃbandhi antaram stūyate abhijanaḥ hi eṣa veta sāvakayoḥ tatas te jāte abhijana saṃstavena ca abhijātaḥ stutaḥ bhavati yathā aśmaka abhijanaḥ devadattaḥ aśmākeṣu stūyamāneṣu stutam ātmānam manyate evam atra api draṣṭavyam 
[I,45,v^1]	atha saḥ arodīt iti kasya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ tasmāt barhiṣi rajatam na deyam iti asya kutas sa ākāṅkṣa tvāt padānām saḥ arodīt yat arodīt tat rudrasya rudra tvam iti atra saḥ iti prakṛta apekṣaḥ tad pratyayāt tasya yat aśru aśīryata iti tasya iti pūrva prakṛta apekṣaḥ eva upapattiḥ ca uparitanasya yaḥ barhiṣi rajatam dadyāt purā asya saṃvatsarāt gṛhe rodanam bhavati iti asya hetu tvena ayam pratinirdiśyate tasmāt barhiṣi rajatam na deyam iti evam sarvāṇi sa ākāṅkṣāṇi katham vidheḥ upakurvanti iti guṇa vādena 
[I,45,v^2]	rodana prabhavam rajatam barhiṣi dadataḥ rodanam āpadyate tat pratiṣedhasya guṇaḥ yat arodanam iti katham punar arudatī arodīt iti bhavati katham vānaśru prabhave rajate aśru prabhavam iti vacanam purā asya saṃvatsarāt asati rodane katham rodanam bhavati iti tat ucyate guṇavādaḥ tu gauṇāḥ ete śabdāḥ rudraḥ iti rodana nimittasya śabdasya darśanāt yat arodīt iti ucyate varṇa sārūpyāt nindan anaśru prabhavam api aśru prabhavam iti āha nindan eva ca dhana tyāge dukha darśanāt purā asya saṃvatsarāt gṛhe rodanam bhavati iti āha 
[I,46,i^1]	tathā yaḥ prajā kāmaḥ paśu kāmaḥ vā syāt saḥ etam prājāpatyam tu upuram ālabheta iti ākāṅkṣita tvāt asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ ayam saḥ ātmanaḥ vapām udakhidat iti katham guṇa vādaḥ ittham nāma na āsan paśavaḥ yat ātmanaḥ vapām udakhidat iti etat ca karmaṇaḥ sāmarthyam yat agnau prahṛta mātrāyām vapāyām ajaḥ tu upuraḥ udagāt ittham bahavaḥ paśavaḥ bhavanti iti katham punar anutkhinnāyām vapāyām prajāpatiḥ ātmanaḥ vapām udakhidat iti āha ucyate asat vṛttānta an vā ākhyānam stuti arthena praśaṃsāyāḥ gamyamāna tvāt iha anvākhyāne vartamāne dvayam niṣpadyate yat ca vṛttānta jñānam yat ca kasmiṃścid prarocanā dveṣaḥ vā 
[I,46,i^2]	tatra vṛttānta anvā ākhyānam na pravartakam na nivartakam ca iti prayojana abhāvāt anarthakam iti avivakṣitam prarocanayā tu pravartate dveṣāt nivartate iti tayoḥ vivakṣā vṛttānta anvā ākhyāne api vidhīyamāne ādimatā doṣaḥ vedasya prasajeta katham punar idam nirālambanam anvākhyāyate iti ucyate nityaḥ kaścid arthaḥ prajāpatiḥ syāt vāyuḥ ākāśaḥ ādityaḥ vā saḥ ātmanaḥ vapām udakhidat iti vṛṣṭim vāyum raśmim vā tām agnau prāgṛhṇāt vaidyute ārcīse laukike vā tatas ajaḥ iti annam bījam virud vā tam ālabhya tam upayujya prajāḥ paśūn prāpnoti iti gauṇāḥ śabdāḥ 
[I,47,i]	ādityaḥ prāyaṇīyaḥ caruḥ ādityaḥ udapanīyaḥ caruḥ iti asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ devāḥ vai deva yajanam adhyavasāya diśaḥ na prājānan iti ākāṅkṣita tvāt sarva vyāmohānām ādityaḥ caruḥ nāśayitā api diś mohasya iti stutiḥ katham asati diś mohe diś moha śabdaḥ iti ucyate aprākṛtasya bahoḥ karma samūhasya upasthita tvāt gauṇaḥ moha śabdaḥ avadhāraṇa avakāśa dāna ādibhiḥ jñāpayati iti gauṇa tā 
[I,47,ii_I,47,iii]	rūpāt prāyāt hiraṇyam haste bhavati atha gṛhṇāti iti sa ākāṅkṣa tvāt asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ stenam manaḥ anṛta vādinī vāc iti nindā vacanam hiraṇyaḥ tuti arthena yathā kim ṛṣiṇā devadattaḥ eva bhojayitavyaḥ katham punar astenam manaḥ ninditum api stena śabdena ucyate vācam ca ananṛta vādinīm api anṛta vādinī iti brūyat guṇavādaḥ tu rūpāt yathā stenāḥ pracchanna rūpāḥ evam ca manaḥ iti gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ prāyāt ca anṛta vādinī vāc iti 
[I,48,i_I,48,ii]	dūra bhūyaḥ tvāt dṛṣṭa virodhaḥ udāharaṇam tasmāt bhūmaḥ eva agneḥ divā dadṛśe na arciḥ tasmāt arciḥ eva agneḥ naktam dadṛśe na dhūmaḥ iti agniḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ agniḥ svāhā iti sāyam juhoti sūryaḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāhā iti prātar iti miśra liṅga mantrayoḥ vidhānasya ākāṅkṣita tvāt śeṣaḥ ubhayoḥ devatayoḥ saṃnidhāne homaḥ iti stuteḥ upapattiḥ dūra bhūyaḥ tvāt dhūmasya agneḥ ca adarśane gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ 
[I,48,iii_I,48,iv]	aparādhāt kartuḥ ca putra darśanam dṛṣṭa virodhaḥ eva udāharaṇam na ca etat vidmaḥ iti tat pravare pravriyamāṇe devāḥ pitaraḥ iti brūyāt iti ākāṅkṣita tvāt asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ abrāhmaṇaḥ api brāhmaṇaḥ pravara anumantraṇena syāt iti stutiḥ durjñāna tvāt ajñāna vacanam gauṇam strī aparādhena kartuḥ ca putra darśanena apramatā rakṣata tantum enam ityādinā durjñānam 
[I,48,v_I,48,vi]	ākāli ka īpsā śāstra dṛṣṭa virodhe udāharaṇam kaḥ hi tat veda iti dikṣvatī kāśān karoti iti sa ākāṅkṣa tvāt asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ pratyakṣa phala tvena stutiḥ ananvakḷpti vacanam viprakṛṣṭa kāla phala tvāt gauṇam 
[I,48,vii_I,48,viii]	vidyā praśaṃsā tathā phala abhāvāt iti atra udāhṛtam śobhate asya mukham iti garga tri rātra vidheḥ ākāṅkṣita tvāt śeṣaḥ veda anumantraṇasya ca asya prajāyām vājī jāyate iti śeṣaḥ mukha śobhā vājimat tvam ca guṇa vacana tvāt gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ śobhataḥ iva śiṣyaiḥ udīkṣyamāṇam kule saṃtata adhyayana śravaṇāt medhāvī jāyate iti sa pratigrahāt annam prāpnoti iti 
[I,49,i_I,49,ii]	sarva tvam ādhikārikam anya ānarthakya vākyaḥ udāharaṇam pūrṇāhutyā sarvān kāmān avāpnoti iti pūrṇāhutim juhoti iti ākāṅkṣita tvāt asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ yaḥ u ca enam evam veda iti tarati mṛtyum iti asya ākāṅkṣi tvāt śeṣaḥ phala vacanam stutiḥ sarva kāma phalasya nimitte sarva kāmau āpti vacanam gauṇam asarveṣu sarva vacanam adhikṛta apekṣam 
[I,49,iii_I,49,iv]	phalasya karma niṣpatteḥ teṣām loka vat parimāṇataḥ phala viśeṣaḥ syāt anvāruhya vacanam idam yadi api vidhiḥ tathā api arthavat tā parimāṇataḥ sārataḥ vā phala viśeṣāt 
[I,49,v_I,49,vi]	antyayoḥ yathā uktam abhāgi pratiṣedhāt iti ādau udāhṛtam na pṛthivyām agniḥ cetavyaḥ na antarikṣe na divi iti hiraṇyam nidhāya cetavyam iti ākāṅkṣita tvāt asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ pṛthivī ādīnām nindā hiraṇyastuti arthā asati prasaṅge pratiṣedhaḥ nitya anuvādaḥ yat ca anitya darśanam babaraḥ prāvāhaṇiḥ akāmayatas iti tat parihṛtam arthavāda ākṣepeṇa punar utthitam idānīm arthavāda prāmāṇye tena eva parihāreṇa parihariṣyate iti 
[I,50,i_I,50,ii]	vidhiḥ vā syāt apūrva tvāt vāda mātram hi anarthakam iha ye vidhivat nigadāḥ artha vādāḥ te artha vādāḥ te udāharaṇam audumbaraḥ yūpaḥ bhavati ūrc vā uduṃbaraḥ ūrc paśavaḥ ūrjaiḥ vā asmai ūrjam paśūn na āpnoti ūrjaḥ avaruddhyai iti kim asya vidhiḥ kāryam uta asya api stutiḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam vidhiḥ vā syāt apūrva tvāt vāda mātram hi anarthakam vidhivat nigadeṣu evaṃjātīyakeṣu phala vidhiḥ syāt phalam hi avagamyate tathā hi apūrvam artham vidhāsyati itarathā stuti vāda mātram anarthakam syāt stutaḥ ca āstutaḥ ca tāvān eva saḥ arthaḥ api ca ūrjaḥ avaruddhyai iti prayojanam śrūyate na ca praśastaḥ ayam arthaḥ iti kaścid śabdaḥ asti lakṣaṇayā tu stutiḥ gamyate śrutiḥ ca lakṣaṇāyāḥ jyāyasi iti 
[I,50,iii_I,50,iv]	loka vat iti ced iti ced paśyasi stutiḥ anarthikā na ca śabdena avagamyate iti laukikāni vākyāni bhavantaḥ vidām kurvantu tat yathā iyam gauḥ kretavyā devadattīyā eṣā hi bahu kṣīrā strī apatyā anaṣṭa prajā ca iti kretavyā iti api ukte guṇa abhidhānāt pravartanta itarām kretāraḥ bahu kṣīra iti ca guṇa abhidhānam avagamyate tadvat vede api bhaviṣyati 
[I,50,v_I,50,vi]	na pūrva tvāt na etat evam loke vidita pūrvāḥ arthāḥ ucyante bahu kṣīra ādayaḥ teṣām vijñānam eva na prayojanam atas praśaṃsā gamyate avidita vāde na śraddadhīran pūrva vacanāt iva vidita tvāt eva ca prarocayante vaidikeṣu punar yadi vidhi śabdena na prarocayante na tarām artha vādena jāta āśaṅkaḥ hi vidhi śabde sa tadānīm atha vidhi śabdena prarocitaḥ kim arthavāda śabdena api ca vede vyaktam asaṃvādaḥ ūrjaḥ avaruddhyai iti aprasiddham vacanam ūrgvāḥ udumbaraḥ iti hetu tvam ca aprasiddham yasmāt ūrc udumbaraḥ tasmāt tad mayaḥ yūpaḥ kartavyaḥ iti ūrc udumbaraḥ iti anṛta vacanāt anyat asya anṛtam iti parikalpyeta 
[I,51,i_I,51,ii]	uktam tu vākya śeṣa tvam uktam asmābhiḥ vākya śeṣa tvam vidhinā tu eka vākya tvāt iti nanu uktam phala vacanam iha gamyate na stutiḥ iti yat iha phala vacanam tat audumbarasya yūpasya na ca avihitaḥ audumbaraḥ yūpaḥ asti tatra phala vacanam eva anarthakam stuti vacanaḥ śabdaḥ na asti iti ced iha phala vacanena phalavat tā pratīyate phalavān ca praśastaḥ iti tatra phalavat tāyām ānarthakyam iti yaḥ dvitīyaḥ arthaḥ praśaṃsā nāma sa gamyate lakṣaṇa iti ced na lakṣaṇāyām api arthavat tā bhavati eva lakṣaṇā api hi laukikī nanu uktam asaṃvādaḥ vede na hi ūrc udumbaraḥ iti guṇa vādena prarocana artha tām brūmahe gauṇa tvāt saṃvādaḥ kim sādṛśyam yathā annam prīteḥ sādhanam evam idam api prīti sādhana śakti yuktam praśaṃsitum praśaṃsā vācinā śabdena ucyate śakyate hi tat pakva phala saṃbandhāt ūrc iti vaktum 
[I,52,i_I,52,ii]	vidhiḥ ca anarthakaḥ kvacid tasmāt stutiḥ pratīyeta tad sāmānyāt itareṣu tathātvam apsuyoniḥ vai aśvaḥ apsujaḥ vetasaḥ iti apsuyoniḥ aśvaḥ kartavyaḥ iti vidheḥ aśakya tvāt ānarthakyam tatra avaśyam stutiḥ kalpayitavyā śamayitrībhiḥ adbhiḥ aśvasya avakānām ca saṃbandhaḥ yajamānasya kaṣṭam śamayati iti tad sāmānyāt itareṣu tathātvam tathā iti yāvat tāvat tathātvam iti kim tat sāmānyam vidhi asaṃbhavaḥ stuti saṃbhavaḥ ca 
[I,52,iii_I,52,iv]	prakaraṇe saṃbhavan apakarṣaḥ na kalpyeta vidhi ānarthakyam hi tam prati itas ca paśyāmaḥ stutiḥ iti kutas idam samāmananti yaḥ vidagdhaḥ sa nairṛtaḥ yaḥ aśṛtaḥ sa raudraḥ yaḥ śṛtaḥ sa daivataḥ tasmāt avidahatā śrapayitavyaḥ sa daivata tvāya iti yadi stutiḥ darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ eva śṛtaḥ stāviṣyate tathā saṃbhavan apakarṣaḥ na kalpyeta apakṛṣyate iti apakarṣaḥ vidhi pakṣe tu yatra nairṛtaḥ tatra vidagdha tā nīyeta tathā sati prakaraṇam bādhitam bhavet darśa pūrṇamāsa karma prati nairṛta abhāvāt vidagdhānam anarthakam syāt tasmāt stutiḥ eva 
[I,52,v_I,52,vi]	vidhau ca vākya bhedaḥ syāt audumbaraḥ yūpaḥ bhavati iti vidhau etasmin āśrīyamāṇe ūrjaḥ avaruddhyai iti etasmin ca vākyam bhidyeta ittham audumbaraḥ yūpaḥ praśastaḥ sa ca ūrjaḥ aviruddhyai iti tasmāt vidhivat nigadānām api stutiḥ eva kāryam artha vādānām iti 
[I,53,i_I,53,iii]	hetuḥ vā syāt arthavat tva upapattibhyām atha ye hetuvat nigadāḥ sūrpeṇa juhoti tena hi annam kriyate iti evamādayaḥ teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim stutiḥ teṣām kāryam uta hetuḥ iti kim prāptam hetuḥ syāt anna karaṇam homasya nanu aprasiddhe kārya kāraṇa bhāve na hetu upadeśaḥ satyam evam loke vidhāyiṣyate tu vacanena vede sūrpeṇa home kartavye anna karaṇam hetuḥ iti upadiśyate kim prayojanam anyat api darvi pīṭhara ādi anna karaṇam yat tena api nāma katham homaḥ kriyeta iti kutas tasya api anna kriyāyām arthavat tā śakyate ca tena api annam kartum etāt dhi kriyate iti ucyate na hi vartamāna kālaḥ kaścid asti yasya ayam pratinirdeśaḥ hetau ca śrutiḥ śabdaḥ stutau lakṣaṇā yadi ca darvi pīṭhara ādi na sākṣāt annam karoti iti na anna karaṇam iti ucyate vyarthe tasmin sūrpa stutiḥ anarthikā syāt sūrpam api hi na sākṣāt annam karoti iti tena vinā arthena sūrpasya stutiḥ na upapadyate 
[I,53,iv_I,53,v]	stutiḥ tu śabda pūrva tvāt acodanā ca tasya na tu etat asti śabda pūrvakaḥ ayam arthaḥ anna karaṇam hetuḥ iti śabdaḥ ca anna karaṇam sūrpa home hetuḥ iti āha na ca darvi pīṭharahome tena śabda pūrvam sūrpam na ca darvi piṭhara ādeḥ codanā 
[I,53,vi_I,53,vii]	vyarthe stutiḥ anyāya iti ced iti punar yat uktam tat parihartavyam 
[I,54,i_I,54,ii]	arthaḥ tu vidhi śeṣa tvāt yathā loke asmat pakṣe arthaḥ asti vākya śeṣaḥ hi sa vidheḥ tadā bhavati saṃvādaḥ ca stuti vacana tvena yathā vayam sūrpeṇa annam kriyamāṇam jānīmaḥ tathā sūrpeṇa annam kriyate iti eva gamyate tadā ca āvartamānam stautum vartamānam iti upadiśati tvad pakṣaḥ eṣa doṣaḥ yasya te hetu vidhiḥ vidhau hi na paraḥ śabda arthaḥ pratīyate na ca vartamānam upadiśan vedaḥ śakyam artham vidadhyāt āsmat pakṣe tu eṣa para śabdaḥ paratra vartate yathā loke balavān devadattaḥ yajñadatta ādīn prasahate iti prakṛṣṭa bale api balavat śabdaḥ vartamānaḥ na siṃham śārdūlam vā apekṣya prayujyate ye devadattāt tu nikṛṣṭa balāḥ tān apekṣya bhavati evam tena hi annam kriyate iti prakṛṣṭa anna karaṇena saṃstavaḥ sūrpasya nikṛṣṭāni anyāni anna ākaraṇāni apekṣya bhaviṣyati 
[I,54,iii_I,54,iv]	yadi ca hetuḥ avatiṣṭheta nirdeśāt sāmānyāt iti ced avyavasthā vidhīnām syāt yadi api ca bhavet anna karaṇam hetuḥ darvi piṭhara prakārāṇām tathā api sūrpaḥ etā atiṣṭheta śabdāt anna karaṇam hetuḥ iti vijñāyate śadaḥ ca sūrpasya āha na darvī piṭhara ādīnām tat dhi nirdiśyate yasmāt sūrpeṇa annam kriyate tasmāt sūrpeṇa juhoti iti yathā yasmāt balavat upadhmātaḥ agniḥ tena me gṛham dagdham iti na anagniḥ api balavat upadhmātaḥ dahati iti gamyate atha matam yena yena annam kriyate praṇāḍyā sūrpāt anyena api tena tena api homaḥ kriyate iti avyavasthā vidhīnām syāt na kenacid praṇāḍya annam kriyate tatra yāvat uktam syāt juhoti iti tāvat eva anna karaṇena juhoti iti asmat pakṣe punar sūrpam stūyate tena hi annam kriyate iti vṛttānta an vā ākhyānam na ca vṛttānta jñāpanāya kim tarhi prarocanāya eva tasmāt dhetu vat nigadasya api stutiḥ eva kāryam iti 
[I,55,i_I,55,ii]	tad artha śāstrāt atha idānīm kim vivakṣita vacanāḥ mantrāḥ uta avivakṣita vacanāḥ kim artha prakāśanena yāgasya upakurvanti uta uccāraṇa mātreṇa iti yadi uccāraṇa mātreṇa tadā na niyogataḥ barhiḥ deva sadanam dāmi iti eṣa barhiḥ lavane viniyujyeta abhidhānena ced prakaraṇena vijñāta aṅga bhāvaḥ na anyatra upakartum śaknoti iti antareṇa api vacanam barhiḥ lavanaḥ eva viniyujyeta iti tat evam avagacchāmaḥ uccāraṇa mātreṇa eva upakurvanti iti kutas tad artha śāstrāt yat abhidhāna samarthaḥ mantraḥ tatra eva enam śāstram nibadhnāti uru prathā uru prathasva iti puroḍāśam prathayati iti vacanam idam anarthakam yadi artha abhidhānena upakurvanti atha uccāraṇa mātreṇa tatas vaktavyaḥ viniyogaḥ uktaḥ ca atas na artha abhidhānena yathā sākṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pareṇa ced nīyate nūnam akṣibhyām na paśyati iti gamyate 
[I,55,iii_I,56,i]	nanu artha vāda artham bhaviṣyati iti ced na hi yena vidhīyate tasya vākya śeṣaḥ artha vādaḥ iti uktam na ca nirapekṣeṇa vihite artha vādena kiṃcid api prayojanam kriyate atas na artha vāda artham vacanam tathā abhyādāna samarthāḥ mantrāḥ udāharaṇam liṅgāt eva ādāne prāptāḥ vacanena vidhīyante tām caturbhiḥ ādatte iti catur saṃkhyā artham iti ced na samuccaya śabda abhāvāt tathā imām agṛbhṇan rasanā amṛtasya iti aśva abhidhānīm ādatte iti udāharaṇam rasanā dāne prāptasya rasanādānaḥ eva śāstram viniyojakam tat vivakṣita artha tve na ghaṭeta iti nanu gardabha rasanām parisaṃkhyāsyati na śaknoti parisaṃkhyātam parisaṃcakṣāṇaḥ hi sva artham ca juhyāt para artham ca kalpeta prāptam ca bādheta tasmāt na vivakṣita vacanāḥ mantrāḥ atas na pramāṇam barhiḥ deva sadanam dāmi iti asya rūpam barhiḥ lavane viniyogasya 
[I,56,ii_I,56,iii]	vākya niyamāt niyata pada kramāḥ hi mantrāḥ bhavanti agni mūrdhā divaḥ iti na viparyayeṇa yadi artha pratāyana arthāḥ viparyayeṇa api arthaḥ pratīyate iti niyamaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt atha uccāraṇa viśeṣa arthāḥ viparyaye anyat uccāraṇam iti niyamaḥ āśrīyate tena yatarasmin pakṣe niyamaḥ arthavān sa nūnam pakṣaḥ iti nanu arthavatsu api niyamaḥ dṛśyate yathā indra agni iti yuktam tatra tat viparyaye artha pratyaya abhāvāt 
[I,56,iv_I,56,v]	buddha śāstrāt buddhe khalu api pāṭhāt arthe tad abhidhāna samarthaḥ mantraḥ bhavati agnīt agnīn viharet iti sa buddhe kim bodhayet atha nu uccāraṇa viśeṣa arthāḥ buddhe api uccāraṇa viśeṣaḥ avakalpyeta iti nanu punarvacanāt saṃskāra viśeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati evam asmad pakṣam eva āśritaḥ asi vacanam uccāraṇam tat dhi śakyate kartum na artha pratyāyanam tat pratīte aśakyam yathā sa upānatke pāde dvitīyām upānaham aśakya tvāt na upādatte 
[I,57,i_I,57,ii]	avidyamāna vacanāt yajñe sādhana bhūtaḥ prakāśayitavyaḥ na ca tādṛśaḥ arthaḥ asti yādṛśam abhidadhati yathā catvāri śṛṅgāḥ iti na hi catur śṛṅgam tri pādam dvi śiraskam sapta hastam kiṃcid yajña sādhanam asti tat atra abhidhāna arthaḥ kim abhidadhyāt uccāraṇa arthe tu avakalpyate tathā mā mā hiṃsīḥ iti asatyām api hiṃsāyām kim abhidadhyāt 
[I,57,iii_I,57,iv]	acetane artha bandhanāt acetane arthe khalu artham nibadhnanti oṣadhe trāyasva enam iti abhidhānena upakurvantaḥ evaṃjātīyakāḥ oṣadhim paśu trāṇāya pratipādayeyuḥ na ca asau acetanā śakyā pratipādayitum uccāraṇa arthe tu na eṣa doṣaḥ bhavati tasmāt uccāraṇa arthāḥ śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ iti ca udāharaṇam
