[I,57,v_I,57,vi]	artha vipratiṣedhāt artha vipratiṣedhaḥ api bhavati aditiḥ dyauḥ aditiḥ antarikṣam iti sā eva dyauḥ tat eva antarikṣam iti kaḥ jātucit avadhārayet anavadhārayan ca kim abhidhānena upakuryāt uccāraṇa mātre tu na eṣa virodhaḥ bhavati tasmāt uccāraṇa arthāḥ mantrāḥ ekaḥ rudraḥ na dvitīyaḥ avatasthe asaṃkhyātāḥ sahasrāṇi ye rudrāḥ adhibhūmyām iti ca udāharaṇam
[I,58,i_I,58,ii]	svādhyāya vat avacanāt svādhyāya kāle pūrṇikā āvahanti karoti māṇavakaḥ avahanti mantram adhīte na asau tena mantreṇa tad abhidhānam abhyasyati akṣara ānupūrvyā avadhāraṇaḥ eva yatate yena ca nāma prayojanam tat abhyasitavyam atas uccāraṇa abhyāsāt uccāraṇena prayojanam iti avagacchāmaḥ 
[I,58,iii_I,58,iv]	avijñeyāt api ca keṣāñcid mantrāṇām aśakyaḥ eva arthaḥ veditum yathā amyak sā te indraḥ ṛṣṭiḥ asmaḥ iti sṛṇya iva jarbharī turpharītu iti indraḥ somasya kāṇukā iti ca ete kim pratyāyayeyuḥ uccāraṇa arthe tu na doṣaḥ tasmāt uccāraṇa arthāḥ mantrāḥ iti 
[I,58,v_I,58,vi]	anitya saṃyogāt mantra ānarthakyam anitya saṃyogaḥ khalu api bhavet mantreṣu abhidhāna artheṣu yathā kim te kṛṇvanti kīkaṭeṣu gāvaḥ iti kīkaṭāḥ nāma janapadā na eca aśākham nāma nagaram pramaṅga daḥ rājā iti yadi abhidhāna arthāḥ prāk pramaṅgadān na ayam mantraḥ anubhūta pūrvaḥ iti gamyate tat etaiḥ tad artha śāstra ādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ mantrāṇām avivakṣita vacana tā 
[I,58,vii_I,58,viii]	aviśiṣṭaḥ tu vākya arthaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ tu loke prayujyamānānām vede ca padānām arthaḥ sa yathā eva loke vivakṣitaḥ tathā eva vede api bhavitum arhati na evam loke taiḥ arthaiḥ avabuddhaiḥ saṃvyavahāraḥ iha devatābhiḥ apratyakṣābhiḥ yajña aṅgaiḥ ca acetanaiḥ saṃlāpe na kaścid yajñasya upakāraḥ yadi adṛṣṭam parikalpyeta uccāraṇāt eva tat bhavitum arhati yat dhi kartavyam tat prayojana vat uccāraṇam ca na kathaṃcid na kartavyam yadi apūrvāya yadi arthāya yadi arthaḥ na pratyāyate na kiñcid anarthakam yadi na prayujyate samāmnānānarthakyam tasmāt uccāraṇāt apūrvam tathā ca tad artha śāstrāt uktam 
[I,59,i_I,59,ii]	tat ucyate artha pratyāyana artham eva yajñe mantra uccāraṇam yat uktam na devatābhiḥ yajña aṅgaiḥ ca saṃlape prayojanam asti iti yajñe yajña aṅga prakāśanam eva prayojanam katham na hi aprakāśite yajñe yajña aṅge ca yāgaḥ śakyaḥ abhinirvartayitum tasmāt tad nirvṛtti artham artha prakāśanam mahā anupakāraḥ karmaṇaḥ tat ca karoti iti avagamyate tasmāt asatyasya prayojanam tat ca dṛṣṭam na śakyam apavaditum na artha abhidhānam prayojanam iti nanu artha abhidhānena upakurvatsu tām caturbhiḥ ādatte iti evamādi anarthakam bhavatu na jātucit apajānīmahe dṛṣṭam artha abhidhānasya upakāraka tvam atha kim tat śāstram anarthakam eva na hi 
[I,59,iii_I,59,iv]	guṇa arthena punar śrutiḥ yat uktam tām caturbhiḥ ādatte iti samuccaya śabda abhāvāt na samuccaya artham iti catur saṃkhyā viśiṣṭam ādānam kartavyam iti vākyāt avagamyate tat ekena mantreṇa gṛhṇan na yathāśrutam gṛhṇīyāt iti 
[I,59,v_I,59,vi]	parisaṃkhyā parisaṃcakṣāṇe ca imām agṛbhṇan iti aśva abhidhānīm ādatte iti trayaḥ doṣāḥ prāduḥṣyuḥ iti na evam saṃbandhaḥ iti ādatte iti katham tarhi iti aśva abhidhānīm iti liṅgāt raśanā mātre śabdāt tu viśeṣe aśva abhidhānyām iti sati ca vākye liṅgam viniyojakam tat ca asya prakaraṇāmnānā anumitam vākyam na asti katara tat etena mantreṇa ādānam kuryāt iti yasmin sati raśanā mātre liṅgāt prāpnoti aśva abhidhānyām tu pratyakṣam eva vacanam asmin sati tat ānumānikam na asti tena gardabha raśanāyām na prāptiḥ eva iti 
[I,60,i_I,60,iv]	artha vādaḥ vā uru prathā uru prathasva iti puroḍāśam prathayati iti artha vāda arthena punar śrutiḥ yajñapatim eva tat prathayati iti nanu na ayam mantrasya vākya śeṣaḥ na ca prāptasya stutyā prayojanam satyam na ayam mantrasya vidhiḥ na saṃstavaḥ prathanam eva tatra stūyate mantraḥ punā rūpāt eva prāptaḥ iha anūdyate prathanam stotum ittham prathanam praśastam yat kriyamāṇam evaṃrūpeṇa mantreṇa kriyate kaḥ tadā bhavati guṇaḥ yajñapatim eva tat prajayā paśubhiḥ prathayati kim etat eva asya phalam bhavati na iti brūmaḥ stutiḥ katham bhaviṣyati iti evam ucyate katham asati prathane prathayati iti śabdaḥ mantra abhidhānāt mantreṇa puroḍāśam adhvaryuḥ prathasva iti brūte yaḥ ca evam prathasva iti brūte sa prathayati yathā yaḥ kuru iti brūte sa kārayati 
[I,60,v_I,60,vi]	aviruddham param yat uktam pada niyamasya arthavat tvāt avivakṣita arthāḥ mantrāḥ iti kāmam anarthakaḥ niyamaḥ na dṛṣṭam apramāṇam niyata uccāraṇam adṛṣṭāya iti ced aviruddhāḥ adṛṣṭa kalpanā asmat pakṣe api evam pratyāyamānam abhyudaya kāri bhavati iti 
[I,61,i_I,61,ii]	saṃpraiṣe karma garha anupālambhaḥ saṃskāra tvāt atha yat uktam prokṣaṇīḥ āsādaya iti buddha bodhanam aśakyam atas uccāraṇāt adṛṣṭam iti tat na kartavyam iti api vijñāte anuṣṭhāna kāle smṛtyā prayojanam upāya antareṇa api sā prāpnoti atas anena upāyena kartavyā iti niyama artham āmnānam saṃskāra tvāt 
[I,61,iii_I,61,v]	abhidhāne artha vādaḥ catvāri śṛṅgāḥ iti asat abhidhāne gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ gauṇī kalpanā pramāṇavat tvāt uccāraṇāt adṛṣṭam apramāṇam catasraḥ hotrāḥ śṛṅgāṇi iva asya trayaḥ asya pādāḥ iti savana abhiprāyam dve śīrṣaḥ iti patnī yajamānau sapta hastāsaḥ iti chandāṃsi abhipretya tridhā baddhaḥ iti tribhiḥ vedaiḥ baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ kāmān varṣati iti roravīti śabda karmā mahaḥ devaḥ martyān āviveśa iti manuṣya adhikāra abhiprāyam tat yathā cakravāka stanī haṃsa danta āvalī kāśa vastrā śaivāla keśī nadī iti nadyāḥ stutiḥ yajña samṛddhaye sādhanānām cetana sādṛśyam upapādayitu kāmaḥ āmantraṇa śabdena lakṣayati oṣadhe trāyasva enam iti śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ iti atas param prātar anuvāka anuvacanam bhaviṣyati yatra acetanāḥ santaḥ grāvāṇaḥ api śṛṇuyuḥ kim punar vidvāṃsaḥ api brāhmaṇāḥ iti ittham ca acetanāḥ api grāvāṇaḥ āmantryante 
[I,61,vi_I,61,vii]	guṇāt avipratiṣedhaḥ syāt aditiḥ dyauḥ iti gauṇaḥ eṣa śabdaḥ atas na vipratiṣedhaḥ yathā tvam eva mātā tvam eva pitā iti tathā eka rudra daivatyaḥ ekaḥ rudraḥ śata rudra daivatye śatam rudrāḥ iti avirodhaḥ 
[I,62,i_I,62,ii]	vidyā vacanam asaṃyogāt yat tu akarma kāle avahanti mantreṇa māṇavakaḥ na pūrṇikā avahantim prakāśayitum iccati iti ayajña saṃyogāt na yajña upakārāya etat prakāśayitum icchati nanu prakāśana anabhyāsaḥ akṣara abhyāsaḥ ca paricoditaḥ ucyate saukaryāt prakāśana anabhyāsaḥ durgraha tvāt ca akṣara abhyāsaḥ 
[I,62,iii_I,62,iv]	sataḥ param avijñānam vidyamānaḥ api arthaḥ pramāda ālasya ādibhiḥ na upalabhyate nigama nirukta vyākaraṇa vaśena dhātutaḥ arthaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ yathā sṛṇya iva jarbharī turpharītu iti evamādīni aśvinoḥ abhidhānāni dvi vacana antāni lakṣyante anena aśvinoḥ kāmam aprā iti āśvinam sūktam avagamyate devatā abhidhānāni ca ghaṭante jarbharī iti evamādīni avayava prasiddhyā ca laukikena arthena viśeṣyante evam sarvatra 
[I,62,v_I,62,vi]	uktaḥ ca anitya saṃyogaḥ param tu śruti sāmānya mātram iti atra iti 
[I,63,i_I,63,ii]	liṅga upadeśaḥ ca tad arthavat āgneya āgnīdhram upatiṣṭhate iti vidhānāt vivakṣita arthānām eva mantrāṇām bhavati liṅgeṇa upadeśaḥ yadi te agni prayojanāḥ tatas te āgneyāḥ na agni śabda saṃnidhānāt 
[I,63,iii_I,63,iv]	ūhaḥ ūha darśanam ca vivakṣita arthānām eva bhavati kim ūha darśanam na pitā vardhate na mātā iti anye vardhante iti gamyate pratyakṣam kaumāra yauvana sthāviraiḥ vardhante mātrā ādayaḥ śabdaḥ na vardhate iti brūte kā punar śabdasya vṛddhiḥ yat dvi vacana bahuvacana saṃyogaḥ 
[I,63,v_I,63,vi]	vidhi śabdāḥ ca vidhi śabdāḥ ca vivakṣita arthān eva mantrān anuvadanti śatam himāḥ śatam varṣāṇi jīvyāsam iti etat eva aha iti 
[I,64,i_I,64,ii^1]	dharmasya śabda mūla tvāt aśabdam anapekṣam syāt evam tāvat kṛtsnasya vedasya prāmāṇyam uktam atha idānīm yatra na vaidikam śabdam upalabhemahi atha ca smaranti evam ayam arthaḥ anuṣṭhātavyaḥ etasmai ca prayojanāya iti kim asau tathā eva syāt na vā iti yathā aṣṭakāḥ kartavyāḥ guruḥ anugantavyaḥ taḍāgam khanitavyam prabhā pravartayitavyā śikhā akarma kartavyam iti evamādayaḥ tat ucyate dharmasya śabda mūla tvāt aśabdam anapekṣam syāt iti śabda lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ iti uktam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti atas nirmūla tvāt na apekṣitavyam iti nanu ye viduḥ ittham asau padārthaḥ kartavyaḥ iti katham iva te vadiṣyanti akartavyaḥ eva ayam iti smaraṇa anupapattyā na hi ananubhūtaḥ aśrutaḥ vā arthaḥ smaryate na ca asya avaidikasya ālaukikasya ca smaraṇam upapadyate pūrva vijñāna kāraṇa abhāvāt iti 
[I,64,ii^2]	yā hi bandhyā smareta idam me dauhitra kṛtam iti na me duhitā asti iti matvā na jātucit asau pratīyāt samyak etat jñānam iti evam api yathā eva pāramparyeṇa avicchedāt ayam vedaḥ iti pramāṇam eṣām smṛtiḥ evam iyam api pramāṇam bhaviṣyati iti na etat evam pratyakṣeṇa upalabdha tvāt granthasya na anupapannam pūrva vijñānam aṣṭaka ādiṣu tu adṛṣṭa artheṣu pūrva vijñāna kāraṇa abhāvāt vyāmoha smṛtiḥ eva gamyate tat yathā kaścid jāti andhaḥ vadet smarāmi aham asya rūpa viśeṣasya iti kutas te pūrva vijñānam iti ca paryanuyuktaḥ jāti andham eva aparam vinirdiśeta tasya kutas jāti andha antarāt evam jāti andha paramparāyām api satyām na eva jātucit saṃpratīyuḥ vidvāṃsaḥ samyak darśanam etat iti atas na ādartavyam evaṃjātīyakam anapekṣam syāt iti 
[I,65,i_I,65,iii]	api vā kartṛ sāmānyāt pramāṇam anumānam syāt api vā iti pakṣaḥ vyāvartyate pramāṇam smṛtiḥ vijñānam hi tat kim iti anyathā bhaviṣyati pūrva vijñānam asya na asti kāraṇa abhāvāt iti ced asyāḥ eva smṛteḥ draḍhimnaḥ kāraṇam anumāsyāmahe tat tu na anubhavanam anupapattyā na hi manuṣyāḥ iha eva janmani evaṃjātīyakam artham anubhavitum śaknuvanti janma antara anubhūtam ca na smaryate granthaḥ tu anumīyeta kartṛ sāmānyāt smṛti vaidika padārthayoḥ tena upapannaḥ veda saṃyogaḥ traivarṇikānām nanu na upalabhantaḥ evaṃjātīyakam grantham anupalabhamānāḥ api anumimīran vismaraṇam api upapadyate iti tat upapanna tvāt pūrva vijñānasya tari varṇikānām smaratām vismaraṇasya ca upapanna tvāt grantha anumānam upapadyate iti pramāṇam smṛtiḥ 
[I,65,iv]	aṣṭakā liṅgāḥ ca mantrāḥ vede dṛśyante yān janāḥ pratinandanti iti evamādayaḥ tathā pratyupasthita niyamānām ācārāṇām dṛṣṭa artha tvāt eva prāmāṇyam guroḥ anugamāt prītaḥ guruḥ adhyāpayiṣyati granthagranthi bhedinaḥ ca nyāyān parituṣṭaḥ vakṣyati iti tathā ca darśayati tasmāt śreyāṃsam pūrvam yantam pāpīyān paścāt anveti iti prapāḥ taḍāgāni ca para upakārāya na dharmāya iti eva avagamyate tathā ca darśanam dhanvan iva prapā asi iti tathā sthalayā udakam parigṛhṇanti iti ca gotra cihnam śikhā karma darśanam ca yatra bāṇāḥ saṃpatanti kumārāḥ viśikhāḥ iva iti tena ye dṛṣṭa arthāḥ te tatas eva pramāṇam ye tu adṛṣṭa arthāḥ teṣu vaidika śabda anumānam iti 
[I,66,i_I,66,ii]	virodhe tu anapekṣam syāt asati hi anumānam atha yatra śruti virodhaḥ tatra katham yathā audumbaryāḥ sarva veṣṭanam audumbarīm spṛṣṭvā udgāyet iti śrutyā viruddham aṣṭācatvāriṃśat varṣāṇi veda brahmacaraṇam jāta putraḥ kṛṣṇa keśaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti anena viruddham krīta rājakaḥ bhojyān naḥ iti tasmāt agnīṣomīye saṃsthite yajamānasya gṛhe aśitavyam iti anena viruddham tat pramāṇam kartṛ sāmānyāt iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ aśakya tvāt vyamohaḥ iti avagamyate katham aśakyatā sparśa vidhānāt na sarvā śakyā veṣṭayitum udgāyatā spraṣṭum ca tām udgāyatā spraṣṭavyām avagacchantaḥ kena imam saṃpratyayam bādhemahi sarva veṣṭana smaraṇena iti brūmaḥ 
[I,66,iii^1]	nanu nirmūla tvāt vyāmohaḥ tat smaraṇam iti vaidikam vacanam mūlam bhaviṣyati iti bhavet vaidikam vacanam mūlam yadi sparśanam vyāmohaḥ avyāmohe tu aśakya tvāt anupapannam yathā anubhavanam anupapannam iti na kalpyate tathā vaidikam api vacanam katham tarhi sarva veṣṭana smaraṇam vyāmohaḥ katham vyāmoha kalpanā śrauta vijñāna virodhāt atha kim artham na imau vidhī vikalpyete vrīhi yava vat bṛhat rathantara vat vā na asati vyāmoha vijñāne vikalpaḥ bhavati yadi sarva veṣṭana vijñānam pramāṇam sparśanam vyāmohaḥ yadi sparśanam pramāṇam smṛtiḥ vyāmohaḥ vikalpam tu vadan sparśanasya pakṣe tāvat prāmāṇyam anumanyate tasya ca mūlam śrutiḥ sā ced pramāṇam anumatā na pākṣikī 
[I,66,iii^2]	pākṣikam ca sarva veṣṭana smaraṇam pakṣe tāvat na śaknoti śrutim parikalpayitum sparśa vijñānena bādhita tvāt tatas ca avyāmohe ca tasmin aśakyā śrutiḥ kalpayitum na ca asau avyāmohaḥ pakṣe pakṣe vyāmohaḥ bhaviṣyati iti yat eva hi tasya ekasmin pakṣe mūlam tat eva itarasmin api ekasmin ced pakṣe na vyāmohaḥ śruti prāmāṇya tulya tvāt itaratra api avyāmohaḥ na ca asau ekasmin pakṣe śrutiḥ nibaddha akṣarā hi sā na pramāda pāṭhaḥ iti śakyā gaditum tena na etat pakṣe vijñānam vyāmohāt pakṣa antaram saṃkrāntam iti avagamyate tatra duḥśruta svapna ādi vijñāna mūla tvam te sarva veṣṭanasya iti virodhāt kalpyate na hi tasya sati virodhe prāmāṇyam abhyupagantavyam iti kiṃcid asti pramāṇam tasmāt yathā eva ekasmin pakṣe na śakyā śrutiḥ kalpayitum evam aparasmin pakṣe tulya kāraṇa tvāt 
[I,67,i]	api ca itaretara āśraye anyatas paricchedāt kā iyam itaretara āśraya tā pramāṇāyām smṛtau sparśanam vyāmohaḥ sparśane pramāṇe smṛtiḥ vyāmohaḥ tat etat itaretra āśrayam bhavati tatra sparśanasya kḷptam mūlam kalpyam smṛteḥ saḥ asau anyatas paricchedaḥ kalpya mūla tvāt smṛti prāmāṇyam anavakḷptam tat aprāmāṇyāt sparśanam na vyāmohaḥ tat avyāmohāt smārta śruti kalpanā anupapannā pramāṇa abhāvāt nanu evam sati vrīhi sādhana tva vijñānasya api avyāmohāt yava śrutiḥ na upapadyeta satyam na upapadyate yadi apratyakṣā syāt pratyakṣā tu eṣā na hi pratyakṣam anupapannam nāma asti dvayoḥ tu śrutyoḥ bhāvāt dve hi ete vākye tatra ekena kevala yava sādhana tā gamyate ekena kevala vrīhi sādhana tā na ca vākyena avagataḥ arthaḥ apahnūyate tasmāt vrīhi yavayoḥ upapannaḥ vikalpaḥ bṛhat rathantarayoḥ ca tasmāt uktam śruti viruddhā smṛtiḥ apramāṇam iti atas ca sarva veṣṭana ādi na ādaraṇīyam 
[I,68,i_I,68,iii]	hetu darśanāt ca lobhāt vāsaḥ āditsamānāḥ audumbarīm kṛtsnām veṣṭitavantaḥ kecid tat smṛteḥ bījam bubhukṣamāṇāḥ kecid krīta rājakasya bhojanam ācaritavantaḥ apuṃstvam pracchādayantaḥ ca aṣṭācatvāriṃśat varṣāṇi veda brahmacaryam caritavantaḥ tatas eṣā smṛtiḥ iti avagamyate adhikaraṇa antaram vā vaisarjana homi iyam vāsaḥ adhvaryuḥ gṛhṇāti iti yūpa hastinaḥ dānam ācaranti iti tad kartṛ sāmānyāt pramāṇam iti prāpte apramāṇam smṛtiḥ atra anyat mūlam lobhāt ācaritavantaḥ kecid tatas eṣā smṛtiḥ upapannataram ca etat vaidika vacana kalpanāt 
[I,68,iv_I,68,v]	śiṣṭā kope aviruddham iti ced ācāntena kartavyam yajña upavītinā kartavyam dakṣiṇa ācāreṇa kartavyam iti evaṃlakṣaṇāni udāharaṇāni kim etāni śruti viruddhāni na kartavyāni uta aviruddhāni kāryāṇi iti iti ced paśyasi taiḥ api anuṣṭhīyamānaiḥ vaidīkam kiṃcid na kupyati tasmāt aviruddhāni iti 
[I,69,i_I,69,ii]	na śāstra parimāṇa tvāt na etat evam śāstra paricchinnam hi kramam bādheran katham vedam kṛtvā vedim kurvīteti imām śrutim uparundhyāt antarā vedam vedim ca anuṣṭhīyamānam ācamana ādi dakṣiṇena ca eka hastena anuṣṭhīyamāneṣu padārtheṣu kadācid pradhānam sva kālam atikrāmeta ubhābhyām hastābhyām anutiṣṭhan pradhāna kālam saṃbhāvayiṣyati 
[I,69,iii_I,69,iv]	api vā kāraṇa agrahaṇe prayuktāni pratīyeran api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ agṛhyamāṇa kāraṇāḥ evaṃjātīyakāḥ pramāṇam nanu krama kālau virundhanti virudhnantu na eṣa doṣaḥ ācamanam padārthaḥ padārthānām ca guṇaḥ kramaḥ na ca guṇa anurodhena padārthaḥ na kartavyaḥ bhavati api ca prāptānām padārthānām uttara kālam kramaḥ āpatati yadā padārthaḥ prāpnoti tadā kramaḥ eva na asti kena saha virodhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti tathā yadi dakṣiṇena na ācaryate kālaḥ mā virodhīt iti tatra kāla anurodhena padārthaḥ na anyathātvam abhyupagacchet prayoga aṅgam hi kālaḥ padārthānām upakārakaḥ atas na kāla anurodhena vyathayitavyaḥ padārthaḥ api ca śaucam dakṣiṇa ācāra tā yajña upavīti tvam ca evaṃjātīyakāḥ arthāḥ vyavadhātāraḥ na bhavanti sarva padārthānām śeṣa bhūta tvāt tasmāt ācamana ādīnām prāmāṇyam 
[I,70,i_I,70,ii]	teṣu adarśanāt virodhasya samā vipratipattiḥ syāt yava mayaḥ caruḥ vārāhī upānahau vaitase kaṭe prājāpatyān saṃcinoti iti yava varāha vetasa śabdān samāmananti tatra kecid dīrghaśūkeṣu yava śabdam prayuñjante kecid priyaṅguṣu varāha śabdam kecid śūkare kecid kṛṣṇa śakunau vetasa śabdam kecid vañjulake kecid jambvām tatra ubhayathā padārtha avagamāt vikalpaḥ 
[I,70,iii_I,70,iv]	śāstra sthā vā tad nimitta tvāt vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati yava śabdaḥ yadi dīrghaśūkeṣu sādṛśyāt priyaṅguṣu bhaviṣyati yadi priyaṅguṣu sādṛśyāt yaveṣu kim sādṛśyam pūrva saśye kṣīṇe bhavanti dīrghaśūkāḥ priyaṅgavaḥ ca etat tayoḥ sādṛśyam kaḥ punar atra niścayaḥ yaḥ śāstra sthānām sa śabda arthaḥ ke śāstra sthāḥ śiṣṭāḥ teṣām avicchinnā smṛtiḥ śabdeṣu vedeṣu ca tena śiṣṭā nimittam śruti smṛti avadhāraṇe te hi evam samāmananti yava mayeṣu karambha pātreṣu vihiteṣu vākya śeṣam yatra anyāḥ oṣadhayaḥ mlāyante atha ete modamānāḥ iva uttiṣṭhanti iti dīrghaśūkān yavān darśayati vedaḥ vede darśanāt avicchinna pāramparyaḥ dīrghaśūkeṣu yava śabdaḥ iti gamyate tasmāt priyaṅguṣu gauṇaḥ tasmāt dīrghaśūkānām puroḍāśaḥ kartavyaḥ tasmāt varāham gāvaḥ anudhāvanti iti śūkare varāha śabdam darśayati apsujaḥ vetasaḥ iti vañjule vetasa śabdam śūkaram hi gāvaḥ anudhāvanti vañjulaḥ apsu jāyate jambū vṛkṣa sthale giri nadīṣu vā 
[I,71,i_I,71,ii^1]	coditam tu pratīyeta avirodhāt pramāṇena atha yān śabdān āryāḥ na kasmiṃścid arthe ācaranti mlecchāḥ tu kasmiṃścid prayuñjate yathā pikanema sata ta āmarasa ādi śabdāḥ teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim nigama nirukta vyākaraṇa vaśena dhātutaḥ arthaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ uta yatra mlecchāḥ ācaranti sa śabda arthaḥ iti śiṣṭa ācārasya prāmāṇyam uktam na āśiṣṭa smṛteḥ tasmāt nigama ādi vaśena artha kalpanā nigama ādīnām ca evam arthavat tā bhaviṣyati anabhiyogaḥ ca śabda artheṣu aśiṣṭānām abhiyogaḥ ca itareṣām tasmāt dhātutaḥ arthaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ coditam aśiṣṭaiḥ api śiṣṭa an avagatam pratīyeta yat pramāṇena aviruddham tat avagamyamānam na nyāyyam tyaktum 
[I,71,ii^2]	yat tu śiṣṭa ācāraḥ pramāṇam iti tat pratyakṣa anavagate arthe yat tu abhiyuktāḥ śabda artheṣu śiṣṭāḥ iti tatra ucyate abhiyuktatarāḥ pakṣiṇām poṣaṇe bandhane ca mlecchāḥ yat tu nigama nirukta vyākaraṇānām arthavat tā iti tatra eṣām arthavat tā bhaviṣyati na yatra mlecchaiḥ api avagataḥ śabda arthaḥ api ca nigama ādibhiḥ arthe kalpayamāne avyavasthitaḥ śabda arthaḥ bhavet tatra aniścayaḥ syāt tasmāt pikaḥ iti kokilaḥ grāhyaḥ na imaḥ ardham tāmarasam padmam sataḥ iti dāru mayam pātram parimaṇḍalam śata chidram 
[I,72,i_I,72,ii]	prayoga śāstram iti ced iha kalpasūtrāṇi udāharaṇam māśakam hāstikam kauṇḍinyakam iti evaṃlakṣaṇakāni kim pramāṇam apramāṇam vā iti saṃdigdhāni kim prāptam prayogasya śāstram pramāṇam evaṃjātīyakam iti brūmaḥ satya vācām etāni vacanāni katham avagamyate vaidikaiḥ eṣām saṃvādaḥ bhavati yaḥ eva hi vede grahāḥ te eva iha yāḥ eva vede iṣṭakāḥ tāḥ eva iha tasmāt satya vācaḥ ācāryāḥ ācārya vacaḥ pramāṇam iti ca śrutiḥ pratyakṣataḥ prāmāṇyam anavagatam iti yadi ucyeta pramāṇa antareṇa vacanena avagatam iti na doṣaḥ veda vākyaiḥ ca eṣām tulyaḥ ādaraḥ tasmāt pramāṇam 
[I,72,iii_I,72,iv]	na asanniyamāt na etat evam asat niyamāt na etat samyak nibandhanam svara abhāvāt 
[I,72,v_I,73,i]	avākya śeṣāt ca ṛtvijaḥ vṛṇīte vṛtāḥ yajanti deva yajanam adhyavasyanti iti na atra vidhiḥ gamyate vartamāna kāla pratyaya nirdeśāt na ca atra vākya śeṣaḥ stāvakaḥ asti tasmāt apramāṇam yaḥ ca ādaraḥ uktaḥ sa na antarīyaka tvāt veda vākya miśra samāmnānāt yat tu śrutiḥ iti na etat arthavāda tvāt katham artha vādaḥ vidhi antaram hi asti āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ iti atra ācāryaḥ vedaḥ abhipretaḥ ācinoti asya buddhim iti yat vā ācārya vacanam pramāṇam tad apekṣam katara tat yat pramāṇa gamyam yat ca uktam satya vācām etāni vacanāni iti tat na 
[I,73,ii_I,73,iii]	sarvatra ca prayogāt saṃnidhāna śāstrāt ca ācārya vacanam hi bhavati pūrva pakṣe sarvāsu tithiṣu amāvāsyā iti saṃnihitam ca śāstram paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsyāḥ yajeta amāvāsyāyām amāvasyayā yajet iti tena śruti viruddha vacanāt na satya vācaḥ tasmāt apramāṇam 
[I,73,iv_I,73,v]	anumāna vyavasthānāt tad saṃyuktam pramāṇam syāt anumānāt smṛteḥ ācārāṇām ca prāmāṇyam iṣyate yena eva hetunā te pramāṇam tena eva vyavasthitāḥ prāmāṇyam arhanti tasmāt holāka ādayaḥ prācyaiḥ eva kartavyāḥ āhnī naibuka ādayaḥ dākṣiṇātyaiḥ eva udvṛṣabha yajña ādayaḥ udīcyaiḥ eva yathā śikhā kalpaḥ vyavatiṣṭhate kecid tri śikhāḥ kecid pañcaśikhāḥ iti 
[I,73,vi_I,74,i]	api vā sarva dharmaḥ syāt tat nyāya tvāt vidhānasya api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ evaṃjātīyakaḥ sarva dharmaḥ syāt kutas tat nyāya tvāt vidhānasya vidhīyate anena iti vidhānam śabdaḥ saḥ anumīyate smṛtyāḥ na ca tasya ākṛti vacana tā nyāyyā na ca vyakti vacana tā na sarveṣām anuṣṭhātṝṇām yat ekam sāmānyam tasya vācakaḥ kaścid śabdaḥ asti yaḥ anumīyeta tasmāt sarva dharmatā vidheḥ nyāyyā kutas padārthāḥ kartavyā iti pramāṇam asti vyavasthāyām tu na kiñcid pramāṇam asti atha yat uktam yathā śikhā kalpaḥ vyavatiṣṭhate iti 
[I,74,ii_I,74,iii]	darśanāt viniyogaḥ syāt gotra vyavasthayā śikhā kalpa vyavasthāyām darśanam spaṣṭam 
[I,74,iv_I,74,v]	liṅga abhāvāt ca nityasya idam padebhyaḥ kebhyaścid uttaram sūtram kāni tāni padāni atha kim artham na liṅgāt vyavasthā yathā śuklaḥ hotā iti na asti tat nityam eṣām liṅgam yat yathādarśanam anuvartate ye api śyāmāḥ bṛhantaḥ lohita akṣāḥ te api na sarve ārhnī naibuka ādīn kurvate anevaṃliṅgāḥ api ca anutiṣṭhanti tasmāt na vyavasthā śuklaḥ hotā iti pratyakṣā śrutiḥ 
[I,74,vi_I,74,vii]	ākhyā hi deśa saṃyogāt atha kasmāt na samākhyayā niyamaḥ ye dākṣiṇātyāḥ iti samākhyātāḥ te āhnī naibuka ādīn kariṣyanti yaḥ udīcyāḥ iti samākhyātāḥ te udvṛṣabha yajña ādīn ye prācyāḥ iti te holāka ādīn yathā rājā rājasūyena iti na etat evam deśa saṃyogāt ākhyā bhavati dākṣiṇa deśāt nirgataḥ prākṣu vā udakṣu vā avasthitaḥ āhnī naibuka ādīn karoti eva udīcyāḥ ca deśa antaraḥ udvṛṣabha yajña ādīn prācyāḥ ca holāka ādīn anya deśaḥ ca deśa antara gataḥ na niyogataḥ para padārthān karoti tasmāt na vyavasthā rājā rājasūyena iti tu niyatā jātiḥ 
[I,75,i_I,75,ii]	na syāt deśa antareṣu iti ced iti ced paśyasi yadi deśa saṃyogāt ākhyā bhavet deśa antara sthasya na bhavet bhavati ca deśa ānatara sthasya māthuraḥ iti asaṃbaddhasya api mathurayā tasmāt na deśa saṃyogāt ākhyā 
[I,75,iii_I,75,iv]	syāt yoga ākhyā hi māthura vat deśa saṃyoga nimittāyām api ākhyāyām deśāt nirgatasya tad ākhyā na viruddhā yatas eṣā yoga ākhyā yoga mātra apekṣā na bhūta vartamāna bhaviṣyat saṃbandha apekṣā yatas dṛśyate mathurām abhiprasthitaḥ māthuraḥ iti mathurāyām vasan mathurāyāḥ nirgataḥ ca yasya tu atas anyatamaḥ saṃbandhaḥ na asti na sa māthuraḥ tasmāt na samākhyayā vyavasthā 
[I,75,v_I,75,vi]	karma dharmaḥ vā pravaṇa vat atha kasmāt na karma aṅgam deśaḥ yaḥ kṛṣṇamṛtikā prāyaḥ saḥ āhnī naibuka ādīnām yathā prācīna pravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajeta iti 
[I,75,vii_I,75,viii]	tulyam tu kartṛ dharmeṇa yathā kartari avyavasthitam liṅgam śyāma ādi na padārthaiḥ saṃvādam upaiti tadvat deśa liṅgam avyavasthitam kṛṣṇamṛtikā prāye api anye na kurvanti tathā anya liṅge api kurvanti tasmāt na deśataḥ vyavasthā prācīna pravaṇam tu śrutyā niyatam vaiśvadevasya 
[I,76,i_I,76,ii]	prayoga utpatti aśāstra tvāt śabdeṣu na vyavasthā syāt gauḥ gāvī goṇī gopotalikāḥ iti evamādayaḥ śabdāḥ udāharaṇam go śabdaḥ yathā sāsnādim iti pramāṇam kim tathā gāvi ādayaḥ api uta na iti saṃdehaḥ kim atra ekaḥ śabdaḥ avicchinna pāramparyaḥ artha abhidhāyī itare apabhraṃśāḥ uta sarve anādayaḥ sarve iti brūmaḥ kutas pratyayāt pratīyate hi gāvi ādibhyaḥ sāsna ādimān arthaḥ tasmāt itas varṣa śate api asya arthasya saṃbandhaḥ āsīt eva tatas pareṇa tatas ca paratareṇa iti anāditā kartā ca asya saṃbandhasya na asti iti vyavasthitam eva tasmāt sarve sādhavaḥ sarvaiḥ bhāṣitavyam sarve hi sādhayanti artham yathā hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇiḥ iti arthāya hi ete uccāryante na adṛṣṭāya na hi eṣām uccāraṇe śāstram asti tasmāt na vyavatiṣṭheta kaścid ekaḥ eva sādhuḥ itare asādhavaḥ iti 
[I,76,iii_I,76,iv]	śabde prayatna niṣpatteḥ aparādhasya bhāgi tvam mahatā prayatnena śabdam uccaranti vāyuḥ nābheḥ utthitaḥ urasi vistīrṇaḥ kaṇṭhe vivartitaḥ mūrdhānam āhatya parāvṛttaḥ vaktre vicaran vividhān śabdān abhivyanakti tatra aparādhyeta api uccārayitā yathā śuṣke patiṣyāmi iti kardame patati sakṛt upasprakṣyāmi iti dvis upaspṛśati tatas aparādhāt pravṛttāḥ gāvi ādayaḥ bhaveyuḥ na niyogataḥ avicchinna pāramparyā eva iti 
[I,77,i_I,77,ii]	anyāyaḥ ca aneka śabda tvam na ca eṣa nyāyaḥ yat sadṛśāḥ śabdāḥ ekam artham abhiniviśamānāḥ sarve avichinna pāramparyā eva iti pratyaya mātra darśanāt abhyupagamyate sādṛśyāt sādhu śabde api avagate pratyayaḥ avakalpyate tasmāt amīṣām ekaḥ anādiḥ anye apabhraṃśāḥ hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇiḥ iti evamādiṣu tu abhiyukta upadeśāt anādiḥ amīṣām arthena saṃbandhaḥ iti 
[I,77,iii_I,77,iv]	tatra tattvam abhiyoga viśeṣāt syāt katham punar tatra tattvam śakyam vijñātum śakyam iti āha arthinaḥ hi abhiyuktāḥ bhavanti dṛśyate ca abhiyuktānām guṇayatām avismaraṇam upapannam pratyakṣam ca etat guṇyamānam na bhraśyate iti tasmāt yam abhiyuktāḥ upadiśanti eṣaḥ eva sādhuḥ iti avagantavyaḥ 
[I,77,v_I,77,vi]	tad aśaktiḥ ca anurūpa tvāt atha yat uktam arthaḥ avagamyate gāvi ādibhyaḥ atas eṣām api anādiḥ arthena saṃbandhaḥ iti tad aśaktiḥ eṣām gamyate go śabdam uccārayitu kāmena kenacid aśaktyā gāvī iti uccāritam apareṇa jñātam sāsnādimān asya vivakṣitaḥ tat artham gauḥ iti uccārayitu kāmaḥ gāvī iti uccārayati tatas śikṣitvā apare api sāsnādim iti vivakṣite gāvī iti uccārayanti tena gāvi ādibhyaḥ sāsna ādimān avagamyate anurūpaḥ hi gāvi ādi go śabdasya 
[I,78,i_I,78,ii]	eka deśa tvāt ca vibhakti vyatyaye syāt atas eva hi vibhakti vyatyaye api pratyayaḥ bhavati aśmakaiḥ āgacchāmi iti aśmaka śabda eka deśaḥ upalabdhe aśmakebhyaḥ iti eva śabdaḥ smaryate tatas aśmakebhyaḥ iti eṣaḥ arthaḥ upalabhyate iti evam gāvi ādi darśanāt go śabda smaraṇam tatas sāsna ādimān avagamyate 
[I,78,iii_I,78,iv^1]	prayoga codanā bhāvāt artha eka tvam avibhāgāt atha gauḥ iti evamādayaḥ śabdāḥ kim ākṛteḥ pramāṇam uta vyakteḥ iti saṃdehaḥ ucyate idam tāvat parīkṣyatām kim yaḥ eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ te eva vaidikāḥ uta anyaḥ iti yadā te eva tadā api kim te eva eṣām arthāḥ ye loke uta anyaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ tatra anye laukikāḥ śabdāḥ anye vaidikāḥ anye ca eṣām arthāḥ iti brūmaḥ kutas vyapadeśa bhedāt rūpa bhedāt ca ime laukikāḥ ime vaidikāḥ iti vyapadeśa bhedaḥ agniḥ vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanat iti anyat idam rūpam laukikāt agni śabdāt śabda anyatvāt ca na te eva arthāḥ api ca samāmananti uttānāḥ vai deva gavāḥ vahanti iti ye devānām gāvaḥ te uttānāḥ vahanti iti ukte gamyate eva yaḥ uttānāḥ vahanti te go śabdena ucyantaḥ iti tasmāt anyaḥ vaidika go śabdasya arthaḥ tathā devebhyaḥ vanaspate havīṃṣi hiraṇyaparṇa pradivaḥ te artham iti hiraṇyaparṇaḥ vai devaḥ vanaspatiḥ vede etat vai daivyam madhu yat ghṛtam iti veda ghṛte madhu śabdaḥ tasmāt amīṣām anye arthāḥ iti prāpte brūmaḥ yaḥ eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ te eva vaidikāḥ te eva eṣām arthāḥ iti kutas prayoga codanā bhāvāt 
[I,78,iv^2]	evam prayoga codanā saṃbhavati yadi te eva śabdāḥ te eva arthāḥ itarathā śabda anya tve arthaḥ na pratīyeta tasmāt eka śabda tvam iti ucyate prayojanam idam hetuḥ vyapadiśyatām iti tatas hetuḥ ucyate avibhāgāt iti na teṣām eṣām ca vibhāgam upalabhāmahe atas eva eka śabda tvam tān ca tān ca arthān avagacchāmaḥ atas na anya tvam ca vadāmaḥ yat ca uktam yaḥ uttānāḥ vadanti te deva gāvāḥ yat ghṛtam tat madhu yaḥ hiraṇyaparṇaḥ sa vanaspatiḥ iti na asti vacanam yat uttānānām vahatām go tvam brūyāt 
[I,78,iv^3]	ye gāvaḥ te uttānā vahanti iti evam tat yadi ca anena vacanena go tvam vidhīyate uttānāḥ vahanti iti anuvādaḥ syāt na ca uttānāḥ vahantaḥ prasiddhāḥ kecid te niyogataḥ vidhātavyāḥ teṣu vidhīyamāneṣu na śakyam go tvam vidhātum bhidyate hi tathā vākyam yadi ca anye vaidikāḥ tatas uttāna ādīnām arthaḥ na gamyeta tatra natarām śakyeta avijñāta lakṣaṇam go tvam vijñātum na ca uttāna vahana vacanam api anarthakam stuti arthena arthavat bhaviṣyati iti evam ghṛtasya madhu tvam hiraṇya parṇa tā ca vanaspateḥ tasmāt te eva śabdāḥ arthāḥ ca 
[I,79,i_I,80,i]	yadi laukikāḥ te eva arthāḥ tadā saṃdehaḥ kim ākṛtiḥ śabda arthaḥ atha vyaktiḥ iti kā punar ākṛtiḥ kā vyaktiḥ iti dravya guṇa karmaṇām sāmānya mātram ākṛtiḥ asādhāraṇa viśeṣāḥ vyaktiḥ kutas saṃśayaḥ gauḥ iti ukte sāmānya pratyayāt vyaktau ca kriyā saṃbandhāt tat ucyate vyaktiḥ śabda arthaḥ iti kutas prayoga codanā bhāvāt ālambhana prokṣaṇa viśasana ādīnām prayoga codanā ākṛti arthe na saṃbhaveyuḥ yatra uccāraṇa ānarthakyam tatra vyakti arthaḥ atas anyatra ākṛti vacanaḥ iti ced uktam anyāyaḥ ca aneka artha tvam iti katham sāmānya avagatiḥ iti ced vyakti padārthasya ākṛtiḥ cihna bhūtā bhaviṣyati yaḥ evam ākṛtikaḥ sa gauḥ iti yathā yasya daṇḍaḥ asti sa daṇḍī iti na ca daṇḍa vacanaḥ daṇḍi śabdaḥ evam iha api 
[I,80,ii_I,80,iii]	dravya śabdāt dravya āśrayasya śabdaḥ dravya śabdaḥ na tatra dravya āśraya vacanaḥ śabdaḥ bhavet yadi ākṛtiḥ śabda arthaḥ bhavet ṣaṭ deyā dvādaśa deyā caturviṃśatiḥ deyāḥ iti na hi ākṛtiḥ ṣaṣ ādibhiḥ saṃkhyābhiḥ yujyate tasmāt na ākṛti vacanaḥ 
[I,80,iv_I,80,v]	anya darśanāt ca yadi paśuḥ upākṛtaḥ palāyeta anyam tad varṇam tat vayasam ālabheta iti yadi ākṛti vacanaḥ śabdaḥ bhavet anyasya ālambhaḥ na upapadyate anyasva api paśu dravyasya sā eva ākṛtiḥ tasmāt vyakti vacanaḥ iti 
[I,80,vi_I,81,i]	ākṛtiḥ tu kriyā artha tvāt tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati ākṛti śabda arthaḥ kutas kriyā artha tvāt śyena citam cinvītaḥ iti vacanam ākṛtau saṃbhavati yadi ākṛti arthaḥ śyena śabdaḥ vyakti vacane tu na cayanena śyena vyaktiḥ utpādayitum śakyate iti aśakya artha vacanāt anarthakaḥ tasmāt ākṛti vacanaḥ nanu śyena vyaktibhiḥ cayanam anuṣṭhāsyate na sādhakatamaḥ śyena śabda arthaḥ īpsitatamaḥ hi asau śyena śabdena nirdiśyate atas cayanena śyenaḥ nivartayitavyaḥ saḥ ākṛti vacana tve avakalpyate 
[I,81,ii]	nanūbhayatra kriyāyāḥ asaṃbhavaḥ eva vyapadiśyate na ākṛtiḥ śabda arthaḥ kutas kriyā na saṃbhavet ākṛtau śabda arthe vrīhīn prokṣati iti tathā na vyaktiḥ śabda arthaḥ kriyā eva na saṃbhavet vyakteḥ śabda artha tve śyena citam cinvītaḥ iti yat api ucyate vrīhīn prokṣati iti vyakti lakṣaṇa artha ākṛtiḥ iti śakyam anyatra api śyena citam cinvītaḥ iti vaditum ākṛti lakṣaṇa arthā vyaktiḥ iti kim punar atra jyāyaḥ 
[I,81,iii]	ākṛtiḥ śabda arthaḥ iti yadi vyaktiḥ śabda arthaḥ bhavet vyakti antare na prayujyeta atha vyakti antare prayujyate na tarhi vyaktiḥ śabda arthaḥ sarva sāmānya viśeṣa vinirmuktā hi vyaktiḥ iti ucyate na eṣa doṣaḥ vyakti antare sarva sāmānya viśeṣa vinirmuktaḥ eva pravartiṣyate yadi vyakti antare sarva sāmānya viśeṣa viyukte pravartiṣyate sāmānyam eva tarhi tat na iti ucyate yaḥ hi arthaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣāṇām ca āśrayaḥ sā vyaktiḥ vyakti vacanaḥ ca śabdaḥ na sāmānye na viśeṣe vartate teṣām tu āśrayam eva abhidadhāti tena vyakti antare vṛttiḥ adoṣaḥ na hi tat sāmānyam 
[I,81,iv^1]	yadi vyakti antareṣu api bhavati sarva sāmānya viśeṣa viyuktāyām aśva vyaktau go śabdaḥ kim iti na vartate āha yeṣu eva prayogaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ teṣu vartiṣyate na sarvatra na ca aśva vyaktau go śabdasya prayogaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt tatra na vartiṣyate yadi yatra prayogaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tatra vṛttiḥ adya jātāyām gavi prathama prayogaḥ na prāpnoti tatra adṛṣṭa tvāt sāmānya pratyayaḥ ca na prāpnoti iyam api gauḥ iti iyam api gauḥ iti iyam vā gauḥ iti iyam vā gauḥ iti syāt bhavati tu sāmānya pratyayaḥ adṛṣṭa pūrvāyām api go vyaktau tasmāt na prayoga apekṣaḥ go śabdaḥ vyakti vacanaḥ iti śakyataḥ āśrayitum evam tarhi śakteḥ svabhāvaḥ eṣaḥ yat kasyāṃcid vyaktau vartate kasyāṃcid na 
[I,81,iv^2]	yathā agniḥ uṣṇaḥ udakam śītam evam etat bhaviṣyati iti na evam sidhyati na hi etat gamyate kasyāṃcid vyaktau vartate kasyāṃcid na iti satyam etat go tvam lakṣaṇam bhaviṣyati iti yatra go tvam tasyām vyaktau iti evam tarhi viśiṣṭā vyaktiḥ pratīyeta yadi ca viśiṣṭā pūrvataram viśeṣaṇam avagamyeta na hi apratīte viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭam kecana pratyetum arhanti iti astu viśeṣaṇa tvena ākṛtim vakṣyati viśeṣya tvena vyaktim na hi ākṛti padārthakasya vyaktiḥ na padārthaḥ vyakti padārthakasya vā na ākṛtiḥ ubhayam ubhayasya padārthaḥ kasyacid kiṃcid prādhānyena vivakṣitam bhavati tena atra ākṛtiḥ guṇa bhāvena vyaktiḥ pradhāna bhāvena vivakṣyate iti 
[I,82,i]	na etat evam ubhayoḥ ucyamānayoḥ guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ syāt yadi ca atra ākṛtiḥ pratīyate śabdena tadā vyaktiḥ api padārthaḥ iti na śakyate vaditum kutas ākṛtiḥ hi vyaktyā nitya saṃbaddhā saṃbandhinyām ca tasyām avagatāyām saṃbandhi antaram avagamyate tat etat ātma pratyakṣam yat śabdaḥ uccarite vyaktiḥ pratīyate iti kim śabdāt uta ākṛteḥ iti vibhāgaḥ na pratyakṣaḥ saḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām avagamyate antareṇa api śabdam yaḥ ākṛtim avabudhyeta avabudhyeta iva asau vyaktim yaḥ tu uccarite api śabde mānasāt apacārāt kadācid ākṛtim na upalabheta na jātucit asau imām vyaktim avagaccheta nanu vyakti viśiṣṭāyām ākṛtau vartate vyakti viśiṣṭāyām ced varteta vyakti antara viśiṣṭā na pratīyeta tasmāt śabdaḥ ākṛti pratyayasya nimittam ākṛti pratyayaḥ vyakti pratyayasya iti 
[I,83,i_I,83,ii]	nanu guṇa bhūtā pratīyate iti uktam na guṇa bhāvaḥ asmad pakṣasya bādhakaḥ sarvathā tāvat pratīyate arthāt guṇa bhāvaḥ pradhāna bhāvaḥ vā sva artham ced uccāryate pradhāna bhūtā atha na sva artham para artham eva tatas guṇa bhūtā na tatra śabda vyāpāraḥ asti nanu ca daṇḍī iti na tāvat daṇḍi śabdena daṇḍaḥ abhidhīyate atha ca daṇḍa viśiṣṭaḥ avagamyate evam iha api na tāvat ākṛtiḥ abhidhīyate atha ca ākṛti viśiṣṭā vyaktiḥ gamyeta iti na etat sādhu ucyate satyam daṇḍi śabdena daṇḍaḥ na abhidhīyate na tu apratīte daṇḍe daṇḍi pratyayaḥ asti asti tu daṇḍi śabda eka deśa bhūtaḥ daṇḍa śabdaḥ yena daṇḍaḥ pratyāyitaḥ tasmāt sādhu etat yat pratīte viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭaḥ pratīyate iti 
[I,83,iii]	nanu go śabda avayavaḥ kaścid ākṛteḥ pratyāyakaḥ anyaḥ vyakteḥ yatas ucyate tatas ākṛtiḥ avagatā na go śabdaḥ ākṛti vacanaḥ iti na ca yathā daṇḍi śabdaḥ na daṇḍe prayuktaḥ evam go śabdaḥ na ākṛtau tad artham eva nidarśitam kevala ākṛti abhidhānaḥ śyena śabdaḥ iti tat evam anvaya vyatirekābhyām asati śyena vyakti saṃbandhe śyena śabda uccāraṇāt ākṛti vacanaḥ iti gamyate na tu vrīhi ākṛti saṃbandham antareṇa vrīhi vyaktau śabdasya prayogaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt ākṛti vacanaḥ śabdaḥ iti etat jyāyaḥ 
[I,83,iv_I,83,v]	na kriyā syāt iti ced artha antare vidhānam na dravyam iti ced atha yat uktam na kriyā saṃbhavet vrīhin prokṣati iti na dravya śabdaḥ syāt ṣaṭ deyāḥ iti anya darśana vacanam ca na syāt anyam tad rūpam iti tat parihartavyam 
[I,84,i_I,84,ii]	tad artha tvāt prayogasya avibhāgaḥ ākṛti artha tvāt śabdasya yasyāḥ vyakteḥ ākṛtyā saṃbandhaḥ tatra prayogaḥ prokṣaṇam hi dravyasya kartavya tayā śrūyate katamasya yat yajati sādhanam apūrva prayukta tvāt tasya na ākṛteḥ aśakya tvāt tatra vrīhi śabdaḥ ākṛti vacanaḥ prayujyate prokṣaṇa āśraya viśeṣaṇāya sa hi ākṛtim pratyāyayiṣyati ākṛtiḥ pratītā satī prokṣaṇa āśrayam viśekṣyati iti tena ākṛti vacanam na virudhyate iti evam ṣaṭ deyāḥ gāvaḥ dakṣiṇāḥ iti dakṣiṇā dravye saṃkhyāyāḥ prayoktavye gāvaḥ iti ākṛti vacanaḥ viśeṣakaḥ tathā anyam iti vinaṣṭasya pratinidheḥ anya tva saṃbandhaḥ tatra paśu śabdaḥ ākṛti vacanaḥ ākṛtyā viśekṣyati iti tasmāt gauḥ aśvaḥ iti evamādayaḥ śabdāḥ ākṛteḥ abhidhāyakāḥ iti siddham 
[I,85,i_I,85,ii]	uktam samāmnāya aidam arthyam tasmāt sarvam tad artham syāt udbhidāḥ yajeta balabhidā yajeta abhijitā yajeta viśvajitā yajeta iti samāmananti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim udbhida ādayaḥ guṇa vidhayaḥ āhosvit karma nāmadheyāni iti kutas saṃśayaḥ ubhayathā api pratibhātaḥ vākyāt udbhida iti eṣa śabdaḥ yajeta iti anena saṃbadhyate sa kim vaiyadhi karaṇyena saṃbandham upaiti udbhidāḥ dravyeṇa yāgam abhinirvartayet iti uta sāmānādhikaraṇyena udbhidā yāgena yajeta iti dvedhā api etasmin pratibhāti vākye saṃbhavati saṃśayaḥ 
[I,85,iii^1]	kim tāvat prāptam uktam asmābhiḥ samāmnāyasya aidam arthyam kaścid asya bhāgaḥ vidhiḥ yaḥ aviditam artham vedayati yathā somena yajeta iti kaścid artha vādaḥ yaḥ prarocayan vidhim stauti yathā vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhāḥ devatāḥ iti kaścid mantraḥ yaḥ vihitam artham prayoga kāle prakāśayati yathā barhiḥ deva sadanam dāmi iti evamādiḥ tasmāt udbhida ādayaḥ amīṣām prayojanānām anyatamāya prayojanāya bhaveyuḥ tatra tāvat na artha vādaḥ vākya śeṣaḥ hi sa bhavati vidhātavyasya na ca mantraḥ evaṃjātīyakasya prakāśayitavyasya abhāvāt pāriśeṣyāt guṇa vidhiḥ udbhid guṇa tā yāgasya vidhīyate 
[I,85,iii^2_I,86,i]	kutas prasiddheḥ anugrahāt guṇa vidheḥ arthavat tvāt pravṛtti viśeṣa kara tvāt ca na ca eṣām yāga artha tā loke avagamyate na ca vedena paribhāṣyate atas guṇa vidhayaḥ yadi guṇa vidhiḥ na tarhi karma vidhīyate avihite ca karmaṇi tatra guṇa vidhānam anarthakam na iti brūmaḥ prakṛtau jyotiṣṭome guṇa vidhānam arthavat bhaviṣyati yadi nāmadheyam syāt yāvat eva yajeta iti tāvat eva udbhidā yajeta iti na pravṛttau kaścid guṇa viśeṣaḥ syāt guṇa vidhau ca guṇa saṃyogāt abhyadhikam artham vidadhate udbhida ādayaḥ śabdāḥ arthavantaḥ bhaviṣyanti tasmāt guṇa vidhayaḥ iti evam prāptam evam prāpte brūmaḥ 
[I,86,ii_I,86,iii]	api vā nāmadheyam syāt yat utpattau apūrvam avidhāyaka tvāt api vā iti pakṣaḥ viparivartate nāmadheyam syāt iti pratijānīmahe evam avihitam artham vidhāsyati jyotiṣṭomāt yāga antaram śrutiḥ ca evam yāgam abhidhāsyati itarathā śrutiḥ udbhida ādīn vakṣyantī udbhidādimataḥ lakṣayet udbhidvatā yāgena kuryāt iti yāgena kuryāt iti yajeta iti asya arthaḥ karaṇam hi yāgaḥ udbhida ādi api tṛtīyā nirdeśāt karaṇam tatra udbhidā yāgena iti karma nāmadheya tvena sāmānādhikaraṇyasāmañjasyam dravya vacana tve matu artha lakṣaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇyam syāt śruti lakṣaṇa aviśaye ca śrutiḥ jyāyasī tasmāt karma nāmadheyam nanu prasiddham dravya vacana tvam apahnūyeta aprasiddham karma vacana tvam pratijñāyeta ucyate tṛtīyā nirdeśāt karma vacana tā kutas karaṇa vācinaḥ hi prātipādikāt tṛtīyā bhavati karaṇam ca yāgaḥ tena yāga vacanam imam anumāsyāmahe 
[I,86,iv]	na etat yuktam yadi tṛtīyā nirdeśe sati udbhida ādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ yāge buddhiḥ utpadyeta syāt etat evam na hi naḥ buddhiḥ utpadyate tasmāt ayuktam tṛtīyā vacanam anyathā na upapadyate iti ced kāmam na upapādi na jātucit anavagamyamāne api yāga vacanaḥ bhaviṣyati tasmāt guṇa vidhayaḥ lakṣaṇa iti ced varam lakṣaṇā kalpitā na yāga abhidhānam laukikī hi lakṣaṇā haṭhaḥ aprasiddha kalpanā iti api ca yadi nāmadheyam vidhīyate na yāgaḥ atha yāgaḥ na nāmadheyam ubhaya vidhāne vākya bhedaḥ iti ucyate na nāmadheyam vidhāyiṣyate anuvādāḥ hi udbhida ādayaḥ kutas prāptiḥ iti ced tatas abhidhīyate ucchabda sāmarthyāt bhid śabda sāmarthyāt ca udbhid śabdaḥ kriyā vacanaḥ udbhedanam prakāśanam paśūnām anena kriyate iti udbhid yāgaḥ evam ābhimukhyena jayāt abhijit viśva jayāt viśva jit evam sarvatra atas karma nāmadheyam yat tu apravṛtti viśeṣa karaḥ anarthakaḥ iti nāmadheyam api guṇa phala upabandhena arthavat tasmāt karma nāmadheyāni evaṃjātīyakāni iti siddham 
[I,87,i_I,87,ii]	yasmin guṇa upadeśaḥ pradhānataḥ abhisaṃbandhaḥ citrayā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ trivṛt bahis pavamānam pañcadaśāni ājyāni saptadaśa pṛṣṭhāni iti udāharaṇam kim citrā śabdaḥ pavamāna śabdaḥ ājya śabdaḥ pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ ca guṇa vidhayaḥ uta karma nāmadheyāni iti saṃśayaḥ prasiddheḥ arthavat tvāt pravṛtti viśeṣa kara tvāt ca guṇa vidhayaḥ na ca ete karmāṇi prasiddhāḥ na ca amī yaugikāḥ jāti śabdāḥ hi ete citrā iti ca guṇa śabdaḥ citrayā yaja iti ca yāga anuvādaḥ vijñāta tvāt na yāga vidhiḥ guṇe phala kalpanāyām yajateḥ na vivakṣā tathā ājyāni bhavanti pṛṣṭhāni bhavanti iti ca guṇa vidhi kalpanāyām api na lakṣaṇā tasmāt guṇa vidhayaḥ iti evam prāptam 
[I,88,i^1]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ yasmin guṇavidhiḥ nāmadheyam iti saṃdigdhe guṇaḥ aparaḥ upadiśyate pradhānena karmaṇā tasya saṃbandhaḥ karma nāmadheyam iti arthaḥ guṇa vidhau hi sati vākyam bhidyeta puṃpaśau prāpte strī paśuḥ paśavaḥ phalam citraḥ guṇaḥ iti na śakyam ekena vākyena vidhātum citraḥ guṇaḥ vidhīyamānaḥ striyām vidhīyeta na asau agnīṣomīye paśu kāme ca vidhīyeta saḥ api na agnīṣomīye tathā pañcadaśāni ājyāni bhavanti iti ājyeṣu pañcadaśa tā na ca avihitāni stotreṣu ājyāni bhavanti na ca anyat vidhāyakam vākyam tat ca etat ājyāni vidadhyāt vihiteṣu ca pañcadaśa tām gamyate ca pañcadaśa tāyāḥ ājyānām ca saṃbandhaḥ stotra saṃbandhaḥ ca ājyānām avijñātaḥ pañcadaśa tā saṃbandhaḥ ca dvau etau arthau eka vākyasya aśakyau vidhātum 
[I,88,i^2]	atha nu karma nāmadheyam na eṣa virodhaḥ bhavati kevalam saṃkhyā saṃbandhaḥ tadānīm vidhīyate api ca ājyāni stotrāṇi iti anena śabdena lakṣaṇayā eva guṇaḥ vidhīyeta atas karmaṇām nāmadheyāni vākya antaraiḥ ājyaiḥ stuvate pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate iti evamādibhiḥ vihitānām yat tu aprasiddham karmaṇām nāmadheyam iti avayava prasiddhyā āji gamanāt ājyāni katham āji gamanam iti arthavāda vacanāt yat ājimīyuḥ tat ājyānām ājya tvam iti sparśa vacanāt pṛṣṭhāni pavamāna artha mantraka tvāt bahis saṃbandhāt ca bahiṣpavamānam dadhi madhu payaḥ ghṛtam dhānāḥ taṇḍulā udakam iti nānāvidha dravya tvāt citrā tasmāt evaṃjātīyakāni karma nāmadheyāni iti atha kasmāt na pañcadaśa saṃkhyā viśiṣṭāni ājyāni stotra karmasu vidhīyante viśiṣṭānām vācakasya śabdasya abhāvāt 
[I,88,ii]	nanu pada dvayam idam vācakam bhaviṣyati pañcadaśāni ājyāni iti viśiṣṭānām tat eteṣu stotreṣu vidhāsyati na etat pada dvayam api vidhāyakam ekam atra vidhāyakam ekam uddeśakam ubhayasmin vidhāyake paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ na syāt avidhāyake stotra saṃbandhaḥ na vidhīyate na ca atra ekam padam viśeṣaṇam prati uddeśakam stotram prati vidhāyakam bhavitum arhati vacana vyakti bhedāt atas ayam asamādhiḥ 
[I,89,i_I,89,ii]	tat prakhyam ca anya śāstram agnihotram juhoti svarga kāmaḥ iti āghāram āghārayati iti ca samāmananti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim agnihotra śabdaḥ ādhāra śabdaḥ ca guṇa vidhī uta karma nāmadheyaḥ iti guṇa vidhī iti brūmaḥ kutas gamyate hi agnaye hotram asmin iti tathā kṣaraṇa samartham dravyam ghṛta ādi āghāram āghārayati iti prasiddhiḥ evam anugrahīṣyate guṇa vidhiḥ ca darvi home āghāraḥ ca upāṃśu yāje tatra etayoḥ arthavat tā pravṛtti viśeṣa kara tvam ca na ca guṇa vidhi pakṣe lakṣaṇā bhavati yathā udbhidā yajeta iti agnihotre samāsena avagatam guṇa vidhānam āghāre api āghāram nirvartayati iti śrutyā eva guṇaḥ vidhīyate tasmāt guṇa vidhi iti evam prāpte 
[I,89,iii^1]	brūmaḥ tat prakhyam ca anya śāstram yau guṇau etābhyām vidhīyeta iti āśaṅkyate tau anyatas eva avagatau yat agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyam juhoti iti devatā vidhānam catur gṛhītam vai etat abhūt tasya ādhāram ādhāryāḥ iti ādhāre ca dravya vidhiḥ avidita vedanam ca vidhiḥ iti ucyate viditam ca atra anyatas guṇa vidhānam tasmāt na guṇa vidhī karma nāmadheye tu saṃbhavataḥ yasmin agnaye hotram homaḥ bhavati tat agnihotram dīrgha dhārā kṣaraṇa kriyā prasiddhaḥ eva āghāraḥ tasmāt karma nāmadheye prasiddhi ādayaḥ ca ukta uttarāḥ prajāpati nivṛtti artham agni vidhānam bhaviṣyati iti ced na etat evam agnim hi eṣa vidhātum śaknoti na parjāpatim pratiṣeddhum pratiṣidhyamānasya ca prajāpateḥ vidhānam anarthakam syāt prajāpatiḥ devatā iti gamyate 
[I,89,iii^2]	gamyamānam ca na śakyam mithyā iti kalpayitum atas ayam asamādhiḥ ucyate āghāram āghārayati iti dravya parā codanā yaiḥ tu dravyam cikīrṣyate iti dravyam hi anayā kriyayā kṣāryate kṣāritam ca yāgam sādhayati tat kasya pradhānasya karmaṇaḥ nāmadheyam iti ucyate etat eva āghāraṇam pradhāna karma nanu asya dravya deva taṇ na asti asti iti brūmaḥ tasya āghāram āghārya iti ājyam dravyam māntravarṇikī devatā indraḥ ūrdhva uddharaḥ iti āghāram āghārayati iti mantraḥ hi abhidadhat karma tad sādhanam vā karmaṇi samavaiti eṣa ca mantraḥ indram abhidhātum śaknoti sa yadi indraḥ tad sādhanam bhavet evam anena mantreṇa āghāraḥ śakyate kartum tasmāt indraḥ devatā dravya devatā saṃyuktam āghāraṇam tasmāt yajatiḥ tasya yajateḥ nāmadheyam iti 
[I,90,i_I,90,ii]	tad vyapadeśam ca atha eṣa śyenena abhicaran yajeta atha eṣa saṃdaṃśena abhicaran yajeta atha eṣa gavā abhicaran yajeta iti samāmnāyante tatra guṇa vidhiḥ karma nāmadheyam iti saṃdehaḥ prasiddhi ādibhiḥ pūrva pakṣaḥ udbhida ādīnām iva te tu udbhida ādayaḥ kriyā nimittāḥ śaknuvanti yāgam vaditum ime punar jāti nimittāḥ na śaknuvanti tena guṇa vidhayaḥ iti evam prāptam evam prāpte brūmaḥ tad vyapadeśam ca tena śyena ādīnā prasiddhena yasya vyapadeśaḥ tat ca karma nāmadheyam śrutiḥ hi nāmadheya tve lakṣaṇāḥ guṇa vidhau yat tu jāti śabdāḥ ime na yāgam abhivadanti iti sādṛśya vyapadeśāt abhivadiṣyanti evam hi vyapadeśaḥ bhavati yathā vai śyenaḥ nipatya ādatte evam ayam dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam nipatya ādatte yam abhicaranti śyenena iti nipatya ādattaḥ iti anena sādṛśyena śyena śabdaḥ yāge yathā siṃhaḥ devadattaḥ iti tasmāt karma nāmadheyam saṃdaṃśe saṃdaṃśena yathā durādānam ādatte iti gavi yathā gāvaḥ gopāyanti iti tasmāt saṃdaṃśa śabdaḥ api karma nāmadheyam go śabdaḥ api 
[I,91,i_I,91,ii]	nāmadheye guṇa śruteḥ syāt vidhānam iti ced vājapeyena svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta iti śrūyate tatra kim guṇa vidhiḥ karma nāmadheyam iti saṃdehaḥ evam ced saṃdehaḥ dṛśyate guṇa vidhiḥ na saṃdehaḥ śrūyate hi guṇaḥ saḥ avagamyamānaḥ na śakyaḥ na asti iti vaditum tasmāt guṇa vidhiḥ 
[I,91,iii_I,91,iv]	tulya tvāt kriyayoḥ na na etat evam tulye hi ime kriye syātām yā ca vā ājya peya kriyā yā ca darśa purṇamāsa kriyā ubhayatra dārśa paurṇamāsikaḥ vidhyantaḥ syāt tathā ca dīkṣāṇām upasadām ca darśanam na avakalpyeta saptadaśa dīkṣaḥ vājapeyaḥ iti saptadaśa upasatkaḥ vājapeyaḥ iti atha vā tulya tvāt kriyayoḥ na iti yadi na guṇa vidhiḥ tatas tulyā eṣā vājapeya kriyā jyotiṣṭoma kriyayā tatra dīkṣāṇām upasadām ca darśanam upapannam tasmāt karma nāmadheyam iti liṅgam tu etat prāptiḥ punar uttara sūtreṇa 
[I,92,i_I,92,ii^1]	eka śabdye para artha vat yadi guṇa vidhiḥ syāt sva artha vat para arthavat ca abhidhānam vipratiṣidhyeta yajeta iti asya śabdasya yadi svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta iti svārājya kāmasya yāgam vidhātum sva artham ucyate na tarhi vājapeyena guṇena saṃbaddhum para artham anūdyeta yāgena vājapeya guṇakena iti bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam nanu dve eva ete vākye pratyakṣam upalabhāmahe svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta iti etat ekam pratyakṣam pada dvayam yajeta vājapeyena iti etat api pratyakṣam eva na etat evam evam sati catvāri padāni upalabhemahi trīṇi ca etāni upalabhyante ucyate yajeta iti etat ubhābhyām saṃbhantsyate katham sakṛt uccāritam saṃbandham ubhābhyām eṣyati iti rūpa abhedāt īdṛśam eva asya rūpam svārājya kāmena saṃbadhyamānasya a īdṛśam eva vājapeyena atas tantreṇa ubhābhyām saṃbhantsyate iti na etat asti īdṛśena eva rūpeṇa iti yadi ajñātaḥ tatas vidhiḥ yadi jñātaḥ tatas anuvādaḥ na ca jñātaḥ ajñātaḥ ca yugapad saṃbhavati iti 
[I,92,ii^2]	āha yat idam uktam guṇa vidhi pakṣe anuvādaḥ yajeta iti yadi ayam anuvādaḥ kena idānīm guṇaḥ vidhīyate vājapeya śabdena iti mā vocaḥ na hi ākhyātam antareṇa kṛtyam vā nāma śabda arthasya vyāpāraḥ vidhīyate yaḥ ca atra ākhyāta śabdaḥ yajeta iti saḥ anuvādaḥ iti uktam kena idānīm tasya vyāpāraḥ vidhīyate atas svārājya kāmam guṇam ca prati yajeta iti vidhiḥ tasmāt ubhābhyām saṃbadhyate iti yadi ubhayatra vidhiḥ vājapeyaḥ na svārājya kāmasya yāgena saṃbadhyeta dve hi ete tadā vākye na svārājya kāmasya yāgena saha guṇa vidheḥ eka vākyatā prakaraṇāt saṃbandhaḥ svārājya kāmasya yāgena iti ced na vākyena yāga mātre vidhānāt astu yāga mātreṇa saṃbandhaḥ iti ced na svārājya kāmasya yāgena saha eka vākyatāyāḥ gamyamāna tvāt tat evam prakaraṇasya vākyasya ca bādhaḥ yujyate yadi karma nāmadheyam guṇa vidhi pakṣe hi sarve ime vākya bheda ādayaḥ doṣāḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ tasmāt karma nāmadhā iyam vājapeya śabdaḥ iti siddham 
[I,93,i_I,93,ii]	tad guṇāḥ tu vidhīyeran avibhāgāt vidhāna arthe na ced anyena śiṣṭāḥ yat āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ amāvāsyāyām paurṇamāsyām ca acyutaḥ bhavati iti evamādayaḥ śrūyante tatra saṃdehaḥ kim āgneyaḥ agnīṣomīya iti evamādayaḥ guṇa vidhayaḥ karma nāmadheyāni iti kim tāvat prāptam guṇa vidhau sati anekaḥ guṇaḥ vidhīyeta agni puroḍāśa aṣṭākapālāḥ iti tasmāt na guṇa vidhayaḥ iti 
[I,93,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ tat ca karmam guṇāḥ ca asya vidhīyeran avibhaktā hi te karmaṇaḥ vidhāna arthe tat dhita ante śabde tatra hi aṣṭākapālasya āgneya tā vidhīyate saḥ eṣaḥ evam āgneyaḥ bhavati yadi agnaye saṃkalpya dīyate tena ayam anena prakāreṇa yāgaḥ vihitaḥ bhavati saḥ evam vidhīyamānaḥ na śakyaḥ agnim aṣṭākapālam ca avidhāya vidhātum saṃbandhaḥ hi vidhīyamānaḥ na śakyate saṃbandhinau avidhāya vihitaḥ iti vaktum tasmāt guṇa vidhayaḥ aṣṭasu kapāleṣu saṃskriyamāṇaḥ vrīhi mayaḥ yava mayaḥ vā puroḍāśaḥ eva bhavati saḥ anuvādaḥ siddhaḥ ca atra aṣṭākapālaḥ ucyate kapāleṣu śrayayati iti vacanāt na anyena śrapitam gṛhṇanti tena asmin pakṣe na vākya bhedaḥ bhavati na ced anyena śiṣṭāḥ yatra punar anyena vacanena śiṣṭāḥ guṇāḥ bhavanti bhavati tatra nāmadheyam yathā agnihotram juhoti iti 
[I,94,i_I,94,ii]	barhi rājyoḥ asaṃskāre śabda lābhāt atad śabdaḥ barhi rājyayoḥ puroḍāśe ca saṃdehaḥ kim ete saṃskāra śabdāḥ uta jāti śabdāḥ iti saṃskāra śabdāḥ iti brūmaḥ saṃskṛteṣu tṛṇeṣu barhiḥ śabdam upacaranti sarvatra na asaṃskṛteṣu saṃskṛte ca ghṛte ājya śabdam tathā saṃskṛte piṣṭe puroḍāśa śabdam nanu asaṃskṛte api kasmiṃścid deśaḥ upacaryate yathā barhiḥ ādāya gāvaḥ gatāḥ iti bhavanti vaktāraḥ tathā ājyam krayam iti puroḍāśena me mātā prahelakam dadāti iti sādṛśyāt teṣu prayogaḥ yathā upaśaye yūpa śabdaḥ kutas etat yatas eka deśe hi śabda prayogaḥ tasmāt saṃskāra śabdāḥ iti evam prāptam 
[I,94,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ barhirādiṣu asaṃskṛteṣu api śabda lābhāt na saṃskāra śabdāḥ nanu uktam sādṛśyāt eka deśe bhaviṣyanti tat na prasiddhe hi saṃskāra śabda tve sādṛśyāt iti śakyate vaktum tat ca aprasiddham katham barhiḥ ādi śabdaiḥ uddiśya saṃskārāḥ vidhīyante tena satsu śabdeṣu saṃskāraiḥ bhavitavyam sati ca saṃskāre śabda lābhaḥ iti itaretara āśrayam bhavati na ca avihitāḥ saṃskārāḥ bhavanti yān ālocya lokaḥ prayuñjīta tasmāt na lokāḥ saṃskṛteṣu barhiḥ ādīn prayuñjate tatas eka deśe api jāti nimittāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ sarvatra jāti nimittāḥ bhavitum arhanti na ca alaukikānām satām vedāt eva pūrva uttara pada saṃbandham anapekṣya śakyate arthaḥ adhyavasātum pūrva uttara pade anarthake mā bhūtām iti evam sa parikalpyeta aśakyaḥ tu anavagamyamānaḥ parikalpayitum arthavatī ca te pade pūrvottare laukikena asaṃskṛta prayogeṇa bhaviṣyataḥ tasmāt jāti śabdāḥ evaṃjātīyakāḥ prayojanam barhiṣā yūpāvaṭam avastṛṇāti iti saṃskṛtaiḥ eva staritavyam yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ viparītam siddhānte 
[I,95,i_I,95,ii]	prokṣaṇīṣu artha saṃyogāt prokṣaṇīḥ āsādayaḥ iti śrūyate tatra prokṣaṇī śabdam prati saṃdehaḥ kim saṃskāra nimittaḥ uta jāti nimittaḥ uta yaugikaḥ iti tatra saṃskāreṣu satsu darśanāt saṃskāra śabda tāyām avagamyamānāyām asaṃskṛte śabda lābhāt jāti śabdaḥ asaṃskṛtāsu eva apsu prokṣaṇībhiḥ udvejitāḥ smaḥ iti kasmiṃścid deśe bhavanti vaktāraḥ tena jāti śabdaḥ iti prāpte yaugikaḥ iti ucyate kutas artha saṃyogāt prokṣaṇyaḥ iti upasarga dhātu pratyaya samudāyasya jāti nimitta tā prayogāt anumīyate secana saṃyogāt tu upasarga dhātu karaṇa pratyaya sahitaḥ apsu pravatate iti prasiddhiḥ anugṛhītā bhaviṣyati yadā anyat api secanam prokṣaṇa śabdena ucyate tadā tad saṃyogāt eva apsu bhaviṣyati iti na samudāya arthaḥ kalpayitum śakyate tasmāt yaugikaḥ prayojanam ghṛtam prokṣaṇam bhavati iti yadi saṃskāra śabdāḥ prokṣaṇīḥ āsādayā iti praiṣaḥ yadi jāti śabdaḥ ghṛtam āsādaya iti yadi yaugikaḥ prokṣaṇam iti 
[I,96,i_I,96,ii]	tathā nirmanthye nirmanthyena iṣṭakāḥ pacanti iti saṃskṛte darśanāt saṃskāra śabdaḥ nirmanthya iti asaṃskāre api dṛśyate nirmanthyamānayāda enam pakṣyāmaḥ iti nirmanthana yogāt pūrvavat yaugikaḥ iti saṃsthitam prayojanam saṃskāra nimitte saṃskṛtena iṣṭakāḥ paktavyāḥ jāti śabde yathā upapannena yaugike acira nirmathite yathā na avanītena bhuṅkte iti acira nirdagdhena iti gamyate 
[I,96,iii_I,96,iv]	vaiśvadeve vikalpaḥ iti ced cāturmāsyeṣu prathame parvaṇi vaiśvadeve saṃdehaḥ vaiśvadevena yajeta iti kim vaiśvadeva śabdaḥ guṇa vidhiḥ uta karma nāmadheyam iti yadi saṃdehaḥ na saṃdehaḥ vaiśvadeve vikalpaḥ guṇa vidhiḥ vaiśvadeva śabdaḥ gamyate hi guṇa vidhānam viśvedevāḥ vidhīyante āgneya ādiṣu yāgeṣu tatra agni ādīnām viśvaiḥ devaiḥ vikalpaḥ evam prasiddhiḥ arthavatī bhaviṣyati 
[I,96,v_I,96,vi]	na vā prakaraṇāt pratyakṣa vidhānāt ca na hi prakaraṇam dravyasya na etat evam pratyakṣa śruti vihitāḥ agni ādayaḥ teṣām yāgānām viśvedevāḥ vākyena prakaraṇāt tena eva na anyena iti gamyate na ca ayam viṣama śiṣṭhaḥ vikalpaḥ bhavitum arhati na hi prakaraṇam śrutasya dravyasya bādhane samartham tasmāt karma nāmadheyam 
[I,97,i_I,97,ii]	mithas ca anartha saṃbandhaḥ atha ucyate vaiśvadevaḥ iti anena śabdena pratyakṣam agni ādi guṇa viśiṣṭaḥ yāga guṇaḥ lakṣyate vaiśvadevī hi tatra āmikṣā samavaiti yadi vaiśvadeva śabdena yāga guṇaḥ lakṣyate na tarhi viśvedevāḥ vidhīyante katham sakṛt uccaritaḥ vaiśvadeva śabdaḥ yāga guṇam lakṣayiṣyati viśvān ca devān vidhāsyati iti na ayam vaiśvadeva śabdasya viśvaiḥ devaiḥ mithas saṃbandhaḥ ghaṭate tasmāt karma nāmadheyam eva guṇa vidhiḥ iti 
[I,97,iii_I,97,iv]	para artha tvāt guṇānām para arthāḥ ca guṇāḥ te na śaknuvanti pradhānam āvartayitum tena sakṛt yāga kartavyaḥ na guṇa anurodhena āvartitum arhati saṃpratipanna devata tvāt ca na virodhaḥ tatra ekasyām pradhāna āhutau triṃśat āhutayaḥ hūyante iti triṃśat saṃkhyā saṃpattiḥ āhavanīya āhutīnām na avakalpate tasmāt karma nāmadheyam iti siddham 
[I,97,v_I,97,vi]	pūrvavantaḥ avidhāna arthāḥ tad sāmarthyam samāmnāye vaiśvānaram dvādaśa kapālam nirvapet putre jātaḥ iti śrūyate tatra yat aṣṭākapālaḥ bhavati gāyatryā eva enam brahmavarcasena punāti iti evamādayaḥ kapāla vikalpāḥ śrūyante teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim aṣṭa tva ādayaḥ guṇa vidhayaḥ uta arthavādāḥ iti tatra guṇa vidhayaḥ iti evam brūmaḥ katham ye hi pūrvavantaḥ te avidhāna arthāḥ tat etat asya vākyasya samāmnāye sāmarthyam yat avihita pūrvaka abhidhānam kim tat vidhāna sāmarthyam evam avihitam artham vidhāsyati itaratha artha vādāḥ santaḥ anarthakāḥ syuḥ na ca dvadaśa kapālasya śeṣa bhāvam upagantum arhati pratyakṣāḥ hi aṣṭānām kapālānām stutiḥ parokṣāḥ dvādaśānām pratyakṣa abhāve ca parokṣā syāt tasmāt guṇa vidhayaḥ 
[I,98,i_I,98,ii]	guṇasya tu vidhāna arthe tad guṇāḥ prayoge syuḥ anarthakāḥ na hi tam pratyarthavatā asti na etat asti guṇa vidhayaḥ iti guṇasya vidhāna arthāḥ ete santaḥ puroḍāśasya kapāleṣu saṃkhyāḥ vidadhyuḥ na śaknuvanti yāga prayogasya vidhātum dvādaśa kapāla tā hi yāgasya vākyena aṣṭākapāla ādayaḥ prakareṇa tena te yāge na bhaviṣyanti api ca aṣṭa tva ādayaḥ puroḍāśena eka vākya bhūtāḥ prakaraṇam bādhitvā na yāgasya bhaviṣyanti yāga asaṃbandhe ca anarthakāḥ puroḍāśa saṃbandhe phala abhāvāt arthavāda tvena tu vaiśvānara yāgasya stutiḥ upapadyate tasmāt artha vādāḥ iti 
[I,98,iii_I,98,iv]	tad śeṣaḥ na upapadyate iti yat uktam tat parihartavyam iti ābhāṣā antam sūtram 
[I,98,v_I,98,vi]	avibhāgāt vidhāna arthe stuti arthena upapadyeran yadā tu aṣṭākapāla ādi prarocana arthāḥ anarthakāḥ iti avagatam tadā lakṣaṇayā dvādaśa kapālasya stutiḥ vaiśvānara yāga prarocana arthā bhaviṣyati santi hi dvādaśa saṃkhyāyām aṣṭa tva ādayaḥ saṃkhyā viśeṣāḥ avibhaktāḥ atas dvādaśa kapālasya stuti artha tvena avayava stutiḥ upapadyate yathā śobhanam asya cakrasya nemi tumbāram śobhanam asyāḥ senāyāḥ hasti aśva ratha pādātam iti tasmāt upapannā stutiḥ iti 
[I,99,i_I,99,ii]	kāraṇam syāt iti ced iti ced bhavān paśyati artha vādāḥ iti kāraṇam aṣṭa tva ādīnām brahmavarcasa ādi kasmāt na bhavati brahmavarcasa kāmasya aṣṭākapālaḥ evam uttareṣu yathākāmam kim evam bhaviṣyati puroḍāśasya guṇa vidhāne api ānarthakyam na bhaviṣyati na ca lakṣaṇayā dvādaśa kapālasya stutiḥ kalpitā bhaviṣyati tasmāt kāmebhyaḥ vidhayaḥ baviṣyanti 
[I,99,iii_I,99,iv]	ānarthakyāt akāraṇam kartuḥ hi kāraṇāni guṇa arthaḥ hi vidhīyate yadi kāmāya vidhayaḥ bhinnāni vākyāni bhaveyuḥ ekam ca idam vākyam vaiśvānaram dvādaśa kapālam nirvapet putre jātaḥ iti edam apakrāntam yat dvādaśa kapālaḥ bhavati jagatyā eva asmin paśūn dadhāti yasmin jātaḥ etām iṣṭim nirvapati pūtaḥ eva sa tejasv yat nādaḥ indriyāvī paśumān bhavati iti evam antam tasya madhye aṣṭa tva ādayaḥ śrūyamāṇā yadi na saṃbadhyeran tatas vākya antarāṇi bhaveyuḥ kartuḥ hi kāraṇāni pūta tva ādīni bhaveyuḥ saḥ eṣa guṇa arthaḥ atra vidhīyate vaiśvānara yāge pūtaḥ eva iti evamādiḥ tena ca ete aṣṭa tva ādayaḥ sākṣāt dhetu tvena saṃbadhyante yasmāt gāyatryā eva enam brahmavarcasena punāti tena pūtaḥ eva saḥ yasmāt trivṛtā eva asmin tejaḥ dadhāti tena tejasvī yasmāt virājā eva asmin annādyam dadhāti tena anna ādaḥ yasmāt triṣṭubhā eva asmin indriyam dadhāti tena indriyāvī yasmāt jagati aiva asmin paśūna dadhāti tena paśumān iti tatas kāmāya vidhayaḥ asaṃbhavantaḥ yadi artha vādāḥ api na bhaveyuḥ ānarthakyam eva eṣām syāt tasmāt akāraṇam brahma varcaḥ tvāt yaḥ aṣṭa tva ādīnām tasmāt aṣṭa tva ādayaḥ artha vādāḥ iti 
[I,100,i_I,100,ii]	tad siddhiḥ yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ yajamānaḥ eka kapālaḥ ityādi samāmnāyate tatra saṃdehaḥ kim yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ iti eṣa guṇa vidhiḥ kim artha vādaḥ iti tathā yajamānaḥ eka kapālaḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam guṇa vidhiḥ iti kim evam bhaviṣyati evam apūrvam artham vidhāsyati itaratha artha vādaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt arthavat tvam ca nyāyyam tasmāt vidhiḥ 
[I,100,iii]	na etat evam yadi vidhiḥ syāt tatas prastara kārye yajamānaḥ niyamyeta yajamāna kārye vā prastaraḥ prastare juhūm āsādayati sarvāḥ vā sruvaḥ iti yajamāne juhūḥ āsādyeta sarvā vā sruvaḥ iti tathā asati na yājamānam śakyate kartum dīkṣaṇataḥ brahma yajamānau āsāte karmaṇa kriyamāṇasya iti na ca prastaraḥ yājamānam śaknoti kartum tathā yadi yajamānaḥ eka kapāla kārye viniyujyeta sarva hutaḥ kriyeta tatra sarva tantra parilopaḥ syāt na ca eka kapālaḥ yājamānam śaknoti kartum tasmāt na vidhiḥ vidhi antaram ca asti prastaram uttaram barhiṣaḥ sādayati eka kapālam sarva hatam karoti iti tasmāt api na vidhiḥ kim hi artha vādaḥ yajamānaḥ jñāyate eva prastaraḥ eka kapālaḥ iti ca 
[I,101,i]	katham punar anayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam jñāyate na hi prastaraḥ eka kapālaḥ vā yajamānaḥ na ca yajamānaḥ ekasmin kapāle saṃskṛtaḥ puroḍāśaḥ prathamaḥ vā kaśam ṣṭiḥ lūnaḥ katham para śabdaḥ paratra vartate kim artham vā jñāyamānasva saṃkīrtanam iti ucyate jñāyamānaḥ saṃkīrtyate stotum prastaraḥ uttaraḥ barhiṣaḥ sādayitavyaḥ yajamāna tvāt tathā yajamānaḥ eka kapālaḥ sarva hutaḥ kartavyaḥ svarge āhavanīyaḥ tatra pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ bhavati iti 
[I,101,ii^1]	katham paratra vartate para śabdaḥ iti guṇavādaḥ tu guṇāt eṣa vādaḥ katham aguṇa vacanaḥ guṇam brūyāt sva artha abhidhānanā iti brūmaḥ sarve eva ete gauṇāḥ śabdāḥ na sva artham hitvā guṇeṣu vartante prasiddha hāniḥ hi tathā syāt aprasiddha kalpanā ca na ca sarve guṇa samudāya vacanāḥ guṇa hīne api darśanāt aprasahya kārī api hi kadācid rogeṇa upahataḥ siṃhyāḥ putraḥ siṃhaḥ eva samudāya vācī ca na avayave pravartitum arhati sarva siṃha vyāktiṣu yat sāmānyam tat vacanaḥ śabdaḥ iti sthitaḥ nyāyaḥ pratyuddhriyeta na ca asati siṃhaḥ parikalpanayā pravarteta kalpanāyāḥ aśakya tvāt katham nu sva artha abhidhānena pratyaya vyavasthā iti ced artha saṃbandhāt siṃhaḥ iti nirjñāyate prasahya kāritā tatra prāyeṇa iti prasahya kārī iti gamyate artham pratyaya sāmarthyāt 
[I,101,ii^2]	yaḥ hi manyate prasahya kāriṇam pratyāyayeyam iti sa yadi siṃha śabdam uccārayati sidhyati asya abhipretam siṃha arthaḥ pratītaḥ prasahya kārī iti saṃbandhāt itaram artham pratyāyayati evam sva artha abhidhānena tad guṇa saṃbandhaḥ pratīyate iha tu yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ yajamānaḥ eka kapālaḥ iti kīdṛśaḥ guṇa saṃbandhaḥ pratīyate tad siddhi karaḥ iti sarvaḥ hi ātmanaḥ kārya siddhim karoti anyaḥ api yaḥ tasya kārya siddhim karoti sa tasmin uccarite hṛdayam āgacchati yathā rājā patti gaṇakaḥ iti patti gaṇakaḥ rājñaḥ kāryam sādhayati sa rāja śabdaḥ uccarite pratīyate evam iha api yajamāna kāryam prastara eka kapālau sādhayataḥ tau yajamāne pratīte pratīyete tasmāt tau yajamāna śabdena pratyāyete katham stutau syātām barhiṣaḥ upari sādane sarva home ca iti tasmāt evaṃjātīyakāḥ artha vādāḥ na vidhayaḥ iti 
[I,102,i_I,102,ii^1]	jātiḥ āgneyaḥ vai brāhmaṇaḥ aindraḥ rājanyaḥ vaiśyaḥ vaiśvadevaḥ iti evamādayaḥ śrūyante tatra guṇa vidhayaḥ ārthavādāḥ iti saṃdehaḥ guṇa vidhayaḥ iti brūmaḥ evam apūrvam artham vidhāsyanti itaratha artha vādāḥ santaḥ anarthakāḥ syuḥ na vidhiḥ vidhi antarasya bhāvāt tasmāt saṃvādaḥ tasya saṃkīrtanam vidhistuti artham anāgneya ādiṣu āgneya ādi śabdāḥ kena prakāreṇa guṇa vādena kaḥ guṇa vādaḥ agni saṃbandhaḥ katham eka jātīyaka tvāt kim eka jātīyaka tvam prajāpatiḥ akāmayata prajāḥ sṛjeyam iti 
[I,102,ii^2]	sa mukhataḥ trivṛtam nirabhimīta tam agniḥ devatā an vasṛjyata gāyatrī chandaḥ rathantaram sāma brāhmaṇaḥ manuṣyāṇām ajaḥ paśūnām tasmāt te mukhyāḥ mukhatas hi asṛjyanta urasaḥ bāhubhyām pañcadaśam nirmimīta tam indraḥ devatān asṛjyata triṣṭubh chandaḥ bṛhat sāma rājanyaḥ manuṣyāṇām aviḥ paśūnām tasmāt te vīryavantaḥ vīryāt dhi asṛjyanta ūrubhyām madhyatas saptadaśam niramimīta tam viśvedevāḥ devatāḥ anvasṛjyanta jagatī chandaḥ vairūpam sāma vaiśyaḥ manuṣyāṇām gāvaḥ paśūnām evam ukte sati ekasmin evaṃjātīyake vijñāte anyaḥ api tad jātīyakaḥ hṛdayam āgacchati tasmāt arthavāda śabdāḥ 
[I,103,i_I,103,ii]	sārūpyam yajamānaḥ yūpaḥ āditye yūpaḥ ityādi śrūyate tatra guṇa vidhiḥ artha vādaḥ iti saṃdehaḥ arthavat tvāt guṇa vidhi aśakya tvāt yūpa kārya sādhane yajamānasya yajamāna kārya sādhane vā yūpasya vidhi antara bhāvāt ca na vidhiḥ vidhistuti artham saṃvādaḥ guṇavādāt sāmānādhikaraṇyam kaḥ guṇaḥ sārūpyam kim sārūpyam ūrdhva tā tejasvi tā ca tasmāt evaṃjātīyakāḥ artha vādāḥ 
[I,103,iii_I,103,iv]	praśaṃsā apaśavaḥ vai anye gaḥ aśvebhyaḥ paśavaḥ gaḥ aśvāḥ ayajñaḥ vai eṣa yaḥ asāmā asatram vai etat yat achandomam iti śrūyate tatra vidhi artha vāda saṃdehe arthavat tvāt vidhayaḥ iti prāpte abhidhīyate yadi vidhayaḥ bhaveyuḥ gaḥ aśvāḥ eva paśavaḥ syuḥ sāmavān eva yajñaḥ chandoma vat eva satram anyeṣām paśūnām yajñānām satrāṇām ca utpattiḥ anarthikā syāt vidhi antaram ca na avakalpeta atas stuti artham saṃvādaḥ gaḥ aśvān praśaṃsitum anyeṣām paśūnām nindā sāmavataḥ praśaṃsitum asāmnām nindā chandomavanti praśaṃsitum acchandomakāni nidyante yathā yat aghṛtam abhojanam tat yat malinam avāsaḥ tat iti 
[I,104,i_I,104,ii]	bhūmā sṛṣṭīḥ upadadhāti iti śrūyate tatra guṇa vidhiḥ artha vādaḥ iti saṃdehe apūrva tvāt vidhiḥ iti prāpte ucyate yadi vidhiḥ sṛṣṭi mantrakāḥ upadadhāti iṣṭakāḥ iti arthaḥ tatra na iṣṭakānām viśeṣaḥ kaścid āśrīyate evaṃrūpāḥ sṛṣṭi mantrakāḥ na evaṃrūpāḥ iti tatra sarvāsām sṛṣṭi liṅgāḥ mantrāḥ prāpnuyuḥ anyeṣām asaṃyuktānām mantrāṇām ānarthakyam syāt tasmāt anuvādaḥ mantra samāmnānāt prāptānām upadhāne mantrāṇām sṛṣṭīnām saṃkīrtanam sarjana artha vāda artham api ca vidhi tve lakṣaṇā ekayā stuvate iti atra yā asṛṣṭayaḥ tāḥ lakṣayet nanu anuvāde api lakṣaṇā na anuvāda pakṣe lakṣaṇāyām doṣaḥ katham tu asṛṣṭiṣu sṛṣṭiṣu ca sṛṣṭi śabdaḥ iti bhūmnā bahavaḥ tatra sṛṣṭi liṅgāḥ mantrāḥ alpaśas viliṅgāḥ iti 
[I,105,i_I,105,ii]	liṅga samavāyaḥ prāṇabhṛtaḥ upadadhāti ājyānīḥ upadadhāti iti vidhi tve prāṇa bhṛt mantra kāsu upadhīyamānāsu viliṅgānām mantrāṇām ānarthakyam tasmāt anuvādaḥ liṅga samavāyāt para śabdaḥ paratra vartate yathā chatriṇaḥ gacchanti iti ekena chatriṇā sarve lakṣyante na ca ayam prāṇa bhṛt śaśabdaḥ sṛṣṭi śabdaḥ ca jahatsva artham mantra gaṇam lakṣayet yat gaṇe ca sṛṣṭi prāṇa bhṛt śabdau samavetau tau api parigṛhyete yathā chatri śabdena sva artha lakṣaṇa arthena saḥ api chatrī gṛhyate iti 
[I,105,iii_I,105,iv^1]	saṃdigdheṣu vākya śeṣāt aktāḥ śarkarāḥ upadadhāti tejaḥ vai ghṛtam iti śrūyate tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ghṛta taila vasānām anyatamena dravyeṇa añjanīyāḥ śarkarā uta ghṛtena eva iti katham saṃdehaḥ añjana sāmānyena vākyasya upakramaḥ ghṛtena viśeṣeṇa nigamanam yathā upakramam nigamayitavyam ekasmin vākye tatra yat vā sāmānyam ādau viśeṣa upalakṣaṇa artham vivakṣyate yat vā nigamane viśeṣaḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇa arthaḥ tad ārambha nigamanayoḥ kim samañjasam iti saṃśayaḥ evam saṃdigdheṣu upakrame sāmānya vacane virodha abhāvāt na viśeṣaḥ parikalpyaḥ nigamane tu upajātaḥ sāmānya pratyayaḥ iti virodhāt lakṣaṇa artham ghṛta vacanam yathā sṛṣṭiṣu asṛṣṭiṣu ca sṛṣṭi śabdaḥ evam ghṛtam aghṛtam ca ghṛtam iti ucyate 
[I,105,iv^2]	saṃdigdheṣu evam prāpte brūmaḥ sāmānya vacanena viśeṣa apekṣiṇa upakramaḥ vākyasya viśeṣe nigamana vaśena kutas na hi sāmānyam vihitam yena virodhaḥ nigamanasya katham avihitam saṃdigdheṣu vidhāna śabda abhāvāt na hi vidhāna śabdaḥ asti aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhāti iti vartamāna kāla nirdeśāt na api sāmānyasya sākṣāt stutiḥ pratyakṣam tu ghṛtasya stavanam śrutyā ghṛtasya stutiḥ lakṣaṇayā sāmānyasya śrutiḥ ca lakṣaṇāyāḥ jyāyasī tasmāt ghṛta vidhānam evam vāsaḥ paridhatte etat vai sarva devatyam vāsaḥ yat kṣaumam iti tathā imām spṛṣṭvā udnāyet imām hi audumbarīm viśvābhūtāni upajīvanī iti 
[I,106,i_I,106,ii]	arthāt vā kalpana eka deśa tvāt sruveṇa avadyati svadhitinā avat yati hastena avadyati iti śrūyate tatra saṃdehaḥ kim sruveṇa avadātavyam sarvasya dravasya saṃhatasya māṃsasya ca tathā svadhitinā hastena ca uta sarveṣām arthataḥ vyavasthā dravāṇām sruveṇa māṃsānām svadhitinā sahatānām hastena iti aviśeṣa abhidhānāt avyavasthā iti 
[I,106,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ arthāt vā kalpanā sāmarthyāt kalpanā iti sruveṇa avadyet yathā śaknuyāt tathā yasya śaknuyā tasya ca iti ākhyāta śabdānām artham bruvatām śaktiḥ sahakāriṇī eva ced yathāśakti vyavasthā bhavitum arhati tathā añjalinā saktūn pradāvye juhoti iti dvi hasta saṃyogaḥ añjaliḥ sa vyākośaḥ arthāt kartavyaḥ tathā hi śakyate homaḥ nirvartayitum tat yathā kaṭe bhuṅkte kāṃsya pātryām bhuṅkte iti arthāt kalpyate kaṭe samāsīnaḥ kāṃsya pātrī ām odanam nidhāya bhuṅkte iti 
[I,108,i_I,108,ii]	bhāva arthāḥ karma śabdāḥ tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta eṣa hi arthaḥ vidhīyate prathame adhyāye pramāṇa lakṣaṇam vṛttam tatra vidhi artha vāda mantra smṛtayaḥ tattvataḥ nirṇītāḥ guṇavidhiḥ nāmadheyam ca parīkṣitam sandigdhānām arthānām vākya śeṣāt artha adhyavasānam uktam tat na prasmartavyam anantaram pradhāna apradhānāni parīkṣiṣyante bhinnāni abhinnāni ca iti eṣaḥ eva arthaḥ varṇanīyaḥ na anyaḥ eṣaḥ eva ca adhyāya saṃbandhaḥ tat iha ṣaḍvidhaḥ karma bhedaḥ vakṣyate śabda antaram abhyāsaḥ saṃkhyā guṇaḥ prakriyā nāmadheyam iti vakṣyamānam anusaṃkīrtyate pradarśitam ucyamānam sukham grāhayiṣyate iti śrotuḥ ca buddhiḥ samādhīyate tat etat nānā karma lakṣaṇam iti adhyāyam ācakṣate etat tātparyeṇa atas anyat upodghāta prasakta anuprasaktam ca iti 
[I,108,iii_I,108,iv]	tatra prathamam tāvat idam cintyate prathame adhyāyaḥ idam uktam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti codanā ca kriyāyāḥ abhidhāyakam vākyam vākye ca padānām arthāḥ tatra kim padena padena dharmaḥ ucyate uta sarvaiḥ ekaḥ eva iti kim tāvat prāptam prati padam dharmaḥ iti evam prāptaḥ ucyate yadā ekasmāt apūrvam tadā anyat tad artham bhaviṣyati evam alpīyasi adṛṣṭa anumāna prasaṅga kalpanā bhaviṣyati tasmāt ekam apūrvam 
[I,109,i]	yadā ekam tadā sandehaḥ kim bhāva śabdebhyaḥ uta dravya guṇa śabdebhyaḥ iti kaḥ punar bhāvaḥ ke te punar bhāva śabdāḥ iti yajati dadāti juhoti iti evamādayaḥ nanu yāga dāna homa śabdāḥ ete na bhāva śabdāḥ na etat evam yāga ādi śabdāḥ ca ete bhāva śabdāḥ ca yajyādi arthaḥ ca atas avagamyate bhāvayet iti ca tathā yateta yathā kiṃcid bhavati iti tena ete bhāva śabdāḥ dravya guṇa śabdebhyaḥ dravya guṇa pratyayaḥ na bhāvanāyāḥ atas te na bhāva śabdāḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam aviśeṣeṇa iti 
[I,109,ii^1]	tatas ucyate bhāva arthāḥ karma śabdāḥ tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta yajeta iti evamādibhyaḥ kutas bhāva artha tvāt eva yaḥ āhuḥ kim api bhāvayet iti te svarga kāma pada saṃbandhāt svargam bhāvayet iti brūyuḥ tasmāt tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta phalasya kriyā karaṇam niṣpattiḥ iti te ca yāga dāna homa saṃbaddhāḥ svargasya utpattim vadanti kutas eṣa hi arthaḥ vidhīyate yathā yāga ādinā svarga kāmaḥ kena bhāvayet svargam yāga ādinā iti yasya ca śabdasya arthena phalam sādhyate tena apūrvam kṛtvā na anyathā iti tatas apūrvam gamyate atas yaḥ tasya vācakaḥ śabdaḥ tatas apūrvam pratīyate iti tena bhāva śabdāḥ apūrvasya ca udakāḥ iti brūmaḥ na tu kaścid śabdaḥ sākṣāt apūrvasya vācakaḥ asti bhāva arthaiḥ kim api bhāvayitavyam svarga kāmasya ca kena api bhāvyatā iti tayoḥ naṣṭa aśva dagdha ratha vat saṃprayogaḥ yajeta iti evamādayaḥ sa ākāṅkṣāḥ yajeta kim kena katham iti 
[I,109,ii^2]	svarga kāmaḥ iti anena prayojanena nirākāṅkṣāḥ na evam dravya guṇa śabdāḥ tasmāt bhāva arthāḥ karma śabdāḥ apūrvam codayanti iti atha kasmāt ubhayam sūtritam bhāva arthāḥ karma śabdāḥ iti ucyate bhavanti kecid karma śabdāḥ na bhāva arthāḥ yathā śyena eka trika ādayaḥ kecid bhāva arthāḥ na karma śabdāḥ yathā bhavanam bhāvaḥ bhūtiḥ iti kim punar iha udāharaṇam śyenena abhicaran yajeta citrayā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ iti kim śyenena abhicaran uta yajeta abhicaran iti tathā citrayā paśu kāmaḥ uta paśu kāmaḥ yajeta iti sthite etasmin adhikaraṇe guṇa vidhiḥ nāmadheyam iti vicāraḥ bhaviṣyati tathā darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti darśaḥ kālaḥ pūrṇamāsaḥ iti ca kim tābhyām svarga kāmaḥ uta svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti ca śyenena iti ca citraya iti ca na ete bhāva vacanāḥ na ca eṣām arthinā kaścid saṃbandhaḥ asti vivibhaktika tvāt tasmāt na dravya guṇa śabdāḥ apūrvasya vidhāyakāḥ iti 
[I,110,i_I,110,ii]	sarveṣām bhāvaḥ arthaḥ iti ced evam ced bhāvan paśyati abhāva śabda tvāt na dravya guṇa śabdāḥ apūrvasya vidhāyakāḥ iti sarveṣām bhāvaḥ arthaḥ svarga kāmaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti etayoḥ saṃbandham yajeta iti vakṣyati śyenena abhicaran iti etayoḥ ca tathā citrayā paśu kāmaḥ iti tasmāt ete api sa ākāṅkṣa tvāt bhāva vacanāḥ sarveṣu bhāva vacaneṣu na asti vinigamanāyām hetuḥ karma śabdāḥ eva apūrvasya vidhāyakāḥ na dravya guṇa śabdāḥ iti 
[I,110,iii_I,110,iv]	yeṣām utpattau sve prayoge rūpa upalabdhiḥ tāni nāmāni tasmāt tebhyaḥ parākāṅkṣā bhūta tvāt sve prayoge yeṣām śabdānām uccāraṇa utpattau sve arthe prayujyamānānām rūpam upalabhyate yat sakṛt utpannam kāla antaran tiṣṭhati na kriyā iva utpanna mātram vinaśyati iti arthaḥ tāni nāmāni te dravya guṇa śabdāḥ īdṛśaḥ dravya guṇa śabdānām arthaḥ te dravya guṇa śabdāḥ iti vaktavye tāni nāmāni iti sūtritam atas nāmāni iti eṣām paryāya śabdaḥ katham gamyate yatas eṣām vibhaktayaḥ nāmikyaḥ ucyante katamāḥ tāḥ vṛkṣaḥ vṛkṣau vṛkṣāḥ śuklaḥ śuklau śuklāḥ iti evamādayaḥ tasmāt samyak sūtritam yatas eṣām na kṣaṇikaḥ arthaḥ tatas tebhyaḥ parākāṅkṣā pradhāna ākāṅkṣā na vidyata iti na eṣām utpattiḥ kartavyā bhūta tvāt sve prayoge sva prayoga kāle vidyamāna tvāt iti arthaḥ 
[I,111,i_I,111,iii]	yeṣām tu utpattau arthe sve prayogaḥ na vidyate tāni ākhyātāni tasmāt tebhyaḥ pratīyeta āśrita tvāt prayogasya yeṣām tu śabdānām uccāraṇa utpattau sve arthe prayogaḥ na vidyate prayoga kāle yeṣām arthaḥ na upalabhyate iti arthaḥ tanī ākhyātāni iti bhāva śabdān paryāya śabdena upadiśati katham paryāya śabda tā bhāva śabdānām yatas eṣām vibhaktayaḥ ākhyātikyaḥ iti ucyante katamāḥ tāḥ pacati pacataḥ pacanti iti evamādyaḥ tasmāt tebhyaḥ apūrvam pratīyeta bhavya arthāḥ te bhūta arthaiḥ samuccaritāḥ bhūtasya bhavya artha tāyām dṛṣṭa artha tā bhavya arthasya prayojanayataḥ utpattiḥ arthavatī sā ca bhūtena kriyate iti dṛṣṭaḥ arthaḥ bhavyasya punar bhūta artha tāyām na kiñcid dṛśyate kalpyate ca adṛṣṭam tasmāt na yāgaḥ dravya arthaḥ kim ca āśrita tvāt prayogasya eteṣām prayogaḥ puruṣeṇa āśritaḥ bhavati puruṣa saṃbaddhā bhāvanā ucyate puruṣam hi vadati bhāvayet iti tena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti puruṣaḥ api pratīyate yāgaḥ api saṃbandhaḥ api svarga kāmaḥ dravyeṇa iti dravye pratīyate puruṣaḥ ca na tu saṃbandhaḥ 
[I,112,i_I,112,ii]	nanu etat uktam bhavati arthinaḥ ca dravyasya ca saṃbandham yajeta iti vakṣyati dravyeṇa bhāvayet iti atas dravyeṇa arthasya bhāvanā gamyeta ākāṅkṣā ca iti satyam gamyate dravyeṇa bhāvayet iti tu vākyena yāgena bhāvayet iti tu śrutyā yadā tu yāgena bhāvāyet iti yāga saṃbandhaḥ vidhīyate na tadā dravyeṇa bhāvayet iti dravya saṃbandhaḥ na ca dravya saṃbandhe vidhīyamāne yajeta iti anena saṃbandhaḥ anūdyamāne tu saṃbhavati na ca yaugapādyena vidhi anuvādau saṃbhavataḥ tasmāt śruti vākyayoḥ virodhaḥ virodhe ca śruti balīyasī tena arthinā na dravya saṃbandhaḥ tatra dravyam asati svarga kāma saṃbandhe svarga artham bhaviṣyati iti anupapannam eṣa vinigamanāyām hetuḥ yena bhāva śabdāḥ eva apūrvasya ca udakāḥ na dravya guṇa śabdāḥ iti yadā yāgena kuryāt iti tadā yāga vacanam eva bhavati darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti lakṣaṇayā darśe ca pūrṇamāse ca yāgaḥ vihitaḥ iti katham punar idam avagamyate asti tat apūrvam iti ucyate 
[I,112,iii_I,112,iv^1]	codanā punar ārambhaḥ codanā iti apūrvam brūmaḥ apūrvam punar asti yatas ārambhaḥ śiṣyate svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti itarathāḥ hi vidhānam anarthakam syāt bhaṅgi tvāt yāgasya yadi anyat anutpādya yāgaḥ vinaśyet phalam asati nimitte na syāt tasmāt utpādayati iti yadi punar phala vacana sāmarthyāt tat eva na viniśyati iti kalpyate na evam śakyam na hi karmaṇaḥ anyat rūpam upalabhāmahe yat āśrayam deśa antaram prāpayati tat karma iti ucyate na tat ātmani samavetam sarva gata tvāt ātmanaḥ sarvatra kārya upalambhaḥ sarvatra bhāve liṅgam na tu tat eva deśa antarāt āgamanasya na hi asati āgamane kiṃcid viruddham dṛśyate 
[I,112,iv^2_I,113,i]	yatra samavetam āsīt tat vinaṣṭam dravyam tasya vināśāt tat api vinaṣṭam iti avagamyate āśrayaḥ api avinaṣṭaḥ iti ced na bhasma upalambhanāt sati api basmani asti iti ced na vidyamāna upalambhane api adarśanāt phala kriyā liṅgam iti ced evam sati adarśane samādhiḥ vaktavyaḥ saukṣma ādīnām anyatamat bhaviṣyati iti yadi cintyate kalpitam evam sati kiṃcid bhavati iti tatra apūrvam vā kalpyeta tat vā iti aviśeṣa kalpanāyām asti hetuḥ na viśiṣṭa kalpanāyām anāśritam karma bhaviṣyati iti ced tat api tādṛśam eva svabhāva antara kalpanena deśa antaram na prāpayiṣyati iti tādṛśam eva tasmāt bhaṅgī yajiḥ tasya bhaṅgi tvāt apūrvam asti iti kim cintāyāḥ prayojanam yadi dravya guṇa śabdāḥ api apūrvam codayanti dravya guṇa apacāre na pratinidhiḥ upādātavyaḥ yathā tarhi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ yathā tarhi siddhāntaḥ dravyam guṇam vā pratinidhāya prayogaḥ anuṣṭhātavyaḥ iti
[I,113,ii_I,113,iii]	tāni dvaidham guṇa pradhāna bhūtāni avagatam etat bhāva śabdāḥ karmaṇaḥ vācakāḥ iti bahu prakārāḥ ca bhāva śabdāḥ yajati juhoti dadāti iti evaṃprakārāḥ dogdhi pinaṣṭi vilāpayati iti evamādayaḥ ca teṣu sandehaḥ kim sarve pradhāna karmaṇaḥ vidhāyakāḥ uta kecid saṃskāra karmaṇaḥ iti bhāva artha tva aviśeṣāt sarve pradhāna karmaṇaḥ vācakāḥ iti prāptam tatas brūmaḥ tāni dvaidham bhavitum arhanti iti dvi prakārāṇi kānicid pradhāna karmaṇaḥ vācakāni kānicid saṃskāra karmaṇaḥ evam api sarvāṇi arthavanti arthavat tve sati sarvebhyaḥ na śakyam apūrvam kalpayitum atas na sarvāṇi pradhāna karmaṇaḥ vācakāni 
[I,114,i_I,114,ii]	yaiḥ dravyam na cikīrṣyate tāni pradhāna bhūtāni dravyasya guṇa bhūta tvāt evam sati alpīyasi adṛṣṭa kalpanā nyāyyā na tu vinigamanāyām hetuḥ avagacchāmaḥ kutas apūrvam kutas na iti tat ucyate yaiḥ bhāva karmabhiḥ na dravyam saṃskartum iṣyate utpādayitum vā tāni pradhāna bhūtāni pradhāna karmaṇaḥ vācakāni dravyasya guṇa bhūta tvāt dravyam hi guṇa bhūtam karma nirvṛtteḥ īpsitatama tvāt 
[I,114,iii_I,114,iv]	yaiḥ tu dravyam cikīrṣyate guṇaḥ tatra pratīyeta tasya dravya pradhāna tvāt yaiḥ tu dravyam cikīrṣyate guṇaḥ tatra pratīyeta karma kutas tasya dravya pradhāna tvāt pratyakṣam yajeta iti evamādibhiḥ dravyam na cikīrṣyate tasmāt tāni pradhāna karmaṇaḥ vācakāni dravyasya guṇa bhūta tvāt pinaṣṭi iti evamādibhiḥ dravyam saṃskriyate tasmāt tāni guṇa karma vacanāni eṣaḥ eva vinigamanāyām hetuḥ prayojanam tu pūrvasmin pakṣe praiyaṅgave api carau vrīhayaḥ utpādyāḥ avadhāta artha tvena siddhānte na utpādyāḥ 
[I,115,i_I,115,iii]	dharma mātre tu karma syāt anirvṛtteḥ prayāja vat srucaḥ saṃmārṣṭi agnim saṃmārṣṭi paridhim saṃmārṣṭi puroṅāśam paryagni karoti iti śrūyate tatra sandehaḥ kim paryagnikaraṇam samārjanam ca pradhāna karma uta guṇa karma iti kim tāvat prāptam tatas ucyate karma mātram evaṃjātīyakam aparyāptam yat prayojanasya dṛṣṭasya tat dharma mātram iti brūmaḥ tatra pradhāna karma tvam syāt kasmāt anirvṛtteḥ upakārasya na hi evaṃjātīyakam dravyasya upakārakam dravyam tu evaṃjātīyakam abhinirvartayat guṇa bhūtam tasya guṇa bhūta tvāt idam pradhāna bhūtam 
[I,115,iv_I,115,v]	tulya śruti tvāt vā itaraiḥ sa dharmaḥ syāt vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati itaraiḥ guṇa karmabhiḥ sadharmaḥ syāt evaṃjātīyakaḥ yathā vrīhīn avahanti tathā kutas tulya śruti tvāt tulyā hi dvitīyā śrutiḥ eṣām dravyeṣu yathā vrīhīn avahanti iti evam agnim saṃmārṣṭi puroṅāśam paryagni karoti iti kim guṇa karmaṇi dravye dvitīyā dṛṣṭā iti yatas dvitīyā darśanāt iha api sāmānyatas dṛṣṭena guṇa karma tā na iti brūmaḥ dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ kartuḥ īpsitatame smaryate sā ca iha dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ tatas eva tat īpsitatamam iti gamyate tat ced īpsitatamam karma guṇa bhūtam yadi api pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ guṇa bhāvaḥ na gamyate pramāṇa antareṇa śabdena gamyate tasmāt guṇa bhūtam evaṃjātīyakam iti 
[I,116,i_I,116,ii]	dravya upadeśaḥ iti ced iti ced paśyasi dvitīyā darśanāt pradhāna bhūtam atra dravyam iti na etat evam guṇa bhūte api dvitīyā bhavati tathā hi dṛśyate saktūn juhoti mārutam juhoti eka kapālam juhoti iti 
[I,116,iii_I,116,iv^1]	na tad artha tvāt loka vat tasya ca śeṣa bhūta tvāt na guṇa bhūte api dvitīyā evam hi abhiyuktāḥ upadiśanti karmaṇi dvitīyā kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti na ca loke guṇa bhūte kvacid dvitīyām paśyāmaḥ yat api ca taṇḍulān odanam paca iti odana artham taṇḍulān saṃskuru iti īpsitāḥ eva taṇḍulāḥ balvajān śikhaṇḍakān kuru iti balvajāḥ eva tena ākāreṇa saṃbaddhāḥ īpsitāḥ iti tatra abhiprāyaḥ laukikaḥ ca prayogaḥ śabda artha paricchede hetuḥ na vaidikaḥ yat tu laukike juhoti iti prayoge dvitīyā śakyate tatra vaktum īpsitatamaḥ eva sa prayogaḥ iti taṇḍulān adya juhudhi taṇḍulān adya homena saṃbandhayā iti loke bhavati hi bahu prakārā vivakṣā anyāyaḥ ca aneka artha tvam tena pradhāna bhāvena siddhā satī dvitīyā guṇa bhāvena kalpyeta vede tu katham dvitīya anirdiṣṭe guṇa bhāvaḥ iti dvitīya anirdeśāt pradhānyam eva avagacchāmaḥ evam avagate pradhānye balīyasā hetunā na asti prādhānyam iti avagamyate 
[I,116,iv^2]	kutas na homasya kecid prakāreṇa saktvartha tau akalpyate kutas saktūnām niṣprayojana tvāt na saktūnām anyat prayojanam dṛśyate śrūyate vā yadi vā homaḥ tad arthaḥ homaḥ api niṣprayojanaḥ atha ārāt upakārakaḥ homaḥ tatas prayojanavān jyotiṣṭoma prakaraṇe pāṭhāt gamyate prayojana vat tā na aprayojanaḥ iti śakyate vaktum prayoga vacanena hi saḥ ākāṅkṣyate nanu saktūnām api prakaraṇa pāṭhāt prayojanavat tvam bhaviṣyati kaḥ vā brūte na iti prayojana vat tā eva prayojana vat tvan tu homam abhinirvartayatām na anyena prakāreṇa nanu te api prayoga vacanena ākāṅkṣyante tat ucyate na dravyam tena ākāṅkṣyate itikartavya tām hi saḥ ākāṅkṣati homaḥ ca iti kartavyatā na dravyam nanu home kṛte saktubhyaḥ adṛṣṭam niṣpatsyate na asti atra pramāṇam nanu dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ pramāṇam na hi dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ homasya saktu artha tām jñāpayati 
[I,116,iv^3]	na saktavaḥ prayojanavantaḥ iti bhavet dhomaḥ saktvarthaḥ homa saṃbaddhāḥ saktavaḥ syuḥ iti bhavanti home kṛte saktavaḥ homa saṃbaddhāḥ na homasya saktvartha tā niṣprayojaneṣu saktuṣu ghaṭate saktvartha tā vacanam tu na puruṣasya upakārakam na kratoḥ tad anarthakam eva syāt yatas na tad vacanāt śakyam anyatarat kalpayitum saḥ eṣa dvitīya antar saktūnām homasya ca saṃbandham karoti saṃbandhe ca sati dravyāṇām karma saṃyoge guṇa tvena abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti bhūta tvāt guṇa bhāve ca tṛtīyā tena ucyate tṛtīyāyāḥ sthāne dvitīya iti tena tad artha tvāt dhoma artha tvāt saktūnām na pradhānyam dvitīyā saṃyoge api evam sati arthavat vacanam na ca arthavat tve sati ānārthakyam iti ucyate tasya ca puroḍāśa ādeḥ yāga ādiṣu śeṣa bhāvaḥ tena prayojanavantaḥ tatra saṃskāraḥ na anarthakaḥ na sa dṛṣṭa upakārāya iti ced 
[I,116,iv^4]	adṛṣṭa arthaḥ bhaviṣyati adṛṣṭaḥ api saṃskāraḥ asti iti avagamyate loke yathā grāma antarāt āgatānām puruṣānām paryagnikareṇa adṛṣṭaḥ upakāraḥ kriyate iti ucyate loke ca na anupapattiḥ prayojanam ca varuṇa praghāseṣu śrūyate śamī mayaḥ srucaḥ bhavanti hiraṇmayaḥ vā iti prakṛtau nānā vṛkṣa sruc saṃmārga sādhyam apūrvam iti nānā vṛkṣa srucaḥ utpādayitavyāḥ saṃmārga artha tvena yathā pūrva pakṣaḥ yathā tarhi siddhāntaḥ śamī mayaḥ eva hi hiraṇmayaḥ vā saṃmārṣṭavyāḥ tathā yatra bāṇavantaḥ paridhayaḥ tatra api pālāśāḥ utpādayitavyāḥ pūrva pakṣe siddhānte bāṇavantaḥ eva saṃmārṣṭavyāḥ avabhṛthe ca pūrva pakṣaḥ utpādayitavyaḥ agniḥ saṃmārgāya siddhānte ca apaḥ saṃmārjanīyāḥ tathā ṣaṭtriṃśat saṃvatsaretara samayāḥ puroḍāśāḥ savanīyāḥ iti śrūyate tatra api piṣṭa mayaḥ puroḍāśaḥ utpādayita vayaḥ paryagnikaraṇa artha tvena pūrva pakṣe siddhānte māṃsa mayāḥ eva paryagnikartavyāḥ iti 
[I,118,i_I,118,ii]	stuta śastrayoḥ tu saṃskāraḥ yājyāvat devatā abhidhāna tvāt praugam śaṃsati niṣkevalyam śaṃsati ājyaiḥ stuvate pṛṣṭaiḥ stuvate iti guṇa vacanam stavanam śaṃsanam ca yathā indrasya tu vīryāṇi pravocam iti yat etat guṇa vacanam śrūyate kim etat guṇa bhūtam devatām prati uta pradhānam iti tatra ucyate stuta śastre saṃskāra karmaṇi iti kutas devatā abhidhāna tvāt guṇavacane nirvartyamāne guṇinī devatā saṃkīrtyate na anyathā tad guṇa vacanam bhavati tatra pratyakṣam devatā abhidhānam gamyate devatā prakāśanena ca pratyakṣaḥ upakāraḥ yāga siddhiḥ tasmāt saṃskāra karmaṇī yājyāvat yathā yājyām anāha puras anuvākyām anvāha iti stuti vacanam devatā prakāśanena arthavat tadvat etat api iti
