[I,119,i_I,119,ii]	arthena tu apakṛṣyeta devatānām acodana arthasya guṇa bhūta tvāt yadi saṃskāra karmaṇī eva stotra śastre arthena apakṛṣyeta devatānām naḥ codanā arthasya guṇa bhūta tvāt devatā arthasya guṇa bhūtaḥ mantraḥ iti tad pradhāna bhāve yatra pradhānam tatra nīyeta tatra krama sannidhī uparudhyeyātām tasmāt eṣa duṣṭaḥ pakṣaḥ iti paryudasitavyaḥ katamaḥ punar asau mantraḥ abhi tvā śūra iti aindraḥ pragāthaḥ māhendrasya graha yajeḥ sannidhau āmnātaḥ yatra indraḥ tatra apakṛṣyeta 
[I,119,iii_I,119,iv]	vaśā vat vā guṇa artham syāt na paryudasiṣyāmaḥ imam pakṣam saṃskāra karmaṇī eva stotra śastre devatā abhidhāna tvāt eva yat uktam pragāthasya utkarṣaḥ iti tat na indra śabdena mahā indraḥ abhidhāyiṣyate saḥ eva indraḥ mahat tvena guṇena mahā indraḥ iti ucyate pratyakṣam hi indra śabdam devatā vacanam upalabhāmahe mahat tva vacanam ca mahat śabdam yathā rājā mahā rājaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ mahā brāhmaṇaḥ iti vaśāvat yathā sā vai eṣā sarva devatyā yat ajāḥ vaśā vāyavyām ālabheta iti ajā vaśā śabdena codite karmaṇi chāga śabdena nigamāḥ bhavanti tadvat sa guṇe codite nirguṇena abhidhānam bhaviṣyati tena na bhaviṣyati utkarṣaḥ iti 
[I,119,v_I,119,vi^1]	na śrūti samavāyi tvāt na etat evam indraḥ asya grahasya devatā iti tad hita saṃyogena vijñāyeta na ca asya mahat tvam apekṣamāṇasya tad hita saṃyogaḥ upapadyate tad hita saṃyoga apekṣasya vā mahat tva saṃbandhāt samāsa kalpanā na ca tad hita arthe vṛttasya mahattva saṃbandhaḥ na ca samāsa arthe vṛttasya tad hita saṃbandhaḥ na ca asmin eva prayoge samāsa arthe vṛttiḥ iṣyate etasmin eva tad hita arthe na ca ayam indra śabdaḥ avihita vat sva artham tat hita arthena saṃbadhyeta vihita vat ca para artham mahat tvena saṃbaddham anūdyeta 
[I,119,vi^2]	vispaṣṭaḥ ca ayam anyaḥ arthaḥ mahā indraḥ bhavati mahān indraḥ bhavati iti mahā indraḥ anyaḥ ca indraḥ haviṣaḥ devatā bhavati iti sakṛt uccāraṇe ca na ubhayam śakyeta tasmāt na indraḥ devatā mahattva viśiṣṭaḥ mahā indra śabdāt tu tat hitaḥ utpannaḥ tasmāt tad prātipadikam arthavat iti gamyate na tu avayava saṃbandhena tasmāt devatā antaram indrān mahā indraḥ tena aindrasya pragāthasya utkarṣaḥ prāpnoti atas paryudastitavyaḥ eṣa pakṣaḥ yat api ucyate indrasya vṛtra vadha uttara kālam mahā indra tvam darśayati mahān vā ayam abhūt yaḥ vṛtram avadhīt iti tathā vedasya ādimattā doṣaḥ prasajyeta atas anyaḥ indraḥ mahā indrāt 
[I,120,i_I,120,ii]	vyapadeśa bhedāt ca vyapadeśa bhedaḥ ca bhavati bahu dugdhi indrāya devebhyaḥ haviḥ iti bahu dugdhi mahā indrāya devebhyaḥ haviḥ iti atas api devatā antaram eka devatā tve mantra vikalpaḥ syāt 
[I,120,iii_I,120,iv]	guṇaḥ ca anarthakaḥ syāt yadā vidhi śabdāt avagatam etat bhavati indraḥ devatā iti tadā asya guṇān vā ākhyāne kim prayojanam mahat tvam nāma indrasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti devatā abhidhānam katham tasyai devatāyai dīyate iti guṇe api hi vihite sati tasyāḥ eva devatāyai dīyate avihite api tasmāt guṇa vidhānam anarthakam atha ucyate yaḥ asmin grahe indraḥ sa mahān iti na evam graha saṃbandhasya aprasiddha tvāt viśeṣaṇam na atra kalpyate guṇa saṃbandhasya ca aprasiddha tvāt guṇena viśeṣaṇam anavakḷptam tasmāt api devatā antaram 
[I,121,i_I,121,ii]	tathā yājyā purorucoḥ evam sati yājyā puronuvākyayoḥ bhedena darśanam upapadyate endra sānasim rayim iti aindra yājyā puronuvākyāt vayam mahān indraḥ yaḥ ojasā iti bhedena māhendram darśayati tat eka tve vikalpyeta tatra pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt 
[I,121,iii_I,121,iv]	vaśāyām artha samavāyāt yat uktam ajā vaśā śabdena codite karmaṇi chāga śabdena nigamāḥ bhavanti iti tat yuktam vaśāyām artha samavāyi tvam vayam pratyakṣam avagacchāmaḥ chāgasya vapāyāḥ medasaḥ anubrūhi iti yā eva vaśā sā eva chāga iti tasmāt pragāthasya utkarṣaḥ saṃskāra pakṣe atas pradhāna karmaṇī iti 
[I,121,v_I,121,vi]	yatra iti vā arthavat tvāt syāt vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati saṃskāra karmaṇī eva stotra śastre yat ca etat praghāthasya utkarṣaḥ iti utkṛṣyatām yatra indraḥ tatra praghāthaḥ liṅgena hi krama sannidhī bādhitavyau eva 
[I,121,vii_I,121,viii]	na tu āmnāteṣu apareṣām mantrāṇām utkṛṣṭānām anyatra arthavat tā na asti teṣām ānarthakyam syāt yathā yām yāḥ śaṃsanti śipiviṣṭavatīm pita devatyām āgni mārute kuṣumbhaka sūktam akṣasūktam mūṣikāsu uktam iti evamādīnām 
[I,122,i_I,122,ii]	dṛśyate tat ucyate sarveṣām arthavat tā asti maṇḍūka sūktasya agnau akṣa sūktasya rājasūye mūṣikā su uktasya ekādaśinyām sarveṣām vāca stome sarvāḥ ṛcaḥ sarvāṇi yajūṃṣi sarvāṇi sāmāni vāca stome pāriplavam aśvamedhe śaṃsati iti tathā yasya āśvine śasyamāne sūryaḥ na udiyāt api sarvāḥ dāśa tayīḥ anubrūyāt iti tasmāt asti arthavat tā utkṛṣṭānām atas saṃskāra karmaṇī stotra śastre iti 
[I,122,iii_I,122,iv]	api vā śruti saṃyogāt prakāraṇe stauti śaṃsatī kriyā utpattim vidadhyātām api vā pradhāna karmaṇī stotra śastre syātām kutas śruti saṃyogāt saptamī śruti saṃyogaḥ hi bhavati kavatīṣu stuvate śipiviṣṭavatīṣu stuvate iti yadi stutiḥ tatas kavati akṣareṣu āhitā yadi prakāśanam tatas devatāyām tatra karaṇam kavatyaḥ tṛtīyayā āśroṣyam na saptamyā 
[I,122,v_I,123,i]	api ca śruti saṃyogaḥ bhavati praugam śaṃsati niṣkevalyam śaṃsati iti atas stutiḥ abhinirvartayitavyā tena mantreṇa guṇa vacanaḥ śabdaḥ stuti nirvartana arthaḥ adṛṣṭam artham kariṣyati tasmāt pradhāna karmaṇī api ca śruti saṃyogaḥ bhavati ṣaṣṭhī vibhakti saṃyogaḥ yathā indrasya tu vīryāṇi pravocam iti tena devatā śabdaḥ stuti saṃbandha arthaḥ iti ucyate devatā abhidhāna arthe prātipadikā artha tvāt prathamā syāt atha yat prathama antam tat devatā artham bhavitum arhati yathā indraḥ yātaḥ vasitasya rājā iti na iti ucyate tat api vākya saṃyogāt stuti artham eva nanu vākyāt liṅgam balīyaḥ satyam etat api liṅgam yat stuti vākyasya sa ākāṅkṣasya nirākāṅkṣīkaraṇa sāmarthyam tathā api ubhayathā liṅge anugṛhyamāṇe kutas nirṇayaḥ vākya śeṣāt eva na devatā abhidhāna arthaḥ iti devatā abhidhāna arthaḥ iti etasmin pakṣe stuti artham sa ākāṅkṣa vacanam anarthakam eva syāt tasmāt adṛṣṭa artha tvāt stuti vacanasya pradhāna karmaṇī stotra śastre api ca stautiśaṃsati iti sākṣāt guṇa vacanau lakṣaṇayā abhidhāna arthau syātām tasmāt kriyā utpattim apūrva utpattim vidadhyātām iti 
[I,123,ii_I,123,iii]	śabda pṛthaktvāt ca śabdena pṛthaktvam eva gamyate dvādaśa stotra śastraḥ agniṣṭomaḥ itarathāḥ hi dvādaśa tvam na syāt stotrāṇām śastrāṇām ca ekam eva śaṃsanam stavanam ca atha bhedaḥ āśrīyate tatas na dvādaśa tve avatiṣṭhate 
[I,123,iv_I,123,v]	anarthakam ca tat vacanam agniṣṭuti śrūyate āgneyāḥ grahāḥ bhavanti iti tatra punar ucyate āgneyīṣu śaṃsanti iti tat na vidhātavyam eva yadi saṃskāra karma tasmāt api pradhāna karmaṇī iti 
[I,124,i_I,124,ii]	anyaḥ ca arthaḥ pratīyate saṃbaddhe vai stotra śastre vā iti yadi anyat stotram anyat śastram tatas tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ yadi vā apūrva vacane tatas anyat stotram anyat śastram itarathāḥ yat eva stotram tat eva śastram syāt 
[I,124,iii_I,124,iv]	abhidhānam ca karma vat pradhāna karmaṇaḥ iva ca abhidhānam bhavati dvitīyā saṃyogena praugam śaṃsati iti niṣkevalyam śaṃsati iti 
[I,124,v_I,124,vi]	phala nirvṛttiḥ ca phala nirvṛtti darśanam ca bhavati stutasya stutam asi iti evamādi indravantaḥ manemahi bhakṣīmahi prajām iṣam sā me sati āśīryajñasya bhūyāt iti stotra phalam anūdyate na devatāyāḥ tasmāt pradhāna karmaṇī stotra śastre anyatra sūtra baddham prayojanam daśame adhyāye grahāṇām devatā anya tve stuta śastrayoḥ pradhāna karma tvāt adhikāraḥ syāt 
[I,124,vii_I,124,viii]	vidhi mantrayoḥ aikārthyam aika śabdyāt idam samāmnāyate na tāḥ naśanti na dabhāti taskaraḥ nāsām ā mitraḥ vyathiḥ ā dadharṣati devān ca yābhiḥ yajate dadāti ca jyok ittābhiḥ sa ca te gopatiḥ saha iti yajate dadāti iti udāharaṇam kim yadvat brāhmaṇe bhāva śabdaḥ vidhāyakaḥ tadvat mantre api uta mantre abhidhāyakaḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam vidhau matre ca āmnāyamānasya bhāva śabdasya ekaḥ eva arthaḥ syāt aika śabdyāt saḥ eva ayam ekaḥ śabdaḥ brāhmaṇa gataḥ vidhāsyati mantra gataḥ na śaknoti vidhātum iti anupapannam tasmāt vidhāyakaḥ 
[I,125,i_I,125,ii]	api vā prayoga sāmarthyāt mantraḥ abhidhāna vācī syāt api vā iti pakṣaḥ vyāvartyate evaṃjātīyakaḥ mantraḥ abhidhāna vacanaḥ syāt prayoga sāmarthyāt prayoge kriyamāṇe asya sāmarthyam vidyate go dānam goyāgam ca pratyāyayitum na vidhātum kutas vihita tvāt go dānasya dakṣiṇā vidhāne go yāgasya tu anubandhyāyām karma antaram bhaviṣyati iti ced na asakṛt api ucyamāne tad pratyayāt eva stuti artha kalpanāyām api ānarthakyam parisamāptena sārthavādakena vākyena vihita tvāt yāgasya tasmāt na mantra gataḥ bhāva śabdaḥ evaṃjātīyakaḥ vidhāyakaḥ iti 
[I,125,iii_I,125,iv^1]	tat ca udakeṣu mantra ākhyā mantra gataḥ bhāva śabdaḥ vidhāyakaḥ na iti parīkṣitam kaḥ ayam mantraḥ nāma iti ucyate ajñāte mantre tad gataḥ bhāva śabdaḥ katham vicāritaḥ iti idam arthaḥ adhikaraṇam pūrvam draṣṭavyam katham lakṣaṇaḥ mantraḥ iti tat ca udakeṣu mantra ākhyā abhidhānasya ca udakeṣu evaṃjātīyakeṣu abhiyuktāḥ upadiśanti mantrān adhīmahe mantrān adhyāpayāmaḥ mantrāḥ vartante iti prāyikam idam lakṣaṇam anabhidhāyakāḥ api kecid mantrāḥ iti ucyanta yathā vasantāya kapiñjalān ālabhate iti na śakyam pṛṣṭhā koṭeṇa tatra tatra upadeṣṭum iti lakṣaṇam uktam ṛṣayaḥ api padārthānām na antam yānti pṛthakkaśas 
[I,125,iv^2]	lakṣaṇena tu siddhānām antam yānti vipaścitaḥ udāharaṇam medhaḥ asi iti evamādayaḥ asi antāḥ iṣe tvā iti evamādayaḥ tvā antāḥ āyuḥ dāḥ asi iti āśīḥ agniḥ mūrddhā iti stutiḥ saṅkhā ekaḥ mama iti pralapitam akṣī te indra piṅgale duleḥ iva iti parivedanam ambe ambikaḥ iti praiṣa agnīt agnīn iti anveṣaṇam kaḥ asi katamaḥ asi iti pṛṣṭham pṛṣṭhāmi tvā iti ākhyānam iyam vediḥ iti anuṣaṅgaḥ acchidreṇa pavitreṇa iti prayogaḥ traisvaryam cātu svaryam ca sāmarthyam abhidhānam tat ca etat vṛtti kāraṇena udāharaṇa upadeśena ākhyātam 
[I,125,iv^3]	etat api prāyikam eva asi madhyāḥ api ca mantrāḥ bhavanti īḍyaḥ ca asi vandyaḥ ca vājin iti tvā madhyāḥ ca tattva āyāmi iti āśīḥ brāhmaṇam api saḥ akāmayata prajāḥ sṛjeya iti stutiḥ api vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā iti pralāpaḥ na ca etat vidmaḥ yadi brāhmaṇāḥ vā smaḥ abrāhmaṇāḥ smaḥ vā iti paridevanam ye mām adhukṣanta te mām pratyamuñcante iti praiṣa amutas somam āhara iti anveṣaṇam iha vā saḥ iha vā iti praśnaḥ veda karṇavatīm sūrmim iti prativacanam vidmaḥ vā iti anuṣaṅgaḥ hṛdayasya agre avadyati atha jihvāyāḥ atha vakṣasi iti prayogaḥ traisvaryam cātu svaryam ca iti sāmarthyam sruveṇa avadyati draveṣu iti 
[I,125,iv^4]	lakṣaṇa karmaṇi prayojanam prasiddha tvāt na vaktavyam laghīyasī pratipattiḥ lakṣaṇena ākṣepeṣu apavādeṣu prāptyām lakṣaṇa karmaṇi prayojanam na vaktavyam yaḥ ca kṛtvā pravartate ākṣepeṣu pūrva adhikaraṇasya prayojanam apavādeṣu utsargasya prāptyām uttara vivakṣā kṛtvā cintāyām pūrva adhikaraṇasya prayojanam asti vede mantra śabdaḥ yasya ayam arthaḥ parīkṣitaḥ ahe budhniya mantram me gopāya yam ṛṣayaḥ trayī vidā viduḥ ṛcaḥ sāmāni yajūṃṣi iti
[I,127,i_I,127,ii^1]	śeṣe brāhmaṇa śabdaḥ atha kim lakṣaṇam brāhmaṇam mantrāḥ ca brāhmaṇam ca vedaḥ tatra mantra lakṣaṇaḥ ukte pariśeṣa siddha tvāt brāhmaṇa lakṣaṇam avacanīyam mantra lakṣaṇa vacanena eva siddham yasya etat lakṣaṇam na bhavati tat brāha maṇam iti pariśeṣa siddham brāhmaṇam vṛtti kāraḥ tu śiṣya hita artham prapañcitavān iti karaṇa bahulam iti āha upanibaddham ākhyāyikā svarūpam hetuḥ sūrpeṇa juhoti tena hi annam kriyate iti nirvacanam tat dadhnaḥ dadhi tvam nindā upavītāḥ vai etasya agnayaḥ praśaṃsā vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā iti saṃśayaḥ hotavyam gārhapatye na hotavyam iti vidhiḥ yajamāna saṃmita audambarī bhavati parakṛtiḥ māṣān eva mahyam pacati iti purākalpaḥ ulmukhaiḥ ha sma pūrve samājagmuḥ iti vyavadhāraṇa kalpanā yāvataḥ aśvān pratigṛhnīyāt iti 
[I,127,ii^2]	hetuḥ nirvacanam nindā praśaṃsā saṃśayaḥ vidhiḥ para kriyā purākalpaḥ vyavadhāraṇa kalpanā upamānam daśā ete tu vidhayaḥ brāhmaṇasya tu etat vai sarva vedeṣu niyatam vidhi lakṣaṇam etat api prāyikam iti karaṇa bahulaḥ mantraḥ api kaścid iti vā iti me manaḥ iti āha upanibaddhaḥ ca bhagam bhakṣi iti āha ākhyāyikā svarūpam ca ugraḥ ha bhujyam iti hetuḥ idam vaḥ vām uśanti hi nirvacanam tasmāt āpaḥ nu sthanā iti nindā mogham annam vindata apraceta iti praśaṃsā agniḥ mūrddhā iti saṃśayaḥ adhas khidā āsīt upari khidā āsīt iti vidhiḥ pṛṇīya ādin ādhamānāya iti parakṛtiḥ sahasram ayutādadat purākalpaḥ yajñena yajñam ayajanta devāḥ iti 
[I,128,i_I,128,ii]	anāmnāteṣu amantra tvam āmnāteṣu hi vibhāgaḥ ūha pravara nāmadheyeṣu saṃśayaḥ mantrāḥ uta na iti abhidhāyaka tvāt mantrāḥ iti prāpte brūmaḥ anāmnāteṣu mantra tvam na syāt abhidhāyakeṣu api na abhidhāyaka tvam mantra tve hetuḥ kim tarhi abhiyukta prayogaḥ ye abhiyuktaiḥ mantrāḥ iti na ucyante na te mantrāḥ na ca evam ādāyaḥ mantra samāmnāye santi tasmāt amantrāḥ prayojanam mantre duṣṭe yat prāyaścittam amantreṣu tat na 
[I,128,iii_I,128,iv]	teṣām ṛc yatra artha vaśena pāda vyavasthā ṛcaḥ iti asti vede ahe budhniya mantram me gopāya yam ṛṣayaḥ trayī vidā viduḥ ṛcaḥ yajūṃṣi sāmāni iti kathaṃlakṣaṇikāḥ ṛcaḥ teṣām ṛc yatra artha vaśena pāda vyavasthā yatra pāda kṛtā vyavasthā sa mantraḥ ṛc nāmā yathā agnim īlaḥ iti evaṃjātīyakeṣu mantreṣu abhiyuktāḥ upadiśanti ṛcaḥ adhīmahe ṛcaḥ adhyāpayāmaḥ ṛcaḥ vartante iti yadi artha vaśena iti ucyate yatra vṛtta vaśena tatra na prāpnoti agniḥ pūrvebhiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ iti yatas na artha vaśena iti vṛtta ādi va śa vyāvṛtti artham kim tarhi anuvādaḥ eṣa pradarśana arthaḥ avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam vṛtta ādi nirvṛtti arthe sati vākyam bhidyeta tasmāt yatra pāda kṛtā vyavasthā sā ṛc iti 
[I,129,i_I,129,ii]	gītiṣu sāma ākhyā atha sāmnaḥ kim lakṣaṇam viśiṣṭā kācid gītiḥ sāma iti ucyate pragīte hi mantra vākye sāma śabdam abhiyuktāḥ upadiśanti sāmāni adhīmahi samāni adhyāpayāmaḥ sāmāni vartante iti abhiyukta upadeśaḥ ca naḥ pramāṇam yathā amlam dadhi madhuraḥ guḍaḥ iti gīti viśiṣṭe tāvat mantre gīti śabdaḥ gīti saṃbandhāt mantre saṃpratyayaḥ iti avagantavyam 
[I,129,iii_I,129,v]	śeṣe yajuḥ śabdaḥ atha yajuṣaḥ kim lakṣaṇam iti yajuṣaḥ lakṣaṇam na vaktavyam ṛc lakṣaṇa sāma lakṣaṇābhyām eva yajuḥ vijñāsyate vaiparītyena yā na gītiḥ na ca pāda baddham tat praśliṣṭa paṭhitam yajuḥ iti atha nigadaḥ nāma kim yajūṃṣi uta yajuṣaḥ anyaḥ iti 
[I,129,vi_I,129,vii]	nigadaḥ vā caturtham syāt dharma viśeṣāt nigadāḥ na yajūṃṣi kutas dharma viśeṣāt uccais ṛcā kriyate uccais sāmnā upāṃśu yajuṣā uccais nigadena iti eṣa dharma viśeṣaḥ uccais nigadena iti anūdyate yadi yajuṣaḥ nigada tvam syāt na ca tasya uccais tvam dharmaḥ dṛśyeta dṛśyate tu tasmāt caturtham mantra jātam nigadaḥ nāma 
[I,130,i_I,130,ii]	vyapadeśāt ca vyapadeśaḥ api bhavati yajūṃṣi vartante na nigadāḥ nigadāḥ vartante na yajuṃṣi iti tasmāt api mantra antaram 
[I,130,iii_I,130,iv]	yajūṃṣi vā tad rūpa tvāt yajūṃṣi eva vā nigadāḥ kutas tad rūpa tvāt tat eva eṣām rūpam yat yajuṣām praśliṣṭa pāṭhaḥ ṛc sāma lakṣaṇa vilakṣaṇa tā ca 
[I,130,v_I,130,vi]	vacanāt dharma viśeṣaḥ vacanāt pratyāyana sāmarthyāt asti hi puruṣa antara pratyāyana sāmarthyam keṣāṃcid yajuṣām 
[I,130,vii_I,130,viii]	arthāt ca asti ca taiḥ puruṣa antaraiḥ pratyāyitaiḥ prayojanam na upaṃśu uccāryamāṇāḥ puruṣa antaram pratyāyayeyuḥ tasmāt dharma viśeṣaḥ arthavān yāni ca yajaṃṣi uccais uccāryante te nigadāḥ kutas niśabda prakarṣasya vaktā yathā prakarṣeṇa raktam nitarām raktam iti ucyate gadatiḥ gadana arthaḥ pāṭha vacanaḥ eṣaḥ eva hi prakarṣaḥ yat uccais tvā avacchinna tvam 
[I,130,ix]	nanu vācanikaḥ guṇaḥ yajuṣām upāṃśu tvam na iti brūmaḥ guṇaḥ nāma sa bhavati yaḥ sva kāryam kurvatām upakāre vartate na ca para saṃbodhana arthānām yajuṣām upāṃśu tvam sāhāyye vartate tat dhi sva karma kriyā vighātam karoti tena puruṣa antara saṃbodhana artham uccais tvam guṇaḥ itara artham tu vacanam bhaviṣyati itarāṇi yāni yajūṃṣi na para saṃbodhana arthāni teṣu upāṃśu tvam nivekṣyate 
[I,131,i_I,131,ii]	guṇa arthaḥ vyapadeśaḥ atha yat uktam vyapadeśaḥ iti sa ca eka tve api guṇataḥ bhavati yathā itas brāhmaṇāḥ bhojyantām itas parivrājakāḥ iti evam uccaistvena guṇena tāni eva yajūṃṣi vyapadiśyante nigadāḥ iti 
[I,131,iii_I,131,iv]	sarveṣām iti ced yadi yaḥ uccais gadyate sa nigadaḥ ṛc api nigadaḥ prāpnoti 
[I,131,v_I,131,vi]	na ṛc vyapadeśāt na ṛcaḥ nigadāḥ vyapadiśyante ayājyāḥ vai nigadāḥ ṛcā eva yajanti iti pṛthaktva nimittāḥ hi vyapadeśāḥ bhavanti ucyate vyapadeśaḥ liṅgam prāptiḥ ucyatām iti apāda baddhe gadatiḥ vartate apāda baddhaḥ hi gadyaḥ iti ucyate 
[I,131,vii_I,131,viii^1]	artha ekatvāt ekam vākyam sa ākāṅkṣam ced vibhāge syāt atha praśliṣṭa paṭhiteṣu yajuḥṣu katham avagamyeta iyat ekam yajuḥ iti yāvatā pada samūhena ijyate tāvān pada samūhaḥ ekam yajuḥ kiyatā ca ijyate yāvatā kriyāyāḥ upakāraḥ prakāśyate tāvat vaktavya tvāt vākyam iti ucyate tena abhidhīyate artha ekatvāt ekam vākyam iti etasmāt ced kāraṇāt eka vākyatā bhavati tasmāt eka arthaḥ pada samūhaḥ vākyam yadi ca vibhajyamānam sa ākāṅkṣam padam bhavati kim udāharaṇam devasya tvā savituḥ prasavaḥ iti nanu padam padam atra ekārtham satyam na tu tad vibhāge sa ākāṅkṣam na tarhi artha eka tvam upapadyate bahu tvāt padārthānām pada samudāyasya ca pṛthak arthaḥ na asti iti uktam bhedaḥ saṃsargaḥ vā vākya arthaḥ iti yadi ucyate tathā api ekārtha tā na syāt bahu pade bhedānām saṃsargāṇām ca bahu tvāt 
[I,131,viii^2]	eka prayojana tvāt upapannam yathā tāvat devasya tvā iti nirvāpa prakāśanam tasya viśiṣṭasya vācakaḥ etāvān pada samūhaḥ tat vākyam nanu atra devasya tvā savituḥ prasave nirvapāmi iti ekam vākyam aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām nirvapāmi iti aparam evam bahūni vākyāni yadi nirvapāmi iti anuṣaṅgaḥ tatas bahūni vākyāni na tu evam anuṣaṅgaḥ bhavati yadi guṇa bhūtaḥ nirvapāmi iti tadā pratipradhānam bhidyeta na ca nirvāpaḥ devasya tvā iti evamādīnām arthena ucyate sādhana prādhānye hi adṛṣṭa artha tā vacasya syāt nirvāpe punar pradhāne dṛṣṭam kāryam nirvāpa prakāśanam tat sarvaiḥ viśeṣaṇaiḥ viśiṣṭam ucyate tasmāt avirodhaḥ yathā ca padam padena viśeṣyate tathā uktam tad bhūtānām iti tasmāt ekam vākyam 
[I,132,i]	atha kim artham ubhayam sūtritam artha eka tvāt iti ca vibhāge sa ākāṅkṣa tvāt iti ca ucyate bhavati kiṃcid eka artham na tu vibhāge sa ākāṅkṣam yathā bhagaḥ vām vibhajatu aryamāḥ vām vibhajatu iti eka arthāḥ sarve vibhāgam abhidadhati nanu bhaga viśiṣṭāt vibhāgāt aryam aviśiṣṭaḥ anyaḥ vibhāgaḥ na iti ucyate vibhāga sāmānyena asya prayojanam na viśeṣeṇa sāmānye hi dṛṣṭaḥ arthaḥ bhavati na viśeṣe vibhāge tu na sa ākāṅkṣam tasmāt bhinnam idam vākyam vibhāge vikalpyate tathā syonam te sadanam kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā su sevam kalyayāmi tasmin sīdā amṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇām medhaḥ sumanasyamānaḥ iti vibhāge sa ākāṅkṣam dve tu prayojane kriyete sadana karaṇam puroḍāśa pratiṣṭhāpanam ca tasmāt bhinne vākye pūrvam sadana karaṇe viniyujyate uttaram puroḍāśa pratiṣṭhāpane tasmāt samyak sūtritam na sūtra upālaṃbhaḥ bhavati 
[I,133,i_I,133,ii]	sameṣu vākya bhedaḥ syāt īṣe tvā ūrje tvā iti tathā āyuḥ yajñena kalpatām prāṇaḥ yajñena kalpatām iti atra sandehaḥ kim evamādiṣu bhinnam vākyam uta ekam iti ekam iti brūmaḥ īṣe tvā iti evam ukte na kiṃcid dṛṣṭam prayojanam tathā ūrje tvā iti api ca vacana sāmarthyāt adṛṣṭam tat ubhābhyām ekam kalpayitum nyāyyam evam alyīyasī adṛṣṭa anumāna kalpanā bhaviṣyati tasmāt ekam vākyam 
[I,133,iii^1]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ sameṣu vākya bhedaḥ syāt sameṣu parasparān ākāṅkṣeṣu vākyam bhidyate īṣe tvā iti anena ekaḥ arthaḥ kriyate ūrje tvā iti anena aparaḥ nanu idānīm eva uktam na atra dṛṣṭaḥ arthaḥ iti yadi api pratyakṣa ādinā pramāṇena na upalabhyate śrutyā tu gamyate īṣe tvā iti chinati ūrje tvā iti anumārṣṭī iti tathā āyuḥ yajñena kalpatām prāṇaḥ yajñena kalpatām iti āyuḥ kḷpteḥ anyā prāṇa kḷptiḥ nanu sāmānya mātram idam tat na viśeṣaṇa bhedāt bhedam arhati iti yathā agnaye juṣṭam nirvapāmi iti nirvāpaḥ ekaḥ tasya viśeṣāḥ savituḥ prasave aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām puṣṇaḥ hastābhyām iti na teṣām bhedāt nirvāpasya bhedaḥ iṣyate evam iha api kḷptiḥ nāma ekaḥ arthaḥ na asau āyuḥ ādibhiḥ viśeṣaiḥ bhinnaḥ bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,133,iii^2]	ucyate iha kḷptīḥ vācayati iti bahvaḥ kḷptayaḥ śrūyante tāḥ ca vaktavyāḥ tatra ekām āyuḥ kḷptim āyuḥ yajñena kalpatām iti eṣa mantraḥ śaknoti vaditum prāṇaḥ yajñena kalpatām iti ayam api prāṇa kḷptim aparām evam tu sarve kḷpti viśeṣa vacanāḥ tat ca dṛṣṭam prayojanam tasmāt aneka artha tvāt tatra api vākya bhedaḥ iti nanu sāmānya vacanāt ekatvam yathā vibhāge na etat evam vibhāge dṛṣṭa artham sāmānyam iha na api ca kḷptīḥ vācayati iti vihitam āyuḥ yajñena kalpatām iti ca āyuḥ kḷpti abhidhānam abhinivartyate pratyakṣam prāṇaḥ yajñena kalpatām iti ca prāṇa kḷpteḥ tasmāt vākya bhedaḥ 
[I,134,i_I,134,ii]	anuṣaṅgaḥ vākya samāptiḥ sarveṣu tulya yogi tvat yā te agne ayāśayā tanūḥ vā rṣiṣṭhā gahvareṣṭhā ugram vacaḥ apāvadhīt tu eṣam vacaḥ apāvadhīt svāhā yā te agne raja āśayā yā te agne harāśaya iti atra sandehaḥ tanūḥ varṣiṣṭhā iti kim sarveṣu anuṣaktavyam āhosvit laukikaḥ vākya śeṣaḥ kartavyaḥ iti kim prāptam yā te agne rajāśaya iti etasya tanūḥ varṣiṣṭhā iti na vākya śeṣaḥ na hi ayam asmāt paraḥ prayujyate evam prāpte brūmaḥ anuṣaṅgaḥ vākya samāptiḥ syāt tanūḥ varṣiṣṭhā iti yathā eva hi ayam yā te agne ayāśaya iti etasya anantaram evam yā te agne raja āśayā yā te agne harāśaya iti etayoḥ api harāśaya iti etasya vyavahitaḥ iti ced tat na samudāyasya avyavadhānāt avyavahitaḥ rajāśaya iti samudāyaḥ samudāyena ca vākya śeṣasya saṃbandha abhāvāt samudāyibhyām saṃbandhaḥ samudāyi saṃbandhe ca na gamyate viśeṣaḥ tasmāt sarvatra anuṣaṅgaḥ 
[I,135,i]	api ca sa ākāṅkṣasya sannidhau paraḥ tātpurastāt vā paripūrṇa samarthaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ vākya śeṣaḥ bhavati kiyān tu kālaḥ sannidhiḥ iti ucyate yāvati śaknoti ubhau api apekṣitum kaḥ ca asau ānantaryam saṃbandhi pada vyavāyaḥ vā tāvati hi śaknoti ubhau api apekṣitum saṃbandhi pada vyavāye hi saṃbandhāt eva pūrva saṃskāraḥ na apaiti yatra api apareṇa sa ākāṅkṣena vyavāyaḥ tatra api asti saṃbandhaḥ dvayoḥ api hi kāryam vaktavyam iti paraḥ pūrvam apekṣate anapekṣamāne anyataraḥ pramāda pāṭhaḥ syāt śakyate ca asau apekṣitum tasmāt yathā eva ayam ekasya sannidhau evam aparasya dvayoḥ api asaṃbaddhaiḥ padaiḥ avyavahita tvāt dvayoḥ api ākāṅkṣatoḥ etāvat ca vākya śeṣa saṃbandhe kāraṇam na ānantaryam avyavadhāne vicchede api bhavati saṃbandhaḥ tasmāt anuṣaṅgaḥ 
[I,135,ii^1]	atha iha katham bhavitavyam yatra nirākāṅkṣāṇām sannidhau paripūraṇa samarthaḥ śrūyate yathā citpatiḥ tvā punātu vākya patiḥ tvā punātu devasya tvā savitā punātu achidreṇa pavitreṇa vasoḥ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ iti atra hi punātu antāni paripūrṇāni na kiṃcid ākāṅkṣanti nanu achidreṇa iti etat ākāṅkṣiṣyati satyam ākāṅkṣati ākāṅkṣat api etat ekam ākāṅkṣet ekena eva etat nirākāṅkṣam saṃpadyate iti ekena hi nirākāṅkṣīkṛtaḥ na itarau ākāṅkṣiṣyati anarthaka tvāt ākāṅkṣati ekena ca saṃbaddhaḥ na anarthakaḥ bhavati tasmāt na itarau ākāṅkṣati iti itarau api paripūrṇa tvāt na tam ākāṅkṣataḥ nanu etasya vākya śeṣasya ekam api ākāṅkṣataḥ na gamyate viśeṣaḥ kena nirākāṅkṣīkriyate kena vā na iti tena anavagamyamāne viśeṣe sarvaiḥ saha saṃbhantsyate 
[I,135,ii^2]	āha na etat evam yena asya pratyakṣam ānantaryam upalabhāmahe tena saha saṃbhantsyate iti gamyate viśeṣaḥ tasmāt tena anantareṇa saha saṃbhantsyate iti na asti sarvatra anuṣaṅgaḥ iti āha na etat evam punātu śabdena asya pratyakṣam ānantaryam upalabhāmahe punātu śabdasya api citpatiḥ tvā iti evamādibhiḥ ekaḥ ca asau punātu śabdaḥ punar punar uccaritaḥ tena avagacchāmaḥ yatra punātu śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ tatra tena eka vākya tvāt achidreṇa iti ayam api prayoktavyaḥ tathā ca sati citpatiḥ tvā iti evamādayaḥ vinā punātu śabdena sa ākāṅkṣāḥ te ca punātu śabdam ākāṅkṣanti sa ca punātu śabdaḥ achidreṇa iti anena viśiṣṭaḥ tena punātu śabdena sa anuṣaṅgeṇa niyogataḥ sarve nirākāṅkṣī kartavyāḥ tasmāt sarveṣu tulya prayogāḥ iti vākya parisamāptiḥ anuṣajyate 
[I,136,i_I,136,ii]	vyavayāt na anuṣajyeta sam te vāryuḥ vātena gacchatām sam jayatraiḥ aṅgāni sam yajñapatiḥ āśiṣāḥ iti vāryuḥ vātena gacchatām iti eṣa sam yajatraiḥ aṅgāni iti bahuvacana antana vyavahita tvāt saṃyajña patiḥ āśiṣā iti atra na anuṣajyata ekena sa ākāṅkṣeṇa vyavetaḥ gacchatām iti śeṣaḥ tatas bahuvacana antena sam yajatraiḥ aṅgāni iti etena saṃbandham anupetya vyaveta tvāt pareṇa na saṃbadhyate gamyate hi tadā viśeṣaḥ ekena vyavetaḥ iti gamyamāne viśeṣe na tatra bhāvaḥ vākya śeṣasya upapadyate tasmāt bahuvacana antasya parasya ca tad vyapetasya laukikaḥ vākya śeṣaḥ kartavyaḥ iti 
[I,137,i_I,137,ii]	śabda antare karma bhedaḥ kṛta anubandha tvāt asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ tatra śrūyate somena yajeta dākṣiṇāni juhoti hiraṇyam ātreyāya dadāti iti yajati dadāti juhotayaḥ te kim saṃhatya kāryam kurvanti uta viyutya iti saṃśayaḥ sādhakāḥ saṃhatya api sādhayantaḥ dṛśyante viyutya api saṃhatya tāvat trayaḥ grāvāṇaḥ ekāmukhām dhārayantaḥ dṛśyante nāgadantakāḥ tu viyutya api ekaikasmin hi śakyate śikyam avalambayitum atas yajati dadāti juhotavyaḥ saṃhatya sādhayeyuḥ viyutya vā iti jāyate saṃśayaḥ 
[I,137,iii_I,137,vii]	kim tāvat prāptam saṃhatya iti kutas adṛṣṭa arthānām upakāra kalpanā alpīyasī nyāyya iti katham adṛṣṭaḥ yaḥ aśrutaḥ vā arthaḥ sa na asti iti avagamyate tasmin asati dṛṣṭaḥ ced śrutaḥ vā na virudhyate virudhyamāne kalpyaḥ syāt jāyate tena saḥ arthavān viśeṣaḥ ced na gamyeta tatas na ekaḥ api kalpyate 
[I,137,viii]	gamyate ca viśeṣaḥ bahubhyaḥ ekam apūrvam iti tasmāt samudāyaḥ cikīrṣitaḥ tatas hi adṛṣṭe kalpyamāne avayavānām samudāyam prati arthavat tvāt ekam apūrvam samudāyāt kalpitam bhaviṣyati na ca aśabdaḥ samudāyaḥ avayava śabdaiḥ eva samudāyasya ukta tvāt tasmāt samudāyaḥ cikīrṣitaḥ atha vā yajeta iti etasya pūrvaḥ bhāgaḥ yajati artham bravīti uttaraḥ tam eva bhāvayet iti anuvadati evam juhoti iti pūrvaḥ bhāgaḥ juhoti artham uttaraḥ tam eva anuvadati tena ekasyām bhāvanāyām trayaḥ yajati ādaye upāyāḥ vidhīyante śrutyā tasmāt etaiḥ yāga dāna homaiḥ viśiṣṭā pūrvasya bhāvanā pratīyate atas ucyate saṃhatya ekam apūrvam sādhayanti iti yat vā yajati śabdena vihitam dānam dāna homa śabdena anūdyate guṇa sambandha artham tasmāt ekam apūrvam iti prāptam 
[I,138,i^1]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ pratiśabdam apūrva bhedaḥ iti śabda antare karma bhedaḥ kṛta anubandha tvāt yajeta iti anena kevalasya yāgasya kartavyatā ucyate na tu juhoti śabda abhihitasya dadāti śabda abhihitasya vā śabda antara tvāt prayoga vākya śeṣa bhāvena hi samudāyasya sattā sambandhaḥ gamyate śrutyā avayavasya yajeta iti sannihitayoḥ api vākyena dāna homayoḥ śrutyā yāgasya eva sattā sambandhaḥ gamyate na dāna homayoḥ śrutiḥ ca vākyāt balīyasī tasmāt na samudāyaḥ śabdaḥ kalpyamānaḥ hi prayoga vacanena eka vākyatām nītvā kalpyeta śabda antaram ca yajateḥ dadātiḥ tatra yadi api paraḥ bhāgaḥ bhāvanā vacanaḥ sarveṣu samānaḥ tathā api ekaikasya pūrvaḥ avayavaḥ anyaḥ anyaḥ ca tena samudāyaḥ śabda antaram anyasmāt samudāyāt tatra artha antaram vyaktam dadyāt iti dānena sādhayet iti kevalam eva dānam karaṇam bhāvanāyāḥ pratīyate na yāga homau sahāyau apekṣate 
[I,138,i^2]	tathā juhoti iti homa sādhanām bhāvanām āha na dāna yāgau apekṣate tatra etāvat śabdena avagatam dānena kevalena sidhyati iti juhoti iti api homena kevalena sidhyati iti na tu dānena kevalena sidhyati iti vijñānam nivartate dadāti tarhi svena kāraka grāmeṇa kṛta anubandhaḥ na yāgam homam vā anubandham apekṣate tasmāt bhinnāni vākyani pratiśabdam apūrva bhedaḥ iti na ca dānasya yajati juhotiḥ vā anuvādaḥ yāga homayoḥ avivakṣā prasaṅgāt na ca dānam itarayoḥ anuvādaḥ para sva tva artha tvāt dadāteḥ itarayoḥ ca tyāga artha tvāt prayojanam pūrva pakṣe samudāyāt apūrvam siddhānte tu yāgasya phalavat tvāt itarayoḥ guṇa bhāvaḥ 
[I,139,i_I,139,ii]	ekasya evam punar śrutiḥ aviśeṣāt anarthakam hi syāt samidhaḥ yajati tanūnapātam yajati iti evamādiḥ pañca kṛtvas abhyastaḥ yajati śabdaḥ kim ekam apūrvam codayati kim pratyabhyāsam apūrva bhedaḥ iti śabda antare karma bhedaḥ uktaḥ iha saḥ eva śabdaḥ punar punar uccāryate tasmāt ekam eva atra apūrvam nanu apūrva antaram avidadhat anarthakaḥ bhavati satyam eva aprayojanaḥ bhavati bahu kṛtvas api ca uccāryamāṇaḥ na anyārthaḥ bhavati yat prathame uccāraṇe gamyate śatatame api tat eva gamyate tasmāt pañca kṛtvas abhyastaḥ yajati śabdaḥ ekam apūrvam codayati na ca abhyāsaḥ anarthakaḥ bhaviṣyati tanūna pāda ādīḥ devatā vidhāsyati tasmāt ekam apūrvam 
[I,139,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ ekasya evam punar śrutiḥ syāt karma bhedam kuryāt iti arthaḥ tāvatī eva vidhīyamāne asati kasmiṃścid viśeṣe punar śrutiḥ anarthakā bhavet nanu uktam na śaknoti artha antaram vidhātum iti ucyate samidhaḥ yajati iti api prathamaḥ anuvādaḥ eva darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti yāgaḥ prāptaḥ eva tatra devatāḥ na śakyāḥ vidhātum śruti prāptā hi tatra devatā iyam vākyāt prakaraṇāt vā tayoḥ vikalpaḥ na nyāyyaḥ saḥ eṣa devatā yāga saṃbandhaḥ vidhīyamānaḥ akriyamāṇe yāge na śakyaḥ kartum iti anarthakaḥ syāt kriyamāṇe tu śakyate tasmāt abhyasitavyaḥ yāgaḥ pratyabhyāsam ca adṛṣṭa bhedaḥ iti na ca yat samidh saṃbandhena kriyate tat tanūnapāt saṃbandhena bhinna tvāt tayoḥ atas na vikalpaḥ prayojanam pūrva pakṣe sakṛt prayogaḥ iti siddhānte punar punar prayogaḥ iti 
[I,140,i_I,140,ii^1]	prakaraṇam tu paurṇamāsyām rūpāvacanāt evam hi samāmananti yat āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ amāvāsyāyām paurṇamāsyām ca acyutaḥ bhavati tau abrūtām agnīṣomau ājyasya eva tau upāṃśu paurṇamāsyām yajan iti tābhyām etam agnīṣomīyam ekādaśa kapālam paurṇamāse prāyacchat aindram dadhi amāvāsyāyām aindram payaḥ amāvāsyāyām iti tathā āghāram āghārayati ājya bhāgau yajati sviṣṭakṛte samavadyati patnī saṃyājān yajati samiṣṭa yajuḥ juhoti tathā yaḥ evam vidvān paurṇamāsīm yajate yaḥ evam vidvān amāvāsyām yajate iti tatra saṃdehaḥ sarvāṇi etāni sama pradhānāni uta āgneya ādīni payontāni pradhānāni āghāra ādīni ārāt upakārakāṇi aṅgāni tathā yaḥ evam vidvān iti evam saṃyuktau prakṛtānām karmaṇām anuvaditārau atha vā yaḥ evam vidvān paurṇamāsīm yajate yaḥ evam vidvān amāvāsyām yajate iti apūrvayoḥ karmaṇoḥ vidhātārau tatra itare guṇa vidhayaḥ iti kim prāptam śabda antara tvāt abhyāsāt ca sama pradhānāni iti prāpte brūmaḥ prakaraṇam tu paurṇamāsyām prakṛtānām āgneya ādīnām anuvaditārau paurṇamāsī amāvāsya asaṃyuktau 
[I,140,ii^2]	kutas rūpāvacanāt yaḥ evam vidvān paurṇamāsī saṃjñakam yāgam yajate iti na sarve yāgāḥ ucyante yaḥ paurṇamāsī saṃjñakaḥ sa vidhīyate na ca etat evam avagacchāmaḥ kīdṛśam evaṃsaṃjñakasya yāgasya rūpam iti te na kiṃcid pratipadyemahi atas brūmaḥ yadi apūrvasya vidhātārau anarthakau iti atha nu prakṛtānām anuvaditārau tatas sannihitāḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyā saṃyuktāḥ yāgāḥ iti gamyate rūpam tatra arthavat tā vacanasya katham punar eka vacana antaḥ bahūnām vācakaḥ bhaviṣyati iti yadi ucyate samudāya śabda tayā avakalpiṣyate rūpavantaḥ hi pūrva prakṛtāḥ yāgāḥ teṣām ca pracaya śiṣṭaḥ samudāyaḥ api asti tad apekṣaḥ ayam arūpa śabdaḥ tasmāt eka vacana anta tā na doṣaḥ bhavati hi bahūnām eka vacana antar śabdaḥ samudāya apekṣaḥ yathā yūtham vanam kulam pariṣad iti yadā āgneya ādīnām samudāya vacanau etau tadā darśa paurṇamāsa śabdena ete eva abhidhīyante tatas eṣām phala saṃbandhaḥ phalavat sannidheḥ tu āghāra ādīni ārāt upakārakāṇi iti 
[I,141,i_I,141,ii]	viśeṣa darśanāt ca sarveṣām sameṣu hi apravṛttiḥ syāt yadi ca sarvāṇi sama pradhānāni abhaviṣyan na vikṛtau prayājāḥ dṛṣṭantām dṛśyante tu prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalam juhoti iti asatya āgneya guṇa tve prayājasya tat na upapadyate atas na sarvāṇi sama pradhānāni 
[I,141,iii_I,141,iv]	guṇaḥ tu śruti saṃyogāt na etat asti paurṇamāsī amāvāsya asaṃyuktau samudāya śabdau iti kim tu apūrvayoḥ karmaṇoḥ vidhātārau tathā na lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ bhaviṣyati nanu rūpam na asti vākya antareṇa rūpam avagamiṣyāmaḥ paurṇamāsyām āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ bhavati iti yat etat paurṇamāsīnām karma tasya etat rūpam agniḥ devatā puroṅāśaḥ dravyam iti atas āgneya ādibhiḥ guṇaḥ vidhīyate iti 
[I,142,i_I,142,ii]	codanā vā guṇānām yugapad śāstrāt codite hi tad artha tvāt tasya tasya upadiśyeta karma codanāḥ vā āgneya ādayaḥ syuḥ kutas guṇānām yugapad śāsanāt ekena eva vākyena atra anekaḥ guṇaḥ vidhātum iṣyate bhavatā na ca śabda antareṇa codite karmaṇi anekaḥ guṇaḥ paraspara saṃbandhe ca asati śakyate vidhātum katham yadi tāvat paurṇamāsyām aṣṭākapālaḥ bhavati iti saṃbandhaḥ vivakṣitaḥ na tadā ayam arthaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ sat tayā abhisaṃbadhyate iti kaḥ tarhi aṣṭākapālaḥ paurṇamāsya abhisaṃbandhyate iti tatra tadā bhavatiḥ vartate tadānīm āgneyaḥ iti ayam asya antikāt api upanipatitaḥ bhavati saṃbandha abhāvāt na anena saṃbandham arhati aṣṭākapālaḥ āgneyaḥ bhavati iti atha āgneyaḥ paurṇamāsyām bhavati iti vivakṣyate tad āgneya puroṅāśayoḥ asaṃbandhaḥ eva syāt atha paurṇamāsyām aṣṭākapālasya āgneya tā vidhīyate vaktavyam kena tasyām aṣṭākapālaḥ vihitaḥ iti atha tasyām āgneyasya aṣṭākapāla tā tathā api eṣa doṣaḥ atha paurṇamāsī iti ubhābhyām saṃbadhyeta 
[I,142,iii^1]	paraspareṇa dravya devatayoḥ asaṃbandhaḥ eva syāt atha dravya devate paraspareṇa viśiṣṭe satyau paurṇamāsyā saṃbadhyeyātām iti ucyate āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ yaḥ sa paurṇamāsyām bhavati iti tasya aprasiddha tvāt etat api ayuktam atha kenacid agnaye saṅkalpitaḥ paurṇamāsyām vidhīyate tathā api devatāyāḥ avidhānāt rūpa abhāvaḥ eva atha agniḥ devatā bhaviṣyati iti kaścid brūyāt sa vaktavyaḥ mithas ca anartha saṃbandhaḥ iti na hi āgneya śabdaḥ anuvādaḥ vidhiḥ ca bhavati iti kalpayiṣyāmaḥ devatām iti ced na asati vidhāne devatāyāḥ abhāvāt saṃbandhi śabdaḥ ayam devatā iti saḥ eva agniḥ aṣṭākapālasya devatā na ājyasya 
[I,142,iii^2]	tasmāt avaśyam āgneya aṣṭā kapāla saṃbandhaḥ vidhātavyaḥ saḥ eṣa yāgaḥ bhavati iti tena paurṇamāsī yāgasya aparaḥ yāgaḥ saṃbandhī vidhīyate na dravyam devatā vā na ca yāgasya yāga antaram rūpam bhavati atas rūpāvacanāt paurṇamāsyam āvāsya asaṃyuktau na apūrvayoḥ karmaṇoḥ vidhātārau yat tu uktam paurṇamāsya māvāsyā śabdau lakṣaṇayā prakṛtān yāgān anuvaditum śaknutaḥ na añjasyena iti na eṣa doṣaḥ yadā añjasyena śabda arthaḥ na avakalpate tadā lakṣaṇayā api kalpyamānaḥ sādhuḥ bhavati yathā agnau tiṣṭhati avaṭe tiṣṭhati agni samīpe avaṭa samīpe tiṣṭhati iti bhavati saṃvyavahāraḥ lakṣaṇā api hi laukikī ā iva iti 
[I,143,i_I,143,ii]	vyapadeśaḥ ca tadvat ugrāṇi ha vā etāni havīṃṣi amāvāsyāyām saṃbhriyante āgneyam prathamam aindraḥ uttaraḥ iti samuccayam darśayati āgneya ādīnām guṇa tve vikalpaḥ syāt tatra āgneyam prathamam aindraḥ uttare dvaḥ iti vyavadeśaḥ na avakalpeta vikalpe saṃbhāra paurvāparya anupapattiḥ iti 
[I,143,iii_I,143,iv]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam ca dṛśyate caturdaśa paurṇamāsyām āhutayaḥ hūyante trayodaśa amāvāsyāyām iti 
[I,144,i_I,144,ii^1]	paurṇamāsī vat upāṃśu yājaḥ syāt jāmi vai etat yajñasya kriyate yat anvañcau puroḍāśau upāṃśu yājam antarā yajati iti viṣṇuḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ ajāmi tvāya prajāpatiḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ ajāmi tvāya agnīṣomau upāṃśu yaṣṭavyau ajāmi tvāya iti tatra sandehaḥ upāṃśuyājam antarā yajati iti kim viṣṇu ādi guṇakānām prakṛtānām yāgānām samudāyasya vācakaḥ atha vā apūrvasya yāgasya iti tatas ucyate paurṇamāsī vat upāṃśu yājaḥ bhavitum arhati kutas nāma saṃbandhāt nāma saṃbaddhaḥ hi viśiṣṭaḥ yāgaḥ śrūyate upāṃśuyāja saṃjñakaḥ na ca dravya devate rūpam prakṛtāḥ ca upāṃśu guṇakāḥ yāgāḥ vidyante tasmāt samudāya śabdaḥ iti 
[I,144,ii^2]	nanu upāṃśu guṇakam yāga antaram upāṃśu tvena rūpeṇa rūpavat vidhīyate na evaṃjātīyakaḥ śabdaḥ upāṃśu viśiṣṭam yāgam śaknoti vaktum upāṃśu yāgaḥ iti hi tasya vaktā cajoḥ ku ghiṇṇyatoḥ iti ku tvena bhavitavyam avyutpannaḥ punar upāṃśu yāja śabdaḥ tasmāt na rūpavat yāga antaram atha api nāma saṃyuktam yajati sāmānyam eva tathā api anupadiṣṭa devatā dravya rūpam na yāga antaram pratipadyemahi nanu evam sati prakṛtānām api avācakaḥ prāpnoti mā bhūt upāṃśu yāja śabdaḥ yajati śabdaḥ bhaviṣyati tathā sati upāṃśu yāja śabde api anuvāda tvāt anāñjasye api na doṣaḥ 
[I,145,i_I,145,ii^1]	codanā vā aprakṛta tvāt karma antarasya vācakaḥ syāt upāṃśu yājam yajati iti kutas prakṛtānām yāgānām abhāvāt na ced prakṛtāḥ vidyanta kasya samudāyam vakṣyati nanu idānīm eva uktam viṣṇu ādi guṇakāḥ prakṛtāḥ yāgāḥ vidyante iti na vidyante na hi te vidhayaḥ viṣṇuḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ iti evamādayaḥ artha vādāḥ hi te katham asmin vākye vidhi antarasya bhāvāt upāṃśu yājam antarā yajati iti etat etasmin vākye vidhīyate yadi ime api vidhīyeran bhidyeta tarhi vākyam api ca yāgasya viṣṇu ādinām ca saṃbandhaḥ atra gamyate vākye na ca yāgasya vidhānam nanu ca upāṃśu yājam antarā yajati iti atra api antarāla saṃbandhaḥ avagamyate vāḍham sa tu vidhīyate upāṃśu tva ādi saṃbandhaḥ ekam hi idam vākyam na anekam vidhātum arhati katham jāmi vai etat yajñasya kriyate iti evam upakramam etat vākyam ajāmi tvāya iti evam antam tasya madhye samāmnātam viṣṇu ādi vākyam tena saṃbandhyamānam na vākya antaram bhavitum arhati tasmāt viṣṇuḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ iti evamādayaḥ na vidhayaḥ kim tarhi artha vādāḥ kaḥ punar artha vādaḥ 
[I,145,ii^2]	āgneya agnīṣomīyayoḥ nirantaram kriyamāṇayoḥ jāmitā doṣaḥ uktaḥ tam bhiṣajitum upāṃśu yājam antarā yajati iti vihitam katham tena bhiṣajiṣyate tasmin kriyamāṇe jñāyate eva yathā viṣṇuḥ yaṣṭavyaḥ prajāpatiḥ agnīṣomau ca iti tatas ca vyavadhānāt ajāmitau agamyate eva tena āja amita artha vādam vakṣyāmi iti viṣṇu ādi saṃbandhaḥ anūdyate na tu antarāla saṃbandhasya anyat prayojanam asti atas vidhānāt katham viṣṇu ādayaḥ yaṣṭavyāḥ iti etat avagamyate yaṣṭavyān ayaṣṭavyān vā viṣṇu ādīn upāṃśuyāja abhiṣṭavāya saṅkīrtayati iti gamyate tatra kecid tāvat āhuḥ prāptāḥ eva iti kutas śākhā antare vidhānāt iti yadi api aprāptiḥ tathā api upāṃśu tva sāmānyāt prajāpatiḥ devatāḥ viṣṇuḥ ca iti anuvādau eva upāṃśu dharmāṇau hi viṣṇu prajāpatī tasmāt yat kiñcid prājāpatyam yajñe kriyate tat upāṃśu eva kriyate iti evamādi saṅkīrtanāt mantra samāmnānāt ca viṣṇum aprāptam api prāptam iva vadet agniṣomayoḥ tu vidhāyakam udāhriyate etau abrūyātām agnīṣomau vā ājyasya eva tau upāṃśu paurṇamāsyām yajan iti tasmāt yāga antaram 
[I,146,i_I,146,ii]	guṇa upabandhāt yat ucyate na jñāyate katamaḥ asau upāṃśuyāja saṃjñakaḥ yāgaḥ iti yasya ayam guṇaḥ upabaddhaḥ upāṃśu paurṇamāsyām yajan iti tasmāt na doṣaḥ 
[I,146,iii_I,146,iv]	prāye vacanāt ca pradhāna karma prāye vacanam pradhāna karma tām upodbalayati yathā agrya prāye likhitam dṛṣṭvā bhavet ayam agryaḥ iti matiḥ tasmāt na samudāya śabdaḥ iti 
[I,146,v_I,146,vi]	āghāra agnihotram arūpa tvāt āghāram āghārayati iti śrūyate tathā imāni aparāṇi ūrdhvam āghārayati santatam āghārayati ṛjum āghārayati iti evamādi idam ca agnihotram juhoti tathā dadhnā juhoti payasā juhoti iti evamādi tatra sandehaḥ kim ūrdhvam āghārayati dadhnā juhoti iti evamādibhiḥ āghārāḥ homāḥ ca vihitāḥ teṣām āghāram āghārayati agnihotram juhoti iti etau samudāya anuvādau uta etau eva apūrvayoḥ āghāra homayoḥ vidhātārau iti kim tāvat prāptam na apūrvayoḥ vidhī iti kutas arūpa tvāt na hi etayoḥ pūrvebhyaḥ homa āghārebhyaḥ viśiṣṭam rūpam asti yatas karma antaram adhyavaseyam atas prakṛta tvāt prakṛta anuvādau 
[I,147,i_I,147,ii]	saṃjñā upabandhāt saṃjñā upabandhaḥ ca bhavati agnihotram nāma homam juhoti iti āghāra saṃjñakam karma karoti iti saṃjñā viśiṣṭau āghāra homau vidhīyete na ca vijñāyate kaḥ asau āghāraḥ nāma karma viśeṣaḥ kaḥ āgnihotra saṃjñakaḥ iti nanu vijñāyate āghāraṇam āghāraḥ havanam homaḥ yadi āghāraṇa sāmānyam homa sāmānyam ca vidhīyete vijñāta pūrvau tarhi āghāra homau tena anuvādau atha avyutpannāḥ ubhayoḥ api saṃjñā tathā api na āghāra agnihotra sāmānyam ucyeta viśeṣa āśraya tvāt saṃjñāyāḥ na ca sa viśeṣaḥ gamyate iti apūrvau āghāra homa vidhī na avakalpyete api ca katham kriyā sādhana śabdena ucyeta īpsitatamam hi yat sādhanam tat dvitīya antena ucyate kriyā tiṅantena anuvāda pakṣe kriyāṇām samudāyaḥ artha antaram tat īpsitatamam sādhanam bhaviṣyati 
[I,147,iii_I,147,iv]	aprakṛta tvāt ca na ca prakṛtam api dravya devatam āghāre vidyate yena rūpavān syāt tasmāt etau api samudāya śabdau iti 
[I,150,i_I,150,ii]	codanā vā śabda arthasya prayoga bhūta tvāt tad sannidheḥ guṇa arthena punar śrutiḥ na ca etat asti samudāya śabdau iti karma antara codane syātām kutas śabda arthasya prayoga bhūta tvāt āghārayati juhoti iti homa āghārau prayoktavyau iti śabda arthaḥ tena karma antare vidhīyeta iti avagacchāmaḥ āghāra agnihotra śabdau ca havana āghāraṇa sāmānya vācinau prajñātau atas na avijñāta arthau tena rūpavantau santau vidhīyete 
[I,150,iii]	yat uktam ūrdhvam āghārayati dadhnā juhoti iti evamādibhiḥ vihita tvāt anuvādau iti na etat evam na hi ete homa aghārau vidhātum śaknuvanti ūrdhvam āghārayati dadhnā juhoti iti ca na etat uktam bhavati āghāraḥ kartavyaḥ homaḥ kartavyaḥ iti kim tarhi ūrdhva tā āghāra saṃbandhaḥ kartavyaḥ dadhi homa saṃbandhaḥ kartavyaḥ iti tasmāt arāpta tvāt na anuvādau nanu saṃbandhe vihita arthāt dhomāghārau bhaviṣyataḥ na etat evam asmin hi sati vidhānena saṃbandhaḥ tasmāt na arthāt āpadi ete homa āghārau atas apūrvau vidhīyeta iti brūmaḥ 
[I,150,iv^1]	nanu āghārayati juhoti iti homa āghāra gataḥ vyāpāraḥ śrūyate na dadhi ūrdhvatā ādi saṃbandhaḥ satyam na śrūyate tasmin nidheḥ guṇa arthena vyāpāra śravaṇam avakalpiṣyate nanu padārtha antara gatam vyāpāram śrutiḥ na śaknoti vaditum satyam evam etat sva padārtha gatam vakṣyati tam tu sva padārtham guṇa śabdaḥ viśekṣyati saḥ eva viśiṣṭaḥ pratyeṣyate iti bhavet etat viśiṣyāt sva padārtham guṇa śabdaḥ na tu eṣa guṇa gataḥ vyāpāraḥ pratīyeta tatra kim bhaviṣyati avyāpriyamāṇe api guṇe śabda artha avakḷptaḥ bhaviṣyati 
[I,150,iv^2]	guṇa vacana sannidhiḥ idānīm kim arthaḥ anarthakaḥ tu katham punar anarthakaḥ nāma vedaḥ bhavitum arhati sati arthe na anarthakaḥ asati tu arthe kim anyat ucyeta evam tarhi vākyāt bhaviṣyati śruti arthe sati na vākya arthaḥ avakalpyate satyam evam etat avivakṣite tu avakalpiṣyate katham avivakṣā guṇa vacanasya apramāda pāṭhāt sva padārthasya ca śabda antareṇa vihita tvāt tasmāt siddham guṇa arthena dadhnā juhoti iti evamādīnām punar śrutiḥ juhoteḥ uccāraṇam ca anuvādaḥ guṇa saṃbandha arthaḥ yadi juhoti iti anuvādaḥ 
[I,149,i]	kena idānīm guṇaḥ vidhīyate dadhi śabdena iti mā vocata nanu idānīm eva vākyāt guṇa vyāpāraḥ gamyate iti uktam satyam evam etat avidhīyamānaḥ tu kutas gamyate iti pramāṇam asya na avagamyeta asati pramāṇe vyāmohaḥ syāt evam tarhi vidhāyakau juhoti āghāra yati śabdau kasya tarhi anuvādaḥ dhātu arthasya iti brūmaḥ 
[I,149,ii]	yadi vidhāyakau pūrvam eva vihite sva arthe kim artham punar uccāryete vākya arthaḥ yaḥ tam vidhātum iti adoṣaḥ tasmāt karma antara codane yat uktam na asti āghāre prakṛtam dravya devatam iti kim evam sati dravya devatena yadā prasiddha artha abhidhānāt nirjñātam eva asya rūpam api ca catur gṛhītam vā etat abhūt tasya āghāram āghārya iti ājyam asya dravyam māntra varṇikaḥ devatā vidhiḥ indraḥ ūrdhvaḥ adhvaraḥ divi spṛśatu mahataḥ yajñaḥ yajñapate indravān svāhā iti āghāram āghārayati iti evam asau indravān yadi asya indraḥ devatā tat yadi devatā abhidhānam etat āghārasya tatas anena āghāraḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati tasmāt karma antare na samudāya śabdau iti siddham 
[I,150,i_I,150,ii]	dravya saṃyogāt codanā paśu somayoḥ prakaraṇe hi anarthakaḥ dravya saṃyogaḥ na hi tasya guṇa arthena jyotiṣṭome śrūyate yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yat agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhate iti tatra idam āmananti hṛdayasya agre avadyati atha jihvāyāḥ atha vakṣasaḥ iti tathā somena yajeta iti tatra api aindra vāyavam gṛhṇāti maitrāvaruṇam gṛhṇāti āśvinam gṛhṇāti iti evamādi tatra saṃśayaḥ kim avadyati gṛhṇāti coditānām karmaṇām eva alabhati yajatī samudāyasya anuvaditarau atha apūrvayoḥ karmaṇoḥ vidhātārau iti 
[I,150,iii^1]	kim tāvat prāptam samudāyasya iti kutas ye ime ālabhati yajatibhyām karmaṇī vidhīyeyātām iti cintyete pūrvam eva te avadyati gṛhṇātibhyām avagamite na ca avagamitaḥ arthaḥ vidhīyate hṛdaya ādīn tu paśu śabdena anuvadati soma śabdena ca rasam tasmāt somena yajeta iti anuvādaḥ yajatiḥ yajeta svarga kāmaḥ iti phala sambandha arthaḥ paśum ālabheta iti ca alabhatiḥ agnīṣoma saṃbandha arthaḥ api ca daśa etān adhvaryuḥ prātaḥsavane grahān gṛhṇāti iti samuccayaḥ dṛśyate tathā aśvinaḥ daśamaḥ gṛhyate tṛtīyaḥ hūyate iti ca kramaḥ yadi ca apūrvau yāgau vidhīyete tatra aindra vāya vādibhiḥ devatāḥ vidhīyeran tāḥ eka arthāḥ santyaḥ vikalperan yathā khādire badhnāti pālāśe badhnāti rohitake badhnāti iti tatra krama samuccaya darśane na upapadyeyātām atha punar asmin samudāya vacane yajatau samyak etat avakḷptam bhavati tasmāt samudāya anuvādau evam prāpte brūmaḥ apūrvayoḥ karmaṇoḥ vidhāna codane paśu somayoḥ kutas 
[I,150,iii^2]	soma śabdaḥ kṣīriṇyām latāyām prasiddhaḥ na rase ākṛti vacanaḥ hi soma śabdaḥ na vyakti vacanaḥ tathā śṛṅgiṇi pucchavati lomaśe catuṣpadi dravya viśeṣe paśu śabdam ākṛti vacanam upacaranti na ca evam ākṛtika dravyāḥ prakṛtāḥ yāgāḥ vidyante yeṣām imau samudāyasya anuvaditārau bhaveyātām nanu paśu vikāraḥ hṛdaya ādiḥ paśu śabdena agnīṣoma saṃbandha artham anūdyate na etat evam paśuḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ bhavati iti etāvat ucyate na ayam prakṛtaḥ hṛdaya ādiḥ paśuḥ iti tatra yadi laukikasya paśoḥ grahaṇam tatas mukhyaḥ paśu śabdaḥ yadi hṛdaya ādeḥ tatas jaghanyaḥ vikāra saṃbandhena tathā soma śabdaḥ api vikāra saṃbandhena anuvādaḥ syāt tasmāt apūrve karmaṇī vidhīyeyātām na anuvādau atha aindravāyavādiṣu prakṛteṣu yāgeṣu latā vidhīyeta iti ucyate na sā śakyā vākyena aindra vāyavī jñātum śrutyā hi rasaḥ aindra vāyavaḥ tasmāt dravya saṃyoga vacanaḥ prakṛteṣu yāgeṣu api satsu vidhātum anuvaditum vā na śaknuvan anarthakaḥ syāt tasmāt apūrva karmaṇī vidhīyeyātām na prakṛtānām anuvādau iti 
[I,151,i_I,151,ii]	acodakāḥ ca saṃskārāḥ evam tāvat prakṛteṣu satsu api na anuvādau iti uktam atha idānīm prakṛtāḥ eva yāgāḥ na santi iti ucyate kutas acodakāḥ saṃskārāḥ na ca aindra vāya vādibhiḥ yāgāḥ vidhīyante tena grahaṇam upakalpana mātram dṛṣṭa artham upakalpyamāne tu devatā saṅkīrtanam adṛṣṭāya atas aindra vāyavam gṛhṇāti iti indra vāyubhyām saṃkalpayati iti etāvat uktam bhavati tatra yāgam antareṇa saṃkalpayati iti etat na yujyate iti yāgaḥ kalpyeta saḥ eva āmnātaḥ yāgaḥ yasmin sati saṃkalpaḥ avakalpyeta tasmāt na aindra vāyavam gṛhṇāti iti evamādibhiḥ yāgāḥ vidhīyeran prakṛtānām yāgānām abhāvāt na samudāya śabdaḥ yajatiḥ tathā labhati śabdaḥ iti 
[I,152,i_I,152,ii^1]	tad bhedāt karmaṇaḥ abhyāsaḥ dravya pṛthaktvāt anarthakam hi syāt bhedaḥ dravya guṇībhāvāt paśau vṛttā kathā daśame punar udbhaviṣyati somaḥ idānīm vartate katham krama samuccayau iti indra vāyu ādyāḥ devatāḥ na evam śrūyante indra vāyubhyām yāgaḥ nirvartayitavyaḥ mitrāvaruṇābhyām yāgaḥ nirvartayitavyaḥ iti yadi evam aśroṣyanta yāgam prati devatāḥ vyakalpiṣyanta kevalayā hi devatayā tadā yāgaḥ nirvartyate iti vihitam abhaviṣyat atha punar imāḥ adṛṣṭa artham gṛhṇāti saṃskāram prati devatāḥ vidhīyante tatra indra vāyu saṃkalpāt anyaḥ mitrāvaruṇa saṃkalpaḥ tena gṛhṇātau tad kṛtāt adṛṣṭāt adṛṣṭa antaram utpādayati evam apareṣu api grahaṇeṣu tasmāt samuccayaḥ grahaṇam tu niyata parimāṇeṣu ūrdhva pātreṣu prādeśa mātreṣu niyata parimāṇeṣu udaka kalaśeṣu saṃskṛtasya daśamuṣṭi parimitasya kṛtsnasya somasya na avakalpate 
[I,152,ii^2]	yadi api ca avakalpeta tathā api nitya vihitānām devatānām vikalpa pakṣe tāvat prayoga vacanaḥ mā bādhi iti avayava grahaṇam eva nyāyyam kṛtsna grahaṇe hi tat eva indra vāyubhyām saṃkalpitam tat eva mitrāvarūṇābhyām iti na avakalpeta tasmāt kalpana bhedāt pṛthak avasthitaḥ somaḥ nānā devata tvāt eva na aikyena śakyaḥ kartum na ca asati devatā yāge devatābhyaḥ śakyate saṃkalpayitum tasmāt avaśyam yathā saṃkalpitāḥ devatāḥ yaṣṭavyāḥ tāsu ca ijyamānāsu jyotiṣṭomena yajeta iti śrutaḥ yāgaḥ nirvṛttaḥ eva bhavati na devatā antaram ākāṅkṣati kṛtsnena ca daśamuṣṭinā somena yāgaḥ śrutaḥ saḥ asati abhyāse na avakalpate iti arthāt sa guṇaḥ bhaviṣyati iti abhyasitavyaḥ yāgaḥ na hi anabhyastaḥ sarvābhiḥ devatābhiḥ sarveṇa ca somena saṃpannaḥ bhaviṣyati tasmin ca abhyasyamāne krama samuccayau yuktau eva bhavataḥ tasmāt tayoḥ darśanam yujyate eva iti 
[I,153,i_I,153,ii]	saṃskāraḥ tu na bhidyeta para artha tvāt dravyasya guṇa bhūta tvāt yat api ucyate yathā khādire badhnāti pālāśe badhnāti iti khādira ādayaḥ saṃskāre vikalpante tadvat devatāḥ vikalpayiṣyante iti tat ca na evam yuktam tatra saṃskāram abhinirvartayitum khādira ādayaḥ śrūyante yadi ca indra vāyu ādyāḥ api graha devatāḥ yāgam abhinirvartayitum śrūyeran tatas atra api vikalpaḥ syāt na tu etāḥ yāge śrutāḥ tasmāt samuccīyeran 
[I,153,iii_I,153,iv]	pṛthaktu a niveśāt saṅkhyayā karma bhedaḥ syāt asti vājapeyaḥ vājapeyena svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta iti tatra prājāpatyāḥ paśavaḥ saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabhate saptadaśaḥ vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpateḥ āptyai śyāmāḥ tu uparāḥ eka rūpāḥ bhavanti evam eva hi prajāpatiḥ samṛddhyai tatra sandihyate kim saptadaśa etāni karmāṇi atha saptadaśa paśu guṇakam ekam karma iti kim tāvat prāptam ekam karma iti kutas prajāpataye saptadaśa paśavaḥ saṅkalpyante kim ekam yāgam abhinivartayitum uta bahūn iti saṃśaye ekam iti nyāyyam yaḥ hi bahūn yāgān kalpayati kalpayati asau ekam tatra ekasmin eva parikḷpte saptadaśānām eva paśūnām parikalpanam upapannam bhavati kena ca dvitīya ādīn yāgān avakalpayema evam sati alpīyasi adṛṣṭa anumāna prasaṅga kalpanā bhavati tasmāt ekaḥ yāgaḥ saptadaśabhiḥ paśubhiḥ nirvartyate 
[I,154,i]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ saṅkhyayā karma bhedaḥ bhavet pṛthaktve paśūnām sati saptadaśa saṅkhyā niviśeta tat ca paśūnām pṛthaktvam bahuṣu yāgeṣu avakalpate na ekasmin katham ekādaśabhiḥ avadānaiḥ asau yāgaḥ nivartayitavyaḥ iti evam ca udakaḥ pratidiśati tāni ca ekasmāt eva paśoḥ avāpyante tatra dvitīya ādeḥ ālambhaḥ na avadāna saṃpādanāya bhavitum arhati ekam ālabhyamānam anvālabhyeran adṛṣṭa arthāya apare tathā asati atad artha tvāt na te prājāpatyāḥ bhaveyuḥ tatra prājāpatyān iti śravaṇam uparudhyeta tena ekasmin paśau pṛthaktve niveśinī saptadaśa saṅkhyā na avakalpyeta bahuṣu yāgeṣu bahubhiḥ eva avadāna gaṇaiḥ prayojanam tena saptadaśabhyaḥ yāgebhyaḥ saptadaśa paśūn upādadīran tatra saṅkhyā sāmam jasyam bhaviṣyati tasmāt saptadaśa yāgāḥ 
[I,154,ii^1]	nanu ekasmin api yāge saptadaśabhiḥ avadāna gaṇaiḥ yakṣyate vacanāt na etat evam paśuṣu him sā saṅkhyā śrūyate na avadāna gaṇeṣu avadānāni havīṃṣi yāga sādhanāni na paśu ākṛtiḥ sā hi avadāna prakṛti dravyam viśiṣantī prakṛtau pradhānasya upakṛtavatī iti vikṛtau api avadāna prakṛti dravyam viśiṣantī pradhānasya upakariṣyati tatra ca paśoḥ saptadaśa saṅkhyā vikārikā na avadāna gaṇasya tasmāt ekasmai avadāna gaṇāya ekaḥ paśuḥ ālabdhavyaḥ prāpnoti tatra saptadaśa saṅkhyā na upapadyate evam eva avakalpiṣyate 
[I,154,ii^2]	yadi śṛṅga abhiprāyāḥ varṇa abhiprāyāḥ rūpa abhiprāyāḥ vā abhiviṣyan saptadaśa paśavaḥ śvetaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ rohitaḥ iti evamādayaḥ teṣām anyatamaḥ gṛhyate iti athavā tu uparāḥ śṛṅgiṇaḥ eka śṛṅgāḥ iti evamādayaḥ teṣām anyatamaḥ iti te hi śyāmāḥ tu uparāḥ eka rūpāḥ śrūyante tadeṣu bahuṣu yāgeṣu upapadyate na ekasmin tasmāt saptadaśa yāgāḥ iti prayojanam ekasmin aṣṭe duṣṭe kṛtsnaḥ paśu gaṇaḥ āvarteta ekam ālabhyamānam anvālabheran pūrva pakṣe adṛṣṭa artham siddhānte ekaḥ eva paśuḥ āvartate na hi karma bhede paśuḥ paśu antaram ākāṅkṣati iti 
[I,155,i_I,155,ii^1]	saṃjñā ca utpatti saṃyogāt atha eṣa jyotiḥ atha eṣa viśvajyotiḥ atha eṣa sarva jyotiḥ iti atra saṃdehaḥ kim ebhiḥ nāmadheyaiḥ prakṛtam jyotiṣṭomam saṅkīrtya tatra sahasra dakṣiṇa ādi guṇaḥ vidhīyate atha vā vakṣyamāṇa viśeṣāṇi karma antarāṇi upadiśyante iti kim prāptam prakaraṇa anugrahāt prakṛtasya guṇa vidhānam iti nanu vākya sāmarthyāt jyotiḥ ādīnām ete guṇāḥ vidhāyiṣyante na eṣa doṣaḥ jyotiṣṭomasya eva etāni vācakāni jyotiḥ iti jyotiṣṭomasya pratīkam upādīyate viśvajyotiḥ iti trivṛt ādīni asya jyotīṃṣi vākya śeṣa saṅkīrtitāni tāni sarvāṇi asya tena asau viśvajyotiḥ sarvajyotiḥ ca jyotiṣṭomaḥ iti evam prāptam 
[I,155,ii^2]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ saṃjñā hi tisraḥ bhedikāḥ teṣām jyotiḥ ādyāḥ utpatti vākye hi etāḥ śrūyante tāsām imāḥ punar śrutayaḥ tasmāt atha eṣa jyotiḥ iti apūrvasya karmaṇaḥ vidhāyakam vākyam anuvāde hi sati apravṛtti viśeṣa karam anarthakam syāt prakṛtasya ca guṇa vidhāne vikalpaḥ bhavet tatra pakṣe bādhaḥ na ca jyotiḥ ādayaḥ jyotiṣṭomasya vaditāraḥ samudāya antarāṇi hi etāni na ca avayavena samānena samudāya antaram tad artham eva bhavati yathā śālā śabdaḥ gṛha vacanaḥ tatra na śālā śabda sāmānyān mālā śabda ādayaḥ api gṛha vacanāḥ bhavanti 
[I,155,ii^3]	yat tu jyotiṣṭomasya jyotiḥ iti pratīkam upādīyate iti prakaraṇa sāmarthyāt dhi tatra jyotiṣṭoma śabdena parokṣena eka vākyatā bhavet sā pratyakṣam jyotiḥ śabdena saha eka vākyatām bādheta naca etat nyāyyam vākyam hi prakaraṇāt balīyaḥ atha punar ayam dyotana artha tvāt vā jyotiṣṭoma tvāt vā karma antare vatsyati yat ca trivṛt ādīni jyotīṃṣi teṣām sākalya vacanaḥ viśvajyotiḥ sarva jyotiḥ iti ced na iti brūmaḥ na hi trivṛt ādiṣu jyotiḥ śabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ evam bruvan prasiddham bādheta yat tu vākya śeṣāt jyotiḥ śabdaḥ trivṛt ādi vacanaḥ iti tasmin eva vākye sa tatra prayuktaḥ iti gamyate pramāṇa antareṇa na śabdena yatra tu tad pramāṇa antaram na asti na tatra vartitum arhati yathā siṃhaḥ devadattaḥ iti siṃha śabdaḥ devadatta vacanaḥ pramāṇa antareṇa na tu siṃham ālabheta iti yatra tatra tu tad pramāṇa antaram na asti tasmāt na viśvajyotiḥ sarva jyotiḥ iti ca jyotiṣṭomasya vaditārau na ced jyotiṣṭomaḥ ucyate sarvāṇi kamāntarāṇi
[I,157,i_I,157,ii]	guṇaḥ ca apūrva saṃyoge vākyayoḥ sama tvāt cāturmāsyeṣu vaiśvadeve samāmananti tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevī āmikṣāḥ vājibhyaḥ vājinam iti tatra sandihyate kim āmikṣā guṇake karmaṇi vājinam guṇa vidhiḥ uta tasmāt vā ajina guṇakam karma antaram kim prāptam guṇa vidhiḥ iti kutas vājenāt nena āmikṣayāḥ vājinaḥ viśvedevāḥ tān anūdya vājinam vidhīyate tena ubhayam vaiśvadevam āmikṣāḥ vājinam ca tasmin eva ca karmaṇi vājina guṇa vidhiḥ yathā agnihotram juhoti iti ukte dadhnā juhoti payasā juhoti iti 
[I,157,iii_I,157,iv]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ guṇaḥ ca aprakṛtena devatā abhidhānena saṃbandhyamānaḥ karma antaram vidadhyāt same hi tadā ete vākye bhavataḥ ubhe api apūrvayoḥ yāgayoḥ vidhātṛṇī katham punar apūrva devatā abhidhānam yadā idānīm eva uktam viśveṣām devānām anuvādaḥ vājinam iti tat ucyate iha viśveṣām devānām devatā tvam kvacid śrutyā kvacid vākyena tat dhita nirdeśe śrutyā caturthī nirdeśe vākyena yatra śrutyā devatā tvam tatra āmikṣayā saha eka vākya tvam yatra caturthī tatra vājinena tatra eṣām ekatra śrutyā devatā tvam vākyena dravya viśeṣa saṃbandhaḥ ekatra ubhayam api vākyena tat iha devatā tvam prati śruti vākyayoḥ virodhaḥ virodhe ca śrutiḥ balīyasi iti āmikṣā vākye devatā tvam viśveṣām devānām na vājina vākyaḥ iti adhyavasīyate tena avagamyate aprakṛtena devatā padena asya saṃbandhaḥ iti tasmāt karma antaram iti atha yat upavarṇitam yathā agnihotram juhoti iti ukte dadhnā juhoti iti evamādayaḥ guṇa vidhayaḥ iti tatra ucyate 
[I,158,i_I,158,iii]	aguṇe tu karma śabde guṇaḥ tatra pratīyeta yuktam yat tatra guṇa vidhānam na tatra aprakṛtena kenacid guṇena saṃbandhaḥ prakṛtena tu asti yāgena tasmāt anupavarṇanam etat atha vā adhikaraṇa antaram dadhnā juhoti iti evamādīni karma antarāṇi vikalpa parijihīrṣayā avakalpyante tat eva tu karma juhoti iti śabdāt avagamyate na karma antaram tasmāt tatra eva guṇa vidhiḥ vacanāt vikalpaḥ ca iti siddham 
[I,158,iv_I,158,v]	phala śruteḥ tu karma syāt phalasya karma yogi tvāt agnihotram prakṛtya samāmananti dadhnā indriya kāmasya juhuyāt iti evamādi tatra saṃśayaḥ kim agnihotra homāt dhoma antaram dadhi ādi homaḥ uta dadhi ādeḥ guṇāt phalam iti kim prāptam homa antaram iti kutas phala śruteḥ phalam iha śrūyate tat ca karmaṇaḥ nyāyyam 
[I,158,vi^1]	kim dṛṣṭam hi karmaṇaḥ phalam kṛṣi āditaḥ vrīhi ādi na iti brūmaḥ na hi etat dṛṣṭena anena sidhyati yadi darśanam hetuḥ phala jñāne kṛṣi ādau padārthe tad darśanam na home atha kṛṣau dṛṣṭam anyatra api bhavati dravyāt api prasajyate atha kṛṣi sadṛśāt bhavati iti ucyate kṛṣi sadṛśaḥ homaḥ kriyā tvāt na dravyam asadṛśam hi tat iti homaḥ api asadṛśaḥ mantra devatā ādi sādhana tvāt dhomasya lāṅgala ādi sādhana tvāt ca kṛṣeḥ tyāga ātmaka tvāt dhomasya pāṭana ātmaka tvāt ca kṛṣeḥ atha kiṃcid sādṛśyam gṛhyate dravyasya api sat anityam iti evamādi kiṃcid sādṛśyam asti atha dravyāt anyat sadṛśataram asti iti kṛtvā na dravyam sadṛśam iti ucyate homāt api anyat kṛṣeḥ sadṛśataram asti dṛṣṭa artham iti kṛtvā homaḥ api asadṛśaḥ syāt 
[I,158,vi^2]	na ca etat siddham yat kvacid dṛśyate tat anyasmin sadṛśa mātre adṛṣṭam api bhavitum arhati iti yat dhi yasya kāraṇa bhūtam dṛṣṭam siddhe tat ced sādhye api kāraṇa bhūtam iti avagamyate bhavati tat tasya sādhakam yat na jñāyate kāraṇa bhūtam iti na tat sadṛśam api sādhakam tasmāt sadṛśam api sādhakam asādhakam vā iti parīkṣitavyam iti atha yat karma tat phalavat dṛṣṭam homaḥ api karma tena api phalavatā bhavitavyam iti uparate karmaṇi dravyāṇām tad saṃyogānām ca dravya antaram phalam dṛṣṭam iti dravyam api phalavat syāt api ca kṛṣeḥ na adṛṣṭam iti tad sādṛśyāt dhomāt api na adṛṣṭam bhavet kṛṣi sādṛśyāt vā vrīhiḥ eva bhavet na indriyam tasmāt na evaṃjātīyakeṣu etat bhavati dṛṣṭāt adṛṣṭa siddhiḥ iti katham tarhi homāt nyāyyam phalam iti ucyate śabdena avagamyate tad phalam yatas phalam iti śabdaḥ āha tatas nyāyyam homāt ca phalam iti śrutyā śabdena gamyate dadhnaḥ phalam iti vākyena śrutiḥ ca vākyāt balīyasī tasmāt homāt phalam iti nyāyyam dadhnaḥ phalam iti ca anyāyyam 
[I,159,i]	api ca dadhi ubhayam asamartham kartum phalam sādhayitum homam ca nanu kambala nirṇejana vat etat bhaviṣyati nirṇejanam hi ubhayam karoti kambala śuddhim pādayoḥ ca nirmala tām na brūmaḥ ekasya ubhayam prayojanam abhiniṣpādayitum sāmarthyam na asti iti kim tarhi phale guṇa bhūtam dadhi home ca iti ekam vākyam vaditum asamartham iti yadi phalam dadhnā kuryāt iti brūyāt na dadhnā homam iti atha dadhnā homam sādhayet iti brūyāt na phalam iti ubhaya vacane bhidyeta vākyam abhinnam ca idam upalabhyate tasmāt na guṇāt phalam iti agni hotra homāt dadhi homaḥ karma antaram iti 
[I,160,i_I,160,ii]	atulya tvāt tu vākyayoḥ guṇe tasya pratīyeta tuśabdāt pakṣaḥ viparivartate na karma antaram kim tu guṇāt phalam iti katham atulye hi ete vākye agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti atra karma samabhivyāhṛtam phalam svarga kāmaḥ homena kuryāt iti dadhnā indriya kāmasya juhuyāt iti guṇa samabhivyāhṛtam na hi atra homaḥ indriyāya kartavyaḥ iti pratīyate kim tarhi dadhnā homaḥ indriya kāmasya iti homasya dadhi saṃbandhaḥ indriyāya na homasya utpattiḥ yaḥ indriya kāmaḥ syāt sa dadhnā homam kuryāt iti katamaḥ atra śabdaḥ puruṣa prayatnasya vaktā iti juhuyāt iti brūmaḥ 
[I,160,iii^1]	nanu śrutyā homa saṃbaddham eṣa puruṣa prayatnam vadati vākyena dadhi saṃbandham na ca vākyam śrutim apabādhitum arhati na ca yugapad ubhaya saṃbandhaḥ na virudhyate vākyam hi tathā bhidyeta iti atra ucyate ye bhavadīyam pakṣam āśrayeran te śrutim apabādheḥ antarām asmadīye tu punar pakṣe juhuyāt iti dhātvarthaḥ kevalaḥ apabādhitaḥ bhavati yuṣmadīye tu kṛtsnaḥ eva dadhnā iti śabdaḥ tam ca apramādyantaḥ samāmanantī iti gamyate na ca etat pramatta gītam iti uktam tulyam hi sāṃpradāyikam iti tasmāt na karma samabhivyāhṛtam phalam guṇa samabhivyāhṛte tu na kaścid pramāda pāṭhaḥ avaśyam hi juhuyāt iti dadhna indriya kāmayoḥ saṃbandha vidhāna artham vaktavyam bhavati nanūcyamāne api na kevalaḥ karoti arthaḥ avagamyate kevale na vacaḥ prayojanam sa ca homa saṃbaddhaḥ tasmāt asamañjasam iti na iti brūmaḥ homa saṃbaddhaḥ api asau karoti arthaḥ eva kevalam tu asya homa saṃbandhe viśeṣaḥ na tu karoti artha tām bādhate indriya kāmasya homa saṃbaddham prayatnam dadhi saṃbaddham kuryāt iti 
[I,160,iii^2]	nanu evam sati saḥ eva doṣaḥ homa samabhivyāhṛtam phalam iti ucyate juhuyāt iti śabdasya etat sāmarthyam yat dhoma viśiṣṭam prayatnam āha na tu atra homaḥ sādhana tvena vidhīyate sādhya tvena viśiṣṭaḥ tu prayatnaḥ vākyena dadhi āśritaḥ avagamyate atas eva ca vṛtti kāreṇa uktam homam āśritaḥ guṇaḥ phalam sādhayiṣyati iti yathā rāja puruṣaḥ rājānam āśritaḥ rāja karma karoti iti tasmāt dadhnaḥ phalam yaḥ indriya kāmaḥ sa dadhnā kuryāt indriyam iti katham iti anayā agnihotra itikartavyatayā iti kutas etat phala sādhanasya dadhnaḥ itikartavya tā kāṅkṣa tvāt asyāḥ ca iti kartavyatāyāḥ sannidhānāt codanā liṅgasya ca juhoti arthasya darśanāt yasmāt eva ca ayam juhoti arthaḥ anuvādaḥ tasmāt avidhāyakaḥ na ca anyat dhomasya vidhāyakam na asti iti tasmāt na karma antaram tasmāt dadhnaḥ phalam iti atha vā dadhi śabdasya vivakṣita artha tvāt dadhi homa saṃbandhaḥ ayam vākyena vidhīyate tena dadhnaḥ homena saṃbadhyamānāt phalam bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,162,i_I,162,ii]	sameṣu karma yuktam syāt trivṛt agniṣṭut agniṣṭomaḥ tasya vāyavyāsu ekaviṃśam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ yajeta iti etasya eva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā paśu kāmaḥ hi etena yajeta iti atra ayam arthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ kim tasya eva agniṣṭutaḥ agniṣṭomasya guṇāt vāravantīyāt paśavaḥ phalam etena yajeta iti anuvādaḥ atha kim etena yajeta iti karma antaram iti kim prāptam na karma antaram guṇāt phalam iti kutas etena yajeta iti viditasya etat vacanam na aviditasya atas na vidhi antaram paśu kāmaḥ evam yajeta iti ucyate na yajeta iti katham kṛtvā vāravantīyam kṛtvā iti api ca etasya eva iti vispaṣṭam akarma antara vacanam tasmāt guṇāt phalam iti evam prāptam 
[I,162,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ sameṣu evaṃjātīyakeṣu bhinna vākyeṣu karma yuktam phalam bhavet etasya eva revatīṣu vāravantīyam kṛtvā iti na hi etasya revatyaḥ santi yāsu asya vāravantīyam bhavet tatra revatyaḥ bhavanti tāsu ca vāravantīyam vidhīyeta iti vākyam bhidyeta atha ucyeta asya pūrvāḥ revatīḥ upādāya tāsu ca vāravantīyam kṛtvā etena yajeta iti anuvadati iti tathā agniṣṭoma sāma iti na avakalpyeta atha agniṣṭoma sāma kārye bhavati iti ucyate etasya eva iti etat avivakṣitam syāt ubhayasmin vivakṣyamāṇe bhidyeta vākyam tasmāt karma antaram 
[I,163,i]	atha karma antare katham avākya bhedaḥ revatīṣu ṛkṣu vāravantīyam sāma kṛtvā paśu kāmaḥ yajeta iti apūrvaḥ yāgaḥ sarvaiḥ viśeṣaṇaiḥ viśiṣṭaḥ vidhīyate tena eka artha tvam vibhāge ca sākāṅkṣa tvam iti eka vākya tvam upapadyate nanu artha bhedaḥ yāgaḥ ca evam hi apūrvaḥ kartavyaḥ revatīṣu vāravantīyam apūrvam iti na iti brūmaḥ nirvṛtta vāravantīyarevatī guṇakaḥ yāgaḥ vidhīyate na vāravantīya nirvṛttiḥ arthāt revatīṣu vāravantīyam abhinirvartsyati śakyate ca tat nirvartayitum ucyate revatīnām vāravantī yasya ca saṃbandhaḥ na vihitaḥ syāt tatra ca revatīṣu anyāni api sāmāni bhaveyuḥ vāravantīyam ca anyāsu api ṛkṣu na eṣa doṣaḥ kṛtvā iti abhinirvṛttaḥ saṃbandhaḥ yāgāya ucyate tena saṃbandhaḥ gamyate dvau api etau arthau kṛtvā iti eṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti vaditum abhinirvṛttim pūrva kāla tām ca yathā śoṇam ānaya iti rakta guṇa saṃbaddhaḥ aśvaḥ śabdena eva ānayataḥ vidhīyate iti na vākya bhedaḥ bhavati evam atra api draṣṭavyam 
[I,163,ii^1]	nanu evam api bahavaḥ arthāḥ revatyaḥ vāravantīyam tad saṃbandhaḥ yāgaḥ paśu kāmaḥ ca iti na eṣa doṣaḥ bahavaḥ śrūyante ekaḥ atra vidhīyate yāgaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ nanu revatyaḥ api vidhīyante vāravantīyam api yadi na vidhīyeran na eva tad viśiṣṭaḥ yāgaḥ pratīyeta na hi avidhāya viśeṣaṇam śakyate viśiṣṭaḥ vidhātum tasmāt bahuṣu vidhīyamāneṣu na aikārthyam atra ucyate arthaḥ iti prayojanam abhidhīyate yāvanti padāni ekam prayojanam abhinirvartyanti tāvanti ekam vākyam na ca atra bahūni prayojanāni na hi atra anekasya abhipretasya anekam padam vidhāyakam asti revatīṣu iti na etat kevalam revatīnām vidhāyakam revatīṣu vāravantīyam iti 
[I,163,ii^2]	atra api pada dvaye vāravantīya śabdaḥ dvitīya antar na asmāt saṃbandhaḥ abhipretaḥ gamyate prātipadikā arthasya avyatirekāt kṛtvā iti api karotiḥ na saṃbandha mātre paryavasitaḥ para prayojana saṃbandham āha evam viśiṣṭaḥ tu yajatiḥ na para arthaḥ tat ekam eṣām padārthānām prayojanam tasmāt eka vākya tvam guṇe punar phale prakalpyamāna agniṣṭoma sāmnaḥ kārye vāravantīyam etasya ca yat agniṣṭoma sāma iti vākya bhedaḥ syāt 
[I,164,i^1]	atha ucyate revati ādi sarva viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ yāgaḥ etasya agniṣṭutaḥ vidhīyeta tathā api paśu kāma saṃbandhāt bhidyeta vākyam atha evam ucyeta revatīṣu kṛtena vārayantīyena paśu kāmaḥ yajeta iti na evam śakyam ṛc antara pragāṇāt viśeṣa hānāt vaiguṇyam syāt nanu idānīm eva uktam śakyate hi revatīṣu vāravantīyam kartum iti sati vacane śakyam asati vacane na vāravantīya grahaṇena gṛhyante vacanam tarhi bhaviṣyati paśu kāmaḥ revatīṣu vāravantīyam abhinirvartayet tatas yajeta iti yajatiḥ anuvādaḥ yadi vacanam revatīṣu vāravantīya saṃbandhasya siddham karma antaram na agniṣṭutaḥ guṇa vidhiḥ 
[I,164,i^2]	nanu tatas yajeta iti yāga anuvādāt yāgena asya aṅga prayojana saṃbandhaḥ bhaviṣyati na evam śakyam yāgam pratyaṅga bhāve vidhīyamāne paśu kāmam pratyasaṃbandhaḥ ubhaya saṃbandhe vākyam bhidyeta atha yāga saṃbandhaḥ anuvādaḥ prakareṇa ca aṅgatā na idam upapannam prakaraṇāt dhi vākyam balavattaram tasmāt karma antaram yāga guṇakam vā revatīṣu vāravantīyam tad guṇakaḥ vā yāgaḥ tatra yāga paśu kāmayoḥ saṃbandhasya vidhātrīm yajateḥ uparitanīm vibhaktim upalabhāmahe liṅgam na tu revatī va āravantīya saṃbandhasya vidhāyakam sākṣāt kiṃcid upalabhyate tasmāt sarva viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭaḥ yāgaḥ paśu kāmasya vidhīyate iti siddham 
[I,165,i]	atha punar viśiṣṭe yāge vidhīyamāne tat revatīṣu vāravantīyam katham agniṣṭoma sāma bhavati iti ucyate vacanāt agniṣṭoma sāmnaḥ kārye bhaviṣyati iti kim iva hi vacanam na kuryāt na asti vacanasya ati bhāraḥ atha yat uktam etasya eva iti anantara apekṣam vacanam iti tatra api avirodhāt etat dharmakasya iti lakṣaṇā śabdaḥ bhaviṣyati tasmāt na guṇāt phalam karma antaram evam dharmakam iti siddham sameṣu evaṃjātīyakeṣu karma yuktam phalam iti 
[I,165,ii_I,165,iii]	saubhare puruṣa śruteḥ nidhanam kāma saṃyogaḥ yaḥ vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ yaḥ annādya kāmaḥ yaḥ svarga kāmaḥ sa saubhareṇa stuvīta sarve vai kāmāḥ saubharaḥ iti samāmnāya tatas samāmananti hīṣiti vṛṣṭi kāmāya nidhanam kuryāt ūrgiti annādya kāmāya ū iti svarga kāmāya iti tatra vicāryate kim saubharam vṛṣṭeḥ nimittam hīḥ iti etat aparam vṛṣṭeḥ nimittam atha saubharam eva vṛṣṭeḥ nimittam yadā tat vṛṣṭeḥ nimittam tadā hīḥ iti saubharasya nidhanam kartavyam iti katham nidhanāt aparam phalam katham vā nidhana vyavasthā artham śravaṇam iti yadi evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate hīḥ iti vṛṣṭi kāmāya kuryāt iti tatas nidhanāt aparam phalam atha evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ hīḥ iti nidhanam kuryāt iti tadā nidhana vyavasthā artham śravaṇam tadā vṛṣṭi kāmāya iti saubhara viśeṣaṇam kriyate na hīṣā saṃbandhaḥ 
[I,166,i]	kim tāvat prāptam saubhare nidhane aparaḥ kāmaḥ vidhīyate iti kutas puruṣa śruteḥ puruṣa prayatnasya atra śravaṇam bhavati kuryāt iti tat vṛṣṭi kāmasya hi iṣaḥ ca saṃbandhe kartavye vaktavyam bhavati na tu saubhara nidhana saṃbandhe tatra hi sāṅgam saubharam kuryāt iti prayoga vacana sāmarthyāt eva siddham tasmāt kuryāt iti puruṣa prayatna vacanāt avagacchāmaḥ yatarasmin pakṣe puruṣa prayatna vacanam arthavat tataraḥ ayam pakṣaḥ iti tatra asmin pakṣe arthavat nidhanāt aparam phalam iti tasmāt saubharaḥ ekaḥ kāmaḥ bhedena nidhanāt api dvitīyaḥ kāmaḥ iti 
[I,166,ii]	atha vā vṛṣṭikāmāya iti puruṣa śrutiḥ vṛṣṭim yaḥ kāmayate sa puruṣaḥ vṛṣṭi kāma śabdena ucyate tat asmin pakṣe śrutiḥ viniyoktrī itarasmin pakṣe punar vṛṣṭi kāma śabdena puruṣa vacanena satā saubharam lakṣyeta tathā lakṣaṇā śabdaḥ syāt śruti lakṣaṇa aviṣaye ca śrutiḥ nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā tasmāt paśyāmaḥ nidhane dvitīyaḥ kāmaḥ iti evam ca phala bhūyaḥ tvam bhaviṣyati tasmāt nidhane aparaḥ kāmaḥ 
[I,166,iii_I,166,iv]	sarvasya ukta kāma tvāt tasmin kāmaśrutiḥ syāt nidhana arthā punar śrutiḥ vāsabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na ca etat asti yat uktam nidhane aparaḥ kāmaḥ iti na evam saṃbandhaḥ kriyate vṛṣṭi kāmāya hīḥ iti kuryāt iti katham tarhi hīḥ iti nidhanam saubharasya iti katham hi iṣaḥ vṛṣṭi kāma saṃbandhe kriyamāṇe nidhanam kuryāt iti saṃbandhaḥ na kṛtaḥ syāt tatra hīḥ iti nidhanam iti na avakalpyeta tatra ubhaya saṃbandhe vākya bhedaḥ tatra nidhana śabdaḥ pramāda samāmnātaḥ iti gamyeta na ca evaṃjātīyakaḥ pramāda samāmnātaḥ iti uktam tasmāt na hi iṣaḥ vṛṣṭi kāmena saṃbandhaḥ tena na nidhanāt aparam phalam 
[I,167,i]	atha hi iṣaḥ nidhana saṃbandhe katham avākya bhedaḥ iti ucyate vṛṣṭi kāmāya saubharam asti eva saubharasya nidhanam asti eva tatra hīḥ iti kuryāt iti eṣaḥ eva arthaḥ vidhīyate tasmāt avākya bhedaḥ iti atas nidhana vyavasthā iti gamyate evam eva ūrc iti ū iti ca vaditavyam sarvasya saubharasya ūrc vṛṣṭi svarga kāma tvāt śakyate kāma vacanaiḥ saubharam lakṣayitum kim artham lakṣyate iti nidhana arthā punar śrutiḥ 
[I,168,i_I,168,ii]	guṇaḥ tu kratu saṃyogāt karma antaram prayojayet saṃyogasya aśeṣa bhū tvāt asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti tam prakṛtya śrūyate yadi rathantara sāmā somaḥ syāt aindra vāyava agrān grahān gṛhṇīyāt yadi bṛhat sāmā śukra agrān yadi gajat sāmā āgrayaṇa agrān iti tatra sandihyate kim graha agra tā viśeṣaḥ jyotiṣṭomasya vidhīyate uta karma antarasya rathantara sāmnaḥ bṛhatsāmnaḥ ca iti yadi rathantara sāma grahaṇena bṛhat sāma grahaṇena ca jyotiṣṭomaḥ abhidhīyate tatas tasya graha agra tā viśeṣaḥ atha na abhidhīyate tatas karma antarasya iti 
[I,168,iii^1]	kim tāvat prāptam prakaraṇāt jyotiṣṭomasya iti prāpte ucyate guṇaḥ tu kratu saṃyogāt iti tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na etat asti jyotiṣṭomasya iti kutas kratu saṃyogāt katham tarhi karma antarasya iti nanu jyotiṣṭoma kratoḥ eva eṣa evaṃjātīyakaḥ vādaḥ rathantara sāmā bṛhatsāma iti na iti brūmaḥ yadi na kṛtsna kratu saṃyogaḥ bhavet jyotiṣṭomasya vādaḥ kṛtsna kratu saṃyogaḥ tu eṣaḥ katham kṛtsna kratu saṃyogaḥ bhavati katham vā na kṛtsna kratu saṃyogaḥ iti yadi rathantara sattā vā bṛhat sattā vā nimittam graha agra tā viśeṣasya tatas na kṛtsna kratu saṃyogaḥ rathantaram bṛhat vā yadi sāma asti tatas aindra vāyava agra tā śukra agra tā ca iti tatas jyotiṣṭomasya guṇa vidhiḥ 
[I,168,iii^2]	atha rathantara sāma sattāḥ bṛhat sāmasattā vā na nimittam tatas kṛtsna kratu saṃyogaḥ yadi rathantara sāma iti kaḥ arthaḥ ayam arthaḥ yadi rathantara sāma asya viśeṣaṇam kratoḥ iti kutas etat samāsapada sāmarthyāt samarthānām hi padānām samāsaḥ bhavati sāmarthyam ca bhavati viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāve asādhāraṇam ca bhavati viśeṣaṇam tatra ayam arthaḥ yadi rathantaram eva sāma bṛhat eva vā na anyat iti jyotiṣṭomasya ca bahūni sāmāni gāyatra ādīni tasmāt na jyotiṣṭomasya vācakau etau śabdau iti tena yadi api prakaraṇāt jyotiṣṭomasya guṇa vidhiḥ iti gamyate tathā api tat bādhitvā vākyena rathantara sāmnaḥ bṛhatsāmnaḥ ca bhavitum arhati 
[I,169,i]	nanu yathā jyotiṣṭomaḥ na rathantara sāmā evam anyaḥ api na rathantara sāmā kaścid asti ucyate karma antaram rathantara sāmakam kalpayiṣyati etat vākyam yadi rathantara sāmā somaḥ syāt iti nanu na asti atra vidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ ucyate asti yaḥ eṣaḥ syāt iti āha na eṣa vidhātum śaknoti yadi śabda saṃbandhāt vidyamānasya nimitta arthena evaṃjātīyakaḥ śabdaḥ bhavati na vidhāna arthena iti atra brūmaḥ yat etat sayadikam vākyam yadi rathanatara sāmā somaḥ syāt iti atra avāntara vākyam asti rathantara sāmā somaḥ syāt iti yat avāntara vākyam tasya anyaḥ arthaḥ anyaḥ ca sayadikasya sayadikaḥ na śaknoti vidhātum yatas avāntara vākyam tat vidhāsyati na ca rathantara sāmnaḥ bṛhat sāmnaḥ vā bhāvaḥ nimitta tvena śrūyamāṇaḥ api arthavān bhavati tasmāt avivakṣitaḥ yadi saṃbandhaḥ tasmin ca avivakṣite pada dvayam idam rathantara sāmā somaḥ syāt iti śaknoti rathantara sāmānam kratum vidhātum yadi iti anarthakam 
[I,169,ii]	atha vā yadi roceta iti adhyāhāraḥ atha vā yathā etat bhavati payasā ṣāṣṭikam bhuñjīta yadi śālim bhuñjīta tatra dadhi upasiñcet iti evaṃjātīyakena vākyena śāli bhojanam vihitam bhavati evam atra api vihitam draṣṭavyam yadi rathantara sāmā somaḥ syāt aindra vāyava agrān grahān gṛhṇīyāt iti katham punar śāli bhojanam tena vākyena vihitam bhavati iti ucyate vyatyāsena saṃbandhaḥ kalpyeta yadi dadhi upasecanam icchet śālim bhuñjīta iti 
[I,170,i]	nanu na khalu icchateḥ parām liṅvi bhaktim upalabhāmahe siñcateḥ hi tām parām samāmnanti iti siñcateḥ khalu sā parā samuccarantī kameḥ artham gamayati kāma pravedane hi tām manyāmahe iti evam iha api yadi aindra vāyava agrān grahān gṛhṇīyāt iti grahītum icchet iti arthaḥ tatas rathanatara sāmānam kratum kuryāt iti nanu evam sati icchā mātram bhavet na graha agra tvi śeṣa vidhānam ucyate yathā asmin laukike vākye yadi dadhi upasecanam icchet śālim bhuñjīta iti dadhi upasecana saṃkīrtanāt dadhi upasiktam śālim bhuñjīta iti tena eka vākya tvāt gamyate evam atra api graha agra tā viśeṣa saṅkīrtanāt tena eka vākya tvāt graha agra tā viśiṣṭaḥ rathantara sāmā gamyate atha vā atra hetu hetumatoḥ liṅ rathantara sāmā somaḥ aindra vāyava agrāṇām grahāṇām hetuḥ kartavyaḥ iti tasmāt kṛtsna kratu saṃyogāt guṇaḥ karma antaram prayojayet evam kṛtsna kratu saṃyogaḥ arthavān bhaviṣyati 
[I,170,ii]	api ca pūrveṇa nimittena bhavitavyam pareṇa naimittikena katham sati hi nimitte naimittikam bhavitum arhati na asati yat ca bhaviṣyat tat na sat bhaviṣyat ca rathantara sāma tat katham pūrva kālasya graha agra tā viśeṣasya nimittam bhaviṣyati iti api ca niḥsandigdham jagat sāmā karma antaram tad sāmānyāt itarat api karma antaram iti gamyate tasmāt na jyotiṣṭomasya guṇa vidhānam iti 
[I,171,i_I,171,ii]	ekasya tu liṅga bhedāt prayojana artham ucyeta eka tvam guṇa vākya tvāt tuśabdāt pakṣaḥ anyathā bhavati na etat asti yat uktam kratu antaram iti katham tarhi jyotiṣṭomasya eva graha agra tā viśeṣaḥ iti kutas prakaraṇa sāmarthyāt nanu etat uktam vākya sāmarthyāt kratu antarasya rathantara sāmnaḥ bṛhatsāmnaḥ ca iti parihṛtam etat jyotiṣṭomaḥ eva rathantara sāmā bṛhatsāmā ca iti punar dūṣitam aneka sāma tvāt jyotiṣṭomasya viśeṣaṇam rathantareṇa bṛhatā vā na prakalpate iti tat ucyate prakalpate viśeṣaṇam bṛhat rathantarayoḥ vaikalpika tvāt bhavati sa prayogaḥ yatra rathantaram na asti bhavati ca sa prayogaḥ vidyamāna rathantara sāmakaḥ tat etat rathantaram sattayā eva asādhāraṇa tvāt viśeṣakam tasmāt jyotiṣṭomaḥ eva rathanatara sāmā bṛhatsāmā ca iti 
[I,171,iii]	atha yat uktam pūrveṇa nimittena bhavitavyam uttareṇa naimittikena iti na etat niyogataḥ bhavati hi bhaviṣyat api nimittam yathā varṣiṣyati iti kṛṣi gṛha karma anuṣṭhānam api ca tat dṛṣṭam idam ca vācanikam nimittam tat yathāvacanam bhavitum arhati syāt iti ca iyam liṅ triṣu api kāleṣu bhavati tasmāt bhaviṣyat api nimittam yat tu jagat sāma iti karma antaram tad sāmānyāt rathantara sāma api karma antaram iti jagat sāma asaṃbhavāt karma antaram saṃbhavati rathantara sāmnaḥ bṛhatsāmnaḥ ca jyotiṣṭomasya abhidhānam tasmāt na karma antaram iti 
[I,172,i_I,172,ii]	aveṣṭau yajña saṃyogāt kratu pradhānam ucyate sati rājasūyaḥ rājā rājasūyena svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta iti tam prakṛtyām ananti aveṣṭim nāma iṣṭim āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ hiraṇyam dakṣiṇā iti evamādi tām prakṛtya vidhīyate yadi brāhmaṇaḥ yajeta bārhaspatyam madhye nidhāya āhutim āhutim hutvā abhighārayet yadi rājanya aindram yadi vaiśyaḥ vaiśvadevam iti tatra sandihyate kim brāhmaṇa ādīnām prāptānām nimitta arthena śravaṇam uta brāhmaṇa ādīnām ayam yāgaḥ vidhīyate iti katham nimitta artha tā bhavet katham vā yāga vidhānam iti yadi rāja śabdaḥ brāhmaṇa ādiṣu api kenacid prakāreṇa tatas nimitta artha tā atha kṣatriyaḥ eva tatas prāpakāṇi evaṃjātīyakāni śravaṇāni 
[I,172,iii]	kim tāvat prāptam nimitta artha tā iti tatas evam tāvat upavarṇyate yaugikaḥ rāja śabdaḥ iti rājyam yasya karma sa rājā kim punā rāja karma janapada pura parirakṣaṇe tatas ca uddharaṇe rājya śabdam ārya āvarta nivāsinaḥ prayuñjante rājñaḥ karma rājyam iti ca abhiyuktāḥ upadiśanti tena manyāmahe yasya etat karma sa rājā iti yathā yaḥ udamegham nāma kaṃcid puruṣam na āvediṣuḥ tasya tu putram auda meghiḥ iti evam viduḥ śaknuyuḥ te yaḥ tasya pitā saḥ udameghaḥ iti kalpayitum uda megha putrasya evam samabhivyāhāraḥ bhavati iti evam rājya yogāt rāja śabdaḥ iti vijñāyate 
[I,172,iv]	nanu janapada pura parirakṣaṇa vṛttim anupajīvati api kṣatriye rāja śabdam āndhrāḥ prayuñjante prayoktāraḥ na brūmaḥ na prayuñjate iti kim tarhi karma viśeṣa nimitta tvāt rāja śabdasya tad yogāt api rāja śabdaḥ bhavati iti etat upapādayāmaḥ prayuñjate ca tat yukte rāja śabdam akṣatriye api tat asmin upapanne prakaraṇa vaśāt yadi śabda samabhivyāhārāt ca rājasūyasya eva guṇa vidhānam bhaviṣyati na brāhmaṇasya vaiśyasya ca karma antaram vidhāyiṣyati iti 
[I,173,i]	atha vāsāru alaukikasya prayogasya sārvalaukikena prayogeṇa virudhyamānasya aprāmāṇyam syāt abhyupagacchanti hi te janapadinaḥ sārvabhaumam prayogam api ca avipragītāḥ laukikāḥ arthāḥ vipra gītebhyaḥ pratyayitatarāḥ bhavanti tathā āryāvarta nivāsinām śabda artha upāyeṣu abhiyuktānām abhivyāharatām karmāṇi ca anutiṣṭhatām antya janapada vāsibhyaḥ mlecchebhyaḥ samīcīnataraḥ ācāraḥ bhavati tasmāt yaugikaḥ rāja śabdaḥ nimitta arthāni śravaṇāni rājasūyasya guṇa vidhiḥ na karma antaram iti 
[I,173,ii^1]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ aveṣṭau tu khalu kratu pradhānam brāhmaṇa ādi śravaṇam brāhmaṇa ādīnām aveṣṭi yāgam vidhātum na nimitta artham kutas aprāpta tvāt brāhmaṇa vaiśyayoḥ katham aprāptiḥ kṣatriyasya rājasūya vidhānāt rājā rājasūyena yajeta iti nanu uktam yaugikaḥ rāja śabdaḥ iti etat api ayuktam yatas jāti vacanaḥ iti nanu ubhaya abhidhāne yadi śabda saṃbandhāt prakaraṇāt ca na karma antara vidhānam nyāyyam iti uktam atra ucyate na ubhaya abhidhānam avakalpate kutas yadi tāvat jāti śabdaḥ rājā iti tatas tad karma tvāt janapada paripālane rājya śabdaḥ bhaviṣyati tena āryāvarta nivāsinām prayogaḥ na virotsyate 
[I,173,ii^2]	atha yadi rājya śabdaḥ paripālane nitya saṃbaddhaḥ bhaviṣyati tatas tasya kartā iti rāja śabdaḥ kṣatriya jātau tad nimittaḥ bhaviṣyati tatra andhrāṇām prayogaḥ na virotsyate tasmāt na prayoga darśanāt ubhau api rāja rājya śabdau jāti paripālanābhyām nitya saṃbaddhau iti abhyupagantavyam kaḥ nu khalu nirṇayaḥ rāja jātīyasya karma iti atas paripālanam rājya śabdena ucyate evam hi smarantaḥ abhiyuktāḥ tasya karma iti ṣyan pratyayam vidadhati na tu tasya kartā iti pratyaya lopam vā prātipadika pratyāpattim vā samāmananti tasmāt rājñaḥ karma rājyam na rājyasya kartā rājā 
[I,174,i]	nanu yaḥ yaḥ janapada pura parirakṣaṇam karoti tam tu lokaḥ rāja śabdena abhivadati ucyate yogāt lokaḥ prayuṅkte paripālane rājya śabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ iti sa tu paripālane rājya śabdaḥ rāja yogāt iti asmābhiḥ uktam tasmāt rāja śabdaḥ prasiddheḥ mūlam tad yogāt rājya śabdaḥ tad ayogāt api brāhmaṇa vaiśyayaḥ rāja śabdaḥ prayujyate na tu evam smaranti rājya yogāt rājā iti 
[I,174,ii^1]	yat tu uktam anumānāt rājyasya kartā yaḥ sa rājā yathā auda megheḥ pitā uda meghaḥ iti ucyate anumānāt prayogaḥ balavān rājyasya kartāram rājā iti anumimīmahe kṣatriye tu pratyakṣam prayuñjānān upalabhāmahe tathā yogam api anumimīmahe rājyasya kartā rājā iti rājñaḥ karma rājyam iti tu smaranti anumimānāḥ ca smṛtim anumimate sma smarantaḥ tu pratyakṣam upalabhante tena tatra smṛtiḥ balīyasi iti āha yaḥ yaḥ rājyam karoti tatra rāja śabdam prayuñjate na yat rājñaḥ karma tat rājyam iti tena manyāmahe rājya yogaḥ rāja śada pravṛttau nimittam na tu rājayogaḥ rājya śabda pravṛttau iti na brūmaḥ prayogāt vayam rājayogam rājya śabda pravṛttau nimittam avagacchāmaḥ iti katham tarhi smaraṇāt prayogāt ca smṛtiḥ balīyasī prayogāt dhi smṛtiḥ anumīyeta 
[I,174,ii^2]	api ca rājya yogasya nimitta tā vyabhicarati janapada paripālanam akurvati api rājā iti āndhrāḥ vadanti iti uktam nanu rāja yogāt rājyam iti etat api vyabhicarati na hi rājñaḥ syanditam nimiṣitam ca sarvam rājyam iti ucyate yadi vayam prayogāt nimitta bhāvam brūyām tatas evam upālabhyemahi smṛtyā tu vayam nimitta bhāvam brūmaḥ tena yat yat rāja jātīyasya karma jātyā viśeṣyate tat rājyam iti abhyupagacchāmaḥ yat tu uktam āndhrāḥ api rājya yogāt rājānam abhyupagacchanti iti parihṛtam etat prayogaḥ durbalaḥ smṛteḥ iti yat uktam āryāvarta nivāsinaḥ pramāṇam itarebhyaḥ ācārebhyaḥ iti tulyaḥ śabda prayogaḥ ācāreṣu iti uktam tasmāt jāti nimittaḥ rāja śabdaḥ evam ced yajña saṃyogāt kṣatriyasya rājasūyena yāga vidhiḥ aveṣṭiḥ iti 
[I,175,i_I,175,ii]	ādhāne sarva śeṣa tvāt idam samāmananti vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta grīṣme rāji anyaḥ śaradi vaiśyaḥ iti tatra sandihyate kim brāhmaṇa ādi śravaṇam nimitta artham brāhmaṇa ādayaḥ ādadhānāḥ vasanta ādiṣu ādadhīran iti uta brāhmaṇa ādīnām ādhānam vidhīyate iti katham nimitta artha tā syāt katham ca ādhāna vidhānam iti yadi brāhmaṇaḥ vasantaḥ iti pada dvayam parasparam saṃbaddham tatas nimitta artham śravaṇam atha brāhmaṇaḥ ādadhīta iti ādhāna vidhānam brāhmaṇasya evam rājani ādiṣu api 
[I,175,iii^1]	kim tāvat prāptam nimitta artham śravaṇam iti kutas nimitta sarūpāḥ ete śabdāḥ kim nimitta sārūpyam brāhmaṇa ādīnām vasanta ādibhiḥ samuccāraṇam tat ca aviditam vedyate iti nanu brāhmaṇa ādīnām ādadhati na api asti samuccāraṇam vāḍham asti samuccāraṇam na tu amīṣām ādhāna saṃbandhaḥ na viditaḥ kena prāptaḥ viditaḥ iti kāmaśrutibhiḥ kāḥ kāmaśrutayaḥ agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti evamādayaḥ katham ābhiḥ śrutibhiḥ ādhānam prāptam iti ucyate sāmarthyāt yathā agnihotram abhinirvartyate tathā kuryāt yathā darśa pūrṇamāsau abhinirvartyete tathā kuryāt
