[I,175,iii^2]	na ca gārhapatya āhavanīyān vāhārya pacana ādibhyaḥ vinā etāni karmāṇi sidhyanti samāmananti hi yat āhavanīye juhoti tena saḥ asya abhīṣṭaḥ prītaḥ bhavati iti evamādi tena sāmarthyāt etat uktam bhavati āhavanīya ādi kartavyam iti tat ca ādhānena vinā na sidhyati iti ādhānam api kartavyam iti avagamyate tat kena kartavyam yasya kāmaśrutayaḥ tāḥ ca aviṣeśeṇa brāhmaṇa ādīnām tasmāt amīṣām ādhāna saṃbandhaḥ viditaḥ iti api ca ubhābhyām brāhmaṇa ādīnām saṃbandhe vidhīyamāne vākyam bhidyeta na hi tadānīm ekaḥ arthaḥ vidhīyate atas nimitta arthāḥ śrutayaḥ iti evam prāptam 
[I,176,i^1]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ ādhāne sarva śeṣa tvāt prāpakāṇi ādhānasya etāni śravaṇāni kutas sarva karmaṇām śeṣa bhūtam ādhānam iti na śruti liṅga ādīnām anyatamena ucyate kim tarhi agnīnām sarva śeṣa tvāt tad śeṣa tvāt ca ādhānasya kim atas yadi evam agnayaḥ kāma śrutibhiḥ prāpnuvanti nādhānm iti nanu agnīnām abhyupāyaḥ ādhānam iti ucyate na eteṣām arjane ādhānam eva ekaḥ abhyupāyaḥ kim tarhi yathā anyeṣām dravyāṇām utpādane krayaṇa ādayaḥ ca abhyupāyāḥ evam agnīnām api iti na niyogataḥ utpādanam eva tena pakṣe ādhānam prāpnoti pakṣe na 
[I,176,i^2]	yatarasmin pakṣe aprāptiḥ tataraḥ pakṣaḥ utpattim prayojayiṣyati brāhmaṇa ādīnām ādhānasya brāhmaṇaḥ ātma artham ādadhīta iti yadā etat vacanam tad ātma artham eva āhitāḥ āhavanīya ādayaḥ bhavanti na anyathā evam ca sati na kṛtrimeṇa yācitena vā karmāṇi agni hotra ādīni anuṣṭhātavyāni iti gamyate tena akṛtrimaḥ eva kevalaḥ agniḥ teṣām sādhakaḥ iti niścīyate katham ca ātmā artha tā dhānasya gamyate iti kartṛ abhiprāye hi kriyā phalaḥ āt adhīta iti etat ātmanepadam saṃbhavati asati asmin vacane kāma śruti parigrahe na ādhānasya ātma artha tā bhavet 
[I,177,i]	api ca satīṣu etāsu ādhāna śrutiṣu na kāmaśrutayaḥ śaknuvanti aparām ādhāna śrutim kalpayitum yathā prāptasya ādhānasya punar śrutayaḥ etāḥ bhaveyuḥ asatīṣu etāsu ādhāna śrutim aparigṛhṇantaḥ kāmaśrutayaḥ aśakyān agnihotra ādīn vadanti iti parigṛhṇīyuḥ ādhāna śrutim satīṣu etāsu yeṣām ādhānam uktam tān adhikṛtya uttara kālāḥ kāma śrutayaḥ bhavanti iti gamyate 
[I,177,ii_I,177,iii]	atra āha asti kevalasya ādhānasya vidhāyikā śrutiḥ evam sapatnam bhrātṛvyam avarti sahate yaḥ evam vidvān agnim ādhattaḥ iti tayā prāptasya nimitta arthāni brāhmaṇa ādīnām śravaṇāni bhaviṣyanti ucyate saṃbhāra vidhāna arthā punar śrutiḥ eṣā na iti brūmaḥ bhinnam hi idam vākyam saṃbhāra vidhāna vākyāt anyaḥ hi arthaḥ ādhattaḥ iti anyaḥ apaḥ upasṛjati iti eka artha vidhāne hi ekam vākyam bhavati bhinnau ca imau arthau tasmāt atra vākya bhedaḥ iti 
[I,177,iv^1]	ucyate vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti asyām śrutau satyām punar śrutiḥ kevalasya ādhānasya avidhāyikā apām upasarjanam tu vidhīyate tat ekasmin arthe vidhīyamāne na aneka artham bhavati nanu ādhānasya etat vidhānam guṇa arthā sā punar śrutiḥ na iti brūmaḥ sā brāhmaṇa ādi saṃbaddhā prathamā śrutiḥ iyam kevalā punar śrutiḥ kutas sā hi śabdena vidadhāti tatra liṅgam uccarantīm paśyāmaḥ iyam praśastam ādhānam iti āha tatas praśasta tām ādhānasya anumanyāmahe 
[I,177,iv^2]	evam ca vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti eṣā vidhāyikā śrutiḥ iti brūmahe na etat praśaṃsā vacanam asmat pakṣam bādhate śakyate hi anyena vihitam anyena praśastam iti vaditum yadi tu etat vidhāyakam iti ucyate tatas asmad pakṣam virudhyeta katham ajñātasya jñāpanam vidhānam etat yadi prāśaṃsā vacanena apūrvam vijñāpyeta tadā liṅgāḥ na apūrvam jñāpitam bhavet tatra apūrvajñāpana vacanaḥ śabdaḥ uparudhyeta na tu liṅgāḥ vihite praśaṃsā vacanam uparudhyate vihite api hi vākya antareṇa praśaṃsā vacanam avakalpate api ca yat liṅgāḥ vidhānam tat śrutyā vākyena tu praśaṃsā gamyate śrutiḥ ca vākyāt balīyasī 
[I,178,i_I,178,ii]	nanu idam api vākyam brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti ucyate sva padārtham atra śrutiḥ vidadhāti ādhānam brāhmaṇa ādi saṃbandhena para padārtham praśaṃsati yaḥ evam sapatnam bhrātṛvyam avarti sahate iti nanu aneka guṇa vidhānam tvayā vākyena adhyavasitam bhavati na eṣa doṣaḥ aguṇa vidhi pare hi vākye bhavati aneka guṇa vidhānam iti uktam tad guṇāḥ tu vidhīyeran avibhāgāt vidha arthe na ced anyena śiṣṭāḥ iti tasmāt brāhmaṇa ādi saṃyuktā vidhāyikā śrutiḥ iyam api kevalasya ādhānasya punar śrutiḥ saṃbhāra vidhānam upakramitum iti siddham yat uktam aneka guṇa vidhāne vākyam bhidyeta iti yadi imau guṇa vidhāna viśiṣṭau vidhīyeyātām bhavet vākya bhedaḥ dvābhyām tu viśeṣaṇābhyām viśiṣṭam ekam ādhānam vidhāyiṣyate tena na bhaviṣyati vākya bhedaḥ tasmāt brāhmaṇa ādīnām ādhānasya prāpakāṇi śravaṇāni iti siddham 
[I,179,i_I,179,ii]	ayaneṣu codana antaram saṃjñā upabandhāt darśa pūṇa māsau prakṛtyām ananti dākṣāyaṇa yajñena yajeta prajā kāmaḥ sa akaṃprasthāpyena yajeta paśu kāmaḥ saṃkrama yajñena yajeta annādya kāmaḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ eva guṇāt phalam uta karma antaram evaṃjātīyakam iti kim prāptam karma antaram iti kutas saṃjñā upabandhāt yadi api prakaraṇāt yajati śabdāt ca saḥ eva pūrva prakṛtaḥ yāgaḥ iti gamyate tathā api na asau evaṃsaṃjñakaḥ iti yāga antaram vidheyam gamyate 
[I,179,iii_I,179,iv]	aguṇāt ca karma codanā na ca atra guṇaḥ uparudhyate kaścid yat vidhāna arthā codanā bhavet yadi ca na yāga antaram ānarthakyam eva api ca yadi guṇaḥ upabadhyeta tatas yāga guṇa saṃbandhaḥ gamyate iti tat anuṣṭhānam vidhīyeta iti ananubadhyamāne yāga mātram gamyate iti tat anuṣṭhānam vihitam gamyate 
[I,179,v_I,179,vi]	samāptam ca phale vākyam itas ca karma antaram katham phale samāptam vākyam prājā kāmaḥ yajeta iti prajā kāmasya yāgaḥ upayaḥ vidhīyate vidhīyate ced karma antaram 
[I,180,i_I,180,ii]	vikāraḥ vā prakaraṇāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ eva adhikāraḥ evaṃjātīyakaḥ syāt dākṣāyaṇa yajña ādiḥ evam prakaraṇam anugṛhītam bhavati 
[I,180,iii_I,180,iv]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam api etam artham darśayati triṃśatam varṣāṇi darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta yadi dākṣāyaṇa yājī syāt atho api pañcadaśa eva varṣāṇi yajeta atra hi eva sā saṃpadyate dve hi paurṇamāsyau yajeta dve amāvasye atra hi eva khalu sā saṃpad bhavati iti yadi dākṣāyaṇa yajñaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau eva evam tarhi triṃśat saṃpadā prayojanam tatas tasya triṃśat saṃpad anugrahaḥ yujyate tasmāt api na karma antaram 
[I,180,v_I,180,vi]	guṇāt saṃjñā upabandhaḥ yat uktam saṃjñā upabandhāt karma antaram iti yadi dākṣāyaṇa śabdaḥ na kenacid api prakāreṇa darśa pūrṇamāsa vacanaḥ śakyate kalpayitum tatas ucyeta karma antaram iti śaknoti tu āvṛtti guṇa saṃbandhāt viditum ayanam iti āvṛttiḥ ucyate dakṣasya ime dākṣāḥ teṣām ayanam dākṣāyaṇam kaḥ punar dakṣaḥ utsāhī tathā sa akaṃprasthāpye api saha prasthānam guṇa saṃbandhaḥ evam sarvatra śakyate ced darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ guṇa saṃbandhaḥ vaditum kim iti saḥ eva yāgaḥ pratīyamānaḥ anyaḥ iti ucyate kim iti vā prakaraṇam bādhyate 
[I,180,vii_I,180,viii]	samāptiḥ aviśiṣṭā yat uktam phale vākyam samāptam prajā kāma ādeḥ yāga anuṣṭhānam vidhīyate iti na evam aviśiṣṭā phale samāptiḥ yāni anyāni mukta saṃśayāni guṇe phalasya vidhāyakāni vākyāni guṇasya phala vacanāni paryavasitāni taiḥ etat aviśiṣṭam atra api hi guṇāt phalam ucyate katham na etat evam saṃbadhyate prajā kāmasya yajñam anutiṣṭhet iti katham tarhi prajā kāmasya āvṛtti yajñam anutiṣṭhet iti āvṛtti yajñaḥ iti yajñāvṛtti saṃbandhaḥ anuṣṭhātavyaḥ nirdiśyate na yajñaḥ tasmāt prakṛtayoḥ darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ guṇāt phalam ucyate na yāga antaram vidhīyate iti evam sa akaṃprasthāpye saṃkrama yajñe ca draṣṭavyam iti 
[I,181,i_I,181,ii]	saṃskāraḥ ca aprakaraṇe akarma śabda tvāt anārabhyādhīyate kiṃcid vākyam śvetam ālabheta bhūti kāmaḥ sauryam carum nirvapet brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ api āmananti īṣām ālabheta caturaḥ muṣṭīn nirvapati iti tatra ayam arthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ kim darśa pūrṇamāsike ālambhe ālambhaḥ guṇa vidhiḥ darśa pūrṇamāsike ca nirvāpe nirvāpaḥ guṇa vidhiḥ uta na prakṛtim apekṣate itaraḥ cetavaraḥ ca iti yadā na prakṛtim apekṣate tadā api kim yāvat ukte uta yajimati ete karmaṇi iti 
[I,181,iii]	kim tāvat prāptam prakṛtayoḥ ālambha nirvāpayoḥ guṇavidhi iti kutas akarma śabda tvāt na atra karmaṇaḥ vidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ asti nanu ālabheta nirvapet iti ca na etau vidhātārau aviditasya arthasya vaktā vidhāyakaḥ bhavati na ca etayoḥ aviditaḥ arthaḥ ālambhaḥ kartavyaḥ nirvāpaḥ kartavyaḥ iti tasmāt anuvaditārau kim artham anuvadataḥ ālambhane śvetam vidhātum nirvāpe ca carum tasmāt na ālambha antaram nirvāpa antaram ca prakṛtayoḥ eva guṇavidhi iti 
[I,182,i_I,182,ii^1]	yāvat uktam vā karmaṇaḥ śruti mūla tvāt na ca etat asti prākṛtayoḥ guṇavidhi iti kim tarhi ālambha antaram vidhīyate iti nirvāpa antaram ca yadi ālambha nirvāpau vidhīyete tatas na prākṛtau tau vihitau yadi na vidhīyete tatas prākṛtau lakṣyete yau ālambha nirvāpau kartavyau iti tatas tau lakṣayitvā śvetaḥ vidhātavyaḥ bhavati caruḥ ca tau ca bhūti kāmasya brahmavarcasa kāmasya ca iti dvau api athāḥ vidheyau syātām tatra vākyam bhidyeta atha vā yaḥ asau vidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ sa lakṣayitavya upayuktaḥ iti vidhāyaka abhāvāt ekaḥ api arthaḥ na śakyate vidhātum 
[I,182,ii^2]	atha saḥ eva lakṣayiṣyati tena eva ca vidhāyiṣyate guṇaḥ iti na mithas vidhāna lakṣaṇa saṃbandhaḥ avakalpate atha dhātu arthaḥ anuvādaḥ pratyayaḥ vidhātum iṣyate iti ucyate yaḥ ālambhaḥ saḥ etad guṇaḥ kartavyaḥ iti tathā api na prākṛtaḥ lakṣyeta laukikaḥ api hi ālambhaḥ asti pratyaya arthe anūdyamāne prākṛtaḥ anūdyeta iti sa hi kartavyaḥ nirjñātaḥ na laukikaḥ atas na prākṛta anuvādaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti yāvat uktam ālambha mātram nirvāpa mātram ca apūrvam kartavyam karmaṇaḥ śruti mūla tvāt śruti mūlam hi karma iti uktam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti tasmāt karma antare 
[I,183,i_I,183,ii]	yajatiḥ tu dravya phala bhoktṛ saṃyogāt eteṣām karma saṃbandhāt yat uktam na prākṛtayoḥ guṇavidhi iti etat gṛhṇīmaḥ yat tu uktam ālambha mātram vidhīyate nirvāpa mātram iti etat apajānīmahe yajimatī ete karmaṇi iti kutas dravya phala bhoktṛ saṃyogāt dravya devatā saṃyogaḥ atra vidhīyate bhūti kāmasya brahmavarcaskām asya ca katham na hi idam eva ucyate tatas śvetam ālabheta iti yadi hi etāvat eva ucyeta tatas śveta ālambha saṃbandhaḥ avagamyate iha hi śvetam vāyavyam ālabheta iti ucyate tena śveta vāyavya saṃbandhaḥ vidhīyate yathā paṭam vaya iti paṭa vayana saṃbandhaḥ vidheyaḥ avagamyate paṭam dīrgham vaya iti paṭasya dīrgha tā vidhīyate dīrgha śabda prayogāt evam iha api saurya vāyavya śabda prayogāt dravya devatā abhisaṃbandhaḥ vidheyaḥ iti gamyate itarathā devatā śabdaḥ pramāda samāmnātaḥ iti gamyate 
[I,183,v]	nanu atra api śvetam vāyavyam kuryāt tam ca ālabheta iti artha dvaya vidhānāt bhidyeta eva vākyam na iti brūmaḥ na hi ālabheta iti asya ayam ati bhāraḥ yat dravya devatā saṃbandhena puruṣa prayatnam brūyāt tam ca ālabheta iti artha viśiṣṭam śrutyā eva hi puruṣa prayatnaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ gamyate vākyena ca dravya devatā āśrayaḥ iti na atra dvābhyām vākyābhyām prayojanam yathā raktam aśvam yojaya iti yadā guṇa vidhi param bhavati vākyam tadā dvābhyām vākyābhyām prayojanam guṇa dvaya vidhāne atha śoṇam ānayā iti ucyate tatra guṇa vidhi pare api vākye paryavasitaḥ eva guṇa dvaya vidhānam śrutyā eva viśiṣṭa guṇa dravyasya pratīta tvāt na bhavati ekasya vākyasya ati bhāraḥ evam iha api iti saṃbandhaḥ ca bahubhiḥ padaiḥ viśiṣṭaḥ ekaḥ eva ucyate iti eka artha tvam vibhajyamānāni ca atra padāni sa ākāṅkṣāṇi iti upapannam eka vākya tvam na ca yāgam antareṇa devatāyai dravyam saṅkalpitavyam iti eṣa saṃbandhaḥ avakalpate tasmāt yajimatī ete karmaṇi iti 
[I,184,i_I,184,ii]	liṅga adarśanāt ca liṅgam khalu api etam artham darśayati saumāraudram carum nirvapet iti prakṛtya pariśrite yājayet iti pariśrayaṇa vidhiḥ etasya vākye yajati śabdena saṅkīrtanam avakalpate yadi yajimatī ete karmaṇī atha prakṛtau guṇa vidhānam yāvat uktam vā yajati śabdena anuvādaḥ na avakalpeta tasmāt avagacchāmaḥ yajimati iti 
[I,184,iii_I,184,iv^1]	viśaye prāya darśanāt kim iha udāharaṇam na tāvat śūtreṇa eva parigṛhītam yathā aveṣṭau yajña saṃyogāt kratu pradhānam ucyate iti na api ca sādhyam pratijñātam yathā ayaneṣu codanā antaram iti kevalam viśaye saṃśaye prāya darśanam hetuḥ iti nirdiśyate kasya ayam hetuḥ iti na vijānīmaḥ prakṛtam yajimat etat karma iti tat api na saṃbandhyamānam iva paśyāmaḥ tat etat agamakam sūtram eva tāvat anarthakam atha kā atra pratijñā kaḥ ca sandehaḥ iti vaktavyam vṛtti kāra vacanāt pratijñām saṃśayam ca avagacchāmaḥ atra bhagavān ācāryaḥ idam udāhṛtya vatsam ālabheta vatsa nikāntā hi paśavaḥ iti imam saṃśayam upanyasyati sma kim yajimat abhidhānaḥ eṣaḥ ālabhatiḥ uta ālambha mātra vacanaḥ iti upapadyate ca etat udāharaṇam saṃśayaḥ ca 
[I,184,iv^2]	tatra ca pūrva pakṣam pratijānīte sma yajimat abhidhānaḥ iti idam tu pratyudāharaṇa sūtram pūrvasya adhikaraṇasya na atra pūrva pakṣeṇa atīva prayojanam tathā api puruṣāṇām uccāvaca buddhi viśeṣān ālocya bhavati mandānām sāmānyatodṛṣṭena api āśaṅkā sā api nivartanīyā na hi manda viṣeṇa vṛścikena api daṣṭaḥ mriyeta na jātucit kadāpi tatra cikitsā na ādareṇa kartavyā bhavet atas tām nivartayitum pūrva pakṣam upanyasyati sma ālabhatiḥ asmābhiḥ prāṇi saṃyuktaḥ yajimat abhidhānaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ayam api ālabhatiḥ prāṇi saṃyuktaḥ eva tena ayam api yajimat vacanaḥ eva iti bhavati kasyacid āśaṅkā atha vā yajimat abhidhānaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ālabhatiḥ prāṇi saṃyuktaḥ tasya ayam anuvādaḥ vatsa vidhāna arthaḥ tathā ca phalam na kalpayitavyam bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,185,i]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ asmin saṃśaye ālambha mātram saṃskāraḥ kutas prāya darśanāt yatra anyāni api saṃskāra karmāṇi prāya bhūtāni iti ucyante tatra etat api śrūyate prāyāt api ca artha niścayaḥ bhavati yathā agrya prāye likhitaḥ agryaḥ iti gamyate nanu liṅgam prāya darśanam katham anena siddhiḥ iti ucyate yathā prāya darśanena sidhyati tathā varṇayitavyam katham ca prāya darśanam hetuḥ nyāyataḥ prāptau satyām kaḥ punar nyāyaḥ devatā saṃbandha abhāvāt na yāga vacanaḥ adṛṣṭa artha tvāt ca vatsaḥ ālabhyamānaḥ gām prastāvayiṣyati iti tasmāt evam nyāya prāpte prāya darśanam dyotakam bhavati tasmāt ālambha mātram saṃskāraḥ 
[I,185,ii_I,185,iii]	arthavāda upapatteḥ ca artha vādaḥ ca bhavati vatsa nikāntā hi paśavaḥ iti yasmāt vatsa priyāḥ paśavaḥ tasmāt vatsaḥ ālabdhavyaḥ iti yadi gām prastāvayitum ālabhyate tatra etat vacanam avakalpate atha saṃjñapayitum tatra evaṃjātīyakam vacanam na upapadyate tasmāt api ālambha mātram saṃskāraḥ iti siddham 
[I,186,i_I,186,ii]	saṃyuktaḥ tu artha śabdena tad arthaḥ śruti saṃyogāt asti agniḥ tatra na eva araḥ caruḥ bhavati iti uktvā yat enam carum upadadhāti iti samāmananti tatra sandihyate kim caruḥ yāga arthaḥ yāgam kṛtvā avaśiṣṭaḥ upadhātavyaḥ uta upadhāna arthaḥ eva iti yāga arthaḥ iti brūmaḥ caroḥ hi prasiddham kāryam yāgaḥ na upadhānam ucyate yadi api yāga artha tā caroḥ prasiddhā tathā api devatā vacana saṃbandha abhāvāt yajati śabda asaṃbandhāt ca na yāga artha tā iti gamyate tat ucyate tasya eva vākya śeṣe śrūyate bṛhaspateḥ vai etat annam yat nīvārāḥ iti tena devatā vacanena sannihitena eka vākya tā bhaviṣyati iti bṛhaspati devatākaḥ upadhātavyaḥ iti tasmāt yāga arthaḥ caruḥ iti evam prāptam 
[I,186,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ saṃyuktaḥ tu artha śabdena kārya śabdena upadadhāti iti tat arthaḥ eva syāt upadhāna arthaḥ upadadhātinā ca asya pratyakṣam eka vākya tvam parokṣam devatā vacanena anumeyam carum upadadhāti iti hi pratyakṣam vākyam bārhaspatyam upadadhāti iti ānumānikam tasmāt kṛtsnaḥ caruḥ upadhātavyaḥ tatas cced kiṃcid ijyāyām viniyujyeta tat anyatra śrutam anyatra kṛtam bhavet yat tu bārhaspatyāḥ nīvārāḥ iti artha vādaḥ saḥ iti yat tu uktam prasiddhā caroḥ yāga artha tā iti prasiddhiḥ vākyena bādhyate tasmāt upadhāna arthaḥ iti siddham 
[I,187,i_I,187,iii]	pātnīvate tu pūrva tvāt avacchedaḥ tvāṣṭram pātnīvatam vidhāya idam ucyate yat paryagnikṛtam pātnīvatam utsṛjanti iti tatra sandehaḥ kim tvāṣṭrasya paryagnikṛtasya eṣaḥ utsargaḥ vidhīyate uta tasmāt yāga antaram iti yadi paryagnikṛtam utsṛjanti iti pada dvayam paraspareṇa saṃbaddham tatas tvāṣṭrasya utsargaḥ atha pātnīvata śabdaḥ utsṛjatinā saṃbadhyeta tatas yāga antaram kim tāvat prāptam yāga antaram iti kutas pūrvaḥ tvāṣṭraḥ pātnīvataḥ ca ubhaya viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭaḥ katham pātnīvata śabdena ānūdyeta api ca tvāṣṭrasya utsarge vidhīyamāne paryagnikṛtam iti viśeṣaṇam na avakalpeta atas brūmaḥ paryagnikṛtasya pātnīvatatā vidhīyate saḥ eva yāgaḥ iti 
[I,187,iv_I,187,v]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ na karma antaram pūrvasya eva utsṛjati śabdena avacchedaḥ vidhīyate kim evam bhaviṣyati yajimattā tāvat kalpayitavyā na bhaviṣyati utsṛjati śabdaḥ ca śrutyā utsargam vidadhat vākyena na bādhitaḥ bhaviṣyati karma antara pakṣe vākyena pātnīvatatāyām vidhīyamānāyām arthāt prāptaḥ utsargaḥ dhātunā ānūdyeta api ca paryagnikṛtasya pātnīvata tā pūrvasya viditā eva sā vidhātum na śakyate tasmāt pūrvasya karmaṇaḥ avacchedaḥ yat tu uktam tvāṣṭrasya utsargaḥ vidhīyamāne paryagnikṛtam iti viśeṣaṇam tāvat na avakalpeta iti na eṣa doṣaḥ atantram eva atra pātnīvata śabdaḥ na asau viśeṣyate atas eva tvāṣṭraḥ pātnīvataḥ ubhaya viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭaḥ kevalena pātnīvata śabdena lakṣaṇayānu udyeta iti na doṣaḥ tasmāt avacchedaḥ iti siddham 
[I,188,i_I,188,iii]	adravya tvāt kevale karma śeṣaḥ syāt na kasyacid api prakaraṇe śrūyate eṣa vai haviṣā haviḥ yajate yaḥ adābhyam gṛhītvā somāya yajate iti tathā parā vaitasya āyuḥ prāṇaḥ eti yaḥ aṃśum gṛhṇāti iti tatra sandehaḥ kim yāga antaram etat grahaṇakam uta jyotiṣṭoma yāge graha vidhiḥ iti kim prāptam yāga antaram iti kutas apūrva nāmadheya saṃyogāt na prakṛtau etat nāmadheyakaḥ yāgaḥ asti na grahaḥ kaścid yaḥ abhyasyeta tasmāt yāga antaram nanu dravya devatam na śrūyate mā bhūt dravya devatam sākṣāt eva yajati śabdaḥ vidyate tasmāt karma antaram adābhyasaṃjñakam aṃśu saṃjñakam ca yāgam karoti iti evam prāptam 
[I,188,iv]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ adravya devatāke kevale nāmadheye śrūyamāṇe brūmaḥ jyotiṣṭome eva graha abhyāsa viśeṣa vidhānam iti kutas etat tāvat grahasya nāmadheyam na yāgasya grahaṇena sākṣāt saṃbandhāt vyavahita tvāt yāgasya aṃśuḥ iti ca mukta saṃśayam eva graha nāmadheyam na ca graha bhede yāga bhedaḥ bhavati na ca dravya devatam śrūyate yatas gṛhṇātiḥ yajimat vacanaḥ bhavet yat api uktam sākṣāt atra yajati śabdaḥ vidhāyakaḥ iti na evam śakyam karma antaram vidhātum vihita yāga vacanaḥ hi saḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt tasmāt yajatinā jyotiṣṭomaḥ eva ucyate aṃśvada abhya śabdābhyām api aparau graha abhyāsau vidhīyeta iti siddham 
[I,189,i_I,189,ii]	agniḥ tu liṅga darśanāt kratu śabdaḥ pratīyeta asti agniḥ yaḥ evam vidvān agnim cinutaḥ iti evam vidhāya śrūyate atha atas agnim agniṣṭomena eva anuyajati tam ukthena tam atirātreṇa tam ṣoḍaśinā iti evamādi tatra sandehaḥ kim ayam agni śabdaḥ yāga vacanaḥ jyotiṣṭoma ādibhyaḥ karma antaram cinutaḥ iti ākhyātena vidhīyate uta dravya vacanaḥ jyotiṣṭoma ādiṣu guṇa vidhānam iti 
[I,189,iii]	kim prāptam yāga vacanaḥ iti kutas liṅga darśanāt liṅgam hi dṛśyate agneḥ stotram agneḥ śastram iti tathā ṣaṣ upasadaḥ agneḥ cityasya bhavanti iti yasya stotram śastram upasadaḥ ca tasya agni śabdaḥ vācakaḥ iti gamyate yāgasya etat sarvam tasmāt yāga vacanaḥ iti nanu liṅgam asādhakam prāptiḥ ucyatām iti atra ucyate atha atas agnim agniṣṭomena eva anuyajati iti yāgam abhinivartayati iti ucyate tam agnim iti viśinaṣṭi tasmāt agni saṃjñakaḥ iti gamyate anuśabdaḥ api upasargaḥ yajateḥ viśeṣakaḥ evam upapadyate yadi agniḥ yāgaḥ tasmāt kratu śabdaḥ pratīyeta 
[I,189,iv_I,189,v]	dravyam vā syāt codanāyāḥ tad artha tvāt dravyam vā agni śabdena ucyeta katamat dravyam yat etat jvalanaḥ atra hi eṣa prasiddhaḥ cinutaḥ iti eṣā hi codanā cayana arthāḥ na yajati artham śaknoti vaditum cayanena enam saṃskurute citau sthāpayati iti anuśabdaḥ ca paścāt arthaḥ bhaviṣyati cayane nirvṛtte paścāt agniṣṭomena yāgena yajati iti 
[I,190,i_I,190,ii]	tad saṃyogāt kratuḥ tadākhyaḥ syāt tena dharma vidhānāni yat tu liṅga darśanam uktam yāga vacanaḥ agni śabdaḥ iti tat teṣu eva liṅga saṃyukteṣu vacaneṣu na sarvatra teṣu cityā agni saṃyogāt yāge lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ tena kratu vacanāni tad dharma vidhānāni iti adoṣaḥ 
[I,190,iii_I,190,iv]	prakaraṇa antare prayojana anya tvam kuṇḍapāyinām ayane śrūyate māsam agnihotram juhoti māsam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajate iti evamādi tatra sandihyate kim niyate agnihotre niyatayoḥ ca darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ māsaḥ vidhīyate kālaḥ atha kim niyata agnihotrāt niyatābhyām ca darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām karma antara vidhānam iti 
[I,190,v]	kim tāvat prāptam niyateṣu kāla vidhiḥ iti kutas kāla vidhi sarūpaḥ eṣa śabdaḥ māsam iti katham kāla vidhi sarūpa tā yat agnihotram juhoti iti viditam māsam iti aviditam evam ca agnihotra śabdaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsa śabdaḥ ca na artha antara vṛttau bhaviṣyataḥ tasmāt kāla vidhiḥ nanu kuṇḍapāyinām ayana prakaraṇam bādhyeta evam kāmam bādhyatām vākyam hi balavattaram 
[I,190,vi]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ prakaraṇa antare śrūyamāṇam vākyam yasya prakaraṇe tasya vācakam bhavitum arhati nanu pratyakṣaḥ agnihotrasya darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ ca guṇa vidhiḥ na iti ucyate katham upasiddhaḥ caritvā iti hi uktvā idam abhidhīyate na ca upasadaḥ agnihotrasya darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ ca santi tasmāt aśakyaḥ tatra māsa vidhiḥ atha ucyate upasadaḥ api vidhīyante iti tathā guṇa vidhāna arthaḥ asmin vākye aneka guṇa vidhānāt vākyam bhidyeta asmin pakṣe punar atantram agnihotra śabdaḥ na karma viśekṣyati tena vākya bhedaḥ na bhaviṣyati tasmāt karma antaram iti siddham 
[I,191,i_I,191,iii]	phalam ca akarma sannidhau anārabhya kiṃcid śrūyate āgneyam aṣṭākapālam nirvapet ruj kāmaḥ agnīṣomīyam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ aindrāgnam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet prajā kāmaḥ iti atra sandihyate kim prākṛteṣu āgneya ādiṣu phalam vidhīyate uta prākṛtebhyaḥ karma antarāṇi etāni kim prāptam prākṛteṣu phala vidhiḥ iti kutas viditāḥ āgneya ādayaḥ pratyabhijñāyante tasmāt teṣām anuvādaḥ phala saṃbandha arthaḥ iti 
[I,191,iv]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ phalam ca bhedakam akarma sannidhau śrūyamāṇam katham anuvāde sati na śakyeta phalam vidhātum vidhāyakasya abhāvāt na hi avidhīyamānaḥ hi upāyaḥ rucaḥ bhavati iti gamyate api ca ruj kāme atra vidhīyamāne kāmasya anitya tvāt āgneya ādīnām nitya tvāt saṃbandhaḥ na avakalpeta evam sarvatra tasmāt karma antarāṇi 
[I,192,i_I,192,ii]	sannidhau tu avibhāgāt phala arthena punar śrutiḥ asti aveṣṭiḥ āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ puroḍāśaḥ bhavati iti evamādiḥ tām prakṛtyā ucyate etayā annādya kāmam yājayeta iti tatra sandehaḥ kim karma antaram aveṣṭeḥ uta aveṣṭiḥ eva iti kim prāptam karma antaram iti uktena nyāyena evam prāpte brūmaḥ sannidhau phala arthena punar śrutiḥ aveṣṭeḥ eva na karma antaram iti kutas avibhāgāt etayā iti eṣa śabdaḥ na śaknoti aveṣṭyā vibhaktam yāgam anyam vaktum sannihitasya pratinirdeśakaḥ eṣa śabdaḥ tasmāt aveṣṭiḥ eva annādya kāmasya vidhīyate iti kim prayojanam yadi aveṣṭiḥ āgneya ādīni havīṃṣi atha karma antaram anya haviṣkaḥ yāgaḥ iti 
[I,192,iii_I,192,iv]	āgneya sūkta hetu tvāt abhyāsena pratīyeta darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ amāvāsyābhyām paurṇamāsyām ca acyutaḥ bhavati iti vidhāya punar ucyate āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ amāvāsyāyām bhavati iti tatra sandehaḥ kim amāvāsyāyām dvis āgneyena yaṣṭavyam uta sakṛt iti kim prāptam āgneya sūkta hetu tvāt abhyāsena pratīyate ekasya evam punar śrutiḥ aviśeṣāt anarthakam hi syāt iti 
[I,193,i_I,193,ii]	avibhāgāt tu karmaṇā dvis ukteḥ na vidhīyate na etat asti punar abhyasitavyaḥ āgneyaḥ iti kutas na abhyāsasya vācakaḥ śabdaḥ asti iti nanu āgneyaḥ punar uccaritaḥ param karma vidhāsyati na iti brūmaḥ śabdaḥ punar uccaritaḥ na punar arthaḥ kartavyaḥ iti śaknoti vaditum yaḥ asya prathamam uccaritasya arthaḥ śata kṛtvas api uccaritasya saḥ eva arthaḥ bhaviṣyati na anyaḥ nanu vihitam eva punar viśiṣṭam vidadhat anarthakaḥ bhavati bhavatu kāmam anarthaka tvam na tu anyam śaknoti vaditum bhavet upapannam anarthaka tvam na tu artha antara vacana tā tasmāt na dvis abhyasyeta iti 
[I,193,iii_I,193,iv]	anya arthāḥ vā punar śrutiḥ atha vā na anarthikā punar śrutiḥ artha vāda arthā bhaviṣyati iti ucyate kim artha vādena prayojanam yadā pūrvena eva vākyena sārtha vādakena vihitaḥ āgneyaḥ kam anyam artham vidhātum śrutiḥ prayujyeta śruti mātram yat na kasyacid vidhāna artham tat anarthakam iti uktam āmnāyasya kriyā artha tvāt ānarthakyam atad arthānām iti śrutaḥ ca aśrutaḥ ca tāvān eva saḥ arthaḥ yathā śrutā ca aśrutā ca devatāḥ aṅga bhāvam sādhayati evam etat iti tat ucyate anya arthāḥ vā punar śrutiḥ na āgneyam vidhātum aindrāgna vidhāna arthā āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ amāvāsyāyām bhavati eva na kevalena agninā sa sādhuḥ bhavati iti indra sahitaḥ agniḥ samīcīnataraḥ tasmāt aindrāgnaḥ kartavyaḥ iti 
[I,194,i_I,194,ii]	yāvat jīvikaḥ abhyāsaḥ karma dharmaḥ prakaraṇāt bahvṛca brāhmaṇe śrūyate yāvajjīvam agnihotram juhoti iti yāvajjīvam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti atra sandeheḥ kim karma dharmaḥ abhyāsaḥ yāvat jīvika tā uta kartṛ dharmaḥ niyamaḥ codyate yāvat jīvika tā iti katham karma dharmaḥ abhyāsaḥ katham vā kartṛ dharmaḥ niyamaḥ iti yadi juhotiḥ anuvādaḥ yāvajjīvam iti vidhiḥ tatas karma dharmaḥ abhyāsaḥ yadi viparītam tatas kartṛ dharmaḥ niyamaḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam karma dharmaḥ abhyāsaḥ kutas prakaraṇāt yadi iyam vacana vyaktiḥ juhoti yajati śabdau anuvādau yāvajjīvam iti ca vidhiḥ tatas prakaraṇam anugṛhyate tasmāt abhyāsaḥ evam kṛtvā satra saṃstavaḥ yuktaḥ bhaviṣyati jarā maryam vai etat satram yat agnihotram darśa pūrṇamāsau ca iti dīrgha kāla sāmānyāt tasmāt abhyāsaḥ 
[I,194,iii_I,194,iv^1]	kartuḥ vā śruti saṃyogāt atra brūmaḥ yāvajjīvikaḥ abhyāsaḥ na syāt kartuḥ dharmaḥ niyamaḥ ca udyate iti kutas śruti saṃyogāt evam śruti paricchinnaḥ arthaḥ bhaviṣyati itarathā lakṣaṇā syāt katham yāvat jīvanam tāvatā kālena kuryāt iti tat etat pradoṣa parisamāptam agnihotram anabhyasya na śakyate yāvat jīvana kālena kartum paurṇamāsyam āvāsya aparisamāptau ca darśa pūrṇamāsau yadi ucyeta jīvana kālasya eka deśe api kṛtam tena kālena kṛtam bhavati iti na etat evam artha prāptam hi tat na vidhātavyam śabdena jīvana parimitaḥ kālaḥ yaḥ tena parisamāpayitavyam iti arthāt abhyāsaḥ sa hi kartavya tayā śrūyate na ca asau juhoti yajatibhyām ucyate lakṣaṇayā tu gamyate 
[I,194,iv^2]	yāvajjīvam juhuyāt yāvajjīvam abhyasyet iti śrutiḥ ca prakaraṇāt balīyasī yadi iyam vacana vyaktiḥ asya vākyasya yāvajjīvam iti anuvādaḥ juhoti yajati iti ca vidhānam iti evam yajati juhoti śabdau sva arthau eva bhaviṣyataḥ yāvat jīva śabdaḥ api jīvana vacanaḥ eva na abhyāsa lakṣaṇaḥ bhaviṣyati iti jīvane nimitte karma vidhīyate jīvan ced dhotavyam iti jīvanam nimittam na kālaḥ niyata nimitta tvāt niyatam karma tena ucyate kartuḥ dharmaḥ niyamaḥ ca udyate iti 
[I,195,i_I,195,ii]	liṅga darśanāt ca karma dharme hi prakrameṇa niyamyeta tatra anarthakam anyat syāt liṅgam ca bhavati api ha vai eṣa svargāt lokāt chidyate yaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsa yājī paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyām vā atipātayeta iti katham liṅgam karma dharme hi prakrāntam satram yāvat jīvana kālena parisamāpyeta na tatra kāla atipātaḥ syāt tatra ca anarthakam anyat syāt prāyaścitta ādi vidhīyamānam 
[I,195,iii_I,195,iv]	vyapavargam ca darśayati kālaḥ ced karma bhedaḥ syāt vyapavargasya samāpanasya darśanam bhavati darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeta iti yadi darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somasya kālaḥ asti vyaktam na yāvat jīvana kālena tau parisamāpyete atha jīvanam nimittam upapadyate karma bhedaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau parisamāpya somam karma antaram kuryāt iti api ca āhitāgniḥ vai eṣa yaḥ agnihotram juhoti na darśa pūrṇamāsau yajeta yāḥ āhuti bhājaḥ devatāḥ tāḥ anudhyāyinīḥ karoti iti anudhyāyinī vacanam bhavati niyataḥ yaḥ āhuti bhāgaḥ tasmin adīyamāne anudhyāyinī vacanam bhavati yaḥ tu aniyate āhuti bhāgaḥ tam anudhyāyanti idam naḥ bhaviṣyati iti niyataḥ ca bhāgaḥ niyama pakṣe bhavati na kāmya pakṣe karma dharme ca kāmyam agnihotram ca darśa pūrṇamāsau ca tasmāt niyama pakṣaḥ api ca śrūyate jarā maryam vā etat satram yat agnihotram darśa pūrṇamāsau ca jarayā ha vā etābhyām nirmucyate mṛtyunā ca iti jarā maraṇa nirmocana avadhāraṇa vacanam ca niyama pakṣaḥ upapadyate kāmya pakṣe hi aprayogāt api mucyeta 
[I,196,i_I,196,ii]	anitya tvāt tu na evam syāt tuśabdaḥ anvācaye itaraḥ ca paśyāmaḥ kartuḥ dharmaḥ niyamaḥ ca udyate iti yadi pūrvasya homasya guṇa vidhiḥ bhavet saḥ ekaikaḥ pūrvaḥ agni hotra homaḥ anityaḥ syāt kāma saṃyogena śrutaḥ na anyaḥ kaścid nityaḥ tatra liṅgam virudhyeta jarā maryam vā etat satram yat agnihotram darśa pūrṇamāsau jarayā vā etābhyām nirmucyate mṛtyunā ca iti katham virudhyate jarā maraṇa nirmocana ādhāraṇa vacanam niyama pakṣaḥ upapadyate kāmya pakṣe aprayogāt api mucyeta 
[I,196,iii_I,196,iv]	virodhaḥ ca api pūrvavat itas ca paśyāmaḥ na pūrva abhyāsaḥ guṇaḥ ca udyate iti kutas virodhāt virodhaḥ bhavati darśa pūrṇamāsa vikārāḥ saurya ādayaḥ api yāvajjīvam abhyasitavyāḥ bhaveyuḥ saḥ anārabhya arthaḥ pratijñātaḥ syāt atas api paśyāmaḥ niyamaḥ iti satra saṃstavaḥ ca santata bhāvam upapatsyate 
[I,197,i_I,197,ii]	kartuḥ tu dharma niyamāt kāla śāstram nimittam syāt yadi kartuḥ dharmaḥ niyamaḥ ca udyeta tatas jīvanam nimittam jīvane nimitte karma vidhīyate tatra prayoge parisamāptam karma tathā vyapavargasya darśanam akḷptam bhavati tasmāt kartṛ dharmaḥ niyamaḥ ca udyate iti siddham bhavati 
[I,197,iii_I,197,v]	nāma rūpa dharma viśeṣa punarukti nindā śakti samāpti vacana prāyaścitta anya artha darśanāt śākhā antareṣu karma bhedaḥ syāt iha śākhā antarāṇi udāharaṇam kāṭhakam kālāpakam paippalādakam iti evamādīni tatra sandehaḥ kim ekasyām śākhāyām yat karma agni hotra ādi śrūyate tat śākhā antare punar śrūyamāṇam bhidyeta tasmāt uta na bhidyeta bhidyeta iti paśyāmaḥ kutas nāma bhedāt ekam kāṭhakam nāma anyat kālāpakam nāma evam nāma bhedāt bhedaḥ nanu grantha nāma etat satyam karmaṇām api iti brūmaḥ karmabhiḥ api evamādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam eka vibhakti tvam ca iti rūpa bhedāt ca ekasyām śākhāyām agnīṣomīyam ekādaśa kapālam āmananti ekasyām dvādaśa kapālam evam bhinnam rūpam katham iva na karma antaram bhaviṣyati 
[I,197,vi]	dharma viśeṣāt ca kārīrī vākyāni adhīyānāḥ taittirīyāḥ bhūmau bhojanam ācaranti apare śākhinaḥ na ācaranti tathā agnim adhīyānāḥ kecid upādhyāyasya uda kumbhān āharanti apare na aśvamedham adhīyānāḥ kecid aśvasya ghāsam āharanti apare na pare anyam dharmam ācaranti aśva ghāsa ādeḥ ekeṣām upakāram ākāṅkṣati aśvamedha ādiḥ ekeṣām na ākāṅkṣati saḥ eva ekaḥ katham na ākāṅkṣeta katham vā anyat ākāṅkṣitum arhati atas gamyate anyat iti punarukti prasaṅgāt ca yadi sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam karma ekasyām śākhāyām vihitasya karmaṇaḥ śākhā antare vacanam punaruktam anarthakam syāt na tu bheda pakṣaḥ eṣa doṣaḥ asti tasmāt api karma bhedaḥ 
[I,198,i]	nindā vacanāt ca prātar prātar anṛtam te vadanti purā udayā juhvati ye agnihotram divākīrtyam ādivā kīrtayantaḥ sūryaḥ jyotiḥ na tadā jyotiḥ eṣām iti kecid śākhinaḥ anudita homam nindanti apare punar udita homam nindanti yathā atithaye pradrutāya annam āhareyuḥ tādṛś tat yadi udite juhvati iti sarva śākhyā pratyaye viruddham na tu karma bhede tasmāt api bhedaḥ iti aśakteḥ ca na śaknuyuḥ khalu api sarva śākhā pratyayam upasaṃhartum tatra anārabhyaḥ arthaḥ vidhīyate iti pratijñātam bhavet śakyam tu karma bhede atas karma bhedaḥ iti 
[I,198,ii_I,198,iii]	samāpti vacanāt ca asamāpte api samāpteḥ vacanam bhavati kecid āhuḥ atra asmākam agniḥ parisamāpyate iti apare anya parisamāptim vyapadiśanti tat eka karma tve na upapadyate na hi tatra ca parisamāpyeta anyatra na bhede tu yuktam tasmāt bhedaḥ iti prāyaścitta vidhānāt ca kecid anudita homa vyatikrame prāyaścittam āmananti kecid udita homa vyatikrame vṛddhe ca prāyaścittam na ca karma ekatvaḥ ubhayathā vṛddhiḥ saṃbhavati karma bhede tu yat anudite homa karma tat udite vṛddham itarat api udite tasmāt api bhedaḥ 
[I,198,iv]	anya artha darśanāt ca idam śrūyate yadi purā didīkṣāṇāḥ syuḥ yadi vā eṣām gṛhapatiḥ gṛhapateḥ vā anusatriṇaḥ iti te enam eva bṛhatsāmānam kratum upeyuḥ upetam hi eṣām rathantaram atha yadi adidīkṣāṇā iti iṣṭavatām aniṣṭa pūrvāṇām ca dvādaśa ahe darśanam upapadyate yadi karma bhedaḥ eka karma tve na avakalpyate katham tāṇḍake śrūyate eṣa vāva prathamaḥ yajñaḥ yajñānām yat jyotiṣṭomaḥ yaḥ etena aniṣṭvā atha anyena yajeta gartapatyam eva tat jāyeta pravām īyate iti tat sarvatra syāt tatra ādidīkṣāṇām dvādaśa ahe darśanam na upapadyate tasmāt api karma bhedaḥ 
[I,199,i]	atha aparam liṅga darśanam yat pakṣa samitām pinuyāt kanīyāṃsam yajña kratum upeyāt kanīyasīm prajñām kanīyasaḥ paśūn kanīyaḥ annādyam pāpīyān syāt atha yadi vedi saṃmityā minoti iti pakṣa samāne pratiṣiddhe vedi saṃmānasya darśanam bhavati tat tu karma bhedaḥ upapadyate pākṣikasya vedi saṃmānasya darśanam eka karma tve na upapadyate katham eke hi samāmananti ratha akṣa mātrāṇi yūpa antarālāni bhavanti iti tat sarvatra syāt tatra ca no pakṣa saṃmānam naḥ vedi saṃmānam syāt vedi saṃmāna darśanam na upapadyate tasmāt api karma bhedaḥ 
[I,199,ii_I,199,iii]	aparam ca liṅga darśanam keṣāṃcid jyotiṣṭome śrūyate dve saṃstutānām virājam atiricyeta iti pareṣām tisraḥ saṃstutānām virājam atiricyante iti eka karma tve virodhaḥ nānā karma tve kasmiṃścid jyotiṣṭome dve kasmiṃścid tisraḥ tasmāt karma bhedaḥ iti api ca sārasvate śrūyate ye puroḍāśinaḥ te upaviśanti ye sānnāyinaḥ te vatsān vārayanti sānnāyinaḥ iṣṭa prathama yajñāḥ puroḍāśinaḥ viparītāḥ ubhayeṣām sārasvate darśanam avakalpate karma bhede eka karma tve sarveṣām jyotiṣṭoma pūrva tvam syāt tatra darśanam na upapadyate 
[I,199,iv]	api ca śrūyate upahavyaḥ niruktaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ yajñaḥ rathantara sāmā aśvaḥ śyāvaḥ dakṣiṇā pareṣām śrūyate upahavyaḥ aniruktaḥ ukthaḥ yajñaḥ bṛhatsāmā aśvaḥ śvetaḥ rukma lalāṭaḥ dakṣiṇā iti karma eka tve rathantara vacanam bṛhadvacanam ca anarthakam śākhā dvaya pratyaya tvāt bṛhatsāmā rathantara sāmā vā syāt sa ca ayam prakṛtitaḥ evaṃlakṣaṇakaḥ prāptaḥ nānā karma tve tu anyaḥ bṛhat sāmānyaḥ rathantara sāma iti yuktam bhavati tasmāt śākhā antare karma bhedaḥ bhavitum arhati 
[I,200,i_I,200,ii]	ekam vā saṃyoga rūpa codana ākhyā viśeṣāt na ca etat asti yat uktam śākhā antareṣu karma bhedaḥ iti sarva śākhā pratyayam sarva brāhmaṇa pratyayam ca ekam karma artha saṃyogasya aviśeṣāt tat eva prayojanam uddiśya tat eva vidhīyamānam pratyabhijānīmaḥ rūpam api asya tat eva dravya devatam puruṣa prayatnaḥ ca tādṛśaḥ eva codyate nāmadheyam ca aviśiṣṭam tena tat eva karma sarva śākhā ādiṣu iti pratyayaḥ 
[I,200,iii_I,200,iv]	na nāmnā syāt acodana abhidhāna tvāt yat uktam nāma bhedaḥ iti parihṛtam tat granthanām atas iti atha yat uktam karmaṇaḥ api nāma sāmāna adhikaraṇya darśanāt iti na eṣa doṣaḥ grantha saṃyogāt karma kāṭhaka ādi na karma saṃyogāt granthaḥ kāṭhakaḥ katham gamyate yat karma kāṭhaka ādi saṃyuktam tat kāṭhaka ādi śabdena ucyate kim atas api yat grantha saṃyogāt kāṭhakam kālāpakam karma ucyate eka tve api kāṭhaka grantha saṃyogāt kāṭhakam kālāpaka grantha saṃyogāt tu kālāpakam bhaviṣyati 
[I,201,i_I,201,ii]	sarveṣām ca eka karmyam syāt yadi śabda bhedāt bhedaḥ bhavet śabda aikyāt tarhi karma aikyam bhavet tatra kāṭhaka śabda abhidhānāt aikyam bhavet agnihotrasya darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ jyotiṣṭomasya ca tad śabda tvāt na ca etat evam tasmāt api abhedaḥ 
[I,201,iii_I,201,iv]	kṛtakam ca abhidhānam idānīṃtanam ca etat abhidhānam bhavet asya na pūrvam āsīt yatas prabhṛti kaṭhasya prakṛṣṭam vacanam tatas prabhṛti pravṛttam pūrvam na āsīt bhedaḥ idānīm bhedaḥ iti viruddham 
[I,201,v_I,201,vi]	eka tve api param eka karma tve api rūpa bhedaḥ bhavati vacanāt na ca vācanike rūpa bhede asatyām api bheda buddhau karmaṇaḥ bhedaḥ abhyavasīyeta 
[I,201,vii_I,201,viii]	vidyāyām dharma śāstram atha yaḥ dharma viśeṣaḥ uktaḥ vidyā grahaṇa arthaḥ saḥ na karmaṇaḥ upakārakaḥ katham gamyate śruti ādīnām abhāvāt vidyā saṃyogāt ca na karma prayuktaḥ iti 
[I,201,ix_I,201,x]	āgneya vat punarvacanam atha yat uktam yathā amāvāsyāyām āgneyasya punar ukta doṣāt madhyamaḥ pakṣaḥ nirastaḥ evam ayam api tasmāt eva doṣāt karma ekatva pakṣaḥ nirasitavyaḥ iti etat parihartavyam 
[I,202,i_I,202,ii]	advirvacanam vā śruti saṃyoga aviśeṣāt na eva khalu etat dvis vacanam saḥ eva ayam arthaḥ punar śrāvitaḥ agnihotra ādiḥ bahu kṛtvas bahubhiḥ tu puruṣaiḥ na ca ekaḥ arthaḥ bahubhiḥ ucyamānaḥ punaruktaḥ bhavati yadi bhavet ekasmin eva vede bahubhiḥ ucyamāne bhavet tasmāt na bahu karma samavāyaḥ ayam ekam eva idam karma iti 
[I,202,iii]	vākya asamavāyāt 
[I,202,iv_I,202,v]	artha asannidheḥ ca artha āsannidheḥ ca śākhā śabdaḥ upapannaḥ bhaviṣyati śākhāḥ iva homāḥ śākhāḥ tat yathā vṛkṣasya śākhāḥ evam iha api vṛkṣa sthānīyasya vedasya śākhāḥ kim śākhā sārūpyam yathā nānā avasthānam na ca ekaikasyām kṛtsnam puṣpam phalam sannihitam evam iha api na eka ekasyām kṛtsam guṇa kāṇḍam sannihitam iti artha asannidheḥ śākhā śabda upapattiḥ tasmāt api ekam karma iti 
[I,202,vi_I,202,vii]	na ca ekam prati śiṣyate na ca yat kāṭhake agnihotram tat kāṭhakam eva ekam puruṣam prati vidhīyate taittirīyasya api tad vihitam eva puruṣa viśeṣa vacana abhāvāt yat ca agnihotrasya kiṃcid aṅgam vidhīyate sarva avasthasya tat agnihotrasya yat ca kāṭhakasya agnihotram tat ca taittirīyakasya iti viśeṣa vacana abhāvāt tasmāt sarva śākhyābhiḥ ekam samāptam karma ucyate iti 
[I,203,i_I,203,ii]	samāpti vat ca saṃprekṣā atra asmākam agniḥ parisamāpyate iti utprekṣitāraḥ bhavanti anvāroheṣu maitrāyaṇīyānām agniḥ parisamāpyate asmākam teṣu na parisamāpyate iti yadi anyat eva maitrāyaṇīyānām anyat ca teṣām katham te brūyuḥ eṣu asmākam na parisamāpyate iti eka tvam upapannam teṣām api hi te santi 
[I,203,iii_I,203,iv]	eka tve api parāṇi nindā śakti samāpti vacanāni na hi nindā nindyam ninditum prayujyate kim tarhi ninditāt itarat praśaṃsitum tatra na ninditasya pratiṣedhaḥ gamyate kim tarhi ninditāt itarat praśaṃsitum tatra na ninditasya pratiṣedhaḥ gamyate kim tu itarasya vidhiḥ tatra ekasmin agnihotre dvau kālau vihitau vikalpyete atas na kaścid virodhaḥ 
[I,203,v_I,203,vi]	tathā asamarthānām ekasmin api vede vihitam kṛtsnam aṅga jātam upasaṃhartum aśaktiḥ samarthānām tu sarva śākhābhyaḥ api āgamitam adhikam vidhim upasaṃhartum śaktiḥ asti iti tena eka karma tve api na viruddham iti tathā ekasmin api karmaṇi kiṃcid vastu samāptam iti kṛtvā samāpti śabdaḥ prayujyate yathā ādhvaryave samāpte jyotiṣṭomasya samāptaḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ iti bhavati 
[I,203,vii_I,203,viii]	prāyaścittam nimittena yat uktam udita homasya api prāyaścitta antā na avṛddha tā gamyate anudita homasya api tat eka tve virudhyate aviruddham nānātvaḥ iti tat parihartavyam 
[I,204,i_I,204,ii]	prakramāt vā niyogena vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na eṣa doṣaḥ udite hoṣyāmi iti prakānte anyathā kriyamāṇe bhavati doṣaḥ tatra prāyaścittasya viṣayaḥ bhaviṣyati iti karma ekatve api na doṣaḥ 
[I,204,iii_I,204,iv]	samāptiḥ pūrvat tvāt yathājñāte pratīyeta pūrvavati samāpti vacanam bhavati yat prārabdham tat parisamāpyate tatra asmākam parisamāptaḥ agniḥ iti yaḥ asmābhiḥ jñāyate prārabdhaḥ ca parisamāpyate iti abhiprāyaḥ 
[I,204,v_I,204,vi]	liṅgam aviśiṣṭam sarva śeṣa tvāt na hi tatra karma codanā tasmāt dvādaśa ahasya āhāra vyapadeśaḥ syāt yat uktam yadi purā didīksāṇāḥ iti dvādaśa āhe iṣṭa prathama yajñānām aniṣṭa prathama yajñānām ca darśanam karma bhedaḥ upapadyate na sarva śākhā pratyaya eka karmaṇi iti na eṣa doṣaḥ yadi didīkṣāṇāḥ dvādaśa ahena adidīkṣāṇāḥ dvādaśa śāhena iti evam tat na hi sāmavede jyotiṣṭomasya vidhānam kim atas api yatra vihitaḥ tatra anūdyate tena karma bhede api sarva jyotiṣṭomānām eṣa dharmaḥ prāthamyam nāma atas nānā karma pakṣe api avaśyam dvādaśa ahasya āhāra vyapadeśaḥ kalpanīyaḥ tasmāt adoṣaḥ 
[I,205,i_I,205,ii]	dravye ca ācodita tvāt vidhīnām avyavasthā syāt nirdeśāt vyavatiṣṭheta tasmāt nitya anuvādaḥ syāt dravye ca agnau acodita tvāt ekādaśinyāḥ saṃmāna parimāṇam parti na eṣā vyavasthā syāt na eva agnau ekādaśinī codyate kutas pakṣa saṃmānam vedi saṃmānam vā syāt dvayam api etat para artham kīrtyate paśu ekādaśinī vidhāna artham yadi pakṣa saṃmitā syāt ayam doṣaḥ syāt vedi saṃmāne na doṣaḥ bhavet kaḥ etat saṅkaṭa madhyavasānam arhati ekasmin yūpaḥ ekādaśa paśavaḥ niyoktavā iti vācastoma ādiṣu tu yūpa ekādaśinyām asya nitya anuvāda tvāt ratha akṣa mātrāṇi eva yūpa antarālāni bhaviṣyanti nitya anuvāda tvāt ca asati api pakṣa saṃmāne vedi saṃmāne vā ekādaśinī vidhāna artham vacanam upapadyate eva iti na doṣaḥ 
[I,205,iii_I,205,iv^1]	vihita pratiṣedhāt pakṣe atirekaḥ syāt atirātre gṛhṇāti ṣoḍaśinam iti vihitaḥ ṣoḍaśī na atirātre gṛhṇāti ṣoḍaśinam iti pratiṣiddhaḥ tena pakṣe dvayoḥ stotrīyayoḥ atirekaḥ pakṣe tisṝṇām tasmāt adoṣaḥ katham punar ayam dvayoḥ tisṝṇām vā atiḥ ekaḥ trivṛt bahiṣpavamānam tat tāvat navakam pañcadaśāni ājyāni tāni tāvat catvāri tena sā ṣaṣṭiḥ pañcadaśaḥ mādhyaṃdinaḥ pavamānaḥ tayā pañcadaśa saṃkhyayā saha pūrvayā ca nava saṃkhyayā caturaśītiḥ saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni catvāri saptadaśaḥ ārbhavaḥ pavamānaḥ pañca saptadaśakāni tāni iti pañca aśītiḥ pūrvayā catur śītyā saha ekonasaptati śatam 
[I,205,iv^2]	ekaviṃśam yajñāyajñiyam tayā ekaviṃśatyā saha tasya navati śatam stotriyāḥ iti brāhmaṇa vādaḥ agniṣṭoma mātram abhipretya ucyate sā virāj saṃpūrṇā virāj iti daśaka ākhyāḥ trayaḥ ekaviṃśakāḥ uktha paryāyāḥ sā triṣaṣṭiḥ ekaviṃśaḥ ṣoḍaśī tayā ekaviṃśatyā saha caturaśītiḥ pañcadaśakāḥ rātri paryāyāḥ trayaḥ tatra ekaika paryāyaḥ catur stotraḥ tat aśīti śatam saṃpūrṇā virāj trivṛt rathantaram pañcasāma tat navakam tatas caturaśīteḥ ekam navakam āgacchati tathā tisraḥ saṃstutānām virājam atiricyante yadā ṣoḍaśī na gṛhyate tadā ekaviṃśatyā vinā dve saṃstutānām virājam atiricyete evam eka karma tve api liṅgam upapadyate 
[I,206,i_I,206,ii]	sārasvate vipratiṣedhāt yadā iti syāt yat uktam puroḍāśinām sānnāyinām ca sārasvate darśanam bhavati iti jyotiṣṭoma pūrvaka tvāt sarva karmaṇām vipratiṣiddham etat iti tena yadā sānnāyinaḥ puroḍāśinaḥ iti kalpyate 
[I,206,iii_I,206,iv]	upahavye apratiprasavaḥ atham yat uktam upahavye bṛhat rathantara vidhānam prakṛti prāptam eva eka karma tve pratiprasava tayā api asaṃbhavāt vidhīyamānam anarthakam syāt iti tat parihartavyam ābhāṣā antam sūtram 
[I,207,i_I,207,ii]	guṇa arthāḥ vā punar śrutiḥ yadā rathantara sāmā tadā aśvaḥ śvetaḥ dakṣiṇā yadā bṛhatsāmā tadā rukma lalāṭaḥ iti 
[I,207,iii_I,207,iv]	pratyayam ca api darśayati yadā na sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam karma iti katham ekasyām śākhāyām samāmnāyate anyasyām guṇaḥ vidhīyate yathā maitrāyaṇīyānām samidh ādayaḥ prayājāḥ na samāmnāyante atha ca guṇāḥ śrūyante ṛtavaḥ vai prayājāḥ samānīya hotavyāḥ iti tathā yeṣām śākhinām kuṭaruḥ asi iti aśma ādāna mantraḥ na āmnā ataḥ teṣām api hi dṛśyate kukkuṭaḥ asi iti aśmānam upapādatte kuṭaruḥ asi iti vā iti tasmāt ekam karma iti pratīmaḥ 
[I,207,v_I,207,vi]	api vā krama saṃyogāt vidhi pṛthaktvam ekasyām vyavatiṣṭheta yaḥ hi anya śākhā avasthitān vidhīn upasaṃharati sa sva śākhā vihitam kramam uparuṇaddhi iti tena śākhā antareṣu karma bhedaḥ iti 
[I,207,vii_I,207,viii]	virodhinā tu asaṃyogāt aika karmye tad saṃyogāt vidhīnām sarva karma pratyayaḥ syāt ucyate na eṣa śākhā antara vihitānām aika karmye sati virodhinā saṃyogaḥ na hi kramaḥ vākyena virudhyate durbalaḥ hi kramaḥ balavat vākyam vākyena ca śākhā antarīyāṇām upasaṃhāraḥ tasmāt sarva śākhā pratyayam sarva brāhmaṇa pratyayam ca ekam karma codyate iti siddham bhavati 
[I,208,i_I,208,ii]	atha atas śeṣa lakṣaṇam nānā karma lakṣaṇam vṛttam anantaram śeṣa lakṣaṇam vartayiṣyāmaḥ kaḥ śeṣaḥ kena hetunā śeṣaḥ katham ca viniyujyate iti śruti ādīni ca viniyoge kāraṇāni iti vakṣyate teṣām ca balavat abalavattā etat tātparyeṇa anyat api upoddhātā ādinā 
[I,208,iii_I,209,i]	śeṣaḥ para artha tvāt iha sūtre śeṣasya lakṣaṇam yena ca hetunā śeṣaḥ iti ucyate tat ubhayam ākhyāyate yaḥ parasya upakāre vartate sa śeṣaḥ iti ucyate tat yathā ye para arthāḥ te vaktāraḥ bhavanti śeṣa bhūtāḥ vayam iha iti nanu yaḥ api pradhāna bhūtaḥ saḥ api kadācid para arthe vartate yathā upādhyāyaḥ pradhāna bhūtaḥ śiṣyāṇām vidyā vinaya ādhāne vartate satyam vartate yaḥ tu atyantam para arthaḥ tam vayam śeṣaḥ iti brūmaḥ yathā garbha dāsaḥ karma arthaḥ eva svāminaḥ anaḍvān ca krīyate vakṣyati iti eva nanu garbha dāsasya api sa vāmī saṃvid adhānaḥ guṇa bhāva māyāt na iti brūmaḥ ātmanaḥ eva asau saṃvid adhānaḥ guṇa bhāvam gacchati na antarīyaka tvāt garbha dāsasya upakaroti anaḍuhaḥ vā yaḥ tu atyantam para arthaḥ tam vayam śeṣaḥ iti brūmaḥ atha tatra kim vṛttam yaiḥ tu dravyam cikīrṣyate guṇaḥ tatra pratīyeta iti tatra apūrva artha tā vyāvartitā dṛṣṭa prayojanānām ākhyātānām iha tu sarveṣām eva śeṣāṇām lakṣaṇam ucyate 
[I,209,ii_I,209,iii]	dravya guṇa saṃskāreṣu vādariḥ vādariḥ ācāryaḥ atra dravya guṇa saṃskāreṣu eva śeṣa śabdaḥ iti mane na yāga phala puruṣeṣu dravyam kriyā artham yadi prayojanavatī kriyā vyaktam sā dravyeṇa nirvartayitavyā tasyāḥ nirvṛttiḥ dravyāt ṛte na bhavati iti tad nirvṛttaye dravyam eṣitavyam bhavati tasmāt kriyā artham dravyam guṇaḥ śaknoti viśiṣṭam dravyam coditam lakṣayitum lakṣitena ca tena prayojanam viśiṣṭasya kriyā sādhana tvāt tasmāt saḥ api dravya dvāreṇa kriyāyāḥ upakaroti iti kriyā arthaḥ eva saṃskāraḥ nāma sa bhavati yasmin jāte padārthaḥ bhavati yogyaḥ kasyacid arthasya tena api kriyāyām kartavyāyām prayojanam iti saḥ api para arthaḥ tasmāt dravya guṇa saṃskārāḥ para artha tvāt śeṣa bhūtāḥ 
[I,209,iv]	na tu yāga phala puruṣāḥ yāgaḥ tāvat kartavyaḥ puruṣasya na hi tasmin nirvartite kiṃcid aparam asti kartavyam sa hi puruṣa arthaḥ yat anyat dravya ādi tat tad artham tasya śeṣa bhūtam sa tu na kiṃcid abhinirvartayitum kriyate phalam api na tena kriyate tasmin tu kṛte svayam eva tat bhavati tasmin kṛte phalam asya bhavati iti etāvat gamyate na asti śabdaḥ yāgena kriyate phalam iti tasmāt yāgaḥ na śeṣa bhūtaḥ kasyacid arthasya phalam api na puruṣam pratyupadiśyate yaḥ svargam kāmayate sa yāgam kuryāt iti etāvat śabdena udiśyate na ātmanaḥ parasya vā iti svargam pratīcchā mātreṇa svarga kāmaḥ iti bhavati tasmāt puruṣam prati guṇa bhāvena na śrūyate svargaḥ tasmāt saḥ api na śeṣa bhūtaḥ na ced phala yāgau guṇa bhāvena codyete kasya puruṣaḥ pradhāna bhūtaḥ bhavati pratyakṣaḥ ca asya dravya tvāt karma prati guṇa bhāvaḥ tasmāt dravya guṇa saṃskāreṣu eva śeṣa bhāvam vādariḥ menaḥ iti 
[I,210,i_I,210,ii]	karmāṇi api jaiminiḥ phala artha tvāt jaiminiḥ tu khalu ācāryaḥ karmāṇi api śeṣa bhūtāni manyate sma na vādariḥ iva avadhāraṇām anumene sa hi dadarśa na yāgaḥ kartavya tayā codyate phala kāmasya tu tad sādhana upāya tvena iti evam śrutaḥ arthaḥ parigṛhītaḥ bhaviṣyati arthavān ca upadeśaḥ enam eva artham ṣaṣṭhe adhyāye sūtraiḥ eva sādhayiṣyati iha tu tad siddhena eva phala artha tvena śeṣa bhāvam yāgasya āpādayati sma tasmāt anavadhāraṇāḥ dravya guṇa saṃkārāḥ śeṣa bhūtāḥ yāgaḥ api śeṣa bhūtaḥ phalam prati iti 
[I,210,iii_I,210,iv]	phalam ca puruṣa artha tvāt phalam api puruṣam pratyupadiśyate yaḥ svargaḥ me bhavet iti evam kāmayate tasya yāgaḥ na yaḥ svargaḥ saḥ ātmānam labheta iti kutas ātma nepada prayogāt kartṛ abhiprāyaḥ etat bhavati kriyā phalam anubhavet katham puruṣaḥ iti yāgaḥ prayujyate tasmāt phalam puruṣa artham yāgāt śrūyate na ātma nirvṛtti artham tasmāt śeṣa bhūtam iti 
[I,211,i_I,211,iii]	puruṣaḥ ca karma artha tvāt puruṣaḥ api audumbarī saṃmāna ādiṣu guṇa bhūtaḥ śrūyate tasmāt anavadhāraṇā eṣā dravya guṇa saṃskāreṣu śeṣa tvam vādariḥ menaḥ iti atha idānīm atra bhagavān vṛtti kāraḥ pariniścikāya dravya guṇa saṃskāreṣu eva niyataḥ yajim prati śeṣa bhāvaḥ āpekṣikaḥ itareṣām yāgasya dravyam prati pradhāna bhāvaḥ phalam prati guṇa bhāvaḥ phalasya yāgam prati prādhānyam puruṣam prati guṇa tā puruṣasya phalam prati pradhāna tā audumbarī saṃmāna ādi prati guṇa tvam tasmāt saṃmata avadhāraṇā dravya guṇa saṃskārāḥ yāgam prati niyogataḥ guṇa bhūtā eva iti 
[I,211,iv_I,211,v]	teṣām arthena saṃbandhaḥ staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti tatra śrūyante dharmāḥ nirvapaṇam prokṣaṇam avahananam iti evamādayaḥ auṣadha dharmāḥ tathā utpavana vilāpa naya haṇa āsāt anādayaḥ ājya dharmāḥ tathā śākhā haraṇam gavām prasthāpanam gavām prastāvanam iti evamādayaḥ api sāntāyyasya teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim sarve auṣadhe ājye sānnāyye ca kartavyāḥ uta ye yatra kriyamāṇāḥ arthavantaḥ te tatra kartavyāḥ iti 
[I,211,vi]	nanu saṃyuktāḥ eva śrūyante yathā vrīhīn avahanti taṇḍulān pinaṣṭī iti bāḍham saṃyuktāḥ avaghāta ādayaḥ tu padārthāḥ vidhīyante śrutyā vākyena eṣām vrīhi ādi saṃyogaḥ atas asti saṃśayaḥ kim tāvat prāptam teṣām arthena saṃbandhaḥ arthena prayojanena ye yatra kriyamāṇāḥ prayojanavantaḥ te tatra kartavyāḥ prathana ādayaḥ ājya sāntāyyayoḥ anupakārakāḥ iti na tatra karaṇīyāḥ evam utpavana ādayaḥ auṣadha sānnāyyayoḥ śākhā āharaṇa ādayaḥ ājya auṣadhayoḥ nanu śrūyante sarve sarvatra etat eva na jānīmaḥ śrūyante na śrūyante iti tat vicārāyitavyam yadi api śrūyaran tathā api anupakāraka tvāt na eva kartavyāḥ bhaveyuḥ 
[I,212,i_I,212,ii]	vihitaḥ tu sarva dharmaḥ syāt saṃyogataḥ aviśeṣāt prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt ca ucyate yaḥ arthāt prāptaḥ syāt sa yatra prayojanam tatra eva kriyeta śabdena tu sarve amī padārthāḥ vihitāḥ tena na yatra kevalam prayojanam pratyakṣam dṛśyate tatra eva kartavyāḥ kva tarhi yatra yatra vihitāḥ te ca amī sarvatra vihitāḥ gamyante kutas saṃyogataḥ aviśeṣāt prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt ca sarveṣām tāvat ājya auṣadha sānnāyyānām apūrveṇa sādhya sādhana saṃyogaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ yatra kriyamāṇāḥ apūrvasya kṛtā bhavati iti vijñāyate tathā prakaraṇam aviśiṣṭam yasmin vihitāḥ sarveṣām vihitāḥ bhavanti iti gamyate atas sarve sarvatra kartavyāḥ yat tu amī na sarvatra upakurvanti iti vidhāna sāmarthyāt sarvatra upakārakāḥ iti gamyate sa ca ayam adṛṣṭaḥ upakāraḥ bhaviṣyati 
[I,212,iii_I,212,iv]	artha lopāt akarma syāt na etat sarve sarvatra karaṇīyāḥ iti ye yatra na upakurvanti na te tatra kriyām arhanti iti uktam eva nanu vidhāna sāmarthyāt sarve sarvatra upkariṣyanti na iti brūmaḥ 
[I,213,i_I,213,ii^1]	phalam tu saha ceṣṭayā śabda arthaḥ abhāvāt viprayoge syāt na asti vidhānam yena sarve sarvatra upakurvanti na ca pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ upakāram avagacchāmaḥ arthāpattiḥ api niyogataḥ tatra eva bhavet yatra eva śabena codanā bhavati na anyathā yadi ca prathana ādīnām ājyasān nāyyayoḥ anupakurvatām api tad prakaraṇe samāmnāyaḥ anupapannaḥ bhavet tatas arthāt adṛṣṭaḥ upakāraḥ kalpyeta te tu avaśyam samāmnānīyāḥ auṣadha artham phalam hi saha ca iṣṭayā avahanana ādikayā avagamyate tuṣa vimocana ādi prayojanam ca tena na tasmāt ṛte puroḍāśaḥ sidhyati sati ca asmin arthavān prakaraṇe samāmnāyaḥ 
[I,213,ii^2]	arthavati ca tasmin na adṛṣṭa kalpanāyām pramāṇam asti iti atas na śakyam kalpayitum yadi ca tatra taṇḍula ādi niṣpādanam dṛṣṭam na abhaviṣyat tatas viprayoge taṇḍula ādīnām abhāvāt upakārasya śabda artha mātram dṛṣṭa upakāra anapekṣam kartavyam iti ājyasān nāyyayoḥ api kriyamāṇānām adṛṣṭam abhaviṣyat tasmāt na prathana ādayaḥ sarvatra evam utpavana ādayaḥ śākhā haraṇa ādayaḥ ca tasmāt na sarve sarvatra kartavyāḥ prathana ādayaḥ na ājya sānnāyayyoḥ auṣadhe eva te utpavana ādayaḥ ājyasya na auṣadha sānnāyyayoḥ śākhā haraṇa ādayaḥ ca sānnāyyasya na ājya auṣadhayoḥ iti siddham 
[I,213,iii_I,213,iv]	dravyam ca utpatti saṃyogāt tad artham eva codyeta staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra samāmananti sphyaḥ ca kapālāni ca agni hotra havaṇī ca śūrpam ca kṛṣṇājinam ca śamyā ca ulūkhalam ca musalam ca dṛṣṭat ca upalā ca etāni vai daśa yajñāyudhāni iti tatra saṃdihyate kim yaḥ yaḥ iha śakyate ebhiḥ kartum tasmai tasmai padārthāya etāni samāmnātāni uta yat yena saṃyuktam tasmai eva iti kim tāvat prāptam yat yena śakyam iti kutas evam vidhayaḥ bhaviṣyanti tathā arthanvataḥ itarathā te anuvādāḥ niṣprayojanāḥ prakaraṇa aviśeṣaḥ ca sarva padārthān prati yajñāyudhāni iti ca yajña saṃyogaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ tasmāt sarve sarvatra iti evam prāptam 
[I,214,i]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ dravyam ca utpatti saṃyogāt tad artham eva codyeta yaḥ yena padārthena saha utpatti vākyena saṃyuktaḥ sa padārthaḥ tena eva kartavyaḥ yathā sphyena uddhanti iti uddhana artha tā sphyasya vākyena tat uddhaṇanam na sphyāt anyena kartavyam yadā ca evam tadā prāptaḥ eva sphyaḥ tasya ayam anuvādaḥ bhavitum arhati etāni vai daśa yajña āyudhāni iti evam ekaisya anuvādaḥ tena tena vacanena prāptasya yathā kapāleṣu śrapayati agni hotra havaṇyā havīṃṣi nirvapati śūrpeṇa vivinakti kṛṣṇājinam adhastāt ulūkhalasya avastṛṇāti śamyāyām dṛṣadi upadadhāti ulūkhala musalābhyām avahanti dṛṣad upalābhyām pinaṣṭī iti prakaraṇāt sarvāṇi sarvatra prāpnuyuḥ vacanāt tu yathāvacanam yajña āyudha śabdaḥ api sāmānyena prayojanam vidadhat tat vā adhyeta eva parokṣam hi sāmānya vacanena viśeṣa vidhānam bhavati pratyakṣam tu viśeṣa vacanena viśeṣa vidhānam tasmāt yat yena utpattyā saṃyuktam tat tatra eva viniyujyate iti siddham 
[I,215,i_I,215,ii]	artha eka tve dravya guṇayoḥ aika karmyāt niyamaḥ syāt jyotiṣṭome krayam prakṛtya śrūyate aruṇayā piṅga akṣya ekahāyanyā somam krīṇāti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim aruṇimā kṛtsna prakaraṇe niviśete uta krayaḥ eva eka hāyanyām iti katham punar aruṇayā krīṇāti iti evam vispaṣṭe kraya saṃbandhe gamyamāne saṃśayaḥ iti ucyate iha hi guṇam aruṇimānam amūrtam santam kriyāyāḥ karaṇam iti śabdaḥ upadiśati yat karaṇa abhidhāyinyā tṛtīyā vibhaktyā saṃyujya nirdiśati aruṇayā iti na ca amūrtaḥ arthaḥ kriyāyāḥ sādhanam bhavitum arhati atas asaṃbandham krīṇātinā aruṇa guṇasya avagacchāmaḥ na ca aśaṅkanīyam artham pramāṇa bhūtaḥ śabdaḥ abhidhāsyati iti evam prakalpanā kadācid upapadyeta api kenacid prakāreṇa saṃbandhaḥ iti vacana prāmāṇya prakāra anveṣaṇe buddhiḥ bhavati tat yadi param vicārayantaḥ kriyā saṃbandha sāmarthyam avagamiṣyāmaḥ eka vākyatayā krayaḥ eva aruṇi mānam niveśayiṣyāmaḥ atha tu apramādyadbhiḥ anviṣyamāṇaḥ na kathaṃcana saṃbandhaḥ upapatsyate tatas vākya bhedam abhyupagamya prakaraṇa dharmam enam adhyavasāsyāmaḥ tasmāt avaśyam vicāraṇīyam etat iti 
[I,215,iii]	kim tāvat prāptam kṛtsne prakaraṇe niveśaḥ kasmāt saṃyogataḥ aviśeṣāt prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt ca nanu prakaraṇāt vākyam balīyaḥ bhavati iti eka vākya tvāt aruṇimā krayeṇa saṃbhantsyate iti na etat evam avagamyate na hi vacana śatena api anārabhyaḥ arthaḥ śakyaḥ vidhātum yaḥ hi brūyāt udakena dagdhavyam agninā kledayitavyam iti kim sa vacana prayojana sāmañjasyam aśnuvīta na ca amūrtaḥ arthaḥ kriyāyāḥ sādhanam upapadyate tasmāt aruṇayā krīṇāti iti saṃbandha abhāvāt eka vākyatā na bhavati iti 
[I,213,i]	nanu na eva ayam guṇa vacanaḥ kim tarhi dravya vacanaḥ kutas strī liṅga saṃbandhāt dravya viśeṣāḥ hi ete strī pumān napuṃsakam iti strīyām yat prātipadikam vartate tasmāt strī pratyayaḥ bhavati iti strī pratyayam ca aruṇayā iti upalabhāmahe tasmāt dravya vacanaḥ aruṇa śabdaḥ iti tat etat apeśalam tat eva hi dravyam aruṇimnā parichidyamānam aruṇa śabda abhidhānīyatām labhate tat eva anya guṇakam na aruṇa śabdaḥ śaknoti abhivaditum aruṇimānam eṣa śabdaḥ na vyabhicarati vyabhicarati punar dravyam avyabhicāri ca kāraṇam kāraṇavatām iṣṭam atas asya guṇaḥ sva arthaḥ iti gamyate tat asya pratyakṣataḥ guṇa vacana tā gamyate strī pratyaya darśanāt tu nūnam aruṇā prātipadikam dravya vacanam iti anumānam pratyakṣam ca anumānāt balīyaḥ tasmāt guṇa vacanaḥ katham tarhi strī pratyaya saṃbandhaḥ bhavati hi guṇa vacanasya api strī liṅga tā yathā ca aruṇā buddhiḥ evam aruṇa iti guṇa vacanaḥ ced krīṇātinā na saṃbadhyate tasmāt vākya bhedam kṛtvā prakaraṇe sarvasmin eva saṃniveśaḥ iti 
[I,213,ii]	atha yadi krīṇātinā na saṃbadhyate tasmin eva vākye eka hāyanī śabdena saṃbhantsyate na bhaviṣyati vākya bhedaḥ iti tat na kevalam hi guṇam aruṇa śābdaḥ abhidadhāti na dravya guṇau kevalam ca dravyam eka hāyanī śabdaḥ na guṇa sahitam iti tayoḥ saṃbandhasya vācikām ṣaṣṭhīm antareṇa katham saṃbandhaḥ gamyate āha antareṇa api ṣaṣṭhīm eka vibhakti nirdeśāt sāmānādhikaraṇyam avagamiṣyāmaḥ yathā nīlam utpalam iti tat anupapannam rūpāt aruṇa śabdasya guṇa vacana tā kalpanīyam tu eka vibhakti saṃyogāt eka hāyanī śabda saṃnidhānāt ca tat eka vākyatām abhyupagamya eka hāyanī śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyam na ca liṅgāt vākyam balīyaḥ tasmāt asat etat 
[I,217,i]	tatra ucyate yadā kevala guṇavacana tāyām śabdaḥ pravartamānaḥ na anyena saṃbandham labhate tadā anupadeśaka tvāt ānarthakyam mā bhūt iti dravya para tām āpadyate tasyām avasthāyām eka vibhakti yuktena eka hāyanī śabdena saṃnihitena eka vākyatām āpadyamānaḥ samāna adhikaraṇaḥ bhavati tathā ca kṛtvā nīlam utpalam iti upapadyate sa ca ayam aruṇā śabdaḥ tasyām avasthāyām vartate na hi asya sva artham abhidadhate itas vicchinnasya prakaraṇe api arthavat tā kutas yena eva hetunā saṃbadhyate krīṇātinā na na amūrtaḥ arthaḥ kriyāyāḥ sādhanam bhavati iti na ca kriyā sādhanaiḥ dravyaiḥ na hi kevala guṇa vacanaḥ śaknoti dravyam abhidhātum iti saḥ eva hetuḥ prakaraṇa saṃbandha abhāve api tatra api saṃbadhyamānaḥ kriyābhiḥ vā saṃbadhyeta tad sādhanaiḥ vā dravyaiḥ tat ca ubhayam api anupapannam atas anarthaka tva parijihīrṣayā saṃnihitena eka hāyanī śabdena aruṇā śabdaḥ saṃbadhyate na asti vākya bhedaḥ 
[I,217,ii]	na etat evam na hi ayam aruṇā śabdaḥ eka hāyanī viśeṣaṇam bhavitum arhati kim kāraṇam karaṇa vibhaktyā tṛtīyayā samuccaritaḥ ayam tena etena tṛtīyā śruti sāmarthyāt kriyā viśeṣaṇena bhavitavyam kārakāṇām hi kriyayā saṃbandhaḥ na dravyeṇa iti saḥ eṣa śruti sāmarthyāt kriyā viśeṣaṇam eka vākya tvāt eka hāyanī viśeṣaṇam śrutiḥ ca vākyāt balīyasī tasmāt na asya ekahāyanī saṃbandhaḥ iti 
[I,217,iii]	nanu ca guṇasya kriyā saṃbandha abhāvāt avivakṣitā kāraka śaktiḥ iti eka hāyanī saṃbandhaḥ ayam adhyavasitaḥ evam api na upapadyate yadi kāraka abhidhānam avivakṣitam iti guṇa śabdena etena dravyam abhidhātum iṣyate tadā prātipadikā arthasya avyatirekaḥ iti prathamā vibhaktiḥ prāpnoti na hi tṛtīya antaḥ tam abhisaṃbandham śaknoti vaktum na ca anyathā anupapattiḥ iti anyaḥ asya anupapadyamānaḥ arthaḥ śakyate kalpayitum yathā agnau tiṣṭhati māṇavakaḥ iti ukte jvalane anupapadyamānaḥ na aśve gavi vā kalpyate agni samīpa vacanaḥ eva adhyavasīyate tadvat iha api aprathama antaḥ śabdaḥ na kathaṃcid api avyatirikte prātipadikā arthe bhavitum arhati iti tasmāt kāmam anarthakaḥ avagamyatām na asya ekahāyanī saṃbandhaḥ adhyavasātavyaḥ 
[I,218,i^1]	āha na brūmaḥ na kārakam aruṇā śabdena abhidhīyate iti vyaktam aruṇa guṇa viśiṣṭam etena kārakam abhidhīyate kadācid tu kiṃcid vidhitsitam bhavati kadācid upasarjanībhūtaḥ arthaḥ vidhitsitaḥ pradhānībhūtaḥ anuvādaḥ tat yathā daṇḍī iti upasarjanī bhūta daṇḍaka puruṣa pradhānakaḥ śabdaḥ avagamyate kadācid tu nirjñāte puruṣe daṇḍa guṇa vidhāna artham uccāryate daṇḍī praiṣa ananvāha iti tathā lohiteṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti evam iha api yadi anupasarjana bhūtaḥ aruṇaḥ guṇaḥ pradhāna bhūtam kārakam tathā api anūdite kārake aruṇa guṇa vidhāna artham vacanam yujyate tasmāt eka hāyanī saṃbandhaḥ upapadyate na asti vākya bhedaḥ iti 
[I,218,i^2]	na etat sāram atra hi eka hāyanī krīṇātyoḥ anavabuddham saṃbandham bodhayitum ayam eka hāyanī śabdaḥ uccaritaḥ saḥ eṣa katham iva aruṇa aśabena saṃbadhyate tat etat abhihitam api punar punar paryanuyujjyate katham punar eka hāyanī śabdasya krīṇātinā aruṇa guṇena ca samāne samabhivyāhāre krīṇātinā saṃbandhaḥ abhyupagamanīyaḥ na punar āruṇyena iti śabda prāmāṇyāt bhavati hi kriyā saṃbandhasya vācikā vibhaktiḥ eka hāyanī śabdam anuniviṣṭā na tu guṇa saṃbandhasya vācikā kā punar kriyā saṃbandhasya vācikā kā vā guṇa saṃbandhasya iti kāraka lakṣaṇā kriyā saṃbandhe vivakṣite bhavati dvitīya ādiḥ avivakṣite punar kārake saṃbandha mātra vivakṣāyām ṣaṣṭhī na ca atra ṣaṣṭīm paśyāmaḥ paśyāmaḥ tu khalu tṛtīyām atas krīṇātinā saṃbandham abhyupagacchāmaḥ eka hāyanī śabdasya na aruṇā śabdena iti 
[I,219,i_I,219,ii]	katham tarhi bhavati atra saṃbandhaḥ nīlam uta palam iti ucyate bhavati na tu śruti lakṣaṇaḥ kim tu vākya lakṣaṇaḥ utpala śabda saṃnidhāne tad apekṣī nīla śabdaḥ tena eka vākyatām abhyupagacchat na ajahat sva artha vṛttiḥ upala viśeṣa abhidhāna paraḥ uccāryamāṇaḥ saṃbandham abhyupaiti nanu iha api vākya lakṣaṇaḥ tadvat eva aruṇimnā samam saṃbandhaḥ eka hāyanyā yujyate na iti brūmaḥ śrutiḥ hi vākyāt balīyasī śrutiḥ ca asyāḥ kriyā saṃbandham āha na guṇa saṃbandham yadi punar śruti sāmarthyāt kriyā saṃbandhaḥ abhyupagamyeta eka vākyatavat api guṇa saṃbandhaḥ na evam śakyam yaḥ hi anyena saha saṃbandhum uccāryate na tad samīpa gataḥ api anyaḥ tena saha saṃbanddhum arhati yathā bhāryā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ devadattasya iti bhāryā viśeṣaṇa artham uccāryamāṇaḥ rāja śabdaḥ na puruṣeṇa saṃbadhyate tadvat iha krayā viśeṣaṇa artham uccāryamāṇaḥ eka hāyanī śabdaḥ na aruṇā śabdena saṃbandham arhati 
[I,219,iii]	āha satyam evam etat asatyām ākāṅkṣāyām ānantaryam akāraṇam sarvatra tu bodhite padārthe vākya arthaḥ upapadyate na anyathā sāmānya vṛtti hi padam viśeṣa vṛtti vākyam sāmānyena abhipravṛttānām padārthānām yat viśeṣe avasthānam sa vākya arthaḥ tat etat uktam tad bhūtānām kriyā arthena samāmnāyaḥ arthasya tad nimitta tvāt iti tatra pratyakṣataḥ padārthaḥ vākya arthaḥ punar ānumānikaḥ tat etat avagamyatām kevala sva artha vṛtti padam anupadeśakam iti pada antareṇa saṃnihitena eka vākya tvam abhyupaiti na anyathā iti tat iha yadi api eka hāyanī śabdaḥ krīṇātinā saṃbandhyamānaḥ kṛtārthaḥ na pada antareṇa saṃbandham ākāṅkṣati aruṇā śabdaḥ tu pada antareṇa saṃbandham alabhamānaḥ anarthakaḥ iti eka hāyanī śabdena eka vākyatām abhyupaiti nanu uktam kriyā saṃbandha arthaḥ na aruṇa asaṃbandha arthaḥ iti 
[I,220,i]	āha aruṇā śabdasya anarthakya parihārāya ubhaya saṃbandha arthaḥ iti vadāmaḥ anya artham api kṛtam anya artham api śaknoti kartum tat yathā śāli artham kulyāḥ praṇīyante tābhyaḥ ca pānīyam pīyate upaspṛśyate ca evam iha api kraya saṃbandha artham eka hāyanī śabdaḥ uccāryamāṇaḥ aruṇā śabdena saha saṃbhantyate na kiṃcid duṣyati tasmāt na vākya bhedaḥ iti na etat asti yadi api ayam aruṇā śabdaḥ anarthakaḥ mā bhūt iti eka hāyanyā saṃbadhyeta tathā api sarvasmin prakaraṇe niveṣṭum arhati na ca enam somam krīṇāti iti eṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti viśeṣṭum na hi ayam viśeṣaṇa tvena ucāryate kim tarhi apūrvaḥ ayam vidhīyate 
[I,220,ii]	nanu apūrvaḥ api vidhīyamānaḥ eka hāyanī śabda vat itareṇa saṃbhantsyate katham prayojanāya hi uccāryamāṇaḥ śabdaḥ yena arthaḥ tasmai tāvat prayojanāya avakalpyate saṃnihitaḥ ca buddhau bhavati tena buddhau saṃnihitena śakyate sa ākāṅkṣaḥ śabdaḥ saṃbandhayitum iti na etat evam yaḥ hi asaṃbadhyamānaḥ anarthakaḥ bhavati sa saṃbadhyate na anyaḥ kutas etat saṃbadhyamāne hi sāmānyam viśeṣe avasthāpyeta tatra vākyena śrutiḥ pīḍitā syāt na ca ayam asaṃbadhyamānaḥ krīṇātinā anarthakaḥ bhavati prakaraṇa gatābhiḥ eka hāyanībhiḥ abhisaṃbhantsyate 
[I,221,i]	nanu etat uktam prakaraṇe api asya saṃbandhaḥ anupapannaḥ iti na anupapannaḥ ekasmin vākye anyaḥ arthaḥ vidhīyamānaḥ na anyena saṃbadhyate vacana vyakti bhedāt anyā hi vacana vyaktiḥ vidhīyamānasya anyāḥ guṇena saṃbadhyamānasya ajñāta vat jñāpyate vidhīyamānaḥ arthaḥ jñāta vat anūdyate guṇa saṃbandha artham na ca sakṛt uccāryamāṇaḥ jñāta vat ajñāta vat ca bhavitum arhati eka hāyanī śabdaḥ kraye vidhīyamānaḥ ajñāta vat syāt aruṇā śabdena saṃbadhyamānaḥ ca jñata vat vākya bhede punar na doṣaḥ bhavati prakaraṇe tu vākya antaraiḥ kriyā dravya antarāṇī ca prāptāni taiḥ idam vākya antara vihitam saṃbadhyate tatra anyasmin vidhīyate anyasmin vākye anūdyate iti upapannam bhavati tasmāt saṃyogataḥ aviśeṣāt prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt ca sarvasmin prakaraṇe dravyeṣu niveśaḥ iti 
[I,221,ii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ artha eka tve dravya guṇayoḥ aika karmyāt niyamaḥ syāt iti yatra artha eka tvam śrūyate dravya guṇayoḥ tatra dravya guṇau ekasmin padārthe niyamyeyātām kutas aika karmyāt eka kārya tvāt ekam hi kāryam dravya guṇayoḥ śrūyate kraya saṃbandhaḥ katham etat avagamyate eka vākya tvāt katham eka vākya tvam aruṇayā piṅga akṣya eka hāyanyā iti aparyavasitaḥ arthaḥ sa ākāṅkṣa tvāt abhidhātṛ pratipatroḥ somam krīṇāti iti tu paryavasyati tayoḥ evam nairutsukyāt yadi eka kārya tā kim iti vikalpaḥ na bhavati na etat evam eka arthāḥ tu vikalperan iti vikalpa dharmāṇau prāpnutaḥ iti ayuktaḥ ayam paryanuyogaḥ katham paryanuyogaḥ nāma sa bhavati yaḥ sva pakṣam sādhayati vipakṣasya ca pratīpam ācarati na ca vikalpaḥ asmad pakṣasya pratīpam ācarati krayeṇa aruṇim āsaṃbandhaḥ iti eṣa naḥ pakṣaḥ na ca vikalpaḥ nānā kārya tvāt 
[I,222,i^1]	nanu idānīm eva uktam ekam kāryam iti tat ca api viruddham evam hi pūrvam abhihitam amūrta tvāt guṇaḥ na kriyayā saṃbadhyate iti idānīm viparītam abhidhīyate ubhau api dravya guṇau eka arthau krayam abhinirvartayate iti ucyate na etat viruddham na ca vikalpaḥ ekam kāryam sāmarthya bhedaḥ tu sākṣāt dhi dravyam kriyām pratyupakaroti guṇaḥ tu viśiṣṭānām sādhanam yadi evam na tarhi guṇaḥ kriyām abhinirvartayati sādhanasya asau viśeṣakaḥ iti na etat evam guṇasya kriyām abhinirvartayate etat eva sāmarthyam yat sādhanam viśiṣyāt ākāṅkṣati ca kriyā sādhana viśeṣaṇam cihna bhūtaḥ hi guṇaḥ sādhanam lakṣayati 
[I,222,i^2]	asati cihne na lakṣyeta katamat sādhanam kriyāyāḥ iti tatas kriyā na adhyavasyema kartum iti bhavati kriyā sādhanam gunaḥ na ca eva sati vikalpaḥ bhavati yathā adhikaraṇasya kartṛ ādīnām ca adhikaraṇam hi kartṛ ādīni dhārayati tāni adhāryamāṇāni na śaknuvanti kriyām abhinirvartayitum tathā kartā karaṇa ādīni samādhatte tāni asamāhitāni na śaknuvanti svam svam artham abhinirvartayitum yasmin tu sādhana upakāre kārye tasmin eva upakāre anyat sādhanam vidhīyate tatra vikalpaḥ yathā vrīhim iryajeta yavaiḥ yajeta iti ubhaye api taṇḍula nirvṛti arthāḥ 
[I,222,ii]	evam tarhi tat eva idam saṃjātam bhavati eka hāyanī vidhanam tad viśeṣaṇam ca aruṇaḥ guṇaḥ tatra saḥ eva doṣaḥ vākya bhedaḥ prasajjyeta iti na brūmaḥ aruṇā śabdaḥ eka hāyanī śabdena saṃbadhyate iti kim tarhi krīṇātinā eva saṃbadhyate evam hi śrūyate aruṇa guṇena krayam abhinirvartayet iti yathā ca tena nirvartyate tathā yatitavya bhavati na ca aviśiṃṣan sādhanam guṇaḥ kriyām abhinivartayati iti arthāt sādhana viśeṣaṇa tām pratipadyate yathā sthālyām pacet iti kriyā sādhana tvena nirdiṣṭe arthāt saṃbhavane dhāraṇe ca syālīm vyāpārayati tadvat iha api draṣṭavyam tasmāt na asti vākya bheda prasaṅgaḥ iti 
[I,223,i]	nanu evam api vākyam bhidyeta katham pratyekam vākya parisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti yathā deva datta yajñadatta viṣṇu mitrā bhojyantām iti pratyekam bhujiḥ samāpyate yathā ca yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ somam na pivet iti evam iha api aruṇayā krīṇāti ekahāyanyā krīṇāti iti na etat asmad pakṣasya bādhakam evam api krayaḥ eva aruṇimā nivekṣyati na sarvasmin prakaraṇaḥ iti satyam eṣa doṣaḥ na bhavati kim tu anaruṇayā api eka hāyanyā krayaḥ prāpnoti aruṇayā ca aneka hāyanyā tatra yat uktam dravya guṇayoḥ niyamaḥ iti sā pratijñā hīyate na tarhi brūmaḥ vākya bhedaḥ iti katham krayasya hi dravya aruṇi mānau upadiśyete na krayaḥ tayoḥ na ca pradhānam pratiguṇam bhidyate pratipradhānam hi guṇaḥ bhidyate iti asti ca ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ samudāye vākya parisamāptiḥ iti yathā gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti tathā abhiṣutya hutvā bhakṣāyanti iti tasmāt ubhaya viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭaḥ krayaḥ vidhīyate 
[I,223,ii]	katham punar tasmin ca itarin ca dṛṣṭānte sati ekāntena avadhāryate samudāyaḥ eva vākya parisamāptiḥ na pratyavayavam iti atra brūmaḥ iha dravya aruṇi mānau ubhau api kriyā saṃbaddhau upalabhyete paraspareṇa asaṃbaddhau krayaḥ api dravya aruṇimābhyām viśiṣṭaḥ upalabhyate na anyayatareṇa tatra yadi dravya param aruṇim aparam ca bhavati vacanam idam tatas pratyavayavam asaṃśayam kraya saṃbandhaḥ atha kraya vidhitsayā abhidhīyate tatas yathā eva ayam eka hāyanī viśiṣṭaḥ evam aruṇim aviśiṣṭaḥ iti niyamataḥ ubhaya saṃbandhaḥ abhyupagamanīyaḥ na ca atra dravya aruṇi mānau īpsitau īpsitaḥ tu krayaḥ tena hi jyotiṣṭoma dravyam somaḥ pariprāpyate dravya aruṇi mānau kraya arthau santau īpsitau syātām na anyathā tasmāt krayaḥ vidhīyate sa ca na anyatara viśiṣṭaḥ pratīyate iti samudāye vākya parisamāptiḥ iha niścīyate yadā ca evam tadā na eka hāyanīm muktvā anyat dravyam kraya sa adhanam asti na ca aruṇāt anyaḥ sādhanasya viśeṣakaḥ guṇaḥ iti niyamaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati 
[I,224,i]	atra vadāmaḥ yadi krayasya sādhane guṇaḥ abhisaṃbandhum upaiti tadā vākye bhinne api kraya sādhana tvāt aruṇimā asmin dravye na nivekṣyate kim artham eka vākyatā prayatnena sādhyate iti tat etat abhidhīyate bhinne hi vākyaḥ ekāhāyanī sādhanakaḥ krayaḥ avabuddhaḥ bhavati aruṇā sādhanam api kraya antaram na tasmin eva eka hāyanī sādhane kraye aruṇimā vihitaḥ bhavati tatra yat kraya antaram aruṇa guṇa viśiṣṭam tatra arthāt prāptam anyat api sādhanam bhavati tat api viśiṃṣan aruṇaḥ guṇaḥ tena saṃbadhyeta eka vākya tve tu tat parihṛtam bhavati tasmāt sādhu abhidhīyate artha eka tve dravya guṇayoḥ aika karmyāt niyamaḥ syāt iti 
[I,224,ii_I,224,iii]	eka tva yuktam ekasya śruti saṃyogāt asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ yaḥ evam vidvān somena yajate iti tatra śrūyate daśā pavitreṇa graham samārṣṭi iti tathā agnihotre srūyate agneḥ tṛṇāni apacinoti iti tathā darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate puroḍāśam paryagnikaroti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ekasya grahasya ekasya agneḥ ekasya puroḍāśasya ca saṃmārjana ādi kartavyam uta sarveṣām grahāṇām sarveṣām agnīnām sarveṣām puroḍāśānām iti kim prāptam ekaḥ grahaḥ ekaḥ agniḥ ekaḥ puroḍāśaḥ iha grahītavyaḥ kutas śruti saṃyogāt ekatva śruti saṃyuktāḥ ete padārthāḥ ekam hi dravyam eṣa śrūyate śabda lakṣaṇe ca hi karmaṇi yat śabdaḥ āha tat asmākam pramāṇam yathā paśum ālabheta iti uktaḥ ekaḥ eva paśuḥ pumān ca ālabhyate evam atra api ekaḥ grahaḥ saṃmārjanīyaḥ ekasya agneḥ tṛṇāni apaceyāni ekaḥ puroḍāśaḥ paryagnikartavyaḥ iti 
[I,225,i_I,225,ii]	sarveṣām vā lakṣaṇa tvāt aviśiṣṭam hi lakṣaṇam na etat asti yat uktam graha ādiṣu eka tva yukteṣu amī padārthāḥ kartavyāḥ iti sarve grahāḥ saṃmārṣṭavyāḥ sarvebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ tṛṇāni apaceyāni puroḍāśa mātram ca paryagnikartavyam iti kutas graha jātyā dravyam lakṣayitvā saṃmārga ādi vidhīyate aviśiṣṭam ca lakṣaṇam sarva dravyeṣu tatra na gamyate viśeṣaḥ kaḥ grahaḥ saṃmārṣṭavyaḥ kaḥ na iti sāmānya avagamāt viśeṣān avagamāt ca sarva pratyayaḥ tathā agni puroḍāśānām api nanu eka vacanam śrūyate tat viśekṣyati na etat asti eka tvam hi śrūyamāṇam graha ādiṣu eka tvam brūyāt na dvitīya ādīn pratiṣedhet eka tvasya asau vācakaḥ na dvitīya ādeḥ pratiṣedhakaḥ tena apratiṣiddhe dvitīya ādau sāmānya vacanena prāptam saṃmārjana ādi kim iti na kriyeta 
[I,226,i]	tatra etat syāt eka vacanam iha śrūyamāṇam prāptaḥ eva ekasmin dravye dvitīya ādiṣu ca kim anyat kuryāt anyatas parisaṃkhyāyāḥ na ced eka vacanam parisaṃcakṣīta dvitīya ādīn anarthakam eva syāt śaknoti ca dvitīya ādīn nivartayitum yathā aśva abhidhānīm ādatte iti gardabha abhidhānam parisaṃcaṣṭe evam atra api draṣṭavyam iti 
[I,226,ii]	na etat evam tatra mantrasya abhidhānyāḥ ca yaḥ saṃbandhaḥ tat abhidhāna param vacanam imām agṛbhṇān iti aśva abhidhānīm iti na anena mantreṇa ādattaḥ iti liṅgena eva ādāne prāpta tvāt mantrasya parisaṃkhyā yuktā iha punar yat eka vacanam dravye śrūyate tat śrūyamāṇam api avidhīyamāna tvena na nivartakam bhavitum arhati yathā kaścid odanam nirdiśya brūyāt yaḥ enam bhakṣayet kaścid śvā mārjāraḥ vā sa nivārayitavyaḥ iti tatra yadi bhakṣaṇam nimitta tvena vidhīyate na śva mārjāra saṃbandhaḥ tatas kākaḥ api āgacchat nivāryate śrūyamāṇe api śuni mārjāre vā śva mārjāra saṃbandhasya nimitta tvena avidhīyamāna tvāt evam iha api ekatva saṃbandhasya avidhīyamāna tvāt śrūyamāṇe api ekatve graha mātram saṃmṛjyeta iti 
[I,226,iii]	na ca atra dravya ekatva saṃbandha vidhāyakaḥ kaścid śabdaḥ asti nanu saṃmārṣṭi iti na hi etat dravya ekatva saṃbandhasya vidhāyakam kasya tarhi dravya saṃmārga saṃbandhasya vidhāyakam evam śrutyā sva pada arthaḥ vihitaḥ bhavati itarathāḥ vākyena para padārthaḥ vidhīyate śruti asaṃbhave ca vākyam kramate na saṃbhavantyām śrutau atas avidhīyamānam viśeṣaṇa tvena eka tvam na dvitīya ādīn pratiṣeddhum arhati evam sati na dvitīya ādau saṃmārga ādi kriyamāṇam acoditam bhavati pratiṣiddham vā yathā eva hi tat ekasya śrutam avagamyate tathā dvitīya ādeḥ api 
[I,227,i]	ayam ca aparaḥ doṣaḥ na tat eka tvam dravyasya saṃmārga ādau viṣaye niyamyeta na hi saṃmārga ādiḥ yasmin dravyaḥ ekatvam niyamyeta tasya viśeṣaṇa tvena bhavati vidhīyate hi atra saṃmārga ādiḥ na prāptaḥ lakṣaṇa tvena dravyasyāmnāyate na hi yaugapadyena vidhātum śakyate lakṣaṇa tvena ca uccārayitum prasiddha saṃbandhaḥ hi śaknoti lakṣayitum na ca avihitaḥ evaṃjātīyakaḥ śabdau agamyaḥ prasiddha saṃbandhaḥ bhavati vidhīyate ca saṃmārga ādiḥ tasmāt na viśeṣakaḥ na ced viśeṣakaḥ na dravyaḥ ekatvam niyamyate iti śakyam āśrayitum 
[I,227,ii]	atha ekatvam saṃmārgaḥ ucyate tatra api dvayī gatiḥ syāt eka tvam pradhānam saṃmārgaḥ vā tat ca ubhayam api anupapannam na tāvat eka tvasya saṃmārgaḥ śākyate kartum na ca dravye kriyamāṇaḥ eka tvasya upakaroti kenacid prakaraṇam na ca eka tvasya upakṛtena kiṃcid prayojanam asti na hi tat guṇa bhūtam śrutam atha ekatvam saṃmārgam prati guṇa bhūtam iti tat api na katham amūrta tvāt na hi tat saṃmārgam niṣpādayati yadi api anyat amūrtam kriyām niṣpādayati sādhanam viśiṃṣat tathā api etat na bhavitum arhati na hi atra grahaḥ saṃmārga arthaḥ saṃmārgaḥ atra grahāya codyate sa hi prayojanavān kalpya prayojanaḥ saṃmārgaḥ yadi grahaḥ saṃmārgasya upakuryāt tat upakāriṇaḥ upakaroti iti saṃmārgasya upakārakam eka tvam bhavet na tu etat evam tasmāt eka tva saṃmārgayoḥ asaṃbandhaḥ 
[I,227,iii^1]	nanu pradhāna bhutam api graha ādi saṃmārgam niṣpādayati eva atas tad sādhanam tat ca viśiṃṣat tat upakariṣyati yathā ijyā arthe dadhani payasi ca praṇītāḥ dharmāḥ pāke upakurvanti paridhāna arthe ca paridau yūpa dharmāḥ bandhane tasmāt ayam asamādhiḥ iti atra ucyate na brūmaḥ atad arthe sādhake na śaknuvanti upakartum iti kim tarhi yadā pradhāna bhūtam graha ādi lakṣaṇa tvena ucyate na tadā ekatvasya graha ādinā saṃbandhaḥ na saṃmārga ādinā iti katham yāvat iha lakṣaṇa tvena kiṃcid ucyate saṃvādaḥ tatra bhavati na tu tat vidhīyate vijñānāya kim artham tarhi uccāryate anyat tasya kiṃcid vidhāyiṣyate iti tat etat graha ādi lakṣayitvā tasya saṃmārga ādi vidhīyate 
[I,227,iii^2]	tat yadi ekatva saṃbandhaḥ aparaḥ graha dravye saṃmārga ādau vā padārthe vidhīyeta dvayoḥ saṃbandhayoḥ vidhānāt bhidyeta vākyam atha ucyeta graha ādi lakṣayitvā tasya ekatva saṃbandhaḥ vidhīyate na saṃmārga ādi saṃbandhaḥ iti tathā ca saṃmārga ādīnām adhyayanam pramādaḥ iti abhyupagatam syāt na ca etat evam tasmāt ubhābhyām eka vacanasya asaṃbandhaḥ iti evam etat eka tvam grahasya na kiṃcid upakāram karoti na saṃmārgasya evam eva sadanūdyate tasmāt na etat kiṃcid api kartum vivakṣyate iti sarveṣām graha ādīnām saṃmārga ādi kartavyam iti kutas saṃyogataḥ aviśeṣāt prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt ca 
[I,228,i]	yadi avivakṣitam eka tvam katham trahi eka vacanam uccāryate nanu bahuṣu vivakṣiteṣu bahuvacanena bhavitavyam ucyate na vayam etat vicārayāmaḥ eka vacanam uccārayitavyam na uccārayitavyam iti uccāryamāṇe sati kim pratipattavyam ekasmin eva saṃmārga ādi uta sarveṣu iti tat ca sarveṣu iti sthāpitam api ca na vibhakteḥ vacanam eva ekam prayojanam kim tarhi kāraka saṃbandhaḥ api avivakṣitaḥ eka tve kāraka saṃbandha artham asya uccāraṇam bhaviṣyati tasmāt na anarthakam 
[I,228,ii]	api ca grahaḥ prātipadikā arthaḥ ekatvam vibhakti arthaḥ kim atas yadi evam etat atas bhavati prātipadikā artha gatam hi vibhaktiḥ svam artham śrutyā eva vadati atha evam sati kim na saṃmārgeṇa saṃbhantsyate iti tena hi saṃbadhyamānam vākyena saṃbadhyeta na ca śrutyā anyena saṃbadhyamānam vākyena acchidya anyena saṃbandham arhati asaṃbadhyamānaḥ tu ekatvena saṃmārgaḥ yadi na ekatva viśiṣṭaḥ kriyate na kiṃcid vipannam bhavati na ca eka tva viśiṣṭaḥ saṃmārga ādiḥ graha ādi mātrasya ca vidhīyate iti kim iti dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca na kriyeta iti 
[I,229,i_I,229,ii]	codite tu para artha tvāt yathāśruti patīyeta atha yat uktam yathā paśum ālabheta iti ekaḥ eva paśuḥ puṃpaśuḥ ca ālabhyate evam idam api iti asti atra vaiparītyam iha graha arthaḥ saṃmārgaḥ tatra punar yāga arthaḥ paśuḥ kim evam sati bhavati yaḥ yāga artham paricchinati sa yāgasya upakaroti aparicchinnena na śakyaḥ yāgaḥ kartum iti na tu graheṇa kenacid viśiṣṭena saṃmārgaḥ kartavyaḥ yat graham viśiṃṣat saṃmārgasya upkuryāt paśoḥ ca etat eka tvam yāgam pratyupadiśyate nanu uktam prātipadikā artha gatam svam artham vibhaktiḥ śrutyā eva abhivadati iti yāgaḥ etat vākyena vidhāsyati tatra vākyāt śrutiḥ balīyasi iti uktam satyam yatra śrautaḥ abhisaṃbandhaḥ vivakṣyate avivakṣyamāṇe ca vākya avagataḥ san aparyudasitavyaḥ bhavati tasmāt ekaḥ puṃpaśuḥ ca alabhyate iti graha ekatvam na saṃmārgasya upakaroti iti na graham śaknoti viśeṣṭum tasmāt avivakṣitam iti 
[I,230,i_I,230,iii]	saṃskārāt vā guṇānām avyavasthā syāt asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ tatra śrūyate daśā pavitreṇa graham saṃmārṣṭi iti tatra eṣaḥ arthaḥ adhigataḥ sarve grahāḥ saṃmārjitavyāḥ iti idam idānīm saṃdihyate kim camasā api saṃmārṣṭavyāḥ uta na iti kim tāvat prāptam camasa ādi api sarvam saṃmārjyam iti kutas saṃyogataḥ aviśeṣāt prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt ca iti yathā eva hi grahāṇām apūrva saṃbandhaḥ evam camasānām api yathā eva ca grahāḥ asmin prakaraṇe evam camasā api tasmāt sarvatra saṃmārgaḥ 
[I,230,iv]	nanu grahāḥ śrūyante te camasānām nirvartakāḥ bhaviṣyanti ucyate pradarśana artham graha grahaṇam bhaviṣyati graha ādi soma pātram yasmin gṛhyamāṇaḥ somaḥ vyavasicyeta iti evam āśaṅkyate tat sarvam saṃmārjitavyam yathā bhojana kālaḥ vartate sthālāni saṃmṛjyantām iti ukte yāni yāni bhojane upayogam arhanti tāni tāni sarvāṇi saṃmṛjyante sthāla grahaṇam lakṣaṇa artham iti gamyate evam iha api draṣṭavyam iti 
[I,230,v]	ucyate loke artha lakṣaṇaḥ saṃvyavahāraḥ yena yena arthaḥ saṃmṛṣṭena uktaḥ anuktaḥ vā sa sa saṃmṛjyeta eva iha tu vede śabda lakṣaṇaḥ śabdaḥ ca grahasya saṃmārgam āha tatra kim artham śrutau saṃbhavantyām graha śabdaḥ lakṣaṇayā kalpyate ucyate saṃmārṣṭi iti saṃmārge puruṣa prayatnam vidhātum eṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti śravaṇena eva graha saṃbandhe tu vākyena śrutiḥ ca vākyāt balīyasī tasmāt lakṣaṇayā graha śabdaḥ varṇyate na yathāśrutaḥ iti tena yaḥ yaḥ saṃmārjana saṃskāra arhaḥ sa sa saṃmārjitavyaḥ na iti graheṣu eva vyavatiṣṭheta evaṃjātīyakaḥ guṇaḥ iti 
[I,231,i_I,231,ii]	vyavasthā vā arthasya śruti saṃyogāt tasya śabda pramāṇa tvāt vyavatiṣṭheta vā graheṣu eva saṃmārgaḥ na camaseṣu api prasajyeta iti kutas arthasya śruti saṃyogāt śrūyamāṇaḥ hi grahaḥ na utsraṣṭavyaḥ utsṛjyamāne śrutiḥ eva bādhyate graham iti pramatta gītam tatra bhavatām iti avagamyate na ca etat nyāyyam tasmāt graha śabdena graham lakṣayitvā tasya saṃmārga saṃbandhaḥ vidhīyate na ca avidadhat saṃmārgam śaknoti tad saṃbandham vidhātum atas vidadhāti eva eṣa śabdaḥ saṃmārgam na ca śrutiḥ bādhiṣyate kutas saṃmārṣṭi iti saṃmṛji gatam puruṣa prayatnam śrutyā śaknoti vidhātum na tatra kaścid viśeṣaḥ utpādyamāne vā saṃmṛjau pareṇa vā saṃbadhyamānaḥ iti tena na graha saṃbandhe api śrutiḥ bādhitā bhavati atas graheṣu eva saṃmārgaḥ vyavasthātum arhati iti 
[I,231,iii]	nanu apūrva saṃyoga aviśeṣāt prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt ca camaseṣu api prasajyate na graheṣu eva asya vidhānam iti uktam atra ucyate prakaraṇavadbhiḥ eka vākyatām kṛtvā śaknoti tatra vidhātum na akṛtvā eka vākyatām sā ca prakaraṇāt anumīyate iyam punar graha śabdena saha pratyakṣā tasmāt na prakaraṇe vidhānam graha ekatva saṃbandhe punar utsṛjya sva artham na śaknoti vidhātum tasmāt vaiṣamyam asya graha eka tva vidhānena yat uktam yathā sthālāni saṃmṛjyantām iti lakṣaṇā tadvat iha api iti parihṛtam etat loke karma artham lakṣaṇam śabda lakṣaṇam punar vedaḥ iti 
[I,232,i_I,232,ii]	ānarthakyāt tad aṅgeṣu vājapeye śrūyate saptadaśa aratniḥ vājapeyasya yūpaḥ bhavati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim saptadaśa āratni tā vājapeyasya ūrdhva pātre niviśate uta paśoḥ yūpe niviśate iti kim tāvat prāptam ūrdhvapātre iti kutas vājapeyasya yūpa abhāvāt yat vājapeyasya asti pātram yūpa sadṛśam tatra bhavitum arhati asti ca ṣoḍaśi pātram tat ca khādira tvāt ūrdhva tvāt ca yūpa sadṛśam tatra niveśe sati vājapeya śabdaḥ āñjasyena bhavati itarathā vājapeya aṅga paśu yāge lakṣaṇayā vājapeya śabdaḥ vṛttaḥ iti gamyate nanu tvad pakṣe api yūpa śabdaḥ lakṣaṇayordhva pātre ucyate sarvathā vayam lakṣaṇā śabdān na mucyāmahe mad pakṣe tu vājapeya prakaraṇam anugṛhyate tasmāt ūrdhva pātre niveśaḥ iti 
[I,232,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ ānarthakyāt tad aṅgeṣu vājapeya śabdaḥ tāvat soma yāga viśeṣa vacanaḥ tasya sākṣāt yūpena na prayojanam asti tu tasya aṅgam paśu yāgaḥ tasya tu paśum bandhum yūpena kāryam sākṣāt vājapeya yūpasya yadi saptadaśa āratni tā vidhīyate tasya abhāvāt anarthakam eva vacanam prāpnoti tat anarthakam mā bhūt iti yaḥ asya paśu yāge yūpaḥ tatra niveśam arhati ūrdhva pātre ca yūpa śabdaḥ lakṣaṇayā syāt nanu itarasmin api pakṣe vājapeya śabdaḥ lakṣaṇayā iti na iti brūmaḥ vājapeyaḥ eva vājapeya śabdaḥ bhaviṣyati śakṣyati ca sa paśu yūpam viśeṣṭum saḥ asya aṅgasya upakārakaḥ yaḥ ca yasya upakāriṇaḥ upakaroti bhavati sa tasya saṃbaddhaḥ mukhyena eva saṃbandhena na ca eka antaritam iti kṛtvā asaṃbaddhaḥ bhavati yathā devadattasya naptā iti putreṇa ca asau antaritaḥ atha ca devadattena mukhyena eva saṃbandhena saṃbaddhaḥ tasmāt eṣaḥ eva pakṣaḥ āśrayaṇīyaḥ na hi etasmin pakṣe kaścid api lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ bhavati iti 
[I,233,i_I,233,ii]	kartṛ guṇe tu karma asamavāyāt vākya bhedaḥ syāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ prayāja vākye śrūyate abhikrāmam juhoti abhijitya iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim abhikramaṇam prayājeṣu eva niviśataḥ uta kṛtsne prakaraṇaḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam kartṛ guṇe abhikramaṇe brūmaḥ vākya bhedaḥ syāt iti karmaṇā karmaṇaḥ asamavāyāt abhikramaṇam karma amūrtam na tat karma havanam sādhayitum śaknoti tasmāt na tena eka vākya tām yāti atas sarvasmin prakaraṇe niviśate saṃyogataḥ aviśeṣāt prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt ca iti
