[I,233,iii]	nanu anena eva hetunā ani asmin api na nivekṣyate ucyate anyatra puruṣaiḥ saṃbhantsyate nanu prayājeṣu api puruṣaiḥ saṃbadhyeta na etat evam juhoti iti havanaḥ eṣa śabdaḥ puruṣa prayatnam vidhātum śaknoti na puruṣa abhikramaṇa asaṃbandham nanu anyatra api puruṣa abhikramaṇa saṃbandhasya avidhānam na eṣa doṣaḥ anyatra prakaraṇa āmnānāt aṅga bhāve nirjñāte prayoga vacanaḥ asya kartavyatām vakṣyati tasmāt sarvasmin prakaraṇe abhikramaṇasya niveśaḥ iti 
[I,233,iv_I,233,v]	sa ākāṅkṣam tu eka vākyam syāt asamāptam hi pūrveṇa na etat asti yat uktam abhikramaṇam prakaraṇe niviśate iti prayājeṣu eva bhavitum arhati kutas taiḥ saha asya eka vākyatā yatas sākāṅkṣam etat pūrveṇa padena asamāptam vākyam abhikrāmam juhoti iti atra paryavasyati prakaraṇāt ca vākyam balavat iti prayājeṣu eva abhikramaṇam niviśate nanu abhikramaṇam amūrta tvāt dhoma nirvṛttau asamartham iti uktam ucyate sākṣāt asamartham kartrā saṃbadhyamānam śakṣyati nirvartayitum katham abhikramaṇena samāsīdati āhavanīyam kartā dvayam abhyupāya bhūtam homasya dūrāt vā abhiprasārya hastam juhuyāt samāsīdet anvābhikramaṇena tasmāt abhikramaṇam upakaroti homasya iti avagamyate atas prayājeṣu eva niveśaḥ iti 
[I,234,i_I,234,ii]	saṃdigdhe tu vyavāyāt vākya bhedaḥ syāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ saptama aṣṭamayoḥ brāhmaṇa anuvākayoḥ sāmidhenyaḥ uktāḥ navame nividaḥ daśame kāmyāḥ sāmidhenī kalpāḥ idam kāmasya etāvatīḥ anubrūyāt idam kāmasya etāvatīḥ iti ekādaśe ca yajñopavītam āmnātam upavyayate deva lakṣmam eva tat kurutaḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim sāmidhenīḥ eva anubruvāṇaḥ upavyayeta uta prakaraṇe sarvān eva padārthān anutiṣṭhatā upavyātavyam iti kutas saṃśayaḥ upavītam sāmidhenīnām prakaraṇe samāmnātam atha nivṛtte vā tāsām prakaraṇaḥ iti na jñāyate 
[I,234,iii]	nanu darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ eva prakaraṇam idam para prakaraṇe sāmidhenyaḥ śrūyante satyam para prakaraṇe śrūyante tathā api tāsām avāntara prakaraṇam aparam bhavati hi sāmidhenīḥ anubrūyāt iti viśeṣa ākāṅkṣam vacanam yena tad saṃnidhau abhidhīyamānam tasya iti jñāyate katham punar nivṛttam tāsām prakaraṇam iti āśaṅkyate nivid padāni tāsām prakaraṇam vyavadadhati iti yadi evam katham anuvartate prakaraṇam iti āśaṅkā parastāt nividām sādmidhenī guṇāḥ eva kāmyāḥ vidhīyamānāḥ śrūyante yat anantaram yajñopavītam āmnātam tena anivṛttam sāmidhenīnām prakaraṇam iti bhavati matiḥ atas para prakaraṇe nividaḥ samupanipatitā na vyavadadhati yathā
[I,235,i_I,235,ii]	dvādaśa upasattā hīna dharmaḥ jyotiṣṭoma prakaraṇaḥ iti tena bhavati saṃdehaḥ asmin saṃdehe kim tāvat prāptam sāmidhenī prakaraṇam anivṛttam tatra upavītam samāmnātam iti kutas kāmyānām sāmidhenī kalpānām ānantarya vacanāt hṛdayam anuviparivartamānāsu sāmidhenīṣu upavītam āmananti kartuḥ ca vāsaḥ vinyāsa mātram guṇaḥ bhavati upavītam nāma kim kurvatā tat kartavyam iti bhavati tatra padārtha ākāṅkṣā tatra buddhau saṃnihitena aviprakṛṣṭena sāmidhenī vākyena eka vākyatām upagamya sāmidhenīṣu upavītam upavyayate iti eṣa śabdaḥ vidadhāti iti gamyate 
[I,235,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ na asmin saṃdehe yaḥ tu ayoktaḥ sa nirṇayaḥ asmin saṃdehe vākya bhedaḥ iti nirṇayaḥ iti kutas vyavāyāt iha samāptasya sa anubandhasya sāmidhenī vākyasya asya ca upavyayate iti vacanasya nividām vidhāyakena sāmidhenībhiḥ asaṃbaddhena granthena vyavadhānam bhavati yasya ca paryavasite api vacane tad saṃbaddham eva artha antaram prakramante na tatra ananuvṛttam prakaraṇam āgacchati hi tad saṃbaddha abhidhāne hṛdayam yatra tu paryavasite vacane tad asaṃbaddham eva artha antaram prakramante na tatra buddhau pūrvaḥ padārthaḥ saṃnidhīyate na ca buddhau asaṃnihitena eka vākyatā bhavati dvābhyām hi buddhābhyām padārthābhyām vākya arthaḥ saṃjanyate na anyatareṇa saṃnidhau samāmnānasya etat eva prayojanam katham ubhābhyām padārthābhyām viśiṣṭām buddhim utpādayeyuḥ iti anantarau abuddhena saha vākya arthaḥ śakyate kartum asaṃbaddha pada uccāraṇe ca na anantarau abuddhaḥ bhavati tasmāt vyavahitena saha na eka vākyatā bhavati iti 
[I,236,i]	atha anyena prakāreṇa dhyāna ādinā pūrva padārtham avagamya vākya artham saṃjanayet avaidikaḥ sa puruṣa buddhiḥ pūrvakaḥ vākya arthaḥ bhavet yathā anyasmāt anuvākāt ākhyāta padam gṛhītvā anyasmāt ca nāma padam yaḥ vākya arthaḥ saṃjanyate tādṛśam tat bhavet yatra anyena dhyāna ādinā pūrva padārtham avagamya vākya artham saṃjanayet tasmāt na asaṃbaddha artha vyavadhāna eka vākyatā bhavati iti niścīyate tasmāt na sāmidhenībhiḥ eka vākyatā upavītasya iti nanu sāmidhenī kalpānām anantara buddhānām saṃnidhau upavītam āmnāyate tena sāmidhenībhiḥ saṃbhantsyate iti na iti brūmaḥ ativṛttam eva hi sāmidhenīnām prakaraṇam nivitpadaiḥ vyavadhānāt vākyena hi
[I,236,ii]	sāmidhenī kalpāḥ kāmyāḥ saṃbandham upagacchanti na prakaraṇam anuvartate na ca punar kalpa vacanena sāmidhenyaḥ prakṛtāḥ bhavanti na hi tatra tāsām vacanam kartavyāḥ iti kim tarhi saṃkhyābhiḥ saṃbandhayitavyāḥ iti tat api vākyena na prakaraṇena tatra aprakṛtāsu samidhenīṣu yasya eka vākyatā guṇasya sāmidhenībhiḥ na asti na tasya tābhiḥ saṃbandhaḥ tasmāt prakaraṇe yat anuṣṭheyam tat yajñopavītinā iti siddham 
[I,236,iii_I,236,iv]	guṇānām ca parārtha tvāt asaṃbandhaḥ sama tvāt syāt agnyādheye vāraṇa vaikaṅkata pātrāṇi ahoma arthāni homa arthāni ca śrūyante tasmāt vāraṇaḥ vai yajñāvacaraḥ syāt na tu etena juhuyāt vaikaṅkataḥ yajñāvacaraḥ syāt juhuyāt etena iti na ca vāraṇa vaikaṅkatānām pātrāṇām agnyādheyena saṃbandhaḥ kutas yajñau acara vacanāt yajñasya etāni pātrāṇi vākyena prakaraṇam bādhitvā bhavanti tatra eṣa saṃdehaḥ kim pavam āneṣṭiṣu niviśante uta darśa pūrṇamāsa ādiṣu sarva yāgeṣu iti kim tāvat prāptam pavamāna haviḥṣu iti kutas uktam etat pradhāne asaṃbhavan padārthaḥ tad guṇe kalpyate iti agni ādheya prakaraṇe ca samāmnānāt pavamāna haviṣām tad guṇa tā tasmāt pavamāna haviḥṣu iti evam prāptam 
[I,237,i]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ guṇānām sama tvāt pava māna haviṣām agnyādheyasya ca na paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ yathādhānam agneḥ guṇaḥ saṃskāra arthaḥ evam pavamāna havīṃṣi api agneḥ eva guṇa bhūtāni kaḥ tatra paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ iti yat uktam ādhānasya prakaraṇe samāmnāyante iti yadi api samāmnāyante tathā api prakaraṇam bādhitvā vākyena agneḥ bhavanti kim iha vākyam yat āhavanīye juhoti tena saḥ asya abhīṣṭaḥ prītaḥ bhavati iti 
[I,237,ii]	nanu āhavanīyaḥ atra yāgasya adhikaraṇa tvena guṇa bhūtaḥ śrūyate satyam adhikaraṇam āhavanīyaḥ tathā api tu āhavanīya arthaḥ eva yāgaḥ prayojanavat tvāt āhavanīyasya niṣprayojana tvāt pavamāna haviṣām katham eṣām niṣprayojana tā phala aśravaṇāt kalpyam phalam iti ced satyam kalpyam agni saṃskāraḥ tu tad phalam na svargaḥ svarge kalpyamāne dvis adṛṣṭam kalpyeta homāt ca svargaḥ bhavati tasya ca āhavanīyena aparaḥ adṛṣṭaḥ saṃskāraḥ iti tasmāt agni artha tā pavamāna haviṣām na eṣām ādhānena saṃbandhaḥ tasmāt na ādhāne śrūyamāṇam pavamāna haviṣām bhavitum arhati kim tarhi sarva yāgeṣu darśa pūrṇamāsa prabhṛtiṣu ādhānasya pradhāna bhūteṣu niveśaḥ iti 
[I,238,i_I,238,ii]	mithas ca anartha saṃbandhāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate vārtraghnī paurṇamāsyām anūcyete vṛdhanvati amau asyāyām iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim anuvākyādvi tvasya pradhāne niveśaḥ uta ājya bhāgayoḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam pradhānaḥ iti kutas paurṇamāsīsamabhivyāhārāt amau asya asamabhivyāhārāt ca pradhānam paurṇamāsī ca āmau asyā ca na ājya bhāgau tasmāt sākṣāt vākyāt pradhānasya iti prāptam 
[I,238,iii]	tatra brūmaḥ mithas saha dvābhyām anuvākyābhyām na pradhānasya kāryam asti yatra tu dva anuvākye tatra tayoḥ vārtraghna tā vṛdhanvattā ca vidhīyate pradhāne ca eka anuvākyā tatra dvi tvam vārtraghna tām vṛdhanvat tām ca vidadhat vākyam bhidyeta ājya bhāgayoḥ tu dve prāpte āgneyī saumī ca tatra vārtraghna tām vṛdhanvat tām kevalām śakṣyati vidhātum nanu pradhāna gāmi tve api dvayoḥ pradhānayoḥ dve anuvākye āgneyasya agnīṣomīyasya ca iti ucyate ekā vārtraghnī āgneyī ekā saumī tathā vṛdhanvatyai tatra yāgneyī sā vidhīyamānā saṃbadhyeta na saumī amau asyāyām tāvat na asti eva paurṇamāsyām api agnīṣomīya eva kriyamāṇe kriyeta tatra api eka devatyāḥ na śaknuyāt devatā dvi tve kāryam kartum atha ubha agnīṣomīye prāpte iti na ekasya yāgasya dvābhyām anuvākyābhyām prayojanam upādeya tvena hi anuvākyā codyate tatra ekatvam vivakṣitam tena tatra api na dve tasmāt ājya bhāgayoḥ niveśaḥ iti 
[I,239,i_I,239,ii]	ānantaryam acodanā jyotiṣṭome śrūyate muṣṭīkaroti vācam yacchati dīkṣitam āvedayati iti tathā hastau avanenikte ulaparājim stṛṇāti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim muṣṭīkaraṇam vāgyamaḥ ca āvedana artham uta kṛtsna prakaraṇe niveśaḥ iti tathā hastau anejanam kim ulaparājim staritum uta prakaraṇe sarva padārthān kartum iti kim tāvat prāptam hastau anejanam hasta saṃskāra artham vāgyamaḥ puruṣa saṃskāra arthaḥ āmantrayamāṇaḥ ekāgraḥ bhavati padārthān anutiṣṭhati tena keṣām keṣām padārthānām ime saṃskārau iti ākāṅkṣā asti satyām ākāṅkṣāyām ānantaryeṇa nirākāṅkṣīkaraṇam tasmāt ānantaryāt āvedana arthaḥ vāgyamaḥ muṣṭīkaraṇam ca hastau anejanam ca ulaparājim staritum 
[I,239,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ sarvaiḥ prakaraṇa adhītaiḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti kutas vākya bhedāt katham vākya bhedaḥ artha dvayasya abhidhānāt na hi dīkṣitam āvedayitum iti asmin arthaḥ āvedayati iti na ca staritum iti asmin arthe stṛṇāti iti staraṇam api vidhīyate avanejanam ca muṣṭīkaraṇam vāc yamaḥ ca vidhīyate āvedanam ca na ca eṣām paraspareṇa kaścid saṃbandhaḥ asti na ca padārtha ākāṅkṣāyām satyām ānantaryam eka vākya tve kāraṇam bhavati tasmāt prakaraṇa dharmāḥ evaṃjātīyakāḥ 
[I,240,i_I,240,ii]	vākyānām ca samāpta tvāt svena svena pada samūhena paripūrṇam ekam vākyam tathā aparam tathā sarvāṇi yāni udāhṛtāni tasmāt vispaṣṭam artha dvayam vibhāge ca nirākāṅkṣatā tena vākya bhedaḥ atas saṃyogataḥ aviśeṣāt prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt ca kṛtsne parkaraṇe niveśaḥ iti 
[I,240,iii_I,240,iv]	śeṣaḥ tu guṇa saṃyuktaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ pratīyeta mithas teṣām asaṃbandhāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ samāmnāyate āgneyam caturdhā karoti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim āgneye agnīṣomīye aindra agne ca sarvatra caturdhā karaṇam kim vā āgneyaḥ eva iti kim prāptam śeṣaḥ caturdhā karaṇam āgneyam iti devatā guṇa saṃyuktaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ pratīyate agnīṣomīye api syāt aindrāgne api kutas tau api āgneyau yasya agniḥ devatā anyā ca bhavati asau āgeyaḥ tat yathā yā ḍitthasya ḍavitthasya ca mātā sā ḍavitthasya bhavati evam iha api yadi āgneya agnīṣomasya ca puroḍāśasya mithas saṃbandhaḥ na bhavet tatas āgneyaḥ eva caturdhā karaṇam vyavatiṣṭheta bhavati tu saṃbandhaḥ tasmāt avyavasthā yathā āgneyasya mastakam vibhajya prāśitram avadyati iti sarvebhyaḥ prāśitrau adānam evam caturdhā karaṇam api 
[I,241,i_I,241,ii]	vyavasthā vā artha saṃyogāt liṅgasya arthena saṃbandhāt lakṣaṇa arthā guṇa śrutiḥ vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati vyavatiṣṭheta vā caturdhā karaṇam āgneyaḥ eva na sādhāraṇam bhavitum arhati kutas artha saṃyogāt agninā devatayā arthena eka devatyasya saṃyogaḥ na dvi daivatyasya agnīṣomīyasya aindrāgnasya ca iti kutas yasya hi agnīṣomau devatā ubhaya viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭaḥ saṃkalpaḥ kriyate tasya agniḥ somam apekṣamāṇaḥ devatā na nirapekṣaḥ yasya ca agniḥ somam apekṣamāṇaḥ devatā na tasmāt tat hitaḥ utpadyate samarthānām hi saḥ ucyate sa apekṣam ca asamartham tasmāt na tat hita antena nirapekṣa agni daivatyena dvi devati asya abhidhānam atas yatra nirapekṣaḥ agniḥ devatā tatra eva caturdhā karaṇam iti devatā liṅgasya hi sāmartyena saṃyogaḥ bhavati tat hita arthasya na asati sāmarthye 
[I,241,iii]	atha yat uktam yathā prāśitrau adānam sarvebhyaḥ kriyate evam caturdhā karaṇam api iti yuktam prāśitrau adānena tatra eva saṃbandhaḥ kriyate āgneyasya prāśitram avadyati iti katham tarhi āgneyasya mastakam vibhajya iti ekam hi etat vākyam prāśitram avadyati iti dvitīyam āgneyasya mastakam vibhajya iti tatra āgneyasya mastakāt avadyati iti gamyate anyasya mastakāt anyasmāt vā iti aniyamaḥ yadi tu tatra kevala agni daivatyaḥ na abhaviṣyat tad ānarthakya parihārāya dvi daivatyaḥ api agrahiṣyata yat tu ḍitthasya mātā iti yuktam tatra avyāsaṅgi mātṛ tvam tatas jātaḥ ḍitthaḥ etāvatā saṃbandhena mātā iti ucyate na atra kiṃcid apekṣyate sa ca tāvān tatra saṃbandhaḥ asti iti ḍitthasya mātā iti yuktam vacanam 
[I,243,i_I,243,ii]	artha bhidhāna sāmarthyān mantreṣu śeṣa bhāvaḥ syāt tasmāt utpatti saṃbandhaḥ arthena nitya saṃyogāt iha mantrāḥ udāharaṇam bahis deva sadanam dāmi iti evamādayaḥ kim mukhyaḥ eva abhidheye mantrāṇām viniyogaḥ uta gauṇe api iti kaḥ punar mukhyaḥ kaḥ vā gauṇaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ śabdāt eva avagamyate sa prathamaḥ arthaḥ mukhyaḥ mukham iva bhavati iti mukhyaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ tu khalu pratītāt arthāt kenacid saṃbandhena gamyate sa paścāt bhāvāt jaghanam iva bhavati iti jaghanyaḥ guṇa saṃbandhāt ca gauṇaḥ iti 
[I,243,iii^1]	yadi evam sarve eva mukhyaḥ sarvaḥ hi śabdāt gamyate yathā eva hi agniḥ jvalati iti ukte jvalane saṃpratyayaḥ evam eva agniḥ māṇavakaḥ iti śabdaḥ eva uccārite māṇavake saṃpratyayaḥ atha ucyate yasmin nirupapadāt śabdāt saṃpratyayaḥ sa mukhyaḥ yasmin sa upapadāt sa gauṇaḥ iti na etat yuktam yasya hi śabdasya rūpam kasyacid arthasya nimittam sa upapadasya api tat eva rūpam nirupapadasya api na ca śakyam nimitte sati naimittikena na bhavitum kim atas yadi evam idam na śakyate vaditum upapadāt ṛte na saḥ arthaḥ bhavati upapade tu saṃjāte saḥ arthaḥ saṃjaniṣyate iti na ca asau samudāya arthaḥ śakyate vijñātum 
[I,243,iii^2]	anvaya vyatirekābhyām hi vibhāgaḥ avagamyate atha vākya arthaḥ ayam iti ucyate na evam śakyam na hi ananvitaḥ padārthaḥ bhavati vākya arthaḥ tat evam dṛśyatām agni śabdaḥ eva ayam jvalana vacanaḥ agni śabdaḥ eva māṇavakasya abhidhātā iti tasmāt na gauṇaḥ mukhyaḥ iti kaścid viśeṣaḥ atha ucyate yaḥ suṣṭhu prasiddhaḥ sa mukhyaḥ yaḥ manāk iva sa gauṇaḥ iti idam api na upapadyate prasiddhiḥ nāma prajñānam na ca prajñāne kaścid viśeṣaḥ asti atha ucyate yasya bahuśas prayogaḥ asti sa mukhyaḥ alpaśas prayujyamānaḥ gauṇaḥ iti na etat evam alpaśas api prayujyamānaḥ na asati sāmarthye pratyāyayet atas saḥ api śabdāt pratīyate iti mukhyaḥ eva 
[I,244,i^1]	atra ucyate asti atra viśeṣaḥ māṇavakaḥ na agni śabdāt pratīyate katham avagamyate uktam anyāyaḥ ca aneka artha tvam iti katham na viparyayaḥ ucyate anādṛtya eva māṇavaka pratyayam jvalanam agni śabdāt pratiyantaḥ dṛśyante na tu anādṛtya jvalanam mānavakam agni śabdāt pratiyanti kutas etat yaḥ yaḥ agni sadṛśaḥ vivakṣyate tatra tatra agni śabdaḥ niyataḥ iti atas eva vigata sādṛśyāt ayam tu dṛśyate atas agni sādṛśyam asya pravṛttau nimittam na ca jvalane apratīte tad sādrṛśyam pratīyate tasmāt jvalanasya agni śabdaḥ nimittam na māṇavakasya tasmāt jvalane mukhyaḥ na māṇavake 
[I,244,i^2]	evam eva tṛṇa pratyayasya barhiḥ śabdaḥ nimittam na tṛṇa sadṛśa pratyayasya tat evam dvaite sati mukhya para tā śabdasya uta gauṇa para tāpi iti yuktaḥ vicāraḥ kim tāvat prāptam mukhye gauṇe ca viniyogaḥ kutas ubhayasya śakya tvāt ubhayam api barhiḥ śabdena śakyate pratyāyayitum tṛṇam ca tṛṇa sadṛśam ca tṛṇam sākṣāt tṛṇa sadṛśam tṛṇa pratyayena yat ca nāma darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ sādhana bhūtena barhiḥ śabdena śakyate pratyāyayitum tat sarvam pratyāyayitavyam vinigamanāyām hetu abhāvāt api ca evam āśrīyamāṇe pūṣā ādi anumantraṇa ādīni darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām na utkṛṣyante tatra eva gauṇena abhidhānena prakṛtām devatām abhivadiṣyanti 
[I,245,i]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ mukhyaḥ eva viniyoktavyaḥ mantraḥ na gauṇaḥ iti kutas ubhaya aśakya tvāt prakaraṇe hi samāmnānāt pradhānena eka vākyatām upaiti tatra etat āpatati yat śaknuyāt anena mantreṇa sādhayitum tathā sādhayet iti sa ca asau artha abhidhāna saṃyogāt śaknoti upakartum na gauṇam artham śakyoti abhidhātum tasmāt na gauṇe viniyogaḥ 
[I,245,ii]	nanu mukhya pratyayāt śakyate gauṇaḥ pratyāyayitum satyam etat mukhya pratyāyanena eva asya prayojanavattā nirvṛttā iti na gauṇam prati viniyoge kiṃcid pramāṇam asti mukhye viniyogena tu ānarthakyam parihriyate parihṛtaḥ ānarthakye na gauṇa abhidhānam āpatati na hi anabhidhāya mukhyam gauṇam abhivadati śabdaḥ atas pramāṇa abhāvāt na gauṇe viniyujyeta 
[I,245,iii^1]	api ca gauṇasya pratyāyane sāmarthyāt bahavaḥ abhyupāyāḥ prāpnuvanti sāmarthyam ca śabda eka deśaḥ iti uktam arthāt vā kalpana eka deśātvāt iti tatra mantre niyogataḥ gauṇam prati viniyujyamānaḥ upāya antaram vinā pramāṇena bādhyeta mantrāmnānam pramāṇam iti ced na tasya upāya antara nivṛttau sāmarthyam asti nanu mukhye api viniyujyamān sya eṣaḥ eva doṣaḥ na iti ucyate yadi mukhye api na viniyujyeta na eva pradhānasya upakuryāt tatra ca asya utpattiḥ anarthikā eva syāt tasmāt asti gauṇe mukhye ca viśeṣaḥ api ca yaḥ gauṇe mantram viniyuṅkte sa vaktavyaḥ kim artham mukhyam pratyāyayasi iti 
[I,245,iii^2]	sa ced brūyāt na anyathā gauṇa pratyayaḥ asti iti pratibrūyāt enam anye api gauṇa pratyayasya abhyupāyāḥ santi iti atha saḥ evam abhiyuktaḥ pratibrūyāt mukhya pratyayaḥ api pākṣikaḥ abhyupāyaḥ iti brūyāt enam na tarhi niyogataḥ gauṇe viniyojanīyaḥ yadā gauṇa pratyayāya mukham upādatte tadā etat āpatitam bhavati mukhyaḥ eva viniyogaḥ iti arthena ca pratītena prayojanam na pratyāyakena mantreṇa atas anyena api upāyena gauṇaḥ pratyāyayitavyaḥ na saḥ eva mantraḥ ādartavyaḥ atha api mantreṇa pratyāyakena prayojanam syāt tathā api mukhya pratyāyanena eva nirvṛttam prayojanam iti natarām gauṇe viniyujyeta tasmāt mukhya gauṇayoḥ mukhye kārya saṃpratyayaḥ iti siddham 
[I,246,i_I,246,ii]	saṃskāraka tvāt acodite na syāt atha yat uktam pūṣā ādi anumantraṇa ādīnām utkarṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati iti yuktaḥ teṣām utkarṣaḥ saṃskārakaḥ hi mantraḥ saḥ asati saṃskārye anarthakaḥ iti yatra arthavān tatra nāyayiṣyate na ca kaścid doṣaḥ bhaviṣyati 
[I,246,iii_I,246,iv]	vacanāt tu ayathārtham aindrī syāt agnau śrūyate niveśanaḥ saṃgamanaḥ vasūnām iti aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim indrasya upasthānam kartavyam uta gārhapatyasya iti kutas punar gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti evam vispaṣṭe vacane saṃśayaḥ iti ucyate yat dhi vākyena upasthānam tat stuti vacanena saṃskaraṇam na samīpa sthāna mātram na ca aindreṇa mantreṇa agneḥ abhidhānam śakyate kartum atas gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti na gārhapatya artham upasthānam etat iti jāyeta śaṅkā gārhapatyaḥ upasthāna arthaḥ bhavet iti tādṛśaḥ ca śabdaḥ na asti tṛtīya antar saptamī antaḥ vā tasmāt vicāraḥ katham upapannam bhavati iti 
[I,247,i]	kim tāvat prāptam sāmarthyāt indra upasthānam aśakya tvāt ca gārhaptyā upasthānasya katham dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ iti ced avivaksita īpsita arthāḥ vā saṃbandha mātra pradhānā yat vā upasthāna viśeṣaṇam saṃbandhāt gārhapatya śabdaḥ tasmāt gārhapatya viśiṣṭam upasthānam indra artham kartavyam iti gārhapatyaḥ ca deśena viśiṃṣyāt mukhyam eva kāryam mantrāṇām 
[I,247,ii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ vacanāt tu ayathārtham aindrī syāt na etat asti indra artham upasthānam iti ayathārtham aindrī syāt kutas vacana sāmarthyāt vacanam idam bhavati aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti gārhapatye dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ prādhānyam āha kim iva vacanam na kuryāt na asti vacanasya ati bhāraḥ tasmāt gārhapatya artham upasthānam 
[I,247,iii_I,247,iv]	guṇāt vā api abhidhānam syāt saṃbandhasya aśāstra hetu tvāt atra āha nanu etat uktam na aindreṇa mantreṇa gārhapatya upasthānam bhaviṣyati iti ucyate vacanāt bhaviṣyati āha na vacana śatena api śakyam etat indra śabdena agninam pratyāyayet iti bruvan vihanyeta yathā agninā siñcet iti udakena dīpayet iti na hi śāstra hetukaḥ śabda arthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ bhavati nityau asau lokataḥ avagamyate iti uktam autpattikaḥ tu śabdasya arthena saṃbandhaḥ iti nanu śabda lakṣaṇaḥ api bhavati śabda arthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ kṛtrimaḥ yathā devadattaḥ yajñadattaḥ iti bhavati kaścid yatra saṃbandhasya vidhāyakam vākyam bhavati na tu etat vākyam śabda arthayoḥ saṃbandhasya vidhāyakam gārhapatyasya indra śabdaḥ nāma iti katham tarhi siddha saṃbandhena indra śabdena gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti na ca śakyate para śabdena paraḥ vaditum kim atra vacanam kariṣyati 
[I,248,i]	atra ucyate guṇāt vā api abhidhānam syāt saṃbandhasya aśāstra hetu tvāt iti yadi api na idam vākyam śabda artha saṃbandhasya vidhāne hetu bhūtam tathā api anena indra śabdena śakyam kartum gārhapatya abhidhānam kutas guṇa saṃyogāt gauṇam idam abhidhānam bhaviṣyati bhavati hi guṇāt api abhidhānam yathā siṃhaḥ devadattaḥ agniḥ māṇavakaḥ iti evam iha api anindre gārhapatyaḥ indra śabdaḥ bhaviṣyati asti ca asya indra sādṛśyam yathā eva indraḥ yajña sādhanam evam gārhapatye api iti athavā indrateḥ aiśvarya karmaṇaḥ indraḥ bhavati bhavati ca gārhapatyasya api svasmin kāryaḥ īśvara tvam tasmāt indra śabdena yaḥ pratyāyate arthaḥ sa pratītaḥ sādṛśyāt gārhapatyam pratyāyayiṣyati aiśvaryāt vā pratyāyayiṣyati iti na doṣaḥ 
[I,248,ii_I,248,iii]	tathā āhvānam api iti ced staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra idam samāmnāyate haviṣkṛt ehi iti tris avaghnan āhvayati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim eṣa mantraḥ avahantim pratyupadiśyate uta hantiḥ asya kālam lakṣayati iti katham hantim pratyupadiśyate katham vā kālam lakṣayet yadi evam saṃbandhaḥ kriyeta haviṣkṛt ehi iti avaghnan iti tatas hantim pratyupadiśyate atha avaghnan āhvayati iti tatas asya kālam lakṣyati iti kim tāvat prāptam tathā āhvānam api yathā aindrī gārhapatyam pratyupadiśyate evam eṣa mantraḥ hantim pratyupadiśyate evam śrutiḥ anugṛhītā bhavati itarathā lakṣaṇā syāt hanti kālasya mantrasya ca saṃbandhaḥ bhavet na hanteḥ mantrasya evam ca satyāhvayati iti ayam anuvādaḥ āhvānam karoti yaḥ hi ehi iti brūte saḥ āhvayati tatra kenacid guṇena mantraḥ hantim pratyāyayiṣyati tasmāt na āhvāne viniyoktavyaḥ 
[I,249,i_I,249,ii]	na kāla vidhiḥ codita tvāt na etat asti hantim pratyupadiśyate iti kim tarhi kāla lakṣaṇā syāt kutas tris āhvayati iti tritvam atra vidhīyate yadi asmin eva vākye mantraḥ vidhīyeta aneka guṇa vidhānāt vākyam bhidyeta tasmāt na evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ evam avaghnan iti katham tarhi avaghnan āhvayati iti nanu asmin api pakṣe mantraḥ vidhīyate kālaḥ ca tatra saḥ eva doṣaḥ bhavet na iti brūmaḥ avahanana kāle eva arthena haviṣkṛt āhvātavyā tatra ayam eva saṃbandhaḥ anūdyate kevalā tu tris āvṛttiḥ vidhīyate yat tu kāla lakṣaṇa arthaḥ śabdaḥ iti na eṣa doṣaḥ laukikī hi lakṣaṇā mantraḥ api ca rūpāt eva āhvāne prāptaḥ saḥ api anūdyate eva coditaḥ ca vākya antareṇa avaghātaḥ śaknoti kālam lakṣayitum tasmāt āhvāne viniyoktavyaḥ iti 
[I,250,i_I,250,ii]	guṇa abhāvāt idam pada uttaram sūtram atha kasmāt na guṇāt avahantim brūte haviṣkaroti hi avahantiḥ tasmāt dhaviṣkṛt kim evam bhaviṣyati rūpāt eva avahantau mantre prāpte kevalam tris āvṛttim eva vakṣyati na bhaviṣyati vākya bhedaḥ iti atra ucyate guṇa abhāvāt gauṇam abhidhānam avahantau na saṃbhavati iti na hi asau āhūtaḥ asmi iti avagacchati tatra adṛṣṭa artham āhvānam syāt yajamānasya patnyām haviṣkṛti dṛṣṭa artham āhvānam tasmāt na hanti mantraḥ iti 
[I,250,iii_I,250,iv]	liṅgāt ca liṅgam ca bhavati vāc vai haviṣkṛt vācam eva etat āhvayati iti na ca vācaḥ avahantinā sādṛśyam asti asti tu yajamānasya patnyā sā hi strī vāc iti ca strī liṅgaḥ śabdaḥ avahantiḥ tu na strī na pumān na napuṃsakam iti nanu avahanteḥ api strī liṅgaḥ śabdaḥ asti kriyā iti atra brūmaḥ na niyogataḥ avahanteḥ strī liṅgaḥ śabdaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ api tasya asti avaghātaḥ iti napuṃsaka siṅgaḥ api karma iti api ca patnyāḥ svarūpeṇa sādṛśyam avahanteḥ para rūpeṇa śabdena tasmāt patnyām haviṣkṛti liṅgam anurūpataram bhavati 
[I,250,v_I,250,vi]	vidhi kopaḥ ca upadeśe syāt avahanti mantre sati asmin mantre vidhi antara kopaḥ syāt apahatam rakṣaḥ iti avahanti apahatāḥ yātudhānāḥ iti avahanti iti tatra pakṣe abhāvāt nitya vat śrūtiḥ upadhyeta tasmāt avaghnan iti kāla lakṣaṇa arthaḥ iti mantraḥ api ahvāna arthaḥ iti 
[I,251,i_I,251,ii]	tathā utthāna visarjane jyotiṣṭome śrūyate uttiṣṭhan anvāha agnīt agnīn viharaḥ iti tathā vratam kṛṇutā iti vācam visṛjati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim utthānam vāc visarjanam ca prati mantrayoḥ upadeśaḥ uta kāla arthaḥ saṃyogaḥ iti atra pūrva adhikaraṇyāyaḥ atidiśyate yaḥ tatra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ saḥ iha pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ yaḥ tatra siddhāntaḥ saḥ iha siddhāṇtaḥ agnīt agnīn iti evam uttiṣṭhan anvāha iti vratam kṛṇutā iti evam vācam visṛjati iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ lakṣaṇa abhāvāt uttiṣṭhan anvāha iti siddhānte saṃbandhaḥ vratam kṛṇutā iti ucyamāne vācam visṛjati iti vākyena pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ liṅgena siddhāntaḥ 
[I,251,iii]	yadi api ca śakyate utthāna kriyā agnīt agnīn vihara iti vaktum utthānena agniḥ idhyate vahniḥ ca vihriyate iti vratam kṛṇutā iti ca vāc abhidhānam tathā api adṛṣṭa artham vacanam bhavati iti na mantrayoḥ utthāna visarjana artha tā kalpyeta kalpyamānāyām ca mantra antaram vihitam bādhyeta yāḥ paśūnām ṛṣabhaḥ vācaḥ iti api ca utthāna vāc visargau prati mantrau vidhīyamānau adṛṣṭa arthau syātām preṣaṇe tu dṛṣṭha arthau tat lakṣaṇa eva atra nyāyyā 
[I,252,i_I,252,ii]	sūktavāke va kāla vidhiḥ para artha tvāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate sūktavākena prastaram praharati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim sūktavākaḥ prastara prakaraṇam pratyupadiśyate uta iyam kāla lakṣaṇa iti tat ucyate kāla lakṣaṇa iti kutas sūktavākasya devatā saṃkīrtana artha tvāt prastara prakaraṇam ca pratyaśakteḥ prastarasya ca sruc dhāraṇa artha tvāt 
[I,252,iii_I,252,iv]	upadeśaḥ vā yājyā śabdaḥ hi na akasmāt upadeśaḥ vā prastara prakaraṇam prati mantrasya syāt evam śruti vihitaḥ arthaḥ bhavati sūktavākena iti karaṇa vibhakti saṃyogāt itarathā lakṣaṇā syāt sūktavākena lakṣaṇena prastaram praharet iti evam ca kṛtvā yājyā śabdaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati sūktavākaḥ eva yājyā prastaraḥ āhutiḥ iti 
[I,252,v_I,252,vii]	sa devatā arthaḥ tad saṃyogāt yat uktam devatā saṃkīrtane sūktavākaḥ samarthaḥ na prastara prakaraṇaḥ iti ucyate na devatā vacanaḥ parkaraṇena saṃbadhyate prakaraṇam hi yajiḥ māntra varṇikaḥ devatā vidhiḥ evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ agniḥ idam haviḥ ajuṣatāvīvṛdhate iti evam devatām anukramya āśāste ayam yajamānaḥ iti uktvā idam idam āśāste iti ca yat anena haviṣā āśāste tat asya syāt iti prastaram haviḥ nirdiśati agni ādīn ca devatā viśeṣān tena praharatiḥ yajatiḥ evam sūkta vākena prastaraḥ prahartum śakyate yadi praharatiḥ yajatiḥ agni ādi devatākaḥ ca tasmāt sūktavākasya harati saṃyogaḥ api devatā artha tā ghaṭataḥ eva yadi agniḥ idam haviḥ ajuṣatāvī vṛdhate iti evamādi eva śrūyeta na āśāste ayam yajamānaḥ iti evamādīni aparāṇi tatas agni ādayaḥ eva iṣṭāḥ na antaritā iti eva paryavasitam vākyam bhavet yatas tu khalu āśāste ayam yajamānaḥ iti evamādīni aparāṇi śrūyante tena iha paryavasānam agni ādayaḥ puroḍāśa ādibhiḥ iṣṭāḥ aparam tu yajamānaḥ āśāste tat anena prastareṇa prāpnuyāt iti 
[I,253,i_I,253,ii]	nanu satsu api eteṣu devatā saṃkīrtanaḥ eva paryavasyet puroḍāśa ādibhiḥ iṣṭāḥ agni ādayaḥ tatas eva yajamānaḥ āyuḥ ādīni api āśāsānaḥ prāpnuyāt iti ucyate ubhayathā saṃbandhe sati praharaṇe viniyoktavyaḥ liṅam ca na bādhitam bhaviṣyati vākyam ca anugrahīṣyate iti athavā agniḥ idam haviḥ ajuṣata iti prastaraḥ eva haviḥ nidiśyate evam idam iti saṃnihita vacanam upapannam bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,253,iii_I,253,iv]	pratipattiḥ iti ced su iṣṭakṛt vat ubhaya saṃskāraḥ syāt atha sruc dhāraṇe viniyuktasya prastarasya prakaraṇam pratiprattiḥ iti ucyate tatra prativacanam su iṣṭakṛt vat etat syāt iti yathā ijyā arthāt puroḍāśāt vacana prāmāṇyāt sviṣṭakṛt ijyate yāgaḥ ca sa bhavati pratipādyate ca puroḍāśaḥ evam pratipādyeta eva hi prastaraḥ yāgaḥ ca nirvartyate iti na doṣaḥ pratipādyamānaḥ api hi tyajyate pratyakṣatas pratipādyate vacanāt ijyām sādhayati iti evam gamyate tasmāt sūktavākaḥ praharati mantraḥ iti 
[I,254,i_I,254,ii]	kṛtsnā upadeśāt ubhayatra sarva vacanam darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ sūktavākena prastaram praharati iti śrūyate tatra saṃdehaḥ kim paurṇamāsyām kṛtsnaḥ sūktavākaḥ prayoktavyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ amāvāsyāyām uta yathāsāmarthyam niṣkṛṣya yathāyatham prayogaḥ iti tat ucyate ubhayatra sarva vacanam iti kutas kṛtsnaḥ hi mantraḥ sūktavākaḥ iti ucyate sa padena api vinā sūktavākaḥ na syāt tatra sūktavākena na prahṛtam bhavet tasmāt ubhayatra kṛtsnaḥ sūktavākaḥ vaditavyaḥ 
[I,254,iii_I,254,iv]	yathārtham vā śeṣa bhūta saṃskārāt ye paurṇamāsī devatātā vācinaḥ śabdāḥ te paurṇamāsyām prayoktavyāḥ na amāvāsyāyām ye amāvāsyā devatā vācinaḥ te amāvāsyāyām na paurṇamāsyām śeṣa bhūtam artham saṃskurvantaḥ mantrāḥ upakurvanti na anyathā iti uktam tasmāt ye yatra upakurvanti te tatra prayoktavyāḥ iti na kṛtsnaḥ paurṇamāsyām na kṛtsnaḥ ca amāvāsyāyām iti 
[I,254,v_I,255,i]	vacanāt iti ced atha yat uktam vacanam idam bhaviṣyati sūktavākena praharati iti tatra padena api ūnena na sūktavākena prahṛtam bhavet kṛtsnasya hi sūktavākasya upadeśaḥ iti tat ucyate 
[I,255,ii_I,255,iv]	prakaraṇa avibhāgāt ubhe prati kṛtsna śabdaḥ ubhe paurṇamāsyamāvāsye prati eṣa kṛtsna śabdaḥ ubhayoḥ prakaraṇāt ubhayoḥ asau kṛtsnaḥ ucyate avayave avayavaḥ iti na etat evam na hi sa apekṣāṇām itikartavya tayā saṃbandhaḥ na hi itikartavyatā etat viśiṣṭā śrūyate itikartavya tā viśiṣṭāḥ tu ete gamyate kutas na hi iti kartavya tām prati karmaṇi vidhīyaṇte phalam prati teṣām vidhiḥ itikartavya tā tu karmaṇām vidhīyate tatra saṃnidhāna aviśeṣāt kasya kim vidhīyate kasya na iti na gamyate viśeṣaḥ sādhana tvena ca sarveṣām nirdeśāt itikartavya tāyāḥ saṃnidhānāt ca vacanāt ca asya prakaraṇa liṅgasya aviśeṣāt ekaikasya kṛtsnam prakaraṇam nirākāṅkṣasya na sahāyam apekṣamāṇasya tasmāt ekaikam prati kṛtsnaḥ sūktavākaḥ upadiśyate sa vibhāge api pradhānānām kṛtsnaḥ eva prayoktavyaḥ iti yāni yatra anarthakāni padāni tāni api tatra prayoktavyāni adṛṣṭāya bhaviṣyanti sūkta vākena praharati iti vacanāt na asti vacanasya ati bhāraḥ guṇena vā kenacid abhidhānam tāsām devatānām nirvartayiṣyanti iti 
[I,255,v^1]	atra ucyate na etat evam uktam mukhyam eva kāryam mantrāṇām na gauṇam iti saṃskāra artha tvāt vā utkarṣaḥ nyāyyaḥ na gauṇam abhidhānam iti kaḥ tarhi kṛtsna saṃyogasya samādhiḥ ucyate iti eṣa samādhiḥ na hi etat ekam vākyam yaḥ kṛtsnaḥ sūktavākaḥ bahūni etāni vākyāni yeṣām pradhāna devatā abhidhāyīni padāni madhye sādhāraṇāni tantra padāni purastāt uccāryante tathā parastāt yathā agniḥ idam haviḥ ajuṣatāvī vṛdhata mahā ujya ayaḥ kṛta agnīṣomau idam haviḥ ajuṣetām avī vṛdhetām iti evamādīni teṣām purastāt tantram yathā idam dyāvāpṛthivī iti parastāt api yathā asya amṛdhet iti 
[I,255,v^2]	tāni etāni sarvāṇi sūkta vacanena sūktavāka śabdam labhyante na ca teṣām samudāyaḥ kiṃcid artham vadati tasmāt na samudāyaḥ sūktavākaḥ na ca sākṣāt sādhanam sūktavāka sāmānyasya eka tvāt sūktavākaḥ vartate iti eka vacanam bhavati sūktavākena prastaram praharati iti tu yena kenacid sūkta vākena prahriyamāṇe yathāśrutam kṛtam bhavati tasmāt samudāyaḥ sūktavākaḥ yat tu amāvāsyā devatā vācīni padāni na paurṇamāsyām prayujyante na tatra sūktavāka śabdaḥ bādhyate prakaraṇam tatra liṅgena bādhitam tat ca nyāyyam eva tasmāt paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām ca vibhajya sūktavākaḥ prayoktavyaḥ iti 
[I,256,i_I,256,ii]	liṅga krama samākhyānāt kāmya yuktam samāmnānam iha kāmyayājya anuvākyā kāṇḍam udāharaṇam indra agnī rocanā divaḥ pravarṣaṇibhyaḥ indra agnī navatim puras ślathat vṛtram iti evamādyāḥ ṛcaḥ aparāḥ api kāmyāḥ iṣṭayaḥ aindrāgnam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet yasya sajātāḥ viyāyuḥ aindrāgnam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet bhrātṛvyavān agnaye vaiśvānarāya dvādaśa kapālam nirvapet ruj kāmaḥ agnaye vaiśvānarāya dvādaśa kapālam nirvapet sapatnam abhidroṣyan iti evamādyāḥ tat etāḥ yājyā anuvākyāḥ prati saṃdehaḥ kim yāvat kiṃcid aindrāgnam karma tatra sarva tra anena aindra agnena yājyā anuvākyā yugalena bhavitavyam uta etasyām eva aindra agnyām iṣṭau kāmyāyām iti evam vaiśvānarīyayoḥ yājyā anuvākyayoḥ evam sarvatra 
[I,257,i]	kim tāvat prāptam yāvat kiṃcid aindrāgnam vaiśvāvarīyam agnīṣomīyam jātavedasam ca sarvatra etāḥ yājyā anuvākyāḥ bhaveyuḥ kutas liṅgāt nanu krama samākhyāne viśeṣake bhaviṣyataḥ satyam tathā api kramam samākhyām ca śaknoti liṅgam bādhitum iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ liṅga krama samākhyānāt tāsu eva kāmyāsu etāḥ yājyā anuvākyāḥ iti gamyate yaḥ eva hi liṅga kramaḥ eṣām karmaṇām saḥ eva āsām yājyā anuvākyānām tena tāsām eva tāḥ śeṣa bhūtāḥ iti 
[I,257,ii]	nanu liṅgam balavattaram iti uktam satyam etat iha tu samākhyā balīyasī na hi etāḥ samākhyānāt ṛtaḥ eṣām kāmyānām karmaṇām prāpnuvanti na bhinna deśānām karmaṇām kutas samākhyām antareṇa āsām ṛtām yājyā anuvākyā tvam eva na vijñāyate kutas bhinna deśānām karmaṇām yājyā anuvākyāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti yā ca eṣām samākhyā sā kāmyānām eva yājyā anuvākyā tvam ācaṣṭe na sarveṣām yadi samākhyā na ādriyate yājyā anuvākyātvam eva eṣām na bhavati yadi ādriyate tadā kāmyānām eva evam hi tat samākhyāyate kāmyayā ājya anuvākyā kāṇḍam iti 
[I,257,iii]	atha kim artham ubhayam upadiśyate liṅga kramāt iti samākhyānāt iti ca asti tatra pāthikṛtīyam vrātapatīyam ca karma sāmidhenī kāryam api asti yājyā anuvākya akāryam api yadi liṅga kramāt iti etāvat eva ucyate sāmidhenīkārye api liṅgena tāsām viniyogaḥ syāt atha kim artham liṅga kramau vyapadiśyete sarvāḥ yājyā anuvākyā kāryaḥ eva viniyujyeran sāmidhenīṣu viniyogaḥ na syāt atha punar samākhyānāt liṅga kramāt ca nirvṛtte yājyā anuvākyā kārye sāmidhenīṣu viniyogaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati yathā agni vāruṇyāḥ iṣṭeḥ krame atīte saumāraudrīṇām anāgate manoḥ ṛcaḥ tāḥ sāmidhenīṣu dhāyyāḥ iti ucyante tathā pṛthu yājāḥ tam saṃbādhaḥ iti dve dhāyye kalpyete tasmāt ubhayam vyapadeṣṭavyam iti 
[I,258,i_I,258,iii]	adhikāre ca mantra vidhiḥ atadākhyeṣu śiṣṭa tvāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate āgneyyā agnīdhram upatiṣṭhate aindryā sadaḥ vaiṣṇavyā haviḥ dhānam iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim prakṛtābhiḥ evaṃliṅgavatībhiḥ upasthātavyam uta dāśatayībhyaḥ evaṃliṅgāḥ āgamayitavyāḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam prakaraṇe ca mantraḥ liṅgena vidhīyamānaḥ dāśatayībhyaḥ eva āgamayitavyaḥ āgneyī iti evamādibhiḥ hi śakyāḥ dāśatayaḥ abhivaditum yaḥ ca ayam prakṛtaḥ sa kārya antare viniyuktaḥ na iha api upadeśam arhati upadiṣṭa upadeśaḥ hi na nyāyyaḥ evaṃjātīyakasya katham jātīyakasya yaḥ kasmiṃścid viśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ na asau sāmānyena liṅgena anyātra upadeśam arhati katham yadi tat liṅgam tasya lakṣaṇa tvena tatas sa viśiṣṭaḥ lakṣyeta yena anena evaṃliṅgena etat karoti iti tatas na upadiṣṭaḥ bhavati atha upadiśyate evaṃliṅgena karoti iti tatas na lakṣyate tena upadiṣṭasya evaṃjātīyakasya evaṃjātīyakaḥ punar upadeśaḥ na nyāyyaḥ tasmāt dāśa tayā liṅgavantaḥ mantrāḥ grahītavyāḥ 
[I,259,i]	nanu prakaraṇa sāmarthyataḥ prakṛtāḥ grahītum nyāyyāḥ na iti ucyate liṅgam hi prakaraṇāt balīyaḥ āha virodhe sati liṅgena prakaraṇam bādhyeta na ca etayoḥ virodhaḥ na vayam prakaraṇam anujighṛkṣantaḥ prakṛtam liṅgavantam upādadānā liṅgam upabādhemahi yadi tu prakṛtam viliṅgam upadademahi tatas bādhemahi liṅgam ubhayam saṃpādayiṣyāmaḥ prakaraṇam liṅgam ca na etat evam liṅgena pratyayaḥ bhavati dāśatayena api kartavyam iti dāśatayaḥ api hi āgneyī śabdena śakyante vaditum sa pratyayaḥ liṅga janitaḥ yat mithyā iti kalpyate tat prakaraṇa anurodhāt sa ced prakaraṇam anurudhyate mithyā iti kalpyate atha na anurudhyate samyak iti tasmāt virodhaḥ virodhe ca prakaraṇa daurbalyam 
[I,259,ii^1]	ucyate tat liṅga vat tā anena upasthānena anugrahītavyā na dāśatayī mantra vyāktiḥ sā ca prakṛte mantraḥ upādīyamāne niravaśeṣā upāttā bhavati dāśa tayām punar mantra vyaktau upādīyamānāyām prakaraṇāt yā mantra vyaktiḥ prāpnoti sā bādhitā bhavati asati virodhe na ca iha liṅga prakaraṇayoḥ virodhaḥ prakaraṇāt vyāktiḥ pratīyate liṅgāt sāmānyam anyā ca vyaktiḥ anyat sāmānyam tasmāt prakṛtaḥ liṅgavān upādeyaḥ iti ucyate satyam evam etat prakṛtaḥ upādīyamāne prakaraṇam na bādhitam bhavati liṅgam api anugṛhītam liṅga janitaḥ tu pratyayaḥ kaścid mithyā iti kalpitaḥ bhavati nanu vyaktiḥ apadārthaḥ katham vyaktau anupādīyamānāyām pratyayaḥ bādhyeta ucyate etat eva na vijānīmaḥ liṅga vat tātra aṅgam na vā iti kim tu tat dhitarnirdeśaḥ ayam tatra devatāyāḥ mantraḥ lakṣyate mantra vyaktiḥ hi sādhanam na sāmānyam nāma kiṃcid aparam devatā eva atra sāmānyam yayā sādhanam lakṣayitavyam 
[I,259,ii^2]	na ca gamyate viśeṣaḥ ayam asau mantraḥ na ayam asau iti anavagamyamāne viśeṣe sarve tad liṅgāḥ grahītavyāḥ iti dāśatayām api mantra vyaktau bhavati pratyayaḥ sa prakaraṇa anurodhena bādhyeta iti anyāyyam evam sati na dāśatayaḥ eva upādātavyāḥ bhavanti prakṛtam api upādadīran nanu etat uktam kārya antare prakṛtasya upadeśaḥ na asau artha antaraḥ upadekṣyate iti ucyate na niyogataḥ saḥ eva artha antare vartate sa ca anyaḥ ca sāmānyena liṅgena na evam sati kiṃcid duṣyati nanu etat duṣyati na ubhayam anugṛhītam bhavati liṅgam prakaraṇam ca satyam na anugṛhītam bhavati kim tu ananugrāhyam eva prakaraṇam liṅga pratyaya viruddha tvāt api ca na liṅgam prakaraṇam ca anugrahītavyam iti tad paricchinne pravṛttiḥ bhavati yat avagamyate etat phalavat iti tatra pravartate kim atas yadi evam etat atas bhavati na liṅgam anugṛhītam kvacid iti aparasmin tad paricchinne na pravṛttiḥ bhavitum arhati tasmāt dāśatayaḥ grahītavyāḥ iti gamyate 
[I,260,i_I,260,ii]	tad ākhyaḥ vā prakaraṇa upapattibhyām tad ākhyaḥ jyotiṣṭoma samākhyātaḥ eva grahītavyaḥ kutas prakaraṇa upapattibhyām prakṛtaḥ hi asau prakṛta pratyayaḥ ca nyāyyaḥ katham na jyotiṣṭomam prati mantrasya vyāpāra vidhānam upapadyate prāpta tvāt eva vyāpāra viśeṣa vidhānam tu upapadyate aprāpta tvāt vyāpāra viśeṣasya anapekṣya ca prakaraṇam dāśataye vidhīyamāne vākyam bhidyeta upasthānam ca kuryāt tat ca evam liṅgena iti 
[I,261,i_I,261,ii]	anarthakaḥ ca upadeśaḥ syāt asaṃbandhāt phalavatā na hi upasthānam phalavat nanu ca prakaraṇāt jyotiṣṭomasya upakārakam syāt yadi upasthāna jyotiṣṭoma saṃbandhaḥ vivakṣyeta tadā upasthānam jyotiṣṭome upadiśyeta prakaraṇāt tena eka vākyatām iyāt yadā tu kha lūpa sthānasya mantra saṃbandhaḥ vivakṣyate sarva upasthāneṣu tadā mantraḥ prāpnoti prakaraṇam bādhitvā na prakaraṇam viśeṣakam bhavitum arhati ubhaya saṃbandhe vākya bhedaḥ asmat pakṣe na punar ayam doṣaḥ yena āgneyena aindreṇa vā jyotiṣṭome vyāpāraḥ kriyate tena upasthāna vyāpāra viśeṣaḥ tadā jyotiṣṭomikaḥ vidhīyate anyat sarvam anūdyate iti na doṣaḥ bhavati athavā agnīdhra haviḥ dhānasadaḥ saṃbandha mātram vidhīyate upatiṣṭhate iti ayam anuvādaḥ anena mantreṇa āgnīdhram upatiṣṭhate iti samāsīdati iti arthaḥ tasmāt prakṛtāḥ mantrāḥ evaṃjātīyakāḥ upādātavyāḥ iti 
[I,261,iii_I,261,iv]	sarveṣām ca upadiṣṭa tvāt yat api uktam upadiṣṭāḥ hi te prakṛtāḥ kāryantaraḥ iti tat ucyate ukta uttaram etat api ca na kenacid na upadiṣṭāḥ sarve vācāstomaḥ āśvine śasyamāne sūrye anudyati tena na prakṛte kaścid viṣeśaḥ tasmāt prakṛtasya eva grahaṇam 
[I,262,i_I,262,ii]	liṅga samākhyānābhyām bhakṣa artha tā anuvākasya bhakṣa mantraḥ śrūyate bhakṣe hi mā viśa dīrgha āyu tvāya śaṃtanu tvāya rāyaspoṣāya varcase suprajāḥ tvāya ehi vaso purovaso priyaḥ me hṛdaḥ asi aśvinoḥ tvā bāhubhyām sadhyāsam nṛ cakṣasam tvā deva soma su cakṣāḥ avakhyeṣam hinva me gātrāḥ harivaḥ gaṇān me mā vitītṛṣaḥ śivaḥ me saptarṣīn upatiṣṭhasva mā me avāk nābhim ati gāḥ mandra abhibhūtiḥ ketuḥ yajñānam vāc juṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu vasumat gaṇasya rudramat gaṇasya āditya vat gaṇasya soma devate mati vidaḥ prātaḥsavanasya mādhyaṃdinasya savanasya tṛtīyasavanasya gāyatra chandasaḥ triṣṭubh chandasaḥ jagacchandasaḥ agni hutaḥ indra pītasya nara aśaṃsa pītasya pitṛ pītasya madhumate upahūtasya upahūtaḥ bhakṣayāmi iti evamādiḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim kṛtsnaḥ eṣaḥ anuvākaḥ bhakṣaṇe viniyojanīyaḥ uta kaścid asya avayavaḥ anyatra api iti 
[I,262,iii]	kim prāptam liṅga samākhyānābhyām bhakṣa artha tā anuvākasya sarvaḥ anuvākaḥ bhakṣaṇe viniyojanīyaḥ kutas bhakṣayāmi iti eṣa śabdaḥ vyaktam bhakṣaṇe viniyojanīyaḥ bhakṣaṇam eṣa śaknoti vaditum na anyat kiṃcid anyāni ca asya padāni bhakṣaṇa viśeṣaṇa vacanāni eva yatra yatra bhakṣayāmi iti tatra tatra prayujyante 
[I,262,iv]	nanu ehi vasaḥ iti evamādi sadhyāsam iti evam antam grahaṇa artham svena pada samūhena paraspara ākāṅkṣiṇa eka artham vibhinnam bhakṣaṇa vākyāt nṛ cakṣasam iti evamādi avakhyeṣam iti evam antam avekṣaṇa vacanam hinva me gātrāḥ harivaḥ iti evamādi ca mā me vāc nābhim ati gāḥ iti evam antam samyak jaraṇa artham tat bahu tvāt arthānām bahūni vākyāni katham etat śakyam vaditum sarvam idam ekam vākyam bhakṣaṇe viniyujyate iti 
[I,263,i]	ucyate sarvāṇi etāni bhakṣaṇa viśeṣa viśeṣaṇāni iti uktam āha evam api bhidyeta vākyam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyāṇām yugapad vacana asaṃbhavāt ucyate na viśeṣaṇāni vivakṣiṣyāmaḥ viśeṣaṇaiḥ grahaṇa avekṣaṇa ādibhiḥ viśiṣṭaḥ ekaḥ arthaḥ vivakṣyate na evam samyak bhavati viśeṣaṇa vacanānām avivakṣita sva artha vacana tā bhakṣaṇa viśeṣaṇa para tā ca iti lakṣaṇayā tu gamyate śruti lakṣaṇa aviṣaye ca śrutiḥ nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā tasmāt na ekam vākyam iti 
[I,263,ii]	atra ucyate yadi api amī grahaṇa ādayaḥ bahavaḥ arthāḥ gamyante na tu sarve īpsitāḥ iti bhakṣaṇam eva ekam pratyāyayitavyam tat dhi śrutam viśeṣaṇāni aśrutāni na taiḥ pratītaiḥ prayojanam prayojanam ca yāvataḥ pada samūhasya ekam tāvat ekam vākyam tasmāt viśiṣṭa bhakṣaṇa artham etat ekam vākyam iti bhakṣaṇe viniyoktavyam samākhyānam ca bhavati bhakṣa anuvākaḥ iti kṛtsnaḥ ca anuvākaḥ na avayavaḥ 
[I,263,iii]	nanu ca samākhyā laukikaḥ śabdaḥ katham vaidikam aṅgam niyaṃsyati iti yadi api laukikaḥ tathā api anādiḥ tasya anuvākena saṃbandhaḥ kim atas yadi evam etat atas bhavati bhakṣaṇa samabhivyāhṛtam anuvākam brūte samabhivyāhāraḥ ca sati saṃbandhe bhavati yathā pācakaḥ lāvakaḥ iti samabhivyāhārāt saṃbandham anumāsyāmahe āha na anumāna gamyaḥ evaṃjātīyakeṣu aṅga bhāvaḥ vidhānāt eva avagamyate na anyathā na ca samākhyā vidhātrī atra ucyate samākhyā saṃbandhinau buddhau saṃnidhim upaneṣyati prayoga vacanaḥ vidhāsyati iti tasmāt kṛtsnaḥ anuvākaḥ bhakṣaṇe viniyoktavyaḥ iti 
[I,264,i_I,264,ii]	tasya rūpa upadeśābhyām apakarṣaḥ arthasya codita tvāt na etat evam kṛtsnaḥ anuvākaḥ bhakṣaṇe viniyujyate iti rūpāt grahaṇa vākyam grahaṇe viniyujyeta ehi iti evamādi sadhyāsam iti evam antam nṛ cakṣasam iti evamādi ca avakhyeṣam iti evam antam darśane kutas mukhya artham evam tat vākyam bhavati itarathā lakṣaṇa artha tā syāt mukhya artha tā ca nyāyyā na lakṣya artha tā 
[I,264,iii]	ucyate viśeṣaṇānām abhidhāne na kiṃcid asti prayojanam iti uktam atra ucyate na eva etāni viśeṣaṇāni pṛthak eva etāni grahaṇa ādīni svaiḥ svaiḥ vākyaiḥ ucyante iti kutas asti hi taiḥ prayojanam coditāni hi tāni kānicid tu pṛthak vākyaiḥ kānicid artha prāptāni tāni avaśyam prakāśayitavyāni tāni prakāśayiṣyanti etāni vākyāni rūpam ca eṣām tad prakāśana sāmarthyam atas nānā artha tvāt na ekam vākyam ucyate nanu bhakṣaṇa vākya śeṣī bhavitum api eṣām rūpam iti ucyate bāḍham asti rūpam na tu tad viśeṣaṇāni etāni kalpyante kasya hetoḥ adṛṣṭa arthāni tathā bhavanti uktaiḥ anuktaiḥ vā viśeṣaṇaiḥ tāvān eva saḥ arthaḥ itarathāḥ grahaṇa ādīni prakāśayiṣyanti tathā dṛṣṭa arthāni bhaviṣyanti tasmāt rūpa upadeśābhyām apakrṣaḥ bhavet keṣāṃcid atra iti 
[I,264,iv_I,265,i]	guṇa abhidhānāt mandra ādiḥ eka mantraḥ syāt tayoḥ eka artha saṃyogāt bhakṣa anuvāke śrūyate mandra abhibhūtiḥ ketuḥ yajñānām vāc juṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu vasumat guṇasya soma devate mati vidaḥ prātaḥsavanasya gāyatra chandasaḥ agni hutaḥ indra pītasya madhumate upahūtasya upahūtaḥ bhakṣayāmi iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim mandra ādiḥ tṛpyatu iti evam antaḥ ekaḥ mantraḥ vasumat gaṇa ādiḥ aparaḥ uta mandra ādiḥ bhakṣayāmi antaḥ ekaḥ eva mantraḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam dvau mantrau dvau hi etau arthau anyā tṛptiḥ anyat bhakṣaṇam tatas artha bhedāt vākya bhedaḥ tat uktam tasya rūpa upadeśābhyām apakarṣaḥ arthasya codita tvāt iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ guṇa abhidhānāt mandra ādiḥ eka mantraḥ syāt iti tṛptiḥ bhakṣaṇā viśeṣaṇa tvena abhidhīyate iti bhakṣayāmi vāc tarpsyati iti 
[I,265,ii]	nanu tṛpyatu iti eṣaḥ anyaḥ śabdaḥ anyaḥ ca tarpsyati iti eṣā bhaviṣyantī kriyāyām upapada bhūtāyām bhavati iti tatra dvayoḥ kriyayoḥ asti saṃbandhaḥ bhakṣayāmi vāc tarpsyati iti iha punar bhakṣayāmi tṛpyatu iti na asti kaścid saṃbandhaḥ ucyate na hi ayam vidhau tṛpyatu iti vijñāyate kva tarhi prārthanāyām vā prāpta kāle vā yadi bhakṣayāmi vāc tarpsyati iti evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate yadi vā bhakṣayāmi vācaḥ tarptum prāptaḥ kālaḥ iti tena viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvāt eka artha tāyām eka vākya tve mantra aikyam upapadyate nanu nirākāṅkṣe ete vākye bhaṅktvā rūpam sa ākāṅkṣe kriyete atra ucyate yadi api ete vākye bhinna arthe nirākāṅkṣe dvau arthau abhivadeyātām tathā api bhakṣaṇasya prakāśanam dṛṣṭam prayojanam na tarpaṇasya iti kṛtvā aikārthyam eva bhavet kim aṅga punar guṇa bhāve gamyamānaḥ eva atra tasmāt guṇa abhidhānāt mandra ādiḥ eka mantraḥ syāt iti 
[I,266,i_I,266,ii]	liṅga viśeṣa nirdeśāt samāna vidhāneṣu anaindrāṇām amantra tvam eṣaḥ eva mantraḥ udāharaṇam iha ca pradānāni aindrāṇi anaindrāṇi ca vidyante teṣām bhakṣaṇāni api santi tatra saṃdehaḥ kim aindreṣu anaindreṣu ca mantraḥ uta aindreṣu eva mantraḥ anaindrāṇām amantrakam bhakṣaṇam iti kim tāvat prāptam anaindrāṇām amantrakam bhakṣaṇam iti kutas samāna vidhānāni etāni pradānāni teṣu indra pītasya iti mantraḥ anindra pītam na śaknoti vaditum na ca samāna prakaraṇaḥ ūhaḥ saṃbhavati asati vacane anya artha an abhidhānāt tasmāt amantrakam bhakṣaṇam evaṃjātīyakeṣu iti 
[I,266,iii_I,266,iv]	yathādevatam vā tad prakṛti tvam hi darśayati athavā yathādevatam ūhena lakṣayitavyam kasmāt dhruva camasā hi prakṛti bhūtāḥ ke punar dhruva camasāḥ ye śukrām anthi pracāre savana mukhīyāḥ aindrāḥ te bhavanti teṣām prakṛti bhūtam pradānam vikṛti bhūtāni anyāni katham avagamyate tad prakṛti tvam hi darśayati katham anuṣṭubh chandasaḥ iti ṣoḍaśinī atirātre bhakṣa mantram namati iti kim atra darśanam namati iti vipariṇāmam darśayati 
[I,266,v_I,267,i]	nanu vacanam etat syāt na iti ucyate na etat namati iti śrūyate katham tarhi evam namati iti anuṣṭubh chandasaḥ iti bhakṣa mantram namati iti saḥ eṣaḥ ūhaḥ vikāreṣu upapadyate tasmāt ete vikārāḥ atas anaindreṣu api ca udaka prāptaḥ mantraḥ ūhitavyaḥ bhavati ucyate vikārāḥ ete iti liṅgam apadiṣṭam nyāyaḥ abhidhīyatām iti ucyate aindraḥ somaḥ gṛhyate mīyate ca tena aindreṣu somaḥ anaindreṣu somaḥ eva na asti iti sarve somadharmāḥ aindreṣu eva adharmakāḥ itare sa ākāṅkṣāḥ katham punar jñāyate aindraḥ somaḥ gṛhyate mīyate ca iti mantra varṇāt indrāya tvā vasumataḥ iti evamādiḥ mantraḥ aindram somam vaditum śaknoti na anyam tasmāt aindraḥ somaḥ tena aindreṣu soma dharmāḥ anyāni tu pradānāni sa ākāṅkṣāṇi atas dharmān grahīṣyanti iti nyāyaḥ tasmāt yathādevatam ūhitavyaḥ mantraḥ iti evam sthitam tāvat aparyavasitam tatas evam sati cintā antaram vartiṣyate 
[I,267,ii_I,268,i]	punar abhyunnīteṣu sarveṣām upalakṣaṇam dvi śeṣa tvāt santi punar abhyunnītāḥ somāḥ śukrāmanthi pracāraḥ eva savana mukhīyāḥ teṣām hotuḥ vaṣatkāre anuvaṣatkāre ca caturbhiḥ madhyataḥkāriṇām camasaiḥ hutvā hotrakāṇām camasaiḥ sakṛt sakṛt vaṣaṭkāraḥ eva hutvā punar sa śeṣeṣu eva pātreṣu somaḥ abhyunnītaḥ evam hi tatra adhvaryuḥ saṃpreṣyati madhyataḥkāriṇām camasādhvaryavaḥ vaṣaṭkṛte anuvaṣaṭkṛte jahuta hotrakāṇām camasādhvaryavaḥ sakṛt dhutvā śukrasya abhyunnīya upāvartadhvam iti tatra hotrakāḥ nānā devatāḥ yajanti maitrāvaruṇaḥ mitrāvaruṇau mitram vayam havāmahe iti brāhmaṇāt śaṃsī indram indra tvā vṛṣabham vayam iti potāḥ marutaḥ marutaḥ yasya hi kṣayaḥ iti na iṣṭā tvaṣṭāram patnīḥ ca agne patnīḥ iha avaha iti āgnīdhraḥ agnim ukṣā annāya vaśānnāya iti tatra taiḥ camasaiḥ pūrvasmin vaṣaṭkāraḥ indraḥ iṣṭaḥ punar abhyunnīya mitrāvaruṇa ādyāḥ devatāḥ iṣṭāḥ śeṣaḥ tatra indrasya mitrāvaruṇa ādīnām ca tatra saṃdehaḥ kim prasthita devatāyāḥ ca indrasya mitrāvaruṇa ādīnām ca upalakṣaṇam uta indraḥ na upalakṣayitavyaḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam punar abhyunnīteṣu sarveṣām upalakṣaṇam kasmāt dvi śeṣa tvāt camase camase tatra dvayoḥ śeṣaḥ prakṛtau yasyai hutam tat śeṣaḥ tad pītaḥ iti uktam iha api tadvat eva vaditavyam tasmāt camase camase dvayoḥ upalakṣaṇam 
[I,268,ii_I,268,iii]	apanayāt vā pūrvasya anupalakṣaṇam apanītam prasthita devatāyāḥ śeṣam manyāmahe kutas mitrāvaruṇa ādibhyaḥ tad pātra stham abhyāśrāvyate katham etat ucyate mitrāvaruṇa ādayaḥ hi ijyante tat yathā ācārya śeṣam devadattaḥ bhuñjānaḥ yadi śeṣam pūrṇakāya prayacchati pūrṇakaḥ devadattam upalakṣayati devadatta śeṣam bhuñjaḥ iti na ācārya śeṣam tasmāt na prasthita devatā indraḥ upalakṣayitavyaḥ iti 
[I,268,iv_I,268,v]	grahaṇāt vā apanayaḥ syāt na ca etat asti indraḥ na upalakṣaṇīyaḥ iti tasya api hi asau śeṣaḥ pratyakṣam avagamyate nanu apanītaḥ iti ucyate na asau apanīyate sakṛt dhutān camasa anabhidroṇa kalaśāt gṛhṇāti sa śeṣaḥ camasaḥ lakṣaṇam anyasya unnīyamānasya tatas camasa sthaḥ hotum unnetavyaḥ preṣitaḥ vā yat tu yakṣyamāṇāḥ devatāḥ prati āśrāvitaḥ iti ucyate āśrāvyate tatra devatābhyaḥ na tu idam vā tat vā iti tena yat dhotum gṛhītam tat āśrāvitam iti gamyate na ca āśrāvaṇa velāyām devatā abhisaṃbandhaḥ yat yat devatā abhisaṃbaddham tat āśrāvyate tasmāt asti indraśeṣaḥ lakṣyate ca atas sarveṣām upalakṣaṇam iti kṛtvā acintā eṣā na atra prayojanam vaktavyam pūrva adhikaraṇasya eva etat prayojanam avadhāryate 
[I,269,i_I,269,ii]	pātnīvate tu pūrvavat asti pātnīvataḥ grahaḥ yat upāṃśu pātreṇa agrayaṇāt pātnīvatam gṛhṇāti iti dvi devatyānām śeṣāḥ āgrayaṇa sthālyām upanītāḥ tatas pātnīvataḥ gṛhyate atha hute pātnīvate tat śeṣe bhakṣyamāṇe bhavati saṃdehaḥ kim indra vāyu ādayaḥ upalakṣayitavyā na vā iti kim tāvat prāptam upalakṣayitavyāḥ teṣām api hi asau śeṣaḥ yathā prasthita devatāyāḥ iti 
[I,269,iii_I,269,iv^1]	grahaṇāt vā apanītam syāt apanīyate hi sa śeṣaḥ iha na yathāpūrvavat tatra hi pātra lakṣaṇa tvena saṃkīrtyate na somaḥ grāhya tvena iha tu āgrayaṇāt gṛhṇāti iti sthālī sthaḥ somaḥ nirdiśyate hotum yakṣyamāṇa devatām prati nanu sthālyām āgrayaṇaḥ na agrayaṇaḥ ca tatra yaḥ tasmāt āgrayaṇāt gṛhyate sa pātnīvataḥ yaḥ tu saṃpātān āsau pātnīvataḥ iti ucyate āgrayaṇaḥ apādānam tasmāt yaḥ apaiti āgrayaṇaḥ anāgrayaṇaḥ vā sa sarvaḥ pātnīvataḥ āgrayaṇāt ca eṣa sarvaḥ apetaḥ nanu anāgrayaṇāt api apetaḥ na eṣa doṣaḥ āgrayaṇāt tāvat apetaḥ tena asau pūrva devatābhiḥ pītaḥ iti na śakyate vaktum 
[I,269,iv^2]	yaḥ hi indra arthasya somasya avayavaḥ śeṣaḥ saḥ indra pītaḥ iti prakṛtau ucyate iha api tadvat eva pūrva devatā arthasya avayavaḥ vaditavyaḥ nanu yaḥ asau pūrva devatā arthaḥ tasya eva ayam avayavaḥ na iti brūmaḥ na hi hutasya avayavaḥ dṛśyate nanu prakṛtau api hutasya avayavaḥ na dṛśyate ucyate huta āhutasya samudāyasya tatra avayavaḥ upalakṣyate tad devatasya nanu iha api samudāyaḥ eva āsīt tad devatyaḥ tasya eva ayam avayavaḥ na iti ucyate āsīt ayam samudāyaḥ tad devatyaḥ idānīm tasya avayavaḥ anya devatyaḥ jātaḥ tena samudāyaḥ tad devatya tvāt apetaḥ 
[I,270,i]	āha pūrva devatā pītasya asau avayavaḥ āsīt tena bhūta pūrva gatyā bhaviṣyati ucyate prakṛtau na bhūta pūrva gatyā abhidhānam kṛtam iha api tadvat eva na kartavyam iti api ca indra devatyaḥ tatra indra pītaḥ iti uktam anapanītā ca tasya indra devatya tā asya punar pūrva devatā saṃbandhaḥ apagataḥ tasmāt na atra pūrva devatā upalakṣaṇīyā iti 
[I,270,ii_I,270,iii]	tvaṣṭāram tu upalakṣayet pānāt asti pātnīvataḥ somaḥ tatra mantraḥ agnā i patnī van sajūs devena tvaṣṭrā somam pibā iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim tvaṣṭā upalakṣayitavyaḥ na vā iti kim prāptam upalakṣayitavyaḥ kutas pānāt pānam śrūyate sajūs devena tvaṣṭrā somam pibā iti tena ayam agnaye patnīvate saha tvaṣṭrā dīyate iti gamyate yasmai ca yena saha dīyate ubhābhyām tat dīyate evam tat saha dānam bhavati yathā devadattāya yajñadattena saha śatam dīyatām iti ukte tatra ubhābhyām api dīyate tasmāt tvāṣṭraḥ api asau somaḥ iti tu aṣṭā upala kṣayitavyaḥ asau api indraḥ iva pibati iti 
[I,271,i_I,271,ii]	atulya tvāt tu na evam syāt na etat evam śabda pramāṇakāḥ vayam yat śabdaḥ āha tat asmākam pramāṇam śabdaḥ ca agneḥ patnīvataḥ pānam āha tvaṣṭuḥ sahabhāva mātram na hi ananuṣṭhīyamāne sahabhāvaḥ sidhyati iti tvaṣṭari pānam anumīyate nanu tvaṣṭre pānam coditam satyam coditam mantra varṇena na codanayā codanā hi pātnīvatam gṛhṇāti iti loke tu kāryam dṛṣṭvā coditam acoditam api anuṣṭhīyate eva lokataḥ ca etat paricchinnam na evaṃjātīyakena vākyena tvaṣṭuḥ somaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati iti 
[I,271,iii_I,271,iv]	triṃśat ca parārtha tvāt tasmin eva pātnīvate mantraḥ aibhiḥ agne sa ratham yāhi arvāk nānā ratham vā vibhavaḥ hi aśvāḥ patnīvataḥ triṃśatam trīn ca devān anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasva iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim trayastriṃśataḥ devānām upalakṣaṇam kartavyam uta na iti kim prāptam trayastriṃśatam devān upalakṣayet katham dīyate hi somaḥ trayastriṃśate devebhyaḥ evam hi agnim agnīt adhīcchati āyāhi agneḥ avācīnam trayastriṃśatā devaiḥ saha samānam ratham adhiṣṭhāya nānā rathaiḥ vā vibhavanti hi te aśvāḥ tat idam anuṣvadham āvaha trayastriṃśatam patnīvataḥ devān āgamaya tarpaya ca iti atra hi agnim agnīt adhīcchati trayastriṃśataḥ devānām tṛptayaḥ iti gamyate yat pradhānaḥ ca atra mantraḥ tat paraḥ somaḥ tasmāt ucyate trayastriṃśat devāḥ upalakṣayitavyāḥ iti 
[I,272,i_I,272,ii^1]	nanu codanāyām patnīvān kevalaḥ agniḥ devatā tvena śrūyate satyam codanāyām patnīvān devatā tvena śrūyate na tu devatā antaram niṣidhyate kim atas yadi evam etat atas bhavati māntra varṇikāḥ trayastriṃśat devāḥ aviruddhāḥ codanāyām pratīyante iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ na trayastriṃśat devāḥ upalakṣayitavyāḥ iti na atra mantre agniḥ āhvātā pariveṣṭā vā tarpayitā vā adhyeṣyate na atra trayastriṃśat deveṣu iṣṭeṣu prayojanam nirvartyate kaḥ tarhi yaṣṭavyaḥ patnīvān kutas etat sa hi codyate pātnīvatam gṛhṇāti iti nanu māntra varṇikānām trayastriṃśataḥ devānām atra saṃkīrtanam ucyate para artha tvena tāḥ saṃkīrtyante katham na hi aprattam agneḥ tat bhavati na ca parakīyasya dānam avakalpate tasmāt tvam amūbhyaḥ trayastriṃśat devatābhyaḥ dehi iti asamañjasam vacanam agnaye tu anena dānam uktam bhavati 
[I,272,ii^2]	katham īśānaḥ hi vilaṃbhayati dravyam tat iha vilaṃbhanam saṃkīrtayan tvam asya īśānaḥ iti pratyāpayati nanu mādayasva iti ucyate na vilaṃbhaya iti ucyate na hi mādyanti devatāḥ tasmāt mada karaṇa saṃkīrtanam adṛṣṭāya syāt dṛṣṭāya tu tyāga saṃkīrtanam lakṣaṇayā lakṣaṇā hi adṛṣṭa kalpanāyāḥ jyāyasī pramāṇāt dhi sā bhavati nanu tyāge api lakṣyamāṇe agniḥ kartā ādhīṣyate tat ucyate agneḥ api adhyeṣaṇa adṛṣṭāya eva tasmāt agneḥ aiśvarya karaṇam etat vākyam lakṣayati iti nyāyyam api ca pātnīvate somaḥ codyate pātnīvatam gṛhṇāti iti 
[I,273,i]	nanu uktam māntra varṇikam ca pratiṣedhati codanā iti ucyate tat api māntravarṇikam na asti iti uktam api ca sāmarthyāt pratiṣedhati iti gamyate na hi sa apekṣaḥ patnī vat śabdaḥ tat dhita arthena saṃlakṣyate tasmāt kevalaḥ patnīvān devatā iti etat codanā vaśena mantraḥ varṇanīyaḥ tasmāt yathā eva asmābhiḥ varṇitaḥ mantraḥ tathā eva bhavitum arhati iti patnīvān ca agniḥ agne patnī ivan iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdiśyate tasmāt agniḥ upalakṣayitavyaḥ na trayastriṃśat devatāḥ iti 
[I,273,ii_I,273,iii]	vaṣaṭkāraḥ ca kartṛ vat asti anuvaṣaṭkāra devatā somasya agne vīhi iti anuvaṣaṭkaroti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim anuvaṣaṭkāra devatā upala kṣayitavyā na vā iti kim prāptam upalakṣayitavyā iti na tatra pārārthyam kiṃcid pūrvat upalakṣyate tasmāt upalakṣayitā ivyati evam prāpte brūmaḥ anuvaṣaṭkāra devatā na upalakṣayitavyā kartṛ vat yathā kartā na upalakṣyate hotṛ pītasya adhvarī upītasya iti evam eva anuvaṣaṭkāra devatā api na hi sā prakṛtau upalakṣitā yat ca nāma prakṛtau kṛtam tat iha karaṇīyam tasmāt na upalakṣayitavyā iti 
[I,274,i_I,274,ii]	chandaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tu sarva gāmi tvāt sthitāt uttaram ucyate na etat asti yat uktam ūhena mantravat bhakṣaṇam kartavyam iti amantrakam bhakṣaṇam kartavyam kasmāt ucyate samāna vidhāna tvāt na asti atra prakṛti vikṛti bhāvaḥ katham prakaraṇasya tulya tvāt yat liṅgam uktam chandaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ saḥ iti ucyate tṛtīyasavana tvāt jagati icchandasaḥ iti prāpte anuṣṭubh chandasaḥ iti ṣoḍaśini bhakṣa mantram namati iti samāna vidhāne api avakalpyate yat tu uktam aindraḥ somaḥ gṛhyate mīyate ca iti na ete aindrāḥ anaindrāḥ ca bhinnāḥ yāgāḥ ekasya eva ete abhyāsa viśeṣāḥ na ca ābhāsa viśeṣāṇām dharmāḥ guṇa tvāt sarve ete yāga dharmāḥ tena kṛtsnāḥ yāgasya codyante soma dharmāḥ somaḥ ca iti yat ca indraḥ gṛhyate mīyate ca iti indrasya mantra āmnānān mantreṇa grahaṇam prakāśayitavyam itarāsām devatānām dhyāna ādinā iti tasmāt anaindrāṇām amantrakam bhakṣaṇam iti 
[I,275,i_I,275,ii]	aindra agne tu liṅga bhāvāt syāt evam sthite cintyate asti tatra aindrāgnaḥ somaḥ aindrāgnam gṛhṇāti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim mantravat bhakṣaṇam amantrakam vā iti kim prāptam aindra agne tu mantraḥ syāt yasya hi indra agnī devatā tasya na indraḥ śakyate hi saḥ indra pītaḥ iti vyapadeṣṭum yasya hi avayava antaram indreṇa pītam saḥ indra pītaḥ tasya indra agnibhyām pibadbhyām pītam avayava antaram indreṇa tasmāt mantravat bhakṣaṇam iti 
[I,275,iii_I,275,iv]	ekasmin vā devatā antarāt vibhāga vat na asya avayava antaram indreṇa pīyate na ca avayava antareṇa indra pītena tat pītam bhavati tena pītaḥ iti lakṣaṇā śabdaḥ ayam indram uddiśya yaḥ saṃkalpitaḥ indraḥ yasya devatā iti yathā eva ca sa ākāṅkṣasya tat dhita arthena asaṃbandhaḥ evam samāsaḥ api indra pītasya iti sa ākāṅkṣasya na avakalpate tat uktam vyavasthā vā artha saṃyogāt iti 
[I,275,v]	āha nanu tena eva adhikaraṇena etat gatam kim artham punar cintyate iti ucyate yat tatra vicāritam siddham eva tat katham punar vicāryate na eva sa ākāṅkṣasya devatā saṃbandhaḥ iti na eva iha devatā saṃbandhaḥ iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ pāna mātra saṃbandhaḥ atra iti pāna mātra saṃbandhena yatra dvābhyām pīyate tatra ekena devatā saṃbandhaḥ iti uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ tasmāt na punar uktam iti 
[I,276,i_I,276,ii]	chandaḥ ca devatāvat asmin mantre gāyatra chandasaḥ iti ucyate tatra saṃdehaḥ kim eka chandasi some mantraḥ uta nānācchandasi api iti ucyate chandaḥ ca devatāvat yathā anya sahita indre na mantraḥ evam aneka chandaske some na syāt mantraḥ iti atra api hi gāyatra chandasaḥ iti sa viśeṣaṇasya samāsaḥ na avakalpate 
[I,276,iii_I,276,iv]	sarveṣu vā abhāvāt ekacchandasaḥ sarveṣu vā mantraḥ syāt kutas abhāvāt ekacchandasaḥ na eva kaścid ekacchandasāḥ somaḥ asti tena yathābhūtaḥ ayam tathābhūtasya chandaḥ viśeṣaṇam tasmāt aneka chandaske some mantraḥ syāt iti 
[I,276,v_I,276,vi]	sarveṣām vā eka mantryam aitiśāyanasya bhakti pāna tvāt sa vana adhikāraḥ hi yat uktam anaindrāṇām amantrakam bhakṣaṇam iti tat na sarveṣām sa mantrakam bhakṣaṇam iti yathāsamāmnātaḥ ca mantraḥ syāt na indra pītaḥ iti somaḥ ucyate kim tarhi savanam prātaḥsavana śabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt nanu some api ṣaṣṭhī satyam asti ṣaṣṭhī na tu tena sāmānādhikaraṇyam na asau indreṇa somaḥ pītaḥ na api indrāya dattaḥ anyaḥ eva pītaḥ dattaḥ vā sa gataḥ eva na ca atītaḥ samudāyaḥ vyapadiśyate pratyakṣa vacanaḥ hi ayam śabdaḥ savane tu na doṣaḥ indra pītam bhavati savanam yatra indreṇa pītam tasmāt anaindraḥ apīta savane antarbhavati iti śakyate mantreṇa vaditum śakyate ced samāna vidhāne katham iva mantraḥ na bhaviṣyati bhaktyā hi api itaḥ pītaḥ iti ucyate evam eva aitiśāyanaḥ ācāryaḥ manyate sma asmākam api etat eva matam ācārya grahaṇam tasmāt āgatam iti tasya saṃkīrti artham 
[I,278,i_I,278,ii]	śruteḥ jāta adhikāraḥ syāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate uccais ṛcaḥ kriyate uccais sāmnā upāṃśu yajuṣā iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ṛc ādi jātim adhikṛtya ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ uta vedam adhikṛtya iti kim tāvat prāptam jāta adhikāraḥ syāt kutas śruteḥ eṣām śabdānām śravaṇāt eva jātim pratipadyāmahe tena upāṃśu tvam jātyā adhikṛtayā saṃbadhyate vedānām adhikārakaḥ śabdaḥ na asti iti api ca ṛgveda vyatikrāntānām ṛcām yajurvedaḥ uccais prayogaḥ bhaviṣyati itarathā tasyāḥ eva ṛcaḥ ubhau dharmau vaikalpikau syātām tatra pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt prakaraṇam ca evam anugṛhītam bhavati itarathāḥ veda saṃyoge sarvasmin api kratau upāṃśu tvam syāt tasmāt jāta adhikārāḥ ete śabdāḥ iti 
[I,278,iii_I,278,iv]	vedaḥ vā prāya darśanāt vedam vā adhikṛtya idam ucyate kutas prāya darśanāt kim idam prāya darśanāt iti veda prāye vākye veda upakrame nigamyamānāḥ ime śabdāḥ śrūyante prajāpatiḥ vā idam ekaḥ āsīt sa tapaḥ atapyata tasmāt tapaḥ te pānāt trayaḥ devāḥ asṛjyanta agniḥ vāyuḥ ādityaḥ te tapaḥ atapyanta tebhyaḥ te pānebhyaḥ trayaḥ vedāḥ asṛjyanta agneḥ ṛgvedaḥ vāyoḥ yajurvedaḥ ādityāt sāmavedaḥ iti evam upakramya nigamanaḥ idam śrūyate uccais ṛcā kriyate ucchaiḥ sāmnā upāṃśu yajuṣā iti etasmāt kāraṇāt ebhiḥ prakṛtaiḥ upāṃśva ādi kartavyam na jātyā ṛc a ādibhiḥ iti ucyate kutas etat avagamyate vākya upasaṃhāre śruta tvāt yasmāt itas ete vedāḥ jātāḥ tasmāt etaiḥ upāṃśva ādi kartavyam iti ṛc a ādibhiḥ api veda vacanaiḥ eva upasaṃhāreṇa bhavitavyam itarathā vākyam eva na avakalpeta tatra anarthakāḥ eva bhaveyuḥ tasmāt veda adhikārāḥ iti 
[I,279,i_I,279,ii]	liṅgāt ca liṅgam api asmin arthe bhavati yathā ṛc a ādayaḥ śabdāḥ śaknuvanti vedam abhivaditum iti ṛgbhiḥ prātar divi devaḥ īyate yajurvedena tiṣṭhati madhye ahnaḥ sāmavedena astamaye mahīyate vedaiḥ aśūnyaiḥ tribhiḥ eti sūryaḥ iti dvau vedau saṃkīrtya ṛc śabdam ca triṣu pādeṣu caturthe pādaḥ upasaṃharati bahuvacanena vedaiḥ aśūnyaḥ tribhiḥ eti sūryaḥ iti ṛc śabdam veda vacanam darśayati tasmāt api paśyāmaḥ veda adhikārāḥ ete śabdāḥ iti 
[I,279,iii_I,279,iv]	dharma upadeśāt ca na hi dravyeṇa saṃbandhaḥ dharma upadeśaḥ ca bhavati sāmnaḥ uccais sāmnā iti sa veda adhikāra pakṣe yujyate jāta adhikāre tu ṛcaḥ uccais tvena sāmnaḥ uccais tvam siddham na asya sāma dravyeṇa saha saṃbandhaḥ veditavyaḥ tasmāt api veda adhikārāḥ iti 
[I,279,v_I,279,vi]	trayī vidyā ākhyā ca tad vidi trayī yasya vidyā sa trayīvidyaḥ yaḥ trīn vedān adhīte saḥ evam prakhyāyate trayī iti ca eṣa śabdāḥ ṛc sāma yajuḥṣu prasiddhaḥ yadi ṛc sāmayajūṃṣi iti trayaḥ vedāḥ ucyante evam tad vidi trayīvidyā ākhyā yujyate bhavati ca tasmāt veda adhikārāḥ ete 
[I,280,i_I,280,ii]	vyatikrame yathāśruti iti ced atha yat uktam ṛgvedam atikrāntānām ṛcām yajurvede api uccais tvam bhaviṣyati iti tatra mad pakṣe yathāśrutaḥ prayogaḥ bhaviṣyati iti yat uktam tat parihartavyam iti ābhāṣā antam sūtram 
[I,280,iii_I,280,iv]	na sarvasmin niveśāt na eṣa doṣaḥ sarvasmin ṛgvedaḥ uccais tvam sarvasmin ca yajurvedaḥ upāṃśu tvam tatra yadi ṛgveda vyatikrāntāyāḥ ṛcaḥ yajurvedaḥ upāṃśu tvam bhavati iti na etat dūṣyati veda dharmaḥ san ṛc dharmaḥ iti vedasya ca na dharma dvayena saṃbandhaḥ 
[I,280,v_I,280,vi]	veda saṃyogāt na prakaraṇena bādhyeta yat uktam prakaraṇam evam anugṛhītam bhavati iti veda saṃyogāt vākyena prakaraṇe bādhyamāne na doṣaḥ bhaviṣyati 
[I,280,vii_I,280,viii]	guṇa mukhya vyatikrame tad artha tvāt mukhyena veda saṃyogaḥ asti ādhānam yaḥ evam vidvān agnim ādhattaḥ iti tat yājuḥ vaidikam tatra sāmagānam āmananti yaḥ evam vidvān vāravantīyam gāyati yaḥ evam vidvān yajñāyajñīyam gāyati yaḥ evam vidvān vāmadevyam gāyati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ādhāne sāma gānam uccais uta upāṃśu iti uccais iti prāptam kutas sāmavedena etat kriyate yat vāravantīya ādibhiḥ tasmāt uccais etāni sāmāni geyāni iti 
[I,281,i]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ guṇa anurodhena vā mukhyam vyatikramet mukhya anurodhena vā guṇam iti guṇaḥ vyatikramitavyaḥ nyāyyaḥ mukhyaḥ ca anugrahītavyaḥ iti kutas mukhya artha tvāt guṇasya guṇasya anuṣṭhānena mukhyaḥ sa guṇaḥ katham syāt iti guṇe pravartate guṇa pravṛttyā ced mukhyasya guṇa hāniḥ bhavati guṇa pravṛttau phalam eva na avāptam bhavati atha pradhānam sa guṇam kariṣyāmi iti guṇe pravartamānaḥ guṇasya guṇam vinipātayati na asya sva arthaḥ hīyate na asau guṇam sa guṇam kartum pravartate guṇaḥ ca sāma gānam pradhānam ādhānam ādhānasya yājuḥ vaidika tvāt upāṃśu tā guṇaḥ sa gaṇa dharmam uccais tvam sāma vaidikam bādhate tasmāt upāṃśu sāmāni geyāni iti 
[I,281,ii_I,281,iii^1]	bhūyastvena ubhaya śruti yajurvede jyotiṣṭomam samāmananti jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti tathā sāmavede api asya evam eva samāmnānam sakṛt ca kṛtāyām buddhau dvitīyam guṇa artham śravaṇam bhavati tatra saṃdehaḥ kim yājuḥ vaidikam āmnānam kriyā artham sāmavaidikam guṇa artham uta viparītam iti yatarat ca āmnānam kriyā artham tat dharmāḥ bhaviṣyanti kim tāvat prāptam sāmavedikam kriyā artham yājurvedikam vā iti aniścayaḥ viśeṣān avagamāt iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ bhūyastvena guṇānām paricchidyeta yatra bhūyāṃsaḥ guṇāḥ samāmnātāḥ tatra kriyā arthā codanā iti gamyate 
[I,281,iii^2]	yatra hi kartavya tayā codanā tatra itikartavyatā ākāṅkṣyate yatra ākāṅkṣitā iti kartavyatā tatra iti kartavyatā vacanam nyāyyam ye ca bhūyāṃsaḥ guṇāḥ sa iti kartavyatā tat itikartavya tāliṅgena kartavya tā codanām anumimīmahe yathā bahuṣu rāja pratimeṣu upaviṣṭeṣu yasya śvetam chatram bāla vyajanam ca sa rājā iti avagamyate anākhyātaḥ api rāja liṅgena evam kartavyatā āliṅgena guṇānām bhūyastvena jyotiṣṭomasya yājuḥ vaidikasya codanā anumīyate tasmāt jyotiṣṭomasya upāṃśu prayogaḥ yajurvedena hi jyotiṣṭomaḥ kriyate yat tena codyate acoditam na śakyate kartum iti 
[I,282,i_I,282,ii]	asaṃyuktam prakaraṇāt iti kartavya tā arthi tvāt uktāni viniyoga kāraṇāni śrutiḥ liṅgam vākyam iti śrutiḥ aindryā gārhapatyam iti dvitīyā vibhaktiḥ liṅgam mantreṣu vacana sāmarthyam bahis deva sadanam dāmi iti vākyam aruṇayā krīṇāti iti atha kim etāvanti eva viniyoga kāraṇāni na iti ucyate kim aparam kāraṇam iti praśnena eva upakramaḥ bhavati ca praśnena eva upakramaḥ yathā kā nāma iyam nadī kaḥ nāma ayam pravataḥ kim idam phalam iti 
[I,282,iii]	tat ucyate asaṃyuktam prakaraṇāt itikartavya tā arthi tvāt yat asaṃyuktam śrutyā liṅgena vākyena vā tat prakaraṇāt itikartavya tā arthi tvāt yat itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣiṇaḥ saṃnidhau pūraṇa samartham upanipatati yat vacanam tat tena prakṛtena saha eka vākya tām yāti tasmāt prakṛte viniyujyate kim iha udāharaṇam kim ca prayojanam iti darśa pūrṇamāsau prakṛtya śrūyate samidhaḥ yajati tanūnapātam yajati iḍaḥ yajati barhiḥ yajati svāhākāram yajati iti tāni tatra eva prakaraṇa sāmarthyāt viniyujyante na agnihotre jyotiṣṭome vā 
[I,283,i_I,283,ii]	kramaḥ ca deśa sāmānyāt atha kim etāvanti eva viniyoga kāraṇāni na iti ucyate kim ca kramaḥ ca deśa sāmānyāt kramavatām ānupūrveṇa upadiśyamānānām yasya paryāye yam dharmam āmananti tasya tam prati ākāṅkṣā anumīyate satyām ākāṅkṣāyām eka vākya bhāvaḥ tasmāt tatas viniyogaḥ iti kim iha udāharaṇam kim ca prayojanam ānupūrvyavatām yāgānām anumantraṇeṣu āmnāteṣu upāṃśu yājasya krame dabdhiḥ nāma asi iti samāmnātaḥ tasya ākāṅkṣām utpādya tena eka vākyatām yāt vā tatra eva viniyogam arhati iti tathā ca aindrāgnam karma viyāta sajātasya asti bhrātṛ vyavataḥ tasya yājyā anuvākyā yugalam api āmnāyata aindrāgnam indra agnī rocanā ādivaḥ pravarṣaṇibhyaḥ iti ekam aparam indra agnī navatim puras ślathat vṛtram iti tatra liṅgāt viniyoge siddhe viśeṣa viniyogaḥ bhavati pūrvam yugalam pūrvasya aindrāgnasya uttaram uttarasya iti etat udāharaṇam prayojanam ca iti 
[I,284,i_I,284,ii]	ākhyā ca evam tat artha tvāt atha kim etāvanti eva viniyoga kāraṇāni iti na iti ucyate kim ca samākhyā ca evam syāt katham viniyoga kāraṇam iti samākhyā sati saṃbandhe bhavati yathā pācakaḥ lāvakaḥ iti tatra pācaka śabdam upalabhya pacatinā asya saṃbandhaḥ iti gamyate evam vede api iti akṛtaka artha saṃbandham samācakṣāṇam śabdam upalabhya bhavati saṃbandhe tasmin saṃpratyayaḥ kim iha udāharaṇam prayojanam ca ādhvaryavam iti samākhyātāni karmāṇi adhvaryuṇā kartavyāni hautram iti ca hotrā etat udāharaṇam prayojanam ca iti 
[I,284,iii_I,284,iv]	śruti liṅga vākya prakaraṇa sthāna samākhyānām samavāye pāra daurbalyam artha viprakarṣāt uktāni viniyoga kāraṇāni śruti liṅgam vākyam prakaraṇam sthānam samākhyānam iti teṣām samavāye kim balīyaḥ iti cintyate eka artha vṛtti tvāt vācaḥ yugapad asaṃbandhāt dvayoḥ dvayoḥ saṃpradhāraṇā tatra śruti liṅgayoḥ kim śruti balīyasi āhosvit liṅgam iti kim punar atra udāharaṇam aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti atra cintyate kim indrasya gārhapatyasya vā upasthānam kartavyam iti aniyamaḥ uta gārhapatyasya eva iti yadi tulya bale ete kāraṇe tatas vikalpaḥ atha śrutiḥ balīyasī gārhapatyaḥ eva upastheyaḥ 
[I,285,i]	kā punar atra śrutiḥ kim liṅgam śrutiḥ gārhapatya śabda śravaṇam liṅgam punar kadā ca na starīrasi na indrasaḥ casi dāśuṣe iti indra śabdasya viśiṣṭa devatā abhidhāna sāmarthyam atha kim vākyam nāma saṃhatya artham abhidadhati padāni vākyam yadi evam idam api vākyam aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti idam api kadā cana starīḥ asi iti ubhayatra api saṃhatya artham abhidadhati padāni tena vākyasya vākyasya ca eṣā saṃpradhāraṇā na śruti liṅgayoḥ yadi vā śruti liṅga vākyāni vivektavyāni idam śruti vākyayoḥ antaram idam liṅga vākyayoḥ iti 
[I,285,ii]	tat abhidhīyate yat tāvat śabdasya artham abhidhātum sāmarthyam tat liṅgam yat arthasya abhidhānam śabdasya śravaṇa mātrāt eva avagamyate sa śrutyā avagamyate śravaṇam śrutiḥ eka artham anekam padam vākyam iti uktam eva tat etat sarveṣu eva vākyeṣu samavetam viviktam ca dṛśyate iha tāvat kadā cana starīḥ asi iti anena mantreṇa indraḥ upasthātavyaḥ iti na etat kasyacid śabdasya śravaṇāt eva avagamyate na api śabda antarasya samīpaḥ uccāritasya sāmarthyam asti yena etat avagamyate etasyām khalu ṛci indra śabdaḥ vidyate yaḥ viśiṣṭām devatām avagamayitum śaknoti tayā ca avagamitayā prayojanam asti iti tena indra upasthānaḥ indra śabdaḥ prayujyate tad eka vākyatāt ca avaśiṣṭāni padāni na tu evam asyām ṛci kasyacid śabdasya sāmarthyāt gārhapatyasya upasthānam bhavati śravaṇāt eva tu gārhapatya śabdasya vayam agnim pratīmaḥ na liṅgāt yadi tu liṅgam balīyaḥ indraḥ upasthātavyaḥ yadi gārhapatya śravaṇam tatas gārhapatyaḥ 
[I,286,i^1]	evam tarhi liṅga vākye virudhyamānaḥ iha saṃpradhārye na śruti liṅge indra śabdasya viśiṣṭa devatā abhidhāna sāmarthyāt indra upasthānam yadi liṅgam balīyaḥ atha tu vākyam gārhapatyaḥ upastheyaḥ vākyam hi etat aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti na etat evam yadi api etat vākyam śrutiḥ api atra asti yā tu atra śrutiḥ sā liṅgena virudhyate na yat vākyam katham balīyasi api hi liṅge aindrya upatiṣṭhate iti etat gārhapatya śabdena saha eka vākyatām upaitya eva yadi hi na upeyāt tatas liṅgena virudhyate 
[I,286,i^2]	yaḥ tu gārhapatya śravaṇāt eva arthaḥ pratīyate sa liṅge balīyasi parityaktaḥ bhavati na asau upasthānena saṃbadhyate tadā hi indram gārhapatya śabdaḥ abhivadet agni samīpam vā atha nu śrutiḥ pramāṇam bhavati tatas liṅgena avagatam indra upasthānam bādhyeta tasmāt śruti liṅgayoḥ eva eṣa virodhaḥ na liṅga vākyayoḥ iti athavā na atra eka vākya tvāt indra prādhānyam gārhapatya prādhānyam vā upasthānasya kutas tarhi indra śabdavat tvāt mantrasya indra prādhānyam dvitīya avibhakti śravaṇāt gārhapatya prādhānyam tasmāt śruti liṅgayoḥ virodhaḥ 
[I,286,ii]	kim tāvat prāptam tulya bale ete kāraṇaḥ iti katham idam api kāraṇam idam api śrutiḥ api liṅgam api na hi vijñānasya vijñānasya ca kaścid viśeṣaḥ upalabhyate rūpam prati asya bhaṅgurasya iva rūpam asya dṛḍhasya iva iti nanu liṅgasya bhaṅgurasya iva rūpam sa vicikitsaḥ hi bhavati liṅgāt pratyayaḥ nirvicikitsaḥ śruteḥ na etat yuktam yatas liṅgāt sa vicikitsaḥ pratyayaḥ tasya ca śruteḥ ca na eva saṃpradhāraṇā asti yatas tu khalu liṅgāt nirvicikitsaḥ pratyayaḥ sa śrutyā vikalpitum arhati nanu na eva kadācid liṅgāt nirvicikitsaḥ pratyayaḥ asti na etat evam evam hi sati na eva liṅgam nāma kiṃcid pramāṇam abhaviṣyat kāmam mā bhūt pramāṇam bhavati tu saṃśayaḥ liṅga parijñāteṣu artheṣu yadi vā vispaṣṭam eva aprāmāṇyam na saṃśayaḥ katham samartham etat imam artham abhinirvartayitum iti liṅgāt etāvat avagamyate na ca yat yasya nirvartanāya alam tat asati eva vacane tat nirvartayitum arhati tasmāt na liṅgam viniyojakam iti 
[I,287,i]	atra abhidhīyate prakaraṇavataḥ arthasya saṃnidhāne yam artham āmananti sa tasya sādhana bhūtaḥ iti eva gamyate katham khalu upakariṣyati iti saṃdihyamāne bhavati sāmarthyāt pariniścayaḥ yatra ayam samarthaḥ tatra śakyaḥ viniyoktam iti tasmāt bhavati liṅgam pramāṇam iti na ca liṅga prāmāṇye vinigamanāyām hetuḥ asti tasmāt tulya bale ete kāraṇe kadā cana starīḥ asi iti liṅgāt indraḥ upasthātavyaḥ śruteḥ gārhapatyaḥ iti avirodhāt khalu api imam eva artham pratipadyāmahe balīyān api hetuḥ virudhyamānm abalīyāṃsam bādhitum arhati na aviruddham na ca kaścana virodhaḥ yat indram upatiṣṭheta anena mantreṇa gārhapatyam api 
[I,287,ii]	nanu ayam eva virodhaḥ sakṛt upasthānam coditam asakṛt abhinirvartyate iti upastheya bhedāt pratipradhānam āvartante guṇāḥ iti nyāya eva eṣa na virodhaḥ ayam tarhi virodhaḥ gārhapatyaḥ upasthīyamāne agnivacanaḥ indra śabdaḥ guṇam kriyā yogam vā apekṣamāṇaḥ bhavitum arhati indre tu upasthātavye nirapekṣaḥ indra vacanaḥ eva gauṇa mukhyayoḥ ca mukhye saṃpratyayaḥ iti na iti brūmaḥ virodhe mukhyena gauṇaḥ bādhyeta na ca kaścid virodhaḥ yugapad abhidhāne hi virudhyeyātām iha ca anyasmin prayoge agni vacanaḥ anyasmin indra vacanaḥ atas tulya bale ete kāraṇe iti 
[I,288,i]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ śruti liṅgayoḥ śruti balīyasī kutas artha viprakarṣāt kim idam artha viprakarṣāt iti arthasya viprakarṣaḥ artha viprakarṣaḥ kaḥ punar arthaḥ śrutyā arthaḥ gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ śruti arthaḥ indraḥ upastheyaḥ iti viprakṛṣṭaḥ katham kadā cana starīḥ asi iti anena mantreṇa indraḥ upasthātavyaḥ iti na śrūyate sati api indra abhidhāna sāmarthye vacana abhāvāt anupasthānīya indraḥ iti eva gamyate 
[I,288,ii]	nanu idam uktam prakaraṇa āmnānāt aṅgam iti avagamyate sāmarthyāt viniyogaḥ iti na etat asti uktam eva etat dharmasya śabda mūla tvāt aśabdam anapekṣam syāt iti yat etat prakaraṇam liṅgam ca ubhayam api etat śabdam na ca atikrānta pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ evaṃlakṣaṇake arthe śabdam antareṇa paricchedaḥ avakalpate atas manyāmahe viprakṛṣṭam śruti arthāt liṅgam iti yadi evam śrutiḥ yatra virodhinī na vidyate tatra api na liṅgāt artha paricchedaḥ tatra etat eva na asti liṅgam pramāṇam iti kutas eva etena śrutiḥ virotsyate iti tatra śruti liṅgayoḥ balīyaḥ tvam prati saṃpradhāraṇā eva na upapadyate iti brūmaḥ 
[I,288,iii^1]	atra ucyate itikartavyatha arthinaḥ prakaraṇavataḥ arthasya saṃnidhau upanipatitaḥ mantraḥ āmnāna sāmarthyāt itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣasya vāki a śeṣa tām abhyupetya etena mantreṇa yajeta iti kim uktam bhavati yāgena abhīpsite sādhyamāne anena mantreṇa upakuryāt iti na ca antareṇa indra abhidhānam ayam mantraḥ upakartum śaknoti tena etat uktam bhavati anena indraḥ abhidhātavyaḥ iti atas śruti mūlaḥ eva ayam arthaḥ yadi śruti mūlaḥ na śruti antareṇa bādhitum śakyaḥ tat etat liṅgam yadi vā na eva pramāṇam yadi vā śrutyā vikalpitum arhati iti na api apramāṇam bhaviṣyati na api vikalpiṣyate iti brūmaḥ katham śruti lakṣaṇaḥ ayam arthaḥ iti upapāditam tasmāt na apramāṇam 
[I,288,iii^2]	yatas tu khalu ānumānikīm eka vākyatām liṅga sāmarthyam ca apekṣya śrautaḥ ayam arthaḥ yat indrasya upasthānam anena mantreṇa iti avagamyate pratyakṣā tu śruti gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti saḥ eṣaḥ artha viprakarṣaḥ prathamam tāvat liṅga jñānam tatas sāmarthyāt śabdena ayam arthaḥ abhihitaḥ bhavati tat etat śruti virodhe na avakalpate vispaṣṭam hi avagatam etat anena mantreṇa gārhapatyaḥ upastheyaḥ iti tatra vijñātam etat evam ayam upakaroti mantraḥ iti etasmin ca nirjñāte kṛta sāmarthyayoḥ vākya prakaraṇayoḥ na etat evam kalpayitum śakyam indra upasthānam śabdena abhihitam iti tasmāt artha viprakarṣāt śrutyā liṅgam bādhyate iti 
[I,289,i]	vikalpasya ca anyāyya tvāt anyāyyaḥ ca vikalpaḥ tatra hi abhāvaḥ pakṣe nitya vat ca aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti śrūyamāne yat abhāvaḥ pakṣe parikalpyate tat aśrutam bhavati śrutam ca hīyate yāvān ca śrutasya arthasya utsarge doṣaḥ tāvān aśruta parikalpanāyām ubhayatra hi prasiddhiḥ bādhyate tasmāt anyāyya tvāt vikalpasya śruti liṅgayoḥ śruti balīyasi iti avagacchāmaḥ 
[I,289,ii]	atha yat uktam sati virodhe nyāyyaḥ bādhaḥ na ca atra asti virodhaḥ iti ayam asti virodhaḥ yat akṛta sāmarthyayoḥ vākya prakaraṇayoḥ indra upasthāna vācinī śrutiḥ bhavati kṛta sāmarthyayoḥ tu na avakalpate na ca vākya prakaraṇābhyām yugapad kṛta sāmarthyābhyām akṛta sāmarthyābhyām ca śakyam bhavitum tasmāt virodhaḥ virodhe ca śrutiḥ liṅgāt balīyasi iti 
[I,290,i]	liṅga vākyayoḥ virodhe kim udāharaṇam syonam te sadanam kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suṣevam kalpayāmi tasmin sīdā amṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇām medha sumanasyamānaḥ iti atra saṃdehaḥ kim kṛtsnaḥ mantraḥ upastaraṇe puroḍāśa āsādane ca prayoktavyaḥ uta kalpayāmi ante upastaraṇe tasmin sīdā iti evamādiḥ puroḍāśa āsādanaḥ iti yadi vākyam balīyaḥ tatas kṛtsnaḥ ubhayatra katham suṣevam kalpayāmi iti etat apekṣya tasmin sīdā iti evamādiḥ pūrveṇa eka vākya tām upaiti yat kalpayāmi tasmin sīdā iti atha liṅgam balīyaḥ tatas kalpayāmi antar sadana karaṇe katham syonam te sadanam kṛṇomi iti sadana karaṇam abhivaditum alam iti tasmin sīdā iti ayam api puroḍāśam sādayitum iti sādane viniyujyate 
[I,290,ii]	kim tāvat prāptam tulya bale ete kāraṇaḥ iti yathā liṅgam prati śruteḥ balīyaḥ tvam uktam na tathā vākyam prati liṅgasya ucyate athavā vākyam eva liṅgāt balīyaḥ kutas tat dhi śrutyā api bādhyate na ca balīyaḥ kāraṇam śakyate bādhitum tena asya bhaṅgura tām adhyavasyāmaḥ yaḥ tu ekena bādhyate śakyaḥ asau anyena api bādhitum iti 
[I,290,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ liṅga vākyayoḥ liṅgam balīyaḥ iti kutas artha viprakarṣāt kaḥ atra artha viprakarṣaḥ prakaraṇavataḥ saṃnidhau āmnānāt darśa pūrṇamāsa aṅgam ayam mantraḥ iti avagamyate tasmin sīdā iti puroḍāśa āsādana abhidhāna sāmarthyāt sādane viniyujyamāne kṛta sāmarthyam mantrāmnānam iti na asti pramāṇam yena upastaraṇe api viniyujyeta tathā syonam te sadanam kṛṇomi iti eṣaḥ api prakaraṇa āmnāna sāmarthyāt eva darśa pūrṇamāsa aṅga tām āpannaḥ sāmarthyāt eva upastaraṇe viniyogāt kṛta prayojane na puroḍāśa āsādane viniyogam arhati na hi asmin viniyujyamānasya kiṃcid api prayojanam asti evam upastaraṇe tasmin sīdeti asya na asti sāmarthyam pūroḍāśa āsādane api syonam te iti asya pūrveṇa eka vākyatām upetya upastaraṇe sāmarthyam pūrvasya pareṇa eka vākya tvāt sādane na tu svarūpeṇa ubhayoḥ tat eṣaḥ artha viprakarṣaḥ 
[I,291,i]	yat syonam te iti asya pratyakṣam sadana karmaṇaḥ abhidhāna sāmarthyam tat mukhyam tasmin sīdeti asya punar pūrveṇa saha eka vākyatām upagatasya bhavati jaghanyam tat atra pūrvasya mantrasya abhidhāna sāmarthyāt upastaraṇe viniyogaḥ uktaḥ bhavati iti saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ liṅgasya śruti arthaḥ uttarasya tu upajanite abhidhāna sāmarthye tatas śruti arthaḥ iti liṅga antaritaḥ viprakṛṣṭaḥ bhavati evam uttarasya sādane saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ pūrvasya ca liṅga antaritaḥ tasmāt artha viprakṛṣṭāt liṅga vākyayoḥ liṅgam balavattaram tatas syonam iti eṣa śabdaḥ yadi api uttareṇa ākāṅkśitaḥ iti sādane api prayogam arhati tathā api bhitvā vākyam upastaraṇaḥ eva viniyoktavyaḥ tasmin sīdeti eṣa ca sādane 
[I,291,ii]	nanu syonam te iti asya śabdasya yathā eva upastaraṇa abhidhāna sāmarthyam evam uttareṇa eka vākyatām upagantum sāmarthyam sāmarthyam ca liṅgam iti ucyate tasmāt bhidyamāne vākye liṅgam eva bādhitam bhavati iti satyam evam etat api liṅgam liṅgam api khalu etat evaṃlakṣaṇakam viprakṛṣṭa artham eva bhavati liṅgāt eka vākyatā tasmāt abhidhāna sāmarthyam tatas śruti arthaḥ iti viprakṛṣṭa artha tā viprakṛṣṭa artha tā ca bādhane hetu bhūtā tasmāt naḥ uttaraṇa eka vākya tām yāsyati iti evam tasmin sīdā iti uttaram na pūrveṇa api 
[I,292,i_I,292,ii]	api ca uttareṇa eka vākyatām upagatasya na kiṃcid api dṛṣṭam asti kāryam upastaraṇa pratyāyanam tu dṛṣṭam kutas śrutatvāt upastaraṇasya sādanasya ca evam uttarasya sādana pratyāyanam na tu pūrveṇa eka vākyatāyām na ca etau pūrva uttarābhyām eka vākyatām antareṇa pṛthak yathāyatham kārye na kurutaḥ tasmāt pūrvaḥ pūrvatra viniyojanīyaḥ uttaraḥ uttaratra iti atha yat uktam śrutyā api tat bādhitam iti vākyena api tat bādhitavyam iti na etat evam na hi bādhitasya anyena api bādhanam eva nyāyyam bādhitam hi anugṛhītavyam arthavat tvāya śrutim prati viprakṛṣṭa artham vākyam prati saṃnikṛṣṭa artham tasmāt liṅgam balīyaḥ iti 
[I,292,iii_I,292,iv]	atha vākya prakaraṇayoḥ virodhe katham iti kim punar prakaraṇam nāma kartavyasya iti kartavyatā ākāṅkṣasya vacanam prakaraṇam prārambhaḥ hi sa tasyāḥ vacana kriyāyāḥ na eṣa vidhi ādiḥ vidhi anta apekṣaḥ vākyam tu uktam eva tayoḥ virodhe kim udāharaṇam sūkta vāka nigadaḥ tatra hi paurṇamāsī devatāḥ amāvāsyā devatāḥ ca āmnātāḥ tāḥ paraspareṇa eka vākyatām na abhyupayanti tatra liṅga sāmarthyāt paurṇamāsī prayogāt indra agni śabdaḥ utkraṣṭavyaḥ amāvāsyāyām prayoktavyaḥ atha idānīm saṃdihyate yaḥ asya śeṣaḥ avīvṛdhetām mahaḥ jyāyaḥ krātām iti sa kim yāvat kṛtvaḥ sūktavāke samāmnātaḥ tāvat kṛtvaḥ ubhayoḥ paurṇamāsyam āvāsyayoḥ prayoktavyaḥ prakaraṇam balavattaram iti uta yatra indra agni śabdaḥ utkṛṣya nītaḥ tatra eva prayoktavyaḥ vākyam balavattaram iti evam sarveṣu saṃśayaḥ kim tāvat prāptam tulya bale ete kāraṇaḥ iti kutas itaratra api ākāṅkṣā itaratra api tulyāyām ākāṅkṣāyām na asti vinigamanāyām hetuḥ tasmāt tulya balaḥ iti athavā vākyam durbalam bādhitam hi tad liṅgena 
[I,293,i]	iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ prakaraṇāt vākyam balīyaḥ katham artha viprakarṣāt kaḥ atra artha viprakarṣaḥ vākyaḥ ekaikam padam vibhajyamānam sa ākāṅkṣam bhavati kṛtsnam paripūrṇam bhavati tatra pratyakṣaḥ eka vākya bhāvaḥ prakaraṇe tu apratyakṣaḥ katham itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣasya samīpaḥ upanipatitam pūrṇam iti tasya prakṛtasya sa ākāṅkṣa tvam avagamyate na eka vākya bhūtam iti anumīyate eka vākya tayā ca abhidhāna sāmarthyam avakalpya abhihitaḥ ayam evam bhavati iti parikalpanā eṣaḥ atra artha viprakarṣaḥ yat vākyasya samāsannā śrutiḥ prakaraṇasya viprakṛṣṭā tasmāt sūkta vākena prastaram praharati iti paurṇamāsī devatā vācinām amau āsyāḥ devatā vācinām ca niṣkṛṣya prayoge tat śeṣāṇām api niṣkṛṣya prayogaḥ tena yadi api prakaraṇa sāmarthyāt paurṇamāsī devatā pad aśeṣāṇām amau āsyāḥ devatā vācibhiḥ saha eka vākyatā anumīyate pratyakṣā tu amau āsyāḥ devatā padaiḥ saha na ca pratyakṣa virodhe anumānam saṃbhavati arthavati ca prakaraṇe saṃjāte na nirākāṅkṣāṇām ākāṅkṣā śakya upapādayitum
