[I,293,ii]	atha yat uktam liṅgena api hi tat bādhyate atas prakaraṇena api bādhitavyam iti na yat anyena api bādhyate tat bhaṅguram anyatra api iti avagantavyam atha bhaṅguram pramāṇam eva na abhaviṣyat kiṃcid tu prati kasyacid prabhāvaḥ vākyasya prakaraṇam prati bādhaka śaktiḥ na tu liṅgam prati liṅgam prati viprakṛṣṭa artham etat prakaraṇam prati saṃnikṛṣṭa artham tena vākyena prakaraṇam bādhyate iti atha prakaraṇasya kramasya ca virodhe kim udāharaṇam rājasūya prakaraṇe abhiṣecanīya krame śaunaḥ śepha ākhyānādi āmnātam yadi prakaraṇam balavat sarveṣām tat aṅgam yadi kramaḥ abhiṣecanīyasya eva kim tāvat prāptam tulya balaḥ ete kāraṇaḥ iti kutas na tāvat viśeṣam upalabhāmahe yena avagacchāmaḥ idam balīyaḥ iti tasmāt tulya bale ete kāraṇaḥ iti api ca prakaraṇam vākyena bādhitam tasmāt bādhyeta krameṇa api iti 
[I,294,i]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ prakaraṇam kramāt balīyaḥ kutas artha viprakarṣāt kaḥ atra artha viprakarṣaḥ prakaraṇavataḥ sa ākāṅkṣa tvāt tad saṃnidhāna āmnātena paripūrṇena api avakalpeta eka vākya tvam na tu kramavataḥ kramaḥ āmnātena anekasya āmnāyamānasya saṃnidhi viśeṣāmnāna mātram hi kramaḥ tatra saṃnidhi viśeṣa āmnānasāmarthyāt kramavataḥ saṃnidhau āmnātasya anupalabhyamānam eva akāṅkṣāvat tvam asti iti avagantavyam prakaraṇe tu prakaraṇavataḥ pratyakṣam na ca prakaraṇavatā kramavatā ca yaugapadyena eka vākyatā saṃbhavati āmnātasya iti virodhaḥ tatra prakaraṇe pratyakṣam sa ākāṅkṣa tvam kramaḥ ānumānikam bādhitum arhati sa ākāṅkṣa tvāt eka vākya tvam eka vākya tvāt abhidhāna sāmarthyam sāmarthyāt śruti arthaḥ iti saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasya śruti arthaḥ viprakṛṣṭaḥ kramasya tasmāt krama karaṇayoḥ prakaraṇam balavattaram iti 
[I,294,ii_I,294,iii]	atha yat uktam vākyena api hi tat bādhitam atas anyena api tat bādhitavyam iti na etat bādhitasya anugrahaḥ nyāyyaḥ na bādhitam bādhitavyam iti atha krama samākhyayoḥ virodhe kim udāharaṇam kim balavattaram iti pauroḍāśikam iti samākhyāte kāṇḍe sāṃnāyya krame śundhadhvam daivyāya kramaṇaḥ iti śundhana arthaḥ mantraḥ samāmnātaḥ tatra saṃdihyate kim samākhyānasya balīyaḥ tvāt puroḍāśa pātrāṇām śundhane viniyoktavyaḥ uta kramasya balīyaḥ tvāt sāṃnāyya pātrāṇām iti kim tāvat prāptam tulya bale ete karaṇe syātām kutas aviśeṣāt yadi vā samākhyā eva balīyasī bādhitaḥ hi kramaḥ prakaraṇena api iti 
[I,295,i]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ kramaḥ balīyān kutas artha viprakarṣāt kaḥ punar atra artha viprakarṣaḥ nirjñāte prakaraṇena kena api saha eka vākya tve yat saṃnidhau āmnāyate tatra ākāṅkṣām parikalpyate na eka vākyatā iti avagamyate laukikaḥ ca śabdaḥ samākhyā na ca loke evaṃvidheṣu artheṣu pramāṇam tasmāt kramaḥ balīyān iti 
[I,295,ii_I,295,iii]	yadi evam bhavati evaṃlakṣaṇakeṣu krameṇa viniyogaḥ na tu artha aviprakarṣāt kramaḥ balīyān katham dvayoḥ hi pramāṇayoḥ balīyaḥ tvam prati saṃpradhāraṇam na ca evam sati samākhyā pramāṇam laukika tvāt śabdasya puruṣasya pramāṇatā bhavati iti na eṣa doṣaḥ na atra aṅga bhāvaḥ puruṣa prāmāṇyāt gamyate pauroḍāśika śabdaḥ etasya kāṇḍasya iti etat atra puruṣa pramāṇakam bhavati ca asmin arthe puruṣaḥ pramāṇam yathā sāṃnāyya kramaḥ āmnānam puruṣa pramāṇakam yathā prakaraṇam eka vākya tvam veda śabdaḥ ca ayam iti na hi ete anindriya viṣayāḥ arthāḥ upapadyante eṣu abhiyuktānām prāmāṇyam ye tu anindriya viṣayāḥ teṣu abhiyuktā na pramāṇam tasmāt samākhyā kāraṇam kāraṇa tve ca sati balīyaḥ tvam parīkṣyam iti ucyate artha viprakarṣaḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ samākhyāyāḥ ayam artha viprakarṣaḥ upadiśyate hi krame samāmnānāt sāṃnāyya saṃbandhaḥ na upadiśyate samākhyāyām śabdam uccāryamāṇam upalabhya artha āpattyā nūnam asti iti kalpyate tasmāt pūrvaveda artha viprakarṣāt krameṇa samākhyā bādhyate iti 
[I,295,iv]	atha yat tatra tatra ucyate idam anena bādhyate idam anena iti tatra yat bādhyate tat kim bādhaka viṣayam prāptam uta aprāptam iti kim ca atas yadi aprāptam kim bādhyate atha prāptam katham śakyeta bādhitum prāptam bādhaka viṣayam pūrva vijñānam iti brūmaḥ katham sāmānyasya kāraṇasya vidyamāna tvāt atha katham nivartate mithyājñānam iti pratyaya antaram bhavati kim tu khalu amithyājñānasya svarūpam yasya bādhakaḥ pratyayaḥ vimṛṣyamāṇasya api na upapadyate na tat mithyā tat eteṣām śruti liṅga vākya prakaraṇa sthāna samākhyānām pūrvam pūrvam yat kāraṇam tat param param prati balīyaḥ bhavati na etasya utpannasya vimṛṣyamāṇasya bādhakam vijñāna antaram asti tasmāt teṣām samavāye virodhe para daurbalyam artha vipralkarṣāt iti 
[I,296,i_I,296,ii]	ahīnaḥ vā prakaraṇāt gauṇaḥ jyotiṣṭomam prakṛtya samāmananti tisraḥ eva sāhnasya upasadaḥ dvādaśa ahīnasya iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim dvādaśa upasattā jyotiṣṭomaḥ uta ahīnaḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam jyotiṣṭomaḥ iti kutas prakaraṇāt evam prakaraṇam anugṛhītam bhavati nanu vākyena bādhyate na bādhyate ahīna śabdena jyotiṣṭomam vakṣyāmaḥ kutas na hīyate iti ahīnaḥ dakṣiṇayā kratu karaṇaiḥ vā phalena vā na hīyate tena jyotiṣṭomaḥ ahīnaḥ vā śabdena saṃśayaḥ nivartyate 
[I,297,i_I,297,ii]	asaṃyogāt tu mukhyasya tasmāt apakṛṣyeta apakṛṣyeta dvādaśa upasattā kutas asaṃyogāt jyotiṣṭomena katham asaṃyogaḥ ahīnena eka vākya tvasya pratyakṣa tvāt nanu jyotiṣṭomaḥ eva gauṇaḥ ahīnaḥ na iti ucyate na hi mukhya saṃbhave gauṇa grahaṇam arhati nanu nañsamāsaḥ bhaviṣyati na iti brūmaḥ tathā sati ādi udāttaḥ ahīna śabdaḥ abhaviṣyat madhya udāttaḥ tu ayam tasmāt prakaraṇam bādhitvā hīnasya dharmaḥ api ca vyapadeśaḥ bhavati tisraḥ eva sāhnasya upasadaḥ dvādaśa ahīnasya iti yadi anyaḥ sāhnaḥ anyaḥ ca ahīnaḥ tatas evam vyapadeśaḥ avakalpate vidyate ca vyapadeśa vacanam tasmāt ahīnasya iti 
[I,297,iii_I,297,iv]	dvi tva bahutva yuktam vā codanāt tasya jyotiṣṭome śrūyate yuvam hi sthaḥ svaḥpatī iti dvayoḥ yajamānayoḥ pratipadam kuryāt ete asṛgram indavaḥ iti bahubhyaḥ yajamānebhyaḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ eva niviśete pratipādau uta dvi yajñam kiṃcid kulāya ādim bahu yajñam ca dvi rātra ādim utkraṣṭavyaḥ iti kim prāptam dvi tva bahutva yukte jyotiṣṭomena asaṃyogāt utkṛṣyeyātām pratipadau na hi jyotiṣṭomasya dvau yajamānau śrūyete yathā kulāyasya etena rāja purohitau sāyujya kāmau yajeyātām iti 
[I,298,i_I,298,ii]	pakṣeṇa artha kṛtasya iti ced iti ced paśyasi parti padau utkraṣṭavyaḥ iti na etat evam prakaraṇam hi bādhyeta bādhyatām asaṃyogāt dvābhyām yajamānābhyām bahubhiḥ ca yajamānaiḥ jyotiṣṭomasya iti ced asati api vacane arthāt dvau yajamānau bhaviṣyataḥ yaḥ ekaḥ na śakṣyati sa mahāyaḥ saḥ upakraṃsyate avaśya yaṣṭavye sati yathā śakyate tathā yaṣṭavyam iti bādhitvā api kāṃcid prāptim yajamānaḥ sahāyam upādāsyate evam prakaraṇe pratipadau bhaviṣyataḥ tasmāt na utkraṣṭavyaḥ iti 
[I,298,iii_I,298,iv]	na prakṛteḥ eka saṃyogāt prakṛtiḥ hi jyotiṣṭomaḥ pratyakṣāḥ tatra dharmāḥ āmnātāḥ na kutaścid ca udakena prāpyante kim atas yadi evam pratyakṣa śrutāḥ na śakyāḥ bādhitum vikṛtau tu ca udaka prāptāḥ santaḥ ānumānikāḥ bādhyeran iti vivakṣitam hi jyotiṣṭome kartuḥ ekatvam pratyakṣa śrutam na sāmarthyena bādhyate yatra api hi avaśya kartavyatā śrūyate tatra api ekaḥ eva yajamānaḥ śrūyate vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta iti tasmāt jyotiṣṭomāt utkraṣṭavyaḥ ete pratipādau iti 
[I,298,v]	atha kasmāt patnī abhiprāyam etat na bhavati ekasyām patnyām yajamāne ca yuvam hi sthaḥ iti dvayoḥ bahuṣu vā patnīṣu ete asṛgram indavaḥ iti yathā kṣaume vasānau agnim ādadhīyātām iti kṣaumavasān aparam vacanam evam iha api pratipad vidhāna param ucyate asaṃbhavāt tatra mukhyasya lakṣaṇā śabdaḥ puṃsaḥ vācakaḥ striyām iha tu dvi yajñe bahu yajñe ca saṃbhavati na lakṣaṇā śabdaḥ bhavitum arhati bahubhyaḥ yajamānebhyaḥ iti yat api etat dvivacanam dvayoḥ yajamānayoḥ iti atra api yaḥ eka śeṣaḥ pumān striyā iti asau api lakṣaṇā śabdaḥ eva api ca upa asmai gāyatā naraḥ iti pratipadoḥ niravakāśa tvam eva syāt tasmāt utkraṣṭavye ete pratipadau iti siddham 
[I,299,i_I,299,ii]	jāghanī ca eka deśa tvāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayanti iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim etat vidhānam darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ uta paśau iti katham darśa pūrṇa māyayoḥ katham ca paśau iti yadi jāghanyām patnī saṃyājāḥ vidhīyante tatas utkarṣaḥ atha patnī saṃyājeṣu jāghanī vidhīyate tatas darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ eva kim prāptam utkarṣaḥ kutas etat utkṛṣyate jāghanyām patnī saṃyājāḥ vidhīyante iti katham śabdāt patnī saṃyājānām vidhānam vākyena jāghanyāḥ śabdaḥ ca balavān na vākyam 
[I,299,iii]	nanu patnī saṃyājāḥ vihitāḥ eva satyam vihitāḥ jāghanyām idānīm punar vidhīyante sā tad saṃbaddhā kartavyā iti ucyate evam sati darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ patnī saṃyājāḥ vinā api jāghanyāḥ na viguṇāḥ jāghanī tu tatra pratipādyate tasmāt yatra jāghanī prayojanavatī tatra tasyāḥ pratipattiḥ paśau ca sā na darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ eka deśaḥ ca jāghanī pratipādyamānā na paśum prayokṣyate tasmāt asya vidhānasya utkarṣaḥ iti 
[I,300,i_I,300,ii]	codanā vā apūrva tvāt jāghanī vā patnī saṃyājānām guṇa tvena vidhīyate kutas apūrva tāt aprāptā jāghanī patnī saṃyājānām guṇa tvena tatra sva śabdena patnī saṃyājāḥ vihitā jāghanī saṃbandhaḥ teṣām avihitaḥ yatra ca saṃbandhaḥ vidhīyate tatra anyatarasya anyatra vidhānam saṃbandhaḥ na antarīyakaḥ yat vā saṃbandhasya vidhānam na antarīyakau saṃbandhinau yatra ubhau lakṣaṇa tvena tatra sva śabdena saṃbandhaḥ vidhīyate yatra tu anyataraḥ lakṣaṇa tvena tatra ekam lakṣayitvā anyataraḥ vidhīyate lakṣaṇa tvena ca atra patnī saṃyājāḥ katham avagamyate patnī saṃbandhāt na sarvaḥ yāgaḥ kaścid eva tu lakṣyate yasya patnyaḥ sādhana tvena 
[I,300,iii]	atha kasmāt na jāghanīm lakṣayitvā patnī saṃyājāḥ vidhīyante na asya apūrvasya yāgasya patnyaḥ śakyante vidhātum jāghanyām tu lakṣyamāṇāyām yāge sa patnīke vidhīyamāne vākyam bhidyeta asti tu atra vihitaḥ sa patnīkaḥ yāgaḥ yaḥ patnībhiḥ lakṣyate tasmāt yāgam lakṣayitvā jāghanī vidhīyate yat tu vākyena jāghanī vidhānam śrutyā yāgasya iti tat iha yāga vidhānam na saṃbhavati iti uktam vākya bheda prasaṅgāt tasmāt jāghanī vidhānam evam ced darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ vinā jāghanyā viguṇaḥ patnī saṃyāja yāgaḥ syāt tasmāt anutkarṣam iti 
[I,300,iv_I,300,v]	eka deśaḥ iti ced atha yat uktam eka deśaḥ jāghanī na paśum prayokṣyate tasmāt utkarṣaḥ iti tat parihartavyam 
[I,301,i_I,301,ii]	na prakṛteḥ aśāstra niṣpatteḥ na prakṛtau darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ jāghanī śāstrena ucyate evam paśoḥ niṣpannayā jāghanyā patnī saṃyājāḥ yaṣṭavyāḥ iti aviśiṣṭā jāghanī vidhīyate sā saṃbhavati darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ krītyā api ānīyamānā tasmāt anutkarṣaḥ iti 
[I,301,iii_I,301,iv]	saṃtardanam prakṛtau krayaṇa vat anartha lopāt syāt jyotiṣṭome abhiṣavaṇa phalake prakṛtya śrūyate dīrgha some saṃtṛdyāt dhṛtyai iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim saṃtardanam jyotiṣṭomaḥ eva āhosvit dīrgha kāleṣu someṣu iti ucyate na etat lupta artham prakṛtau tasmāt na utkṛṣyeta iti āha nanu asaṃtardanam api śrūyate asaṃtṛṇe bhavataḥ iti ucyate krayaṇa vat vikalpiṣyate yathā hiraṇyena krīṇāti gavā krīṇāti iti evamādīnām vikalpaḥ evam atra api vikalpaḥ bhaviṣyati saṃtardanam asaṃtardanam vā bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,301,v_I,301,vi]	utkarṣaḥ vā grahaṇāt viśeṣasya utkṛṣyate vā saṃtardanam gṛhyate hi viśeṣaḥ dīrgha some saṃtṛdyāt iti jyotiṣṭomam apekṣya satrāṇi kālataḥ dīrghāṇi bhavanti 
[I,302,i_I,302,ii]	kartṛtaḥ vā viśeṣasya tad nimitta tvāt na utkṛṣyeta vā saṃtardanam jyotiṣṭomāt evam prakaraṇam anugṛhītam bhavati dīrghasoma śabdaḥ ca kartṛtaḥ bhaviṣyati dīrghasya yajamānasya somaḥ dīrgha somaḥ iti 
[I,302,iii_I,302,iv]	kratutaḥ vā artha vāda anupapatteḥ syāt na ca etat asti jyotiṣṭome saṃniveśaḥ iti dīrgha kāle some kriyeta kratutaḥ eva dīrgha tvam na kartṛtaḥ kutas artha vāda anupapatteḥ dhṛtyā iti artha vādaḥ bhavati dhāraṇāya iti arthaḥ dīrgha kāle some punar punar grāvabhiḥ abhihanyamāne soma abhiṣavaṇa phalakayoḥ dāraṇa śaṅkāyām dhṛtyā iti artha vādaḥ upapadyate tasmāt utkarṣaḥ iti 
[I,302,v_I,302,vi]	saṃsthāḥ ca kartṛ vat dhāraṇa artha aviśeṣāt idam pada uttaram sūtram kāni padāni atha kim artham saṃsthāsu na niveśaḥ tathā sati prakaraṇam anugṛhītam bhaviṣyati dīrghasoma śabdaḥ ca dīrgha kālaḥ hi agniṣṭomam apekṣya ukthi a ādiṣu saṃsthāsu somaḥ iti ucyate na saṃsthāsu dīrgha kāla tve api some arthavādaḥ upapadyate tāvān eva hi tatra somaḥ daśa muṣṭīḥ mimītaḥ iti vacanāt tatra dhāraṇe na viśeṣaḥ kaścid tasmāt utkarṣaḥ eva 
[I,303,i_I,303,ii]	ukthi ādiṣu vā arthasya vidyamāna tvāt na ca etat asti utkarṣaḥ iti prakaraṇa anugrahāt anutkarṣaḥ dīrghasoma śabdaḥ ca dīrgha kāla tvāt upapadyate tatra api adhikaḥ agniṣṭomāt somaḥ pradānāni hi vivardhante tāni avivṛddhe pradeye na śakyāni vivardhayitum pūrṇe grahe graha śabdaḥ bhavati tena na śakyāni nyūnāni pātrāṇi grahītum tasmāt dāraṇa āśaṅkāyām dhāraṇam āśaṃsitavyam bhavati tatra dhṛtya iti upapadyate iti 
[I,303,iii_I,303,iv]	aviśeṣāt stutiḥ vyartha iti ced iti ced paśyasi saṃsthāsu api artha vādaḥ avakalpate pradeya vivṛddhyā iti na etat evam vyarthā eva hi stutiḥ bhavet kutas soma aviśeṣāt yāvān eva agniṣṭome somaḥ tāvān eva ukthi a ādiṣu api saṃsthāsu ukthi ādiṣu api daśamuṣṭiḥ eva somaḥ grahītavyaḥ nanu arthāt pradeyam vivartsyati iti daśamuṣṭiḥ sa katham śakyeta vivardhayitum triparva iti ca parva saṃkhyā niyamāt na śakyaḥ bahu parvā grahītum tasmāt dhāraṇā viśeṣāt artha vāda anupapattiḥ saṃsthāsu syāt tasmāt utkarṣaḥ 
[I,303,v_I,303,vi]	syāt anitya tvāt na etat asti utkarṣaḥ iti saṃsthāsu syāt prakaraṇa anugrahāt arthāt ca pradeya vivṛddhyā dāraṇa śaṅkāyām artha vādaḥ upapadyate kena prakāreṇa pradeyam vivardhiṣyate iti viprakṛṣṭa parvā somaḥ grahīṣyate api ca tṛtīye savanaḥ aśuḥ ekaḥ abhiṣūyate tasya pramāṇam ca na āmnātam tam aneka parvāṇam sthūlaparvāṇam ca grahīṣyati tena pradeya vivṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati atas arthavādaḥ avakalpiṣyate tasmāt saṃsthāsu niveśaḥ iti siddham 
[I,304,i_I,304,ii]	saṃkhyā yuktam kratoḥ prakaraṇāt syāt jyotiṣṭome pravargyam prakṛtya samāmnāyate na prathama yajñe pravṛñjyāt dvitīye tṛtīye vā pravṛñjyāt iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim jyotiṣṭome sarveṣu eva prayogeṣu na pravarjitavyam uta prathame prayoge pratiṣedhaḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam jyotiṣṭome pratiṣedhaḥ kutas yajña saṃyogāt prathama śabdena yajñaḥ abhidhīyate jyotiṣṭomaḥ tasya hi prathama saṃyogaḥ evam samāmnāyate eṣa vāva prathamaḥ yajñānām yat jyotiṣṭomaḥ yaḥ etena aniṣṭvā atha anyena yajeta iti yajñānām prathamaḥ iti kṛtvā prathama śabdena jyotiṣṭomaḥ abhidhīyate evam ca prakaraṇam anugṛhyate yadi kratoḥ eṣa vādaḥ tasmāt saṃkhyā yuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ jyotiṣṭomasya pravargyam pratiṣedhet iti 
[I,304,iii_I,305,i]	naimittikam vā kartṛ saṃyogāt liṅgasya tad nimitta tvā na ca etat asti yajñasya eṣa vādaḥ iti caturṣu api vedeṣu na prathama yajñaḥ iti evaṃsaṃjñakaḥ kaścid yajñaḥ asti bhavati tu prathamaḥ yajñasya prayogaḥ kartṛ saṃyogāt pūrvasya dvitīya ādīn apekṣya prathama śabdaḥ bhavati sa prayogasya upapadyate na kratoḥ prayogaḥ śravaṇāt gamyate kratuḥ prayoga saṃbaddha tvāt śrutiḥ ca balīyasī na lakṣaṇā tasmāt prathame prayoge na pravarjitavyam iti atha yat uktam jyotiṣṭomena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt tat vacanaḥ iti laksaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti tat parihṛtam yat tu prathama yajñaḥ iti yajña śabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyam tat api yajña śabdasya yāga vacana tvāt asmad pakṣasya ābādhakam 
[I,305,ii_I,305,iii]	pauṣṇam peṣaṇam vikṛtau pratīyeta ācodanāt prakṛtau darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ samāmananti tasmāt pūṣā prapiṣṭa bhāgaḥ adantakaḥ hi saḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim pauṣṇam peṣaṇam prakṛtau uta vikṛtau iti kim prāptam prakṛtau iti kutas prakaraṇāt nanu prakṛtau pūṣaṇam na kasyacid dhaviṣaḥ devatām samāmananti iti ucyate prākṛtīm kāṃcid devatām pūṣa śabdaḥ vakṣyati 
[I,305,iv]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ yatra pauṣṇam haviḥ asti tatra tasya pesaṇam vidhātsum śakyam na ca prakṛtau pūṣā asti tasmāt utkraṣṭavyam peṣaṇam iti yat uktam kāṃcid devatām pūṣa śabdaḥ vakṣyati iti brūyāt yadi anyatra api mukhyaḥ pūṣā na syāt nanu anyatra kriyamāṇe prakaraṇam uparudhyeta uparudhyatām vākyam hi asya uparodhakam athavā na eva atra saṃdehaḥ evam eva prāptam ucyate pauṣṇam peṣaṇam vikṛtau na prakṛtau iti na asti puṣṇaḥ prakṛtau codanā iti kim artham prāptam ucyate uttaratra kathā vartiṣyate 
[I,306,i_I,306,ii]	tat sarva artham aviśeṣāt pauṣṇam peṣaṇam prakṛtau śrūyamāṇam vikṛtau iti uktam tatra saṃdehaḥ kim carau paśau puroḍāśe ca uta carau eva iti kim tāvat prāptam tat sarvatra syāt carau paśau puroḍāśe ca kutas aviśeṣāt na kaścid viśeṣaḥ āśrīyate tasmāt sarvatra iti 
[I,306,iii_I,306,v]	carau vā artha uktam puroḍāśe artha vipratiṣedhāt paśau na syāt carau pauṣṇam peṣaṇam viniyujyeta puroḍāśe tāvat peṣaṇam arthāt eva prāpnoti na evām yathā puroḍāśaḥ bhavati tat artham tāvat na vacanam paśau ca na syāt hṛdaya ādiṣu piṣyamāṇeṣu teṣām ākāra vināśaḥ syāt tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ hṛdayasya agre avadyati iti na hṛdayāt avadāyiṣyate tathā anyat api avadānam na yathā aśrutāt avadāsyate nanu śakyate piṣṭebhyaḥ api hṛdaya ādibhyaḥ avadātum na iti brūmaḥ ākārāḥ hṛdaya ādayaḥ na māṃsāni uktam etat ākṛtiḥ śabda arthaḥ iti yadi api punar tad ākṛtikaḥ kriyate tathā api asya utsādana pradeśam prati muhyeyuḥ tasmāt carau pauṣṇam peṣaṇam bhaviṣyati iti evam artham vacanam 
[I,306,vi_I,306,vii]	carau api iti ced iti ced paśyati bhavān artha vipratiṣedhāt na paśu artham iti nanu carau api artha vipratiṣedhaḥ viśada siddhaḥ odane caru śabdam upacaranti piṣyamāṇaḥ hi piṣṭakam yavāgūḥ vā syāt khaliḥ vā 
[I,307,i_I,307,ii]	na pakti nāma tvāt atra ucyate satyam viśada siddhaḥ odane caru śabdaḥ prayujyate viśada siddhaḥ caruḥ dīyate iti na tu asya viśada siddhiḥ nimittam yadi viśada siddhiḥ nimittam syāt na piṣṭa siddhe prayujyeta tatra api hi prayujyate piṣṭaka caruḥ sādhyate iti atas anyat etayoḥ sāmānyam tat nimittam tat etat ucyate na pakti nāma tvāt iti na carau vipratiṣedhaḥ katham pakti nāma tvāt pakti nāma etat caruḥ iti anavasrāvita antaruṣma pākena abhinirvartyasya bhavati caru śabdaḥ vācakaḥ tena piṣṭaḥ odane viśada odane ca prayoktāraḥ bhavanti caruḥ iti pakṣa uktam eva prayojanam pūrva pakṣe paśau api peṣaṇam siddhānte cārau eva 
[I,307,iii_I,307,iv]	ekasmin eka saṃyogāt pauṣṇam peṣaṇam vikṛtau bhavati carau eva iti uktam atha idānīm saṃdihyate kim eka devatye pauṣṇaḥ etat bhavati uta dvi devatye api iti kim dvi devatyaḥ udāharaṇam rājasūyaḥ uttare tri saṃyukte saumāpa auṣṇe ekādaśa kapāle aindrāpa auṣṇaḥ caruḥ śyāvaḥ dakṣiṇā iti tatra aindrāpa auṣṇaḥ udāharaṇam kim prāptam eka devati asya eva peṣaṇam iti kutas kevala saṃyogāt yathā caturdhā karaṇe 
[I,308,i_I,308,ii]	dharma vipratiṣedhāt ca dvi devatye vipratiṣidhyeta dharmaḥ pūṣṇaḥ peṣaṇam na itarasya tatra yadi pūṣṇaḥ bhāgaḥ piṣyeta apiṣṭaḥ itarasya syāt tatra viṣamaḥ pākaḥ bhavet pāka nimittaḥ ca caru śabdaḥ sa vipratiṣidhyeta atha avirodham manyamānāḥ aparasya api bhāgam piṃṣyuḥ bhāga saṃmohaḥ syāt tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ anyasya bhāgaḥ anyasmai avadīyeta tathā yatha aśrutam kriyeta tasmāt api eka devatye peṣaṇam iti 
[I,308,iii_I,308,iv]	api vā sa dvitīye syāt devatā nimitta tvāt devatā nimittam etat peṣaṇam śrūyate pūṣā prapiṣṭa bhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ iti sa ca dvi devatye api bhāge piṣyamāṇe prapiṣṭa bhāgaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati na yathā caturdhā karaṇe tatra hi tat dhitaḥ nirapekṣasya bhavati na sa dvitīyasya indra pītaḥ iti samāsaḥ api nirapekṣasya na sa dvitīyasya iha tu prapiṣṭa śabdasya bhāga śabdena saha anya padārthaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ samāsaḥ eṣaḥ api samarthayoḥ eva na tu atra dvi devatye kaścid evaṃjātīyakaḥ doṣaḥ tasmāt eka devatye dvi devatye api vā carau asya bhāgaḥ peṣṭavyaḥ eva 
[I,308,v_I,308,vi]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam api evam bhavati tasmāt pūṣā prapiṣṭa bhāgaḥ adantakaḥ hi iti devatā nimittam peṣaṇam iti stutiḥ darśayati tathā saumāpa auṣṇam carum nirvapet nema piṣṭam paśu kāmaḥ iti nema piṣṭa tām darśayati tathā ardham piṣṭam ardham apiṣṭam bhavati dvi devatya tvāya iti devatā nimittam eva peṣaṇam darśayati 
[I,309,i_I,309,ii]	vacanāt sarva peṣaṇam tam prati śāstravat tvāt artha abhāvāt dvi carau apeṣaṇam bhavati idam pada uttaram sūtram nema piṣṭam bhavati iti kasmāt etat na vacanam iti ucyate yadi vacanam etat bhavet saumāpa auṣṇa mātram anūdya sarvatra peṣaṇam vidadhyāt carau paśau puroḍāśe ca tatra somāpauṣṇasya caru saṃbandhe nema piṣṭa saṃbandhe ca ubhayasmin vidhīyamāne vākyam bhidyeta tasmāt yaḥ yaḥ saumāpa auṣṇaḥ tatra tatra nema piṣṭa tā tam prati saumāpa auṣṇa mātram prati śāstravat tvam ardhapeṣaṇasya puroḍāśe arthāt sarva peṣaṇe prāpte artha abhāvāt ca paśau carau vāpeṣaṇe prāpte vacanam idam bhavet tatra caru śabdaḥ na vivakṣita sva arthaḥ syāt pradarśana arthaḥ kalpyeta peṣaṇa anuvāda pakṣe punar na eṣa virodhaḥ bhavati tasmāt bhavati eva liṅgam nanu aṅga nāśa bhayāt paśoḥ apeṣaṇam na iti brūmaḥ ardha peṣaṇe na aṅga nāśaḥ apiṣṭāt avadāsyate peṣaṇam ca adṛṣṭa artham 
[I,309,iii_I,309,iv]	ekasmin vā artha dharma tvāt aindra agna vat ubhayoḥ na syāt acodita tvāt eka devatye vā pauṣṇam peṣaṇam bhavitum arhati na aindrāpa auṣṇe kutas na eṣa devatā dharmaḥ vidhīyate pūṣṇaḥ bhāgaḥ piṣṭaḥ upayoktavyaḥ iti kasya tarhi arthasya dharmaḥ kaḥ punar arthaḥ yāgaḥ katham avagamyate na devatā dharmaḥ iti ucyate na hi tasyāḥ bhāgaḥ asti 
[I,309,v]	nanu yat devatāyai dīyate tat tasyāḥ bhāgaḥ bhavati ucyate etat dhi devatām uddiśya tyajyate na ca tyāga mātreṇa devatā sva tvam bhavati parigrahaṇena hi sva svāmi saṃbandhaḥ āpadyate na ca parigṛhītam devatayā iti kiṃcana pramāṇam asti yaḥ ca yam bhajate sa tasya bhāgaḥ na ca haviḥ devatā bhajate tasmāt na asti pūṣṇaḥ bhāgaḥ 
[I,310,i]	atha api kathaṃcid bhavet bhāgaḥ tathā api na devatāyāḥ dharmaḥ peṣaṇam bhavitum arhati niṣprayojanaḥ hi tathā syāt ayāga dharma tvāt katham tarhi prakaraṇa antare samāmnātaḥ yāga dharmaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ucyate vākya saṃyogāt nanu ca devatayā eṣa saṃyogaḥ śrūyate na yāgena iti ucyate bhāga abhāvāt anarthaka tvāt ca na devatā saṃyogaḥ iti uktam 
[I,310,ii]	tathā api tu yathā yāga saṃbandhaḥ bhavati tathā vaktavyam tat ucyate ayam atra pūṣṇaḥ bhāgaḥ yaḥ pūṣaṇam uddiśya tyajyate yasya dravyasya tyāge pūṣā devatā na ca aindrāpa auṣṇe bhavati pūṣā devatā na sa caruḥ pūṣṇaḥ sva tvena saṃbadhyate tasmāt aindrāpa auṣṇe na kaścid asti pūṣṇaḥ caruṇā saṃbandhaḥ kevale tu pūṣaṇi devatā bhūte tasmai saṃkalpitaḥ bhāgaḥ bhavati katham yam uddiśya saṃkalpaḥ bhavati sa tasya bhāgaḥ iti prasiddhiḥ eṣā tena yadi api pūṣā svena uccāraṇena indra apu uṣṇoḥ upakārakam uccāraṇam kurvan upakārakaḥ bhavet tathā api na tasya dvi devatyaḥ bhāgaḥ iti ucyate asaṃkalpanāt kevale pūṣaṇi devatāyām caroḥ peṣaṇam kriyate na aindrāpa auṣṇeṣu dvi devatyeṣu iti 
[I,310,iii_I,310,iv]	hetu mātram adanta tvam yat uktam adantakaḥ hi iti devatā dharmam darśayati iti arthavādaḥ eṣaḥ itarasmin api pakṣaḥ upapadyate 
[I,310,v_I,310,vi]	vacanam param atha aparam yat kāraṇam uktam nema piṣṭam iti dvi devatye peṣaṇam darśayati ardha piṣṭam bhavati ardham apiṣṭam dvi devatya tvāya iti devatā dharmam darśayati iti atra ucyate evam sati vacanam idam aprāpte bhavati iti nanu aneka artha vidhidhānam ekam vākyam prāpnoti ucyate sati pakṣa antare aneka artha vidhiḥ pakṣa antara āśrayaṇena parihriyate asati punar pakṣa antare uccāraṇa anarthakya prasaṅga parijihīrṣayā aneka artham vākyam abhyupagantavyam bhavati tasmāt na dvi devatye peṣaṇam iti siddham 
[I,312,i_I,312,ii]	nivītam iti manuṣya dharmaḥ śabdasya tad pradhāna tvāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ āmnātam nivītam manuṣyāṇām prācīnāvītam pitṝṇām upavītam devānām upavyayate deva lakṣmam eva tat kurutaḥ iti nivītam manuṣyāṇām iti atra saṃdehaḥ kim ayam vidhiḥ uta artha vādaḥ iti yadā vidhiḥ tadā kim ayam puruṣa dharmaḥ uta karma dharmaḥ atha yat prakaraṇe manuṣyāṇām tatra vidhiḥ uta manuṣya pradhāne karmaṇi niviśataḥ iti 
[I,312,iii]	kim prāptam vidhiḥ manuṣya dharmaḥ ca iti yadi vidhiḥ evam apūrvam artham vidadhat arthavān bhavati itaratha artha vāda mātram anarthakam vidhiḥ ced puruṣa dharmaḥ nivītam manuṣyāṇām iti puruṣa pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ katham avagamyate na atra manuṣyāḥ vidhīyante manuṣyāṇām nivītam vidhīyate na ca avihitam aṅgam bhavati yadi manuṣyāḥ api vidhīyeran vākyam bhidyeta tasmāt nivītam manuṣyāṇām upakārakam 
[I,312,iv]	nanu prakaraṇāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ upakārakam prakaraṇāt dhi vākyam balavattaram api ca guṇa bhūteṣu manuṣyeṣu kāraka saṃbandhasya vivakṣita tvāt tṛtīyā bhavet ṣaṣṭhī tu eṣā saṃbandha lakṣaṇā tatra guṇa bhūteṣu manuṣyeṣu manuṣya grahaṇam na eva kartavyam syāt manuṣyaiḥ eva tat kriyamāṇam kriyeta manuṣya pradhāna pakṣe tu kartavyam 
[I,313,i_I,313,ii]	apadeśaḥ vā arthasya vidyamāna tvāt apadeśaḥ iti jñāyamānasya vacanam saḥ eṣa na vidhiḥ anuvādaḥ eṣaḥ kutas arthasya vidyamāna tvāt prāptaḥ eva arthaḥ yat nivītam manuṣyāṇām nivītam hi manuṣyāḥ prāyaśas sva artham kurvanti tasmāt anuvādaḥ 
[I,313,iii_I,313,iv]	vidhiḥ tu apūrva tvāt syāt vidhiḥ eva bhavet tathā prayojanavān itarathāḥ vāda mātram anarthakam pūrvavān anuvādaḥ bhavati ayam tu apūrvaḥ yat niyamena nivyātavyam iti 
[I,313,v_I,313,vi]	sa prāyāt karma dharmaḥ syāt yat uktam vidhiḥ iti etat gṛhyate yat tu manuṣya dharmaḥ iti tat na anumatam kratu dharmaḥ ayam prakaraṇāt prakṛtyā eva hi karma prāyeṣu dharmeṣu ucyamāneṣu etat abhidhīyate tasmāt karma dharmaḥ 
[I,313,vii_I,313,viii]	vākya śeṣa tvāt nivītam manuṣyāṇām iti asya vākya śeṣaḥ samākhyā ādhvaryavam iti yadi darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śeṣaḥ tatas adhvaryuṇā kartavyam tatra samākhyā anugṛhīṣyate 
[I,313,ix_I,313,x]	tad prakaraṇe yat tad saṃyuktam avipratiṣedhāt ucyate prakaraṇāt samākhyānāt ca karma dharmaḥ vijñāyate vākyāt manuṣya dharmaḥ tasmāt utkarṣam arhati na iti brūmaḥ prakaraṇaḥ eva abhiniviśamānasya manuṣya pradhāna tā avakalpiṣyate katham yat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ manuṣya pradhānam tatra nivekṣyate anvāhārya karmaṇi prakaraṇam ca evam anugrahīṣyate vākyam ca 
[I,314,i_I,314,ii]	tad pradhāne vā tulya vat prasaṃkhyānāt itarasya tad artha tvāt na etat asti prakaraṇe niveśaḥ iti manuṣya pradhāne karmaṇi nivītam syāt ātithye kutas tulya vat prasaṃkhyānāt tulyāni ca etāni prasaṃkhyāyante yat tāvat upavītam devānām upavyayate iti tat prakṛtayoḥ darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ upavītam vidadhāti yat prācīnāvītam piṭṝṇām iti tat pitṛ pradhāne karmaṇi prācīnāvītam vidadhāti yat api etat nivītam manuṣyāṇām iti tat api ātithye nirapekṣam vidadhāti katham gamyate manuṣya pradhāne vidadhāti iti manuṣyāṇām iti ṣaṣṭhī antena saṃbandhāt manuṣyāṇām eva prāpnoti na manuṣya pradhāne ucyate manuṣyāṇām kalpyamāne phalam kalpanīyam manuṣya pradhāne punar ṣaṣṭhī bhaviṣyati saṃbandhaḥ ca evam avakalpiṣyate phalam ca evam na kalpanīyam tat uktam sameṣu vākya bhedaḥ syāt iti 
[I,314,iii]	nanu manuṣya pradhānena saha eka vākyatām prāptam punar prakṛtābhyām darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām eka vākyatām yāsyati na hi dvau saṃbandhau ekasmin vākye vidhīyete bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam itarasya manuṣya grahaṇasya nivīta saṃbandha artha tvāt tena eva saha eka vākyatā bhaviṣyati pratyakṣeṇa śabdena tat eka vākya tayā ca arthavat tve sati na prakṛtena eka vākyatau akalpyate tasmāt prakaraṇam bādhitva ātithye nivekṣyate iti 
[I,315,i_I,315,ii]	artha vādaḥ vā prakaraṇāt na etat asti vidhiḥ sa ca manuṣya pradhāne karmaṇi iti manuṣyāṇām iti manuṣya saṃbandhaḥ atra śrūyate na manuṣya pradhānena karmaṇā saṃbandhaḥ manuṣya prādhānye ca sati phalam kalpanīyam ātithya karmaṇā tu anirdiṣṭena aprakṛtena anumeyena saṃbadhyeta tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ prakaraṇāt utkṛṣyeta saṃbhavan tatra katham saṃbhavaḥ iti ced artha vādaḥ eṣaḥ sa prakṛtam stuvan prakaraṇe saṃbhaviṣyati vidhiḥ san utkṛṣyeta tasmāt na vidhiḥ manuṣya pradhāne karmaṇi iti 
[I,315,iii_I,315,iv^1]	vidhinā ca eka vākya tvāt itas ca na vidhiḥ kutas vidhinā eka vākya tvāt upavyayate deva lakṣmam eva tat kurute iti eṣa vidhiḥ anena asya saha eka vākyatā bhavati yadi itaraḥ api vidhiḥ syāt vākyam bhidyeta na hi vidheḥ ca vidheḥ ca eka vākya tā bhavati vacana vyakti bhedāt tatra eka vākyatā rūpam bādhyeta kim eka vākyatā rūpam nivītam manuṣyāṇām iti prāpta anuvādaḥ prāptasya kim arthena punar vacanam upavītastuti arthena katham upavīta stutiḥ nivītam ayogyam deva karmaṇi darśa pūrṇamāsa saṃjñake manuṣyāṇām hi tat tathā prācīnāvītam pitṝṇām na deva karmaṇi upavītam tu tatra yogyam tasmāt upavyātavyam iti 
[I,315,iv^2_I,316,vi]	yathā yādṛśaḥ asya veśaḥ tādṛśaḥ naṭānām yādṛśaḥ devadattasya tādṛśaḥ brāhmaṇānām iti devadatta veśa praśaṃsā artham itaraveśa saṃkīrtanam evam iha api upavyāna stuti arthena nivīta saṃkīrtanam na asti atra vidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ nivītam manuṣyāṇām kartavyam iti ātithya prayoga vacanam tasya kartavyatā vidhāyakam iti ced na etat evam stuti arthena arthavat tve sati na śakyam kalpayitum parokṣam hi tat ānarthakya parijihīrṣayā kalpyeta parihṛte tu ānarthakyaḥ iha punar na kiṃcid kalpanīyam tasmāt artha vādaḥ evam ca vākyena aviruddham prakaraṇam arthavat bhavati upavītam liṅga darśanāt sarva dharmaḥ syāt na vā prakaraṇāt tasya darśanam vidhiḥ vā syāt apūrva tvāt udaktvam ca apūrva tvāt sataḥ vā liṅga darśanam vidhiḥ tu dhāraṇe apūrva ṛtvāt 
[I,316,vii_I,316,viii]	diś vibhāgaḥ ca tadvat saṃbandhasya artha hetu tvāt jyotiṣṭomam prakṛtya śrūyate prācīm devāḥ abhajanta dakṣiṇām pitaraḥ pratīcīm manuṣyāḥ udīcīm asurāḥ iti apareṣām udīcīm rudrāḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim vidhiḥ uta artha vādaḥ vidhiḥ san kim manuṣya dharmaḥ uta karma dharmaḥ atha vā prakaraṇe manuṣya pradhāne karmaṇi niveśaḥ kim vā ātithyaḥ iti 
[I,317,i]	kim tāvat prāptam diś vibhāgaḥ ca tadvat saṃbandhasya artha hetu tvāt yaḥ eṣa diś vibhāgaḥ sa nivīta vat vicāryaḥ yaḥ nivīte pūrva pakṣaḥ saḥ iha pūrva pakṣaḥ yaḥ madhyamaḥ sa madhyamaḥ yaḥ siddhāntaḥ sa siddhāntaḥ arthavat tvāt vidhiḥ manuṣya saṃbandhāt manuṣya dharmaḥ iti pūrva pakṣaḥ pratyaṅmukhāḥ udak mukhāḥ vā pṛṣṭhatas ādityam prāṃśu padārthān anutiṣṭhanti manuṣyāḥ iti anuvādaḥ vidhiḥ eva prakaraṇa anugrahāt ca jyotiṣṭoma dharmaḥ vākya prakaraṇa anugrahāya jyotiṣṭome manuṣya pradhāne dakṣiṇā vyāpāre niveśaḥ iti aparaḥ pakṣaḥ bhinna tvāt vākyānām ātithye niveśaḥ iti aparam matam artha vādaḥ ayam prakaraṇa anugrahāya prācīna vaṃśam karoti iti anena vidhinā eka vākya tvasya pratyakṣa siddha tvāt iti siddhāntaḥ 
[I,317,ii_I,317,iii]	paruṣi dita pūrṇa ghṛta vidagdham ca tadvat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ āmnātam yat puruṣi ditam tat devānām yat antarā tat manuṣyāṇām yat sa mūlam tat pitṝṇām iti tathā yaḥ vidagdhaḥ sa nairṛtaḥ yaḥ aśṛtaḥ sa raudraḥ yaḥ śṛtaḥ sa sa devatyaḥ tasmāt avidahatā śrapayitavyam sa devatyāyaḥ iti jyotiṣṭome śrūyate yat pūrṇam tat manuṣyāṇām upari adhas devānām adhas pitṝṇām iti tathā ghṛtam devānām mastu pitṝṇām niṣpakvam manuṣyāṇām iti tatra manuṣya saṃbaddheṣu raudre ca saṃdehaḥ kim manuṣyāṇām dharmāḥ vidhayaḥ uta karma dharmāḥ anūvādāḥ atha yat prakaraṇam manuṣya pradhānam raudram ca tatra niviśeran uta ātithye uta artha vādaḥ iti 
[I,318,i]	kim tāvat prāptam etāni api tadvat yaḥ nivīte pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ saḥ eteṣām pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ yaḥ madhyamaḥ sa madhyamaḥ yaḥ siddhāntaḥ saḥ eva siddhāntaḥ arthavat tvāt manuṣya saṃbandhāt ca vidhayaḥ manuṣya dharmāḥ ca iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ upari mūle ca aniyamāt lāghavam aśṛtam roga tvāt raudram pūrṇe api ślakṣṇa tvāt lāghavam evam ghṛtam śirasi nihitam manuṣyāṇām sukha karam eva artha prāpta tvāt anuvādaḥ iti uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ vidhiḥ karma dharma prāyāt samākhyānāt ca karma dharmaḥ iti pakṣaḥ anvāhārye dakṣiṇāsu ca iti vākya prakaraṇa anugrahāt pakṣaḥ ātithyaḥ iti vākya bheda prasaṅgāt artha vādaḥ iti prakaraṇāt vidhinā eka vākya tvāt iti parva pratilunāti upari vilāt gṛhṇāti navanītena abhyaṅkte avidahatā śrapayitavyam iti ebhiḥ saha eṣām eka vākya bhāvaḥ tasmāt ete na vidhayaḥ artha vādāḥ iti 
[I,318,ii_I,319,i]	akarma kratu saṃyuktam saṃyogāt nitya anuvādaḥ syāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ āmnāyate na anṛtam vadet iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ayam pratiṣedhaḥ dārśa paurṇamāsikasya padārthasya prakaraṇaḥ eva niveśaḥ atha prāyeṇa prāptasya karmaṇaḥ puruṣam prati pratiṣedhaḥ puruṣa dharmaḥ ayam iti kim prāptam puruṣa dharmaḥ syāt puruṣasya ayam upadiśyate na darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ kutas puruṣa prayatnasya śravaṇāt vadet iti vadanam anutiṣṭhet iti śrutyā gamyate tasya puruṣa saṃbandhaḥ śrutyā eva karma saṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇāt śrutiḥ ca prakaraṇāt balīyasī itarathā vadanam bhavati iti etāvatī arthe vadanam anutiṣṭhet iti avivakṣita sva arthaḥ para arthaḥ vidhi arthaḥ bhavet puruṣasya upadeśe punar vivakṣita sva arthaḥ eva śabdaḥ tasmāt puruṣasya upadeśaḥ yasya ca upadeśaḥ tasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ sa ca ayam arthaḥ upanayana kāle eva puruṣasya pratiṣiddhaḥ tena saṃyogena ayam nitya anuvādaḥ nanu eṣā śrutiḥ tasyāḥ smṛteḥ mūlam na eṣā tasyāḥ mūlam bhavitum arhati yadi iyam tad mūlikā bhavet darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ iti smaryeta upanayana kāle eva ca asya upadeṣṭāraḥ bhavanti api ca puruṣa dharmaḥ iti upadiśanti tasmāt na eṣā smṛtiḥ atas śruteḥ iti 
[I,319,ii_I,319,iii]	vidhiḥ vā saṃyoga antarāt vidhiḥ vā ayam darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ na anṛtam vadet iti na anuvādaḥ kutas saṃyoga antarāt niyama anuṣṭhānena puruṣasya saṃbandhaḥ smaryate padārtha pratiṣedhena iha saṃyogaḥ puruṣasya katham anyat śrūyamāṇam anyasya anuvādaḥ bhaviṣyati tasmāt vidhiḥ pratiṣedhasya ayam āha gṛhṇāmaḥ etat vidhiḥ iti puruṣa dharmaḥ iti tu gṛhṇāmaḥ puruṣa prayatnasya śruta tvāt atra brūmaḥ sarveṣu ākhyāteṣu kriyā anuṣṭhānam śrūyate na kārakam kiṃcid katham etat gamyate pratyayāt yatas kriyām anuṣṭheyām pratīmaḥ 
[I,319,iv_I,320,i]	nanu kartāram api pratiyanti satyam pratiyanti na tu śabdāt kutas tarhi arthāt yadā kriyā anuṣṭhātavyā vidhīyate tadā arthāt kāraka vyāpāraḥ gamyate yaḥ ca arthāt gamyate na sa śrautaḥ yaḥ ca na śrautaḥ na sa vākyāt gamyate katham asau prakaraṇam bādhiṣyate āha prakṛti pratyayau pratyaya artham saha brūte iti ācārya upadeśāt kartā śabda arthaḥ karma ca iti avagamyate kartari śap karmaṇi yak iti pratyaya artham kartāram karma ca samāmananti ācāryāḥ tasmāt śabda arthaḥ kartā karma ca iti 
[I,320,ii]	ucyate na ācārya vacanāt sūtrakāra vacanāt vā śabda arthaḥ bhavati pratyayāt asau gamyate anuṣṭheyā ca kriyā pratītā satī kārakāṇi pratyāyayati iti avagatam etat api ca na eva kartā pratyaya arthaḥ karma vā iti ācāryāḥ āhuḥ nanu kartari karmaṇi ca lakāraḥ śrūyate na asau kartari karmaṇi vā śrūyate kim tu ekasmin eka vacanam dvayoḥ dvivacanam bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti tatra aparam vacanam tatra evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate ekasmin kartari dvayoḥ kartroḥ bahuṣu kartṛṣu iti evam karmaṇi eka tva ādi saṃbandhaḥ tatra na evam bhavati kartari bhavati ekasmin ca iti katham tarhi kartari ekasmin eka vacanam kartuḥ ekatvaḥ iti arthaḥ evam dvi tve bahu tve karmaṇi ca evam varṇyamāne laukika nyāya anugataḥ sūtra arthaḥ varṇitaḥ bhavati sūtra akṣarāṇi ca nyāya anugatāni bhavanti āgamaḥ api ca ayam eva yadā ekatva ādayaḥ vibhakti arthāḥ tadā karma ādayaḥ viśeṣaṇa tvena iti 
[I,320,iii]	nanu etat api asti yadā karma ādayaḥ vibhakti arthāḥ tadā ekatva ādayaḥ viśeṣaṇa tvena iti ucyate artha prāptāḥ hi karma ādayaḥ te na bhavanti śabdasya abhidheya bhūtāḥ na tu eka tva ādayaḥ arthāt prāpnuvanti tena te śabda artha bhūtāḥ tasmāt api viśeṣaṇam eka tva ādayaḥ tathā api viśeṣaṇam eva abhidhīyate yathā hiraṇyamālinaḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti hiraṇyamāli tvam viśeṣaṇa tvena tathā api tat eva vidhīyate tasmāt kartuḥ ekatvam śabda arthaḥ na kartā 
[I,321,i]	nanu kartuḥ ekatvāt eka vacanam kartuḥ dvi tvāt dvivacanam kartuḥ bahu tvāt bahuvacanam tena nūnam kartā śabda arthaḥ iti gamyate ucyate na etat anumānāt śakyam kartā anuṣṭheya kriyā avagamāt eva avagamyate iti pratyakṣam tat tāvat kenacid na bādhyate ekavacana nirdeśe kartṛ ekatvam gamyate dvivacana nirdeśe kartuḥ dvi tvam bahuvacana nirdeśe kartṛ bahu tvam tat api pratyakṣam katarat atra anumāṇam bādhitum arhati iti yathā ākṛti vacane śabde dvivacane dravya bhedaḥ avagamyate eka vacane dravya eka tvam evam iha api draṣṭavyam tasmāt na śrautaḥ na ced śrautaḥ na prakaraṇam bādhiṣyate 
[I,321,ii_I,321,iii]	yat tu puruṣa prayatnaḥ anarthakaḥ bhavati karma dharma pakṣe prayoga vacanena kartavyatā vacanāt iti tat ucyate aṅgam sat prakaraṇena gṛhyeta na ca avihitam aṅgam bhavati tasmāt aṅga tvāya vidhātavyam asmin api pakṣe atas manyāmahe prākaraṇikasya ayam niṣedhaḥ iti tasmāt tat aṅgam yat anṛtam tat na vācyam iti tena yat saṃkalpitam tat aṅgam tat eva kartavyam vrīhim ayam saṃkalpya na yava mayaḥ pradeyaḥ āha yadā ubhayoḥ api pakṣayoḥ na anṛtam vaditavyam tadā kaḥ vicāreṇa arthaḥ iti ucyate pūrvasmin pakṣe puruṣa dharmaḥ tatra bhraṃśe smārtam prāyaścittam siddhānte darśa pūrṇamāsa dharmaḥ tatra bhraṃśe yājurvedikam prāyaścittam 
[I,321,iv_I,321,v]	ahīna vat puruṣaḥ tad artha tvāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate aṅgirasaḥ vetaḥ uttamāḥ suvargam lokam āyante apsu dīkṣā tapasī prāveśayan tīrthe snāti tīrtham eva hi sajātānām bhavati iti darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ āmnāyate tasmāt jañjabhyamānaḥ anubrūyāt mayi dakṣa kratū iti prāṇa apānau eva ātmandhattaḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ayam dharmaḥ prakaraṇe niviśate uta puruṣasya upadiśyate iti kim tāvat prāptam ahīna vat puruṣaḥ tad artha tvāt eṣa vidhiḥ prakaraṇāt utkṛṣyeta kutas puruṣa śruteḥ brūyāt iti puruṣa prayatnasya vivakṣita tvāt 
[I,322,i]	nanu prakaraṇam bādhyate ucyate bādhyatām prakaraṇam vākyam tu asya bādhakam jañjabhyamāna saṃyogāt prakaraṇāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ upadiśyate iti gamyate vākyāt jañjabhyamānasya vākyam ca prakaraṇāt balīyaḥ tasmāt utkṛṣyeta iti phalam api āmananti prāṇa apānau eva ātmandhattaḥ iti sa ca saṃyogaḥ bādhyate tasmāt puruṣa dharmaḥ prakaraṇāt utkṛṣyeta ahīna vat yathā hīna saṃyogāt dvādaśa upasattā prakaraṇāt utkṛṣyate evam jañjabhyamāna saṃyogāt mayi dakṣa kratū iti vacanam 
[I,322,ii_I,322,iii]	prakaraṇa viśeṣāt vā tat yuktasya saṃskāraḥ dravya vat na vā utkraṣṭavyam kutas prakaraṇa viśeṣāt prakaraṇa yuktaḥ eva jañjabhyamānaḥ vacanena saṃskriyate yathā yava ādi dravyam prokṣaṇa ādinā nanu na śaknoti prakaraṇam jañjabhyamāna śabdam eka deśe avasthāpayitum vākyam hi prakaraṇāt balavattaram iti ucyate na brūmaḥ jañjabhyamāna śabdaḥ prakaraṇena aprākaraṇikāt puruṣāt nivartyate iti kim tu phalam tatra kalpanīyam nanu pratyakṣam śrūyate phalam prāṇa apānau eva ātmandhattaḥ iti na iti brūmaḥ na atra vidhāyakam śabdam upalabhāmahe yaḥ eṣaḥ prāṇa apānau eva ātmandhattaḥ iti vartamāna apadeśaḥ eṣa na vidhāyakaḥ stāvakaḥ tu bhavati mantra vacanasya tasmāt darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām anyatra etat na phalavat atas puruṣasya darśa pūrṇamāsau kurvataḥ saṃskāra karma iti gamyate 
[I,323,i_I,323,ii]	āha puruṣa saṃskāra karma iti gṛhyate darśa pūrṇamāsau eva kurvataḥ iti etat na katham yaḥ api hi anyatra darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām jañjabhyate saḥ api jañjabhyamāna śabdena ucyate eva na ca prakaraṇena vyāvartyate iti etat uktam tasmāt utkṛṣyate atra ucyate na eva vyāvartyate saṃskṛtena tu tena na asti prayojanam nanu prakaraṇe puruṣa saṃskāreṇa api na asti prayojanam ucyate saṃskṛta puruṣaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau anuṣṭhāsyati āha utkarṣe api sati saṃskṛtaḥ anyat anuṣṭhāsyati ucyate na anyasya saṃskāraḥ guṇaḥ bhavati aprakṛta tvāt āha prakṛtasya api na guṇaḥ vākyena puruṣa dharmaḥ iti avagamāt ucyate ānarthakyāt na puruṣa dharmaḥ avagamyate tasmāt asya prakṛtābhyām darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām eka vākyatā na anyena phalavatā api karmaṇā prakaraṇa abhāvāt tasmāt na utkarṣaḥ yat tu prakaraṇe niveśa etasmin pakṣe brūyāt iti anuṣṭhāna vacanam avivakṣita sva artham iti evam sati atyanuvādaḥ bhaviṣyati na puruṣa saṃbandha vidhānasya prayojanam asti iti 
[I,324,i_I,324,ii]	vyapadeśāt apakṛṣyate atha yat upavarṇitam dvādaśa upasattā yathā utkṛṣyate tathā idam api utkraṣṭavyam iti ucyate tat dhi vākyena ahīnānām vyapadiśyate phalavantaḥ ca ahīnāḥ na ca tatra jyotiṣṭome ahīna śabdaḥ gauṇa tvāt vyapadeśāt ca tisraḥ eva sāhnasya upasadaḥ dvādaśa ahīnasya iti tatas yuktam dvādaśa upasattā yat prakaraṇāt utkṛṣyate na tu iha puruṣa saṃbandhaḥ niṣprayojana tvāt anyasya ca prayojanavataḥ prakaraṇe abhāvāt 
[I,324,iii_I,324,iv]	śaṃyau ca sarva paridānāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate devāḥ vai śaṃyum bārhaspatyam abruvan havyam naḥ vaha iti prakṛtya vacanam idam bhavati kim me prajāyāḥ iti te abruvan yaḥ brāhmaṇāya avaguret tam śatena yātayāt yaḥ nihanat tam sahasreṇa yātayāt yaḥ lohitam karavat yāvataḥ praskandya pāṃsūn saṃgṛhaṇāt tāvataḥ saṃvatsarān pitṛ lokam na prajānīyāt iti tasmāt na brāhmaṇāya avaguret na hanyāt na lohitam kuryāt iti 
[I,324,v_I,325,i]	tatra saṃdehaḥ kim darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ avagoraṇa pratiṣedhaḥ uta puruṣa asya upadiśyate iti kim prāptam prakaraṇāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ avagoraṇa ādi pratiṣedhaḥ na darśa pūrṇamāsyoḥ brāhmaṇasya avagoritavyam vadhaḥ vā kāryaḥ lohitam vā praskandanīyam anyaḥ upāyaḥ āsthātavyaḥ ānataye te na anvāhāryeṇa ānamanti iti prakaraṇāt prāpnoti evam prāpte brūmaḥ śaṃyau ca prakaraṇāt utkarṣaḥ kasmāt sarva paridānāt sarva avasthasya brāhmaṇasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ uktaḥ na darśa pūrṇamāsa gatena eva na avagoraṇa ādi kartavyam iti nanu prakaraṇāt darśa pūrṇamāsa dharmaḥ ayam satyam prakaraṇāt evam vākyena avaguramāṇasya dharmaḥ vākyam ca prakaraṇāt balīyaḥ nanu jañjabhyamānasya iva prakaraṇe niveśaḥ bhavet na iti ucyate tatra phalam kalpanīyam iha kḷptam asti hi atra vidhāyaka vibhaktiḥ śatena yātayāt sahasreṇa yātayāt svargam lokam prajānīyāt iti tasmāt utkarṣaḥ evaṃjātīyakasya iti 
[I,325,ii_I,325,iii]	prāc aparodhān mala vat vāsasaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate mala vat vāsasā na saṃvadet na asyāḥ annam adyāt iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim mala vat vāsasā saha darśa pūrṇamāsa aṅgasya saṃvādasya pratiṣedhaḥ uta puruṣasya sarvatra pratiṣedhaḥ iti kim prāptam prakaraṇāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ pratiṣedha vidhiḥ 
[I,325,iv]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ mala vat vāsasā saha saṃvādaḥ utkṛṣyeta prakaraṇāt kasmāt prāc aparodhāt evam śrūyate yasya vratye ahani patnī anālambhukā syāt tām aparudhya yajeta iti patnyā ca saha saṃvādaḥ adhvaryoḥ darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ asti patni patnī eṣa te lokaḥ iti prasajyamānaḥ pratiṣidhyeta sa ca aprāptaḥ eva prāc aparodhāt apanīyatām yāgam anutiṣṭhatām katham saṃvādaḥ prasajyeta yatas pratiṣedham arhet tasmāt utkṛṣyeta mala vat vāsasā saha saṃvādaḥ 
[I,326,i_I,326,ii]	anna pratiṣedhāt ca anna pratiṣedhaḥ ca bhavati na asyāḥ annam adyāt abhyañjanam vai striyāḥ annam iti upagamana pratiṣedhaḥ eṣa vidhīyate sa ca prakaraṇe na prasaktaḥ iti prakaraṇāt utkṛṣṭaḥ puruṣa dharmaḥ eṣa niścīyate 
[I,326,iii_I,326,iv]	aprakaraṇe tu tad dharmaḥ tatas viśeṣāt anārabhya śrūyate tasmāt suvarṇam hiraṇyam bhāryam durvarṇaḥ asya bhrātṛvyaḥ bhavati iti su vāsasā bhavitavyam rūpam eva bibharti iti tatra kim prakaraṇa dharmaḥ uta puruṣa dharmaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ atra ucyate aprakaraṇe tu tat dharmaḥ tatas viśeṣāt puruṣa dharmaḥ evaṃjātīyakaḥ syāt kutas tatas prakaraṇa adhītāt viśeṣaḥ asya na ayam prakaraṇa adhītaḥ yadi aprakaraṇe samāmnātaḥ sarva prakaraṇa dharmaḥ syāt aprakaraṇe samāmnānam na kaṃcid viśeṣam kuryāt tasmāt evaṃjātīyakaḥ puruṣa dharmaḥ iti 
[I,326,v_I,326,vi]	adravya tvāt tu śeṣaḥ syāt tuśabdaḥ pakṣa vyāvṛttau na puruṣa dharmaḥ bhavet agnihotra ādīnām śeṣaḥ syāt kasmāt adravya tvāt na atra dravya devatam śrūyate yat śravaṇāt bhāryam yaṣṭavyam iti parikalpyeta asati tu dravya devatā saṃbandhe vibhartiḥ ayam dhāraṇā vacanaḥ saṃskāra vācī saṃskāraḥ ca śeṣa bhūtasya avakalpate na anyathā tasmāt karmaṇām agnihotra ādīnām śeṣaḥ evam su vāsasā bhavitavyam iti 
[I,327,i_I,327,ii]	veda saṃyogāt ādhvaryavam iti veda saṃyogaḥ śeṣa bhūtasya yujyate śeṣa bhūtaḥ hi adhvaryuṇā kriyate na puruṣa dharmaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsa ādīnām hi karmaṇām sa aṅgānām aṅgānām ardhvayuḥ kartā tasmāt api karma dharmāḥ evaṃjātīyakāḥ iti 
[I,327,iii_I,327,iv]	dravya saṃyogāt ca dravya paraḥ ca atra bhavati nirdeśaḥ suvarṇam bhāryam iti dvitīya artha saṃyogāt dravya saṃskāraḥ ca karma śeṣa pakṣe prayojanavān anarthakaḥ puruṣa dharme 
[I,327,v_I,327,vi]	syāt vā asya saṃyoga vat phalena saṃbandhaḥ tasmāt karma etiśāyanaḥ syāt vā phalena evaṃjātīyakānām saṃbandhaḥ puruṣa dharmaḥ iti arthaḥ suvarṇasya vāsasaḥ vā dharmaḥ bhavat niṣprayojanaḥ syāt nanu saṃskṛtena suvarṇena vāsasā ca karma setsyati na etat evam suvarṇasya aṅgam na karmaṇaḥ upakuryāt śruti ādīnām abhāvāt na karma aṅgam tasmāt durvarṇaḥ asya bhātṛvyaḥ bhavati iti evamādinā evaṃjātīyakānām phalena saṃbandhaḥ 
[I,327,vii]	nanu vartamāna apadeśaḥ ayam satyam evam etat ānarthakya parihārāya phala codanayā saṃbandhaḥ eṣitavyaḥ bhavati anyasmāt caiṣitavyāt eka vākya gatasya vipariṇāmaḥ laghīyān kutas pratyakṣā tena eka vākyatā parokṣānyena vipariṇāmaḥ ca vartamāna kālasya avivakṣā saṃbandhasya ca tātparyādhyavasānam tasmāt evaṃjātīyakaḥ pradhāna karma upadeśaḥ syāt yathā prajāpati vratānām phalena saṃbandhaḥ etāvatā ha ena sā viyuktaḥ bhavati iti evam atra api draṣṭavyam tasmāt evaṃjātīyakaḥ puruṣa dharmaḥ iti 
[I,328,i_I,328,ii]	śeṣaḥ aprakaraṇe aviśeṣāt sarva karmaṇām iha karma saṃyuktāḥ homāḥ jaya ādayaḥ udāharaṇam yena karmaṇetsat tatra jayān juhuyāt rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ juhoti iti abhyātānān juhoti iti tatra ete kim sarva karmaṇām kṛṣi ādīnām śeṣa bhūtāḥ uta vaidikānām agni hotra ādinām iti śeṣa tvam tu nirjñāta karma saṃbandhāt phala aśravaṇāt ca kim tāvat prāptam sarva karmaṇām śeṣāḥ viśeṣān abhidhānāt iti 
[I,328,iii_I,328,iv]	homāḥ tu vyatiṣṭheran na āhavanīya saṃyogāt na ca etat asti sarva karmaṇām karṣaṇa ādīnām api aṅga bhūtāḥ iti homāḥ ete atas vyavatiṣṭheran āhavanīya saṃyogaḥ bhavati homeṣu yat āhavanīye juhoti tena saḥ asya abhīṣṭaḥ prītaḥ bhavati iti tena yasya āhavanīyaḥ tasya ete aṅgam na ca kṛṣi ādīni āhavanīye vartante na ca eṣām gārhapatyaḥ asti yatas praṇītaḥ āhavanīyaḥ syāt tasmāt na karmaṇā ādīnām jaya ādayaḥ 
[I,329,i_I,329,ii]	śeṣaḥ ca samākhyānāt itas ca paśyāmaḥ vaidikānām śeṣa bhūtāḥ iti kutas sāma khyānāt ādhvaryavam iti hi samākhyāte vede jaya ādayaḥ samāmnātāḥ santaḥ adhvaryuṇā kariṣyante karṣaṇa ādiṣu adhvaryoḥ abhāvāt anadhvaryuṇā api kriyamāṇāḥ samākhyām bādheran tasmāt vaidikānām śeṣa bhūtāḥ iti 
[I,329,iii_I,329,iv]	doṣāt tu iṣṭiḥ laukike syāt śāstrāt dhi vaidike na doṣaḥ syāt asti aśva pratigraha iṣṭiḥ varuṇaḥ vai etam gṛhṇāti yaḥ aśvam pratigṛhṇāti yāvataḥ aśvān pratigṛhṇīyāt tāvataḥ vāruṇān catuṣkapālāt nirvapet iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim laukike aśva pratigrahaḥ iṣṭiḥ atha vaidikaḥ iti kaḥ punar laukikaḥ aśva pratigrahaḥ kaḥ vā vaidikaḥ iti loke bhikṣamāṇaḥ vā abhikṣamāṇaḥ vā yatra aśvam labhate tatra laukika aśva pratigrahaḥ vaidikaḥ api pauṇḍarīke aśva sahasram dakṣiṇā jyotiṣṭome gauḥ ca aśvaḥ ca iti 
[I,329,v_I,330,i]	tatra ucyate vaidika tva sāmānyāt vaidikaḥ iti prāpte ucyate doṣāt tu iṣṭiḥ laukike syāt doṣaḥ hi śrūyate varuṇaḥ vai etam gṛhṇāti yaḥ aśvam pratigṛhṇāti iti sa ca ayam anuvādaḥ yatra doṣaḥ tatra iti sa ca laukike aśva pratigrahe śūdrāt anyasmāt vā pāpa karmaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati iti upapadyate doṣa saṃyogāt laukikaḥ iti gamyate āha na doṣa saṃkīrtanam prāyaścitta viṣaya viśeṣaṇam kim tu prāyaścittastuti arthena ucyate doṣa nirdhāta arthe sati evam syāt varuṇa pramocanam idam karma tat laukike bhavitum arhati loke varuṇa grahaṇasya vidyamāna tvāt vaidike tu aśva pratigrahe tat na syāt śāstrāt dhi vacanena tasya kartavyatā avagamyate yadi ca tatas pāpam syāt na tasya kartavyatau agamyeta akartavyam hi pāpa phalam nanu vaidike api pratigrahe apratigrāhyāt pratigṛhṇataḥ pāpam asti ucyate bhavet evam yadi pratigrahasya kartuḥ iṣṭiḥ bhavet sā tu khalu yathā hetu kartuḥ tathā uttara adhikaraṇe vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt na veda codite aśva pratigrahe iṣṭiḥ iti etāvat iha adhikaraṇe siddham 
[I,330,ii_I,330,iii]	artha vādaḥ avā anupapātāt tasmāt yajñe pratīyeta na ca etat asti yat uktam yaḥ śūdrāt anyasmāt vā pāpa kṛtaḥ loke aśvam pratigṛhṇīyāt saḥ etām iṣṭim nirvapet sa hi varuṇa gṛhītaḥ iti ucyate jala udareṇa yaḥ gṛhītaḥ yasya udaram jala vṛddhyā śvayati jala udaram iti eva loke tat prasiddham na ca tasya aśva pratigrahaḥ laukikaḥ nidānam iti pratijñāyate na ca anena vidhīyate tasmāt na aśva pratigrahāt jala udara upapātaḥ 
[I,331,i]	atha pāpam varuṇa śabdena ucyate vṛṇītaḥ iti eṣaḥ abhiprāyaḥ iti tadā prasiddhau tyaktāyām kleśa mātram vṛṇvat varuṇa śabdena ucyate tatra yājñe api pratigrahe varuṇa gṛhītaḥ syāt rakṣaṇa poṣaṇa vicikitsā ādinā kleśena na eṣa pakṣaḥ vyavatiṣṭheta laukike aśva pratigrahaḥ iti prasiddhiḥ ca bādhyeta tasmāt artha vādaḥ eṣaḥ yāvat varuṇa gṛhītasya varuṇa unmocane śreyaḥ tāvat eta iti upamānena eṣā stutiḥ yaḥ asya pratigrahaḥ tat varuṇa grahaṇam iva yā iṣṭiḥ sā tat unmocanī iva yathā varuṇa gṛhītena unmocanam avaśya kartavyam tādṛś eva etat iti tasmāt yajñe pratīyeta laukike hi phalam kalpanīyam vaidike yasmin aśva pratigrahaḥ tasya aṅga bhūtā bhaviṣyati tatra prayoga vacanena saha eka vākyatā saṃbandhāt avakalpyamānā parokṣāyāḥ phala vacanena saha eka vākyatāyāḥ laghīyasi iti yuktam iṣṭiḥ vaidike dānaḥ iti 
[I,331,ii_I,331,iii]	acoditam ca karma bhedāt yāvataḥ aśvān pratigṛṇīyāt tāvataḥ vāruṇān catuṣkapālāt nirvapet iti tatra etat samadhigatam vaidike aśva pratigrahaḥ iṣṭiḥ iti atha idānīm saṃdihyate kim pratigraha kartrā kartavyā yasmai dīyate uta hetu kartrā yaḥ dadāti iti kim prāptam acoditam ca karma bhedāt na dānasya kartuḥ iṣṭiḥ codyate pratigrhakartuḥ tām avagacchāmaḥ yāvataḥ aśvān pratigṛhṇīyāt tāvataḥ catuṣkapālān vāruṇān nirvapet iti tasmāt pratigrahītra ṛtvijā kartavyā iti 
[I,332,i_I,332,ii^1]	sā liṅgāt ārtvije syāt na eṣā pratigraha kartuḥ kim tarhi hetu kartuḥ syāt kutas liṅgāt kim liṅgam pūrva padānām uttaraiḥ padaiḥ yathārtham abhisaṃbandhaḥ idam śrūyate prajāpatiḥ varuṇāya aśvam anyat iti prajāpatiḥ aśvasya dātā kīrtitaḥ varuṇaḥ pratigrahītā sa svām devatām ārcchat iti saḥ iti sa apekṣam pūrva prakṛtam vākya śeṣam apekṣate saḥ iti prajāpatim pratinirdiśati iti tena saha aikya vākya tām yāti sāmāna adhikaraṇyāt ca prajāpateḥ eva pratinirdeśaḥ avakalpate na tu varuṇasya vaiyadhikaraṇyāt sa paryadīryate iti eṣaḥ api prajāpatim eva pratinirdiśati pūrva prakṛtam tena ca saha eka vākya tām yāti 
[I,332,ii^2]	saḥ eva etam vāruṇam catuṣkapālam apaśyat iti prajāpatiḥ eva iti niravapat prajāpatiḥ eva iti tatas vai sa varuṇa pāśāt amucyata prajāpatiḥ varuṇaḥ etam gṛhṇāti iti hetu apadeśaḥ ayam yasmāt eva prajāpatiḥ varuṇāya aśvam dattvā paridīrṇaḥ tasmāt yaḥ aśvam prati gṛhṇāti prayacchati tam varuṇaḥ gṛhṇāti sa paridīryate iti yatas tu vāruṇena pratimuktaḥ tasmāt anyena api aśvam prayacchatā vāruṇaḥ nirvaptavyaḥ iti aśvasya dātuḥ vāruṇī iṣṭiḥ praśasyate karta vyā anena ākhyātena tasmāt aśvam dattvā vāruṇīm iṣṭim nirvapet iti 
[I,332,iii]	āha nanu yaḥ asvam pratigṛhṇāti sa nirvapet iti ucyate evam sati anyathā upakrānte vākye anyathā upasaṃhṛtaḥ upakramaḥ api anarthakaḥ syāt upasaṃhāraḥ api tasmāt upakrame vā śabda arthaḥ upasaṃhāra vaśena kalpanīyaḥ upasaṃhāre vā upakrama vaśena tatra prajāpatiḥ varuṇāya aśvam anayat iti varuṇāt aśvam pratyagṛhṇāt iti upasaṃhāra anurodhena kalpyeta yat vā upakrama vaśena upasaṃhāram yaḥ aśvam pratigṛhṇāti iti yaḥ aśvam pratigrāhayati iti tatra mukhyam vā pūrvam codanāt loka vat iti prathamam anugrahītavyam virodha abhāvāt paścāt tanam tu virodhāt lakṣaṇayā kalpanīyam 
[I,333,i]	api ca prajāpatiḥ varuṇāya aśvam anayat iti varuṇāt aśvam pratyagṛhṇāt iti bahu asamañjasam kalpayitavyam pratigṛhṇāti iti eṣa śabdaḥ pratigrāhayati iti etam artham śaknoti yayā kayācid śaktyā vaktum yaḥ hi tat ācarati yena ca kriyā praṇāḍya api sidhyati sa tasyāḥ kriyāyāḥ kartā iti śakyate vaditum yathā ṣaḍbhiḥ halaiḥ karṣati iti saṃvidhānam kurvan vilekhanam akurvan api ucyate tat samartham ācarati iti evam iha api sa pratigraha samartham ācarati yaḥ dadāti tasmāt dadat pratigṛhṇāti iti śakyate vaditum tasmāt adhyavadhārya idam avakḷptam dadat pratigṛhṇāti iti ucyate tasya ca vāruṇīṣṭiḥ iti 
[I,333,ii_I,333,iii]	pāna vyāpad ca tadvat idam samāmananti somendram carum nirvapet śyāmākam soma vāminaḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ laukikasya soma pānasya vamane sauma indraḥ caruḥ uta vaidikasya iti kim laukikam soma pānam kim ca vaidikam ucyate vaidikam soma pānam jyotiṣṭome tad vikṛtiṣu ca laukikam soma pānam yat sapta rātreṣu daśa rātreṣu dhātu sāmya artham āsevyamāne some kim tāvat prāptam pāna vyāpad ca tadvat laukike vamanaḥ iṣṭiḥ bhavitum arhati na vaidike tadvat iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ pratinirdiṣṭaḥ yathā tatra doṣa saṃyogena śravaṇāt laukike aśva pratigrahaḥ iti uktam evam iha api doṣa saṃyogena śravaṇam bhavati indriyeṇa vai eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yaḥ somam pibati iti loke dhātu sāmya artham āsevite vamanena vinaṣṭe dhātu sāmya vyāpadā indriyeṇa vyṛddhiḥ upapadyate śāstrāt dhi vaidike na doṣaḥ syāt tatra śeṣaḥ pātavyaḥ iti śabdāt codite nirvṛtte na asti doṣaḥ yadi api vamyate tathā api pāna kriyā tatra nirvartitā kṛtaḥ vacana arthaḥ iti na doṣaḥ syāt tasmāt laukikasya soma pānasya vyāpadi sauma indraḥ syāt 
[I,334,i_I,334,ii]	doṣāt tu vaidike syāt arthāt dhi laukike na doṣaḥ syāt vaidikasya pānasya vyāpadi bhavitum arhati na laukikasya kasmāt doṣāt doṣa saṃbandhaḥ atra śrūyate indriyeṇa vai eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate iti laukike punar dhātu sāmya ādi artham kriyamāṇe na kiṃcid duṣyati vamanāya eva hi tam pibanti loke atha api ayam artha vādaḥ tathā api phala kalpanā parīhārāya vaidikaḥ eva iti kalpanā nyāyyā 
[I,334,iii_I,334,iv]	tat sarvatra aviśeṣāt tat etat soma pāna vyāpadi sauma indram karma sarvatra vamane syāt ārtvije yājamāne ca kutas aviśeṣāt na viśeṣaḥ kaścid āśrīyate asya vamane syāt na asya iti tasmāt sarvatra bhavet 
[I,335,i_I,335,ii]	svāminaḥ vā tat artha tvāt svāminoḥ vā vamane syāt kutas tat artha tvāt tat artham karma yajamāna artham yatra somaḥ vamyate yat tu atra sauma indram karma tat api tat artham eva idam hi soma vāminaḥ upakārāya śrūyate tat soma vāminaḥ yajamānasya upakartum śaknoti na ārtvijaḥ na hi tat ṛtvij artham karma yatra somaḥ vamyate atha ucyate soma vāminaḥ adhvaryoḥ hotuḥ vā ātmīyāḥ ṛtvijaḥ tadīyeṣu agniṣu nirvartayiṣyanti iti tathā sati yadi vā vyṛddha somasya karmaṇaḥ na aṅgam na soma vāminaḥ adhvaryoḥ hotuḥ vā tatra atyanta guṇa bhūtāḥ adhvaryva ādayaḥ svaiḥ ṛtvigbhiḥ kārayantaḥ na phalam prāpnuvanti tat artham ca kriyamāṇam na yajamānasya upakāre vartate iti na ṛtvijaḥ vamane kriyeta 
[I,335,iii_I,335,iv]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam ca bhavati yajamānasya soma vāminaḥ iti katham soma pīthena vai eṣa vyṛdhyate yaḥ somam vamati iti yajamānaḥ soma saṃskāre vinaṣṭe viguṇam asya karma iti vyṛdhyeta na kathaṃcid ṛtvijaḥ vyṛddhiḥ ṛtvijaḥ yasya somam vamanti iti vamanena saṃbandhaḥ syāt na yaḥ somam vamati iti tasmāt api paśyāmaḥ yajamānasya vamane sauma indram iti 
[I,336,i_I,336,ii]	sarva pradānam haviṣaḥ tad artha tvāt staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra sāmāmnāyate yat āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ amau āsyāyām paurṇamāsyām ca acyutaḥ bhavati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim kṛtsnam haviḥ agnaye pradātavyam uta śeṣayitavyam kiṃcid kiṃcid dātavyam iti kim prāptam kṛtsnam haviḥ pradīyeta kutas tad artha tvāt puroḍāśaḥ āgneyaḥ kartavyaḥ iti vacanam tasmāt sarvam pradātavyam iti 
[I,336,iii_I,336,iv]	niravadānāt tu śeṣaḥ syāt niṣkṛṣya avadānam niravadānam tat dhi śrūyate dvis haviṣaḥ avadyati iti aparam api vacanam dvi avadānam juhoti iti tena dvi avadāna mātram hotavyam anyat pariśeṣaṇīyam 
[I,336,v_I,336,vi]	upāyaḥ vā tad artha tvāt na ca etat asti dvi avadāna mātram hotavyam iti yat juhoti tat dvis avakhaṇḍanena saṃskartavyam iti hotavye dvis avakhaṇḍa mātram vidhīyate na adviḥ avakhaṇḍitasya homaḥ pratiṣidhyate kṛtsnam ca hotavyam iti tat evam nyāyyam na anyathā 
[I,336,vii_I,336,viii]	kṛta tvāt tu karmaṇaḥ sakṛt syāt dravyasya guṇa bhūta tvāt ucyate yadā dvis avakhaṇḍana viṣiṣṭam home śrutam tadā sakṛt avadānam yāvat śrutam tat sarvam kṛtam tadā na aparam dravyam asti iti punar yāgaḥ na āvartitavyaḥ katham tat dhi dravyam yāga nirvṛtti artham na dravyam yāgena saṃbandhayitavyam iti yadi hi yāgena haviḥ saṃbandhayitavyam syāt tatas yāgena dvi avadāne saṃbandhite aparam api saṃbandhanīyam asti iti tad saṃbandha artham punar yāgaḥ āvarteta na tu yāgaḥ dravya saṃbandha arthaḥ kim tarhi dravyam yāge guṇa bhūtam yāgaḥ katham nirvṛttim upeyāt iti dravyam upādīyate tena nirvṛtte yāge siddhe ca puruṣa arthe na niyogena guṇa anurodhena pradhāna āvṛttiḥ yuktā iti 
[I,337,i]	katham na dravyam pradhānam yena āvṛttiḥ te bhavet yatas yāgāt phalam bhūta bhavya samuccāraṇe bhūtam bhavyāya upadiśyate iti na ca yāgena dravyasya upakāraḥ nirvartyate pratyakṣaḥ kaścid tasmāt dvi avadānam hutvā śeṣayitavyam iti yat tu uktam āgneyam haviḥ iti vacanāt sarvam hotavyam iti gamyate iti tatra anumānikaḥ homa saṃbandhaḥ iha tu pratyakṣaḥ dvis avadāne api ca akṛtsna saṃbandhe api tat dhitasya upapattiḥ tatas grahītavyam iti sāmānyam khalu āgneyaḥ iti dvi avadānam juhoti iti viśeṣaḥ tasmāt śeṣayitavyam kiṃcid iti 
[I,337,ii_I,337,iii]	śeṣa darśanāt ca śeṣāt iḍām avadyati śeṣāt sviṣṭakṛtam yajati iti anuvādāt asti śeṣaḥ iti paśyāmaḥ 
[I,338,i_I,338,ii]	aprayojaka tvāt ekasmāt kriyeran cheṣasya guṇa bhūta tvāt staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra śeṣa kāryāṇi aiḍa prāśitra sauviṣṭa kṛt ādīni tatra saṃdehaḥ kim haviṣaḥ haviṣaḥ kartavyāni uta ekasmāt dhaviṣaḥ iti kim prāptam aprayojaka tvāt ekasmāt kriyeran aprayojakāni śeṣa kāryāṇi haviṣām yadi śeṣa kāryaiḥ prayuktāni bhaveyuḥ sarvāṇi prayuktāni iti sarvebhyaḥ kriyeran anyathā arthāni tu etāni na avaśyam śeṣa kāryeṣu viniyoktavyāni saṃnidhānāt tu yatas kutaścid anuṣṭhātavyāni śeṣaḥ hi sādhanam amīṣām iti 
[I,338,iii_I,338,iv]	saṃskṛta tvāt ca sakṛt ca evaṃjātīyakena śeṣa kāryeṇa saṃskṛtam pradhānam iti kṛtvā na aparasmāt api kartavyam iti 
[I,338,v_I,338,vi]	sarvebhyaḥ vā kāraṇā viśeṣāt saṃskārasya tad artha tvāt sarvebhyaḥ vā havirbhyaḥ śeṣa kāryāṇi kartavyāni kutas kāraṇā viśeṣāt yat ekasya haviṣaḥ śeṣa kārya kriyāyām kāraṇam tat sarveṣām sa hi śeṣaḥ pratipādayitavyaḥ yasya eva na pratipādyate tasya tena saṃskāreṇa varjanam syāt tasmāt sarvebhyaḥ kartavyāni iti 
[I,338,vii_I,338,viii]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam ca dṛśyate devāḥ vai sviṣṭakṛtam abruvan havyam naḥ vahaḥ iti saḥ abravīt varam vṛṇaiḥ bhāgaḥ me astu iti vṛṇīṣva iti te abruvan saḥ abravīt uttara ardhāt eva mahyam sakṛt sakṛt avadyāt iti vīpsā darśanam tasmāt sarvebhyaḥ śeṣa kāryāṇi iti 
[I,339,i_I,339,ii]	ekasmāt ced yathākāmya viśeṣāt atha kṛtvā acintā yadā ekasmāt bhaveyuḥ kim tadā yatas kutaścid uta prathamāt iti kim prāptam yatas kutaścid iti kutas na kaścid viśeṣaḥ āśrīyate iti tasmāt aniyamaḥ iti 
[I,339,iii_I,339,iv]	mukhyāt vā pūrva kāla tvāt mukhyāt vā kartavyāni kutas pūrva kāla tvāt tatas kartavyeṣu na asti nimitta vighātaḥ asati nimitta vighāte naimittikam kartavyam iti tatas kṛteṣu dvitīya ādīnām nimitta vidhātaḥ iti akriyā tasmāt mukhyāt eva kriyeran iti 
[I,339,v_I,339,vi]	bhakṣā śravaṇāt dāna śabdaḥ parikraye darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate idam brahmaṇaḥ idam hotuḥ idam adhvaryoḥ idam agnīdhaḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ayam ṛtvijām vibhāgaḥ parikrayāya uta bhakṣaṇāya iti kim prāptam parikraya arthaḥ vibhāgaḥ kutas bhakṣā śravaṇāt na śrūyate bhakṣitavyam iti yaḥ eva śrutasya utsarge doṣaḥ saḥ eva aśruta parikalpaṇāyām karmakarebhyaḥ ca dīyate tasmāt parikrayaḥ eṣaḥ 
[I,340,i_I,340,ii]	tad saṃstavāt ca eṣā vai darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ dakṣiṇā iti dakṣiṇā saṃstavāt ca parikraya artham manyāmahe 
[I,340,iii_I,340,v]	bhakṣa arthaḥ vā dravye sama tvāt bhakṣa arthaḥ eṣa vibhāgaḥ kutas dānasya abhāvāt katham abhāvaḥ prabhavatā hi śakyam dātum na aprabhavatā katham na prabhu tvam saṃkalpitam hi yajamānena devatāyāḥ etat iti na ca devatāyai saṃkalpitena śiṣṭāḥ svena iva vyavaharanti tasmāt śiṣṭa ācāram anuvartamānena aśakyam prabhavitum tasmāt na parikrayaḥ 
[I,340,vi]	atha yat uktam na śrūyate bhakṣayitavyam iti yāvān ca śrutasya utsarge doṣaḥ tāvān aśruta parikalpanāyām iti ucyate idam brahmaṇaḥ iti evamādibhiḥ brahma ādīnām bhāgaiḥ abhisaṃbandhaḥ tatra bhāgāḥ brahma ādīnām upakuryuḥ brahma ādayaḥ vā bhāgānām brahma ādibhiḥ bhāgānām upakurvadbhiḥ na kiṃcid dṛṣṭam asti bāgaiḥ tu brahma ādīnām upakārakaiḥ śakyate kenacid prakāreṇa dṛṣṭaḥ upakāraḥ kartum bhakṣyamāṇaiḥ tasmāt bhakṣaṇāya vibhāgaḥ iti kaḥ punar upakāraḥ iti ced tṛptānām karma śeṣa parisamāpane sāmarthyam bhavati iti 
[I,341,i_I,341,ii]	vyādeśāt dāna saṃstutiḥ atha yat dakṣiṇā saṃstavaḥ iti vyādeśa sāmānyāt tat aparikraya arthe api bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,342,i_I,342,ii]	ājyāt ca sarva saṃyogāt staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra śrūyate uttara ardhāt sviṣṭakṛte samavadyati iti tathā iḍām upahvayati iti tathā anyāni prāśitra avadāna ādīni śeṣa kāryāṇi tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ājyāt upāṃśuyāja dravyāt sviṣṭakṛt iḍam avadātavyam uta na iti kim prāptam avadātavyam iti kutas sarva saṃyogāt sādhāraṇa prakaraṇa samāmnātāt sarveṣām śeṣa kāryāṇi api ca sarva saṃyogaḥ bhavati tat yat sarvebhyaḥ havirbhyaḥ samavadyati iti tasmāt ājyāt api śeṣa kāryāṇi kriyante 
[I,342,iii_I,342,iv]	kāraṇāt ca kāraṇam śrūyate devāḥ vai sviṣṭakṛtam abruvan havyam naḥ vaha iti saḥ abravīt varam vṛṇaiḥ bhāgaḥ me astu iti vṛṇīṣva iti abruvan saḥ abravīt uttara ardhāt eva mahyam sakṛt sakṛt avadyāt iti tulyam kāraṇam anyeṣām ājyasya ca artha vāde saṃkīrtyate tasmāt api ājyāt avadātavyam iti 
[I,342,v_I,342,vi]	ekasmin samavatta śabdāt āditye carau prāyaṇīye śrūyate agnaye sviṣṭakṛte samavadyati iti ājyāt ekasmāt ca haviṣaḥ avadyati iti miśrasya anyena haviṣā samavadyati iti yadi ca ājyāt api sviṣṭakṛte avadīyeta tatas ca udakena prāpaṇīyaḥ ājya avadāne kriyamāṇe samavadyati iti upapadyate itarathā caroḥ ekasmāt avadyati iti abhaviṣyat 
[I,343,i_I,343,ii]	ājye ca darśanāt sviṣṭakṛt artha vādasya dhrauve ca ājye sviṣṭakṛt artha vādaḥ bhavati avadāya avadāya dhruvām pratyabhidhārayati sviṣṭakṛte avadāya na dhruvām pratyabhidhārayati na hi tatas parāma āhutim yakṣyan bhavati iti pratyabhidhāraṇasya etat prayojanam darśayati tatas patrām āhutim hoṣyati iti sauviṣṭakṛte vṛtte tatas para āhutiḥ na asti iti na pratyabhidhāryeta sviṣṭakṛt arthe dhruvāyām bhavati pratyabhidhāraṇam iti darśayati 
[I,343,iii_I,343,iv]	aśeṣātvāt tu na evam syāt sarva ādānāt aśeṣa tā na evam dhrauvājyāt sviṣṭakṛt iḍam avadātavyam iti kasmāt aśeṣa tvāt kutas na asya śeṣaḥ sarva ādānāt 
[I,343,v_I,344,i]	sādhāraṇyāt na dhruvāyām syāt nanu upāṃśuyāja artham gṛhīte yat dhruvāyām śiṣṭam tat śeṣa bhūtam na etat sādhāraṇam hi tat upāṃśuyājāya anyebhyaḥ ca prayojanebhyaḥ yāvat ājyena yaṣṭavyam tat tat ājyam prayojayati yasya yasya ājyam tasya tasya evam grahītavyam saṃskartavyam ca iti tasmāt sādhāraṇam dhrauvam ājyam darśayati ca sarvasmai vai etat yajñāya gṛhyate yat dhruvāyām ājyam iti kim atas yadi evam iti yat sādhāraṇam upāṃśuya ajāya avattam dhruvāyām ājyam tena anyāni prayojanāni kāryāṇi na tu tat pratipādyam yat dhi kṛta prayojanam ākīrṇa karam avatiṣṭhate tat pratipādayitavyam iti kvacid ca yat pratipādayitavyam tat evam pratipādayitavyam iti yat tu prayojana vat upāttam tat na pratipādayitavyam tasmāt na dhruvāyām upāṃśu yājasya sauviṣṭakṛtaḥ ca kaścid śeṣaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ yathā yatra ekasya amukhyāyām bahūnām odanaḥ śṛtaḥ bhavati tatra ekasmin bhuktavati na tasya śiṣṭam bhṛtyebhyaḥ pratipādanīya mukhāyām asti iti gamyate prayojana vat dhi tat evam upāṃśuya aja ājye api draṣṭavyam iti āha juhvām tarhi ājyasya śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati camasa vat yathā camaseṣu graheṣu ca somasya codanayā iti tatra pratyāha 
[I,344,ii_I,344,iii]	avatta tvāt ca juhvām tasya ca homa saṃyogāt dhruvāyām tāvat na asti śeṣaḥ upāṃśu yājasya sādhāraṇa tvāt iti uktam atha kasmāt na juhvām yat śiṣṭam tena śeṣa kāryam yathā homa arthe camase śeṣaḥ iti ucyate yat juhvām avattam tat sarvam homena saṃbaddham tasmāt na juhvām śeṣaḥ 
[I,344,iv_I,344,v]	camasa vat iti ced iti punar yat uktam tat parihartavyam 
[I,344,vi_I,344,vii]	na codanā virodhāt dhaviḥ prakalpana tvāt ca na etat evam kutas codanā virodhāt somasya agneḥ vīhi iti anuvaṣaṭkaroti iti tatra codanā api ca tatra aindra vāyavam gṛhṇāti iti evamādīni grahaṇāni na soma saṃyuktāni haviḥ prakalpanāni eva iha punar homa saṃyogaḥ caturgṛhītam juhoti iti 
[I,345,i_I,345,ii]	utpanna adhikārāt sati sarva vacanam atha yat uktam tat yat sarvebhyaḥ havirbhyaḥ samavadyati iti ucyate utpannam śeṣam adhikṛtya etat ucyate na aviśeṣaṇam tasmāt yaḥ iha śeṣāḥ tebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ iti yathā sarve odanaḥ bhuktaḥ sarve brāhmaṇāḥ bhuktavantaḥ iti prakṛta apekṣaḥ sarva śabdaḥ evam atra api iti 
[I,345,iii_I,345,iv]	jāti viśeṣāt param atha yat uktam prāpaṇīye kevale carau samavatta śabdaḥ na avakalpate yadi na tatra ca udakena ājyāt api sviṣṭakṛt avadānam iti ucyate asati api ājyāt śeṣa kārye samavatta śabdaḥ jāti viśeṣa apekṣaḥ upapadyate odana jātim ājya jātim ca apekṣya anuvādaḥ hi saḥ yathāsaṃbhavam ca anuvādaḥ kalpyeta 
[I,345,v_I,345,vi]	antyam areka arthe atha yat uktam sviṣṭakṛt artham dhruvāyām abhidhāraṇam darśayati iti na tat sviṣṭakṛt artham śeṣa abhāvāt iti uktam tasmāt ayam tasya arthaḥ na hi tatas āhutim yakṣyan bhavati iti na rekṣyate dhruva ataḥ yadi āhutiḥ aparā hotavyā bhavet na ca pratyabhidhāryeta dhuvātaḥ kila ricyeta na rakṣyate aparasyāḥ āhuteḥ abhāvāt kim pratyabhidhāraṇena iti 
[I,346,i_I,346,ii]	sākam prasthāyīye sviṣṭakṛt iḍam ca tadvat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate sākam prasthāyīyena yajeta iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim sviṣṭakṛt iḍam asti na asti iti asti iti brūmaḥ kutas darśa pūrṇamāsa vikāraḥ hi sākam prasthāyīyam iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ na asti iti kutas aśeṣa tvāt sarva ādānāt ca aśeṣa tā katham evam tatra śrūyate ājya bhāgābhyām pracarya āgneyena ca puroḍāśena āgnīdhre srucau pradāya saha kumbhībhiḥ abhikrāman āha iti tasmāt na tatas śeṣa kāryat iti 
[I,346,iii_I,346,iv]	sautrāmaṇyām ca graheṣu asti sautrāmaṇī tatra grahāḥ śrūyante āśvina sāra sva tā aindrāḥ tatra ca udakena sviṣṭakṛt iḍam prāptam atha idānīm saṃdehaḥ kim nivartate uta na iti kim prāptam ca udaka anugrahāya kartavyam iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ sautrāmaṇyām ca graheṣu na kartavyam iti caśabdena atidiśyate kutas aśeṣa tvāt sarva ādānāt śeṣa tā tatra api hi grahaiḥ evam hotum pratiṣṭhante yat payaḥ grahāḥ ca sura grahāḥ ca gṛhyante iti graha stham khalu api tat dravyam abhigṛhītam abhyanukramam abhyāśrāvitam devatām prati yathā gṛhītān grahān ṛtvijaḥ ādadate āśvinam adhvaryuḥ sārasvatam brahmā aindram pratiprasthāta iti homa artham aśeṣa ādānam bhavati homa saṃyogaḥ ca eṣām śruyate uttare agnau payaḥ grahāt juhvati dakṣiṇe agnau sura grahāt juhvati iti 
[I,347,i_I,347,ii]	tadvat ca śeṣa vacanam etam eva nyāyam śeṣa vacanam upodbalayati ucchinaṣṭi na sarvam juhoti iti sarva home prāpte pratiṣedhaḥ avakalpyate vācanika tvāt ca sviṣṭakṛt iḍam na bhavati tasya anyatra upayoga vacanāt brāhmaṇam parikrīṇīyāt uccheṣaṇasya pātāram iti aparasya api śeṣasya vācanikaḥ viniyogaḥ śatātṛṇāyām vikṣārayanti iti 
[I,347,iii_I,347,iv]	dravya eka tve karma bhedāt pratikarma kriyeran asti sarva pṛṣṭha iṣṭiḥ indrāya rāthantarāya indrāya bārhatāya indrāya vairūpāya indrāya vairājāya indrāya śāknarāya iti tatra puroḍāśaḥ bahūnām karmaṇām sādhāraṇaḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim pratikarma sviṣṭakṛt iḍam kartavyam sakṛt eva vā iti kim prāptam codanā anugrahāt pratikarma kartavyam ekasmin api dravye bahu tvāt karmaṇām 
[I,347,v_I,347,vi]	avibhāgāt ca śeṣasya sarvān prati aviśiṣṭa tvāt sakṛt eva kartavyam iti brūmaḥ avibhāgāt śeṣasya na atra vibhāgaḥ sarveṣām karmaṇām puroḍāśasya uttara ardhāt sviṣṭakṛt avadātavyam ekaḥ ca asau uttara ardhaḥ tatas avadīyamāne na gamyate viśeṣaḥ kasya avattam kasya na iti evam iḍāyām api tasmāt sakṛt avadātavyam iti 
[I,348,i_I,348,ii]	aindra vāyave tu vacanāt pratikarma bhakṣaḥ syāt asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti tatra aindra vāyave grahe saṃdehaḥ kim sakṛt bhakṣaṇam uta dvis iti soma saṃskāra artha tvāt sakṛt iti prāpte brūmaḥ aindra vāyave dvis bhakṣayitavyam iti kutas vacanāt vacanam idam bhavati dvis aindra vāyavasya bhakṣayati dvis hi etasya vaṣaṭkaroti iti na asti vacanasya ati bhāraḥ 
[I,348,iii_I,348,iv]	some avacanāt bhakṣaḥ na vidyate jyotiṣṭome samāmananti somān teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim teṣām śeṣaḥ bhakṣayitavyaḥ uta na iti kim prāptam some bhakṣaḥ na vidyate kasmāt avacanāt na śakyam asati vacane adhyavasātum bhakṣaṇam tasmāt soma śeṣaḥ na bhakṣayitavyaḥ iti 
[I,348,v_I,348,vi]	syāt vā anya artha darśanāt bhavet vā bhakṣaḥ anya artham hi vacanam bhakṣam darśayati sarvatas parihāram āśvinam bhakṣayati bhakṣitā api āyitān camasān dakṣiṇasya anasaḥ avalambe sādayanti iti na asati bhakṣaṇaḥ evaṃjātīyakāḥ bhakṣa viśeṣāḥ saṃbhavanti 
[I,349,i_I,349,ii]	vacanāni tu apūrva tvāt tasmāt yathopadeśam syuḥ nanu darśanam idam prāptiḥ vaktavyā ucyate vacanāni tarhi bhaviṣyanti sarvatas parihāram āśvinam bhakṣayati tasmāt sarvāḥ diśaḥ śṛṇoti iti viśiṣṭam bhakṣaṇam vidhīyate apūrva tvāt bhakṣa anuvādaḥ na avakalpate api ca evam apūrvam artham vidadhataḥ arthavat tā bhaviṣyati tasmāt yatra eva viśiṣṭam bhakṣaṇam śrūyate tatra eva bhavati na ati prasajyate 
[I,349,iii_I,349,v]	camaseṣu samākhyānāt saṃyogasya tad nimitta tvāt jyotiṣṭomaḥ eva śruyate praitu hotuḥ camasaḥ pra brahmaṇaḥ prodgātṝṇām pra yajamānasya prayantu sadasyānām iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim camasinām asti bhakṣaḥ na iti kim prāptam na iti brūmaḥ na ati prasajyate iti uktam evam prāpte brūmaḥ camaseṣu asti bhakṣaḥ iti kutas samākhyānāt hotuḥ camasaḥ brahmaṇaḥ camasaḥ udgātuḥ camasaḥ iti samākhyayā nirdiśyate hotā yatra camati camiṣyati acamīt vā sa hotuḥ camasaḥ yadi atra hotā na camet na hotuḥ camasaḥ bhavet tasmāt camati iti 
[I,349,vi]	āha kā asya liṅgasya prāptiḥ iti sāmarthyam iti brūmaḥ hotuḥ camasena praitavyam yadi ca atra hotā na camet na śakyam bhavet dhotuḥ camasena praitum na ca atra anyat dhotā odana ādi camiṣyati soma camasaḥ iti hi tam samācakṣate api ca na tat dhotuḥ dravyam yajamānasya tat dravyam hotuḥ tatra camanam kartavyam some ca bhakṣyamāṇe tena homaḥ avakalpate pavitram hi somaḥ na tasmin bhakṣite pātram vyāpadyate tatra camasena śakyate hotum vacana prāmāṇyāt ucchiṣṭena hoṣyati iti ced na etat evam asati avakāśe vacanam bādhakam bhavati asti ca avakāśaḥ soma bhakṣaṇam tasmāt camasibhiḥ bhakṣayitavyaḥ somaḥ iti 
[I,350,i]	atha takṣaṇa ādīni āśrīyeran tathā saṃbandha apahnavāt atat camasatā eva syāt dravya antaram syāt tasmāt ca abrāhmaṇasya somam pratiṣedhati sa yadi rājanyam vaiśyam vā yājayet sa yadi somam vibhakṣayiṣet nyagrodhasti bhīra āhṛtya tāḥ saṃpiṣya dadhani unmṛja tasmai bhakṣam prayacchet na somam iti bhakṣā nivṛttim darśayati sa eṣa bhakṣa āśaṅkā evam sati upapadyate yadi camasinaḥ asti bhakṣaḥ tasmāt asti iti manyāmahe 
[I,350,ii_I,350,iii]	udgātṛ camasam ekaḥ śruti saṃyogāt asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti tatra asti praitu hotuḥ camasaḥ pra brahmaṇaḥ prodgātṝṇām iti tatra asti samākhyānāt bhakṣaḥ iti uktam tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ekaḥ eva enam camasam udgātā bhakṣayet uta sarve bhakṣayeyuḥ atha subrahmaṇya varjitāḥ chandogāḥ bhakṣayeyuḥ athavā saha subrahmaṇyena iti kim tāvat prāptam ekaḥ bhakṣayet udgātā eva kutas śruti saṃyogāt udgātā ekaḥ śrutyā saṃyujyate camasena prodgātṝṇām iti 
[I,351,i]	nanu bahuvacanam śrūyate tena bahavaḥ bhakṣayeyuḥ ucyate śrūyate bahuvacanam tat udgātṛ prātipadika gatam tat vivakṣitam sat udgātṛ bahu tvam brūyāt ekaḥ ca ugātā tatra bahu tvam śrūyamāṇam api na śaknuyāt udgātṛ bhedam kartum tasmāt avivakṣitam bahuvacanam anumānam hi etat bahūnām camasaḥ iti katham yat bahuṣu prātipadikam vartate tatas bahuvacanam bhavati bahuvacanam tu tatas dṛśyate prodgātṝṇām iti tasmāt nūnam bahūnām camasaḥ iti anumānam pratyakṣam tu ekaḥ udgātā na dvitīyaḥ na tṛtīyaḥ anumānāt ca pratyakṣam kāraṇam balavat bhavet tasmāt ekasya camasaḥ sa ca udgātuḥ iti 
[I,351,ii_I,351,iii]	sarve vā sarva saṃyogāt sarve vā bhakṣayeyuḥ ekasmin udgātari bhakṣayati bahuvacanam pramāda adhītam iti gamyate na hi tat anūdyate na vidhīyate iti nanu sarveṣu api bhakṣayat su udgātṛ śabdaḥ pramādaḥ gamyate ucyate lakṣaṇa arthaḥ api tāvat saṃbhaviṣyati udgātṛ prabhṛtayaḥ iti 
[I,351,iv_I,351,v]	stotra kāriṇām vā tad saṃyogāt bahu śruteḥ ucyate na etat asti bahūnām camasaḥ iti kutas udgātṛ śabdasya camasena saṃbandhaḥ pratyakṣeṇa vākyena bahuvacanasya punar udgātṛ śabdena śrutyā saṃbandhaḥ anyena ṛtvijā tu bahuvacanasya na eva kaścid asti saṃbandhaḥ tasmāt bahūnām camasaḥ iti anupapannam iti atra ucyate śaknoti ayam udgātṛ śabdaḥ bahu tvam vaditum kriyā yogena udnāyanti iti udgātāraḥ ke te prastotā udgātā pratihartā iti tat etena bahuvacana nirdeśena anumānika kriyā yoga nimittaḥ udgātṛ śabdaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti avagamiṣyāmaḥ bahuvacanam hi evam avakḷptam bhaviṣyati udgātṛ śabdaḥ ca tasmāt stotra kāriṇām camasaḥ iti 
[I,352,i_I,352,ii^1]	sarve tu veda saṃyogāt kāraṇāt eka deśaḥ syāt sarve chandogāḥ sahasubrahmaṇyāḥ bhakṣayeyuḥ kim iti gāna saṃyogāt iti na ayam pakṣaḥ upapadyate katham ekaḥ tatra udgānena saṃbandhaḥ itaraḥ gānena anyat dhi gānam anyat udgānam gīti mātram gānam laukikam vaidikam ca dvitīyam sāmnaḥ parva utpūrvasya gāyateḥ abhidheyam prasiddham tatra ekaḥ eva udgītham karoti iti ekaḥ eva udgātā na bahavaḥ tasmāt gāna saṃyogāt bahavaḥ bhaviṣyanti iti etat api na upapadyate katham tarhi veda saṃyogāt audgātram nāma pravacanam tathā audgātrāṇi karmāṇi audgātrasya kartā vā adhyetāḥ vā udgātā iti ucyate katham udgātuḥ karma audgātram iti prasiddham 
[I,352,ii^2_I,353,i]	evam ced vyaktam audgātrasya kartā udgātā iti gamyate yasya udgātā prasiddhaḥ tat viśiṣṭam karma anākhyātam api audgātram iti vadati śabdaḥ ca yasya audgātram prasiddham sa tasya kartāram udgātā iti vadati anākhyātam api yathā yasya udameghaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa tasya anākhyātam api apatyam auda meghiḥ iti brūte yasya oda meghiḥ sa tasya pitaram anākhyātam api uda megham pratipadyate evam audgātra saṃbandhāt upapadyate udgātṛ śabdaḥ prastotā api udgātā api pratihartā api subrahmaṇyaḥ api evam bahuvacanam udgātṛ śabdaḥ ca ubhayam api upapannam bhaviṣyati na ca anyaḥ kaścid doṣaḥ tasmāt audgātreṇa saṃbaddha aśva tvāraḥ udgātṛ camasam bhakṣayeyuḥ iti yatra kāraṇam asti tatra api subrahmaṇyāḥ udgātāraḥ yathā udgātṛ śabdaḥ viniṣadya udgātāraḥ sāmnā stuvate iti stotra kāriṣu tathā idam api vacanam udgātāraḥ na apavyāhareyuḥ uttamāyām eṣa uttamā iti apasubrahmaṇyānām eva 
[I,353,ii_I,353,iii]	grāva stutaḥ bhakṣaḥ na vidyate anāmnānāt jyotiṣṭome grāvaḥ tut nāma hotṛ puruṣaḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim sa somam bhakṣayet na iti ucyate grāvaḥ tut na bakṣayet kutas yatas asya bhakṣam nāmananti hāri yojane camasinām adhikāraḥ iti manyamānaḥ evam ha sma āha na asyām nāyate bhakṣaḥ iti 
[I,353,iv_I,353,v]	hāri yojane vā sarva saṃyogāt hāri yojanasya vā grāvastutam bhakṣayitāram manyāmahe evam hi āmananti yathā camasam anyān camasān camasinaḥ bhakṣayanti atha etasya hāri yojanasya sarve eva lipsante iti yadā hāri yojanasya sarve lipsante tadā grāvaḥ tud api iti 
[I,354,i_I,354,ii]	camasinām vā saṃnidhānāt vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na etat asti grāva stutaḥ hāri yojane bhakṣaḥ iti camasinām tatra adhikāraḥ na sarveṣām katham camasinām eṣa vibhāgaḥ camasinaḥ anyān camasān yathā camasam bhakṣayanti iti anūdya camasinaḥ eva vadati atha etasya hāri yojanasya sarve eva lipsante iti ekam hi idam vākyam atha etasya iti atha śabda prayogāt anantara vṛttam apekṣate atha sarve eva iti eva śabdaḥ sāmarthyāt sarvān pūrva prakṛtān apekṣate atas manyāmahe yathā camasam anyān camasān camasinaḥ bhakṣayanti iti anena pūrveṇa atha etasya hāri yojanasya iti etasya eka vākya tā bhavati iti tena camasinām saṃnihitānām eṣa vibhāgaḥ yathā camasam anyatra hāri yojane tu sarve eva iti 
[I,354,iii_I,354,iv]	sarveṣām tu vidhi tvāt tad arthā camasiśrutiḥ tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na etat asti camasinaḥ eva hāri yojane lipsante iti sarve tu vidhīyante hāri yojane sarve bhakṣayanti iti na punar camasinaḥ iti saṃbandhaḥ śakyate vidhātum dvau hi saṃbandhau asmin vākye apūrvau na śakyete vidhātum tasmāt anyā vacana vyaktiḥ kā punar asau yathā camasam anyān camasān camasinaḥ bhakṣayanti iti anuvādaḥ camasinaḥ camasān bhakṣayanti eva te bhakṣayantaḥ yathā camasam eva atha etasya hāri yojanasya na kevalam camasinaḥ sarve eva iti kim evam bhaviṣyati sarva śabdaḥ ca sarvān vadan na eka deśe kalpitaḥ bhaviṣyati na ca dvau saṃbandhau apūrvau ekasmin vākye bhaviṣyataḥ tasmāt eṣa pakṣaḥ jyāyān iti tad arthāḥ hi eṣā camasiśrutiḥ hāri yojanasya praśāṃsa arthā camasinaḥ kīrtyante hāri yojanam praśaṃsitum katham mahābhāgaḥ hi hāri yojanaḥ yasmāt tatra sarve lipsante anyān camasān ekaikaḥ na te mahābhāgāḥ nyūnāḥ hāri yojanāt iti 
[I,355,i_I,355,ii]	vaṣaṭkārāt ca bhakṣayet atha kim samākhyā eva ekā bhakṣa kāraṇam na iti brūmaḥ vaṣaṭkārāt ca bhakṣayet vaṣaṭkāraḥ ca bhakṣaṇe nimittam katham vacanāt evam hi śrūyate vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathama bhakṣaḥ iti bhakṣaṇasya aprāpta tvāt na prāthami avidhāna arthaḥ eṣa śabdaḥ prāthami aviśiṣṭam bhakṣaṇam eva vidadhāti iti 
[I,355,iii_I,355,iv]	homa abhiṣavābhyām ca aparam api kāraṇam homa abhiṣavau katham havirdhāne grāvabhiḥ abhiṣutya āhavanīye hutvā pratyañcaḥ para iti sadasi bhakṣān bhakṣayanti iti na tāvat eṣa kramaḥ vidhīyate home nirvṛtte tatas bhakṣaṇasya aprāpta tvāt dvayoḥ ca kramayoḥ vidhānāt abhiṣutya hutvā iti vākyam bhidyeta arthena ca prāpta tvāt asya kramasya na hi akṛte prayojane kaścid pratipādanam arhati na ca bhakṣaṇa aṅga bhāvena homa abhiṣavau codyete abhiṣavasya homa artha tvāt homasya ca phala artha tvāt tasmāt dhoma abhiṣavayoḥ kartṝṇām bhakṣaṇam vidhīyate ye abhiṣuṇvanti juhvati ca te bhakṣayanti iti 
[I,356,i_I,356,ii]	pratyakṣa upadeśāt camasānām avyaktaḥ śeṣe idam śrūyate praitu hotuḥ camasaḥ pra brahmaṇaḥ prodgātṝṇām iti tatra saṃdehaḥ camaseṣu homa abhiṣavayoḥ kartāraḥ vaṣaṭkartāraḥ ca kim bhakṣayeyuḥ uta na iti kim prāptam na bhakṣayeyuḥ pratyakṣa upadeśāt camasānām camasinaḥ prati praitu hotuḥ camasaḥ iti evamādibhiḥ viśeṣa vacanaiḥ homa abhiṣava kāriṇām sāmānya vākyena yaḥ somaḥ bhakṣaṇena saṃskartavyaḥ sa camaseṣu camasibhiḥ iti atha idānīm anyat nimittam kva bhaviṣyati avyaktaḥ sāmānya nimittaḥ kva śeṣe bhaviṣyati yatra na cam asinaḥ 
[I,356,iii_I,356,iv]	syāt vā kāraṇa bhāvāt anirdeśaḥ camasānām kartuḥ tad vacana tvāt syāt vā camaseṣu vaṣaṭkartṛ ādīnām bhakṣaḥ prāpyate hi teṣām tatra kāraṇam na ca pratiṣidhyate nanu camasinām pratyakṣa upadeśāt nivarteran ucyate anirdeśaḥ camasānām kartuḥ tad vacana tvāt praitu hotuḥ camasaḥ iti evamādayaḥ śabdāḥ na śaknuvanti vaṣaṭkartṛ ādīn pratiṣeddhum upadeṣṭāraḥ hi te na pratiṣeddhāraḥ tasmāt vaṣaṭkartṛ ādayaḥ api camaseṣu bhakṣayeyuḥ 
[I,357,i_I,357,iii]	camase ca anya darśanāt camase ca anyān camasinaḥ darśayati camasān camasādhvaryave prayacchati tān sa vaṣaṭkartre harati iti ekaḥ hi svaḥ camasaḥ vaṣaṭkartre hriyate tena bahu haraṇa darśanam na avakalpate yadi vaṣaṭkartṛ ādayaḥ na camaseṣu bhakṣayeyuḥ tasmāt bhakṣayanti iti atha yatra ekasmin pātre bahavaḥ bhakṣayanti kaḥ tatra kramaḥ iti ucyate 
[I,357,iv_I,357,v]	eka pātre kramāt adhvaryuḥ pūrvaḥ bhakṣayet tasya hi kramaḥ bhakṣayitum yasya haste somaḥ 
[I,357,vi_I,357,vii]	hotā vā mantra varṇāt hotā vā pūrvaḥ bhakṣayet mantra varṇāt mantra varṇaḥ hi tathā hotuḥ cit pūrve haviḥ adyam āśata iti tathā hotā iva naḥ prathamaḥ pāhi iti 
[I,357,viii_I,357,ix]	vacanāt ca vacanam idam bhavati vaṣaṭkartuḥ prathama bhakṣaḥ iti vacanam eva idam na mantavyam aneka guṇa vidhānāt avivakṣitam prāthamyam iti aprāpta tvāt prāthamyasya na ayam anuvādaḥ vidhiḥ eva samāsena ca vidadhataḥ na aneka guṇa vidhānam duṣkaram 
[I,358,i_I,358,ii]	kāraṇa ānupūrvyāt ca pratham hi vaṣaṭkaraṇam nimittam hotuḥ tatas homaḥ adhvaryoḥ nimittam nimitta ānupūrvyāt ca naimittika ānupūrvye krama anurodhaḥ 
[I,358,iii_I,358,vi]	vacanāt anujñāta bhakṣaṇam atha yaḥ eka pātre somaḥ anekena bhakṣyate kim tatra anujñāpya ananujñāpya vā bhakṣayitavyam uta anujñāpya eva iti lāghavāt aniyamaḥ prāptaḥ ucyate anujñāpya bhakṣayitavyam iti kasmāt vacanāt idam vacanam bhavati tasmāt somaḥ na anupahūtena peyaḥ iti upahvānam ca anujñāpanam prāpti sūtram etat atha anujñātena bhakṣayitavyam iti sthite kim laukikena vacanena anujñāpayitavyam uta vaidikena iti aniyamāt laukikena iti prāptaḥ ucyate 
[I,358,vii_I,358,viii]	tad upahūtaḥ upahūyasva iti anena anujñāpayet liṅgāt anujñāpana liṅgaḥ ayam mantraḥ liṅgāt anujñāpane samāmnātaḥ sāmarthyāt vinijujyate tatra kṛte arthe laukikaḥ nivartate 
[I,359,i_I,359,ii]	tatra arthāt prativacanam etat avagatam tad upahūtaḥ upahūyasva iti anena anujñāpayet iti atha prativacane saṃdehaḥ kim laukikam prativacanam uta etat eva iti kim prāptam etat vaidikam praśne viniyuktam laukikam anyat prativacanam bhavitaum arhati evam prāpte brūmaḥ tatra etat eva prativacanam iti 
[I,359,iii]	nanu praśna liṅgam etat upahūyasva iti ucyate yat asya pūrvam upahūtaḥ iti prativacanasya samartham tat prativacana kārye baviṣyati āha viparītam etat samāmnānam pūrvam hi praśnena bhavitavyam tatas prativacanena ucyate arthāt pūrvam prativacana kārye bhaviṣyati arthaḥ hi kramāt balīyān iti 
[I,359,iv_I,359,v]	tad eka pātrāṇām samavāyāt idam saṃdihyate kim yaḥ kaścid anujñāpayitavyaḥ uta samāna pātraḥ iti aviśeṣa abhidhānāt yaḥ kaścid iti prāptaḥ ucyate tat khalu anujñāpanam eka pātrāṇām syāt kutas anujñāpanam iha aṅgam anujñāpanasya ca etat rūpam yatra anyena kartavyam anyaḥ cikīrṣet saḥ anumanyasva iti brūte saha bhojana ādi vā ācaritu kāmaḥ cittam anyasya anukūlayati tat etat nānā pātreṣu na eva saṃbhavati na hi tatra anyena kartavyam anyaḥ vā cikīrṣati iti saha bhojana ādau vā padārthe saṃmānayati eka pātre tu some sādhāraṇe saṃskartavye nyāyena samaḥ vibhāgaḥ prāpnoti tatra avibhajya pīyamāne kadācid anyena pātavyam anyaḥ pibet tatra anujñāpanam saṃbhavati tvayā ardham pātavyam mayā ardham kadācid aham abhyādhikam nyūnam vā pibeyam tat anujñātum arhasi iti eka pātre vā pānam tvayā saha ācaran aham tava citta prasādānam vyāhanyām iti saṃbhavati anujñāpanā tasmāt eka pātreṣu eva etat syāt iti
