[I,360,i_I,360,ii]	yājya apanayena apanītaḥ bhakṣaḥ pravara vat asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ tatra ṛtu yāgeṣu śrūyate yajamānasya yājyā saḥ abhipreṣyati hotar etat yaja iti svayam yā niṣpadya yajati iti yadā svayam yajati tadā saṃdehaḥ kim asya bhakṣaḥ asti na asti iti tat ucyate yājyāyām apanīyamānāyām na apanīyeta bhakṣaṇam hotuḥ eva tu bhakṣaṇam syāt na yajamānasya iti kutas anyā hi yājyā anyat bhakṣaṇam na ca anyasmin apanīyamāne anyat apanīyate yathā tasyām eva yājyāyām apanīyamānāyām pravaraḥ na apanīyate tadvat etat api iti 
[I,360,iii]	nanu yājyāyāḥ adhi vaṣaṭkaroti iti yatra yājyā tatra vaṣaṭkāraḥ yatra vaṣaṭkāraḥ tatra bhakṣaṇam api iti na iti ucyate na tāvat yājyāyām avayava bhūtaḥ vaṣaṭkāraḥ yena yājyā agrahaṇena asau gṛhyeta yat tu tasyāḥ adhi vaṣaṭkaroti iti anyena api prayujyamānāyāḥ upari hotā vaṣaṭkariṣyati yājya apanayaḥ hi vacanāt na vaṣaṭkāra apanayaḥ yāvat vacanam vācanikam bhavati eva vacanam hi tad viṣayam eva 
[I,351,i_I,351,iii]	yaṣṭuḥ vā kāraṇa āgamāt yaṣṭuḥ vā bhakṣaḥ syāt kutas kāraṇa āgamāt bhakṣasya kāraṇam vaṣaṭkāraḥ sa ca yājyāyām āgacchantyām āgacchati evam hi śrūyate yājyāyāḥ adhi vaṣaṭkaroti iti nanu etat uktam yajamānena api prayujyamānāyām hotā adhi vaṣaṭkaroti iti na eṣa samādhiḥ anavāna tā yaṣṭavyam vaṣaṭkāreṇa yāgaḥ kriyate na yājyām atreṇa tasmāt ā vaṣaṭkārān na āvānitavyam yajamānena anyaḥ ced vaṣaṭkuryāt avānyāt yajamānaḥ na ca yajeta yaṣṭavye ca asau codyate na yājyā mātra vacane svayam nipadya yajati iti sa aṅgasya niṣadya yāge vidhānāt 
[I,351,iv_I,351,v]	pravṛtta tvāt pravarasya anapāyaḥ atha yat uktam yathā pravaraḥ na apanīyate evam bhakṣaḥ api iti ucyate aśakya tvāt pravaraḥ na apanīyate atikrāntaḥ hi sa katham apanīyeta hotuḥ bhraṣṭe ca avasare anuṣṭhīyamānaḥ yajamānasya viguṇaḥ syāt na ca viguṇaḥ kathaṃcid artham sādhayet na atra ca udakena prāpnoti atha ucyate yat śakyam tat ca udakena prāpitam yat na śakyam na tat prāpitam iti prakṛtiḥ iyam apūrvasya atra vidhānam yādṛśam uktam tādṛśam yadi śakyate kartavyam yadi na śakyate yatra eva śakyate tatra eva kāryam na yatra viguṇam iti tasmāt pravarasya anapāyaḥ yuktaḥ na bhakṣasya iti 
[I,362,i_I,362,ii]	phala camasaḥ naimittikaḥ bhakṣa vikāraḥ śruti saṃyogāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate sa yadi rājanyam vā vaiṣyam vā yājayet sa yadi somam vibhakṣayiṣet nyagrodhastibhīḥ āhṛtya tāḥ saṃpiṣya dadhani unmṛjya tam asmai bhakṣam prayacchet na somam iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim phala camasaḥ bhakṣa vikāraḥ uta ijyā vikāraḥ iti kim phala camasam bhakṣayet iti arthaḥ uta phala camasena yajeta iti kim prāptam phala camasaḥ naimittikaḥ bhakṣa vikāraḥ bhakṣaṇena hi śrutena eka vākya tā bhavati iti tasmai bhakṣam prayacchet iti na tena yajeta iti śabdaḥ asti tasmāt bhakṣa vikāraḥ 
[I,362,iii_I,362,iv]	ijyā vikāraḥ vā saṃskārasya tad artha tvāt ijyā vikāraḥ vā phala camasaḥ phala camasena yajeta iti arthaḥ katham yat etat bhakṣaṇam etat soma saṃskāra artham phala camasya api yadi bhakṣaṇam phala camasa saṃskāra artham phala camasasya anyatra anupayogāt anarthakam atha bhakṣaṇam pradhānam tathā na somam iti anuvādaḥ na avakalpate yadi tu ijyā vikāraḥ bhavet tatas phala camasa saṃskāraḥ avakalpate tasmāt ijyā vikāraḥ 
[I,363,i]	āha katham yaji saṃbandhe asati ijyā vikāraḥ bhaviṣyati iti ucyate asti yaji saṃbandhaḥ katham iti yadi rājanyam vā vaiṣyam vā yājayet nyagrodhasti bhīḥ saṃpiṣya tam asmai bhakṣam prayacchet yājayitum iti gamyate bhakṣa saṃbandhe hi na pūrvam uttareṇa saṃbadhyate yadi somam bhakṣaṇena saṃskartum icchet nyagrodhastibhīḥ saṃskuryāt iti tasmāt na bhakṣaṇa saṃbandhaḥ yāgaḥ hi prakṛtaḥ asti tena saha saṃbhantsyate na doṣaḥ bhaviṣyati 
[I,363,ii]	nanu tasmai bhakṣam prayacchet iti vacanāt bhakṣa sādhanam iti gamyate na yāga sādhanam iti bhakṣa śabda anantaryāt ucyate śrūyamāṇe saṃbandhe anarthakam iti kṛtvā prakṛta saṃbandhaḥ iti ucyate katham tu bhakṣa saṃbandhaḥ iti yat dhi yāga dravyam bhakṣayitavyam tat ca udakena bhavati tasmāt bhakṣa saṃbandham labhate bhakṣa saṃbandhena ca yāga saṃbandhaḥ eva lakṣyate yadi tena ijyate tatas sa bhakṣaḥ bhavati tasmāt bhakṣa vacanāt sutarām tena ijyate iti gamyate sā eṣā vyavadhāraṇa kalpanā tasmai bhaksam prayacchet tam asmai bhakṣam kuryāt iti arthaḥ yathā sa bhakṣaḥ bhavati tathā kuryāt iti yadi ca tena ijyate tatas ayam bhakṣaḥ bhavati tasmāt tena yaṣṭavyam iti 
[I,363,iii_I,363,iv]	homāt homa viśeṣa vacanam bhavati yadā anyān camasān juhvati atha etasya darbha taruṇakena upahatya juhoti iti ijyā vikāre sati darbha taruṇakena iti juhotau guṇa vacanam avakalpate tasmāt api ijya avikāraḥ 
[I,364,i_I,364,ii]	camasaiḥ ca tulya kāla tvāt yadā anyān ca amasān unnayanti atha enam camasam unnayanti iti ijyā vikāre sati unnayana darśanam yujyate na bhakṣa vikāre tasmāt api ijya avikāraḥ 
[I,364,iii_I,364,iv]	liṅga darśanāt ca itas ca paśyāmaḥ ijyā vikāraḥ iti kutas liṅga darśanāt kim liṅgam bhavati soma pratiṣedha anuvādaḥ tasmai bhakṣam prayacchet na somam iti ijyā vikāre sati somaḥ na bhakṣyate tasmāt paśyāmaḥ ijyā vikāraḥ iti 
[I,364,v_I,364,vi]	anuprasarpiṣu sāmānyāt asti rājasūye daśa peyaḥ tatra śrūyate śatam brāhmaṇāḥ somān bhakṣayanti daśa daśa ekaika camasam anuprasarpanti iti atra rājanyacamase saṃdehaḥ kim tam rājanyāḥ anuprasarpeyuḥ uta brāhmaṇāḥ iti kim prāptam rāji anyāḥ iti katham daśa daśa ekaikam camasam anuprasarpeyuḥ iti anuprasarpatām saṃkhyā vidhīyate ekasyām rājanya jātau daśa saṃkhyā vidhīyate rājanya jātiḥ sā eva tena tam daśa rājanyāḥ anuprasarpeyuḥ evam śatam brāhmaṇāḥ rājanyāḥ ca teṣu śata śabdaḥ anuvādaḥ anuvāda sarūpaḥ ca śatam bhakṣayanti iti tasmāt rājanyāḥ rājan yacamasam anuprasarpeyuḥ iti kecid āhuḥ brāhmaṇa rājanyānām ekasmin camase bhakṣaṇam virudhyate iti na sa doṣaḥ na hi somena ucchiṣṭāḥ bhavanti iti śrūyate 
[I,365,i_I,365,ii]	brāhmaṇāḥ vā tulya śabda tvāt brāhmaṇāḥ vā rājan yacamasam anuprasarpeyuḥ katham śatam brāhmaṇāḥ somam bhakṣayanti iti vidhiḥ śrutyā brāhmaṇa gatām eva saṃkhyām āha tasmāt śatam brāhmaṇāḥ teṣām bhakṣaṇa artham anuprasarpatām ekaikasmin camase daśa daśa upadiśyante tasmāt brāhmaṇa aśatasya daśa brāhmaṇāḥ rājan yacamasam anuprasarpeyuḥ iti 
[I,366,i_I,366,ii]	sarva artham aprakaraṇāt anārabhya kiṃcid ucyate yasya khādiraḥ sruvaḥ bhavati sa chadasām eva rasena avadyati sarasāḥ asya āhutayaḥ bhavanti yasya parṇa mayī juhūḥ bhavati na sa pāpam ślokam śṛṇoti iti evamādi tatra saṃdehaḥ kim khādira tā sruve pālāśa tā juhvām prakṛtau niviśate uta prakṛtau vikṛtau ca iti kim prāptam sarva artham aprakaraṇāt prakṛti vikṛti artham evaṃjātīyakam kutas aprakaraṇāt na kasyacid prakaraṇe śrūyante tāni vākyena sarvatra bhaveyuḥ iti 
[I,366,iii_I,366,iv]	prakṛtau vādvirukta tvāt prakṛtau vā niviśeran anārabhya adhītāni pātrāṇi kutas advirukta tvāt evam adviruktam bhaviṣyati iti dvis uktāyām kaḥ doṣaḥ asaṃbhavaḥ iti brūmaḥ yat dhi prakṛtau vikṛtau ca bhavati asti tat prakṛtau prakṛtau ced asti ca udakena eva vikṛtim prāpnoti tatas nānā ārabhya vidhim ākāṅkṣati tasmāt anākāṅkṣita tvāt anārabhyavidhiḥ na tatra vidadhāti tena brūmaḥ prakṛti arthaḥ eva iti 
[I,366,v_I,366,vi]	tat varjantu vacana prāpte aprakaraṇāt prakṛti vikṛti artham eva iti ucyate yat tu ca udakena prāpnoti iti anārabhya vidhinā prāpte na ca udakam ākāṅkṣati tasmāt anārabhya vidhi varjam ca udakaḥ prāpayiṣyati anārabhya vidhi vākyena pratyakṣeṇa sruve khādira tā ca udaka vākyena anumānikena vikṛtau ānumānikāt ca pratyakṣam balavat tasmāt prakṛti vikṛti arthaḥ anārabhya vidhiḥ 
[I,367,i_I,367,ii]	darśanāt iti ced yadi anārabhyavidhiḥ ca udakāt balīyān anārabhya vidhinā prāpte na ca udakam ākāṅkṣati nirākāṅkṣe vaikṛte karmaṇi ca udakaḥ na eva prāpnoti tatra prayāja ādīnām darśanam na eva upapadyeta dṛśyante ca prayāja ādayaḥ kvacid prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalam juhoti iti atha ca udakaḥ balīyān tatas etad darśanam upapadyate tasmāt prakṛti arthaḥ anārabhya vidhiḥ 
[I,367,iii_I,367,iv]	na codana eka arthyāt na prakṛti arthaḥ sarva arthaḥ iti brūmaḥ aprakaraṇe samāmnānāt yat uktam anārabhya vidhinā nirākāṅkṣasya na ca udakaḥ iti tat na upapadyate na hi anārabhyavidhiḥ codanām nirākāṅkṣīkaroti prāpte hi ca udake na sruve khādira tāna ārabhya vidhinā śakyā vidhātum asati ca udake anārabhyavidhiḥ api na asti na ca anārabhya vidhiḥ sruvam prāpayati tasya ca khādira tām kutas codana eka arthyāt eka arthāḥ hi codanā yasya khādiraḥ sruvaḥ bhavati iti na ca atra sruvaḥ khādira tā ca ubhayam vidhīyate sruvasya sataḥ khādira tām eṣa śabdaḥ āha sa ca ca udakena prāptaḥ tasmāt asti ca udakaḥ sa hi anārabhya vidhi vākyasya pratyakṣa tvāt tam varjayitvā anyam prāpayati tasmāt prakṛti vikṛti arthaḥ anārabhya vidhiḥ 
[I,368,i_I,368,ii]	utpattiḥ iti ced iti ced paśyasi utpattiḥ eṣām prakṛti vidhibhiḥ tulyā prakṛtau aṅgāni saṃkṣepeṇa vistareṇa ca ucyante pañca prayājān yacati iti saṃkṣepeṇa samidhaḥ yajati iti evamādinā vistareṇa iha api yasya khādiraḥ sruvaḥ bhavati iti evamādiḥ vistāraḥ yasya evaṃrūpāḥ sruvaḥ iti saṃkṣepaḥ evaṃrūpaḥ prakṛtau vidhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ayam api evaṃrūpaḥ tasmāt prākṛtaḥ iti sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa anumānam tasmāt prakṛti arthaḥ anārabhyavidhiḥ iti 
[I,368,iii_I,368,iv]	na tulya tvāt na etat evam na hi evaṃjātīyakam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam sādhakam bhavati kevalam atra prākṛta vidhi sārūpyam na tu prakṛtau etat bhavati iti pramāṇam asti api ca vikṛtau api saṃkṣepa vistārābhyām aṅgāni vidhīyante tisraḥ āhutīḥ juhoti iti saṃkṣepaḥ āmanam asya āmanasya devāḥ iti vistāraḥ atas vaikṛtaiḥ api anārabhya vidhayaḥ tulyāḥ tasmāt ayam ahetuḥ prakṛti niveśasya 
[I,368,v_I,369,i]	codanā arthakārtsnyāt tu mukhya vipratiṣedhāt prakṛti arthaḥ tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na sarva arthaḥ anārabhya vidhiḥ prakṛti arthaḥ saḥ iti brūmaḥ kutas codanā arthakārtsnyāt kṛtsnam ca udakaḥ prāpayati nānā rabhya vidhinā vaikṛtam apūvam nirākāṅkṣam pātrāṇām hi tat vākyena na yāgānām yāgāḥ codanā liṅga saṃyogāt prakṛtim apekṣante tayā saha eka vākya tām yānti prākṛtāḥ ca tān śaknavanti nirākāṅkṣīkartum nānā ārabhya vidhayaḥ tasmāt avaśyam ca udakaḥ utpādayitavyaḥ sa ced utpādyate na arthaḥ anārabhya vidhinā na ca asau prakaraṇa ādīnām abhāvāt pravartamānaḥ api vaikṛtena yāgena saṃbadhyeta tasmāt vaikṛtena karmaṇā nānā rabhya vidhiḥ saṃbadhyate tasya vaikṛtasya mukhyasya anārabhyavidhiḥ vākya śeṣaḥ prakṛtau vā iti vipratiṣedhe ca udaka sāmarthyāt prākṛte vākya śeṣe prāpte anārabhya vidhiḥ na bhaviṣyati tasmāt anārabhyavidhiḥ prakṛti arthaḥ iti 
[I,369,ii_I,369,iii]	prakaraṇa viśeṣāt tu vikṛtau virodhi syāt anārabhya kiṃcid sāmidhenīnām parimāṇam āmnātam saptadaśa sāmidhenīḥ anubrūyāt iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim etat prakṛtau uta vikṛtau iti kim prāptam pūrveṇa nyāyena prakṛtau iti prāptam prakṛtau ca pāñcadaśyam āmnātam tena vikalpaḥ iti 
[I,369,iv]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ vikṛtau evaṃjātīyakaḥ vidhiḥ syāt kasmāt prakṛteḥ pāñcadaśyena nirākāṅkṣa tvāt nanu vikalpaḥ bhavaiṣyati iti uktam prakaraṇa viśeṣāt pāñcadaśyena na vikalpaḥ viṣama śāsanāt vikṛtau tu ānumānikam pāñcadaśyam bādhitvā anārabhya vidhi vākyena pratyakṣeṇa sāptadaśyam nivekṣyate adviruktam ca etat prayoga vacanam upasaṃhariṣyati tasmāt evaṃjātīyakam vikṛti artham 
[I,370,i_I,370,ii]	naimittakam tu prakṛtau tad vikāraḥ saṃyoga viśeṣāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ āmnātam go dohanena paśu kāmasya praṇayet iti tathā agnīṣomīye paśau śrūyate yūpam prakṛtya bailvaḥ brahmavarcaskāmena kartavyaḥ iti evaṃjātīyakeṣu saṃdehaḥ kim prakṛtau niveśaḥ vikṛtau vā iti kim prāptam vikṛtau iti prakṛtīḥ anyena pātreṇa yūpena ca nirākāṅkṣāḥ evam prāpte brūmaḥ prakṛtau naimittikam niviśate nimitta saṃyogena vidhānāt khādira pālāśa rauhitakāḥ aviśeṣeṇa uktāḥ camasaḥ ca go dohanam bailvaḥ ca viśeṣa vihitau viśeṣa vidhinā ca aviśeṣa vidhiḥ bādhyate prakaraṇam sāmānyam nimitta saṃyogaḥ viśeṣaḥ sāmānyena yat prāpnoti tat parokṣam lakṣaṇayā yat tu viśeṣeṇa tat pratyakṣam śrutyā śrutiḥ ca lakṣaṇāyāḥ balīyasī pratyakṣam ca parokṣāt tasmāt prakṛtau eva syāt 
[I,370,iii_I,370,iv]	iṣṭi artham agnyādheyam prakaraṇāt santi pavamāna iṣṭayaḥ agnaye pavamānāya aṣṭākapālam nirvapet agnaye pāvakāya agnaye śucayaḥ iti tāsām prakaraṇe samāmnātam brāhmaṇaḥ vasante agnim ādadhīta iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim agnyādheyam pavamāna iṣṭi artham uta na iti kim prāptam iṣṭi artham iti kutas prakaraṇāt tāsām prakaraṇe śrūyate atas tad artham 
[I,371,i_I,371,ii]	na vā tāsām tad artha tvāt pavamāna iṣṭayaḥ hi agni arthāḥ yadi agniḥ iṣṭi arthaḥ syāt tatas tad artham agnyādheyam iṣṭīnām upakuryāt niṣphalāḥ tu iṣṭayaḥ tad artham agni ādheyam api niṣphalam syāt katham punar agni artha tā pavamāna iṣṭīnām niṣprayojana tvāt eva prayojanavat tvāt ca agnīnām bhāvayitavyāḥ api iṣṭayaḥ bhūtānām agnīnām arthena kriyeran tasmāt agnyādheyam pavamāna iṣṭi artham 
[I,371,iii_I,371,iv]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam darśayati yathā agni arthāḥ pavamāna iṣṭayaḥ iti kim liṅgam jīryati vai eṣaḥ āhitaḥ paśuḥ yat agniḥ tat etāni eva agnyādheyasya havīṃṣi saṃvatsare nirvapet tena vai eṣa na jīryati tena enam punar navam karoti tat na sūkṣmam iti 
[I,371,v_I,371,vi]	tad prakṛti artham yathā anyena ārabhya vādāḥ tat etat ādhānam kim prakṛti artham uta sarva karma artham iti saṃdehaḥ kim prāptam ucyate tat prakṛti artham katham yathā anye anārabhyavādāḥ prakṛti arthāḥ tena eva hetunā 
[I,371,vii_I,371,viii]	sarva artham vā ādhānasya sva kāla tvāt sarva karma artham vā ādhānam kaḥ arthaḥ sarva karma artham yat agni dravyam tad artham ādhānam na prakṛti artham na prakṛtīḥ prakṛtya śrūyate na ca śruti ādayaḥ asya santi ye aṅga bhāvam upapādayanti anyeṣu anārabhyavādeṣu anyatas nirjñāte aṅga bhāve tatas vicāraḥ kim prakṛteḥ aṅga bhūtāni vikṛteḥ iti tasmāt teṣu yuktam iha tu aṅga bhāve na kāraṇam asti tasmāt agni prayuktam ādhānam na karma prayuktam sarva karma arthāḥ agnayaḥ iti sarva artham iti ucyate 
[I,372,i]	api ca asya svatas kālaḥ vidhīyate sa na vidhātavyaḥ yadā jyotiṣṭomasya prayogaḥ tadā idam kartavyam tadā ca vasantaḥ evam yadā darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ prayogaḥ tadā kartavyam tadā paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā vā aprakṛti artham tu na prakṛti prayoge kriyeta tatra kāla vacanam yuktam tasmāt na prakṛti artham 
[I,372,ii_I,372,iii]	tāsām agniḥ prakṛtitaḥ prayāja vat syāt santi pavamāna iṣṭavyaḥ agnaye pavamānāya iti evamādyāḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim pavamāna iṣṭi saṃskṛte agnau pavamāna iṣṭayaḥ kartavyāḥ uta na iti kim prāptam tāsām khalu pavamāna iṣṭīnām pavamāna iṣṭi saṃskṛtaḥ agniḥ prakṛtitaḥ syāt kutas ca udaka sāmarthyāt prayāja vat yathāsu prayājāḥ bhavanti ca udakena evam pavamāna iṣṭi saṃskṛtāḥ agnayaḥ api bhaveyuḥ 
[I,372,iv_I,372,v]	na vā tāsām tad artha tvāt na veṣṭi saṃskāraḥ agnīnām pavamāna iṣṭiṣu syāt kasmāt tāsām tad artha tvāt tāḥ pavamāna iṣṭayaḥ agni saṃskāra arthāḥ iti uktam yat ca nāma aṅga bhūtam tat ca udakena gṛhyate agni prayuktaḥ ca pavamāna iṣṭi saṃskāraḥ na darśa pūrṇamāsa prayuktaḥ tena na ca udakena ākṛṣyate api ca pavamāna iṣṭayaḥ iṣṭi saṃskāra varjitām prakṛtim apekṣante avihita tvāt tasyām avasthāyām pavam āpana iṣṭīnām 
[I,373,i_I,373,ii]	tulyaḥ sarveṣām paśu vidhiḥ prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt jyotiṣṭome paśuḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yat agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhate iti tathā savanīyaḥ anubandhyaḥ ca santi ca paśu dharmāḥ upākaraṇam upānayanam akṣayāḥ bandhaḥ yūpe niyojanam saṃjñapanam viśasanam iti evamādayaḥ te kim sarveṣām agnīṣomīyasavanīya anubandhyānām uta agnīṣomīyasya savanīyasya vā uta agniṣomīyasya eva iti kim prāptam aviśeṣat sarva paśūnām katham aviśeṣaḥ jyotiṣṭoma prakaraṇe sarve paśavaḥ samāmnātāḥ tad prakaraṇa āpanna tvāt sarve paśu dharmāḥ saṃbadhyante na ca eṣām tatra kaścid viśeṣaḥ 
[I,373,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ savanīyasya ete dharmāḥ bhaveyuḥ tulyaḥ sarveṣām paśu vidhiḥ syāt yadi prakaraṇe viśeṣaḥ na bhavet bhavati tu prakaraṇe viśeṣaḥ savanīyānām prakaraṇe paśu dharmāḥ samāmnātāḥ āgneyaḥ paśuḥ agniṣṭomaḥ ālabhyaḥ āgneyaḥ hi agniṣṭomaḥ aindrāgnaḥ paśuḥ ukthyaḥ ālabhyaḥ aindrāgnāni hi ukthyāni aindraḥ vṛṣṇiḥ ṣoḍaśini ālabhyaḥ aindraḥ vai vṛṣṇiḥ aindraḥ ṣoḍaśī sārasvatī meṣi atirātraḥ ālabhyā vāc vai sarasvatī iti prakṛtya paśudharmāḥ āmnātāḥ tasmāt savanīyasya prakaraṇāt bhavitum arhati 
[I,374,i_I,374,ii]	sthānāt ca pūrvasya yat uktam prakaraṇāt savanīya arthāḥ iti etat gṛhṇīmaḥ kramāt ca agnīṣomīyasya tasya hi kramaḥ aupavasathye ahani samāmnātam tasmāt dvayoḥ api iti 
[I,374,iii_I,374,iv]	śvas tu ekeṣām tatra prāk śrutiḥ guṇa arthā ekeṣām śākhinām śvas savanīyānām āmnānam tat apekṣyeyam eṣām guṇa arthā punar śrutiḥ kaḥ punar guṇaḥ yat arthā eṣā śrutiḥ ucyate paśūn saṃkīrtya yathā vai matsyaḥ aviditaḥ janam avadhu nute evam vā ete aprajñāyamānāḥ janam avadhunvate iti eṣām avijñāne doṣam abhidhāya ebhiḥ katham savanāni paśumanti iti praśna rūpakeṇa vapā pracāraḥ guṇaḥ vidhīyate tat arthā eṣā śrutiḥ vapā pracāreṇa eka vākya tvāt kim atas yadi evam na savanīyānām prakaraṇena paśu dharmāḥ kramāt agnīṣomīya arthāḥ eva iti kim punar tat śvaḥ āmnānam āśvinam graham gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpam parivīya āgnā iyam savanīya paśum upākaroti iti 
[I,374,v_I,374,vi]	tena utkṛṣṭasya kāla vidhiḥ iti ced na etat asti kramāt agnīṣomīya arthāḥ eva iti prakaraṇāt savanīya arthāḥ pūrvedyus eva āmnānam vidhāna artham āśvina vākyam kālaguṇa vidhāna artham katham tena vapā pracāreṇa ukṛṣṭasya kālaḥ eṣa vidhīyate prātaḥsavane vapā pracāre codite sati paśu ālambhaḥ api tatra eva prapnoti tatra kāla aniyame prāpte āśvinam graham gṛhītvā iti kāla mātram vidhīyate trivṛtā yūpam parivīya upākaroti iti anuvādaḥ itarathāḥ hi parivyāṇasya kālaḥ vidhīyeta upākaraṇasya ca tatra aneka guṇa vidhānāt vākyam bhidyeta tasmāt savanīya arthāḥ paśu dharmā iti 
[I,375,i_I,375,ii]	na eka deśa tvāt na etat evam agnīṣomīya arthāḥ eva ete kramāt āśvina kālam hi āmnānam vidhāna artham guṇa arthaḥ etasmin vākyam bhidyeta na vidhāna arthe na hi vapā pracāreṇa utkṛṣṭasya kāla vidhiḥ saṃbhavati eka deśaḥ hi vapā dravyam tena saṃnipātinaḥ vapā saṃskārāt utkarṣet na upākaraṇam 
[I,375,iii_I,375,iv]	arthena iti ced āha arthena tarhi utkṛṣṭasya kālaḥ vidhīyate muṣṭinā pidhāya vapa uddharaṇam āsīta ā vapā homāt iti śrūyate pūrvedyus vapa uddharaṇam muṣṭinā pidhāya na śaknuyāt etāvantam kālam āsīnena avasthātum avaśyam āhāra vihāra ādayaḥ tena kartavyāḥ iti 
[I,375,v_I,375,vi]	na śruti vipratiṣedhāt na etat evam śruti vipratiṣedhaḥ bhavet evam na ca śruti vipratiṣedhaḥ tṛṇa muṣṭinā parṇa muṣṭinā vā pidhāyiṣyate nanu āste iti upaveśane bhavati na avaśyam upaveśanaḥ eva audāsīnye api dṛśyate tat yathā gṛhyāṇi parigṛhya āḥ te kṣetrāṇi parigṛhya aste iti anupadeśane api bhavati vyāpāra nivṛttau iha api tṛṇa muṣṭinā parṇa muṣṭinā vā pidhāya ā vapā homāt udāsiṣyate tasmāt āśvina kālam āmnānam vidhāna artham na savanīyānām prakaraṇe paśu dharmāḥ tasmāt na savanīya arthāḥ 
[I,376,i_I,376,ii]	sthānāt tu pūrvasya saṃskārasya tat artha tvāt na asti savanīyānām prakaraṇam iti evam sati pūrveṇa eva hetunā sthānena pūrvasya agnīṣomīyasya bhavitum arhati saṃskāraḥ ayam paśu yāga prayuktaḥ na jyotiṣṭoma prayuktaḥ jyotiṣṭoma prayukta tve na viśeṣaḥ paśūnām syāt paśu yāgāḥ api hi dharmān prayoktum apūrva tvāt samarthāḥ prakaraṇavantaḥ ca tasmāt kramāt agnīṣomīya dharmāḥ iti 
[I,376,iii_I,376,iv]	liṅga darśanāt ca itas ca paśyāmaḥ agnīṣomīya ārtāḥ paśu dharmā iti kutas liṅga darśanāt liṅgam asmin arthe bhavati vapayā prātaḥsavane caranti puroḍāśena mādhyaṃdine savanaḥ iti paśu puroḍāśam darśayati itarathā samāna vidhāneṣu sarveṣu paśuṣu agnīṣomayoḥ devatayoḥ saṃskāra arthaḥ san puroḍāśaḥ sāmarthyāt agnīṣomīyasya bhavet na savanīyasya tayoḥ devatayoḥ abhāvāt darśayati ca tasmāt agnīṣomīya arthāḥ iti 
[I,376,v_I,376,vi]	acodanā guṇa arthena idam pada uttaram sūtram āha nanu chidra apidhāna arthaḥ paśu puroḍāśaḥ na iti brūmaḥ acodanā guṇa arthena tasya chidra apidhāna arthena na codanā artha vādaḥ saḥ iti uktam tasmāt devatā saṃskāra arthaḥ tasmāt agnīṣomīya artha tve savanīye puroḍāśasya darśanam upapadyate na sādhāraṇye tasmāt agnīṣomīya arthāḥ paśu dharmā iti 
[I,377,i_I,377,ii]	dohayoḥ kāla bhedāt asaṃyuktam śṛtam syāt asti sāyaṃdohaḥ tathā asti prātar dohaḥ santi tu doha dharmāḥ śākhā haraṇam gavām prasthāpanam prasāvanam go dohanam iti evamādayaḥ te kim sāyaṃdoha arthāḥ uta ubhaya arthāḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam dohayoḥ tayoḥ asaṃyuktam dharmaiḥ śṛtam bhavet kasmāt sāyaṃdohasya hi kramaḥ aupavasathye ahani śākhā āharaṇa ādīn samāmananti tasmin eva ahani sāyaṃdohaḥ tasmāt kramāt sāyaṃdoha arthāḥ doha dharmā iti 
[I,377,iii_I,377,iv]	prakaraṇa avibhāgāt vā tad saṃyuktasya kāla śāstram prakaraṇam hi sādhāraṇam yathā eva dadhnaḥ evam payasaḥ kramāt ca prakaraṇam balavattaram tasmāt ubhaya arthāḥ doha dharmāḥ api ca na sāyaṃdohasya pūrvedyus āmnānam kva tarhi uttaredyus katham evam āmananti aindram dadhi amāvāsyāyām aindram payaḥ amāvāsyāyām iti amāvāsyāyām hi ubhayam sāṅgam codyate saḥ eṣa sāyaṃdohaḥ arthāt pūrvedyus anuṣṭhīyate svabhāvaḥ eṣa dadhnaḥ yat pūrvedyus upakrāntam aparedyus abhinirvartate tasmāt sāyaṃdohasya kramaḥ āmātā iti etat eva tāvat na asti atas ubhaya arthāḥ doha dharmā iti 
[I,377,v_I,377,vi]	tadvat savana antare grahāmnānam asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti tatra aindra vāya vādyāḥ grahāḥ prātaḥsavane daśe āmnātāḥ tatra dharmāḥ śrūyante upopte anye grahāḥ sādi ante anupopte dhruvāḥ daśā pavitreṇa graham samārṣṭi iti santi apare mādhyaṃdine savane apare tṛtīyasavane grahāḥ teṣu mādhyaṃdinīyeṣu tārtīyeṣu ca savaneṣu saṃdehaḥ kim sarveṣu graha dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ uta prātaḥsavane ye grahāḥ teṣu iti kim prāptam prātaḥsavana graheṣu bhaveyuḥ teṣām hi krame samāmnānāt na itareṣām evam prāpte brūmaḥ savana antare prātaḥsavanāt mādhyaṃdine tṛtīyasavane ca grahāmnānam tadvat eva bhavitum arhati sarveṣām hi tulyam prakaraṇam yatra ete dharmāḥ samāmnātāḥ vākyena graha mātrasya vidhīyante kramāt ca vākya prakaraṇe balīyasī tasmāt sarva arthāḥ graha dharmāḥ iti 
[I,378,i_I,378,ii]	raśanā ca liṅga darśanāt asti jyotiṣṭome paśuḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yat agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhate iti tatra raśanā śrūyate raśanā dharmāḥ ca trivṛt bhavati darbha mayī bhavati prapiṣṭānām kartavyā ca iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ete dharmāḥ agnīṣomīya raśanāyāḥ savanīya raśanāyāḥ ca sādhāraṇāḥ uta agnīṣomīya raśanāyāḥ eva iti kim prāptam prakaraṇāt agnīṣomīya raśanāyāḥ iti 
[I,378,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇāḥ iti kutas liṅga darśanāt liṅgam bhavati evam āha āśvinam graham gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpam parivīya āgnā iyam paśum upākaroti iti savanīya parivyāṇe raśanām darśayati sā yadi sādhāraṇī tatas etat darśanam avakalpate yadi agnīṣomīya arthāḥ tatas aprākṛtāt savanīya parivyāṇāt nivarteta savanīye ca parivyāṇa antara prākṛtam yatra trivṛt tvam dṛśyate katham sa vai āśvinam graham gṛhītvā upaniṣkramya yūpam parivyayati iti tatra yadi na sādhāraṇī raśanā vāsasā parivyāṇam prāpnoti raśaṇām tu darśayati tasmāt sādhāraṇī raśanā tat sādhāraṇyāt ca tad dharmāḥ api sādhāraṇāḥ tat etat liṅgāt raśanā sādhāraṇyam kaḥ atra khalu nyāyaḥ iti ucyate prakaraṇāt agnīṣomīyasya vākyāt yūpa mātrasya iti 
[I,379,i_I,379,ii]	ārāt śiṣṭam asaṃyuktam itaraiḥ saṃnidhānāt dūrāt yat śiṣyate jyotiṣṭomasya yathā aupasada anuvākyā kāṇḍe aṃśvadābhyau tatra saṃdehaḥ kim jyotiṣṭoma samāmnātāḥ graha dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ uta na iti kim prāptam na kartavyāḥ asaṃnidhānāt yathā payasā maitrāvaruṇam śrīṇāti iti vacanāt maitrāvaruṇasya eva śravaṇam na sarveṣām evam idam api dharma jātam prakaraṇa sthānām eva na sarveṣām iti 
[I,379,iii_I,379,iv]	saṃyuktam vā tad artha tvāt śeṣasya tad nimitta tvāt saṃyuktam vā dharmaiḥ evaṃjātīyakam syāt aprakaraṇa stham api kutas yatas prakaraṇāt vākyam balīyaḥ nanu anyatra kriyamāṇāḥ jyotiṣṭomasya na upakuryuḥ ucyate upakariṣyanti aṃśvadābhyayoḥ tad artha tvāt jyotiṣṭoma artha tvāt śeṣaḥ ayam graha dharmaḥ graha nimittaḥ jyotiṣṭomasya upakārakaḥ yāvān grahaḥ jyotiṣṭomasya upakaroti tasya sarvasya bhavitum arhati tasmāt aṃśvadābhyayoḥ api graha dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ iti 
[I,380,i_I,380,ii]	nirdeśāt vyavatiṣṭheta yat uktam yathā maitrāvaruṇam payasā śrīṇāti iti tat yuktam śrayaṇe vacanāt prakaraṇam bādhitvā vyavasthānam iha tu viparītam tatra sarveṣu graheṣu prakaraṇam viśiṣṭeṣu vākyam iha tu sarveṣu graheṣu vākyam viśiṣṭeṣu prakaraṇam tasmāt aprakaraṇa sthasya api dharmāḥ iti 
[I,380,iii_I,380,iv]	agni aṅga prakaraṇe tadvat anārabhya agnim ucyate citriṇīḥ upadadhāti vajriṇīḥ upadadhāti bhūta iṣṭakā upadadhāti iti santi tu prakaraṇe iṣṭakā dharmāḥ akhaṇḍām akṛṣṇalām iṣṭakām kuryāt iti tatha bhasmanā iṣṭakāḥ saṃyujyāt iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim aprakaraṇe samāmnātānām ime dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ uta na iti kim prāptam na kartavyāḥ kutas asaṃnidhānāt iti prāpte ucyate agni aṅgam evaṃjātīyakam tadvat eva syāt yadvat grahāḥ prakaraṇāt dhi vākyam balavat amūṣām ca iṣṭakānām agni artha tvāt 
[I,381,i_I,381,ii]	naimittikam atulya tvāt asamāna vidhānam syāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate sa yadi rājanyam vā vaiśyam vā yājayet sa yadi somam vibhakṣayiṣet nyagrodhastibhīḥ āhṛtya tāḥ saṃpiṣya dadhani unmṛjya tam asmai bhakṣam prayacchet na somam iti jyotiṣṭome santi soma dharmāḥ mānam upāvaharaṇam krayaḥ abhiṣavaḥ iti evamādayaḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim samāna vidhānāḥ ime dharmāḥ somasya phala camasya ca uta soma dharmāḥ phala camasasya tu tad vikāra tvāt iti guṇa kāmānām pravṛttiḥ vā prayojanam adhikaraṇa cintāyāḥ 
[I,381,iii]	kim prāptam samāna vidhānāḥ prakaraṇa avibhāgāt iti prāpte ucyate naimittikam evaṃjātīyakam asamāna vidhānam syāt kutas atulya tvāt atulyaḥ somena phala camasaḥ somaḥ nitya vat āmnātāḥ phala camasaḥ naimittikaḥ kim atas yadi evam dharmāḥ api nitya vat āmnātāḥ na śakyāḥ anitya vat kartum yadi sādhāraṇāḥ tatra anārabhyaḥ arthaḥ vidhīyeta api ca naimittikaḥ phala camasaḥ sa soma dharmān gṛhṇāti tatra dharmāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ santaḥ dvis uktāḥ iti ucyeran tasmāt asamāna vidhānāḥ 
[I,381,iv_I,381,v]	pratinidhiḥ ca tadvat asti pratinidhiḥ śrute dravye apacarati yathā vrīhiṣu apacaratsu nīvārāḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim nīvārāḥ samāna vidhānāḥ uta na iti kim prāptam pratinidhiḥ ca tadvat yathā naimittikam nityena asamāna vidhānam evam pratinidhiḥ atulya tvāt kātulya tā vrīhīṇām vihitāḥ na nīvārāṇām iyam atulya tā vrīhīṇām vihitāḥ nīvārāṇām arthāpattyāḥ bhavanti 
[I,382,i_I,382,ii]	tadvat prayojana eka tvāt na etat asti asamāna vidhānaḥ pratinidhiḥ iti tadvat syāt yadvat śrutaḥ na prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ kutas vrīhi tvam hi vrīhi dharmāṇām vrīhi vyaktau nimittam na ca vrīhi tvasya sthāne nīvāra tvam bhavati iti śrūyate tasmāt na prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ katham tarhi nīvāreṣu dharmāḥ bhavanti iti ucyate yāḥ vrīhi tvena paricchinnāḥ vrīhi vyaktayaḥ nīvāreṣu tāḥ santi tāsām arthena te dharmāḥ kriyante tāsām ca vyaktīnām anyāsām ca vrīhi gatānām tulyaḥ eṣa vidhiḥ kā tulya tā ubhaye api vrīhi tva lakṣitāḥ iti tasmāt samāna vidhānāḥ iti 
[I,382,iii_I,382,iv]	aśāstra lakṣaṇa tvāt ca itas ca na pratinidheḥ śrutena saha prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ kutas artha lakṣaṇa tvāt arthāt dhi pratinidhiḥ kriyate na ca arthena etat avagantum śakyate vrīhi tvasya sthāne nīvāra tvam bhavati iti tasmāt na pratinidheḥ śrutena saha prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ bhavati iti 
[I,382,v_I,382,vi]	niyama arthā guṇa śrutiḥ atha yaḥ śrutaḥ pratinidhiḥ tatra kim sāmāna vidhyam uta naḥ iti yathā yadi somam na vindeta pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyāt iti asāmāna vidhyam iti brūmaḥ aśrutāt dhi etat viparītam evam prāptaḥ ucyate niyama arthā guṇa śrutiḥ atra api artha lakṣaṇaḥ eva pratinidhiḥ some avidyamāne soma sadṛśam dravyam prāptam tatra su sadṛśe dravye prāptaḥ īṣat sadṛśam niyamyate anyasmin pratinidhātavye anyat pratinidhīyate śrutasya sthāne na yāga dravya tvena 
[I,383,i_I,383,ii]	saṃsthāḥ tu samāna vidhānāḥ prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ tatra saṃsthāḥ samāmnātāḥ agniṣṭomaḥ ukthyaḥ ṣoḍaśī atirātraḥ iti tatra dīkṣaṇīya ādayaḥ dharmāḥ teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim sarva saṃstham jyotiṣṭomam prakṛtya dīkṣaṇīya ādayaḥ dharmāḥ uktāḥ uta agniṣṭoma saṃsthyam abhipretya iti kim prāptam sarva saṃsthāsu samānam vidhānam kutas prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt na asti prakaraṇe viśeṣaḥ yena jñāyeta agniṣṭoma saṃstham prakṛtyā iti tasmāt samāna vidhānāḥ saṃsthā iti 
[I,383,iii_I,383,iv]	vyapadeśaḥ ca tulya vat tulyaḥ iva prakaraṇe vyapadeśaḥ bhavati yadi agniṣṭomaḥ juhoti yadi ukthyaḥ paridhimanakti yadi atirātraḥ etat eva yajuḥ japan havirdhānam pratipadyeta iti sarva avasthasya viśeṣa vacanāt avagamyate yadi api sāmānyam tat api sarva avasthasya eva iti yadi hi na samānam vidhānam agniṣṭoma saṃsthasya eva syāt na iha agniṣṭomam saṃkīrtayet asaṃkīrtyamāne api dharma saṃbandhaḥ bhavati iti sarva avasthasya kīrtanāt sarva avastha prakaraṇam iti avagacchāmaḥ 
[I,384,i]	api ca śrūyate āgneyam ajam agniṣṭomaḥ ālabheta aindrāgnam dvitīyam ukthye aindram vṛṣṇim tṛtīyam ṣoḍaśinī iti dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca darśanam sāmāna vidhye ghaṭate ukthye hi dve nimitte staḥ agniṣṭoma stotram ukthya stotram ca iti tatra dvau naimittikau āgneyaḥ paśuḥ aindrāgnaḥ ca iti tena dvitīya darśanam tatra yujyate evam ṣoḍaśinī atirātre ca prakṛti vikāra bhāve tu pratyakṣa śrutaiḥ aindra agna ādibhiḥ atideśena prāptaḥ āgneyaḥ bādhyeta tatra dvitīya ādi darśanam na upapadyeta bhavati ca tasmāt sarva avasthasya jyotiṣṭomasya dīkṣaṇīya ādayaḥ dharmāḥ iti 
[I,384,ii_I,384,iii]	vikārāḥ tu kāma saṃyoge sa nityasya sama tvāt na etat asti samāna vidhānāḥ iti kim tarhi ukthi a ādayaḥ saṃsthā vikāra bhūtāḥ syuḥ agniṣṭoma saṃsthyam urīkṛtya dīkṣaṇīya ādayaḥ dharmāḥ samāmnātāḥ kutas ukthi ādīnām kāma saṃyogena śravaṇāt paśu kāmaḥ ukthyam gṛhṇīyāt ṣoḍaśinā vīrya kāmaḥ stuvīta atirātreṇa prajā kāmam yājayet iti kāmyaḥ guṇaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ nityam artham vikṛtya niviśate katham guṇāt evaṃjātīyake kāmye phala nirvṛttiḥ paśu kāmaḥ ukthyam gṛhṇīyāt na jyotiṣṭoma kāmaḥ ukthya grahaṇa kāmaḥ vā yathā paśavaḥ bhavanti tathā gṛhṇīyāt iti arthaḥ katham iti tatra avaśyam itikartavya tā apekṣitavyā saṃnidhānāt nityasya itikartavyatayā iti gamyate 
[I,384,iv]	katham punar yā iyam itikartavya tā sā nityasya iti avadhāryate na punar asya eva kāmyasya sādhāraṇī vā iti ucyate yatra yatra guṇe kāmaḥ bhavati tatra tatra kriyāyām sādhyamānāyām na anyathā sā tatra iti kartavyatā yāntikam upanipatati sā sādhanasya vā sādhyasya vā iti saṃdihyamānā sādhyasya bhavitum arhati na asau sādhyasya abhavantī sādhanena saṃbadhyate evam hi saḥ iti kartavya tā viśeṣaḥ codyate anena sādhane sādhakam upakuryāt iti na ca asti sa prakāraḥ yena asādhyamānāyām kriyāyām tena sādhakaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavet tasmāt sādhakasya api iti kartavyatā viśeṣam abhyupagacchatā sādhyasya api iti etat abhyupagamanīyam sādhyaḥ ca jyotiṣṭomaḥ sa adhikāḥ saṃsthāḥ tasmāt jyotiṣṭomasya tāvat sa itikartavyatā iti siddham 
[I,385,i]	atha kasmāt na sādhāraṇī nitya vat āmnānāt yadā eva jyotiṣṭomaḥ tadā eva dīkṣā yadā tu jyotiṣṭome paśu kāmaḥ tad ā ukthya saṃsthāḥ sarvadā jyotiṣṭome dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ ekadā ukthya saṃsthāḥ tatra sarvadā jyotiṣṭomasya dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ te ca ukthya ādi saṃsthasya arthena iti pūrvam uttareṇa virudhyate yadi sarvadā na ukthya ādīnām arthena atha ukthya ādīnām arthena na sarvadā ubhayam vipratiṣiddham tasmāt na sādhāraṇī nitya vat āmnānam ca yadi anityasya syāt nitya vat āmnānam tat anityam kriyeta tatra nitya vat āmnānam bādhyeta tasmāt nitya saṃsthasya jyotiṣṭomasya na kāmyasya ukthya ādi saṃsthasya iti 
[I,385,ii_I,385,iii]	api vā dvis ukta tvāt prakṛteḥ bhaviṣyanti iti nanu agniṣṭoma saṃsthā api kāmyā śrūyate dve hi tatra āmnāte ekam nitya vat ekam kāmyam tatra dvayoḥ vākyayoḥ sāmarthyāt nityaḥ eva sa kāmaḥ bhaviṣyati nitya tā vidhātaḥ na asti iti agniṣṭoma saṃsthasya jyotiṣṭomasya dīkṣaṇīya ādayaḥ dharmāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti 
[I,386,i_I,386,ii]	vacanāt tu samuccayaḥ atha yat uktam dvitīya tṛtīya darśanam samāna vidhi tve avakalpate na anyathā iti vacanam tat bhaviṣyati na darśanam aindrāgnaḥ ukthye dvitīyaḥ vidhīyate tathā aindraḥ ṣoḍaśini tṛtīyaḥ 
[I,386,iii_I,386,iv]	pratiṣedhāt ca pūrva liṅgānām itas ca paśyāmaḥ prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ iti kutas pratiṣedhāt pūrva liṅgānām yadi agniṣṭomaḥ juhoti yadi ukthyaḥ paridhimanakti na juhoti iti homa abhāva darśanam na syāt prāpte nimitte vacana prāmāṇyāt sāmāna vidhye 
[I,386,v_I,386,vi]	guṇa viśeṣāt ekasya vyapadeśaḥ atha yat uktam vyapadeśaḥ iti ekasya eva adhikṛtasya yathā uktena nyāyena ayam anadhikṛtena guṇena vyapadeśaḥ agniṣṭoma grahaṇam ca anuvādaḥ iti 
[I,387,i_I,387,ii]	prakaraṇa viśeṣāt asaṃyuktam pradhānasya staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra barhiḥ barhiḥ dharmāḥ ca tathā vediḥ vedi dharmāḥ ca tatra saṃdehaḥ kim barhirādayaḥ barhirādi dharmāḥ ca pradhānasya utāṅga pradhānānām iti kim tāvat prāptam prakaraṇa viśeṣāt asaṃyuktam pradhānasya pradhānasya evaṃjātīyakāḥ dharmāḥ kasmāt prakaraṇa viśeṣāt pradhānānām hi prakaraṇam na aṅgānām prakaraṇena ca eṣām saṃbandhaḥ tasmāt pradhānasya 
[I,387,iii_I,387,iv]	sarveṣām vā śeṣa tvasya atad prayukta tvāt sarveṣām vā aṅga pradhānānām ime dharmāḥ na atra śeṣa tvam prakaraṇāt bhavati upakāra lakṣaṇam hi tat yat yasya upakaroti tat tasya śeṣa bhūtam sarveṣām ca aṅga pradhānānām ime dharmāḥ upakurvanti katham avagamyate vākyāt vedyām havīṃṣi āsādayati iti haviḥ mātram vākyāt gamyate pradhāna havīṃṣi prakaraṇāt vākyam ca prakaraṇāt balīyaḥ tasmāt barhiṣi havīṃṣi āsādayati iti 
[I,387,v_I,387,vi]	āha yadi prakaraṇam vākyena bādhyate loke api barhiṣām ime dharmāḥ uktāḥ bhavanti tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ sarvatra dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ prāpnuvanti ucyate prakaraṇāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ upakārakāḥ eva iti gamyate tasmāt laukikeṣu na kartavyāḥ evam ced aṅgāni api na darśa pūrṇamāsa śabadakāni tasmāt teṣu api na prāpnuvanti ucyate yadi api aṅgāni na darśa pūrṇamāsa śabdakāni darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ upakārakāṇi eṣu kriyamāṇāḥ dharmāḥ darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ upakariṣyanti tasmāt aṅga pradhāneṣu kartavyāḥ iti 
[I,388,i_I,388,ii]	ārāt api iti ced piṇḍa pitṛ yajñe api barhiḥ dharmaiḥ yujyeta saḥ api dāte barhiṣi vartate tasya ca api barhiṣā asti prayojanam tat api ārāt śiṣṭa dharma vat syāt 
[I,388,iii_I,388,iv]	na tat vākyam hi tad artha tvāt na tasya barhiḥ etaiḥ dharmaiḥ dharma vat vākyam hi ekam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām saha dharmāṇām tena darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ upakārakāḥ dharmāḥ yat darśa pūrṇamāsa artham tatra prāpnuvanti na anyatra tasmāt piṇḍa pitṛ yajña barhiṣaḥ na bhaviṣyanti 
[I,388,v_I,388,vi]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam bhavati evam āha sa vai dhruvām eva agre abhidhārayati tatas hi prathama a ājya bhāgau yakṣyan bhavati iti abhidhāraṇasya ājya bhāga artha tām darśayati 
[I,388,vii_I,388,viii^1]	phala saṃyogāt tu svāmi yuktam pradhānasya jyotiṣṭome keśa śmaśruṇoḥ vapanam payaḥ vratāni tapaḥ ca āmnātāni teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim aṅga pradhāna arthāni uta pradhāna arthāni kim tāvat prāptam aṅga pradhāna arthāni iti pūrveṇa nyāyena prāptam evam prāpte brūmaḥ svāmi yuktam etat tasmāt pradhānasya kasmāt phala saṃyogāt puruṣasya yogena ayam saṃbandhaḥ yāgaḥ apūrvasya dātā puruṣaḥ pratigrahītā nanu aparaḥ api asti saṃbandhaḥ yāgaḥ nirvartyaḥ puruṣaḥ abhinirvartakaḥ iti phalena tu saṃbandhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti evam arthaḥ puruṣaḥ śrūyate na hi yāgam sa sādhayati yāgaḥ sat tayā saṃbhantsyate iti 
[I,388,viii^2]	kim iti tarhi nirvartayataḥ phalam bhavati iti saṃskārāḥ ca saṃskurvanti iti ucyante yat tasya saṃskartavyasya prayojanam tatra sāmarthyam janayanti iti phalam ca grahītum puruṣasya prayojanam na yāgam abhinirvartayitum tasmāt ye puruṣa saṃskārāḥ te puruṣam phala pratigrahaṇa samartham kurvanti na yāga nirvṛtti samartham āha yadi yāga nirvṛttau na sāmarthyam janayanti katham tarhi yāga dharmāḥ te bhavanti ucyate yāgasya sva artham sādhayataḥ sāhāyye vartante kaḥ ca tasya sva arthaḥ yat asya kartā phalena saṃbadhyate tasmāt svāmi saṃskārāḥ pradhāna arthāḥ iti 
[I,389,i_I,389,ii]	cikīrṣayā ca saṃyogāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate ṣaṭtriṃśat prakamā prācī caturviṃśatiḥ agreṇa triṃśat jaghanena iyati śakyāmahe iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim eṣā vediḥ aṅga pradhāna arthā uta pradhāna artha iti kim tāvat prāptam cikīrṣayā ca saṃyogāt pradhāna artha iti kā cikīrṣā iyati śakṣyāmahe iti yat cikīrṣitam tasya arthena eṣā śrūyate śakṣyāmahe asyām kartum iti pradhānam ca tasya cikīrṣitam na aṅgāni pradhānam hi phalavat na aṅgāni āha yadi aṅgāni na cikīrṣitāni kim artham kriyante iti ucyate acikīrṣitāni api aṅgāni kriyante yadi api tāni na cikīrṣyante tathā api taiḥ acikīrṣitaiḥ anyāt cikīrṣyate tasmāt tāni kriyante iti yat cikīrṣitam tasya vediḥ tasmāt pradhāna artha iti sthitam tāvat aparyavasitam 
[I,390,i_I,390,ii]	tathā abhidhānena staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra śrūyate caturhotrā paurṇamāsīm abhimṛśet pañca hotrāḥ amau āsyām iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim aṅga pradhāna artham abhimarśanam uta pradhāna artham iti kim tāvat prāptam pradhāna artham iti pradhāna nāmadheyam ca etat paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā iti ca tasmāt pradhānasya abhimarśanam iti 
[I,390,iii_I,390,iv]	tat yukte tu phala śrutiḥ tasmāt sarva cikīrṣā syāt sthitāt uttaram yat uktam pradhānam cikīrṣitam na aṅgāni tasmāt pradhānasya vediḥ iti tat na tat yukte phala śrutiḥ sa aṅgāt phalam śrūyate tasmāt sāṅgam cikīrṣitam yadi api aṅgāni na cikīrṣitāni tathā api vedyām kartavyāni anyathā na sāṅgam vedyām kṛtam bhavati 
[I,391,i_I,391,ii]	guṇa abhidhānāt sarva artham abhidhānam yat uktam pradhāna nāma tvāt paurṇamāsī śabdasya amāvāsyā śabdasya ca pradhāna haviṣām abhimarśanam iti na etat evam aṅga haviṣām api abhimarśanam syāt kutas guṇa abhidhānāt guṇaḥ abhimarśanam iti abhidhānam bhavati katamat tad abhidhānam yat guṇaḥ abhimarśanam iti brūte paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyām iti ca dvitīya antam paurṇamāsi artham abhimarśanam kartavyam amāvāsyā artham abhimarśanam kartavyam iti atas yatra yatra kriyamāṇam paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām vā upakaroti tatra tatra kartavyam yat yat paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām vā abhisaṃbadhyate sāksāt praṇāḍyā vā tatra tatra kriyamāṇam tayoḥ upakaroti tasmāt pradhāna haviṣām aṅga haviṣām ca kartavyam iti 
[I,391,iii_I,391,iv]	dīkṣā dakṣiṇam tu vacanāt pradhānasya jyotiṣṭome dīkṣāḥ śrūyate tisraḥ dīkṣā iti tathā dakṣiṇāḥ śrūyante tasya dvādaśa śatam dakṣiṇāḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim dīkṣā dakṣiṇam aṅga pradhāna artham uta pradhāna artham iti kim prāptam puruṣāṇām aṅga pradhāna artha tvāt dīkṣā dakṣiṇasya aṅga pradhāna artha tā iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ dīkṣā dakṣiṇam pradhānasya kutas vacanāt vacanam hi bhavati dīkṣāḥ somasya dakṣiṇāḥ somasya iti na hi vacanasya atibhāraḥ nāma kvacid tasmāt dīkṣā dakṣiṇam vacanāt somasya iti 
[I,392,i_I,392,ii]	nivṛtti darśanāt ca nivṛttim dīkṣāṇām darśayati katham adhvaryaḥ yat paśunāya akṣīḥ atha kā asya dīkṣā iti yat ṣaṣ ḍhotāram juhoti sā asya dīkṣā iti asatyām api dīkṣāyām vacanam bhavati tasmāt aṅgānām dīkṣā dakṣiṇam iti 
[I,392,iii_I,392,iv]	tathā yūpasya vediḥ asti jyotiṣṭome paśuḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yat agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhate iti tatra yūpam prakṛtya śrūyate vajraḥ vai yūpaḥ yat antarvedi muniyāt tat nirdahet yat barhiḥ vedī anavaruddhaḥ syāt ardham antarvedi minoti ardham bahis vedī anavaruddhaḥ bhavati na nirdahati iti 
[I,392,v]	tatra saṃdehaḥ kim antar vedī iti yūpa aṅga bhāvena vediḥ upadiśyate uta ardham antar vedī ardham bahirvedī iti deśa lakṣaṇa artham ucyate iti katham yūpa aṅga bhāvena katham vā deśa lakṣaṇa iti yadi yūpa ardhasya vedi antarasya ca saṃbandhaḥ vivakṣitaḥ evam vedi saṃbaddhaḥ yūpaḥ kartavyaḥ tatas yūpa aṅga bhāvena atha yasmin deśe mīyamānasya ardham vedi abhyantare ardham ca bahis sa deśaḥ upadiśyate tatas deśa lakṣaṇā 
[I,392,vi]	kim prāptam tathā yūpasya vediḥ yathā dīkṣā dakṣiṇam pradhānasya tathā yūpasya vediḥ tathā yūpaḥ mātavyaḥ tathā mīyamānasya ardham vedi abhyantare bhavati evam vedi śrutiḥ api anugrahīṣyate itarathāḥ vedi śabdaḥ lakṣayet deśam śruti lakṣaṇa aviṣaye śrutiḥ nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā tasmāt yūpa aṅga bhāvena vediḥ nirdiśyate 
[I,393,i_I,393,ii]	deśa mātram vāśiṣyeṇa eka vākya tvāt deśā mātram vā vedi śabdena lakṣyate na vediyūpa aṅgam kutas aśiṣyeṇa eka vākya tvāt ardham antarvedi minoti ardham bahirvedī iti etena eka vākyatā yā sā śāsitavyena yadi deśa lakṣaṇā atha yūpa aṅga bhāvena vedyāḥ nirdeśaḥ tatas na śāsitavyaḥ bahis vedi nirdeśaḥ bhavati vedyām yūpasya aṅga bhāvena upadiśyamānāyām ardham bahirvedī iti etat uccāryamāṇam na kasmiṃścid upakāre vartate 
[I,393,iii]	atha bahis vedi deśam api yūpa aṅga bhāvena upadiśet vākyam bhidyeta tasmāt yūpa aṅga bhāvena vedyāḥ nirdeśe bahis vedi śabdaḥ sarvathā na śāsitavyaḥ yadi tu deśa lakṣaṇā tatas viśiṣṭe deśe lakṣyamāṇe avaśya vaktavyaḥ bahis vedi śabdaḥ bhavati anucyamāne vedi abhyantare yasmin kasmin ca pradeśe yūpaḥ iti gamyate atha punar bahis vedi śabde śrūyamāṇe yatarasmin deśe mīyamānasya ardham antar vedī ardham bahis vedi sa deśaḥ lakṣayitum iṣṭaḥ bhavati sa ca bahis vedi śabdena vinā na śakyate lakṣayitum iti avaśyam śāsitavyaḥ bhavati tasmāt deśa lakṣaṇa iti 
[I,393,iv_I,393,v]	svāmidhenīḥ tat anvāhuḥ iti havirdhānayoḥ vacanāt sāmidhenīnām jyotiṣṭome śrūyate uta yat sunvanti sāmidhenīḥ tat anvāhuḥ iti havirdhānayoḥ yasmin havirdhāne sunvanti tat sāmidhenībhiḥ saṃbandhayet iti arthaḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim sāmīdhenīnām aṅga bhāvena havirdhānam codyate havirdhāna viśiṣṭāḥ sāmidhenyaḥ anuvaktavyāḥ uta havirdhānena amūṣām anūcyamānānām deśaḥ lakṣyate iti kim tāvat prāptam sāmidhenīnām aṅga tvena havirdhānam codyate yasmin havirdhāne sunvanti tat sāmidhenībhiḥ saṃbandhayet iti tena havirdhāna saṃbaddhāḥ sāmidhenyaḥ anuvaktavyā iti vacanāt sāmidheni aṅga bhāve sati havirdhāna śrutiḥ anugrahīṣyate itarathāḥ deśam lakṣayet iti tasmāt sāmidheni aṅgam havirdhānam 
[I,394,i_I,394,ii^1]	deśa mātram vā pratyakṣam hi artha karma somasya deśa lakṣaṇa artham vā etat ucyate yasmin sunvanti tasmin deśe sāmidhenyaḥ anuvaktavyāḥ iti pratyakṣam hi artha karma somasya tena kriyate dakṣiṇe havirdhāne somam āsādayati iti soma āsādana artham tāvat etat upādeyam sāmidhenyaḥ api agni samindhana artham upādeyāḥ iti iha tu etāvat śrūyate yasya havirdhānasya samīpe sunvanti tad saṃbaddhāḥ sāmidhenyaḥ api agni samindhana artham upādeyāḥ iti tatra na jñāyate kim sāmidhenyaḥ saṃbaddhāḥ havirdhānasya upakurvanti kim havirdhānam sāmidhenīnām iti tat ucyate sāmidhenyaḥ tāvat dhavirdhānasya na upakurvanti na hi tāvat vidhīyante sāmidhenyaḥ anuvaktavyāḥ iti kim tarhi 
[I,394,ii^2_I,395,i]	havirdhāna viśeṣa saṃbandhaḥ tāsām vidhīyate na ca avihitam aṅgam bhavati na api evam vidhīyate havirdhānam āsām anucyamānānām upādātavyam saṃbandhayitum iti katham tarhi havirdhānī viśeṣa saṃbandhaḥ sāmidhenīnām śrūyate havirdhāna saṃbandhaḥ vidhīyate na ca sāmidhenī saṃbandhaḥ havirdhānasya prāptaḥ yaḥ viśeṣa artham anūdyeta kena tarhi havirdhānasya saṃbandhaḥ pratyakṣam hi artha karma somasya na tu sāmidhenīkarma pratyakṣam havirdhānasya bhavati tu deśasya sāmidhenī saṃbandhaḥ apareṇa vedim iti hotuḥ deśaḥ lakṣitaḥ saḥ uttarasya dakṣiṇasya vā havirdhānasya samāsannaḥ tatra yat sunvanti tat anvāhuḥ iti upapadyate vacanam tasmāt deśa lakṣaṇa artham havirdhāna grahaṇam atha evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kasmāt na bhavati yasmin havirdhāne sunvanti tasya havirdhānasya sāmidhenī saṃbandhaḥ iti na evam śakyam evam dvau arthau vidhātavyau bhavataḥ havirdhāna saṃbandhaḥ havirdhāna viśeṣa saṃbandhaḥ ca tatra vākyam bhidyate tasmāt na evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti 
[I,395,ii_I,395,iii]	samākhyānam ca tadvat samākhyānam ca tadvat eva bhavati yathā asmābhiḥ nyāya upadiṣṭaḥ soma artham havirdhānam iti 
[I,395,iv_I,395,v]	śāstra phalam prayoktari tad lakṣaṇa tvāt tasmāt svayam prayoge syāt iha karmāṇi udāharaṇam agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim etāni karmāṇi svayam anuṣṭhātavyāni uta atra utsarga mātram svayam kuryāt śeṣam anyaḥ svayam vā uta śeṣam anyaḥ eva iti kim prāptam svayam prayoge syāt kutas yatas svayam prayuñjānasya phalam bhavati katham avagamyate tad lakṣaṇa tvāt śabdaḥ asya arthasya lakṣaṇam svayam prayuñjānasya phalam bhavati iti katamaḥ sa śabdaḥ svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti yaḥ svargam kāmayate saḥ eva ucyate yāge kartā bhavan phalam sādhayet iti sa aṅge ca kartā bhavan phalam prāpnoti tasmāt svayam prayoge syāt 
[I,396,i_I,396,ii]	utsarge tu pradhāna tvāt śeṣa kārī pradhānasya tasmāt anyaḥ svayam vā syāt utsarge prādhānyam asti katham yaḥ utsargam karoti tena sarvam kṛtam bhavati katham parikrayaḥ utsargaḥ tena anantāḥ sarvam kurvanti tasmāt yaḥ parikrayam karoti tena svayam eva sarvam kṛtam bhavati tasmāt utsarga mātram svayam kuryāt śeṣam anyaḥ svayam vā 
[I,396,iii_I,396,iv]	anyaḥ vā syāt parikrayāmnānāt vipratiṣedhāt pratyagātmani śeṣasya anyaḥ eva syāt kartā kutas parikrayasya āmnāna tvāt puruṣān ati prakāreṣu bahuṣu prāpteṣu parikrayaḥ niyataḥ tasmāt parikrayeṇa ānataiḥ sarve padārthāḥ kartavyāḥ iti vipratiṣeddhaḥ ca ātmani parikrayaḥ yadi svayam kuryāt aparikrītena kṛtam syāt tatra parikrayāmnānānarthakyam adṛṣṭa arthaḥ vā pratijñāyeta tasmāt anyaiḥ parikrītaiḥ śeṣāḥ padārthāḥ kartavyāḥ iti utsargam tu svayam kurvatā sarvam svayam kṛtam bhavati 
[I,397,i_I,397,ii]	tatra arthāt kartṛ parimāṇam syāt aniyamaḥ aviśeṣāt tatra taiḥ parikrītaiḥ kartavyeṣu aniyamena kartṛ parimāṇam syāt kutas aviśeṣāt na kartṛ parimāṇe viśeṣaḥ kaścid āmnāyate arthena tad parimāṇam yāvādbhiḥ asau itikartavya tā nirvartate tāvataḥ vṛṇīta 
[I,397,iii_I,397,iv]	api vā śruti bhedāt pratināmadheyam syuḥ yāvanti kartṛ nāmadheyāni karmāṇi śrūyante tāvantaḥ varītavyāḥ bhidyante tāni ca nāmadheya śravaṇāni tān puras adhvaryuḥ vibhajati pratiprasthātā manthinam juhoti na iṣṭā patnīm abhyudāyati unnetā camasān unnayati iti tathā prastotā prastauti udgātā udgāyati pratihartā pratiharati subrahmaṇyaḥ subrahmaṇyām āha hotā prātaranuvākam anubrūte maitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati ca anuca āha acchāvākaḥ yajati grāva stotrīyām anvāha etāvadbhiḥ karmaṇi prayojanam tena te avaśyam etāni yathā śrutāni kartum varītavyāḥ etat vyatiriktaḥ anyaḥ padārthaḥ na vidyate yaḥ api vākyena na upadiṣṭaḥ sa samākhyayā gamyate tasmāt etāvataḥ vṛṇīta iti 
[I,397,v_I,397,vi]	ekasya karma bhedāt iti ced evam ced pratijñāyate etāvataḥ vṛṇīta iti tat na yaḥ yaḥ tat karma kariṣyati iti saṃkalpate sa sa tat tat śabda abhidheyaḥ bhavati ekaḥ api bahūn padārthān kartum bahubhiḥ nāmadheyaiḥ ucyeta tasmāt aniyamaḥ 
[I,398,i_I,398,ii]	na utpattau hi na etat evam utpattau puruṣāṇām utpādyamāneṣu puruṣeṣu nāmadheyāni bhidyante brāhmaṇam vṛṇīte hotāram vṛṇīte udgātāram vṛṇīte adhvaryum vṛṇītaḥ iti evamādi tasmāt karmaṇi taiḥ evam nāmakaiḥ prayojanam avaśyante varītavyāḥ tasmāt eṣām varaṇe saṃkīrtanam na vidhiḥ prayojanasya abhāvan na anuvādaḥ na vede tāvantaḥ varītavyāḥ iti brūyāt anarthakam eva syāt śaknoti ca idam pratyāyayitum saṃkhyā viśeṣam tasmāt yaḥ saṃkhyā viśeṣaḥ eṣām pratīyate tad artham etat vacanam tasmāt ṣoḍaśa kartāraḥ varītavyāḥ somaḥ tāvat kartṛkaḥ ca syāt evam darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ api 
[I,398,iii_I,398,iv]	camasādhvaryavaḥ ca taiḥ vyapadeśāt santi jyotiṣṭome camasādhvaryavaḥ camasa adhvaryūn vṛṇīta iti teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim eṣām anyatamāḥ uta etebhyaḥ anyaḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam etāvatām saṃkīrtanāt eṣām eva anyatamāḥ iti prāpte brūmaḥ camasādhvaryavaḥ ca apare bhaveyuḥ tebhyaḥ anyaḥ iti kutas taiḥ vyapadeśāt taiḥ parigaṇitaiḥ eṣām vyapadeśaḥ bhavati madhyataḥkāriṇām camasādhvaryavaḥ hotrakāṇām camasādhvaryavaḥ iti 
[I,398,v]	nanu yaḥ eva prakṛtāḥ te camasādhvaryavaḥ bhaveyuḥ na iti brūmaḥ kutas taiḥ vyapadeśāt madhyataḥkāriṇām camasādhvaryavaḥ hotrakāṇām camasādhvaryavaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī saṃbandhe sati bhavati ṛtvigbhiḥ te vyapadiśyante ṛtvijaḥ teṣām svāminaḥ na yajamānaḥ yajamāna puruṣebhyaḥ ca ete anyaḥ iti naḥ pratijñātam na yajamānena camasādhvaryavam kartum varītavyāḥ ṛtvigbhiḥ te varītavyāḥ iti api ca eṣām utpatti vākyaḥ eva bhedaḥ camasa adhvaryūn vṛṇīta iti 
[I,399,i_I,399,ii]	utpattau tu bahu śruteḥ teṣu va saṃdehaḥ kim aniyamaḥ ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ vā uta bahavaḥ eva iti aniyamaḥ iti prāptaḥ ucyate bahavaḥ iti kutas utpattau bahu śruteḥ camasādhvaryavaḥ iti eṣām utpattau bahu śrutiḥ bhavati tasmāt bahavaḥ iti 
[I,399,iii_I,399,iv]	daśa tvam liṅga darśanāt jyotiṣṭome santi camasādhvaryavaḥ te ca bahavaḥ iti uktam kiyantaḥ bahavaḥ iti saṃdehe trayaḥ bahuvacana sāmarthyāt iti prāpte brūmaḥ daśa tvam liṅga darśanāt te daśa bhaveyuḥ tathā hi liṅgam jyotiṣṭoma vikāre daśa peye śrūyate daśa camasādhvaryavaḥ daśa daśa ekaikam camasam anusarpanti iti etasmāt kāraṇāt daśa peyaḥ bhavati iti bruvan daśa camasa adhvaryūn darśayati yadi trayaḥ bhaveyuḥ etad darśanam na upapadyate tasmāt trīn atītya eṣā saṃkhyā yadi ca daśa na bhaveyuḥ na upapadyeta etad darśanam tasmāt bhavanti daśa daśa ca eṣām svāminaḥ tasmāt prayojana bhāvāt daśa saṃkhyā upādīyate tasyām ca upādīyamānāyām aparā api saṃkhyā anugṛhyate tena api daśa bhaveyuḥ 
[I,400,i_I,400,ii]	śamitā ca śabda bhedāt asti śamitā śamitāram upanayīta iti sa kim saṃkīrtitānām anyatamaḥ uta anyaḥ tebhyaḥ iti kim prāptam teṣām varaṇe saṃkīrtanāt teṣām anyatamaḥ iti prāpte ucyate śamitā ca śabda bhedāt śabdaḥ bhidyate evaṃsaṃjñakena idam karma kartavyam iti tasmāt evaṃsaṃjñakaḥ utpādayitavyaḥ asya saṃkīrtanāt saṃkhyau vṛddhiḥ gamyate tasmāt anyaḥ śamitā syāt api ca klomā ca ūrdham vaikartanam ca śamituḥ tat brāhmaṇāya dadyāt yat brāhmaṇaḥ syāt iti abrāhmaṇa āśaṅkā bhavati sā ṛtviji na upapadyate 
[I,400,iii_I,400,iv]	prakaraṇāt vā utpatti asaṃyogāt satyam saṃkhyā vivṛddhiḥ gamyate na tu utpadyamāneṣu yā tu anutpattiḥ teṣu gamyate tatra ekasya karma bhedāt iti evam api avakalpate yat tu uktam abrāhmaṇa āśaṅkā bhavati iti yajamāna abhiprāyā sā yadi abrāhmaṇaḥ yajamānaḥ syāt iti nanu yadi abrāhmaṇaḥ syāt iti prakṛtaḥ śamitā saṃbadhyate ucyate śamayati iti śamitā yaugikaḥ eṣa śabdaḥ prakṛteṣu api avakalpate śāmitram api ādhvaryave samāmnānāt adhvaryuṇā kartavyam tasmāt śamanāt adhvaryuḥ śamitā evam sati aprakṛtaḥ yajamānaḥ saṃbandhyate 
[I,401,i_I,401,ii]	upagāḥ ca liṅga darśanāt jyotiṣṭome santi upagā nāma te śabda bhedāt saṃkhyā vivṛddhim pratyāyayanti iti adhvaryva ādibhyaḥ anyaḥ iti prāpte brūmaḥ teṣām eva kecid syuḥ iti kasmāt utpattau parigaṇanāt yaugikaka tvāt ca śabdasya liṅgam idam bhavati na adhvaryuḥ upagāyet iti yadi ebhyaḥ anye bhaveyuḥ na adhvaryum pratiṣedhet aprāpta tvāt yatas tu pratiṣedhati atas avagachāmaḥ utpattau saṃkīrtitānām eva anyatamaḥ iti 
[I,401,iii_I,401,iv]	vikrayī tu anyaḥ karmaṇaḥ acodita tvāt asti soma vikrayī tatra saṃdehaḥ sa kim adhvaryva ādīnām anyatamaḥ uta ebhyaḥ anyaḥ iti kim prāptam teṣām saṃkīrtanāt teṣām anyatamaḥ iti prāpte brūmaḥ vikrayī tu anyaḥ syāt iti vikrayaḥ na codyate krayacodyate tatra arthāt vikrayaḥ jyotiṣṭomasya ca padārthān kartum adhvaryva ādayaḥ utpādyante na tu vikrayaḥ jyotiṣṭomasya śrūyate tasmāt na adhvaryva ādīnām anyatamaḥ iti 
[I,402,i_I,402,iii]	karma kāryāt sarveṣām ṛtvij tvam aviśeṣāt yaḥ ete puruṣāḥ jyotiṣṭomasya śrūyante te kim sarve ete ṛtvijaḥ uta kecid eṣām iti kim prāptam sarve kutas karma kāryāt sarve yāgasya sādhanam kurvanti tasmāt sarve ṛtau yajanti ye ca ṛtau yajanti te ṛtvijaḥ na kaścid viśeṣaḥ āśrīyate ime eva ṛtau yajanti iti ṛtvijaḥ ime na iti tasmāt sarveṣām ṛtvij tvam nanu parisaṃkhyā śrūyate saumyasya adhvarasya yajña kratoḥ saptadaśaḥ ṛtvijaḥ iti ucyate parisaṃkhyāyām bahavaḥ doṣāḥ santi iti avayutyavādaḥ ayam bhaviṣyati 
[I,402,iv_I,402,vi]	na vā parisaṃkhyānāt na vā sarve kasmāt parisaṃkhyānāt evam hi śrūyate saumyasya adhvarasya yajña kratoḥ saptadaśaḥ ṛtvijaḥ iti saḥ eṣa na vidhiḥ bahutarāṇām prāpta tvāt na anuvādaḥ paryojana abhāvāt na ced parisaṃkhyā api ānarthakyam eva syāt nanu parisaṃkhyāyām sva artha hānam para artha kalpanā prāpta bādhaḥ ca ucyate sva artha hānam adoṣaḥ prāpta tvāt para artha kalpanā ca pratyayāt katham bahūnām ṛtvij tve jñāte punar saptadaśaḥ ṛtvijaḥ iti ucyate saptadaśabhiḥ ṛtvij śabdasya saṃbandhaḥ punar prakāśyate adhikaiḥ ca na prakāśyate tatra vijñāyate etat ṛtvij śabdasya puruṣaiḥ saṃbandhe punar prakāśyamāne saptadaśabhyaḥ abhyadhikāḥ varjitāḥ iti gamyate tatra kim saptadaśabhiḥ saṃbandhaḥ vivakṣitaḥ kim vā adhikānām varjanam iti saptadaśa saṃbandhasya aprayojaka tvāt adhikānām varjanam vivakṣitam iti gamyate 
[I,403,i_I,403,ii]	āha nanu pratiṣidhyamāneṣu api adhikeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti na hi te ṛtau na yajanti na vartau yajantaḥ na ṛtvijaḥ syuḥ ucyate satyam na pratiṣedhāt ṛtvij śabdena na saṃbadhyate kim tu pratiṣedha sāmarthyāt dhi ṛtvij kārye na bhavanti kim punar ṛtvij kāryam ṛtvijaḥ upavasanti iti ṛtvijaḥ vṛṇīte ṛtvigbhyaḥ dakṣiṇām dadāti iti āha yat ṛtvijām kāryam katham tat keṣāṃcid ṛtvij śabdakānām na syāt ucyate evam tarhi dvividhaḥ ayam ṛtvij śabdaḥ ṛtuyajana nimittaḥ varaṇa bharaṇa nimittaḥ ca tatra yāga nimittasya grahaṇam anarthakam tasmāt varaṇa bharaṇa nimittaḥ gṛhyate iti 
[I,403,iii]	āha nanu itaretara āśrayam evam bhavati ye ṛtvijaḥ te varītavyāḥ ye vriyante te ṛtvijaḥ iti tat itaretara āśrayam ucyate na hi ṛtvijaḥ vṛṇītaḥ iti ayam arthaḥ ṛtvijaḥ santaḥ varītavyāḥ iti katham tarhi varaṇena ṛtvijaḥ kriyante iti evam dvitīya anirdeśaḥ yuktaḥ bhaviṣyati adhvaryam vṛṇītaḥ iti evaṃlakṣaṇaḥ dṛṣṭa artha tā ca varaṇasya bhaviṣyati 
[I,403,iv]	katham ātma icchayā adhvaryuḥ bhavati iti ced kaścid brūyāt bhavati iti brūyām katham evaṃśabdakena ayam padārthaḥ kartavyaḥ iti na asti evaṃśabdakaḥ yaḥ ca na asti sa yadi śakyate kartum kartavyaḥ bhavati yathā juhvā juhoti iti avidyamānā juhūḥ kriyate evam etat api draṣṭavyam tatra arthāt aniyamena ṛtvij śabda saṃbandhe kartavye evam varaṇa viśeṣeṇa kṛtavyaḥ iti niyamyate tasmāt na itaretara āśrayam tasmāt saptadaśā eva ṛtvijaḥ kartavyā iti parisaṃkhyā saptadaśaḥ ṛtvijaḥ saṃskāraiḥ kartavyāḥ iti 
[I,404,i_I,404,ii]	pakṣeṇa iti ced evam ced manyase yathā ukta pakṣeṇa etat evam ucyate avayutyavāda pakṣeṇa saptadaśaḥ ṛtvijaḥ iti tat parihartavyam 
[I,404,iii_I,404,iv]	na sarveṣām anadhikāraḥ na etat evam na atra sarveṣām puruṣāṇām vacanam yān adhikṛtya avayutya vādaḥ bhaviṣyati yatra parā saṃkhyā kīrtyate tatra avayutya vādaḥ bhavati yathā dvādaśa kapāle yat aṣṭākapālaḥ bhavati iti na ca iha parā saṃkhyā kīrtyate tasmāt na avayuti avādaḥ iti 
[I,404,v_I,404,vi]	niyamaḥ tu dakṣiṇābhiḥ śruti saṃyogāt saptadaśaḥ ṛtvijaḥ iti samadhigatam katame te saptadaśaḥ iti idam cintyate kim prāptam ajñānam evam prāpte brūmaḥ niyamaḥ tu dakṣiṇābhiḥ śruti saṃyogāt dakṣiṇā saṃbandhena niyamyeran evam hi āmnāyate ṛtvigbhyaḥ dakṣiṇām dadāti iti evam abhidhāya dakṣiṇā dāna krama pare vākye brahma ādayaḥ śrūyante agnīdhe agre dadāti iti tatas brahmaṇe tatas amuṣmai ca amuṣmai ca iti kecid eva viśiṣṭāḥ śrūyante evam ye śrūyante te tāvat ṛtvijaḥ tatas abhyadhikā na anye bhavitum arhanti dakṣiṇābhiḥ niyamaḥ iti 
[I,405,i_I,405,ii]	uktvā ca yajamāna tvam teṣām dīkṣā vidhānāt yaḥ ṛtvijaḥ te yajamānāḥ iti evam abhidhāya brahma ādīnām dīkṣā krama pare ca vākye dīkṣām darśayati katham adhvaryuḥ gṛhapatim dīkṣayitvā brahmāṇam dīkṣayati tat udgātāram tatas hotāram tatas tam pratiprasthātā dīkṣayitvā ardhinaḥ dīkṣayati brāhmaṇāt śaṃsinam brahmaṇaḥ prastotāram udgātuḥ maitrāvaruṇam hotuḥ tatas tam na iṣṭā dīkṣayitvā tṛtīyinaḥ dīkṣayati āgnīdham brahmaṇaḥ pratihartāram udgātuḥ acchāvākam hotuḥ tatas tam unnetā dīkṣayitvā pādinaḥ dīkṣayati potāram brahmaṇaḥ subrahmaṇyam udgātuḥ grāvastutam hotuḥ tatas tam anyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ dīkṣayati brahmacārī vā ācārya preṣitaḥ iti dīkṣā ca yajamāna saṃskāraḥ tasmāt brahma ādayaḥ ṛtvijaḥ saptadaśaḥ iti 
[I,405,iii_I,405,iv]	svāmi saptadaśāḥ karma sāmānyāt etat uktam saptadaśaḥ ṛtvijaḥ iti te ca brahma ādayaḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim eṣām sadasyaḥ saptadaśaḥ uta gṛhapatiḥ kim tāvat prāptam sadasyaḥ iti sa hi karmakaraḥ itaraḥ svāmī yaḥ ca karmakaraḥ sa parikretavyaḥ ṛtvijaḥ ca parikrīyante tasmāt sadasyaḥ saptadaśaḥ ṛtvij iti api ca tasya camasam āmananti varaṇam ca ṛtvij varītavyaḥ na svāmī tasmāt sadasyaḥ saptadaśaḥ iti prāpte ucyate svāmi saptadaśāḥ karma sāmānyāt svāmi eṣām saptadaśaḥ syāt kutas karma sāmānyāt yajñe kartāraḥ ṛtvijaḥ bhavanti yajñe ca kartā gṛhapatiḥ tasmāt ṛtvij yajña karma sāmānyāt yat uktam tam samāmananti tasya camasam āmananti varaṇam ca tasmāt sadasyaḥ saptadaśaḥ iti ucyate brahmāṇam eva te samāmananti varaṇam api camasaḥ ca brahmaṇaḥ eva sa hi sadasi bhavaḥ tasmāt svāmi saptadaśāḥ 
[I,406,i_I,406,ii]	te sva arthāḥ prayukta tvāt agnayaḥ ca sva kāla tvāt svāmi sapta daśāḥ jyotiṣṭomasya ṛtvijaḥ samadhigatāḥ atra idānīm ayam saṃdehaḥ kim sarvam puruṣa kāryam taiḥ kāryam agnibhiḥ ca gārhapatya ādibhiḥ agni kāryam uta kācid vyavasthā iti kim tāvat prāptam te sarva arthāḥ prayukta tvāt agnayaḥ ca sva kāla tvāt te vṛtāḥ sarvasmai puruṣa kāryāya syuḥ agnayaḥ ca agnikāryāya kutas taiḥ kāryaiḥ ākāṅkṣi tvāt prati svam grahaṇam eṣām anuvādaḥ sva kāla tvāt agnayaḥ ca sarva arthāḥ iti samadhigatam etat 
[I,407,i_I,407,ii]	tad saṃyogāt karmaṇaḥ vyavasthā syāt saṃyogasya arthavat tvāt tad saṃyogāt viśiṣṭa puruṣa saṃyogāt vyavatiṣṭheta ye yena puruṣeṇa samākhyāyante te tena kartavyāḥ evam teṣām puruṣa saṃyogaḥ arthavān bhaviṣyati ādhvaryavam adhvaryuṇā hautram hotrā audgātram udgātrā iti 
[I,407,iii_I,407,iv]	tasya upadeśa samākhyānena nirdeśaḥ kim eṣaḥ eva utsargaḥ sarvam samākhyātam samākhyāta puruṣaiḥ kartavyam iti na iti brūmaḥ tasya upadeśāt viśeṣa samākhyānāt ca nirdeśaḥ yathā upadeśaḥ tasmāt maitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati ca anu ca aha iti samākhyā potrīyā na iṣṭrīya iti eṣa samākhyāyāḥ ca apavādaḥ iti 
[I,407,v_I,407,vi]	tadvat ca liṅga darśanam yatra hetuḥ prātaranuvākam anubruvataḥ upaśṛṇuyāt iti hotre prātaranuvāke samākhyayā prāptam hotāram darśayati tathā idam aparam liṅgam bhavati udgīthaḥ udgātṝṇām ṛcaḥ praṇavaḥ uktha śaṃsinām pratihāraḥ adhvaryūṇām iti samākhyā akṛtam bhedam darśayati tathā idam api liṅgam bhavati yaḥ vā adhvaryoḥ svam veda svavān eva bhavati etat vā adhvaryoḥ svam yat āśrāvayati iti samākhyā akṛtam niyamam darśayati 
[I,408,i_I,408,ii]	praiṣa anuvacanam maitrāvaruṇasya upadeśāt asti jyotiṣṭome paśuḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yat agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhate iti tatra idam samāmananti tasmāt maitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati ca anu ca aha iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim sarva anuvacaneṣu sarva praiṣeṣu ca maitrāvaruṇaḥ syāt uta yatra anuvacane praiṣaḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam sarva anuvacaneṣu aviśeṣāt na hi kaścid viśeṣaḥ āśrīyate asmin anuvacane maitrāvaruṇaḥ asmin na iti tasmāt sarva anuvacaneṣu sarva praiṣeṣu ca maitrāvaruṇaḥ syāt 
[I,408,iii_I,408,iv]	puras anuvākya adhikāraḥ vā praiṣa saṃnidhānāt puras anuvākyam vā maitrāvaruṇaḥ anubrūyāt kutas yatra praiṣaḥ ca anuvākyā ca sahocyete tatra maitrāvaruṇaḥ yatra kevala anuvākyāḥ na tatra maitrāvaruṇaḥ yatra vā kevalaḥ praiṣaḥ tatra api na yatra ubhe samuccīyete tatra sa bhavet tathā hi samuccitayoḥ tam samāmananti tasmāt maitrāvaruṇaḥ preṣyati ca anu ca aha iti caśabdāt samuccitayoḥ iti gamyate 
[I,409,i_I,409,ii]	prātaranuvāke hotṛ darśanāt itas ca paśyāmaḥ na sarva anuvacaneṣu maitrāvaruṇaḥ iti kutas yatas prātaranuvāke hotāram darśayati katham yatra hotuḥ prātaranuvākam anubruvataḥ upaśṛṇuyāt tadā adhvayuḥ gṛhṇīyāt iti tasmāt na sarva anuvacaneṣu maitrāvaruṇaḥ iti 
[I,409,iii_I,409,iv]	camasān camasādhvaryavaḥ samākhyānāt santi camasādhvaryavaḥ teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim camasādhvaryavaḥ camasān juhuyuḥ uta adhvaryuḥ iti camasādhvaryavaḥ iti brūmaḥ kasmāt camaseṣu ādhvaryavam te kurvanti iti camasādhvaryavaḥ tasmāt te juhuyuḥ iti 
[I,409,v_I,409,vi]	adhvaryuḥ vā tat nyāya tvāt adhvaryuḥ vā juhuyāt esa hi nyāyaḥ yat ārdhvaryavapadārtham adhvaryuḥ kuryāt ādhvaryavaḥ ca homaḥ tasmāt adhvaryuḥ juhuyāt nanu camasādhvaryavaḥ iti viśeṣa samākhyānāt camasādhvaryavaḥ hoṣyanti iti na iti ucyate camaseṣu ete adhvaryu vat bhavanti iti camasādhvaryavaḥ yadi taiḥ adhvaryuḥ juhoti tatas taiḥ camasa adhvaryubhiḥ api hotavyam yadi camasādhvaryavaḥ juhvati na adhvaryuḥ tadā te na tadvat syuḥ camasādhvaryavaḥ tasmāt na juhuyuḥ iti 
[I,409,vii_I,409,viii]	camase ca anya darśanāt camase ca anyam camasa adhvaryoḥ darśayati katham yamasān camasādhvaryave prayacchati tān sa vaṣaṭkartre harati anyaḥ hutvā camasādhvaryave prayacchati iti gamyate katham sa vaṣaṭkartre harati bhakṣayitum iti gamyate tasmāt dhutasya camasādhvaryave pradānam yaḥ juhoti sa prayacchati tasmāt anyaḥ juhoti iti api ca yaḥ vā adhvaryoḥ svam veda svavān eva bhavati sruc vā adhvaryoḥ svam vāyavyam asya svam camasaḥ asya svam iti na tāvat asya camasaḥ svam yajamānasya hi saḥ camasaḥ asya svam iti bruvan adhvaryoḥ camasena homam darśayati 
[I,410,i_I,410,ii]	aśaktau te pratīyeran atha katham camasādhvaryavaḥ iti samākhyānam ucyate aśaktau te pratīyeran yadā vyāpṛta tvāt na śaknoti adhvaryuḥ hotum tadā samākhyāsām arthāt te hoṣyanti 
[I,410,iii_I,410,iv]	veda upadeśāt pūrvavat veda anya tve yathopadeśam syuḥ asti audgātre samākhyātaḥ śyenaḥ ādhvaryave vājapeyaḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim śyenaḥ udgātṛbhiḥ eva padārthāḥ kartavyāḥ vājapeye adhvaryubhiḥ uta ubhayatra nānā ṛtvigbhiḥ iti kim prāptam veda upadeśāt samākhyānāt iti arthaḥ pūrvavat yathā ādhvaryavam iti samākhyānāt padārthān adhvaryuḥ karoti evam eva veda anya tve yathopadeśam syuḥ yaḥ yena samākhyāte vedaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ tasya padārthāḥ tena eva kartavyāḥ sa aṅgaḥ sa tatra upadiśyate tasmāt śyenaḥ udgātṛbhiḥ vājapeye ca adhvaryubhiḥ padārthāḥ kartavyāḥ iti 
[I,411,i_I,411,ii]	tad grahaṇāt vā svadharmaḥ syāt adhikāra sāmarthyāt saha aṅgaiḥ avyaktaḥ śeṣe tad grahaṇāt prākṛta dharma grahaṇāt vā svadharmaḥ svaiḥ dharmaiḥ ca udaka prāptaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ syāt ca udaka sāmarthyāt saha aṅgaiḥ kuryāt iti śrūyate tāni ca aṅgāni jyotiṣṭome santi apekṣyante tatra jyotiṣṭome na anarvijaḥ taiḥ asya saha eka vākyatā 
[I,411,iii_I,411,v]	nanu pratyakṣā samākhyā ca udakaḥ ānumānikaḥ ucyate satyam pratyakṣā samākhyā laukikī tu sā tatra anumāya vaidikam śabdam tena eka vākyatā syāt ca udake punar viprakṛṣṭa adhītayā pratyakṣaya iti kartavya tayā saha eka vākyatā tasmāt ca udakaḥ balavattaraḥ yat tu uktam samākhyānāt iti tatra ucyate avyaktaḥ śeṣe samākhyātaḥ bhaviṣyati yaḥ padārthaḥ na ca udakena prāpnoti tatra samākhyayā niyamaḥ bhaviṣyati yathā śyene kaṇṭakaiḥ vitudanti iti udgātāraḥ vitotsyanti vājapeye coṣa puṭaiḥ arpayanti iti adhvaryavaḥ arpayiṣyanti 
[I,412,i_I,412,ii]	svāmi karma parikrayaḥ karmaṇaḥ tad artha tvāt asti parikrayaḥ jyotiṣṭome dvādaśa śatam darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ anvāhāryam tatra saṃdehaḥ kim adhvaryuṇā parikretavyāḥ ṛtvijaḥ uta svāminā iti kim prāptam samākhyānāt adhvaryuṇā iti prāpte brūmaḥ svāmi karma parikrayaḥ svayam karoti iti gamyate kasmāt karmaṇaḥ tad artha tvāt phala kāmaḥ hi yajamānaḥ yaḥ ca phala kāmaḥ tena svayam kartavyam sa yadi parikrīṇīte tatas svayam sarvam karoti iti gamyate atha na parikrīṇīte na sarvam kuryāt tasmāt svāmī parikrīṇīta iti 
[I,412,iii_I,412,iv]	vacanāt itareṣām syāt kim eṣaḥ eva utsargaḥ na iti ucyate vacanāt itareṣām syāt yatra vacanam bhavati tatra vacana prāmāṇyāt bhavati parikrayaḥ yaḥ etām iṣṭakām upadadhyāt sa trīn varān dadyāt iti 
[I,413,i_I,413,ii]	saṃskārāḥ tu puruṣa sāmarthye yathāvedam karma vat vyavatiṣṭheran jyotiṣṭome śrūyate keśa śmaśrū vapate dataḥ dhāvate nakhāni nikṛntate snāti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim evaṃjātīyakāḥ adhvaryuṇā kartavyāḥ uta yajamānena iti kim prāptam adhvaryuṇā kartavyāḥ saṃskārāḥ yathāvedam vyavatiṣṭheran samākhyānāt puruṣeṇa karma vat yathā anye padārthāḥ yasmin vedaḥ āmnātāḥ tad samākhyātena puruṣeṇa kriyante evam ete api iti 
[I,413,iii_I,413,iv]	yājamānāḥ tu tad pradhāna tvāt karma vat yajamānena vā kartavyāḥ kutas puruṣa pradhāna tvāt katham puruṣa prādhānyam kartṛ abhiprāyam kriyā phalam gamyate tasmāt puruṣasya karma karaṇa sāmarthyam upajanayanti na ca kaścid yena karma karaṇena sāmarthyam upajanyate tat artham puruṣān krīṇāti iti īpsitebhyaḥ padārthebhyaḥ krīṇāti yena yasya sāmarthyam bhavati tat tena eva kartavyam karma vat yathā pradhāna karmaṇi puruṣa arthāni yajamānasya bhavanti evam etat api iti 
[I,413,v_I,413,vi]	vyapadeśāt ca parasmaipada vyapadeśaḥ ca bhavati tam abhyanakti śara iṣīkayānakti iti ca anyaḥ yajamānasya añjanam abhyañjanam karoti iti gamyate 
[I,413,vii_I,413,viii]	guṇa tve tasya nirdeśaḥ yat uktam samākhyānāt yathāvedam iti na etat evam guṇa tve tasya nirdeśaḥ tatra vayam samākhyām niyāmikām icchāmaḥ yatra karmaṇaḥ prādhānyam yat artham kretavyāḥ puruṣāḥ prāptāḥ tatra samākhyayā niyamaḥ kalpyaḥ hi saṃbandhaḥ vapana ādibhiḥ puruṣāṇām adṛṣṭa artha tvāt kḷptaḥ ārāt upakārakaiḥ na ca kḷptaḥ upapadyamāne kalpyaḥ śakyaḥ kalpayitum tasmāt na puruṣa prādhānye samākhyā niyāmikā syāt 
[I,414,i_I,414,ii]	codanām prati bhāvāt ca codanā iti apūrvam brūmaḥ apūrvam prati saṃskārāḥ vidhīyante te hi asaṃbhavāt dravyeṣu kalpyante saṃnikṛṣṭa dravya abhāve ca viprakṛṣṭeṣu bhaveyuḥ yadā tu saṃnikṛṣṭe dravye saṃbhavanti tadā na viprakṛṣṭeṣu prayoktavyāḥ kṛtārtha tvāt tasmāt yājamānāḥ iti 
[I,414,iii_I,414,iv]	atulya tvāt asamāna vidhānāḥ syuḥ idam pada uttaram sūtram atha kasmāt na samāna vidhānāḥ bhavanti aviśeṣa vidhānāt dhi puruṣa mātrasya prāpnuvanti tat ucyate na etat samānam sarva puruṣāṇām vidhānam kutas atulya tvāt atulyāḥ ete etat vidhānam prati kātulya tā yat yajamānasya vihitāḥ na ṛtvijām katham yajamānasya vihitā iti agamyate arthāt svayam prayoge syāt iti 
[I,414,v]	nanu aviśeṣāt ṛtvijām api vihitāḥ prayojana abhāvāt avihitāḥ iti paśyāmaḥ katham prayojana abhāvaḥ ṛtvigbhiḥ kriyamāṇāḥ na yajamānena kṛtāḥ na kāritāḥ atad artha tvāt parikrayasya svayaṃkṛtāḥ ca na arthinaḥ upakurvanti tasmāt apryojanāḥ atas ṛtvijām avihitāḥ etat atulya tvam tasmāt na samāna vidhānāḥ iti 
[I,415,i_I,415,ii]	tapaḥ ca phala siddhi tvāt loka vat tapaḥ śrūyate dvi aham na aśnāti tri aham na aśnāti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ārtvijam tapaḥ yājamānam iti kim prāptam samākhyānāt ārtvijam tapaḥ iti prāptam evam prāpte brūmaḥ yājamānam tapaḥ iti kutas phala siddhi tvāt phala siddhi artham tapaḥ tapaḥ siddhasya yāga phalam siddhyati katham etat avagamyate duḥkham hi tapaḥ duḥkham ca adharma phalam adharmaḥ yāga phalasya pratibandhakaḥ bhavati aśreyaskaraḥ hi saḥ tasmin sati na śreyaḥ bhavitum arhati tasmāt saḥ apanetavyaḥ phala bhogena ca virudhyete dharma adharmau tasmāt duḥkha phala bhogāya dharmaḥ śrūyate yat tena duḥkham utpādya etavyam idam tat iti evam dṛṣṭa artham bhavati na adṛṣṭam kalpayitavyam tena phala upabhogena kṣīṇaḥ adharme apratibaddhaḥ yāgaḥ phalam dāsyati iti phala siddhiḥ ca yajamānasya kartavyā na ṛtvijām tasmāt yājamānam tapaḥ iti 
[I,415,iii_I,415,iv]	vākya śeṣaḥ ca tadvat etam eva artham vākya śeṣaḥ api dyotayati yadā vai puruṣe na kiṃcid āntarbhavati yadā asya kṛṣṇam cakṣuṣaḥ naśyati atha medhyatamaḥ iti yadā anaśanam tadā medhā arhaḥ iti medhaḥ ca yajñaḥ yajñaḥ ca tyāgaḥ tyāgam kartum arhaḥ tapasā kriyate iti vākya śeṣaḥ bhavati tyāgī ca yajamānaḥ tasmāt yājamānam tapaḥ iti 
[I,415,v_I,415,vi]	vacanāt itareṣām syāt kim eṣaḥ eva utsargaḥ sarvam tapaḥ yājamānam iti na vacanāt itareṣām yatra vacanam tatra ṛtvijām yathā sarve ṛtvijaḥ upavasanti iti 
[I,416,i_I,416,iv]	guṇa tvāt ca vedena na vyavasthā syāt atha yat uktam samākhyānāt artvijam tapaḥ iti guṇa tvāt na samākhyayā gṛhyate yatra puruṣasya guṇa bhāvaḥ tatra samākhyā niyāmikā evam vā śyene śrūyate lohita uṣṇīṣāḥ lohita vasanāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti tathā vājapeye śrūyate hiraṇyamālinaḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim śyenaḥ udgātṛbhiḥ lohita uṣṇīṣa tā kartavyā vājapeye ca adhvaryubhiḥ hiraṇya māli tvam uta ubhayam api sarva ṛtvijām iti kim tāvat prāptam samākhyānāt śyenaḥ udgātṛbhiḥ vājapeye adhvaryubhiḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ guṇa tvāt ca vedena na vyavasthā syāt guṇaḥ lohita uṣṇīṣa tā hiraṇyamāli tvam ca puruṣaḥ pradhānam atas lohitam uṣṇīṣam hiraṇyamālā ca puruṣa viśeṣaṇa tvena śrūyate na kartavya tayā tasmāt puruṣa prādhānyam kim atas yadi evam puruṣāṇām pradhāna bhāve samākhyā na niyāmikā iti etat uktam api ca guṇa tva śravaṇāt sarva puruṣāṇām etat vidhānam iti gamyate pradhāna saṃnidhau hi guṇaḥ śiṣyamānaḥ pratipradhānam upadiṣṭaḥ bhavati tatra vacanena prāptam katham samākhyayā vidyamānayā api niyantum śakyeta tasmāt ubhayatra sarva ṛtvigbhiḥ evaṃjātīyakaḥ dharmaḥ kriyeta iti 
[I,417,i_I,417,ii]	tathā kāmaḥ artha saṃyogāt jyotiṣṭome samāmananti yadi kāmayeta varṣet parjanyaḥ iti nīcais sadaḥ minuyāt iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ārtvijaḥ kāmaḥ atha yājamānaḥ iti kim evam yadi kāmayeta adhvaryuḥ iti uta yajamānaḥ iti evam saṃśayaḥ kim prāptam ārtvijaḥ kāmaḥ samākhyānāt arthī prakṛtaḥ adhvaryuḥ sa vākyena saṃbadhyate minuyāt iti tasmāt ārtvijaḥ kāmaḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ tathā kāmaḥ syāt yathā
[I,417,iii]	tapaḥ yājamānaḥ kāmaḥ iti arthaḥ kutas artha saṃyogāt arthena yāgasya sa aṅgasya yajamānaḥ phalena saṃbadhyate iti gamyate upagraha viśeṣāt jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti upagraha viśeṣāḥ ca minuyāt iti adhvaryuḥ para artham iti gamyate atha yat uktam prakṛtena arthinā saha eka vākya tvāt iti ucyate evam api prakṛtena vākyena saha eka vākyatā yajamāne kāmayamāne minuyāt iti 
[I,417,iv_I,417,v]	vyapadeśāt itareṣām syāt yatra bhavati vyapadeśaḥ tatra ārtvijaḥ kāmaḥ bhavati yathā udgātā ātmane vā yajamānāya vā yam kāmam kāmayate tam āgāyati iti yadi ātmanaḥ iti yajamānāya iti parikalpyeta yajamāna grahaṇam vā śabdaḥ ca na samarthitau syātām tasmāt yajamāna vyapadeśāt ātmānam eva udgātā pratinirdiśati iti gamyate 
[I,418,i_I,418,iii]	mantrāḥ ca akarma karaṇāḥ tadvat iha evaṃjātīyakāḥ mantrāḥ udāharaṇam āyuḥ dāḥ agne āyuḥ me dehi iti varcaḥ dāḥ agne asi varcaḥ me dehi iti eṣu saṃdehaḥ kim ārtvijāḥ uta yājamānāḥ iti samākhyānāt ārtvijāḥ iti prāptam evam prāpte brūmaḥ mantrāḥ ca ete tadvat bhaveyuḥ yathā kāmaḥ evam ātma abhidhāyi padam yuktam bhavati āyuḥ me varcaḥ me iti āyuḥ varcaḥ iti evamādibhiḥ karma phalam abhidhīyate agne tvam karma phalam me sādhaya iti tat iha karma phalam utsāha artham saṃkīrtyate yajamānaḥ ca tena utsahate na anyaḥ yat ṛtvijaḥ krama phalam na tat arthaḥ agniḥ siddham hi tat yat yajamānasya tat arthaḥ agniḥ tat ca asiddham sat āśāsitavyam yat utsāham janayati avaiguṇyāya ṛtvij api siddhe yat utsahate tat yajamānasya eva karma phalāya utsahate tatra ātma abhidhāyi padam na avakalpate yajamāne ca ātmā abhidhāyi padam kalpyamānam agauṇam bhavati tasmāt yājamānāḥ 
[I,418,iv_I,418,v]	viprayoge ca darśanāt viprayoge ca agnīnām pravāse upasthānam asti iha eva san tatra santam tvā agne iti na ca proṣitaḥ agnibhyaḥ ṛtvij bhavati karma kurvataḥ eṣa vācakaḥ śabdaḥ bhavati tu yajamānaḥ agnibhyaḥ proṣitaḥ api yajamānaḥ saṃvidhāya saḥ agnihotrāya pravasati śakyate ca videśa sthena api tyāgaḥ kartum saḥ eva proṣitasya upasthāna viśeṣam bruvan yajamānasya upasthānam darśayati tena eva evaṃjātīyakāḥ yajamānasya bhaveyuḥ iti 
[I,419,i_I,419,ii]	dvi āmnāteṣu ubhau dvi āmnasya arthavat tvāt staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra dvi āmnātāḥ mantrāḥ ādhvaryave kāṇḍe yājamāne ca ājyam yaiḥ gṛhyate pañcānām tvā vātānām yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi iti evamādayaḥ tathā sruc vyūhana mantrāḥ srucau vyūhati vājasya mā prasavena iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim te ubhābhyām api kartavyā uta adhvaryuṇā eva iti kim prāptam samākhyānāt ādhvaryavā iti iti prāptaḥ ucyate ubhau api tān prayuñjīyātām iti kutas dvi āmnātasya arthavat tvāt dvābhyām samākhyānāt dvau api kartārau gamyete tasmāt dvau brūyātām adhvaryuḥ etena prakāśitam anuṣṭhāsyāmi iti yajamānaḥ na pramadiṣyāmi iti 
[I,419,iii_I,419,v]	jñāte ca vācanam na hi avidvān vihitaḥ asti vājapeye śrūyate kḷptīḥ yajamānam vācayati ujjisatīḥ yajamānam vācayati iti atra saṃdehaḥ kim jñaḥ ca ajñaḥ ca sarvaḥ vācayitavyaḥ uta jñaḥ eva iti kim prāptam aviśeṣāt jñaḥ ca ajñaḥ ca iti iti prāpte brūmaḥ jñaḥ eva iti kutas na hi avidvān vihitaḥ asti yaḥ hi avidvān na asau adhikṛtaḥ sāmarthya abhāvāt nanu prayoga kāle śikṣitvā prayokṣyate sāmarthyāt adhikriyeta iti na iti brūmaḥ veda adhyayanāt uttara kāle prayogaḥ śrūyate na prayoga śruti gṛhītam veda adhyayanam kutas anārabhyakarmaṇi vede śrūyate tasmāt svādhyayaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti sati etasmin vacane agnihotram juhuyāt iti evamādibhiḥ vedaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti etat uktam bhavati iti na śakyate kalpayitum tatra homa mātre codite veda adhyāyī śaktaḥ iti adhikriyate na avidvān kiyatā punar viditena vidvān adhikriyate iti yāvatā viditena śaktaḥ bhavati yathā uktam kratum abhinirvartayitum tasmāt tāvat yaḥ veda sa tena kratunā adhikriyate 
[I,420,i]	nanu vedam adhīyīta iti vacanāt kṛtsnaḥ vedaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti bhavati na veda avayavena adhīkriyate iti ucyate kratūnām jñāna artham veda adhyayanam kāryam tatra anyasmin kratau kartavye anyakratu jñānam na dṛṣṭāya bhavati tasmāt kratu antara jñānam adhikāre na ādartavyam kratu antara jñānāya kratu antara granthaḥ sarve kratavaḥ katham jñāyeran pṛthak pṛthak iti kṛtsnasya vedasya adhyayanam śrūyate tasmāt sva padārtha jñaḥ adhikriyeta iti tena asvapadārtha jñasya karma eva na asti kathama asau vācyeta tasmāt sādhu abhidhīyate jñaḥ eva vācayitavyaḥ iti 
[I,420,ii_I,421,i]	yājamāne samākhyānāt karmāṇi yājamānam syuḥ staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra karmāṇi āmnātāni dvādaśa vatsam ca upāvasṛjati ukhām ca adhiśrayati ava ca hanti dṛṣad u pale ca samāhanti adhi ca vapate kapālāni ca upadadhāti puroḍāśam ca adhiśrayate ājyam ca stambayajuḥ ca harati abhi ca gṛhṇāti vedam ca parigṛhṇāti patnīm ca saṃnahyati prokṣaṇīḥ ca āsādayati ājyam ca tāni dvādaśa dvāndvāni darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ iti atra saṃdehaḥ kim etāni adhvaryoḥ karmāṇi uta yajamānasya iti kim prāptam yajamāne samākhyānāt karmāṇi yājamānam syuḥ viśeṣa samākhyānāt yājamānāni iti gamyate yathā potrīyam na iṣṭrī iyam iti 
[I,421,ii_I,421,iii]	adhvaryuḥ vā tad arthaḥ hi nyāya pūrvam samākhyānam adhvaryuḥ vā kuryāt etāni tat arthaḥ hi adhvaryuḥ parikrītaḥ iti samākhyānāt avagamyate adhvaryavaḥ eva sarve ime padārthāḥ samāmnātāḥ yājamānaḥ eṣām dvandvatā ucyate dvandva tā ca samabhyāśa kriyā tatra adhvaryuḥ padārthān kariṣyati yajamānena api samabhyāśīkaraṇam iti etat aśakyam tatra aṅga guṇa virodhe ca tādarthyāt iti dvandva tā guṇaḥ bādhitavyaḥ tasmāt ādhvaryavāḥ ete padārthāḥ iti 
[I,421,iv]	yat uktam samākhyānāt iti tat parihartavyam ucyate nyāya pūrvam samākhyānam samākhyānāt yajamānena dvandvatā saṃpādayitavyā idam ca idam ca saṃpādaya iti yajamānaḥ brūyāt keṣucid ca atra padārtheṣu yajamānasya anumantaraṇam tad nimittā samākhyā bhaviṣyati apūrvam tu apakṛṣyeta tat uktam yathā potrīyam na iṣṭrīyam iti evam atra api iti tat ucyate yuktam tatra viśeṣa samākhyānāt iha tu dvandvatā yājamānīyā padārthāḥ tu ādhvaryavā eva tasmāt adoṣaḥ 
[I,422,i_I,422,ii]	vipratiṣedhe karaṇaḥ samavāya viśeṣāt itaram anyaḥ teṣām yatas viśeṣaḥ syāt asti jyotiṣṭome paśuḥ agniṣomīyaḥ tasya yūpasya parivyāṇe mantrau ekaḥ adhvaryoḥ parivīrasi iti karaṇaḥ aparaḥ hotuḥ yuvā su vāsāḥ iti kriyamāṇa anuvādī tayoḥ ca udaka paramparayā kuṇḍapāyinām ayanam prāptayoḥ bhavati saṃdehaḥ kaḥ punar asau tatra ṛtvij samāsaḥ āmnātaḥ yaḥ hotā saḥ adhvaryuḥ iti kim karaṇam ādhvaryavam hotā kuryāt kim hautram kriyamāṇa anuvādinam iti kim prāptam aniyamaḥ iti 
[I,422,iii]	iti prāptaḥ uccyate vipratiṣedhe karaṇaḥ syāt ādhvaryavaḥ parivīrasi iti na kriyamāṇa anuvādī hotuḥ yuvā su vāsāḥ iti kutas samavāya viśeṣāt dvau tatra samavāyau hotuḥ ca udakena hautreṣu pratyakṣa śravaṇena adhvaryaveṣu yaḥ hotā saḥ adhvaryuḥ iti evam pratyakṣam adhvaryoḥ kārye ca udyate pratyakṣam ca anumānāt balīyaḥ tasmāt ādhvaryavam karaṇam parivīrasi iti hotā kuryāt atha hautram viruddham kaḥ kuryāt itaram anyaḥ teṣām yatas viśeṣaḥ syāt anyaḥ hotṛ puruṣaḥ eva syāt yasya avyāpṛta tā prādhānya viśeṣaḥ vā 
[I,423,i_I,423,ii]	praiṣeṣu ca para adhikārāt staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra praiṣāḥ samānātāḥ prokṣaṇīḥ āsādaya idhmā barhiḥ upasādhaya srucaḥ saṃmṛḍḍhi patnīm saṃnahya ājyena udehi iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim yaḥ eva praiṣe saḥ eva praiṣa arthe uta anyaḥ ca praiṣe anyaḥ ca praiṣa arthaḥ iti kim prāptam ekaḥ eva praiṣa praiṣa arthayoḥ iti kutas samākhyānāt anyaḥ iti ca aśrūta tvāt 
[I,423,iii]	nanu ātmanaḥ praiṣaḥ vipratiṣidhyate ucyate na praiṣaḥ bhaviṣyati prāpta kāle loṭam vakṣyāmaḥ āha prāpta kāle api sati yuṣmad ādiṣu eva upapadeṣu madhyama ādayaḥ vyavasthitāḥ na puruṣa saṃskaraḥ bhavati ucyate satyām vivakṣāyām yuṣmad ādiṣu madhyama ādayaḥ yadā tava prāptaḥ kālaḥ iti vivakṣyate tadā yuṣmat eva madhyamaḥ na asmadi śeṣe vā yadā khalu kriyāyāḥ prāptaḥ kālaḥ iti etāvat vivakṣyate na tava mama vā iti na tadā yuṣmad ādīnām anurodhena madhyama ādayaḥ bhavitum arhanti na ca idam yugapad vivakṣitum śakyate padārthasya prāptaḥ kālaḥ tava ca iti bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam tena yadi vā nirjñāte padārtha kāle tava kālaḥ iti śakyate vaditum yadi vā tava iti nirjñāte padārthasya kālaḥ iti tatra padārthasya kālaḥ vaditavyaḥ na tu yauṣmadarthasya tena hi smṛtena prayojanam sa hi kartavyaḥ iti avagataḥ na tu yuṣmad arthaḥ tathā tasmāt samākhyāyāt adhvaryoḥ eva praiṣa praiṣa arthau iti 
[I,423,iv]	iti prāpte brūmaḥ praiṣeṣu anyaḥ anyaḥ tad artheṣu iti kutas para adhikārāt parasmin hi praiṣaḥ upapadyate na ātmani iti āha nanu uktam prāpta kāle bhaviṣyati iti ucyate na saṃbhavati praiṣa prāpta kāla tā nyāyyā tasya hi yuṣmad arthaḥ gamyamānaḥ na vivakṣitaḥ iti ucyate saṃbhavati ca atra praiṣa arthaḥ tasmāt praiṣaḥ praiṣaḥ ced anyaḥ praiṣa arthaḥ iti siddham 
[I,424,i_I,424,ii]	adhvaryuḥ tu darśanāt atha evam gate idam saṃdihyate kim adhvaryuḥ agnīdhram preṣyet uta agnīt adhvaryum iti aniyamaḥ aviśeṣāt iti prāpte brūmaḥ adhvaryuḥ ukta praiṣa artha kārī syāt kutas darśanāt darśanam bhavati tiryan ca sphyam dhārayet yat anvañcam dhārayet vajraḥ vai sphyaḥ vajreṇa adhvaryum kṣiṇvīta iti yaḥ preṣyati tasya haste sphyaḥ sphyena adhvaryum kṣiṇvīta iti anyam adhvaryum preṣakāt darśayati tasmāt agnīt adhvaryum preṣyet iti 
[I,424,iii_I,424,iv]	gauṇaḥ vā karma sāmānyāt na etat asti agnīdhraḥ praiṣaḥ adhvaryoḥ praiṣa arthaḥ iti kim khalu adhvaryuḥ eva agnīdham preṣyet evam adhvaryuṇā praiṣaḥ praiṣa arthaḥ ca ubhau api kṛtau bhaviṣyataḥ tatra adhvaryavam iti samākhyā anugrahī iṣyate tasmāt adhvaryuḥ eva mukhyam syāt kim asya mukhya tvam yat anena sarvam kartavyam samākhyānāt iti atha yat uktam adhvaryuḥ pracaritā dṛśyate iti tat ucyate satyam dṛśyate na tu asya praiṣa artha karaṇe pramāṇam asti cintyamānam tasmāt etat mithyā darśanam yasya hi darśanasya pramāṇam na asti vyāmohaḥ saḥ yathā śuktikāyām rajata vijñānam asti tu agnīdhraḥ praiṣa artha karaṇe pramāṇam tasmāt agnīdhraḥ pracaritā pracaritari ca adhvaryu śabdaḥ dṛśyate tasmāt gauṇaḥ ādhvaryave vede samāmnātān padārthān karoti iti kṛtvā adhvaryuḥ iti ucyate āgnīdhraḥ iti tasmāt ādhvaryavaḥ praiṣaḥ āgnīdhraḥ praiṣa arthaḥ iti 
[I,425,i_I,425,ii]	ṛtvij phalam karaneṣu arthavat tvāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ āmananti mama agne varcaḥ vihaveṣu astu iti pūrvam agnim parigṛhṇāti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ṛtvij phalam āśāsitavyam agne varcaḥ vihaveṣu astu iti uta yajamānasya iti kim prāptam adhvaryoḥ eva iti kutas evam śrutiḥ ādṛtā bhavisyati itarathā lakṣaṇā syāt ātmanā yajamānam lakṣayet tasmāt ṛtvij phalam āśāsitavyam iti kaḥ arthaḥ anayā samidhā dhāryamāṇe agnau yāgaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati tatra vihaveṣu spardhā sthāneṣu aham varcasvī bhaviṣyāmi iti adhvaryoḥ vacanam evam utsāhī bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,425,iii_I,425,iv]	svāminaḥ vā tad artha tvāt yajamānasya vā vacanam tad artha tvāt karmaṇaḥ yajamāna artham hi idam karma sa aṅgam upagraha viśeṣāt sāṅgasya asya prayojanam yajamānasya phala niṣpattiḥ na adhvaryoḥ su pravarituḥ api yaśaḥ kim atas yadi evam phala saṃkīrtanāt phala kartavyatā gamyate tat etat agni anvādhānam yajamānasya phala saṃkīrtane kriyamāṇe anena mantreṇa phala saṃbandhāt prakāśitam kṛtam bhavati na adhvaryu yaśaḥ kīrtanena tasmāt yajamāna phalam āśāsitavyam iti atha kasmāt na yājamānaḥ eṣa mantraḥ bhavati iti ucyate agni anvādhānam samākhyayā adhvaryavam tat ca evam guṇaḥ mantraḥ karoti ādhvaryavaḥ saḥ ucyate anena mantreṇa iti tasmāt ādhvaryavaḥ mantraḥ mama varcaḥ astu ati api yajamānasya varcaḥ mama iti vyapadiśati lakṣaṇayā yathā rājani jayam vartamānam sainikāḥ asmākam iti vyapadiśanti evam 
[I,426,i_I,426,ii]	liṅga draśanāt ca liṅgam api amum artham darśayati evam hi āha yām vai kāṃcanaḥ ṛtvijaḥ āśiṣam āśāsate yajamānasya eva sā iti āśiṣaḥ yajamāna arthaka tām darśayati tasmāt api brūmaḥ yajamāna phalam āśāsitavyam iti pakṣa uktam eva prayojanam iti 
[I,426,iii_I,426,iv]	karma artham tu phalam teṣām svāminam pratyarthavat tvāt idam samadhigatam karaṇeṣu mantreṣu svāminaḥ phalam āśāsitavyam iti kim eṣaḥ eva utsargaḥ na iti āha kvacid ṛtvijām api phalam āśāsitavyam iti yatra karma artham phalam yathā agnāviṣṇū mā avakra miṣam vijihāthām māmā saṃtāptam iti asaṃtaptaḥ adhvaryuḥ karma śaknoti kartum karma siddhiḥ yajamānasya upakārikā iti ṛtvij phalam āśāsitavyam atra iti 
[I,427,i_I,427,ii]	vyapadeśāt ca yatra ca vyapadeśaḥ bhavati tatra ārtvijam dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasya adhas tāt catvāraḥ uparavāḥ prāveśa mukhyāḥ pradeśa antarālāḥ tatra hastau praveśya adhvaryuḥ yajamānam āha kim atra iti saḥ āha bhadram iti tat nau saha iti adhvaryuḥ pratyāha iti vyapadeśaḥ bhavati adhvaryoḥ yajamānasya ca tat nau saha iti ubhayoḥ vacanam adhvaryu yajamānayoḥ tasmāt adhvaryu phalam āśāsitavyam atra iti 
[I,427,iii_I,427,iv]	dravya saṃskāraḥ prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt sarva karmaṇām darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ barhiḥ dharmāḥ vedi dharmāḥ ca teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim aṅga pradhāna arthāḥ uta pradhāna arthāḥ iti prakaraṇāt pradhāna arthāḥ iti iti prāptaḥ ucyate na evam dravya saṃskāraḥ aṅga pradhāna arthaḥ yathā vyākhyātam eva uttara vivakṣayā prāptiḥ eṣā kriyate iti
