[I,428,i_I,428,iii]	nirdeśāt tu vikṛta apūrvasya anadhikāraḥ jyotiṣṭome paśuḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yat agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhate iti tatra śrūyate barhiṣā yūpāvaṭam avastṛṇāti ājyena yūpam anakti iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim tayoḥ ājya barhiṣoḥ ājya barhiḥ dharmāḥ prākṛtāḥ kartavyāḥ uta na iti kim prāptam kartavyāḥ iti kutas vākyam hi barhiḥ mātrasya ājya mātrasya ca dharmāṇām vidhāyakam tat iha api vākyam ca udakena prāptam na ca etat barhiḥ ājyam niṣprayojanam tasmāt atra dharmāḥ kiyeran iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ nirdeśāt vikṛtau apūrvasya anadhikāraḥ nirdiṣṭāḥ ete dharmāḥ prakṛtau yatra pradhānasya upakurvanti prākṛta kāryayoḥ ājya barhiṣoḥ ye ca pradhānasya upakāriṇaḥ dharmāḥ te iha atidiśyante pradhānam hi ca udakaḥ apekṣate na dharmān pradhānasya hi ca udakena sāmānyam na dharmāṇām 
[I,428,iv]	api ca na anya arthaḥ iti jñātena saṃnihitena api eka vākyatā bhavati anya saṃbandha upapattau satyām yathā bhāryā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ devadattasya iti kim aṅga punar viprakṛtena nirjñātam khalu aṅga tvam pradhāna apekṣāyām bhavati kevalam iha atideśaḥ kriyate padārtha apekṣāyām aṅga tvam api sādhayitavyam syāt dharmāḥ ca apekṣyamāṇāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ bhaveyuḥ tathā ūhaḥ na avakalpeta liṅga viśeṣa darśanāt ca vyavatiṣṭheran dharmāḥ tatra darśanam na upapadyeta vapayā prātaḥsavane caranti puroḍāśena mādhyaṃdinaḥ iti tathā na pitā vardhate na mātā na nābhiḥ prāṇaḥ hi saḥ iti tasmāt yat dvārā prakṛtau kṛtāḥ tat dvārā eva vikṛtau na anya dvārāḥ na ca yūpāvaṭaḥ taraṇam prakṛtau asti yūpāñjanam vā tasmāt na tatra prākṛtāḥ dharmāḥ bhaveyuḥ apūrva tvāt 
[I,429,i_I,429,ii]	virodhe ca śruti viśeṣāt avyaktaḥ śeṣe darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ āmananti samauvapracchinna agrau darbhau prādeśa mātrau pavitre karoti tathā aratni mātre vidhṛtī pavitre uta anyate iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim vedistaraṇa arthāt barhiṣaḥ vidhṛtī pavitre uta anyate iti kim tāvat prāptam vedistaraṇa arthāt barhiṣaḥ kārye kim kāraṇam tat dhi prakṛtam dharmāḥ ca aviśeṣāt sarva barhiṣām arthena tasmāt tatas iti prāpte brūmaḥ anyatas kriyeta kutas virodhāt katham virodhaḥ śrūyate hi tridhā tu pañcadhā tu vā vedīm stṛṇāti iti tat yena āsti īryate katham tat vidhṛti pavitram kriyeta na hi saṃbhavati ekam staraṇāya vidhṛti pavitrāya ca tat etat upadiṣṭa vacanam aneka guṇa tvam ca ubhe api asaṃbhavinī pratijñāte syātām tasmāt na tatas kriyeta iti yadi na tatas kutas tarhi avyaktaḥ evaṃjātīyakaḥ śeṣe asti tatra paribhojanīyam nāma barhiḥ tatas kartavyam 
[I,429,iii_I,429,iv]	apanayanaḥ tu eka deśasya vidyamāna saṃyogāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate puroḍāśa śakalam aindra vāyavasya pātre nidadhāti dhānāḥ āśvina pātre payasyām maitrāvaruṇa pātraḥ iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim anyatas eṣām kriyeta uta prakṛtebhyaḥ iti kim prāptam pūrveṇa nyāyena anyatas iti tatra ucyate tatas eka deśasya apanayaḥ kutas vidyamāna saṃyogāt vidyate hi tatra puroḍāśaḥ dhānāḥ payasyā ca tad saṃyogaḥ eva nyāyyaḥ na anya saṃyogaḥ iti puroḍāśa ādīnām eva saṃskāraḥ na indra vāyava ādīnām kutas puroḍāśa ādiṣu dvitīya adarśanāt pratyakṣaḥ ca eka deśa apanayena upakāraḥ na indra vāyava ādi saṃbandhena evam prakṛta anugrahaḥ bhaviṣyati tasmāt prakṛtasya upadeśena tat kriyeta na ca atra upadiṣṭa upadeśaḥ āśaṅkyaḥ aneka guṇa bhāvaḥ ca anyena śakalena homaḥ anyaḥ ca pratipādyate iti 
[I,430,i_I,430,ii]	vikṛtau sarva arthaḥ śeṣaḥ prakṛti vat idam āmananti yajña arthavaṇam vai kāmyāḥ iṣṭayaḥ tāḥ upāṃśu kartavyāḥ iti atra saṃśayaḥ kim aṅga pradhāna artham upāṃśu tvam uta pradhāna artham iti kim prāptam vikṛtau sarva arthaḥ śeṣaḥ syāt aviśeṣāt aṅgānām pradhānānām ca prakṛti vat yathā prakṛtau vedi dharmāḥ ājya dharmāḥ ca aṅga pradhāna arthāḥ evam atra api 
[I,430,iii_I,430,iv]	mukhya arthaḥ vā aṅgasya ācodita tvāt pradhāna arthaḥ vai eṣa vikṛtiṣu syāt evam idam sarva artham ucyeta prakaraṇam bādhitvā vākyena aṅga pradhāna artham iti tat eva idānīm vākyam viśeṣitam kāmyāḥ iṣṭayaḥ iti kāmyāḥ ca pradhāna yāgāḥ aṅga yāgāḥ pradhāna arthāḥ tasmāt aṅga coditam yat kāmena phalavat codyate tat eva anayā upāṃśu tvā iti kartavya tayā anubadhyate tasmāt pradhāna artham upāṃśu tvam 
[I,431,i_I,431,ii]	saṃnidhāna viśeṣāt asaṃbhave tad aṅgānām śyene śrūyate dṛta navanītam ājyam iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim navanītam pradhānasya uta aṅgānām iti kim prāptam pradhānasya tasya hi prakaraṇam iti vacana prāmāṇyāt navanītena pradhānam nirvartayitavyam iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ asaṃbhavaḥ etasmin tad aṅgānām śyena aṅgānām syāt katham asaṃbhavaḥ soma dravyaka tvāt pradhānasya nanu vacanāt navanītam bhaviṣyati na śyene navanītam bhavati iti eṣa vākya arthaḥ kaḥ tarhi śyene navanītam ājyam bhavati iti navanīta ājya saṃbandhaḥ vidhīyate śyena ājya saṃbandhaḥ anūdyate na ca sākṣāt śyenasya ājya saṃbandhaḥ asti śyena aṅgānām tu vidyate yasya asti tasya anūdya navanītam vidhīyate saṃnidhāna viśeṣāt 
[I,431,iii_I,431,iv]	ādhāne api tathā iti ced evam ced dṛśyate śyena aṅgānām navanītam iti ādhāne api pavamāna iṣṭiṣu syāt tāḥ api hi śyenasya upakurvanti tad saṃskṛte agnau śyenaḥ nirvartate iti 
[I,431,v_I,431,vi]	na aprakaraṇa tvāt aṅgasya tad nimitta tvāt na śyenasya prakaraṇe pavamāna iṣṭayaḥ agni ādhānam vā śrūyate kim atas yadi evam ādhānasya ca śyenasya ca na kaścid asti saṃbandhaḥ agnīnām ādhānam agnayaḥ ca śyenasya tasmāt na pavamāna haviḥṣu navanītam na etat śyena aṅga tve nimittam yat ādhānam agnīnām upakaroti yadi prakaraṇa ādīnām anyatamat asti tat nimittam bhavet tasmāt na śyena agni ādhānayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ asti iti 
[I,432,i_I,432,ii]	tad kāle vā liṅga darśanāt idam idānīm saṃdihyate kim sutyā kālānām aṅgānām navanītam uta sarveṣām iti sutyā kālānām syāt liṅga darśanāt idam śrūyate saha paśūn ālabhate iti tatra punar vacanam agnīṣomīyasya sthāne agnīṣomīyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ anubandhyāyāḥ sthāne maitrāvaruṇīyasya iti dve sthāne śrūnye darśayati tena avagamyate śyenasya vacanam sutyā kālānām aṅgānām viśeṣam vidadhāti iti 
[I,432,iii_I,432,iv]	sarveṣām vā aviśeṣāt sarveṣām eva ca aṅgānām navanītam syāt kutas aviśeṣāt asati viśeṣe sarveṣām api aṅgānām iti 
[I,432,v_I,432,vi]	nyāya ukte liṅga darśanam yat uktam liṅgam tat pariharaṇīyam na asti tāvat pramāṇam yat śyenasya vacanam tat stutyā kālānām aṅgānām iti kim tu darśanam tat apramāṇa mūla tvāt mithyā darśanam mṛgatṛṣṇā vat katham tu madhye paśūnām ālambhaḥ iti nyāyāt kaḥ nyāyaḥ krama anugrahaḥ evam vacana varjitaḥ kramaḥ anugṛhītaḥ bhavati iti tasmāt sarveṣām aṅgānām navanītam iti 
[I,433,i_I,433,ii]	māṃsam tu savanīyānām codanā viśeṣāt śākyānām ayanam ṣaṭtriṃśat saṃvatsaram tatra idam samāmananti saṃsthite saṃsthite ahāni gṛhapatiḥ mṛgayām yāti sa tatra yān mṛgān hanti teṣām tarasāḥ puruḍāśāḥ savanīyāḥ bhavanti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim savanīyānām anyeṣām ca saṃbhavatām puroḍāśānām sthāne tarasā uta savanīyānām eva iti kim prāptam sarva puroḍāśānām māṃsa maya tā syāt na śakyate puroḍāśānām ca māṃsa maya tā vidhātum savanīya śabdena ca puroḍāśān viśeṣayitum bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam tasmāt sarva puroḍāśānām māṃsa maya tā iti iti prāpte ucyate māṃsam tu savanīyānām syāt tarasāḥ savanīyāḥ bhavanti iti ayam tu anūdyate kutas etat sarva puroḍāśeṣu savanīya śabdaḥ anuvādaḥ na ghaṭate puroḍāśa śabdaḥ tu savanīyeṣu avakalpate tasmāt puroḍāśa śabdaḥ anuvādaḥ iti tasmāt savanīyānām dhānā ādīnām sthāne māṃsam codanā śeṣāt iti 
[I,433,iii_I,433,iv]	bhaktiḥ asaṃnidhau anyāyya iti ced iti ced paśyasi savanīyeṣu puroḍāśa śabdaḥ anuvādaḥ bhaviṣyati iti dhānā ādiṣu puroḍāśa śabdaḥ na vartate bhaktiḥ ca anyāyyāḥ mukhye saṃbhavati 
[I,434,i_I,434,ii]	syāt prakṛti liṅga tvāt vairāja vat prakṛtau jyotiṣṭome dhānā ādiṣu ayam puroḍāśa śabdaḥ bhāktaḥ saṃnihite prayuktaḥ iha api bhāktaḥ eva prayokṣyate atra api hi savanīya śabdena te saṃnihitāḥ prakṛtau liṅga samavāyāt śabda pravṛttiḥ vikṛtau api tathā eva yathā chatriṇaḥ gacchanti dhvajinaḥ gacchanti iti yathā ukthyaḥ vairūpasāmā ekaviṃśaḥ poḍaśī vairāja sāmāḥ iti prakṛti liṅgena sāma śabdena vairūpa pṛṣṭhaḥ vairāja pṛṣṭhaḥ iti gamyate evam iha api savanīyānām māṃsa maya tā iti 
[I,435,i_I,435,ii]	atha atas kratu artha puruṣa arthayoḥ jijñāsā tṛtīye adhyāye śruti liṅga vākya prakaraṇa sthāna samākhyānaiḥ śeṣa viniyoga lakṣaṇam uktam iha idānīm kratu artha puruṣa arthau jijñāsyete kaḥ kratu arthaḥ kaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ iti yā api prayojakā prayojaka phala vidhi artha vāda aṅga pradhāna cintā sā api kratu artha puruṣa artha jijñāsā eva katham aṅgam kratu arthaḥ pradhānam puruṣa arthaḥ phala vidhiḥ puruṣa arthaḥ artha vādaḥ kratu arthaḥ prayojakaḥ kaścid puruṣa arthaḥ aprayojakaḥ kratu arthaḥ tasmāt kratu artha puruṣa arthayoḥ jijñāsā iti sūtritam tatra atha atas śabdau prathamaḥ eva adhyāye prathama sūtre varṇitau atha iti prakṛtam śeṣa viniyoga lakṣaṇam apekṣate atas iti kratu artha puruṣa artha jijñāsā viśeṣam prakurute kratave yaḥ sa kratu arthaḥ puruṣāya yaḥ sa puruṣa arthaḥ jijñāsā śabdaḥ api tatra eva samadhigataḥ jñātum icchā jijñāsā iti tat etat pratijñā sūtram kratu artha puruṣa arthayoḥ jijñāsā iti 
[I,435,iii_I,435,iv]	yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasya tasya lipsā artha lakṣaṇā vibhaktavāt atha kiṃlakṣaṇaḥ kratu arthaḥ kiṃlakṣaṇaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ iti lakṣaṇam vācyam tathā hi laghīyasī pratipattiḥ pṛṣṭā koṭena upadeśe garīyasī tat ucyate yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasya yasmin kṛte padārthe puruṣasya prītiḥ bhavati sa puruṣa arthaḥ padārthaḥ kutas tasya lipsā arthena ca bhavati na śāstreṇa kratu arthaḥ hi śāstrāt avagamyate na anyathā avibhaktaḥ hi puruṣa arthaḥ prītyā yaḥ yaḥ prīti sādhanaḥ sa puruṣa arthaḥ puruṣa arthe lakṣite tad viparītaḥ kratu arthaḥ iti kratu arthasya lakṣaṇam siddham 
[I,436,i]	evam vā sūtram varṇyate darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ āmnāyate anatidṛśyam stṛṇāti anatidṛśyam eva enam prajayā paśubhiḥ karoti iti tathā āhārya purīṣām paśu kāmasya vedim kuryāt vatsa jānum paśu kāmasya vedam kuryāt go dohanena paśu kāmasya praṇayet iti evamādīni tatra saṃśayaḥ kim evaṃjātīyakāḥ kratu arthāḥ uta puruṣa arthāḥ iti kim prāptam kratu arthaḥ iti kutas pratyakṣaḥ upakāraḥ tebhyaḥ dṛśyate kratoḥ purīṣa haraṇam vedistaraṇam ca tat uktam dravya guṇa saṃskāreṣu bādariḥ iti tasmāt kratu arthāḥ iti evam prāptam 
[I,436,ii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasya sa puruṣa arthaḥ eva iti prītiḥ tebhyaḥ nirvartate tasmāt ete puruṣa arthāḥ iti nanu pratyakṣaḥ upakāraḥ kratoḥ dṛśyate iti uktam ucyate satyam dṛśyate na tu kratoḥ upakārāya ebhyaḥ saṃkīrti tebhyaḥ phalebhyaḥ ete śrūyante na ca yaḥ upakaroti sa śeṣaḥ yaḥ tu yad arthaḥ śrūyate sa tasya śeṣaḥ iti uktam śeṣaḥ parārtha tvāt iti 
[I,436,iii]	evam vā dravya arjanam udāharaṇam iha dravya arjanam taiḥ taiḥ niyamaiḥ śrūyate brāhmaṇasya pratigraha ādinā rājanyasya jaya ādinā vaiśyasya kṛṣi ādinā tatra saṃdehaḥ kim kratu arthaḥ dravya parigrahaḥ uta puruṣa arthaḥ iti kim prāptam kratu arthaḥ niyamāt yadi eṣa puruṣa arthaḥ syāt niyamaḥ anarthakaḥ bhavet pratyakṣeṇa etat avagamyate niyamāt aniyamāt ca arjitam dravyam puruṣam prīṇayati iti tasmāt kratu arthaḥ kāmaśrutibhiḥ ca asya saha eka vākyatā dṛṣṭā itarathā anumeyena phala vākyena saha eka vākya tām yāyāt liṅgam ca api bhavati agnaye kṣāmavate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālam nirvapet yasya āhitāgneḥ sataḥ agniḥ gṛhān dahet yasya hiraṇyam naśyet āgneya ādīni nirvapet iti evamādi tat dhi dravya upaghāte codyate yadi dravya parigrahaḥ karma arthaḥ tatas etat api sati saṃbandhe karma artham iti ucyate itarartha asati saṃbandhe karma artham iti anumīyate phalam ca asya kalpyeta tasmāt yajati śruti gṛhītam dravya arjanam yena vinā yogaḥ na nirvartate sa yāgasya śrutyā parigṛhītaḥ iti gamyate tasmāt kratu arthaḥ iti 
[I,437,i_I,437,ii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ iti etasmin kṛte padārthe prītiḥ puruṣasya bhavati tasmāt asya lipsā artha lakṣaṇā śarīra dhāraṇa arthā yasya śarīram dhriyate vyaktam tasya asti dravyam śarīriṇaḥ ca yāgaḥ śrūyate tasmāt vidyamāna dravyasya viniyogaḥ ucyate na dravya arjanam śruti gṛhītam vinā api hi dravya arjana vacana tvena śabdasya yāgaḥ nirvartate eva tasmāt puruṣa arthaḥ dravya parigrahaḥ 
[I,437,iii]	api ca yadi śāstrāt karma artham dravya arjanam tat na anyatra viniyujyeta tathā arjitam tatra sarva tantra parilopaḥ syāt api ca upakrāntāni sarva karmāṇi dravya arjanena bhaveyuḥ tatra etat na upapadyate api vai eṣa suvargāt lokāt chidyate yaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsa yājī san amāvāsyām vā paurṇamāsīm vā atipātayet iti evam ca sati prayoga kālāt vahiḥ etat aṅgam sat anupakārakam syāt na ca ādhāna vat bhavitum arhati tatra hi vacanam vasante agnim ādadhīta iti na ca etat aṅgam 
[I,438,i]	atha yat uktam niyama vacanam anarthakam puruṣa arthe dravya parigrahe sati iti ucyate na etāvatā puruṣa artha tā vyāvartate pratyakṣā hi sā tvayā ca parokṣam yukti buddhyā vyapadiśyate na ca parokṣam pratyakṣasya bādhakam bhavati tasmāt niyama vacanāt kāmam aparam adṛṣṭam kalpyeta na tu dṛṣṭa hānam tasmāt yat puruṣasya prayojanam prītiḥ tat artham dhanasya arjanam iti evam ca sati vrīhiṇā yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ prīti artham arjitena vā kratu artham arjitena vā na atra kaścid viśeṣaḥ 
[I,438,ii_I,438,iv]	prīti artham upārjitaḥ api vrīhiḥ vrīhiḥ eva karma artham upārjitaḥ api vrīhiḥ vrīhiḥ eva tasmāt na prayoga codanā gṛhītam dravya arjanam atha yat uktam anumeyena aprakṛtena vā śabdena yuṣmad pakṣe niyamasya eka vākyatā asmat pakṣe tu dṛṣṭena prayoga vacanena iti na eṣa doṣaḥ asmad pakṣe api dṛṣṭena bhujinā na phala vacanena katham tarhi niyamāt adṛṣṭam bhavati iti gamyate yathā eva bhavadīye pakṣe āha asmad pakṣe phalavataḥ eka vākya bhāvāt phalavataḥ upakaroti iti gamyate ucyate asmad pakṣe api phalavataḥ eva eka vākya bhāvaḥ etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ tava śrutam phalam mama tu dṛṣṭam iti atha yat liṅgam uktam gṛha dāha ādiṣu karma śrūyate iti tatra ucyate yadi api na kratu artham dravya arjanam tathā api dāhe nimitte phalāya vā karma aṅga bhāvāya vā jāmavatī ādīnām vidhānam upapadyate eva tasmāt puruṣa artham dravya arjanam prītyā hi tad avibhaktam iti 
[I,439,i_I,439,ii]	tad utsarge karmāṇi puruṣa arthāya śāstrasya anati śaṅkya tvāt na ca dravyam vikīrṣyate tena arthena abhisaṃbandhāt kriyāyām puruṣa śrutiḥ iha prajāpati vratāni udāharaṇam na udyantam ādityam īkṣeta na astaṃyantam ityādīni tatra saṃdehaḥ kim kratu arthāni prajāpati vratāni uta puruṣa arthāni iti kim prāptam kratu arthāni iti kutas evam hi phalam na kalpayitavyam bhaviṣyati iti nanu śrūyate eva eteṣām phalam etāvatā ha ena sā yuktaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na etat phala param vacanam vartamāna apadeśaḥ eva eṣa śabdaḥ iti tena yatra ādityaḥ īkṣitavyaḥ prāptaḥ tatra ayam pratiṣedhaḥ udyataḥ astaṃyataḥ ca niyamaḥ vā syāt kaścid karma aṅga bhūtaḥ 
[I,439,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ tat utsarge prīti utsargaḥ api karmāṇi puruṣa arthāya bhaveyuḥ evaṃjātīyakāni kartuḥ etāni upadiśyante na karmaṇaḥ artha prāptena kartrā saṃbandhaḥ yaḥ sa vidhitsitaḥ na karma saṃbandhaḥ avidyamānaḥ eva śāstram ca anatiśaṅkyam pitṛ mātṛ vacanāt api pramāṇataram svayam hi tena pratyeti indriya sthānīyam hi tat na ca evam ādibhiḥ dravyasya kaścid dṛṣṭaḥ upakāraḥ sādhyate tasmāt tena puruṣa arthena abhisaṃyogāt kriyāyām evaṃjātīyakāyām puruṣaḥ śrūyate 
[I,439,iv_I,439,v]	api ca puruṣa prayatnaḥ padārtha vidhi mātram lakṣayitum uccāryeta svayam avivakṣitaḥ syāt atha yat uktam yatra ādityasya īkṣaṇam prāptam tatra udyataḥ astaṃyataḥ ca partiṣedhaḥ iti satyam pratiṣedhaḥ nyāyyaḥ tathā śrutiḥ anugahyeta itarathā niyamaḥ lakṣyeta iti kim tu iha niyamaḥ śabdena śrūyate tasya vratam iti tena niyamaḥ eṣaḥ na udyan ādityaḥ īkṣitavyaḥ iti api ca etāvatā ha ena sā yuktaḥ bhavati iti puruṣa saṃbaddhaḥ doṣaḥ kīrtyate na karma saṃbaddhaḥ tasmāt puruṣa arthāni prajāpati vratāni iti go lakṣaṇāni api evam eva kartarīkarṇyaḥ kartavyā iti evamādīni 
[I,440,i_I,440,ii]	aviśeṣāt tu śāstrasya yathā śruti phalāni syuḥ ucyate yadi evam imāni api puruṣa arthāni syuḥ samidhaḥ yajati tanūnapātam yajati na anṛtam vadet iti evamādīni atra api puruṣa prayatna saṃkīrtanam atra api na dravyam cikīrṣyate iti 
[I,440,iii_I,440,iv]	api vā kāraṇa agrahaṇe tad artham arthasya anabhisaṃbandhāt api vā na etat asti samidh ādīni api puruṣa arthāni prāpnuvanti iti kāraṇa agrahaṇe puruṣa arthāni prajāpati vratāni bhaveyuḥ na tatra śruti ādikam kiṃcid kāraṇam gṛhyate yena karmaṇām aṅga bhūtāni iti gamyate tasmāt tāni puruṣa arthāni arthasya karmaṇaḥ nābhi saṃbandhaḥ prajāpati vrataiḥ iha tu samidh ādīnām prakaraṇam nāma kāraṇam gṛhyate yena karma arthāni iti vijñāyante tasmāt viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ puruṣa prayatnaḥ ca evam sati anuvādaḥ 
[I,440,v_I,440,vi]	tathā ca loka bhūteṣu loke api niṣpanna kārya ādiṣu prayojanavatsu yat asaṃyuktam phalena śrūyate tat tad aṅgam vijñāyate iti manyamānāḥ upavāsam japam vā upadiśya eva kṛtinaḥ manyante na brutave idam asya prayojanavataḥ aṅgam iti tathā ca apare api manyamānāḥ na duruktam manyante tasmāt samidh ādīni karma aṅgāni na prajāpati vratāni iti siddham 
[I,441,i_I,441,ii]	dravyāṇi tu aviśeṣeṇa ānarthakyāt pradīyeran staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra āmnāyate sphyaḥ ca kapālāni ca agnihotra havaṇī ca śūrpam ca kṛṣṇājinam ca śamyā ca ulūkhalam ca musalam ca dṛṣad ca upalā ca etāni vai daśa yajñāyudhāni iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim etāni dravyāṇi pradātavyāni uta svena svena arthena saṃbandhanīyāni tat etat siddhi artham idam cintanīyam kim eṣa vidhiḥ uta anuvādaḥ iti vidhau sati pradānam anuvāde sati yathā artha saṃbandhaḥ kim prāptam vidhiḥ iti tathā hi pravṛttau viśeṣaḥ itarathāḥ vāda mātram anarthakam pradāne ca eṣām yajña āyudha śabdaḥ anugṛhītaḥ yajñasya āyudhāni yajñasya sādhanāni iti itaratha uddhanana ādīnām āyudhāni bhaveyuḥ śravaṇena lakṣaṇayā yajñasya saṃkhyā ca evam avakalpate yāgena ekena saṃbandhāt itarathāḥ nānā artha saṃbandhāt daśa iti saṃkhyā na avakalpate tasmāt pradīyeran aviśeṣeṇa vihitam prakaraṇena pradhānasya bhavitum arhati 
[I,441,iii_I,441,iv]	svena tu arthena saṃbandhaḥ dravyāṇām pṛthak artha tvāt tasmāt yathāśruti syuḥ na ca etat asti vidhiḥ pradeyāni iti anuvādaḥ prāpta tvāt sphyena uddhanti kapāleṣu śrapayati agni hotra havanyām nirvapati śūrpeṇa vivinakti kṛṣa ajinam ulūkhalasya adhastāt avastṛṇāti śamyāyām dṛṣadam upadadhāti prokṣitābhyām ulūkhala musalābhyām avahanti prokṣitābhyām dṛṣad upalābhyām pinaṣṭī iti evam svena svena vākyena uddhanana ādiṣu prāpnuvanti prāptānām vacanam anuvādaḥ prakaraṇam api vākyena bādhyate yajña āyudha śabdaḥ ca anuvāda pakṣe nyāyyaḥ na vidhi pakṣe gauṇaḥ hi saḥ āyudha śabdaḥ sphya ādiṣu saṃkhyā api pāṭhā abhiprāyā bhaviṣyati vispaṣṭam ca etat uddhananādibhiḥ sphya ādīni prayuktāni iti bhavati hi tatra vidhiḥ sphyena uddhanti iti evamādiḥ na tu yajña āyudhāni kartavyāni iti tasmāt uddhanana ādiṣu vākyena prāptānām anuvādaḥ iti 
[I,442,i_I,442,ii]	codyante ca artha karmasu artha karmasu codyante puroḍāśa ādīni tāni api vikalperan tatra pakṣe bādhaḥ na samuccayaḥ puroḍāśa ādīnām nirapekṣāṇām yaji saṃbadhāt sphya ādīnām ca evam vā codyante ca artha karmasu codyante paridhānīye karmaṇi āhitāgnim agnibhiḥ dahanti yajña pātraiḥ ca iti yadi pradīyeran tatra na bhaveyuḥ tasmāt api na pradātavyāni iti 
[I,442,iii_I,442,iv]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅga darśanena ca caturdaśa paurṇamāsyām āhutayaḥ hūyante trayodaśām āvāsyāyām iti tasmāt api anuvādaḥ iti 
[I,443,i_I,443,ii]	tatra ekatvam ayajña aṅgam arthasya guṇa bhūta tvāt asti jyotiṣṭome paśuḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yat agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhate iti tathā anaḍvāhau yunakti iti tathā aśvamedhe vasantāya kapiñjalān ālabhate iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim vivakṣitam eka tvam dvi tvam bahu tvam ca uta avivakṣitam iti tatra ekatvam ayajña aṅga bhūtam na vivakṣitam iti arthaḥ arthasya guṇa bhūta tvāt na ālambhasya guṇa bhūtā saṃkhyā niyojanasya vā kasya tarhi paśoḥ anaḍuhoḥ kapiñjalānām ca vibhaktiḥ hi śrutyā prātipadikā artha gatam saṃkhyā artham brūte vākyena sā yajña aṅgam brūyāt vākyāt ca śrutiḥ balīyasī tasmāt na yajña aṅgam vivakṣitam iti 
[I,443,iii]	āha mā bhūt yajña aṅgam paśu adīnām aṅgam vivakṣitam tathā api iti ucyate na paśu ādīnām aṅgena uktena anuktena vā kiṃcid prayojanam asti yajña aṅgena hi avipannena prayojanam vipanne api hi paśu ādi aṅge aviguṇaḥ eva kratuḥ bhavati yajñāt ca phalam na paśu ādeḥ tasmāt paśu ādeḥ guṇena ajñātena jñātena vā na kiṃcid prayojanam asti iti na tat vivakṣitam yat dhi prayojana vat tat vivakṣitam iti ucyate 
[I,443,iv_I,443,v]	eka śruti tvāt ca bhavati ca kiṃcid vacanam yena vijñāyate na tat vivakṣitam iti yadi somam apahareyuḥ ekām gām dakṣiṇām dadyāt iti yadi vivakṣitam bhavet na ekām iti brūyāt gām iti eka vacanasya vivakṣita tvāt tathā avī dve dhenū dvaḥ iti atra api dvaḥ iti vacanam jñāpakam avivakṣitam avi iti dvi tvam iti trīn lalāmān iti atra api trīn iti vacanam liṅgam lalāmān iti bahuvacanam avivakṣitam iti 
[I,444,i_I,444,ii]	pratīyate iti ced evam ced paśyasi avivakṣitā saṃkhyā iti tat na pratīyate hi saṃkhyā khyāta vacanasya aṅga bhūtā yathā paśum ānaya iti ukte ekaḥ eva ānīyate paśū iti dvau paśūn iti bahavaḥ ānīyante yaḥ ca pratīyate sa śabda arthaḥ tasmāt yajñasya aṅga bhūtā saṃkhyā iti śabdāt gamyate na ca śabdāt gamyamānam ṛte kāraṇāt avivakṣitam bhavati 
[I,444,iii_I,444,v]	na aśabdam tad pramāṇa tvāt pūrvavat na etat evam satyam pratīyate na tu ayam śabda arthaḥ vyāmohā doṣā pratītiḥ kutas etat vākyāt dhi yajña aṅgam iti avagamyate vākyam ca śrutyā bādhyate tasmāt aśabda arthaḥ ayam yajñaḥ ekatvāt iti śabda arthaḥ api hi pratīyate yathā pūrvaḥ dhāvati iti sa pūrvaḥ iti ucyate yasya aparaḥ asti tena pūrvaḥ iti ukte aparaḥ gamyate na tu aparaḥ dhāvati iti śravaṇāt pratīyate evam iha api paśum iti eka tvam gamyate na tu yajñe yathā eva hi pūrvam iti ukte aparaḥ gamyate eva kevalam na tu sa vidhīyate kasmiṃścid arthe evam iha api saṃkhyā pratīyate eva kevalam na tu kartavya tayā yajñe vidhīyate na paśau katham na paśau vidhīyate iti ced vidhāyakasya abhāvāt ākhyāta śabdaḥ vidhāyakaḥ bhaviṣyati iti etat api na upapadyate dravya devatā saṃbandhasya sa vidhāyakaḥ san ālabhate iti na saṃkhyā saṃkhyeya saṃbandham vidhātum arhati iti bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam tasmāt avivakṣitā saṃkhyā iti 
[I,445,i_I,445,ii]	śabda vat tu upalabhyate tad āgame hi tat dṛśyate tasya jñānam yathā anyeṣām tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na etat asti na yajñe saṃkhyā śabdena śrūyate iti ākhyāta vācye hi arthaḥ upalabhyate loke paśum ānaya iti eka vacane sati eka tva paśu viśiṣṭam ānayanam pratīyate paśu ānaya iti dvi tva viśiṣṭam gamyate tatra hi eka tvam apaiti dvi tvam upajāyate yasya ca āgame yat upajāyate sa tasya arthaḥ iti gamyate tasya jñānam yathā anyeṣām śabdānām aśvam ānaya iti ukte aśva ānayanam pratīyate gām ānaya iti gavān ayanam tatra aśvaḥ apaiti gauḥ ca upajāyate tena jñāyate aśva śabdasya aśvaḥ arthaḥ go śabdasya gauḥ iti 
[I,445,iii]	yat uktam śrutyā vākya arthaḥ bādhyate iti ucyate na śrutiḥ brūte vākya arthaḥ na asti iti kevalam tu prātipadikā artha gatām saṃkhyām āha na adṛśī saṃkhyā vākyena yajñe vidhīyate prātipadikā arthaḥ hi ākhyāta vācyena saṃbadhyate vibhakti arthaḥ api tathā hi tad viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭaḥ ālambhaḥ gamyate tatra ekārtha tvāt eka vākyam avakalpate paśau hi saṃkhyāyām vidhīyamānāyām ekaḥ ākhyāta śabdaḥ na śaknuyāt ākhyāta artham vidhātum saṃkhyā saṃkhyeya saṃbandham ca tasmāt yajñe vivakṣitā saṃkhyā iti 
[I,445,iv_I,445,v]	tadvat ca liṅga darśanam kim iti karṇāḥ yāmyāḥ avaliptāḥ raudrāḥ nabhaḥ rūpāḥ pārjanyāḥ teṣām aindrāgnaḥ daśamaḥ iti yadi tritvam vivakṣitam tadā aindrāgnaḥ daśamaḥ bhavati tathā kṛṣṇāḥ bhaumāḥ dhūmrāḥ āntarikṣāḥ vṛhantaḥ divyāḥ śavalāḥ vaidyutāḥ siddhāḥ tārakāḥ iti prakṛtyaḥ āha ardha māsānām vā etat rūpam yat pañcadaśinaḥ iti tasmāt api paśyāmaḥ vivakṣitā saṃkhyā iti yat tu uktam ekām gām iti avivakṣām darśayati iti atra ucyate go saṃkhyā saṃbandham vidhātum etat ucyate itarathāḥ hi go dakṣiṇā saṃbandhaḥ vihitaḥ gamyeta tasmāt vivakṣite api vācyam etat avī dve dhenū dve trīn lalāmān iti ca anuvādāḥ 
[I,446,i_I,446,ii]	tathā ca liṅgam evam ca kṛtvā samāna śrutikam liṅgam api vivakṣitam bhaviṣyati tatra idam darśanam upapadyate vasante prātar āgneyīm kṛṣṇa grīvām ālabhate grīṣme mādhyaṃdine siṃhīm aindrīm śaradi aparāhṇe śvetām bārhaspatyām iti tatra śrūyate garbhiṇyaḥ bhavati iti garbhaḥ strīṇām guṇaḥ tena striyaḥ darśayati iti bhaviṣyati tathā aśvaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ vṛṣṇiḥ vastaḥ puruṣaḥ iti te prājāpatyāḥ iti tatra śrūyate muṣkarāḥ bhavanti sa indriya tvāya iti muṣkara tvam puṃsām guṇaḥ tena puṃprāptim darśayati iti 
[I,446,iii]	adhikaraṇa antaram vā tathā ca liṅgam iti saṃkhyā adhikaraṇam liṅga adhikaraṇe atidṛśyate liṅgam avivakṣitam śrutyā vākyasya bādhita tvāt na ca vivakṣitam iva śruyate iti bhavati liṅgam strī gauḥ soma krayaṇī iti strī vacanāt somakrayaṇī iti avivakṣitam eva liṅgam pratīyate nanu katham mṛgīm ānaya iti na mṛgaḥ ānīyate na evam aśa abdam tu tat pūrvaḥ dhāvati iti yathā 
[I,446,iv]	liṅgam vivakṣitam vā vākya arthasya śrutyā apratiṣiddha tvāt tathā ca liṅgam garbhiṇyaḥ bhavanti iti tathā ca muṣkarāḥ bhavanti iti yat uktam strī gauḥ soma krayaṇī iti tatra strī iti avivakṣitam tathā prajāpataye puruṣān hastinaḥ ālabhate iti puruṣa grahaṇam avivakṣitam vispaṣṭaḥ hi nyāya uktaḥ liṅga vivakṣāyām tasmāt vivakṣitam liṅgam iti 
[I,447,i_I,447,ii]	āśrayiṣu aviśeṣeṇa bhāvaḥ arthaḥ pratīyeta atra āśrayiṇaḥ padārthāḥ udāharaṇam uttamaḥ prayājaḥ paśu puroḍāśaḥ sviṣṭakṛt iti ete yāgāḥ udāharaṇam eṣu saṃdehaḥ kim yaji mātram saṃskāraḥ devatāyāḥ uta yajina adṛṣṭam devatāyām kriyate iti kim prāptam āśrayiṣu aviśeṣeṇa bhāvaḥ arthaḥ pratīyate iti āśrayiṣu evaṃjātīyakeṣu apūrvasya bhāvaḥ arthaḥ pratyetavyaḥ aviśeṣāt anyaiḥ ākhyāta śabdaiḥ yajati dadāti juhoti iti uktam etat bhūtam bhavyauva upadiśyate iti 
[I,447,iii_I,447,iv]	codanāyām tu anārambhaḥ vibhakta tvāt na hi anyena vidhīyate asyām tu codanāyām anārambhaḥ apūrvasya vibhaktaḥ ayam ākhyāta śabdaḥ yaḥ dṛṣṭa arthaḥ tatas na apūrvam yaḥ khalu adṛṣṭa arthaḥ tatas apūrvam iti dṛṣṭa arthaḥ ca ayam asmin hi yāge kriyamāṇe devatā smaryate sviṣṭakṛtī api dravyam pratipādyate na ca anyena śabdena atra apūrvam vidhīyate tasmāt yaji mātram saṃskāraḥ iti 
[I,448,i_I,448,ii]	syāt vā dravya cikīrṣāyām bhāvaḥ arthe ca guṇa bhūta tā āśrayāt dhi guṇībhāvaḥ syāt vā apūrvam atas satyām api devatā cikīrṣāyām tasmin devatā saṃskāra arthe guṇa bhūta tā yāgasya dravya pratipādanena ca mantreṇa tatra devatā smaryate tasmin mantreṇa dṛṣṭe arthe kriyamāṇe tyāgaḥ aparaḥ adṛṣṭa arthaḥ śrūyate tasya na kiṃcid dṛṣṭam asti devatā āśrayāt tu devatā gatam tat apūrvam iti gamyate 
[I,448,iii_I,448,iv]	arthe samavaiṣamyam atas dravya karmaṇām atikrāntaḥ tṛtīya viṣayaḥ atas prabhṛti dravyāṇām karmaṇām ca arthe prayojane samavaiṣamyam vakṣyate kvacid sāmyam kvacid vaiṣamyam āmikṣā va ajinayoḥ vaiṣamyam kraya pāṃsūnām vaiṣamyam daṇḍasya maitrāvaruṇa dhāraṇe yajamāna dhāraṇe ca sāmyam evam tatra tatra draṣṭavyam sāmyam vaiṣamyam ca iti 
[I,449,i_I,449,ii]	eka niṣpatteḥ sarvam samam syāt cāturmāsyeṣu vaiśvadeve śrūyate tapte payasi dadhi ānayati sā vaiśvadevī āmikṣāḥ vācibhyaḥ vājinam iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim tapte payasi dadhyānayanam āmikṣā prayojayati na vājinam uta ubhayam iti kim prāptam ubhayam iti kutas yasmin kṛte yat niṣpadyate prayojana vat tat tasya prayojakam iti gamyate dadhi ānayane ca kṛtaḥ ubhayam niṣpadyate āmikṣā api tatas eva yājinam api tatra anyatara artham kriyeta yadi vinigamanāyām hetuḥ bhavet agamyamāne viśeṣaḥ ubhaya artham ānayanam iti gamyate tasmāt ekā asau ubhābhyām api prayojitā niṣpattiḥ iti 
[I,449,iii_I,449,iv]	saṃsarga rasa niṣpatteḥ āmikṣā vā pradhānam syāt na etat asti ubhayam prayojakam iti āmikṣā prayoktrī kutas na atra yat dadhi payobhyaḥ nirvartyate tat dhaviḥ yadi tat dhaviḥ syāt ubhayam tābhyām eva niṣpadyate iti gamyata viśeṣaḥ kim tarhi haviḥ iti payaḥ dadhi saṃsṛṣṭam kutas etat sā vaiśvadevī iti ucyate na tatas yat niṣpadyate iti 
[I,449,v]	nanu strī liṅga nirdeśāt āmikṣā haviḥ sā ca tatas niṣpadyate vājinam ca haviḥ tat api niṣpadyate iti na iti ucyate tat eva hi payaḥ taptam dadhi saṃyuktam āmikṣā bhavati tasmāt strī liṅgam adoṣaḥ āha yadi payaḥ dadhi saṃsṛṣṭam haviḥ kim tarhi ucyate āmikṣā prayojikā iti ucyate āmikṣāyām dadhi payasī vidyete na vārjine katham avagamyate saṃsarga saniṣpatteḥ tatra hi dadhi payasoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayaḥ rasaḥ upalabhyate tena tatra dadhi payasī iti anumānam bhavati vājine tikta kaṭukaḥ rasaḥ 
[I,450,i]	āha tapte payasi dadhani ānīyamānaḥ ubhayam bhavati dadhnā ca payaḥ saṃsṛjyate vājināt ca vivicyate tatra saṃsargaḥ cikīrṣitaḥ na vivekaḥ iti kutas etat ucyate śābdaḥ saṃsargaḥ dadhnā aśābdaḥ vājinena vivekaḥ payasaḥ iti sarvanāma ca pūrva uktena śabdena eka vākya tām yāti itarasmin pakṣe payasi dadhyānayanam vājina viveka lakṣaṇa artham syāt śruti lakṣaṇa aviśaye ca śrutiḥ nyāyyā tasmāt āmikṣa artham dadhyānayanam āmikṣā śabdaḥ ca atra anuvādaḥ āmikṣā eva sā bhavati yatra tapte payasi dadhi ānīyate tasmāt āmikṣikā prayoktrī vājinam aprayojakam iti 
[I,450,ii_I,450,iii]	mukhya śabda abhisaṃstavāt ca na ca ubhayam prayojakam nyāyyam na atra vacanam asti idam prayojakam idam na iti asati prayojake anarthakam bhavati iti prayojakam kalpyate tatra ekasmin api prayojake siddhe arthavatī upadeśe na anyat api prayojakam bhavitum arhati na ca na gamyate viśeṣaḥ katham gamyate mukhya śabda abhisaṃstavāt mukhya śabdaḥ saṃstotum nyāyyaḥ iti prāthamyāt tu tasya tāvat prayojaka tva jñānam tasmin sati prayojake parikṣata tvāt ānarthakyasya na dvitīyam api prayojakam prathamā ca āmikṣā dvitīyam vājinam tasmāt āmikṣā prayoktrī 
[I,450,iv]	api ca mukhya śabdena ca āmikṣā stūyate mithunam vai dadhi ca śṛtam ca atha yat saṃsṛṣṭam maṇḍam iva mastu iva pari ca dadṛśe garbhaḥ eva saḥ iti garbhastutāmikṣā mithunasya ca garbhaḥ prayojakaḥ na garbha udakam tasmāt api āmikṣā prayojikā iti manyāmahe kim bhavati prayojanam yadi ubhayam prayojakam vājine naṣṭe punar tapte payasi dadhi ānetavyam atha vājinam aprayojakam naṣṭe vājine lopaḥ dadhi ānayanasya 
[I,451,i_I,451,ii]	pada karmā prayojakam nayanasya parārtha tvāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate aruṇayā piṅga akṣya ekahāyanyā somam krīṇāti iti tatra idam aparam śrūyate ṣaṭ padāni anuniṣkrāmati iti tathā saptamam padam gṛhṇāti iti idam aparam yarhi havirdhāne prācī pravartayeyuḥ tarhi tena akṣam añjyāt iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim soma krayaṇya ānayanam pada pāṃsvartham uta kraya prayuktam iti kim prāptam nayanāt ubhayam niṣpadyate krayaḥ padam ca tasmāt ubhayam prayojakam na hi gamyate viśeṣaḥ iti tat uktam eka niṣpatteḥ sarvam samam syāt iti 
[I,451,iii_I,452,i]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ pada karmā prayojakam iti kutas yasmāt nayanam kraya artham na hi nayanam antareṇa viśiṣṭe deśe krayaḥ upapadyate tasmāt krayeṇa tāvat nayanam prayuktam iti gamyate kraya prayuktam ced na pada prayuktam api bhavitum arhati api ca eka hāyanyāḥ pada pāṃsavaḥ grahītavyāḥ iti na asti śabdaḥ nanu prakṛta eka hāyanī pada pāṃsu grahaṇa vākyena saṃbhantsyate na iti brūmaḥ eka hāyanyā krīṇāti iti viśiṣṭena vākyena kraye upadiṣṭa eka hāyanī prakṛta tvāt pada pāṃsu vākyena saṃbadhyate prakaraṇāt ca vākyam balīyaḥ atha idānīm eka hāyanī krayaṇa artham saṃkīrtitā satī saṃnihita tvāt prasaṅgam upajīvatā pada pāṃsu vākyena saṃbadhyeta yā asau para arthā etasyāḥ padam grāhyam iti tasmāt krayapa yuktam nayanam aprayojakam padam iti kim punar cintāyāḥ prayojanam yadi ubhayam eka hāyanī nayanasya prayojakam yadā ekahāyanyāḥ saptam padam grāvaṇi nidhīyate tadā punar eka hāyanī nīyeta saptamāya padāya yadā padam na prayojakam tadā na eka hāyanī punar ṣaṭ padāni anuniṣkrāmayayitavyā iti 
[I,452,ii_I,452,iii]	artha abhidhāna karma ca bhaviṣyatā saṃyogasya tad nimitta tvāt tad arthaḥ hi vidhīyate darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate kapāleṣu puroḍāśam śrapayati iti tathā puroḍāśa kapālena tuṣān upavapati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ubhayam kapālāni prayojayati puroḍāśa śrapaṇam tuṣa upavāpaḥ ca uta śrapaṇam prayojakam na tuṣa upavāpaḥ iti kim prāptam vinigamanāyām hetoḥ abhāvāt ubhayam 
[I,452,iv]	iti prāpte ucyate artha abhidhānam prayojana saṃbaddham abhidhānam yasya yathā puroḍāśa kapālam iti puroḍāśa artham kapālam puroḍāśa kapālam katham etat avagamyate puroḍāśaḥ tāvat tasmin kāle na asti yena vartamānaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kapālena syāt tena eva hetunā na bhūtaḥ saḥ eṣa kapālasya puroḍāśeṇa bhaviṣyatā saṃbandhaḥ bhaviṣyatā saṃbandhaḥ ca tat nimittasya bhavati tasmāt puroḍāśena prayuktam yat kapālam tena tuṣāḥ upavaptavyāḥ iti evam ca sati carau puroḍāśa abhāve yadā tuṣān upavaptum kapālam upādīyate na tat puroḍāśa kapālam syāt na ced na tena tuṣāḥ upavaptavyāḥ bhavanti tasmāt na tuṣa upavāpaḥ kapālānām prayojakaḥ prayojalkam tu śrapaṇam iti 
[I,453,i_I,453,ii]	paśau anālambhāt lohita śakṛtoḥ akarma tvam asti jyotiṣṭome paśuḥ agniṣomīyaḥ tatra śrūyate hṛdayasya agre avadyati atha jihvāyāḥ iti evamādi tathā lohitam nirasyati śakṛt saṃpravidhyati sthavimataḥ varhiḥ aṃlktā apāsyati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim hṛdaya ādibhiḥ avadānaiḥ ijyā paśoḥ prayoktrī uta śakṛt saṃpravyādhaḥ lohita nirasanam ca tat api prayojakam iti kim prāptam eka niṣpatteḥ sarvam samam syāt ubhayam prayojakam iti 
[I,453,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ paśau śakṛt lohitayoḥ aprayojaka tvam na hi tad arthaḥ paśoḥ ālambhaḥ sakṛt saṃpravidhyati lohitam apāsyati iti ucyate na paśoḥ anyasya vā iti paśuḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ vākyena yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yat agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhate iti śakṛt lohite paśoḥ prakaraṇena bhavetām prakaraṇam ca vākyena bādhyate nanu ete śakṛt lohite pratipādyete tena yāga arthasya paśoḥ na anyasya iti niścayaḥ evam ced aprayojake śakṛt lohitaḥ iti kim bhavati prayojanam sāmye sati śakṛt lohita abhāve anyaḥ paśuḥ ālambhanīyaḥ śakṛt lohitayoḥ aprayojaka tve lopaḥ 
[I,454,i_I,454,ii]	eka deśa dravyaḥ ca utpattau vidyamāna saṃyogāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate uttara ardhāt sviṣṭakṛte samavadyati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim puroḍāśasya āgneya yāgaḥ prayojakaḥ sviṣṭakṛt aprayojakaḥ uta ubhayam iti kim prāptam eka niṣpatteḥ sarvam samam syāt iti evam prāpte brumaḥ eka deśa dravyaḥ ca evaṃjātīyakaḥ aprayojakaḥ bhavet kutas vidyamāna saṃyogāt na eka deśa karma avayavinam prayuṅkte vidyamānasya avayavinaḥ eka deśaḥ upādātavyaḥ iti tatra arthaḥ bhavati na avayavinam upādadīta iti yathā ikṣu khaṇḍam asmai prayaccha modaka śakalam asmai prayaccha iti na ikṣum upādadīta iti gamyate sataḥ ikṣoḥ khaṇḍam upādadīta sataḥ modakāt śakalam upādadīta iti tasmāt anya artham dravyam tasya uttara ardhāt avadeyam asti ca agni arthaḥ puroḍāśaḥ tasmāt viṣṭakṛt aprayojakaḥ iti 
[I,454,iii_I,454,iv]	nirdeśāt tasya anyat arthāt iti iti ced paśyasi aprayojakaḥ puroḍāśasya sviṣṭakṛt iti na etat evam agnim prati nirdeśāt tasya puroḍāśasya sviṣṭakṛt artham anyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ utpādayitavyaḥ yasya uttara ardhāt sviṣṭakṛt ijyate tasya agnaye saṃkalpitasya na iṣṭe yajamānaḥ katham asau tat anyasyai devatāyai dadyāt katham agnim prati nirdeśaḥ iti idam śrūyate aṅgirasaḥ vai itas uttamāḥ suvargam loka māyan te yajñavāstu abhyāyan te puroḍāśam kūrmam bhūtvā sarpantam apaśyan tam abruvan indrāya dhriyasva bṛhaspataye dhriyasva ādityāya dhriyasva sa na adhriyata tam abruvan agnaye dhriyasva iti saḥ adhriyata yat āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ amāvāsyāyām paurṇamāsyām ca acyutaḥ bhavati iti tasmāt tena sviṣṭakṛtaḥ na saṃbandhaḥ evam ced tasmāt anyat dravyam arthāt utpādayitavyam na hi anutpannasya dravyasya uttara ardhaḥ bhavati iti 
[I,455,i_I,455,ii]	na śeṣa saṃnidhānāt na etat evam saṃnihitaḥ hi śeṣaḥ yasmin anutpādyamāne arthaḥ na sidhyati saḥ arthāt upādyate saṃnihite ca śeṣe sati sidhyati uttara ardhāt grahaṇam tasmāt na arthāt dravyam utpādayitavyam yat eva anya artham dravyam saṃnihitam tasya eva uttara ardhāt grahītavyam uttara ardha mātram hi sviṣṭakṛte śrūyate na amuṣya dravyasya iti na ca etāvatā vyavahāraḥ bhavati sarvaḥ hi kasyacid uttara ardhaḥ saḥ eṣa saṃnihitam apekṣate saṃnihitam ca para artham tasmāt para arthāt dravyāt sviṣṭakṛt ijyā atas ca aprayojikā iti yat uktam anīśānena na śakyam dātum iti tat ucyate vācanikaḥ eṣa śeṣa pratipādana arthaḥ utsargaḥ sa śakyaḥ kartum dānam hi utsarga pūrvakaḥ parasya sva tva saṃbandhaḥ sa na śakyaḥ anīśānena 
[I,455,iii_I,455,iv]	karma kāryāt karma nimittaḥ ca sviṣṭakṛtaḥ bhāgaḥ iti śrūyate katham devāḥ vai sviṣṭakṛtam abruvan havyam naḥ vaha iti saḥ abravīt varam vṛṇaiḥ bhāgaḥ me astu iti vṛṇīṣva iti abruvan saḥ abravīt uttara ardhāt eva mahyam sakṛt sakṛt avadyāt iti karma kurvataḥ bhāgaḥ ayam uttara ardhāt iti stutiḥ bhavati yadi āgneyasya uttara ardhāt iti ucyate tatas asti karma arthena bhāgena sādṛśyam idam tat āgneyam havyam yat kila vahasi iti tatra sati sādṛśye stutiḥ upapadyate prayojaka tve ca asati sādṛśye stuti sāmañjasyam na syāt tasmāt aprayojakaḥ puroḍāśasya su iṣṭakṛt yāgaḥ iti 
[I,456,i_I,456,ii]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam api bhavati tat yat sarvebhyaḥ havirbhyaḥ samavadyati tasmāt idam udare viśva rūpam annam samavadhīyate iti yadi para arthāt dravyāt saṃnihitāt ijyate tadā sat saṃnidhāna aviśeṣāt sarvebhyaḥ avadīyate iti upapadyate prayojaka tve tu ekasmāt eva avadīyeta tasmāt api aprayojakaḥ tathā idam aparam liṅgam śeṣāt iḍām avadyati śeṣāt sviṣṭakṛtam yajati iti nanu ayam vidhiḥ syāt na iti brūmaḥ na atra vidhi vibhaktiḥ vartamāna apadeśaḥ hi ayam iti 
[I,456,iii_I,456,iv]	abhighāraṇe viprakarṣāt anuyāja vat pātra bhedaḥ syāt asti vājapeyaḥ vāyapeyena svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta iti tatra śrūyate saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabhate saptadaśaḥ vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpateḥ āptyai iti prājāpatyānām kratu paśūnām ca samuccayaḥ vakṣyate prajā pātyeṣu ca āmnānāt iti asti tu prakṛtau prayāja śeṣeṇa havīṃṣi abhighārayati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim prājāpatyānām vapāḥ abhighārayitum prayāja śeṣasya dhāraṇa artham pātram aparam utpādayitavyam tatas tena prājāpatyānām vapāḥ abhighārayitavyāḥ uta na śeṣaḥ dhārayitavyaḥ na eva tatas prājāpatyānām vapāḥ abhighāraṇīyāḥ iti kim prāptam abhighāraṇe prayāja śeṣa dhāraṇa artham pātram utpādyeta prātaḥsavane ca prayāja śeṣaḥ viprakṛṣṭa kāle mādhyaṃdine savane brahmasāma kāle prājāpatyānām ālabhyaḥ śrūyate tān paryagnikṛtān utsṛjanti brahmasāmni ālabhate iti vyāpṛtā ca juhūḥ bhavati tasmāt pātra antaram utpādanīyam iti yathā anuyājeṣu pṛṣadājya dhāraṇa artham pātram utpādyate pṛṣadājyena anuyājān yajati iti vacanāt evam atra api iti 
[I,457,i_I,457,ii]	na vā pātra tvāt apātra tvam tu eka deśa tvāt na vā prājāpatyānām vapāḥ abhighāryāḥ kutas śeṣa abhāvāt katham śeṣa abhāvaḥ iti ced apātra tvāt katham apātra tā eka deśa tvāt prayāja arthasya hi gṛhītasya ājyasya saḥ eka deśaḥ śeṣaḥ kim atas yadi evam eka deśa vyāpāraḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ na avayavinam upādeya tvena codayati 
[I,457,iii]	āha utpattim na codayet dhāraṇam utpannasya arthāt bhaviṣyati iti ucyate eka deśa tvāt abhighāraṇam dravyam eva na prayuṅkte iti ucyate kṛtārthasya dravyasya ayam eka deśaḥ pratipādyate na abhi ghāraṇam artha karma nanu haviṣām dvitīya anirdeśāt prādhānyam syāt na iti ucyate adṛṣṭaḥ hi haviṣām upakāraḥ kalpyeta ājya prādhānye punar juhvā rikta tvam dṛṣṭam prayojanam ājya bhāga arthena ājyena asaṃsargaḥ juhvā riktayā prayojanam na abhighṛtena haviṣā tasmāt prājāpatyānām abhighāritābhiḥ vapābhiḥ prayojanam eva na asti kim artham śeṣaḥ dhāryate iti 
[I,458,i_I,458,ii]	hetu tvāt ca saha prayogasya hetu tvāt ca abhighāraṇasya saha alabhate iti stutiḥ bhavati tīrtham vai prātaḥsavanam yat prātaḥsavane paśavaḥ ālabhyante tīrthaḥ eva etān ālabhate sa yoni tvāya arthaḥ vapānām abhighṛta tvāya iti arthānatareṇa vapa abhighāraṇam anugṛhṇan na iha asti iti darśayati 
[I,458,iii_I,458,iv]	abhāva darśanāt ca abhāvam khalu api abhigdhāraṇasya darśayati savyāḥ vai etarhi vapāḥ yarhi anabhighṛtāḥ brahma vai brahmasāma yat brahma sāmni ālabhate tena asavyāḥ tena abhighṛtāḥ iti savya śabdaḥ rūkṣe bhāṣyate savyā vapa iti anabhighṛta tām darśayati 
[I,458,v_I,458,vi]	sati savya vacanam āha na etat darśanam sati eva hi abhighāraṇe bhavati etat savya vacanam asti hi vapāyāḥ anyat abhighāraṇam upastṛṇāti ājyam hiraṇya śakalam vapā hiraṇya śakalam tatas abhighārayati iti tasmin sati katham savyāḥ bhaveyuḥ brūte ca tasmāt na etat śakyam avagantum rūkṣāḥ tāḥ vapāḥ dṛśyante iti tena nūnam abhighāraṇam prayāja śeṣeṇa asti iti sati asmin abhighāraṇe pratyakṣe rūkṣāḥ tāḥ iti darśanam vyāmohaḥ iti 
[I,459,i_I,459,ii]	na tasya iti ced evam ced dṛśyate sati abhighāraṇe savyāḥ iti vacanam aliṅgam iti na aliṅgam tasya etat vacanam yat snehanam karoti katamat tat yat prathamam prathamam hi snehanam karoti na dvitīyam snigdhasya tat bhavati na ca snigdhasya snehanam kriyate yathā bhavati loke vādaḥ yat asmābhiḥ kāntārāt nirgataiḥ devadattasya gṛhe snigdham bhuktam tena vayam arūkṣāḥ kṛtā iti satsu api anyeṣu snigdheṣu eva bhojaneṣu evam tasya arūkṣākaraṇasya abhighāraṇasya abhāvāt rūkṣāḥ iti vacanam upapadyate asmin tu sati na upapadyate tasmāt api prayāja śeṣeṇa abhighāraṇam prājāpatyānām na asti iti 
[I,459,iii_I,459,iv]	syāt tasya mukhya tvāt idam pada uttaram sūtram yadi prathamasya abhāvāt savyāḥ iti vacanam bhavati anupapannam tarhi anyasya prathamasya vidyamāna tvāt katamat tat yat śrapyamāṇāyāḥ aparam udvāsitāyāḥ atra ucyate syāt tasya mukhya tvāt yat prayāja śeṣeṇa abhighāraṇam tasya eva abhāvāt etat upapadyate sati api śrapyamāṇāyāḥ abhighāraṇaḥ udvāsitāyāḥ ca yat tāvat śrapyamāṇāyāḥ tat agneḥ arcīṃṣi dahanti yat udvāsitāyāḥ tat agni avayavāḥ ūṣma avayavāḥ ca nāśayanti sā eṣā rūkṣā eva idam tu prayāja śeṣeṇa śītāyāḥ kriyate tat snehayati tena snigdhāyāḥ padāna kālam abhighāraṇam yat tat na snehayati tat idam snehanasya abhighāraṇasya abhāvāt savya tā vacanam upapadyate iti uktam tasmāt na prayāja śeṣaḥ dhāryate iti 
[I,460,i_I,460,ii]	samānayanam tu mukhyam syāt liṅga darśanāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate atihāya iḍaḥ barhiḥ prati samānayati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim samānayanam ājyasya dharmāṇām ca prayojakam uta aprayojakam iti kim prāptam aprayojakam iti kutas prayāja anuyāja arthasya ājyasya ayam eka deśaḥ samānīyate iti pūrveṇa nyāyena aprayojaka tā prāptā tat ucyate mukhyam samānayanam liṅga darśanāt kim liṅgam catur gṛhītāni ājyāni bhavanti na hi atra anuyājān yakṣyan bhavati iti ātithyāyām śrūyate yadi prayāja artham samānayanam tatas tatra ekam caturgṛhītam samānīyate ekam api anuyājānām bhavati tatas ca atithyeḍām tā saṃtiṣṭhate iti anuyāja abhāvaḥ upabhṛti samānayana artham ekam caturgṛhītam grāhyam na tu anuyāja artham tatra bahūnām catur gṛhītānām darśanam upapadyate itarathāḥ hi anuyāja abhāve na eva upabhṛti catuḥ gṛhyeta tatra caturgṛhītāni iti bahuvacanam na upapadyate tasmāt prayojakam samānayanam iti 
[I,460,iii]	nanu liṅgam upadiśyate kā prāptiḥ ucyate dṛṣṭam tatra prayojanam prayājau dvau yaṣṭavyau tatra juhvām ājyena prayojanam na upabhṛti riktāyām upabhṛtaḥ recanam adṛṣṭa artham juhvām nidhānam dṛṣṭa artham eva tena prayājahoma artham ājya samānayanam aupabhṛtam ājyam prayojayati tat api hi prayāja artham anuyāja artham ca iti vakṣyate 
[I,461,i_I,461,ii]	vacane hi hetu asāmarthye atha kasmāt na vacanam etat na catur gṛhītāni ājyāni iti ucyate vacane hi hetuḥ asamarthitaḥ syāt na hi atra anuyājān yakṣyan bhavati iti yadā samānayanam na prayāja artham iti gamyate tadā vacanam yadā vacanam tadā na anuyāja abhāvaḥ hetuḥ asati hetau na hi atra anuyājān yakṣyan bhavati iti hetu vat nigadaḥ na upapadyeta tasmāt prayāja artham samānayanam prayojakam aupabhṛtasya ājyasya kim bhavati prayojanam paryājā arthe samānayane yāvat prayāja artham tāvat sarvam samānā iyam ardham aupabhṛtasya aprayojanaka tve na niyogataḥ ardham yāvat tādvat vā 
[I,461,iii_I,461,iv]	tatra utpattiḥ avibhaktā syāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate catur juhvām gṛhṇāti aṣṭau upabhṛti gṛhṇāti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim jauhavam aupabhṛtam ca ubhayam ubhaya artham prayājebhyaḥ ca anuyājebhyaḥ ca uta jauhavam prayājebhyaḥ aupabhṛtam anuyājebhyaḥ athavā aupabhṛtam prayājebhyaḥ anuyājebhyaḥ ca iti kim prāptam ubhayam ubhaya artham kutas yat yat ājyena kriyate tasmai tasmai bhavitum arhati aviśeṣāt 
[I,461,v_I,462,i]	tatra jauhavam anuyāja pratiṣedha artham na evam ubhayam ubhaya artham iti jauhavam prayāja artham aupabhṛtam ubhaya artham katham yat juhvām gṛhṇāti ṛtubhyaḥ tat gṛhṇāti ṛtavaḥ vai prayājāḥ iti jauhava vacanam anuyāja pratiṣedha artham prayājān saṃkīrtayati āha nanu na asti atra anuyāja pratiṣedha artham vacanam yat etat prayājebhyaḥ tat gṛhṇāti iti prayājeṣu upadeśakam etat na asti asya anuyāja pratiṣedhe sāmarthyam iti ucyate na brūmaḥ pratiṣedhakam etat iti kim tu utpatti vākyaḥ ājyānām na eva prayojana abhisaṃbandhaḥ anena vacanena prayāja prayojana tā kriyate jauhavasya anuyāja prayojana tā asya vacana abhāvāt eva na gamyate iti anuyāja pratiṣedha artham vacanam iti ucyate 
[I,462,ii_I,462,iii]	aupabhṛtam tathā iti ced iti ced dṛśyate jauhavam anuyājebhyaḥ pratiṣidhyate aupabhṛtam ubhaya artham iti bhavatu jauhavam prayāja artham na tu aupabhṛtam ubhaya artham tat api tathā syāt yathā jauhavam katham etat api anuyāja artham eva śrūyate yat upabhṛti gṛhṇāti anuyājebhyaḥ tat gṛhṇāti chandāṃsi hi anuyājāḥ iti anuyāja artha tā asya iti 
[I,462,iv_I,462,v]	syāt juhū pratiṣedhāt nitya anuvādaḥ na etat evam ubhaya artham hi aupabhṛtam evam hi śrūyate yat aṣṭau upabhṛti gṛhṇāti prayāja anuyājebhyaḥ tat gṛhṇāti iti nanu uktam anuyājebhyaḥ tat gṛhṇāti iti anuyāja artha tā asya iti ucyate juhū pratiṣedhāt nitya anuvādaḥ ubhayasmin aupabhṛte jauhave ca ubhaya arthe prāpte jauhavam anuyājebhyaḥ pratiṣiddham na aupabhṛtam tat aupabhṛtasya ubhaya artha tāyām satyām anuyāja artha tā vacanam nitya anuvādaḥ bhavitum arhati na śaknoti prayāja artha tām pratiṣeddhum pratyakṣa śrutā hi sā tasmāt aupabhṛtam ubhaya artham samānayanam ca tatas juhvām śrūyate tasmāt api prayāja artha tā na śakyāḥ bādhitum 
[I,463,i_I,463,ii]	tat aṣṭa saṃkhyam śravaṇāt aṣṭau upabhṛti gṛhṇāti iti śrūyate tatra saṃdehaḥ kim tat aupabhṛtam ājyam aṣṭa saṃkhyena grahaṇena saṃskriyate uta catur saṃkhyā guṇa bhūtāḥ dvayoḥ grahaṇayoḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam aṣṭa saṃkhyā guṇa bhūtā na catur saṃkhye dve iti kutas śravaṇāt aṣṭa saṃkhyā śrūyate catur saṃkhyā aṣṭa saṃkhyayā lakṣyate śruti lakṣaṇa aviśaye ca śrutiḥ nyāyyā tasmāt aṣṭa saṃkhyam grahaṇam etat iti 
[I,463,iii_I,463,iv]	anugrahāt ca jauhavasya anugraha vādaḥ ca bhavati catur gṛhītam vai etat abhūt tasya āghāram āghārya triritaḥ prācīnam prayājān yajati samānayate catur gṛhīta tvāya iti catur gṛhīta anugrahaḥ katham syāt iti kim caturgṛhītam bhavati samānayanena na iti brūmaḥ caturgṛhītam prathamam eva tat āghāre api āghārite yat avaśiṣṭam catur saṃkhyam eva tasya grahaṇam āsīt kim tarhi catur gṛhīta tvāya iti catur gṛhītasya anugraha artham alpam hi catur gṛhītam homāya aparyāptam tat paryāptam katham syāt iti evam catur gṛhīta śabdena alpam iti lakṣyate alpa tvam ca bahu tvam kasyacid apekṣya bhavati yadi hi aupabhṛtam aṣṭa saṃkhyam evam caturgṛhītam alpam bhavati tatra catur gṛhīta śabdena alpa tā śakyate lakṣayitum tasmāt api paśyāmaḥ aupabhṛte aṣṭa saṃkhyā guṇa bhūtā iti 
[I,464,i_I,464,ii]	dvayoḥ tu hetu sāmarthyam śravaṇam ca samānayane tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati dve ete caturgṛhīte evam hetuḥ samarthitaḥ bhavati ātithyāyām catur gṛhītāni ājyāni bhavanti na hi atra anuyājān yakṣyan bhavati iti asatsu api anuyājeṣu etat aṣṭa gṛhītam eva aupabhṛtam bhavet yadā aṣṭa saṃkhyā guṇa bhūtā na tadā dvayoḥ catur gṛhītayoḥ satoḥ catur gṛhītān ājyāni iti bahuvacanam ājyeṣu upapadyate tasmāt caturgṛhīte dve iti 
[I,464,iii]	āha liṅgam etat prāptiḥ ucyatām iti tat abhidhīyate anārabhyaḥ ucyate catur gṛhītam juhoti iti sarva homeṣu tena prayāja anuyājeṣu api na tat aṣṭa gṛhītena śakyate bādhitum nānā viṣaya tvāt aṣṭa gṛhītam hi grahaṇe catur gṛhītam hi home asti hi saṃbhavaḥ yat aṣṭa gṛhītam gṛhyeta catur gṛhītam hūyeta tat etat iha aṣṭa tvam grahaṇe bhavati katham dve caturgṛhīte home sampādayet tasmāt dve ete caturgṛhīte aṣṭa gṛhīte gṛhyamāṇe gṛhyete caturgṛhīte dve na agṛhītvā aṣṭa gṛhītam kaścid sampādayet tasmāt dve ete caturgṛhīte iti 
[I,464,iv]	atha yat uktam aṣṭa gṛhītam śrūyate śrutiḥ ca lakṣaṇāyāḥ garīyasi iti ucyate uktam asmābhiḥ aṣṭa saṃkhyāyāḥ prayojanam katham dve caturgṛhīte syātām iti api ca aṣṭau upabhṛti gṛhṇāti iti upabhṛti samānīte dve caturgṛhīte katham syātām iti itaratha asati aṣṭa śabde nānā pātrayoḥ gṛhyeyātām tasmāt aṣṭa śabda śravaṇam adoṣaḥ sādhu etat dve caturgṛhīte upabhṛti iti prayojanam dvayoḥ catur gṛhītayoḥ satoḥ samānayane ardham samānetavyam bhavati aṣṭa gṛhīte sati na niyogataḥ ardham tathā yatra anuyāja artham na grahaṇam tatra api aṣṭa gṛhītam yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ yathā ca siddhāntaḥ tathā cāturmāsyeṣu caturgṛhītam upabhṛti bhavati 
[I,466,i_I,466,iii]	svaruḥ tu aneka niṣpattiḥ sva karma śabda tvāt asti jyotiṣṭome paśuḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yat agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhate iti tatra idam āmnātam khādire badhnāti pālāśe badhnāti rohite badhnāti iti tat saṃnidhau idam aparam āmnāyate svaruṇā paśum anakti yūpasya svarum karoti iti atha idānīm idam saṃdihyate kim bhedena yūpāt svaruḥ utpādayitavyaḥ uta yūpam kriyamāṇam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalaḥ grahītavyaḥ iti tatra idam tāvat naḥ parīkṣyam kim chedana ādi utpatteḥ prayojakaḥ svaruḥ uta aprayojakaḥ prayojakaḥ ced bhedena yūpāt niṣpādyeta na ced prayojakaḥ yūpam niṣpadyamānam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalaḥ grahīṣyate iti sa katham prayojakaḥ syāt katham vā na prayojakaḥ iti yadi eṣā vacana vyaktiḥ svaru śabda vācyam bhāvyate katham joṣaṇa ādinā iti kartavyatā viśeṣeṇa iti tatas svaruṇā paśum anakti iti sa svaruḥ iti avagataḥ grahīṣyate tatas prayojakaḥ atha evam vijñāyate svaruṇā paśum anakti iti anavagataḥ svaruḥ etāvat asya vijñāyate añjanam tena kriyate iti idam api yūpasya svarum karoti iti yūpa eka deśam svarukārye añjane viniyuṅktaḥ iti tatas aprayojakaḥ 
[I,466,iv]	kim tāvat prāptam svaruḥ tu aneka niṣpattiḥ sva karma śabda tvāt svaruḥ na yūpena eka niṣpattiḥ syāt yūpam anapekṣamāṇasya svaroḥ joṣaṇa ādinā utpattiḥ kutas sva karma śabda tvāt svaḥ hi asya karma śabdaḥ svarutāyāḥ vidhāyakaḥ bhavati svarum karoti iti evam ca yūpaka aṣṭa avayavasya svaru tvam kriyate iti yūpasya svarum karoti iti lakṣaṇayā yūpa śabdaḥ khadira ādi avayavasya iti arthaḥ kutas svarutva bhāvanā hi śrutyā gamyate svarum karoti iti svarum utpādayati iti yūpa avayava upādānam vākyena vākyāt ca śrutiḥ balīyasi iti tasmāt evam sati na niyogataḥ yūpa kāṣṭhāt eva svaruḥ utpādayitavyaḥ nirapekṣāt anyasmāt api vṛkṣāt kartavyaḥ bhedena iti 
[I,467,i_I,467,ii]	jāti antarāt ca śaṅkate itas ca nirapekṣasya svaroḥ utpattiḥ iti gamyate kutas jāti antarāt api āśaṅkā bhavati vṛkṣa antarāt katham na anyasya svarum kuryāt yadi anyasya vṛkṣasya svarum kuryāt anye asya lokam anvāroheyuḥ yūpasya svarum karoti iti na hi yūpam anuniṣpannasya garhaṇe jāti antara āśaṅkā avakalpate yūpa śakalaḥ hi svaru kārye tadānīm viniyujyate tasmāt api bhedena yūpāt svaruḥ utpādayitavyaḥ iti 
[I,467,iii_I,467,iv]	tat eka deśaḥ vā svarutvasya tad nimitta tvāt vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati yūpa eka deśaḥ hi yūpam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalaḥ grahītavyaḥ iti kasmāt evam āmnāyate yadi anyasya vṛkṣasya svarum kuryāt anye asya lokam anvāroheyuḥ yūpasya svarum karoti iti na ca atra ayam arthaḥ vidhīyate svarum utpādayati iti kim tarhi svaru kāryam kartum yam upādatte tam yūpāt iti kutas svarutvasya tad nimitta tvāt svaru tvam atra śrūyate svaroḥ yūpasya svarum karoti iti kasya ātmīyam yūpasya iti ātmīyaḥ ca samudāyasya eka deśaḥ bhavati tasmāt idam ucyate aprāṇinaḥ ṣaṣṭhī pañcamī arthe bhavati yathā śākasya dehi śākāt dehi iti tathā kvacid tṛtīya arthe ghṛtasya yajati ghṛtena yajati pañcamī arthe ghṛtāt yajati ghṛtasya yajati iti dvitīya arthe vā somasya pibati somam pibati somāt pibati iti 
[I,468,i]	nanu uktam yūpa avayavaḥ atra vākyena vidhīyate śrutyā svaroḥ utpattiḥ śrutiḥ ca vākyāt balīyasi iti ucyate satyam evam yūpasya iti tu śabdaḥ avivakṣita arthaḥ bhavati tatra śrutiḥ api bādhyate vākyam api na tu asmad pakṣe kiṃcid avivakṣita artham svarum karoti iti sva arthaḥ eva anuvādaḥ bhaviṣyati iti yūpa śakalaḥ vidhāyiṣyate svaru śabdaḥ ca añjana arthena śakale upacaritaḥ iti gamyate avayava prasiddhiḥ ca etam artham gamayiṣyati bhavati hi brāhmaṇam atha kasmāt svaruḥ nāma etasmāt veṣaḥ avacchidyate tat asya etat svam iva aruḥ bhavati tasmāt svaruḥ nāma iti 
[I,468,ii_I,468,iii]	śakala śruteḥ ca itas ca yūpam anuniṣpannasya grahaṇam kutas śakala śruteḥ śakala śrutiḥ bhavati svaroḥ yaḥ prathamaḥ śakalaḥ parāpatet sa svaruḥ kāryaḥ iti śakalaḥ ca eka deśaḥ eka deśaḥ ca aprayojakaḥ saṃbandhi śabda tvāt tāvatā ca vyavahārāt samudāya apekṣiṇaḥ tatra prakaraṇāt anya arthena khadira ādinā joṣaṇa ādi karma viśiṣṭena yāga arthena prakṛtena asya eka vākyatā yūpāya khadira ādi joṣayate chinatti takṣati ca tatra yaḥ śakalaḥ prathamaḥ para āptitaḥ tam ca svarum añjana artham karoti iti svaru śabdam ca tatra anuvadan eva upacarati tasmāt na etat asti pṛthak niṣpattiḥ svaruḥ iti yena anyasmāt api vṛkṣāt iti śaṅkyate tasmāt jāti antara āśaṅkā vacanam nitya anuvādaḥ yūpa śakalaḥ tuti arthaḥ 
[I,469,i_I,469,ii]	pratiyūpam ca darśanāt itas ca na pṛthak niṣpattiḥ svaruḥ kutas ekādaśinyām pratiyūpam ca darśanāt yathā anupūrvam svarubhiḥ paśūn samajya madhyame raśanā guṇe sve sve svam svam yūpa śakalam upagūhati iti svaru bahu tvam darśayati yadi ca svaruḥ pṛthak niṣpattiḥ syāt ekaḥ eva ekādaśinyām tantreṇa kāryam sādhayet yūpam anuniṣpannasya tu grahaṇe prakṛtau svayūpa śakalena añjanam kṛtam iti ekādaśinyām api ca udakaḥ svayūpa śakalam eva prāpayati iti bahu tvam upapannam bhavati svayūpa śakala grahaṇam ca prākṛtasya grahaṇāt adhyavasīyate yādṛśaḥ asau prākṛtaḥ tādṛśaḥ asau garhītavyaḥ na viśiṣṭaḥ iti tasmāt svaruḥ utpatteḥ na prayojakaḥ iti 
[I,469,iii_I,469,iv]	ādāne karoti śabdaḥ atha yat uktam utpattiḥ asya śabdena ucyate svarum karoti iti evam ca karoti śabdaḥ avakalpiṣyate iti ucyate ādāne karoti śabdaḥ bhaviṣyati svarum karoti svarum ādatte iti yathā kāṣṭhāni karoti gomayāni karoti iti ādāne karoti śabdaḥ bhavati evam iha api draṣṭavyam 
[I,472,i_I,472,ii]	śākhāyām tad pradhāna tvāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate śākhām adhikṛtya prācīm āharati udīcīm āharati prāc udīcīm āharati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ayam digvādaḥ uta śākhāvādaḥ iti digvādaḥ iti prāptam tathā śruti śabdaḥ śākhā vāde lakṣaṇa iti tasmāt digvādaḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ śākhāvādaḥ iti kutas yadi tāvat ayam arthaḥ prācī diś āhartavyā iti tatas aśakyaḥ arthaḥ atha prācīm diśam pratyāharaṇīya iti tatas kāhartavyā iti vākye śākhā śabdasya abhāvāt anupapannaḥ ayam saṃbandhaḥ atha prakṛtā śākhā iti tatas prācī śabdena tasyāḥ eva abhisaṃbandhaḥ nyāyyaḥ kutas pratyakṣāḥ hi prācī śabdena harateḥ eka vākyatā prakaraṇāt śākhā śabdena bhavet ubhayathā atra prācī śabdaḥ lakṣaṇayā prakṛtām vā śākhām lakṣayet diśaḥ vā anīpsita tvāt vihāra deśam īpsitatamam ayuktam 
[I,472,iii]	api ca prācī iti saṃbandhi śabdaḥ ayam saṃbandhi śabdāḥ ca sarve sa apekṣāḥ vinā pada antareṇa na paripūrṇam artham abhivadanti sāmānya padārtha saṃbandhe ca saṃvyavahāra anupapattiḥ sarvasya eva deśasya kutaścid prāgbhāvāt tathā śākhā śabdaḥ api saṃbandhi śabdaḥ vṛkṣasya iti etat apekṣate yadā vṛkṣasya iti etat apekṣate tadā vṛkṣasya śākhā prācī udīcī prāc udīcī vā iti bhavati saṃbandhaḥ tathā ca saṃvyavahāraḥ avakalpate yat tu śākhā vāde lakṣaṇa iti ucyate bhavati lakṣaṇayā api śabda arthaḥ tasmāt śākhāvādaḥ iti 
[I,473,i_I,473,ii]	śākhāyām tad pradhāna tvāt upaveṣeṇa vibhāgaḥ syāt vaiṣamyam tat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ samāmnāyate mūlataḥ śākhām parivāsya upaveṣam karoti iti tatra ayam arthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ kim śākhā chedanasya ubhayam prayojakam śākhāḥ upaveṣaḥ ca uta śākhā prayojakā upaveṣaḥ anuniṣpādi iti kim prāptam ubhayam chedanāt niṣpadyate śākhā śākhāmūlam ca ubhayam ca prayojana vat agreṇa vatsa apākaraṇa ādi kariṣyate mūlataḥ upaveṣaḥ tena viśeṣa abhāvāt ubhayam prayojakam 
[I,473,iii_I,474,i]	iti prāpte ucyate śākhāyām brūmaḥ tad pradhāna tvāt śākhā pradhāna tvāt upaveṣeṇa vibhāgaḥ bhavet śākhām anuniṣpannaḥ gṛhyate katham tad prādhānyam śākhām parivāsya iti dvitīya anirdeśāt nanūpa veṣam karoti iti api dvitīyā ucyate na asau parivāsayateḥ karma kasya tarhi karoteḥ āha kasmāt evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ na bhavati śākhām parivāsya mūlataḥ upaveṣam karoti iti śākhā śabdaḥ ca yathā eva agre tathā mūle api tatra ayam arthaḥ chedena agra mūle vibhajet kim prayojanam vibhajya mūlam upaveṣam kariṣyāmi iti ucyate na evam vyavahita kalpanā hi evam bhavet avayava dhānena śākhā artham parivāsanam vṛtte tasmin upaveṣa karaṇam nanu prakṛta tvāt mūlam upaveṣa śabdena saṃbadhyate ucyate ubhaya saṃbandhe virodhaḥ virodhe ca prakaraṇāt vākyam balīyaḥ atha saṃnihitena saṃbadhyate tathā api śākhā prayuktena iti āpatati atas siddham eva uvaveṣaḥ na prayojayati chedanam iti etat atra vaiṣamyam 
[I,474,ii_I,474,iii]	śruti apāyāt ca śākhayā vatsān apākaroti śākhayā gāḥ prāpayati śākhayā dohayati iti evamādiṣu śākhā grahaṇeṣu na upaveṣasya vyāpāraḥ tatas śākhā śabdaḥ apaiti na hi tad mūlam śākhā iti ācakṣate kim atas yatra evam yatra śākhā śabdaḥ tad artham chedanam dvitīya anirdeśāt atha api mūle śākhā śabdaḥ bhavet evam api śākhā śabda upadiṣṭeṣu na mūlam amūla parivāsita tvāt yat ca evam saṃskṛtayā śākhayā kriyate tad artham chedanam na ca upadhānam mūla parivāsitayā kriyate tasmāt na tad artham chedanam kim bhavati prayojanam paurṇamāsyām api śākhā utpādyā yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ yathā siddhāntaḥ tathā na utpādayitavyā iti 
[I,474,iv_I,475,i]	haraṇe tu juhotiḥ yoga sāmānyāt dravyāṇām ca artha śeṣa tvāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ āmananti saha śākhayā prastaram praharati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim śākhā praharaṇam pratipatti karma uta artha karma iti kim prāptam haraṇe tu juhotiḥ syāt artha karma iti arthaḥ kutas yoga sāmānyāt yogaḥ asyāḥ samānaḥ prastareṇa saha śākhayā prastaram praharati iti saha yoge yatra tṛtīyā tasya guṇa bhāvaḥ yatra dvitīyā tasya prādhānyam prastare ca vispaṣṭaḥ yajiḥ śākhā api tasmin eva yajau prastarasya viśeṣaṇam samāna yogi tvāt āha nanu tatra tatra guṇa bhūtā śākhā tasyāḥ pratipattiḥ nyāyyāḥ itaratha aneka guṇa bhāvaḥ prasajyeta iti ucyate dravyāṇām ca artha śeṣa tvāt utpattyā cikīrṣitasya śeṣa bhūtāni eva dravyāṇi upadiśyante bhūtam bhavyāya upadiśyate iti tasmāt aneka guṇa tā eva dravyānām nyāyya iti 
[I,475,ii_I,475,iii^1]	pratipattiḥ vā śabdasya tad pradhāna tvāt pratipattiḥ vā śākhā praharaṇam śabdasya tad pradhāna tvāt śabdaḥ atra śākhā pradhānaḥ katham dvitīya aśravaṇāt nanu anyatra eva sā dvitīyā prastare na śākhāyām ucyate prastare dvitīya arthaḥ śākhāyām api katham tulya yogāt saha śākhayā evam prastaraḥ prahṛtaḥ bhavati yadi śākhā api prahriyate tena tulya yoge saha śabdaḥ ayam yadi prastaraḥ praharaṇe pradhānam śākhā api prastara viśeṣaṇam na tarhi tulya yogaḥ tasmāt yaḥ prastare dvitīya arthaḥ sa śākhāyām api atas śākhā pradhānam api ca tatra tatra śākhā guṇa bhūtā tasyām anyatra upadiśyamānāyām aneka guṇa bhāvaḥ tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ dṛṣṭam kāryam hitvā adṛṣṭam kalpyeta 
[I,475,iii^2]	kṛta prayojanāyāḥ śākhāyāḥ apanayanena vedi vivecanāt sukha pracāraḥ dṛṣṭam kāryam na tu prahareṇa kiṃcid sūkṣmam api dṛṣṭam asti tasmāt pratipattiḥ nyāyyā āha nanu tṛtīyā śravaṇāt para arthena śākhā uccāraṇena bhavitum nyāyyam ucyate bhavet etat nyāyyam yadi nirjñāta kālā śākhā syāt tatas prastarasya kāla paricchedāya kīrtyamānā para arthāḥ uccāryeta iha punar etat viparītam nirjñāta kālaḥ prastaraḥ anirjñāta kālā śākhā tasmāt sati api tṛtīyā śravaṇe prastaraḥ eva śākhāyāḥ kālam paricchetsyati yathā dvitīyā nirdiṣṭaḥ tathā śākhā draṣṭavyā yathā tṛtīyā nirdiṣṭā tathā prastaraḥ sāmarthyam hi balavattaram iti 
[I,476,i_I,476,ii]	arthe api iti ced āha nanu guṇa bhāve api dvitīyā bhavati yathā saktu māruta eka kapāleṣu 
[I,476,iii_I,476,iv]	na tasya anadhikārāt arthasya ca kṛta tvāt na etat saktva ādibhiḥ tulyam tasya saktvādeḥ anyatra anadhikārāt iha ca śākhayā anyasya arthasya kṛta tvāt vatsa apākaraṇa ādeḥ āha nanu punaruktam etat saktva ādīnām pradarśanam samādhiḥ ca iti ucyate na punarukta tā mahān doṣaḥ bahu kṛtvas api pathyam veditavyam bhavati grantha bhayena punaruktam na icchanti artha agrahaṇāt tu bibhyataḥ punar punar abhidhīyamānam bahu manyante eva kim cintāyāḥ prayojanam yadi artha karma paurṇamāsyām api śākhā utpādyā atha pratipattiḥ na utpādayitavyā iti 
[I,477,i_I,477,ii]	utpatti asaṃyogāt praṇītānām ājya vat vibhāgaḥ syāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ āmnāyate apaḥ praṇayati āpaḥ vai śraddhā śraddhām eva ālabhya yajate iti ubhayatra ca praṇītānām vyāpāraḥ praṇītābhiḥ havīṃṣi saṃyauti iti tathā antarvedi praṇītā ninayati iti atra saṃdehaḥ kim ubhayam āsām prayojakam saṃyavanam ninayanam ca uta saṃyavana arthānām ninayanam pratipattiḥ iti kim prāptam utpatti saṃyogaḥ nāsām kenacid prayojanena ubhābhyām utpannānām saṃyogaḥ tasmāt na gamyate viśeṣaḥ agamyamāne viśeṣe ubhaya arthānām vibhāgaḥ ayam kaścid yāgaḥ saṃyavane kaścid ninayane iti ājya vat yathā sarvasmai vai etat yajñāya gṛhyate yat dhruvāyām ājyam iti 
[I,477,iii_I,477,iv]	saṃyavana arthānām vā pratipattiḥ itarāsām tad pradhāna tvāt saṃyavana arthāḥ praṇītāḥ kutas tṛtīyā nirdeśāt saṃyavane apām guṇa bhāvaḥ dvitīyā nirdeśāt ca ninayane prādhānyam cintāyāḥ prayojanam puroḍāśa abhāve praṇītānām abhāvaḥ yathā payasyāyām 
[I,478,i_I,478,ii]	prāsana vat maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍa pradānam kṛtārtha tvāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate vāc vai devebhyaḥ apākrāmat yajñāya atiṣṭhamānā sā vanaspatīn prāviśat sā eṣā vāc vanaspatiṣu vadati yā dundubhau yā ca tūṇave yā ca vīṇāyām yat dīkṣitāya daṇḍam prayacchati vācam eva avarundhe krīte some maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍam prayacchati iti maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍam prayacchati iti etat udāharaṇam tatra saṃśayaḥ kim dīkṣita dhāraṇe śeṣa bhūtasya daṇḍasya maitrāvaruṇa dhāraṇam pratipattiḥ athavā artha karma iti kim prāptam maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍa dānam pratipattiḥ kutas dīkṣita dhāraṇe kṛtārtha tvāt daṇḍena dīkṣayanti iti śeṣa bhūtasya anyatra vyāpāraḥ pratipattiḥ nyāyyā yathā cātvāle kṛṣṇa viṣāṇām prāsyati iti kaṇḍūyane śeṣa bhūtāyāḥ prāsanam pratipattiḥ evam atra api draṣṭavyam dvitīyā ca daṇḍe vibhaktiḥ tasmāt prādhānyam iti 
[I,478,iii_I,479,i]	artha karma vā kartṛ saṃyogāt sragvat artha karma vā syāt kutas kartṛ saṃyogāt kartṛ saṃyogaḥ bhavati maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍam iti kartṛ daṇḍa saṃyogaḥ bhavati tasmin ca daṇḍaḥ guṇa bhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ pradhāna bhūtaḥ puruṣam hi sa pracaritum samartham karoti katham yathā pūrvam tamaḥ avagāhate apaḥ sarpati gām ca sarpam ca vārayati avalambanam ca bhavati atas puruṣa prādhānyāt na pratipattiḥ sragvat ca draṣṭavyam yathā srajam udgātre dadāti iti asati api upakāre puruṣasya prayojanavat tvāt niṣprayojana tvāt ca srajaḥ bhavati puruṣa prādhānyam evam iha api draṣṭavyam tasmāt na pratipattiḥ iti atha yat uktam dvitīya aśravaṇāt daṇḍa prādhānyam iti ucyate tathā yuktam ca anīpsitam iti dvitīyā draṣṭavyā kutas maitrāvaruṇe caturthī nirdeśāt saṃpradāne hi caturthī bhavati saṃpradānam ca karmaṇā abhipreyate tatra daṇḍāt abhipretataraḥ maitrāvaruṇaḥ iti gamyate 
[I,479,ii_I,479,iii]	karma yukte ca darśanāt daṇḍī praiṣān anvāha iti anūdyate tena pracarataḥ daṇḍam pradarśayati tat artha karamaṇi sati upapadyate pratipattau tu daṇḍaḥ maitrāvaruṇāya dattaḥ tatas apavṛjyeta kṛtam ca kartavyam iti na tena prayojam iti na dhāryeta tatra etad darśanam na upapadyate tathā ahiḥ tvām daśati iti maitrāvaruṇam brūyāt ahiḥ iva hi eṣaḥ iti tathā muśalyan vāha iti muśala śabdaḥ ca daṇḍe prasiddhaḥ yathā kva nu khalu muśalinaḥ māṇavakāḥ gaṅgām avatareyuḥ iti tasmāt api artha karma 
[I,479,iv_I,480,i]	utpattau yena saṃyuktam tad artham tat śruti hetu tvāt tasya artha antara gamane śeṣa tvāt pratipattiḥ syāt yat uktam yathā kṛṣṇa viṣāṇa aprāsanam iti tatra ucyate yuktam tatra utpadyamānam yat yena prayojanena saṃbaddham utpadyate tat tad artham eva nyāyyam tasya anyatra gamane pratipattiḥ iti etat upapadyate yadi na dṛṣṭam prayojanam bhavati iha tu dṛṣṭam prayojanam maitrāvaruṇasya dhāraṇe tasmāt viṣamam etat athavā adhikaraṇa antaram viṣāṇāyāḥ kaṇḍūyanam prāsanam ca ubhayam api prayojakam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ eka niṣpatteḥ sarvam samam syāt iti utttaraḥ pakṣaḥ kaṇḍūyane tṛtīyā nirdeśāt viṣāṇāyāḥ guṇa bhāvaḥ prāsane ca dvitīya anirdeśāt anyatra ca kṛtārtha tvāt prādhānyam iti 
[I,480,ii_I,480,iii]	saumike ca kṛtārtha tvāt asti jyotiṣṭome avabhṛthaḥ vāruṇena eka kapālena avabhṛtham abhyavapanti iti tatra āmnāyate varuṇa gṛhītam vā etat yajñasya yadṛjīṣam yat grāvāṇa yat aunduvarī yat abhiṣavaṇa phalake tasmāt yat kiṃcid soma liptam dravyam tena avabhṛtham yanti iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim soma liptānām dravyāṇām avabhṛtha gamanam pratipattiḥ athavā artha karma iti kim tāvat prāptam pratipattiḥ iti kutas kṛtārtha tvāt kṛtārthāni etāni dravyāṇi tatra tatra teṣām avabhṛtha gamanam pratipattiḥ nyāyyā 
[I,480,iv_I,480,v]	artha karma vā abhidhāna saṃyogāt artha karma vā abhidhānena saṃyogāt tena avabhṛtham yanti iti tena avabhṛtha saṃjñakam niṣpādayanti iti tṛtīyā tena iti dvitīya avabhṛtham iti tasmāt soma liptam guṇa bhūtam avabhṛthaḥ pradhāna bhūtaḥ iti 
[I,481,i_I,481,ii]	pratipattiḥ vā tat nyāya tvāt deśa artha avabhṛtha śrutiḥ pratipattiḥ vā kutas tat nyāya tvāt eva eṣa hi nyāyaḥ yat anyatra kṛtārtham anyatra pratipādyate tat iha yadi soma liptam dravyam avabhṛthe karaṇam vidhīyate tatas artha karma atha soma liptena yānam vidhīyate tatas pratipattiḥ na hi atra soma liptam vidhīyate avabhṛthe tathā sati avabhṛtha soma lipta saṃbandhaḥ abhyavayanti iti anena ākhyātena vidhīyeta tatra vākyena vidhānam syāt na tu śrutyā yāne amunā vidhīyamāne śrutyā vidhānam tat parigṛhītam bhavati śrutiḥ ca vākyāt balīyasī tasmāt pratipattiḥ atha yat uktam artha karma abhidhānena saṃyogāt iti tatra brūmaḥ evam sati deśa arthāḥ avabhṛtha śrutiḥ avabhṛtham yanti iti avabhṛthena deśam lakṣayati yasmin deśe avabhṛthaḥ tam deśam yanti iti tasmāt pratipattiḥ iti 
[I,481,iii_I,481,iv]	kartṛ deśa kālānām acodanam prayoge nitya samavāyāt idam śrūyate paśubandhasya yajña kratoḥ ṣaṭ ṛtvijaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ yajña kratoḥ catvāraḥ ṛtvijaḥ cāturmāsyānām yajña kratūnām pañca ṛtvijaḥ agnihotrasya yajña kratoḥ ekaḥ ṛtvij saumyasya adhvarasya yajña kratoḥ saptadaśaḥ ṛtvijaḥ tathā same darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta prācīna pravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajeta paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsyāḥ yajeta amāvāsyāyām amāvāsyaya iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim kartṛ deśa kālāḥ vidhīyante uta anūdyante iti kim tāvat prāptam kartṛ deśa kālānām acodanam anuvādaḥ kutas prayoge nitya samavāyāt prayoge nitya samavetāḥ ete iti na ṛte kartṛ deśa kālebhyaḥ prayogaḥ sidhyati tena prayoga codanayā eva prāptānām anuvādaḥ nanu viṣama ādi pratiṣedha artham etat vacanam bhaviṣyati na iti brūmaḥ upadeśakam evaṃjātīyakam vacanam na pratiṣedhakam tasmāt anuvādaḥ iti 
[I,482,i_I,482,ii]	niyama arthāḥ vā śrutiḥ ucyate na ca etat asti anuvādaḥ iti anuvāda mātram anarthakam yadi vidhiḥ evam apūrvam artham prakariṣyati tasmāt vidhiḥ iti nanu prayoga aṅga tvāt prāptaḥ eva iti ucyate niyama arthā śrutiḥ bhaviṣyati kaḥ ayam niyamaḥ aniyatasya niyata tā prayoga aṅga tayā sarve deśāḥ prāpnuvanti na tu samuccayena yadā samaḥ an tadā viṣamaḥ yadā viṣamaḥ na tadā samaḥ saḥ eṣa samaḥ prāptaḥ ca aprāptaḥ ca yadā na prāptaḥ sa pakṣaḥ vidhim prayojayati atas viṣama cikīrṣāyām api samaḥ vidhīyate tasmāt viṣamasya aprāptiḥ vidhau sati bhavati iti samaḥ vidhīyate evam itareṣu api tasmāt vidhiḥ iti 
[I,482,iii_I,482,iv]	tathā dravyeṣu guṇa śrutiḥ utpatti saṃyogāt adhikaraṇa pradeśaḥ ayam idam āmamanti vāyavyam śvetam ālabheta bhūti kāmaḥ tathā somāraudram ghṛte carum nirvapet śuklānām vrīhīṇām brahmavarcaskāmaḥ tathā nairṛtam carum nirvapet kṛṣṇānām vrīhīṇām iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim śveta ādi varṇaḥ vidhīyate uta anūdyate uta anūdyate iti kim prāptam anūdyate dravya śruti gṛhīta tvāt vidhiḥ vā pakṣe prāptasya niyama arthaḥ iti pakṣa uktam prayojanam ubhayoḥ api adhikaraṇayoḥ 
[I,483,i_I,483,ii]	saṃskāre ca tad pradhāna tvāt ayam api adhikaraṇa apradeśaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate vrīhīn avahanti taṇḍulān pinaṣṭī iti tat kim imau vidhī uta anuvādau iti saṃśaye artha prāpta tvāt anuvādau iti prāpte niyama artha tvāt vidhī iti 
[I,483,iii_I,483,iv]	yajati codanā dravya devatā kriyam samudāye kṛtārtha tvāt śeṣa viniyogaḥ uktaḥ kim tat pradhānam yasya ete śeṣāḥ iti ucyate yajati dadāti juhoti iti evaṃlakṣaṇam atha kiṃlakṣaṇakaḥ yajati juhotiḥ dadātiḥ ca iti yajati codanā tāvat dravya devatā kriyam dravyam devatā ca tasya dravasya kriyā yayā tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ bhavati samudāye samuditeṣu eṣu yajati śabdaḥ bhavati loke iṣṭaḥ anena paśupatiḥ iti tena manyāmahe dravya devatā kriyasya arthasya yajati śabdena pratyāyanam kriyate iti lakṣaṇa karmaṇi prayojanam na vaktavyam jñānam eva atra prayojanam iti 
[I,484,i_I,484,iii]	tad ukte śravaṇāt juhotiḥ āsecana adhikaḥ syāt atha kiṃlakṣaṇakaḥ juhotiḥ iti tat ukte yajati ukte arthe juhotiḥ śrūyate āsecana adhike tasmāt yajatiḥ eva āsecana adhikaḥ juhotiḥ hutam anena iti evaṃjātīyake vaktāraḥ bhavanti loke vede api yajati coditam juhotinā anuvadati saṃgrāmiṇam caturhotrā yājayet caturgṛhītam ājyam kṛtvā catur hotāram vyācakṣīta pūrveṇa graheṇa ardham juhuyāt uttareṇa ardham iti atha dadātiḥ kiṃlakṣaṇakaḥ iti ātmanaḥ sva tva vyāvṛttiḥ parasya sva tvena saṃbandhaḥ yajati dadā ati juhotiṣu sarveṣu utsargaḥ samānaḥ tatra yajatiḥ devatām uddiśya utsarga mātram juhotiḥ āsecana adhikaḥ dadāti utsarga pūrvakaḥ para sva tvena saṃbandhaḥ iti eṣaḥ eṣām viśeṣaḥ iti 
[I,485,i_I,485,ii]	vidheḥ karma apavargi tvāt artha antare vidhi pradeśaḥ syāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate yat ātithyāyām barhiḥ tat upasadām tat agnīṣomīyasya iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim para dravyasya upadeśaḥ uta niriṣṭikasya athavā dharma vidhi pradeśaḥ athavā dravya sādha araṇyam iti kim prāptam para dravyasya upadeśaḥ kutas para dravyasya upadeśa sadṛśaḥ śabdaḥ yat ātithyāyām tat upasadām iti yathā yaḥ devadattasya gauḥ sa viṣṇu mitrasya kartavyaḥ iti devadattāt ācchidya viṣṇu mitrāya dīyate iti atas para dravyasya upadeśaḥ iti na ca etat asti tathā sati ātithyāyām tasya vidhānam yat pūrvam tat anarthakam syāt 
[I,485,iii]	evam tarhi niriṣṭikasya upadeśaḥ tena ātithyāyām yat vihitam ātithyāyām yat upāttam iti tathā sati arthavat ātithyāyām tat vacanam niriṣṭikena tu upasadaḥ kartavyāḥ bhavanti na ca eṣa śiṣṭānām ācāraḥ na ca sarve ca udaka prāptāḥ dharmāḥ bhaveyuḥ atas brūmaḥ vidheḥ karma apavargi tvāt artha antare vidhi pradeśaḥ syāt tat barhiḥ parisamāptāyām ātithyāyām apavṛktam pūrvam tat ātithyāyāḥ upasat kāle ātithyā saṃbandhaḥ tasya na asti bhūta pūrveṇa ātithyayā karmaṇā lakṣyeta lakṣaṇā śabdaḥ ca na nyāyyaḥ tasmāt ātithyābarhiṣaḥ āñjasya abhāvāt yat dharmakam ātithyābarhiḥ tat dharmakam upasadām agnīṣomīyasya ca iti nyāyyam 
[I,486,i_I,486,ii]	api vā utpatti saṃyogāt artha saṃbandhaḥ aviśiṣṭānām prayoga eka tva hetuḥ syāt api vā iti pakṣaḥ vyāvartate utpatti saṃyogaḥ eva eṣaḥ asya barhiṣaḥ yadi hi utpannam ātithyāyām barhiḥ viśiṣṭam syāt tasya dharmāḥ aupasade barhiṣi atidiśyeran na tu tat asti kenacid vākyena evam prakṛtya barhiṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ vakṣyate āśvavālaḥ prastaraḥ vidhṛtī ca aikṣavyau iti tena na para vihitam barhiḥ ucyate na niriṣṭikam na kutaścid dharmāḥ pratidiśyante kim tarhi sādhāraṇam amīṣām barhiḥ ucyate yat ātithyāyām vidhīyate tat eva upasadām agnīṣomīyasya ca vidhīyate iti aviśiṣṭānām barhiṣā saṃyogaḥ ekena sarveṣām yat ādau barhiḥ lūyate tat lavanam sarveṣām arthena sādhāraṇaḥ barhiṣaḥ prayogaḥ evam śrutiḥ śabdasya parigṛhītā bhaviṣyati itarathā dharma lakṣaṇā bhavet śruti lakṣaṇa aviśaye ca śrutiḥ nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā tasmāt trayāṇām sādhāraṇam barhiḥ iti pakṣa uktam prayojanam 
[I,486,iii_I,486,iv]	dravya saṃskāra karmasu para artha tvāt phala śrutiḥ artha vādaḥ syāt yasya khādiraḥ sruvaḥ bhavati sa chandasām eva rasena avadyati sarasāḥ asya āhutayaḥ bhavanti yasya parṇa mayī juhūḥ bhavati na sa pāpam ślokam śṛṇoti iti yasya aśvatthi upabhṛt bhavati brahmaṇā eva asya annam avarundhe yasya vaikaṅkatī dhruvā bhavati prati eva asya āhutayaḥ tiṣṭhanti atho praiva jāyate yasya evaṃrūpāḥ sruvāḥ bhavanti sarvāṇi eva enam rūpāṇi paśūnām upatiṣṭhante na asya aparūpam ātman jāyate iti tathā jyotiṣṭoma saṃskāre phala śrutiḥ yadā aṅkte cakṣuḥ eva bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte tathā keśa śmaśrū vapate dataḥ dhāvate nakhāni nikṛntati snāti mṛtāḥ vai eṣā tvac amedhyam vā asya etat ātmani śamalam tat eva upahate medhyaḥ eva medham evam upaiti karmaṇi phalam śrūyate abhīṣū vai etau yajñasya yat ādhārau cakṣuṣī vai etau yajñasya yat ājya bhāgau yat prayāja anuyājāḥ ijyante varma vai etat yajñasya kriyate varma yajamānasya bhārtṛvyasya abhibhūtyai iti 
[I,486,v]	atra saṃdehaḥ kim ime phala vidhayaḥ uta arthavādāḥ iti kim prāptam phala vidhayaḥ pravṛtti viśeṣa kara tvāt phala vidheḥ yathā khādiram vīrya kāmasya yūpam kūryāt pālāśam brahmavarcaskām asya bailvam annādya kāmasya iti yathā ete phala vidhayaḥ evam iha api draṣṭavyam evam prāpte brūmaḥ phala artha vādāḥ iti kutas para artha tvāt kratu arthāni etāni juhūḥ pradāne guṇa bhūtāḥ upabhṛt upadhāraṇe sruvāḥ ājya dhāraṇe añjana vapana ādi ca yajamāne āghārau ājya bhāgau prayāja anuyājāḥ ca āgneya ādiṣu yadi phale api guṇa bhāvaḥ syāt anyatra upadiṣṭānām anyatra punar guṇa bhāvaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ iti pratijñāyeta na ca etat nyāyyam parārtha tā hi guṇa bhāvaḥ kratu arthā ca eṣām śabdena juhvā juhoti juhvā homam abhinirvartayati iti evam sarvatra tasmāt na ete puruṣa arthāḥ 
[I,488,i_I,488,ii]	utpatteḥ ca atad pradhāna tvāt atha ucyeta puruṣam api prati guṇa bhāvaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ yasya parṇa mayī juhūḥ bhavati na sa pāpam ślokam śṛṇoti iti evamādibhiḥ vākyaiḥ iti tat ca na kasmāt utpatteḥ atad pradhāna tvāt tatra pālāśyāḥ juhvāpa apa śloka śravaṇam kriyate iti na kaścid śabdaḥ āha etāvat śrūyate yasya asau bhavati na sa pāpam ślokam śṛṇoti iti etāvat atra śabdena gamyate yasya evaṃlakṣaṇā juhūḥ tasya apāpa śloka śravaṇam iti tatra juhvā tat kriyate juhūḥ vā tad artha iti na etat śabdaḥ āha 
[I,488,iii]	nanu anumānāt etat gamyate dhruvam pālāśyāḥ juhvā tat kriyate yatas tasyām satyām tat bhavati iti atra ucyate na evaṃjātīyakam kārya kāraṇa tve anumānam bhavati kārya kāraṇa saṃbandhaḥ nāma sa bhavati yasmin sati yat bhavati yasmin ca asati yat na bhavati tatra eva kārya kāraṇa saṃbandhaḥ iha tu tad bhāve bhāvaḥ jñātaḥ na abhāve abhāvaḥ yasya pālāśī na bhavati tasya apāpa śloka śravaṇam na asti iti na evaṃjātīyakaḥ śabdaḥ asti tena na niyogataḥ avagamyate tena idam kriyate iti lakṣaṇam etat puruṣasya gamyate tasmāt na anumānam 
[I,489,i]	api ca yasya api juhūḥ pālāśī bhavati tasya api pāpa śloka śravaṇam bhavati katham avagamyate pratyakṣataḥ nanu evam sati agnihotreṇa api phalam na sādhyeta na hutā mātreṇa phalam dṛśyate iti na eṣa doṣaḥ na hi tatra ucyate tāvatā eva phalam bhavati iti iha tu vartamānāyām juhūsattāyām vartamānasya pāpa śloka śravaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ tasmāt na tatra anumānam idam kāryam idam kāraṇam iti agnihotra ādiṣu tu śabdena eva kārya kāraṇa saṃbandhaḥ ucyate tasmāt tatra tad kāle adṛśyamāne api phale kāla antare phalam bhaviṣyati iti gamyate na tu evaṃjātīyakeṣu tasmāt na evaṃjātīyakebhyaḥ phalam asti iti 
[I,489,ii^1]	nanu yasya pālāśī juhūḥ bhavati na sa pāpam ślokam śṛṇoti iti evam ukte tat eva tat phalam bhavati iti gamyate tasmāt iha api kāla antare phalam bhaviṣyati iti ucyate satyam gamyate pramāṇam tatra kim iti vicārayāmaḥ na tāvat pratyakṣam na anumānam na itarat dṛṣṭa viṣayam upamāna ādi no khalu api śabdaḥ iti etat uktam vākya arthaḥ api padārtha upajanitaḥ bhavati na anyathā tat uktam tad bhūtānām kriyā arthena samāmnāyaḥ iti tasmāt apramāṇa mūla tvāt mithyā vijñānam etat laukikeṣu tu vākyeṣu atha evam gamyate tāni hi vijñāte arthe prayujyamānāni adhyāhārya padāni gauṇāni vipariṇata vyavahita arthāni ca prayujyante tasmāt tad sādṛśyāt vacanau agamyeṣu api artheṣu bhavati tattva rūpaḥ mithyā pratyayaḥ yathā mṛgatṛṣṇā ādiṣu 
[I,489,ii^2]	api ca vartamāna apadeśaḥ ayam na ca ayam arthaḥ vartamānaḥ tasmāt na khādira sruva ādi sadbhāve tad phalam bhavet tat evam āpatati khādira ādau sati bhavati tat phalam na api bhavati asati api bhavati vā na vā iti na evam vijñāyate kutas tad phalam iti tasmāt evaṃjātīyakeṣu uccariteṣu na kvacid pravṛttiḥ na kutaścid nivṛttiḥ iti ānarthakyam akriyā artha tvāt artha vāde tu sati bhavati prayojanam khadira ādeḥ sruva ādiṣu karma artheṣu prayojanavatsu yadi eṣām kratum prati prayojanavattā na syāt tatas etat eva phalam kasyācid śabda vṛttyā bhavet vā na vā iti vicāryeta sati tu pārārthye na eva kācid śabda pravṛttiḥ āśrayitum śakyate kaimarthye hi sā kalpyeta tasmāt evaṃjātīyakāḥ artha vādāḥ arthavāda tve ca āvartamāne lakṣaṇayā vartamāna śabdaḥ praśaṃsā arthaḥ upapatsyate 
[I,490,i_I,490,v]	phalam tu tad pradhānāyām atha yat uktam yathā khādiram vīrya kāmasya yūpam kuryāt bailvam annādya kāmasya pālāśam brahmavarcasa kāmasya iti yuktam teṣu vidhi vibhaktiḥ kuryāt iti vīrya khādira saṃbandhasya vidhātrī na ca vartamāna apadeśinī tasmāt tatra avirodhaḥ iti evam hi pada vākya artha nyāya vidaḥ ślokam āmananti kuryāt kriyeta kartavyam bhavet syāt iti pañcamam etat syāt sarva vedeṣu niyatam vidhi lakṣaṇam iti vidhi vibhaktim hi vidhāyikām liṅgam manyamānāḥ ślokam imam samāmananti asti ca atra vidhi vibhaktiḥ tasmāt anupavarṇanam etat iti 
[I,491,i_I,491,ii]	naimittike vikāra tvāt kratu pradhānam anyat syāt asti jyotiṣṭome naimittikam bārhadgiram brāhmaṇasya brahmasāma kuryāt pārthuḥ aśmām rājanyasya rāyovājīyam vaiśyasya iti tathā agnau naimittikam sāhasram prathamam cinvānaḥ cinvīta dvi sāhasram dvitīyam tri sāhasram tṛtīyam iti tathā darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate go dohanena paśu kāmasya praṇayet kāṃsyena brahmavarcasa kāmasya mārtikena pratiṣṭhā kāmasya iti etāni naimittikāni teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim etāni eva naimittikāni nitya arthe uta anyat tatra tatra nitya arthaḥ iti 
[I,491,iii]	kim prāptam etāni eva iti kutas atra brahma sāma ādibhiḥ avaśyam bhavitavyam coditāni hi tāni saṃnihitāni sādhanāni ākāṅkṣanti na ca eṣām santi vihitāni sādhanāni samīpatas ca naimittikāni upanipatanti taiḥ prakṛtaiḥ saṃnihitaiḥ etāni nirākāṅkṣīkriyante iti etat nyāyyam katham naimittikam hi saṃnihitam vākyāt avagamyate na anyat śrūyate yāvān ca śrutasya utsarge doṣaḥ tāvān eva aśruta kalpanāyām 
[I,491,iv]	āha nanu nimitta arthāni tāni prakṛtāni ucyate na eṣa doṣaḥ anya artham api prakṛtam anyena saṃbadhyate yathā śāli artham kulyāḥ praṇīyante tābhyaḥ ca pānīyam pīyate upaspṛśyate ca evam iha api draṣṭavyam athavā asti eva atra avāntara vākyam yathā go dohanena praṇayet iti tat akāma saṃbaddham go dohanena praṇayanam prāpayati na ca śakyam śrutam utsraṣṭum yaḥ api ayam paśu kāmasya iti śabdaḥ sa paśu kāma saṃbandham śaknuyāt kartum nāva antara vākyasya artham nivārayitum na ca gamyamānam vinā kāraṇena avivakṣitam iti śakyam vaditum bhavanti ca dviṣṭhāni vākyāni yathā śvetaḥ dhāvati alambusānām yātā iti tasmāt naimittikāni eva nitya arthe bhavitum arhanti iti 
[I,492,i]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ naimittike śrūyamāṇe kratu artham anyat syāt iti kutas vikāra tvāt viśeṣe śruta tvāt iti arthaḥ viśeṣe hi tatra naimittikam śrūyate tat asati tasmin viśeṣe na bhavitum arhati yat uktam avaśya kartavyāni iti na eṣa doṣaḥ avaśyam kartavya tvāt kariṣyante yat tu na anyat eṣām vihitam sādhanam iti sāmānya vihitam bhaviṣyati iti na doṣaḥ kim tat abhīvartaḥ brahmasāma aṣṭādaśa mantra gataḥ agniḥ vāraṇam praṇayana pātram atha yat uktam saṃnihitaiḥ prakṛtaiḥ naimittikaiḥ brahma sāma ādīni saṃbhatsyante iti na iti brūmaḥ na hi bārhadgira ādīnām prakaraṇam atha ucyeta prakṛtaiḥ stotra ādibhiḥ saṃbadhyante iti etat api na upapadyate yadi api prakṛtāni nityāni stotra ādīni tathā api vākyena nimitta saṃyoge śrūyante bārhadgira ādīni vākyam ca prakaraṇāt balīyaḥ 
[I,492,ii_I,492,iii]	yat uktam saṃnidhānāt vākyāt avagataḥ ayam arthaḥ iti na evaṃjātīyakaḥ vākya arthaḥ sāmānyam padārtham bādhitum arhati nimitta saṃyoge hi bārhadgira ādīnām arthavat tā tasmāt tatra tatra anyat naimittikāt iti atha yat uktam avāntara vākyena go dohanam api prāpitam na śakyam utsraṣṭum ṛte kāraṇāt avivakṣitam kalpayitum dviṣṭham hi tat bhavati iti ucyate kāraṇāt avivakṣitam kim kāraṇam na hi idam yugapad bhavati paripūrṇena ca artha abhidhānam avāntara vākyena ca iti katham praṇayati iti prapūrve nayatau vidhi vibhaktiḥ sva pada gatam artham śrutyā vidadhāti praṇayana ādi saṃbaddham api go dohana ādi śrutyā vākyena ca vastu phalasya go dohana ādeḥ ca saṃbandhaḥ sa hitvā śruti artham kevalena vākyena atha praṇayanasya go dohana ādi saṃbandham go dohana ādeḥ ca phalena saṃbandham vadati iti ucyate na dvi artha abhidhānāt bhidyeta nitarām vākyam na ca etat nyāyyam 
[I,493,i]	yat tu śvetaḥ dhāvati iti evamādi bhavet tatra viśeṣa anavagamāt ubhaya artha avagatiḥ iha tu gamyate viśeṣaḥ kamipadā uccāraṇam saḥ iha śrautaḥ arthaḥ manyeta yadi go dohana ādeḥ kriyā saṃbandhaḥ vivakṣyate kamipadam pramādaḥ bhavet na ca ayam pramādaḥ na eva avāntara vākya arthe vivakṣite kamipada saṃbandhaḥ avakalpate tasmāt na dviṣṭham vākyam go dohana ādi kami saṃbandhaḥ eva atra abhidhīyate na nitya kārye bhavitum arhati iti evam sarvatra 
[I,493,ii_I,493,iii]	ekasya tu ubhaya tve saṃyoga pṛthaktvam agnihotre śrūyate dadhnā juhoti iti punar ca dadhnā indriya kāmasya juhuyāt iti tathā agnīṣomīye paśau āmnāyate khādire badhnāti iti punar ca khādiram vīrya kāmasya yūpam kuryāt iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim atra api anyat nitya artham uta naimittikam eva iti kim prāptam pūrveṇa nyāyena anyat iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ ekasya ubhaya tve nitya tve naimittika tve ca saṃyoga pṛthaktvam kāraṇam tat iha saṃyoga pṛthaktvam asti ekaḥ saṃyogaḥ dadhnā juhoti iti ekaḥ dadhnā indriya kāmasya iti tathā ekaḥ khādire badhnāti iti aparaḥ khādiram vīrya kāmasya iti tasmāt nitya arthe kāmāya ca dadhi khādiḥ ādi iti
