[I,494,i_I,494,ii]	śeṣaḥ iti ced iti ced paśyasi kasmāt na pūrvasya ayam api śeṣaḥ bhavati yat etat uktam dadhnā juhoti khādire badhnāti iti tasya eva tu dadhnaḥ phalam indriyam tathā khādirasya vīryam tat ca idam ca ekam vākyam iti 
[I,494,iii_I,494,iv]	na artha pṛthaktvāt na etat evam pṛthak etau arthau yaḥ ca dadhi homa saṃyogaḥ yaḥ ca dadhi indriya saṃyogaḥ tathā khādirasya badhnātinā saṃyogaḥ vīryeṇa ca dvau etau arthau dvau api ca vidhitsitau artha eka tvāt ca ekam vākyam samadhigatam iha artha dvayena bhidyeta vākyam katham juhoti samabhivyāhṛtā vidhi vibhaktiḥ asaṃbhave śrautasya homa vidhānasya guṇam samabhivyāhṛtam vidhātum arhati tat asaṃbhave guṇa phala saṃbandham tatra hi atyantāya śrutiḥ utsṛṣṭāḥ vākya anurodhena syāt na ca yugapad saṃbhava asaṃbhavau saṃbhavataḥ tasmāt yat eva naimittikam tat eva nitya artham iti 
[I,495,i_I,495,ii]	dravyāṇām tu kriyā arthānām saṃskāraḥ kratu dharmaḥ syāt jyotiṣṭome samāmananti payaḥ vratam brāhmaṇasya yavāguḥ rājanyasya āmikṣā vaiśyasya iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ayam puruṣa dharmaḥ uta kratoḥ iti prakaraṇam bādhitvā vākyena viniyuktaḥ puruṣasya iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ puruṣāṇām kriyā arthānām śarīra dhāraṇa arthaḥ bala karaṇa arthaḥ ca ayam saṃskāraḥ vratam nāma sa kratu dharmaḥ bhavitum arhati prakaraṇa anugrahāya nanu vākyāt puruṣa dharmaḥ iti na iti brūmaḥ tathā sati phalam kalpyam kḷptam itaratra prayoga vacanena upasaṃhṛtam hi tad pradhānasya tasmāt kratu dharmaḥ 
[I,495,iii_I,495,iv]	pṛthaktvāt vyavatiṣṭheta atha puruṣa saṃyogaḥ kim arthaḥ vyavasthāpana arthaḥ iti brūmaḥ payaḥ vratam jyotiṣṭomasya bhavati tat tu brāhmaṇa kartṛkasya eva na anya kartṛkasya iti evam sarvatra 
[I,496,i_I,496,ii]	codanāyām phala aśruteḥ karma mātram vidhīyeta na hi aśabdam pratīyate idam āmananti tasmāt pitṛbhyaḥ pūrvedyus karoti iti tathā sarvebhyaḥ vai eṣa devebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ chandobhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pṛṣṭhebhyaḥ ātmānam āgurate yaḥ satrāya agurate sa viśva jitā atirātreṇa sarva pṛṣṭhena sarva stomena sarva vedasa dakṣiṇena yajeta iti evaṃlakṣaṇake śrute bhavati saṃdehaḥ kim niṣphalam etat karma mātram uta saphalam iti kim prāptam niṣphalam iti kutas phala aśruteḥ śabda pramāṇake karmaṇi evaṃjātīyake na hi aśabdam pratīyate 
[I,496,iii]	nanu vaidikāni karmāṇi phalavanti bhavanti iti evam uktam ucyate phala darśanāt tāni phalavanti iti uktam na vaidika tvāt evam tarhi kartavyatā avagamāt phalavanti iti adhyavasyāmaḥ sukha phalam hi kartavyam bhavati iti ucyate pratyakṣa viruddham evaṃjātiyakasya kartavya tvam sākṣāt dhi tat duḥkha phalam agacchāmaḥ na ca evaṃjātīyakam pratyakṣa viruddham vacanam pramāṇam bhavati yathā ambuni majjanti alābūni śilāḥ plavante pāvakaḥ śītaḥ iti api ca anumānāt atra sukha phala tā yasmāt kartavyam atas sukha phalam iti pratyakṣam ca anumānāt balīyaḥ tasmāt niṣphalam evaṃjātīyakam iti 
[I,496,iv]	evam hi atra phalam kalpyeta yadi etat phalavat evam upadeśaḥ arthavān bhavati iti ucyate kāmam vākyam anarthakam iti nyāyyam vacanam bhavet bhavanti hi anarthakāni api vacanāni daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṣ apūyāḥ iti evaṃjātīyakāni nanu viśva jit vyāpāraḥ sukhaphalaḥ iti uttaram sukha phalam hi bhavati apūrvam na vyāpāraḥ na ca ayam apūrvasya kartavyatām āha phala kartavyatāyām hi satyām tat avagamyate vākya arthaḥ ca phalasya kartavyatām āha na padārthaḥ na ca atra phala saṃbaddham vākyam asti tasmāt na ayam apūrvasya vidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ vyāpāra mātram eva vidadhāti sa ca vyāpāraḥ na tadātve sukhaphalaḥ na api āyatyām bhaṅgi tvāt tatra apūrvam kalpayitvā phalam avagamyeta phalam ca kalpayitvā apūrvam evam itaretara āśrayam bhavati itaretara āśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante tasmāt niṣphalam evaṃjātīyakam iti 
[I,497,i]	āha adhyāhariṣyāmahe phala vacanam ucyate na śakyam paripūrṇe vākye adhyāhartum paripūrṇam hi idam vākyam viśva jit yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ iti na kiṃcid padam asti sa ākāṅkṣam yena adhyāhṛtya phalam saṃbadhyeta yathākṣeme api pathi bhavati vipralambha ka upa deśaḥ kṣemaḥ ayam yathā gacchatu bhavān anena iti paripūrṇam eva idam vākyam na adhyāhāram arhati vipralambhaka kartṛkam evam idam api paripūrṇam vākyam na adhyāhāram arhati api ca adhyāhriyamāṇena eva idam vākyam saṃbadhyeta viśva jit yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ idam ca phalam bhavati iti dvau imau arthau eka artham ca vākyam samadhigatam tasmāt anarthakam evaṃjātīyakam karma iti 
[I,498,i_I,498,ii]	api vāmnāna sāmarthyāt codanā arthena gamyeta arthānām hi arthavat tvena vacanāni pratīyante arthataḥ hi asama arthānām ānantarye api asaṃbandhaḥ tasmāt śruti eka deśaḥ saḥ api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ na ca etat asti aphalam iti phala codanā arthena gamyeta katamena arthena kartavyatā vacanena āha nanu vyāpārasya pratyakṣa viruddhā kartavyatā na vyāpārasya ucyate kasya tarhi vyāpāreṇa anyasya kasyacid iti bhavati tena idānīm vākyam sa ākāṅkṣam tatra adhyāhāraḥ avakalpate bhavati ca adhyāhāreṇa api kalpanā yathā dvāram dvāram iti ukte saṃvriyatām apāvriyatām iti katham punar avagamyate iha adhyāhāreṇa kalpayitavyam iti āmnāna sāmarthyāt evam idam āmnānam arthavat bhaviṣyati śaknoti ca artham avagamayitum tasmāt na anarthakam 
[I,498,iii_I,498,iv]	nanu yat padam adhyāhriyate tat pauruṣeyam tena avagatam ca apramāṇam ucyate na apūrvam adhyāhariṣyāmaḥ vaidikena eva asya saha anyatra samāmnātena eka vākyatām adhyavasāmaḥ āha na evam śakyam antikāt upanipatitam hi padam vākya artham upajanayitum alam bhavati na dūrāt avatiṣṭhamānam atra ucyate vyavahitam api hi parāṇudya vyavadhāyakam ānantaryeṇa manasi viparivartamānam alam eva bhavati viśeṣam upajanayitum yathā itas paśyasi dhāvantam dūre jātam vanaspatim 
[I,498,v]	tvām bravīmi viśāla akṣi yā pinakṣi jarat gavam iti itas paśyasi iti śabdaḥ buddhau bhavati saḥ dūre jātam vanaspatim etaiḥ padaiḥ vyavahitena jarat gavam iti anena śabdena vyavadhāyakāni apodya saṃbadhyamānaḥ saṃbadhyate arthānām hi arthavat tvena hetunā vyavahitāni api vacanāni saṃbadhyante yāni punar arthataḥ hi asamarthāni tāni ānantarye api sati na paraspareṇa saṃbandham arhanti yathā yā pinakṣi jarat gavam iti evamādīni tasmāt na pauruṣeya tā bhaviṣyati āha nanu atra api apekṣā pauruṣeyī ucyate na apekṣā vede veda artha pratipattau abhyupāyaḥ eṣa bhavati ananatara apekṣāyām asaṃbhavantyām āmnāna sāmarthyāt itara apekṣā vṛttiḥ āśrīyate tasmāt śruti eka deśaḥ saḥ phala kāma padam dūre api sat tasya vākyasya eka deśa bhūtam iti arthaḥ 
[I,499,i_I,499,ii]	vākya arthaḥ ca guṇa artha vat indrāya rājñe śūkaraḥ iti yathā vākya antara sthena vidhi śabdena guṇa vidhānam bhavati evam phala vidhānam api bhavitum arhati iti yathā varuṇaḥ vā etam agre pratyagṛhṇāt iti vyavadhāraṇa kalpanā evam idam api draṣṭavyam 
[I,499,iii_I,499,iv]	tat sarva artham anādeśāt tasmāt pitṛbhyaḥ pūrvedyus karoti iti viśvajitā yajeta iti phalavat evaṃvidham karma iti etat samadhigatam idam tu saṃdihyate kim sarva phalam etat karma uta eka phalam iti kim prāptam tat sarva artham iti kutas anādeśāt na kiṃcid iha atidiśyate idam nāma phalam iti asti ced vijñāyeta tasmāt sarva artham aviśeṣāt 
[I,500,i_I,500,ii]	ekam vā codana eka tvāt ekam phalam syāt na vā sarva artham kutas codana eka tvāt sa kāṅkṣa tvāt etat arthi padena saṃbadhyate iti uktam yat ca anekena api saṃbaddhum śaknoti tat ekena saṃbadhyate ekena saṃbaddham san nirākāṅkṣam bhavati na tat apareṇa api saṃbandham arhati tasmāt ekā eva kartavyatā codanā nyāyyā tasmāt ekaphala tā iti 
[I,500,iii_I,500,iv]	sa svargaḥ syāt sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭa tvāt evaṃjātīyakeṣu eva udāhāraṇeṣu etat samadhigatam ekam phalam iti idam idānīm saṃdihyate kim yat kiṃcid uta svargaḥ iti yat kiṃcid iti prāptam viśeṣān abhidhānāt tatas ucyate sa svargaḥ syāt sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭa tvāt sarve hi puruṣāḥ svarga kāmāḥ kutas etat prītiḥ hi svargaḥ sarvaḥ ca prītim prārthayate kim atas yadi evam aviśeṣa vacanaḥ śabdaḥ na viśeṣe vyavasthāpitaḥ bhaviṣyati yajeta kuryāt iti tasmāt svarga phalam evaṃjātīyakam iti 
[I,500,v_I,500,vi]	pratyayāt ca bhavati ca anādiṣṭa phale karmaṇi svargaḥ phalam iti pratyayaḥ loke evam ucyate ārāma kṛt devadattaḥ niyataḥ asya svargaḥ taḍāga kṛt devadattaḥ niyataḥ asya svargaḥ iti kim atas yadi evam ittham anena nyāyena svarge saṃpratyayaḥ bhavati yasmāt svarga phaleṣu karmasu kartavyeṣu phala vacanam na eva uccārayanti gamyate eva iti tasmāt api avagacchāmaḥ evaṃjātīyakeṣu svargaḥ phalam iti 
[I,501,i_I,501,ii]	kratau phala artha vādam aṅga vat kārṣṇa ajiniḥ rātrīḥ prakṛtya śrūyate pratitiṣṭhanti ha vā ete ye etāḥ upayanti brahma varcasvinaḥ anna ādāḥ bhavanti ye etāḥ upayanti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim te phala artha vādāḥ uta phala vidhayaḥ iti kim prāptam phala artha vādāḥ iti kārṣājiniḥ mene kutas phala artha vāda sarūpāḥ ete śabdāḥ iti kim sārūpyam vidhi vibhakteḥ abhāvaḥ aṅga vat yathā yasya khādiraḥ sruvaḥ bhavati sa chandasām eva rasena avadyati iti evamādiṣu 
[I,501,iii_I,501,iv]	phalam ātreyaḥ nirdeśāt aśrutau hi anumānam syāt ātreyaḥ punar ācāryaḥ evaṃjātīyakebhyaḥ phalam asti iti mene na phala artha vādaḥ iti kutas aśruta phala tve api amīṣām phala codanayā vākya śeṣa bhūtayā bhavitavyam tasmāt anyā vyavahitā satī avyavahitā kalpanīyā iyam tu avyavahitā kḷptā eva pratiṣṭhayā brahmavarcasa sattayā ca samabhivyāhāraḥ āsām pratyakṣaḥ vidhi vibhakti mātram anyatas apekṣyam āha katham kevalam vidhi vibhakti mātram anyatas bhaviṣyati yat anena pratiṣṭhā ādinā dhātu arthena saṃbhantsyate iti ucyate saha dhātu arthena bhaviṣyati na kevalam tasmāt adoṣaḥ athavā rātrīṇām yā vidhāyikā vibhaktiḥ sā imam api pratiṣṭhā ādi viśeṣam vidhāsyati prayoga vacanena stutiḥ vā saha pratiṣṭhā ādibhiḥ vidhātrī bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,502,i_I,502,ii]	aṅgeṣu stutiḥ para artha tvāt atha yat uktam yathā yasya khādiraḥ sruvaḥ bhavati iti evamādiṣu phala śrutiḥ artha vādaḥ bhavati evam iha api syāt iti yuktam tatra phala artha vādaḥ phala vidhi asaṃbhavāt phala arthavāda saṃbavāt ca tat uktam dravya saṃskāra karmasu para artha tvāt phala śrutiḥ artha vādaḥ syāt iti 
[I,502,iii_I,502,iv]	kāmye karmaṇi nityaḥ svargaḥ yathā yajña aṅge kratu arthaḥ kāmyāni karmāṇi udāharaṇam sauryam carum nirvapet brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ iti evamādīni iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim eṣām svargaḥ phalam kāmaḥ ca uta kāmaḥ eva iti kim prāptam kāmye karmaṇi nityaḥ svargaḥ syāt katham sarva puruṣa artha abhidhāyī sāmānya vacanaḥ śabdaḥ na viśeṣe avasthāpitaḥ bhavati śakyate hi asya dūra sthena api svarga kāma śabdena saṃbandhaḥ āha nanu viśeṣakaḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ iti na eṣa viśeṣakaḥ upādhi karaḥ eṣaḥ yathā kāṣṭhāni āhartum prasthitaḥ ucyate bhavatā śākam api āhartavyam iti kāṣṭhā haraṇe śāka āharaṇam upādhiḥ kriyate iti kim idam upādhiḥ kriyate iti kāṣṭhā haraṇa adhikāra samīpe dvitīyam karma upadhīyate sati kāṣṭhā haraṇe idam aparam kartavyam iti evam iha api svarga phale phalam aparam upadhīyate brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ yāgena svargam abhinirvartayet iti na hi tatra brahmavarcasa phala vacanam svarga phalasya pratiṣedhakam yathā yajña aṅge kratu arthaḥ go dohanena paśu kāmasya praṇayet iti yaḥ paśu kāmaḥ sa go dohanena praṇayanam abhinirvartayet iti 
[I,503,i_I,503,ii]	vīte ca kāraṇe niyamāt vīte ca kāraṇe vītāyām phala icchāyām avāpte vā phale samāpti niyamaḥ dṛśyate vṛṣṭikāma iṣṭyām yadi varṣet tāvatī eva juhuyāt yadi na varṣet śvobhūte juhuyāt iti yadi na svargaḥ kim arthaḥ samāpti niyamaḥ bhavet tasmāt nityaḥ svargaḥ iti 
[I,503,iii_I,503,iv]	kāmaḥ vā tad saṃyogena codyate kāmaḥ vā phalam bhavet na svargaḥ tad saṃyogena asya codanā bhavati na svarga kāma saṃyogena ānumānikaḥ asya svarga kāmena eka vākya bhāvaḥ pratyakṣaḥ tu kāma vacanena pratyakṣam ca anumānāt balīyaḥ tasmāt kāmaḥ eva phalam iti 
[I,503,v_I,503,vi]	aṅge guṇa tvāt atha yat uktam yathā yajñāṅgaḥ iti yuktam aṅge guṇa tvāt pratyakṣaḥ tatra ṛtunā saṃyogaḥ kāmena ca yaḥ paśu kāmaḥ syāt sa go dohanena praṇayanam abhinirvartayet iti na tu atra pratyakṣaḥ śabdaḥ asti yaḥ brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ syāt sa yāgena svargam abhinirvartayet iti katham tarhi yaḥ brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ syāt sa tat yāgena nirvartayet iti tasmāt na aṅga vat bhavitum arhati iti 
[I,504,i_I,504,ii]	vīte ca niyamaḥ tad artham atha yat uktam vītāyām phala icchāyām avāpte vā phale samāpti niyamaḥ dṛśyate iti tatra brūmaḥ vīte niyamaḥ tad artham vīte niyamaḥ bhavati tasmai prayojanāya kasmai śiṣṭā vigarhaṇāya upakramya aparisamāpayataḥ tad anantaram eva enam śiṣṭāḥ vigarhayeyaḥ prākramikaḥ ayam kāpuruṣaḥ iti vadantaḥ ye hi devebhyaḥ saṃkalpya haviḥ na yāgam abhinirvartayanti tān śiṣṭāḥ vigarhante tasmāt avaśyam samāpayitavyam tatra etat darśanam yuktam bhaviṣyati yadi varṣet tāvatī eva juhuyāt iti tasmāt kāmyānām kāmaḥ eva phalam iti 
[I,504,iii_I,504,iv]	sārvakāmyam aṅga kāmaiḥ prakaraṇāt idam āmnāyate ekasmai vā anyāḥ iṣṭayaḥ kāmāya ahriyante sarvebhyaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau ekasmai vā anye kratavaḥ kāmāya ahriyante sarvebhyaḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim aṅga kāmaiḥ aṅga aṅga kāmaiḥ ca saha asya anuvādaḥ athavā vidhiḥ iti kim prāptam anuvādaḥ iti yat etat sārvakāmyam tat anūdyate aṅga kāmaiḥ ca aṅga aṅga kāmaiḥ ca saha santi hi aṅga kāmāḥ ca aṅga aṅga kāmāḥ ca yathā āhārya purīṣām paśu kāmasya vedim kuryāt khanana purīṣām pratiṣṭhākām asya iti evamādayaḥ tathā yadi kāmayeta varṣet parjanyaḥ iti nīcais sadaḥ minuyāt iti tat vihitam eva idam abhidhīyate iti anuvādam nyāyyam manyāmahe 
[I,505,i_I,505,ii]	phala upadeśaḥ vā pradhāna śabda saṃprayogāt phala vidhiḥ vā kutas pradhāna śabdena phala saṃyogaḥ bhavati sarvebhyaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau sarvebhyaḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ iti ca pradhāna abhidhānena ca pradhānasya sarva phalavattā vihitā tasmāt na anuvādaḥ atha aṅga kāmān aṅga aṅga kāmān ca apekṣate tathā lakṣaṇā śabdaḥ syāt śrutiḥ ca lakṣaṇāyāḥ garīyasī tasmāt prayoga vacanena vidhiḥ iti 
[I,505,iii_I,505,iv]	tatra sarve aviśeṣāt evaṃjātīyakeṣu eva udāharaṇeṣu etat uktam pradhāne sarva kāmānām vidhiḥ iti idam idānīm saṃdihyate kim sakṛt prayoge sarve kāmāḥ uta paryāyeṇa iti kim prāptam sakṛt prayoge sarve kāmāḥ iti katham sarveṣām kāmānām darśa pūrṇamāsau nimittam jyotiṣṭomaḥ ca iti nimittam ced sarveṣām kāmānām kaḥ atra khalu kāmaḥ na bhaviṣyati iti tasmāt yaugapadyena sarve kāmāḥ iti 
[I,506,i_I,506,ii]	yoga siddhiḥ vā arthasya utpatti asaṃyogi tvāt na ca etat asti sarve yugapad kāmāḥ iti paryāyaḥ yoga siddhiḥ paryāyeṇa bhaveyuḥ kāmāḥ iti kutas arthasya utpatti asaṃyogi tvāt arthāḥ ime kāmāḥ nāma na sarve eva yugapad utpadyante asaṃbhavaḥ yugapad utpatteḥ sarveṣām virodhāt athavā utpatti asaṃyogi tvāt iti na kāmānām etat utpatti vacanam utpannānām lakṣaṇa tvena vacanam ye sarve kāmāḥ tebhyaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau jyotiṣṭomaḥ ca iti na sarve kāmāḥ karmaṇaḥ śrūvante ye sarve kāmāḥ tebhyaḥ hi karma vidhīyate tasmāt na kāmānām sāhityam gamyate iti 
[I,506,iii_I,506,iv]	tatra sarve aviśeṣāt kāmyāni karmāṇi udāharaṇam sauryam carum nirvapet brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ aindrāgnam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet prajā kāmaḥ citrayā yajeta pasūkāmaḥ vaiśvadevīm sāṃgrahāyaṇīm nirvapet grāma kāmaḥ iti teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim iha loke kāmāḥ uta amuṣmin lokaḥ iti kim prāptam tatra amuṣmin loke kāmāḥ aviśeṣāt yathā svargaḥ evam ime api na hi anantara nirvṛtte karmaṇi phalam upalabhyate paśu ādi yat ca anantaram upalabhyate tat tatas iti vijñāyate yathā yad kālam mardanam tad kālam mardana sukham yat ca kāla antaraḥ upalabhyate tasya api anyat eva kāraṇam asti pratyakṣam śarīra grahaṇasya tu na adṛṣṭāt ṛte kiṃcid kāraṇam asti tasmāt viśiṣṭa indriya śarīra ādi phalam paśu saṃbandha samartham paśu phalāt karmaṇaḥ bhavati iti evam boddhavyam tat dhi darśayati kaikayaḥ yajñam vivitsan dālbhyam uvāca anayā mā rāṣṭra pratipādanīyayā iṣṭyā yājaya iti saḥ abravīt na vai saumya rāṣṭra pratipādanīyām vettha amuṣmai kāmāya yajñāḥ āhriyante iti janma antara phala tām darśayati tasmāt janma antara phalāni kāmyāni iti 
[I,507,i_I,507,ii]	yoga siddhiḥ vā arthasya utpatti asaṃyogi tvāt iha eva eṣām siddhiḥ yogasya utpattyā yogaḥ na saṃbhavati yaḥ paśubhyaḥ kāmayate saḥ etena yāgena kuryāt iti na atra etat gamyate iha janmani na saṃbhavati iti yat ca anantaram na upalabhyate iti tat na pratyakṣa anumānābhyām na gamyate śabdena tu asti gatiḥ yat tu kāla antare anyat kāraṇam iti na eṣa doṣaḥ anyat api bhaviṣyati etat api yat ca amuṣmai kāmāya yajñāḥ āhriyante iti atra ucyate evam asya ṛṣeḥ matam iha yasya phalam tena tvām na yājayāmi yasya amutra phalam tena ca yājayiṣyāmi iti tasmāt etat parihṛtam iti 
[I,507,iii_I,507,iv]	samavāye codanā saṃyogasya arthavat tvāt agnim citvā sautrāmaṇyāḥ yajeta vājapeyena iṣṭvā bṛhaspati savena yajeta iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim aṅga prayojana saṃbandhaḥ eṣaḥ uta kāla arthaḥ saṃyogaḥ iti aṅga prayojana saṃbandhaḥ iti brūmaḥ evam hi śruti viniyuktaḥ arthaḥ itarathā kālaḥ lakṣyeta śruti lakṣaṇa aviśaye ca śrutiḥ nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā tasmāt agni aṅgam sautrāmaṇī vājapeya aṅgam bṛhaspati save iti 
[I,508,i_I,508,ii]	kāla śrutau kālaḥ iti ced evam ced paśyasi aṅga prayojana saṃbandhaḥ iti atha kāla vidhānam kasmāt na bhavati kāla vidhi rūpaḥ hi śabdaḥ citvā cayane abhinirvṛttaḥ iti 
[I,508,iii_I,508,v]	na asamavāyāt prayojanena syāt na etat evam asamavāyāt śabda prayojanena śabda arthena iti arthaḥ śabda arthaḥ cayanam tena asamavāyaḥ syāt saugrāmaṇyāḥ vājapeyena ca bṛhaspati savasya prakaraṇam ca bādhyeta agni prakaraṇe śrūyamāṇaḥ agneḥ dharmaḥ gamyate yāgaḥ vājapeya prakaraṇe ca vājapeyasya itarathā tayoḥ prakaraṇe anyasya dharmaḥ kālaḥ gamyeta tasmāt aṅga prayojana saṃbandhaḥ iti 
[I,508,vi_I,508,vii]	ubhaya artham iti ced darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ āmananti saṃsthāpya paurṇamāsīm vaimṛdham anunirvapati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ubhaya aṅgam vaimṛdhaḥ kāla arthaḥ paurṇamāsī saṃyogaḥ uta aṅga prayojana saṃbandhaḥ iti kim prāptam evam ced ubhaya arthaḥ vaimṛdhaḥ kutas prakaraṇaḥ ubhayoḥ āmnāna sāmarthyāt kāla vidhi sārūpyāt ca saṃsthāpya iti 
[I,509,i_I,509,ii]	na śabda eka tvāt ekaḥ śabdaḥ anunirvapati iti ekasmin eva vākye na dvau saṃbandhau śaknoti vidhātum vaimṛdhasya darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām pūrṇamāsī kālena ca eka artha tvāt dhi ekam vākyam samadhigatam 
[I,509,iii_I,509,iv]	prakaraṇāt iti ced prakaraṇāt iti yat uktam tat parihartavyam 
[I,509,v_I,509,vi]	na utpatti saṃyogāt na etat evam etat eva vaimṛdhasya utpatti vākyam tat darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām vā prakaraṇāt eka vākya bhāvam iyāt pratyakṣam vā paurṇamāsyā tatra pratyakṣa saṃyogaḥ prakaraṇāt balavān pratyakṣaḥ ca paurṇamāsyā saṃyogaḥ parokṣaḥ kālena tasmāt paurṇamāsya aṅgam vaimṛdhaḥ iti 
[I,509,vii_I,509,viii]	anutpattau tu kālaḥ syāt prayojanena saṃbandhāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate āgni mārutāt ūrdhvam anuyājaiḥ caranti prahṛtya paridhīn juhoti hāri yojanam iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim aṅgam vidhīyate uta kālaḥ iti aṅga vidhāne śrutiḥ kāla vidhāne lakṣaṇā tasmāt aṅga vidhānam iti prāpte brūmaḥ anutpatti vākye kālaḥ syāt āgni mārutam soma aṅgam anuyājāḥ paśu aṅgam tatra na tayoḥ paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ tathā paridhayaḥ paśu aṅgam hāri yojanam anyat eva pradhānam anuyājā āgni mārutam ca prāptam ānantaryam eva tayoḥ na prāptam tat vidhīyate tathā hāri yojanasya paridhi grahaṇasya ca evam ca sati na hāri yojanasya paridhi praharaṇena kaścid upakāraḥ kriyate hāri yojanena vā paridhi praharaṇasya nanu paridhi praharaṇasya upariṣṭāt bhāvena tasya upakriyeta iti ucyate na hi upari bhāva artham paridhi praharaṇam anuṣṭheyam vidyate eva etat paśu artham tasmin ca sati tasya upari bhāvaḥ vidyate eva iti tasmāt kāla arthaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti 
[I,510,i_I,510,ii]	utpatti kāla viṣaye kālaḥ syāt vākyasya tad pradhāna tvāt idam āmnāyate darśa pūrṇamāsau iṣṭvā somena yajeta iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim etat aṅgasya vidhānam uta kālasya iti kim prāptam śruteḥ aṅgasya iti prāpte ucyate asmin kāla aṅga vidhāna saṃśaye kālaḥ syāt vākyasya tad pradhāna tvāt kāla pradhānam hi etat vākyam na yāga vidhāna param atatpara tāsya rūpāvacanāt katham rūpāvacanam devatā bhāvāt katham abhāvaḥ aśruta tvāt yā hi yasya śrūyate sā tasya devatā bhavati śrutyā hi devatā gamyate na pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ tasmāt na apūrvasya yāgasya vidhānam kāla arthe anuvāde na ayam doṣaḥ vihita devatākaḥ hi anūdyate tasmāt atra kāla arthaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti tat ca darśayati eṣa vai devarathaḥ yat darśa pūrṇamān sau yat darśa pūrṇamāsau iṣṭvā somena yajate ratha spaṣṭaḥ eva avasāne vare devānām avasyati iti pradarśite mārge rathena yātum sukham bhavati evam darśa pūrṇamāsau iṣṭvā somena yaṣṭum sukham bhavati darśa pūrṇamāsa prakṛtīni tasya dīkṣaṇīya ādīni svabhyaḥ tāni bhavanti evam artha vādaḥ arthavān bhavati 
[I,511,i_I,511,ii^1]	phala saṃyogaḥ tu acodite na syāt aśeṣa bhūta tvāt vaiśvānaram dvādaśa kapālam nirvapet putre jātaḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ātma niḥśreyasāya uta putra niḥśreyasāya iti ātma niḥśreyasāya iti brūmaḥ na imāni phala dāni parasya bhavanti karmāṇi kutas ādhānaḥ ātmanepada nirdeśāt yathā yadi ekam kapālam naśyet ekaḥ māsaḥ saṃvatsarasya apetaḥ syāt atha yajamānaḥ pramīyeta dyāvāpṛthivī iyam eka kapālam nirvapet yadi dve naśyeyātām dvau māsau saṃvatsarasya apetau syātām atha yajamānaḥ pramīyeta āśvinam dvi kapālam nirvapet saṃkhyāya udvāsayati yajamānasya gopīthāya iti kapāla nāśe nimittaḥ ātma niḥśreyasa phalam karma darśayati evam iha api draṣṭavyam tasmāt ātma niḥśreyasa artham iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ phala saṃyogaḥ na syāt pituḥ phala vacanam śeṣa bhūtam putrasya na pituḥ katham 
[I,511,ii^2_I,512,ii]	evam śrūyate vaiśvānaram dvādaśa kapālam nirvapet putre jāte yat aṣṭākapālaḥ bhavati gāyatryā eva enam brahmavarcasena punāti yat nava kapālaḥ bhavati trivṛtā eva asamin tejaḥ dadhāti yat daśa kapālaḥ virājā eva asmin annādyam dadhāti yat ekādaśa kapālaḥ triṣṭubhā eva asmin indriyam dadhāti yat dvādaśa kapālaḥ jagatyā eva asmin paśūn dadhāti yasmin jātaḥ etām iṣṭim nirvapati pūtaḥ eva sa tejasvī annāt indriyāvī paśumān bhavati iti yaḥ jātaḥ tatra phalam śrūyate na asti vacanasya ati bhāraḥ tasmāt putrasya phalam iti yat uktam na parasya phala dāni etāni karmāṇi iti tat ucyate yat putrasya phalam ātmanaḥ sā prītiḥ tasmāt ātmanepadam na virudhyate etām eva ātmanaḥ prītim abhipretya bhavati vacanam ātmā vai putraḥ iti aṅgāt aṅgāt saṃbhavasi hṛdayāt abhijāyase ātmā vai putra nāmā asi sa jīva śaradaḥ śatam iti 
[I,512,iii_I,513,i]	aṅgānām tu upaghāta saṃyogaḥ nimitta arthaḥ atha yat uktam yadi ekam kapālam naśyet iti evamādi tatra ucyate aṅgānām upaghāta saṃyogaḥ nimitta arthaḥ upapadyate na anyathā na hi kapāle naṣṭe tat anveṣaṇa arthāḥ iṣṭiḥ yuktā na hi kākinyām naṣṭāyām tat anveṣaṇam kārṣāpaṇena kriyate evam vā 
[I,513,ii_I,513,iii]	aṅgānām tu upaghāta saṃyogaḥ nimitta arthaḥ vaiśvānaram dvādaśa kapālam nirvapet putre jātaḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim jāta mātre uta kṛte jātakarmaṇi iti jāta mātraḥ iti brūmaḥ saṃprāpte hi nimitte naimittikena bhavitavyam evam prāpte brūmaḥ kṛte jātakarmaṇi iti kutas sāmarthyāt kṛte hi jātakarmaṇi prāśanam tasya vidhīyate yadi prāk jātakarmaṇaḥ iṣṭiḥ kriyate prāśana kālaḥ viprakṛṣyeta tatra asya śarīra dhāraṇam na syāt 
[I,513,iv]	atha yat uktam saṃprāpte nimitte hi naimittikena bhavitavyam iti ucyate aṅgānām upaghāta saṃyogaḥ nimitta arthaḥ upaghātaḥ putra janma tat bhūtam nimittam na tad kālaḥ aṅgam tat ca nimittam kṛte api jātakarmaṇi na apaiti itarasmin pakṣe kālaḥ apeyāt lakṣaṇā ca asmin pakṣe syāt tasmāt kṛte jātakarmaṇi iti 
[I,513,v]	atha kim antar daśa ahe yasmin kasmin vā ahani uta sva kālaḥ iti kim prāptam yasmin kasmin vāhani iti evam aniyamaḥ prāptaḥ atra ucyate paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām vā kutas śruteḥ evam hi śrūyate yaḥ iṣṭvā paśunā somena vā yajeta sa paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām vā yajeta iti na atibhāraḥ vacanasya itarasmin pakṣe kālaḥ apeyāt lakṣaṇā api asmin pakṣe syāt anyasyām tithau antardaśa ahe vā kurvan sarvāṇi aṅgāni upasaṃhartum na śaknuyāt kālam śaucam ca na upasaṃgṛhṇīyāt tasmāt atīte daśa ahe paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām vā kuryāt iti 
[I,514,i_I,514,ii]	pradhānena abhisaṃyogāt aṅgānām mukhya kāla tvam agnim citvā sautrāmaṇyāḥ yajeta vājapeyena iṣṭvā bṛhaspati savena yajeta iti aṅga prayojana saṃbandhaḥ iti uktam etat idānīm saṃdihyate kim cita mātre tantra madhye eva kartavyam uta sva kāle kartavyam iti tathā vājapeye kim bṛhaspati save uta sva kālaḥ iti mukhya kāla tvam anayoḥ syāt kutas pradhāna akāla tvāt aṅgānām ekaḥ hi kālaḥ pradhānānām aṅgānām ca iti vakṣyate aṅgāni tu vidhāna tvāt pradhānena upadiśyeran iti agni cayanam kṛtvā na tāvatī eva sthātavyam sautrāmaṇī saṃjñakaḥ aparaḥ yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ iti tathā vājapeyam abhinirvartya na etāvatā kṛtī syāt bṛhaspati sava saṃjñakam yāgam abhinirvartayet iti 
[I,514,iii_I,514,iv]	apavṛtte tu codanā tad sāmānyāt sva kāle syāt apavṛtte yāge codyate yāga antaram idam apavṛttiḥ ca sarveṣu yāga aṅgeṣu akṛteṣu na bhavati na yathā bhavān manyate yāga mātre nirvṛttaḥ iti kutas karaṇa vibhaktyā saṃyogāt vājapeyena iṣṭyā vājapeyena phalasya vyāpāram kṛtvā sa aṅgena ca vyāpāraḥ gamyate na niraṅgena bhavet tantra madhye prayogaḥ vadi vājapeyam abhinirvartyetīpsita bhāvaḥ vājapeyasya syāt tatas pradhāna mātram vājapeya saṃjñakam abhinirvartya iti gamyeta na tu evam asti tasmāt yathā uktāni sarvāṇi aṅgāni kṛtvā iti arthaḥ evam ced nirvṛtte prayoge atikrānte vājapeya kāle yāga prayujyate tasya codanā sāmānyāt jyotiṣṭaumike vidhyante prāpte svena ca udaka prāptena kālena bhavitavyam sautrāmaṇyāḥ codanā sāmānyāt darśa pūrṇamāsa kālena iti 
[I,515,i]	āha vājapeye tāvat iṣṭvā iti vacanāt yāgam abhinirvartya iti gamyate agnau tu na upapadyate tatra citvā iti vacanāt cayanam abhinirvartya iti arthaḥ syāt ucyate na etat evam agnim citvā iti hi śrūyate agni cayanena saṃskṛtya iti arthaḥ agniḥ iti jvalanaḥ abhidhīyate na tasya sthala sthāpana mātram upakāraḥ yadi sthala sthite yāgaḥ bhavati tatas cayanena agneḥ upakāraḥ asti tam abhinirvartya iti sthala sthite agnau yāgam abhinirvartya iti gamyate yāvat sthala sthite agnau yāgaḥ na bhavati na tāvat agniḥ cayanena upakriyate yena agniḥ yajamānasya upakaroti saḥ agneḥ upakāraḥ na sthala sthāpana mātram tasmāt tatra api yāgam abhinirvartya iti gamyate 
[I,516,i_I,516,ii]	prakaraṇa śabda sāmānyāt codanānām anaṅga tvam santi anumati ādīni aiṣṭikāni karmāṇi malha ādayaḥ paśavaḥ pavitra ādayaḥ somāḥ valmīka vapāyām homaḥ iti evamādīni dārvihomikāni tathā yaṣṭauhīm dīvyati rājanyam jināti śaunaḥ śepham ākhyāpayati abhiṣicyate iti eteṣām sannidhau śrūyate rājasūyena svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta iti saḥ eṣa rūpavatām yāgānām saṃnidhau arūpaḥ śabdaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ samudāya vācakaḥ samadhigataḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim sarveṣām anumati ādīnām samudāyasya rājasūya śabdaḥ vācakaḥ uta keṣāṃcid vācakaḥ keṣāṃcid na iti kim prāptam sarveṣām vācakaḥ iti kutas prakaraṇa śabda sāmānyāt prakaraṇa śabdaḥ sarveṣām samānaḥ rājasūyena iti rājā tatra sūyate tasmāt rājasūyaḥ rājñaḥ vā yajñaḥ rājasūyaḥ tat prakaraṇa saṃnidhāne sati viśeṣa abhāve ca sarveṣām vācakaḥ bhavitum arhati yaḥ ca rājasūya śabditaḥ tatas phalam bhavati tasmāt sarvāṇi pradhānāni iti 
[I,517,i_I,517,ii]	api vā aṅgam anijyāḥ syuḥ tatas viśiṣṭa tvāt api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ yāḥ anijyāḥ tāḥ aṅgam yathā videvana ādayaḥ rājasūya saṃjñakena yāgena svārājyam kuryāt iti ucyamāne yāgena eva svārājyam sādhyate na āyāgena ayāgāḥ ca videvana ādayaḥ tasmāt aṅgam bhaveyuḥ ijyānām phalavatīnām śrūyamānāḥ iti 
[I,517,iii_I,517,iv]	madhya stham yasya tad madhye rājasūye abhiṣecanīya madhye yaṣṭauhīm dīvyati iti videvana ādayaḥ samāmnātāḥ te kim abhiṣecanīyasya aṅgam uta kṛtsnasya rājasūyasya iti saṃśayaḥ ucyate madhyāmnānāt abhiṣecanīyasya iti tathā ānantaryam anugrahīṣyate iti 
[I,517,v_I,517,vi]	sarvāsām vā sama tvāt ca udanātaḥ syāt na hi tasya prakaraṇam deśa artham ucyate madhye sarvāsām ca anumati ādīnām codanānām aṅgam videvana ādi syāt kutas codanātaḥ samatvāt samānāḥ etāḥ anumati ādyāḥ codanāḥ tāḥ sarvāḥ phalavatyaḥ ca pradhāna bhūtāḥ sarvāsām āsām prakaraṇam na hi abhiṣecanīyasya kevalasya kramāt abhiṣecanīyasya prāpnuvanti prakaraṇāt sarvāsām prakaraṇam ca kramāt balīyaḥ tasmāt na abhiṣecanīyasya kevalasya iti abhiṣecanīyasya tu madhye sthānam videvana ādīnām tatra kriyamāṇāḥ sarvāsām upakurvanti iti 
[I,518,i_I,518,ii]	prakaraṇa avibhāge ca vipratiṣiddham hi ubhayam rājasūyaḥ upasadaḥ prakṛtya śrūyate purastāt upasadām saumyena pracaranti antarā tvāṣṭreṇa upariṣṭāt vaiṣṇavena iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim upasadaṅgam saumya ādayaḥ uta upasat kālāḥ iti upasadaṅgam iti brūmaḥ kutas upasat saṃyogasya śruta tvāt kāla vidhau sati lakṣaṇā syāt tasmāt upasadaṅgam iti 
[I,518,iii]	nanu kāla vat aṅgam bhaviṣyati tathā sati ubhayam anugṛhyeta upasatsaṃyogaḥ ca purastāt iti ca kāla abhidhānam upasat śabda saṃyogāt upasadaṅga tā bhaviṣyati purastāt śabda sāmarthyāt ca pūrva ādiṣu prayogaḥ iti ucyate vipratiṣiddham hi ubhayam na śaknoti upasadām iti eṣa śabdaḥ saumya ādīn ca viśeṣṭum ekasmin vākye pūrva ādīn ca bhidyate hi tathā vākyam tasmāt na kāla vat aṅgam 
[I,518,iv_I,518,v]	api vā kāla mātram syāt adarśanāt viśeṣasya api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ kāla mātram syāt na aṅga prayojana saṃbandhaḥ kutas adarśanāt viśeṣasya na anyaiḥ kāla abhidhānaiḥ asya kaścid viśeṣaḥ lakṣyate āgni mārutāt ūrdhvam anuyājaiḥ caranti iti evamādibhiḥ atra api hi saumya ādayaḥ vihitāḥ upasadaḥ api idam ānupūrvyam avihitam tat vidhīyate tasmāt kāla mātram iti 
[I,519,i_I,519,ii]	phalavat vā ukta hetu tvāt itarasya pradhānam syāt vaiśvadevīm sāṃgrahāyaṇīm nirvapet grāma kāmaḥ iti tatra āmana homāḥ śrūyante āmanasya iti tisraḥ āhutīḥ juhoti iti atra saṃdehaḥ kim sama pradhāna bhūtāḥ āmana homāḥ sāṃgrahāyaṇi iṣṭyā uta aṅgam tasyāḥ iti kim prāptam sama pradhāna bhūtāḥ iti kutas tulya hetu tvāt itarasya tulyam hi yajimat tvam nanu aphalāḥ homāḥ ucyate grāma kāmaḥ iti atra anupajyate tasmāt sama pradhāna bhūtāḥ iti 
[I,519,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ phalavat vā ukta hetu tvāt itarasya pradhānam syāt na ca etat asti sama pradhāna bhūtāḥ homāḥ iṣṭyāḥ iti phalavat dhi aphalasya pradhānam phalavatī ca iṣṭiḥ aphalāḥ homāḥ nanu uktam anuṣaṅgaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ucyate na anuṣaṅgaḥ prāpnoti kutas vyavāyāt tat uktam vyavāyāt na anuṣajyeta iti kena vyavāyaḥ paridhi mantraiḥ ugraḥ asi ugraḥ tvam deveṣu adhyugraḥ aham sajāteṣu bhūyāsam priyaḥ sajātānām ugraḥ ced tāḥ vasu vid iti evamādibhiḥ etān anukramya āmanasya iti tisraḥ āhutīḥ juhoti iti āmananti tasmāt sāṃgrahāyaṇyāḥ aṅgam āmana homā iti 
[I,520,i_I,520,ii]	dadhigrahaḥ naimittikaḥ śruti saṃyogāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate yām vai kāṃcid adhvaryuḥ ca yajamānaḥ ca devatām antaritaḥ tasyāḥ āvṛśceta yat prājāpatyam dadhigraham gṛhṇāti śamayati eva enām iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim nityaḥ dadhigrahaḥ uta naimittikaḥ iti kim prāptam dadhigrahaḥ naimittikaḥ syāt śruti saṃyogāt devatā antarāye nimitte śrūyate na ca nityaḥ antarāyaḥ tasmāt naimittikaḥ iti 
[I,520,iii_I,520,iv]	nityaḥ ca jyeṣṭha śabdāt yat uktam naimittikaḥ iti tat gṛhyate kim tu nityaḥ ca kutas jyeṣṭha śabdāt jyeṣṭha śabdaḥ bhavati jyeṣṭhaḥ vai eṣa grahāṇām yasya eṣa gṛhyate jyaiṣṭhyam eva gacchati iti jyeṣṭha śabdaḥ ca prādhānye prāthamye vā syāt eṣa prathamaḥ na pradhānam yadi nityaḥ evam praśasya tvāt upapadyate na jātu cala acalam hi praśaṃsanti tasmāt nityaḥ ca naimittikaḥ ca iti vinā api nimittena grahītavyaḥ nimittena api punar iti 
[I,520,v_I,520,vi]	sārvarūpyāt ca sarva rūpa tā ca śrūyate sarveṣām vā etat devānām rūpam yat eṣa grahaḥ yasya eṣa gṛhyate sarvāṇi eva enam rūpāṇi paśūnām upatiṣṭhante iti na hi devatā rūpam asmākam kiṃcid anyat pratyakṣam anyat atas nitya tvāt tasmāt api nityaḥ ca naimittikaḥ ca iti 
[I,521,i_I,521,iii]	nityaḥ vā syāt artha vādaḥ tayoḥ karmaṇi asaṃbandhāt bhaṅgi tvāt ca antarāyasya yat uktam nityaḥ naimittikaḥ ca iti tatra nityaḥ eva syāt jyeṣṭha śabdāt sārvarūpyāt ca yat uktam devatā antarāye nimitte śrūyate iti na devatā antarāyaḥ nimitta tvena gamyate tayoḥ adhvaryu yajamānayoḥ karmaṇi antarāyeṇa saṃbandhāt na hi etat śrūyate adhvaryuṇā devatā antaritavyā yajamānena vā iti anityaḥ hi antarāyaḥ na ca evaṃśabdaḥ asti antarāye sati dadhigrahaḥ grahītavyaḥ iti vinā eva saṃyogena dadhigrahasya grahaṇam antarāya sam ādhānam tu asya prayojanam iti tat etat nitya vat grahaṇam anityam prayojanam nityam gṛhṇīyāt anityam antarāyam samādhātum iti na avakalpate tatra prayojane anitya tvāt grahaṇe nitya vat śrutiḥ bādhyeta arthavāda tve tu na bādhyate na hi tat antarāyam samādhātum gṛhyate anyat eva prayojanam asya asti iti praśaṃsitum abhidhīyate dadhigrahasya tu soma aṅga tā eva prayojanam iti bhaṅgi tvāt ca antarāyasya bhaṅgī ca antarāyaḥ anityaḥ nitya praśaṃsā artham saṃkīrtyate tasmāt na eṣa doṣaḥ nityaḥ eva dadhigrahaḥ iti 
[I,521,iv_I,521,v]	vaiśvānaraḥ ca nityaḥ syāt nityaiḥ samāna saṃkhya tvāt asti agniḥ yaḥ evam vidvān agnim cinutaḥ iti tatra śrūyate yaḥ vai saṃvatsara mukhyam abhṛtvā agnim cinute yathā sāmigarbhaḥ vipadyate tādṛś eva tadā ārtim ārcchet vaiśvānaram dvādaśa kapālam purastāt nirvapet saṃvatsaraḥ vā agniḥ vaiśvānaraḥ yathā saṃvatsaram āptvā kālaḥ āgate vijāyate evam eva saṃvatsaram āptvā kālaḥ āgate agnim cinute na ārtim ārcchet iti eṣā vā agneḥ priyā tanūḥ yat vaiśvānaraḥ priyām eva asya tanūm avarundhaḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim nityaḥ vaiśvānaraḥ atha naimittikaḥ iti kim prāptam atra api nityaḥ eva artha vādaḥ ukhyasya saṃvatsara ābharaṇena kṛtaḥ doṣaḥ vaiśvānareṇa vihanyate iti nityaiḥ ca asya samāna saṃkhya tvam bhavati trīṇi etāni havīṃṣi bhavanti trayaḥ ime lokāḥ eṣām lokānām ārohāya iti lokānām haviṣām sāmānyam na asti yadi yathā lokāḥ nityāḥ trayaḥ evam imāni havīṃṣi nityāni trīṇi evam lokaiḥ saṃstavaḥ ghaṭate tasmāt nityaḥ vaiśvānaraḥ iti 
[I,522,i_I,522,ii]	pakṣe vā utpanna saṃyogāt utpannasya nimittaḥ ukhya ābharaṇe nirghātena saṃyogaḥ na asaṃyuktasya utpannasya doṣa nirghāta prayojana tā tasmāt iha na dadhigraha vat virodhaḥ asti tena na artha vādaḥ naimittikaḥ iti atha yat uktam lokaiḥ samāna saṃkhya tvam nitya tvāt upapadyate na anyathā iti tatra brūmaḥ tritvāt lokānām haviṣām ca sāmānyāt artha vādaḥ bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,522,iii_I,522,iv]	ṣaṭcitiḥ pūrvavat tvāt asti agniḥ yaḥ evam vidvān agnim cinutaḥ iti tatra śrūyate saṃvatsaraḥ vā enam pratiṣṭhāyai nudati yaḥ agnim citvā na pratitiṣṭhati pañca pūrvāḥ citayaḥ bhavanti atha ṣaṣṭhīm citim cinutaḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim yaḥ ayam nityaḥ eva agniḥ saḥ eva ayam ṣaṭcitikaḥ ucyate uta ekacitikaḥ naimittikaḥ iti kim prāptam tasmin eva nitye agnau ṣaṣṭhī citiḥ eṣā vidhīyate nityāyām eva ṣaṣṭhyām eṣaḥ artha vādaḥ yaḥ api na pratiṣṭhā arhaḥ saḥ api anayā ṣaṣṭhyā cityā pratiṣṭhātum arhati iti citi praśaṃsā kim artham evam varṇyate ṣaṣṭhī śabda śravaṇāt ṣaṇṇām hi pūraṇī ṣaṣṭhī ekasyām hi citau ṣaṣṭhī śabdaḥ na sāmañjasyena syāt tasmāt ṣaṭcitikaḥ agniḥ nityaḥ iti 
[I,523,i_I,523,ii]	tābhiḥ ca tulya saṃkhyānāt tābhiḥ ca pūrvābhiḥ asyāḥ tulya vat prasaṃkhyānam bhavati katham iyam vāva prathamā citiḥ oṣadhayaḥ purīṣam antarīkṣam vāva dvitīyā citiḥ vayāṃsi purīṣam asau vāva tṛtīyā citiḥ nakṣatrāṇi purīṣam yajñaḥ vāva caturthā citiḥ dakṣiṇā purīṣam yajamānaḥ vāva pañcamī citiḥ prajāḥ purīṣam saṃvatsaraḥ vāva ṣaṣṭhī citiḥ ṛtavaḥ purīṣam iti tulyānām ca tulya vat anukramaṇam bhavati yathā devāḥ ṛṣayaḥ gandharvāḥ te anyatas āsan asurāḥ rakṣāṃsi piśācāḥ te anyatas āsan iti tulya vat ca amūṣām citīnām anukramaṇam anayā ṣaṣṭhyā tasmāt etayā tad tulyayā bhavitavyam yadi ca yasmin eva kratau tāḥ tasmin eva eṣā tatas etābhiḥ tulyā tasmāt api saḥ eva nityaḥ agniḥ ṣaṭcitikaḥ iti 
[I,524,i_I,524,ii]	arthavāda upapatteḥ ca artha vādaḥ ca bhavati ṣaṭ citayaḥ bhavanti ṣaṭ purīṣāṇi tāni dvādaśa saṃpadyante dvādaśāḥ māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ eva pratitiṣṭhati iti tat ekacitike agnau na sāmañjasyena vacanam bhavati tasmāt nityaḥ eva ṣaṭcitikaḥ 
[I,524,iii_I,524,v]	ekacitiḥ vā syāt apavṛkte hi codyate nimittena ekacitiḥ vā naimittikaḥ syāt kutas apavṛkte hi yāge codyate apratiṣṭhayā nimittena yaḥ na pratitiṣṭhati tasya eṣā citiḥ ucyate naimittikī sā na nityā bhavitum arhati api ca apavṛkte yāge codyate sā na vartamāne bhavitum arhati nanu citvā iti cayane nirvṛtte na yāge ucyate na etat padārthe nirvṛtte citvā iti kim tarhi vākya arthe agnim citvā iti agneḥ cayanena artham abhinirvartya iti kṛte ca yāge cayanena agneḥ arthaḥ nirvartitaḥ bhavati na anyathā ṣaṣṭhī śabdaḥ ca pañca pūrvāḥ citaye uktāḥ tāḥ apekṣya avakalpiṣyate tasmāt nirvṛtte yāgaḥ iti ucyate tasmāt vacanāt ekacitiḥ agniḥ 
[I,524,vi_I,524,vii]	vipratiṣedhāt tābhiḥ samāna saṃkhya tvam dvayoḥ sūtrayoḥ idam uttaram tābhiḥ ca tulya saṃkhyānāt arthavāda upapatteḥ ca iti tābhiḥ nityābhiḥ samāna saṃkhya tvam bhaviṣyati artha vādaḥ ca upapatsyate pañca pūrvāḥ citayaḥ bhavanti yābhiḥ asau citibhiḥ na pratitiṣṭhate atha iyam ṣaṣṭhī pratiṣṭhā artham iti tāḥ ca sa purīṣāḥ apekṣya dvādaśa tvena saṃstavaḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhāt ekasya ṣaṣ saṃkhyāyāḥ dvādaśa saṃkhyāyāḥ ca iti atulyānām api tulya vat anukramaṇam bhavati yathā devāḥ manuṣyāḥ pitaraḥ te anyatas āsan iti 
[I,525,i_I,525,iii]	pitṛ yajñaḥ sva kāla tvāt anaṅgam syāt asti āmāvāsye karmaṇi pitṛ yajñaḥ amāvāsyāyām aparāhṇe piṇḍa pitṛ yajñena caranti iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim āmāvāsyasya karmaṇaḥ piṇḍa pitṛ yajñaḥ aṅgam uta anaṅgam iti kim prāptam aṅgam phalavat saṃnidhānāt niṣkraya vacanāt ca āha nanu phalavat saṃnidhau aphalam tad aṅgam bhavati phalavat ca idam kalpyeta svargeṇa iti ucyate satyam amāna āsyaya eka vākya tvāt na śakyaḥ svargaḥ kalpayitum iti āha kāla vacana tvāt na karmaṇā eka vākya tvam saṃbhavati iti ucyate lakṣaṇayā api tāvat karma eka vākya tvam saṃbhavati svarge kalpye na lakṣaṇā na śrutiḥ evam ca āmananti yat pitṛbhyaḥ purvedyus karoti pitṛbhyaḥ etat yajñam niṣkrīya yajamānaḥ devebhyaḥ pratanutaḥ iti amāvāsyām prati niṣkretum ca śrūyate tasmāt tad aṅga bhūtam iti 
[I,525,iv]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ pitṛ yajñaḥ sva kāla tvāt anaṅgam syāt anaṅga bhūtaḥ piṇḍa pitṛ yajñaḥ kasmāt sva kāla tvāt sva śabda abhihitena kālena asya saṃbandhaḥ na karmaṇā lakṣitena iti yathā darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeta iti yathā tat etat purastāt upasadām saumyena caranti iti ca kālaḥ eva ayam mukhyaḥ śabdaḥ na karmaṇi karmaṇi lakṣaṇā śrutiḥ ca lakṣaṇāyāḥ balīyasī yat ca uktam laksaṇayā karma eka vākya tā bhaviṣyati iti tat ca na kasmāt anuvāde hi lakṣaṇā nyāyyā na vidhau vidhiḥ ca ayam tasmāt na ama avāsya akarmaṇā saṃbandhaḥ ekasmin kāle dve karmaṇī paraspareṇa asaṃbaddhaḥ iti 
[I,526,i_I,526,ii]	tulya vat ca prasaṃkhyānāt tulya vat ca anyaiḥ pradhānaiḥ prasaṃkhyāyate catvāraḥ vai mahāyajñāḥ agnihotram darśa pūrṇamāsau jyotiṣṭomaḥ piṇḍa pitṛ yajñaḥ iti mahāyajñaiḥ tulya vat prasaṃkhyāyate kā asya mahā yajña tā syāt anyatas phalavat tāyāḥ tasmāt anaṅgam 
[I,526,iii_I,526,iv]	pratiṣiddhe ca darśanāt itas ca anaṅgam pratiṣiddhe āmāvāsye piṇḍa pitṛ yajñam darśayati paurṇamāsīm eva yajeta bhrātṛvyavān na amāvāsyām hatvā bhrātṛvyam amāvāsyayā yajeta piṇḍa pitṛ yajñena eva amāvāsyāyām prīṇāti iti asatyām amāvāsyāyām piṇḍa pitṛ yajñam darśayati tad anaṅga tvaḥ upapadyate tasmāt api na aṅgam piṇḍa pitṛ yajñaḥ iti 
[I,526,v_I,527,ii]	kim prayojanam cintāyāḥ yadi paurṇamāsyām ādhānam tatas anantarāyām amāvāsyāyām na kriyate yathā pūrva pakṣaḥ yathā tarhi siddhāntaḥ tathā kartavyaḥ idam aparam prayojanam kuṇḍapāyinām ayane māsam agnihotram juhoti māsam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ tathā kartavyaḥ piṇḍa pitṛ yajñaḥ yathā siddhāntaḥ tathā na kartavyaḥ iti ślokam api udāharanti ādhānam paurṇamāsyām ced vṛtte darśe kariṣyate anaṅgam pitṛ yajñaḥ ced tatra eva na kariṣyate iti 
[I,527,iii_I,527,iv]	paśu aṅgam raśanā syāt tad āgame vidhānāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate āśvinam graham gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpam parivīya āgnā iyam savanīyam paśum upākaroti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim paśu aṅgam raśanā uta yūpa aṅgam iti kim prāptam paśu aṅgam kutas tad āgame vidhānāt paśu āgame hi vidhīyate paśunā asyāḥ saṃbandhaḥ utpatti vākye śrūyate parivyāṇam kṛtvā upākaroti paśum na anyathā iti evam śrutiḥ bhavati kāla vacane lakṣaṇā syāt parivyāṇena kālaḥ lakṣyeta iti 
[I,527,v_I,527,vi]	yūpāṅgam vā tad saṃskārāt jyotiṣṭome pratyakṣaḥ hi yūpasya saṃskāraḥ raśanā hi yā ca yāvatīm ca draḍhimnaḥ mātrām yūpasya saṃjanayati draḍhimnā ca prayojanam yūpasya tasmāt yūpasya eva draḍhimne raśanā syāt dvitīyā ca vibhaktiḥ tad prādhānyaḥ eva bhavati raśanāyām ca tṛtīyā tṛtīyā ca guṇa tve tasyāḥ tasmāt yūpa aṅgam yat tu tad āgame vidhānāt iti uktam tat parihartavyam ucyate tad āgame vidhānam vākyam dvitīyā ca vibhaktiḥ śrutiḥ pratyakṣam ca vākyam bādheyātām iti yat tu lakṣaṇa iti śruti asaṃbhave lakṣaṇā api nyāyyā eva 
[I,528,i_I,528,v]	artha vādaḥ ca tad arthavat evam ca mantra artha vādaḥ arthavān bhaviṣyati yuvā su vāsāḥ parivītaḥ āgāt saḥ u śreyān bhavati jāyamānaḥ tam dhīrāsaḥ kavaye unnayanti su ādhyaḥ manasā devayantaḥ iti tasmāt yūpa aṅgam raśanā iti kim prayojanam cintāyāḥ agnau śrūyate eka yūpaḥ ekādaśa paśavaḥ niyojyāḥ iti pratipaśu raśanā kāryā yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhānte dvairaśanyam eva ślokam api udāharanti paśu aṅgam raśanā ced yadi ekasmin bahūn niyuñjīta pratipaśu raśanā kāryā yūpe ced dvairaśanyam syāt iti 
[I,528,vi_I,528,vii]	svaruḥ ca api eka deśa tvāt asti jyotiṣṭome paśuḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ soma aṅga bhūtaḥ yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yat agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhate iti tatra śrūyate svaruṇā svadhitinā vā paśum anakti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim yūpa aṅgam svaruḥ uta paśu aṅgam iti kim prāptam yūpāṅgam iti brūmaḥ kutas eka deśa tvāt eka deśaḥ svaruḥ yūpasya iti śrūyate yūpasya svarum karoti iti svarum antam yūpam kuryāt iti arthaḥ evam sa yūpaḥ bhavati iti yathā caṣālam 
[I,529,i_I,529,ii]	niṣkrayaḥ ca tad aṅga vat yūpāṅgam iva svarum niṣkraya vādaḥ darśayati apaśyan ha sma vai purā ṛṣayaḥ ye yūpam prāpayanti saṃbhajya sruvante manyante yajña vaiśasāya vā idam karma iti te prastaram sruva niṣkrayam apaśyan yūpasya svarum ayajña vaiśasāya iti niṣkraya śravaṇāt tad aṅga tā vijñāyate tasmāt yūpa aṅgam iti 
[I,529,iii_I,529,iv]	paśu aṅgam vā artha karma tvāt paśu aṅgam vā tasya hi añjana arthena svaruṇā prayojanam tathā hi śrūyate svaruṇā paśum anakti iti tat añjanam paśoḥ svaroḥ utpattim prayojayati yadi tad arthaḥ eṣaḥ svaruḥ tatas dṛṣṭam prayojanam atha yūpa arthaḥ adṛṣṭam prayojanam tatas kalpyam tasmāt paśu aṅgam iti 
[I,529,v_I,529,ix]	bhaktyā niṣkraya vādaḥ syāt kayā bhaktyā evam āha yūpaḥ kila agnau pakṣetavyaḥ yat svaruḥ prakṣipyate tena yūpaḥ prakṣipyate iti saḥ eṣa niṣkayaḥ iva bhavati anayā bhaktyā stutiḥ iti kim bhavati prayojanam eka yūpaḥ ekādaśa paśavaḥ yadā niyujyante tadā ekasya eva paśoḥ samañjanam pūrvasmin pakṣe sarveṣām siddhānte ślokaḥ ca bhavati svaruḥ yūpa aṅgam iti ced ekasma eva samañjanam bahūnām eka yūpa tve sarveṣām tu samañjanam iti 
[I,530,i_I,530,ii]	darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ ijyāḥ pradhānāni aviśeṣāt staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra śrūyante āgneya agnīṣomīya upāṃśuya ajaindra agna sāṃnāyya yāgāḥ tathā āghārau ājya bhāgau prayāja anuyājāḥ patnī saṃyājāḥ samiṣṭa yajuḥ sviṣṭakṛt iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim sarve yāgāḥ pradhāna bhūtāḥ uta kecid guṇa bhūtāḥ iti kim prāptam darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ yāvatyaḥ ijyāḥ tāḥ sarvāḥ pradhāna bhūtāḥ iti yajeta svarga kāmaḥ iti aviśeṣeṇa yāgebhyaḥ phalam śrūyate phalavat ca pradhānam sarve ca amī yāgāḥ tasmāt sarve pradhāna bhūtāḥ iti 
[I,530,iii_I,530,iv]	api vā aṅgāni kānicid yeṣu aṅga tvena saṃstutiḥ sāmānyaḥ hi abhisaṃstavaḥ api vā kānicid aṅgāni bhaveyuḥ kāni punar tāni yeṣu aṅga tvena saṃstutiḥ yathā abhīṣū vai etau yajñasya yat āghārau cakṣuṣī vā etau yajñasya yat ājya bhāgau yat prayāja anuyājāḥ ca ijyante varma vai etat yajñasya kriyate varma vā yajamānasya bhrātṛvyasya abhibhūtyai iti abhīśuḥ rathasya aṅgam cakṣuṣī cakṣuṣmataḥ varma varmavataḥ sāmānyaḥ hi abhisaṃstavaḥ yuktaḥ yadi ca aṅgāni tāni saṃstutāni tatas saṃstavaḥ arthavān bhavati tasmāt aṅga saṃstutāni aṅgāni iti 
[I,531,i_I,531,ii]	tathā ca anya artha darśanam evam ca kṛtvā anya artha darśanam upapannam bhavati prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalam juhoti iti na ca prayājān yajati na ca anuyājān yajati iti ca 
[I,531,iii_I,531,iv]	aviśiṣṭam tu kāraṇam pradhāneṣu guṇasya vidyamāna tvāt aviśiṣṭam etat kāraṇam saṃstavaḥ nāma āgneya ādīnām api aṅga tvena saṃstutiḥ asti śiraḥ vā etat yajñasya yat āgneyaḥ hṛdayam upāṃśu yāgaḥ pādau agnīṣomīya iti śiraḥ śirasvataḥ aṅgam hṛdayam hṛdayavataḥ pādau pādāvatas iti sarvasya eva aṅga tvena saṃstutiḥ iti sarvam eva aṅgam prāpnoti tat pradhānam na syāt asati pradhāne kasya aṅgam tasmāt na etat aṅgam iti 
[I,531,v_I,531,vi]	na anukte anya artha darśanam parārtha tvāt atha yat uktam anya artha darśanam para artha tvāt na tat sādhakam bhavati para artham hi tat vākyam na dṛśyamānasya prayāja ādeḥ prāpaṇa artham tasmāt anyat asya pramāṇam anveṣṭavyam śruti antaram nyāyaḥ vā tasmin asati mṛgatṛṣṇā darśanam iva tat bhavati saṃstutiḥ api asati nyāye asādhikā eva 
[I,532,i_I,532,ii]	pṛthaktve tu abhidhānayoḥ niveśaḥ śrutitaḥ vyapadeśāt ca tat punar mukhya lakṣaṇam yat phalavat tvam tat saṃnidhau asaṃyuktam tat aṅgam syāt bhāgi tvāt kāraṇasya aśrutaḥ ca anya saṃbandhaḥ tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati tat uktam sarvāṇi sama pradhānāni iti na etat evam darśa pūrṇamāsa śabda vācyāni pradhānāni karmāṇi kutas phala saṃyogāt darśa pūrṇamāsa śabdakebhyaḥ phalam śrūyate darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti kāni punar darśa pūrṇamāsa śabdakāni yeṣām vacane paurṇamāsī śabdaḥ amāvāsyā śabdaḥ vā āgneya ādīni tāni nanu amāvāsyā śabdakānām na eva phalam śrūyate ucyate pṛthaktve samudāyayoḥ niveśaḥ etayoḥ abhidhānayoḥ paurṇamāsī iti ca amāvāsyāḥ iti ca triṣu āgneya ādiṣu yaḥ samudāyaḥ tatra paurṇamāsī śabdaḥ itareṣu amāvāsyā śabdaḥ 
[I,532,iii^1]	katham paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā iti ca dvi śabdaḥ śrūyate dvi arthavat vyapadeśāt ca katham tat vyapadeśaḥ dvivacat nirdeśāt darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti eka arthau ca darśa amāvāsyā śabdau katham darśaḥ vai etayoḥ pūrvaḥ pūrṇamāsaḥ uttaraḥ tayoḥ atha yat pūrṇamāsam pūrvam ārabhate tat ayathāpūrvam prakriyate darśa pūrṇamāsam ārabhamāṇaḥ sarasvatyai carum nirvapet sarasvate dvādaśa kapālam amāvāsyā vai sarasvatī pūrṇamāsaḥ sarasvān ubhau etau yathāpūrvam kalpayitvā ārabhate ṛddhyai ṛdhnoti eva arthaḥ mithuna tvāya iti 
[I,532,iii^2]	tatra darśa śabdena prakṛtyā amāvāsyā śabdena bruvan eka artha tām darśayati śakyate ca candrasya adarśanena amāvāsyāḥ darśaḥ iti lakṣayitum yathā cakṣuṣoḥ abhāve sati cakṣuṣmān iti cakṣurbhyām lakṣyate etasmāt vyapadeśāt ca śrutitaḥ ca loke śravaṇāt eka artha tām eva adhyavasyāmaḥ tat punar mukhya lakṣaṇam yat phalavat tvam yat anyat tat saṃnidhau śrūyate tat tat aṅgam katham itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣasya saṃnidhau śrūyamāṇam itikartavya tā viśeṣaṇa tvena paripūraṇa samartham tad aṅgam bhavitum arhati akalpyamāne vākya śeṣe phalam kalpayitavyam syāt iti 
[I,533,i]	āha nanu darśa pūrṇamāsa phalam eva atra anuṣajyate ucyate śakyam anuṣaktum kim tu darśa pūrṇamāsa vākyam sa ākāṅkṣam eva syāt anyāsya iti kartavyatā śrutā kalpyeta eṣām api prayāja ādīnām anyā kalpyeta etat itikartavya tau agamyamāna utsṛjyeta tena aṅga tvam kāraṇam bhāgi iti eṣām anyena phalena saṃbandhaḥ aśrutaḥ tasmāt na sarvāṇi sama pradhānāni āghāra ādīni guṇa karmāṇi iti 
[I,533,ii_I,533,iii]	guṇāḥ ca nāma saṃyuktāḥ vidhīyante na aṅgeṣu upapadyante nāma viśeṣa saṃyuktāḥ ca guṇa viśeṣāḥ vidhīyante yathā caturhotrā pūrṇamāsīm abhimṛśet pañca hotra amāvāsyām iti sarveṣu pradhāneṣu asmin samudāye caturhotrā asmin pañca hotra iti vibhāga avijñānāt ca idam na upapadyeta bhavati ca evaṃlakṣaṇakam guṇa vidhānam tasmāt asmad pakṣaḥ eva iti api ca aṅga tvena ādhāra ādīnām saṃstutiḥ upapannā bhaviṣyati 
[I,534,i_I,534,ii]	tulyā ca kāraṇa śrutiḥ anyaiḥ aṅga aṅgi saṃbandhaḥ atha yat uktam āgneya ādīnām api aṅga tvena saṃstutiḥ aṅga tvam khyāpayet iti tat parihartavyam 
[I,534,iii_I,534,iv]	utpattau abhisaṃbandhaḥ tasmāt aṅga upadeśaḥ syāt na eṣa doṣaḥ pradhānānām api eṣām satām utpatti apekṣā śira ādi stutiḥ abhiviṣyati iti jāyamānasya hi puruṣasya agre śiraḥ jāyate madhye madhyam paścāt pādau evam āgneyaḥ agratas upāṃśu yājaḥ madhye agnīṣomīyaḥ paścāt iti etasmāt sāmānyā doṣā stutiḥ iti 
[I,534,v_I,534,vi]	tathā ca anya artha darśanam caturdaśa pūrṇamāsyām āhutayaḥ hūyante trayodaśa amāvāsyāyām iti itarathāḥ na caturdaśa paurṇamāsyām āhutayaḥ bhaveyuḥ na vā amāvāsyāyām trayodaśa iti tasmāt āgneya ādīni pradhānāni āghāra ādīni aṅgāni iti siddham 
[I,534,vii_I,534,viii]	jyotiṣṭome tulyāni aviśiṣṭam hi kāraṇam asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti tatra dīkṣaṇīya ādayaḥ ca yāgāḥ vidyante sautye ca ahani soma yāgaḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim atra yāga mā atra pradhānam uta soma yāgaḥ iti kim prāptam jyotiṣṭome tulyāni sarvāṇi bhaveyuḥ kutas aviśiṣṭam hi kāraṇam yāgāt phalam śrūyate sarve ca amī yāgāḥ phalavat ca pradhānam tasmāt jyotiṣṭome sarve yāgāḥ pradhānam iti 
[I,535,i_I,535,ii]	guṇānām tu utpatti vākyena saṃbandhāt kāraṇa śrutiḥ tasmāt somaḥ pradhānam syāt guṇānām tu utpatti vākyena saṃbandhaḥ bhavati keṣām guṇānām jyotiṣām stomānām katamena utpatti vākyena saṃbandhaḥ bhavati jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti jyotiṣṭomāt yāgāt svargaḥ śrūyate na yāga mātrāt yatra ca jyotīṃṣi stomāḥ sa jyotiṣṭomaḥ kasya jyotīṃṣi stomāḥ stoma yāgasya iti brūmaḥ evam hi āmnāyate katamāni vā etāni jyotīṃṣi yaḥ ete tasya stomāḥ trivṛt pañcadaśa saptadaśa ekaviṃśāḥ etāni vā jyotīṃṣi tāni etasya stomāḥ iti soma yāgasya stomāḥ aṅgam samabhivyāhārāt graham vā gṛhītvā camasam vā unnīya stotram upākaroti iti te ca stomāḥ trivṛt ādayaḥ katham trivṛt bahiṣpavamānam pañcadaśāni ājyāni iti evamādibhiḥ śravaṇaiḥ 
[I,535,iii]	tasmāt trivṛt ādi stomakaḥ soma yāgaḥ sa jyotiṣṭomaḥ iti yaḥ ca jyotiṣṭomaḥ tatas phalam yatas ca phalam tat eva pradhānam iti katham punar trivṛt ādayaḥ jyotīṃṣi ucyate bhavantu vā jyotīṃṣi mā vā bhūvan jyotiḥ śabdena tāvat uktāni vacana mātreṇa api śabdaḥ bhavati viśeṣataḥ lakṣaṇāyām api ca dyotateḥ vā dīpti karmaṇaḥ jyotayateḥ vā jyotiḥ śabdam labhante dyotyate hi taiḥ śabdaiḥ dyotayanti iti vā stutyām tasmāt soma yāgaḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ sa ca pradhānam guṇa bhūtā dīkṣaṇīya ādayaḥ iti 
[I,536,i_I,536,ii]	tathā ca anya artha darśanam śiraḥ vai etat yajñasya yat dīkṣaṇīyā iti evamādi ca liṅgam dṛśyate tathā guṇāḥ ca jyotiṣṭoma vikāre dīkṣaṇīya ādayaḥ dṛśyante caturviṃśati mānam hiraṇyam dīkṣaṇīyāyām dadyāt prāpaṇīyāyām dve caturviṃśatimānaḥ iti tulya tve na pravartayiṣyante dīkṣaṇīya ādayaḥ tasmāt api soma yāgaḥ pradhānam iti 
[I,537,i_I,537,ii]	śruti lakṣaṇam ānupūrvyam tad pramāṇa tvāt caturthe adhyāye prayojakā prayojaka lakṣaṇam vṛttam tat na prasmartavyam iha idānīm krama niyama lakṣaṇam ucyate tat śruti artha pāṭha pravṛtti kāṇḍa mukhyaiḥ vakṣyate śruti ādīnām ca balābalam āditas tu śruti kramaḥ cintyate kim yathāśruti padārthānām kramaḥ āstheyaḥ uta aniyamena iti kim prāptam eka tvāt kartuḥ aneka tvāt ca padārthānām avaśyam bhāvini krame lāghavāt prayoga prāśu bhāvāt ca aniyamaḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ 
[I,537,iii]	śruti lakṣaṇam ānupūrvyam tad pramāṇa tvāt iti śrutiḥ grahaṇam akṣarāṇām tat nimittam yasya kramasya sa sādhuḥ kramaḥ śruti pramāṇakāḥ hi vaidikāḥ arthāḥ na eṣām anyat pramāṇam asti iti uktam kim iha udāharaṇam satre dīkṣā kramaḥ yaḥ ṛtvijaḥ te yajamānā iti uktvā teṣām dīkṣā kramam vidhatte adhvi aryuḥ gṛhapatim dīkṣayitvā brahmāṇam dīkṣayati tatas udgātāram tatas hotāram tatas tam pratiprasthātā dīkṣayitvā ardhinaḥ dīkṣayati brāhmaṇāt chaṃsinam brahmaṇaḥ prastotāram udgātuḥ maitrāvaruṇam hotuḥ tatas tam na iṣṭā dīkṣayitvā tṛtīyinaḥ dīkṣayati āgnīdhram brahmaṇaḥ pratihartāram udgātuḥ acchāvākam hotuḥ tatas tam unnetā dīkṣayitvā padinaḥ dīkṣayati potāram brahmaṇaḥ subrahmaṇyam udgātuḥ grāvastutam hotuḥ tatas tam anyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ dīkṣayati brahmacārī vā ācārya preṣitaḥ iti aniyamena kramaḥ kartavyaḥ yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ yathā tarhi siddhāntaḥ eṣaḥ eva kramaḥ kartavyaḥ iti 
[I,538,i]	tatra āha anyāyyam śruti vacanam iti ucyate kim ayam na sādhuḥ na na sādhuḥ iti brūmaḥ nyāyyam tarhi na brūmaḥ na sādhuḥ kramaḥ iti kim tarhi uktasya punarvacanam anyāyyām iti ucyate sādhoḥ vacanam bahuśas api ucyamānam nyāyyam eva asādhoḥ tu sakṛt api anyāyyam āha sakṛt vacanena jñātasya punarvacane na prayojanam asti iti ucyate bhavati aprasmaraṇam api prayojanam iti uktam vṛtti kāreṇa tat kāryam iti ced sūtrakārasya api aviśeṣaḥ vṛtti kāreṇa 
[I,538,ii]	athavā artha antaram eva idam tatra hi anyaḥ eva saṃśayaḥ vicāraḥ nirṇayaḥ ca śruti pramāṇakaḥ dharmaḥ anya pramāṇakaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ pratyakṣa ādīnām adhigamya nimitta tvāt na tad pramāṇakaḥ atīndriya tvāt codanā lakṣaṇaḥ iti vicāraḥ codanā lakṣaṇaḥ eva iti nirṇayaḥ iha tu siddhe tad prāmāṇye vyavahāra kramasya sādhu tva avadhāraṇam 
[I,538,iii]	athavā śruti vicāraḥ ayam kim padārthāḥ kartavyā iti vidhānam kim vā kramaḥ vidhīyate iti aneka artha vidhāna anupapatteḥ krame anuvādaḥ padārthānām vidhiḥ avadāna vākyeṣu iva padārtha vidhānam śrutyā krama vidhānam vākyena tasmāt na kramaḥ vidhīyate iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ nanu avadāna vākyeṣu kramaḥ vidhīyate satyam vidhīyate pāṭhena na śrutyā yaḥ ṛtvijaḥ te yajamānāḥ iti tu dīkṣāyāḥ prāpta tvāt krama vidhāna arthā śrutiḥ iti siddhāntaḥ tasmāt apunaruktam iti 
[I,539,i_I,539,iii]	arthāt ca kim eṣaḥ eva utsargaḥ sarvatra śruti vaśena eva bhavitum arhati iti uktam hi codanā lakṣṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ arthāt ca sāmarthyāt ca kramaḥ vidhīyate iti guṇa bhūtaḥ hi padārthānām kramaḥ bhavati yaḥ ca yasya nirvartyamānasya upakaroti sa tasya guṇa bhūtaḥ yasmin ca aśrīyamāṇe padārthaḥ eva na saṃpadyate na sa guṇa bhūtaḥ vinā api tena na vaiguṇyam evam pratyakṣaḥ kramasya guṇa bhāvaḥ yatra tatra arthena saḥ eva āśrayitavyaḥ yathā jāte varam dadāti jātam añjalinā gṛhṇāti jātam abhiprāṇiti iti arthāt pūrvam abhiprāṇitavyam tatas añjalinā grahītavyaḥ tatas varaḥ deyaḥ iti tathā vimokaḥ pūrvam āmnātaḥ paścāt tad yogaḥ arthāt viparītaḥ kāryaḥ yājyā anuvākye tu viparyayeṇa āmnāte viparyayeṇa kartavye na atra pāṭha kramaḥ mīyate yatas devatā upalakṣaṇa artha anuvākyā pradāna arthā yājyā agnihotram juhoti iti pūrvam āmnātam odanam pacati iti paścāt asaṃbhavāt pūrvam odanaḥ paktavyaḥ praiṣa praiṣa arthaḥ tu viparyayeṇa āmnātau tau ca viparyayeṇa kartavyau 
[I,540,i_I,540,ii]	aniyamaḥ anyatra asmin viṣaye kramasya niyamaḥ na asti yathā darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ yājamānānām prayāja anumantraṇa ādīnām nānā śākhā antara samāmnātānām vasantam ṛtūnām prīṇāmi iti evamādīnām ekaḥ mama iti evamādīnām ca 
[I,540,iii_I,540,iv]	krameṇa vā niyamyeta kratu eka tve tad guṇa tvāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ āmnātam samidhaḥ yajati tanūnapātam yajati iḍaḥ yajati barhiḥ yajati svāhākāram yajati iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim aniyatena eva krameṇa eṣām anuṣṭhānam uta yaḥ pāṭha kramaḥ saḥ eva niyamyeta iti kim prāptam niyama kāriṇaḥ śāstrasya abhāvāt aniyamaḥ iti 
[I,540,v]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ krameṇa eva niyamyeta ekasmin kratau iti kutas tad guṇa tvāt tad guṇa tvam hi gamyate padārthānām yathā snāyāt anulimpet bhuñjīta iti ca krameṇa anuṣṭhānam avagamyate vākyāt padārthānām yathā ca adṛṣṭa artheṣu upadiśyamāneṣu kaścid brūyāt devāya dhūpaḥ deyaḥ puṣpāṇi avakaritavyāni candanena anuleptavyaḥ upahāraḥ asmai upahartavyaḥ evam kṛte devaḥ tuṣyati iti tam anyaḥ pratibrūte na etat evam na prathamam dhūpaḥ dātavyaḥ prathamam puṣpāṇi avakaritavyāni iti evam manyate dhūpa dānasya prāthamyam anena uktam iti tasmāt vācanikaḥ eṣām eṣa kramaḥ iti 
[I,541,i_I,541,ii]	aśābdaḥ iti ced syāt vākya śabda tvāt iti ced paśyasi atha evam gamyamāne aśabdaḥ eva kramaḥ katham padārtha pūrvakaḥ vākya arthaḥ padebhyaḥ ca padārthāḥ eva avagamyante na kramaḥ syāt etat evam yadi padārthānām samūhasya śravaṇam pratyāyakam arthasya syāt na tu samudāyaḥ pratyāyakaḥ iti uktam tad bhūtānām kriyā arthena samāmnāyaḥ iti atra tasmāt kramasya vācaka śabda abhāvāt vyāmohaḥ eṣa kramaḥ avagamyate evam ca apūrvāsattiḥ anugrahīṣyate itarathā sā api viprakṛṣyeta ghaṭīyantraḥ iva darśayiṣyati ca hṛdayasya agre avadyati atha jihvāyāḥ atha vakṣasaḥ iti yadi niyāmakaḥ pāṭha kramaḥ tatas na vidhātavyam etat niyāmake hi pāṭha krame pāṭha kramāt eva prāpnuyāt 
[I,541,iii_I,541,iv]	artha kṛte vā anumānam syāt kratu eka tve parārtha tvāt svena tu arthena saṃbandhaḥ tasmāt sva śabdam ucyeta ekasmin kratau eka tvāt kratuḥ anekasmin padārthe artha kṛta tvāt kramasya tatra eṣaḥ eva kramaḥ niyamyeta anumānena kutas para artha tvāt vedasya para arthaḥ hi vedaḥ yat yat anena śakyate kartum tasmai tasmai prayojanāya eṣa samāmnāyate śakyate ca anena padārthaḥ vidhātum śakyate ca kriyā kāle pratipattum tasmāt vedaḥ padārthān ca vidhātum upādeyaḥ kriyā kāle ca pratipattum na gamyate viśeṣaḥ vidhātum ayam samāmnāyate na pratipattum iti agamyamāne viśeṣaḥ ubhaya artham upādīyate iti gamyate pratipattum ca anena krameṇa śakyate na anyena atas eva ca kṛtvā pāṭha krama apacāre vinaṣṭaḥ iti ucyate itarathāḥ hi yat yasya prayojanam tasmin nirvartamānaḥ eva kim naṣṭam syāt adṛṣṭam kalpyeta tat ca anyāyyam dṛṣṭe sati tasmāt sva śabdaḥ kramaḥ yaḥ eva padārthānām vācakaḥ śabdaḥ saḥ eva kramasya api 
[I,542,i_I,542,ii]	tathā ca anya artha darśanam evam ca anya artham darśayati vyatyastam ṛtavyāḥ upadadhāti vyatyastam ṣoḍaśinam śaṃsati āśvinaḥ daśamaḥ gṛhyate tam tṛtīyam juhoti iti yadi aniyamena upadhānam śaṃsanam ca vyatyasta vacanam anarthakam syāt na hi kathaṃcid avyatyāsaḥ iti tathā āśvinasya tṛtīyasya homa anuvādaḥ na avakalpyeta yadi pāṭha krameṇa niyamaḥ iti tathā abhicaratā pratilomam hotavyam prāṇān eva asya pratīcaḥ pratiyauti iti kvacid pratilomam vidadhat anulomam darśayati tat upapadyate yadi pāṭha krameṇa prayogaḥ itarathā sarvam anulomam syāt pratiloma darśanam na upapadyeta tathā caturtha uttamayoḥ pratisamānayati iti ukte sati atihāya iḍaḥ barhiḥ pratisamānayati iti ucyate tena barhiṣaḥ caturtha tām darśayati sā pāṭha krame niyāmake avakalpate 
[I,542,iii_I,542,iv]	pravṛttyā tulya kālānām guṇānām tad upakramāt vājapeye saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabhate iti śrūyate teṣu paśuṣu ca udaka prāptāḥ prokṣaṇa ādayaḥ dharmāḥ tatra prathamaḥ padārthaḥ yatas kutaścid ārabdhavyaḥ dvitīya ādiṣu bhavati saṃśayaḥ kim tatas eva dvitīyaḥ api padārthaḥ ārabdhavyaḥ uta dvitīya ādiṣu aniyamaḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam niyama kāriṇaḥ śāstrasya abhāvāt aniyamaḥ iti 
[I,543,i]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ yatas pūrvaḥ ārabdhaḥ tatas eva dvitīya ādayaḥ api padārthāḥ ārabdhavyāḥ iti kutas etat tad upakramāt sarve hi padārthāḥ pradhāna kālān na vipra kraṣṭavyāḥ pradhānam hi cikīrṣitam kṛtam vā teṣām nimittam saha vacanam hi bhavati padārthaiḥ saha pradhānam kartavyam iti bahu padārtha samāmnānāt tu avaśyam bhāvī viprakarṣaḥ tathā api tu yāvadbhiḥ na avyavahitaḥ śakyaḥ padārthaḥ kartum tāvadbhiḥ vyavadhānam avaśyam kartavyam tatas abhyadhikena na vyavadhātavyam iti yadi dvitīyam padārtham anyatas ārabheta tatas adhikaiḥ api vyavadadhyāt tathā prayoga vacanam bādheta nanu tathā sati kaścid alpaiḥ vyavahitaḥ bhaviṣyati ucyate anumatānām vyavadhāyakānām tyāgena kaścid abhyadhikaḥ guṇaḥ bhavati iti tasmāt yatas pūrva padārthaḥ ārabdhaḥ tatas eva uttaraḥ ārambhaṇīyaḥ iti 
[I,543,ii_I,543,iii]	sarvam iti ced iti ced paśyasi pradhāna aviprakarṣeṇa prayoga vacana anugrahaḥ iti sarvam tarhi guṇa kāṇḍam ekasmin apavarjayitavyam yathā saurya ādiṣu 
[I,543,iv_I,543,v]	na akṛta tvāt na etat evam saha prayogaḥ eva hi na anuṣṭhitaḥ syāt 
[I,544,i_I,544,ii]	kratu antara vat iti ced atha yat uktam yathā kratu antareṣu saurya ādiṣu iti tat parihartavyam 
[I,544,iii_I,544,iv]	na asamavāyāt na teṣām arthāt kramaḥ prāpnoti yaḥ niyamyeta aṅga āśrayaḥ hi niyamaḥ bhavitum arhati anaṅga samāśrayasya svayam aṅga tā kalpyeta 
[I,544,v_I,545,i]	sthānāt ca utpatti saṃyogāt ekaviṃśena atirātreṇa prajā kāmam yājayet trinavena ojaskāmam trayastriṃśena pratiṣṭhā kāmam iti evamādi śrūyate tatra āgamena saṃkhyā pūraṇam iti vakṣyate tatra āgame kriyamāṇe kim aniyama ja kramāḥ sarvāḥ ṛcaḥ āgamayitavyāḥ uta kāṇḍa kramebhyaḥ iti kim prāptam aniyamena iti kutas atirātre triṇava ādi śabda arthena etāḥ prāpnuvanti tatra etāsām prāpnuvatīnām pāṭha kramaḥ na asti iti evam prāptaḥ ucyate yat āsām samāmnāye sthānam tena etāḥ atra niyamyante yāḥ pūrvam samāmnātāḥ tāḥ pūrvam eva prayoktavyāḥ ānupūrvyasya hi dṛṣṭam etat prayojanam yat uttara sphuraṇam tat api cikīrṣitam eva iti tri nava ādi śabdaiḥ atirātre yaugapadyena āsām prāpteḥ pāṭha kramasya aviṣayaḥ iti adhikaraṇa antaram iti bhavati matiḥ samāmnāya pāṭha kramāt eva atra niyamaḥ iti punar ukta tā gamyate iti anyathā varṇyate 
[I,545,ii_I,545,iii]	sthānāt ca utpatti saṃyogāt sādyaskre śrūyate saha paśūn ālabhate iti tatra eṣaḥ arthaḥ samadhigataḥ savanīya kāle trayāṇām ālambhaḥ iti atha atra pāṭha kramāt kim agnīṣomīyaḥ pūrvam ālabdhavyaḥ uta sthāna kramāt pūrvam savanīyaḥ iti kim prāptam pūrvam agnīṣomīya iti kutas pāṭha kramāt evam prāpte brūmaḥ savanīyaḥ pūrvam sthānāt yadi pūrvam agnīṣomīyaḥ syāt savanīya sthānam vyāhanyeta āśvinam gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpam parivīya iti nanu itaratra api pāṭha kramaḥ bādhyeta bādhyatām tasya hi pratiṣedha arthaḥ saha śabdaḥ samāmnātaḥ apratiṣiddham ca aśvina graha sthānam tat na bādhitavyam 
[I,545,iv_I,545,v]	mukhya krameṇa vā aṅgānām tad artha tvāt sārasvatau bhavataḥ etat vai daivyam mithunam iti śrūyate tatra saṃdehaḥ kim strī devatyasya prathamam dharmāḥ uta puṃdevati asya iti niyama kāriṇaḥ śāstrasya abhāvāt aniyamaḥ iti prāpte brūmaḥ mukhya krameṇa vā niyamaḥ syāt iti strī devati asya hi pūrvam yājyā anuvākyayoḥ samāmnānam praṇaḥ devī sarasvatī iti tasmāt strī devatyasya pūrvam pradānena bhavitavyam tasmāt strī devatyasya pūrvam dharmāḥ kāryāḥ tathā hi pradhāna kāla tā bhavati aṅgānām itarathā yaiḥ padārthaiḥ vyavadhānam sāmarthyāt anujñātam tebhyaḥ adhikaiḥ api vyavadhānam syāt 
[I,546,i_I,546,ii]	prakṛtau tu sva śabda tvāt yathākramam pratīyeta darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ pūrvam auṣadha dharmāḥ samāmnātāḥ tatas ājyasya tatra saṃdehaḥ kim agnīṣomīya dharmānām mukhya krameṇa pūrvam ājyasya dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ uta yathāpāṭham iti mukhya krama anugraheṇa ājyasya pūrvām iti prāpte brūmaḥ prakṛtau yathāpāṭham pratīyeta sva śabdaḥ hi teṣām pāṭha kramaḥ saḥ anyathā kriyamāṇe bādhitaḥ syāt sahatvasya punar upasaṃgrāhakaḥ prayoga vacanaḥ sva krameṇa padārthe saṃnikṛṣyamāṇe na bādhitaḥ bhaviṣyati api ca pāṭha krame sva śabdaḥ svādhyāyaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti mukhya krameṇa prayoga vacana eka vākya tā sūkṣmā 
[I,546,iii_I,546,iv]	mantrataḥ tu virodhe syāt prayoga rūpa sāmarthyāt tasmāt utpatti deśaḥ saḥ darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ āgneyasya pūrvam mantra pāṭhaḥ uttaraḥ brāhmaṇasya tatra saṃdehaḥ katamaḥ pāṭhaḥ balīyān iti ucyate aniyamaḥ niyama kāriṇaḥ śāstrasya abhāvāt iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ mantra pāṭhaḥ balīyān kutas prayoga rūpa sāmarthyāt prayogāya mantrasya rūpa sāmarthyam tat asya sāmarthyam yena mantraḥ prayujyate tasya ca prayujyamānasya kramaḥ dṛṣṭāya bhavati nanu ca brāhmaṇa pāṭhasya api tat eva prayojanam ucyate utpatti deśaḥ saḥ aparam api tasya prayojanam karma utpatti artham bhaviṣyati 
[I,547,i_I,547,ii]	tad vacanāt vikṛtau yathāpradhānam syāt asti adhvara kalpā nāma iṣṭiḥ āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet sarasvatī ājya bhāgaḥ syāt bārhaspatyaḥ caruḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim āgneya vikārasya bārhaspatyasya pūrvam dharmāḥ kāryāḥ ca udakaḥ balavattaraḥ prayoga vacanāt uta upāṃśu yāja vikārasya prayoga vacanaḥ balavattaraḥ ca udakāt iti kim prāptam vikṛtau asyām yathāpradhānam syāt tad vacanāt teṣām sākṣāt vacana kramaḥ vikṛtau tena saṃnihitānām upasaṃhārakaḥ prayoga vacanaḥ hi pratyakṣaḥ tad dharmāṇām ca anumānikaḥ ca udakena hi sa prāptaḥ tasmāt pratyakṣaḥ prayoga vacanaḥ balavattaraḥ tena ca udakaḥ ānumānikaḥ bādhyate 
[I,547,iii_I,547,iv]	vipratipattau vā prakṛti anvayāt yathāprakṛti mukhya aṅga krama vipratipattau vā yathā prakṛtau tathā eva vikṛtau bhavitum arhati iti kutas prakṛti anvayāt yādṛśāḥ prakṛtau dharmāḥ tādṛśāḥ eva vikṛtau bhavitum arhanti iti mukhya krameṇa kriyamāṇāḥ na prakṛti vat kṛtāḥ syuḥ ca udakaḥ hi prayoga vacanāt balavattaraḥ sa hi utpādayati prāpayati ca prāpitān abhisamīkṣya prayoga vacanaḥ upasaṃharati sa prāpteṣu utpannaḥ prāpti nimittakaḥ uttara kālam pūrva prāptam na bādhitum arhati ca udakam pratyakṣaḥ api san bahis aṅga tvāt yathā prāptān eva upasaṃhariṣyati tasmāt pūrvam bārhaspatyasya dharmāḥ tatas ājyasya iti 
[I,548,i_I,548,ii]	vikṛtiḥ prakṛti dharma tvāt tad kālā syāt yathāśiṣṭam cāturmāsyeṣu sākamedhaḥ tṛtīyam parva tasya avayavāḥ agnaye anīkavate prātar aṣṭākapālaḥ marudbhyaḥ sāṃtapanebhyaḥ madhyaṃdine caruḥ marudbhyaḥ gṛhamedhibhyaḥ sarvāsām dugdhe sāyamodanam iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim etāḥ dvi aha kālāḥ iṣṭayaḥ uta sadyaskālāḥ iti kim prāptam vikṛtiḥ tad kālā bhavitum arhati iti yathāśiṣṭam yathā prakṛtiḥ uktā tathā vikṛtiḥ syāt prakṛti dharmā hi sā tasmāt yā vikṛtiḥ sā dvi ahakālā bhavitum arhati iti 
[I,548,iii_I,548,iv]	api vā krama kāla saṃyuktā sadyas kriyeta tatra vidheḥ anumānāt prakṛti dharma lopaḥ syāt ahnaḥ kāleṣu ye padārthāḥ ucyante prātar madhyaṃdine sāyam iti krameṇa te ekasmin ahani iti pratīyante yathā devadattaḥ prātar apūpam bhakṣayati madhyaṃdine vividham annam aśnāti aparāhṇe modakān bhakṣayati iti ekasmin ahani iti gamyate tasmāt sadyaskālāḥ evaṃjātīyakāḥ vikṛtayaḥ dvi aiha kālyam hi ca udaka prāptam ānumānikam pratyakṣa rūpayā sadyaskāla tayā bādhyeta 
[I,549,i_I,549,ii]	kāla utkarṣaḥ iti ced iti ced paśyasi prāptaḥ sāṅgam śrūyate tathā madhyaṃdine sāyam ca iti utkarṣaḥ bhaviṣyati yathā eteṣu kāleṣu sa aṅgam na ca dvi aha kālatāyāḥ bādhaḥ ekasya ahnaḥ prātar anīkavantam upakraṃsyate dvitīyasya prātar yakṣyeta evam sāṃtapanīyā pūrvedyus madhyāṃdinaḥ upakraṃsyate aparedyus madhyaṃdine yakṣyate tathā gṛhamedhīye sāyam upakramaṇam pūrvedyus sāyam yāgaḥ aparedyus iti nanu vākyāt ekam ahar gamyate iti uktam ucyate padārtha sāmarthya janitaḥ hi vākya arthaḥ bhavati na ca atra padārtha sāmarthyam asti yena ekam ahar gamyeta 
[I,549,iii_I,549,iv]	na tad saṃbandhāt na etat evam kasmāt tad saṃbandhāt eka kāla saṃbaddhāni pradhānāni aṅgaiḥ saha śrūyante katham sāṅgam hi pradhānam prātar kāle śrūyate tathā madhyaṃdine sāyam ca na aṅgāni prātaḥkāla ādiṣu tatra anya kāleṣu aṅgeṣu anya kāleṣu ca pradhāneṣu na sa aṅgam teṣu kāleṣu kṛtam syāt tasmāt sadyaskālāḥ eva etāḥ vikṛtayaḥ iti api ca dvi aham sākamedhaiḥ iti śrūyate tat sadyaskāla āsu upapadyate 
[I,550,i_I,550,ii]	aṅgānām mukhya kāla tvāt yathoktam utkarṣe syāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate āgni mārutāt ūrdhvam anuyājaiḥ caranti iti utkarṣaḥ tathā agnīṣomīye paśau tiṣṭhantam paśum prayajanti iti apakarṣaḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim utkarṣe anuyāja mātram utkṛṣyate apakarṣe ca prayājamātram uta utkarṣe anuyāja ādi apakarṣe ca prayāja antam iti kim tāvat prāptam yāvat uktam utkarṣa apakarṣayoḥ syāt kutas aṅgānām mukhya kāla tvāt evam anyeṣām pradhāna kāla tā bhaviṣyati iti tatra sahatvasya prāpakaḥ prayoga vacanaḥ anugrahīṣyate 
[I,550,iii_I,550,iv]	tad ādi vā abhisaṃbandhāt tad antam apakarṣe syāt tad ādi utkarṣe tad antam apakarṣe gamyeta kutas abhisaṃbandhāt yat anuyājānām parastāt samāmnāyate tat pradhānāt antaram prayoga vacanena prāptam bādhitvā pāṭha sāmarthyāt anuyājebhyaḥ parastāt kriyate tathā yaḥ tatas paraḥ sa tatas parastāt evam ekaḥ utkṛṣyamāṇaḥ sarvam guṇa kāṇḍam utkarṣati tathā apakṛṣyamāṇaḥ apakarṣati iti 
[I,550,v_I,550,vi]	pravṛttyā kṛta kālānām jyotiṣṭome śrūyate prātaranuvāka kāle pratiprasthātaḥ savanīyān nirvapasva iti preṣyati iti savanīyānām nirvāpa kālaḥ asti ca bahiṣpavamāne stute agnīt agnīn vihara barhi stṛṇīhi puroḍāśān alaṃkuru iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim prātar anuvāka kāle savanīyān nirūpya pracaraṇī homa ādayaḥ saumikāḥ padārthāḥ uta pauroḍāśāḥ prāk alaṃkaraṇāt iti kim prāptam aniyamaḥ niyama kāriṇaḥ śāstrasya abhāvāt 
[I,551,i]	iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ pravṛttyā kṛta kālānām jñāna kālānām padārthānām pravṛttyā niyamaḥ syāt prayujyamānam eva hi pūrva padārtham abhiniyacchati sa tasya parastāt samāmnātaḥ parastāt kartavyaḥ saumikasya tu padārthasya pracaraṇī homasya vacanāt kramaḥ bādhitaḥ alaṃkaraṇam ca bahiṣpavamānasya parastāt samāmnātam tasmāt tasya pūrvaḥ padārthaḥ nirvapaṇa ādīnām antar tatas uttare saumikāḥ padārthāḥ kartavyāḥ iti 
[I,551,ii_I,551,iii]	śabda vipratiṣedhāt ca śabdaḥ ca vipratiṣidhyate alaṃkuru iti uktaḥ prokṣaṇa ādīn pratipadyeta asmat pakṣe tu alaṃkuru iti ukte alaṃkaraṇam eva pratipatsyate tatra alaṃkaraṇe prāpta kāle prāpta kāla vacanaḥ loḍantaḥ anugrahīṣyate tasmāt atra prāvṛttikaḥ kramaḥ iti 
[I,551,iv_I,551,v]	asaṃyogāt tu vaikṛtam tat eva pratikṛṣyeta asti darśa pūrṇamāsa prakṛtike paśau agnīṣomīye vaikṛtam yūpa karma tat pratikṛṣyate dīkṣāsu yūpam chinatti iti tat pratikṛṣyamāṇam arvācīnāni api agnīṣoma praṇayana ādīni pratikarṣati uta na iti saṃśaye pratikarṣati saṃbandhāt iti gamyate 
[I,552,i]	tathā prāpte brūmaḥ vikṛtau abhyadhikam yat tat pratikṛṣyamāṇam tatas arvācīnāni api agnīṣoma praṇayana ādīni na pratikraṣṭum arhati katham asaṃyogāt pāśukam yūpa karma tatas prācīnam saumikam na tayoḥ paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ na saumikaḥ padārthaḥ pāśukasya upakārakaḥ paśoḥ vā yadi hi tayoḥ upakārakaḥ syāt tatas tasya upakurvataḥ kramaḥ api asya sāhāyyam kurvan guṇa bhūtaḥ syāt na tu etat asti tasmāt na eṣām paraspareṇa krame niyamaḥ atas yūpa mātram pratikṛṣyate api ca yūpa mātram pratikṛsya kṛtārthe śabde saumikānām sva krama bādhaḥ na bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,552,ii_I,552,iv]	prāsaṅgikam ca na utkarṣet asaṃyogāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate āgni mārutāt ūrdhvam anuyājaiḥ caranti iti anuyājāḥ utkṛṣyamāṇāḥ dākṣiṇa agnikau homau utkarṣanti na iti saṃśayaḥ saṃbandhāt utkarṣanti iti prāpte ucyate na eva a utkraṣṭum arhanti ye tayoḥ sva anuyājāḥ saṃbaddhāḥ te na prayuktāḥ parakīyaiḥ teṣām arthaḥ nirvartitaḥ iti padārthānām ca kramaḥ bhavati na padārtha prayojanānām yaugapadyena hi padārthāḥ upakurvanti iti vakṣyāmaḥ padārthānām ca utpattiḥ kramavatī pṛthak śabda tvāt utpatteḥ na padārtha prayojanasya yugapad prayoga vacanena abhihita tvāt atas anuyāja utpatteḥ utkarṣikāyāḥ abhāvāt dākṣiṇā agnikau homau na utkṛṣyeyātām iti api ca anuyāja mātram utkṛṣya kṛtārthe śabde dākṣiṇā agnikayoḥ homayoḥ sva krama bādhaḥ na bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,553,i_I,553,iii]	tathā apūrvam darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ vediḥ haviḥ abhivāsana uttara kāle samāmnātā sa amāvāsyāyām pratikṛṣyate pūrvedyus amāvāsyāyām vedim karoti iti sā tu apakṛṣyamāṇā tatas arvācīnān padārthān apakarṣati na iti saṃśayaḥ ucyate saṃbandhāt pratikarṣati iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ tathā apūrvam aprakṛtiḥ pūrvikāyām amāvāsyāyām vedi karaṇam pūrvedyus āmnātam ubhayoḥ api śvobhūte haviḥ abhivāsanam abhivāsanam kṛtvā amāvāsyāyām vediḥ kartavyā iti na śruti ādīnām anyatamat kāraṇam asti tasmāt na abhi vāsanā antāḥ pratikraṣṭavyāḥ iti abhivāsane ca apakṛṣyamāṇe havīṃṣi bhasmībhaveyuḥ 
[I,553,iv_I,553,v]	sāṃtapanīyā tu utkarṣet agnihotram sa vana vat vaiguṇyāt cāturmādyeṣu sākamedha avayavaḥ sāṃtapanīyā nāma iṣṭiḥ marudbhyaḥ sāṃtapanebhyaḥ mādhyaṃdine carum nirvapati iti sā daivāt mānuṣāt vā pratibandhāt utkṛṣyamāṇāḥ agnihotram utkarṣet na vā iti saṃśaye ucyate sāṃtapanīyā tu utkarṣet agnihotram sa vana vat vaiguṇyāt yadi na utkarṣet agni hotra savanaḥ agnihotra kāle uddhṛte agnau agnihotram viguṇam syāt tasmāt utkraṣṭavyam savana vat yathā prātaḥsavanam daivāt mānuṣāt vā pratibandhāt utkṛṣyamāṇam mādhyaṃdinam savanam utkarṣati iti evam atra api draṣṭavyam 
[I,554,i_I,554,ii]	avyavāyāt ca evam sāṃtapanīyam agni hotreṇa na vyavahitam bhaviṣyati iti tatra kramaḥ anugrahīṣyate krama bhede ca doṣaḥ śrūyate apa vai etat yajñāt chidyate yat anyasya tantre vitate anyasya tantram pratīyate iti 
[I,554,iii_I,554,iv]	asaṃbandhāt tu na utkarṣet na agnihotrasya sāṃtapanīya aṅgam na sāṃtapanīyāyāḥ vā agnihotram tena na asau agnihotrasya purastāt kartavyā atas na agnihotram utkraṣṭavyam 
[I,554,v_I,555,i]	prāpaṇāt ca nimittasya prāptam ca agnihotrasya nimittam sāyam juhoti prātar juhoti udite juhoti anudite juhoti prathama astamite juhoti saṃdhau juhoti nakṣatrāṇi dṛṣṭvā juhoti iti tat na atikramitavyam tasmāt api na utkarṣaḥ yat uktam vaiguṇyam iti utkarṣe api vaiguṇyam kāla anya tvāt aṅga aprāpteḥ jaghanyaḥ kāla vidhiḥ bādhyatām iti ced na kālasya nimitta tvāt tat apāye aśrutam eva sarvam kriyeta nimittam ca anupādeya tvena śravaṇāt saptamī hi ādhāra ādiṣu asaṃbhavāt nimitta saptamī draṣṭavyā atha yat uktam savana vat utkraṣṭavyam iti tat ucyate 
[I,555,ii_I,555,iii]	saṃbandhāt savana utkarṣaḥ saṃbaddham hi savanam savanena eka kratu saṃbandhāt tat utkṛṣyate 
[I,555,iv_I,555,v]	ṣoḍaśī ca ukthya saṃyogāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate ṣoḍaśinam prakṛtya tam parāñcam ukthyebhyaḥ vigṛhṇāti iti yadā daivāt manuṣāt vā pratibandhāt ukthyāni utkṛṣyante kim tadā ṣoḍaśī utkṛṣṭavyaḥ na iti bhavati saṃśayaḥ kim prāptam na utkraṣṭavyaḥ kutas evam stotram svasmin kāle ṣoḍaśinaḥ kṛtam bhaviṣyati iti samaya adhyuṣite sūrye ṣoḍaśina stotram upakaroti iti tasmāt anutkarṣaḥ iti 
[I,555,vi]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ ṣoḍaśī ca utkraṣṭavyaḥ kasmāt ukthya saṃyogāt ukthya saṃyogaḥ hi ṣoḍaśinaḥ bhavati tam parāñcam ukthyebhyaḥ vigṛhṇāti iti tasmāt utkraṣṭavyaḥ ṣoḍaśī yat uktam ṣoḍaśina stotra kālena āvarjanam bhaviṣyati iti ucyate stotra kramam anurudhyamānasya pradhāna kramaḥ virudhyeta tasmāt na stotra kramaḥ anuroddhavyaḥ ubhayam na śakyam anugṛhītum graham vā gṛhītvā camasam vā unnīya stotram upākaroti iti śrūyate tasmāt utkraṣṭavyaḥ ṣoḍaśī iti 
[I,557,i_I,557,ii]	saṃnipāte pradhānānām ekaikasya guṇānām sarva karma syāt vājapeye saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabhate iti śrūyate agnīṣomīye ca paśau paśu dharmāḥ samāmnātāḥ ca udakena prāptāḥ teṣu saṃśayaḥ kim ekasya ādeḥ ārabhya dharmān sarvān kṛtvā dvitīyasya punar āditas upakramitavyāḥ atha prathamaḥ tāvat sarveṣām kartavyaḥ tatas dvitīyaḥ iti kim prāptam ekaikasya sarve apavarjayitavyāḥ iti kutas pradhāna asatteḥ anugrahāya itarathā pradhāna āsattiḥ viprakṛṣyeta yathā bahuṣu aśveṣu pratigṛhīteṣu ye puroḍāśāḥ teṣu na eka jātīya anusamayaḥ evam iha api iti 
[I,557,iii_I,557,v]	sarveṣām vā eka jātīyam kṛta ānupūrvya tvāt eka jātīya anusamayaḥ kartavyaḥ kim evam bhaviṣyati sahatvam anugrahīṣyate tad saha tvam śrūyate vaiśvadevīm kṛtvā paśubhiḥ caranti iti ekasmin kāle paśūnām pracāraḥ nanu evam sati pūrvasya padārthasya uttaraḥ padārthaḥ paśu antara vyāpāreṇa vyavadhīyate na eṣa doṣaḥ evam api kṛtam eva ānupūrvyam yaḥ asau paśu antare vyāpāraḥ saḥ eva asau na padārtha antaram padārtha antareṇa vyavadhānam bhavati 
[I,558,i_I,558,iii]	kāraṇāt abhyāvṛttiḥ atha yat uktam bahuṣu puroḍāśeṣu na eka jātīya anusamayaḥ iti tat parihartavyam atra ucyate yuktam tatra yat kāraṇāt abhyāvṛttiḥ eka jātīya anusamaye hi kriyamāṇe sahasrasya adhiśrayaṇe kṛte prathamaḥ śuṣyet tasya ca prathamam na śakyeta kartum athavā adhikaraṇa antaram 
[I,558,iv_I,558,v]	kāraṇāt abhyāvṛttiḥ aneka sahasra aśva pratigrahe tantra anuṣṭhānam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ kāṇḍa anusamayaḥ abhyupetavyaḥ iti siddhāntaḥ 
[I,558,vi_I,558,vii]	muṣṭi kapāla avadāna añjana abhyañjana vapana pāvaneṣu ca ekena muṣṭi ādiṣu saṃśayaḥ kim muṣṭinā anusamayaḥ uta caturbhiḥ muṣṭibhiḥ iti kim prāptam muṣṭinā iti kutas eka muṣṭi nirvāpaḥ hi ekaḥ padārthaḥ na catur muṣṭi nirvāpaḥ katham ekasmin muṣṭau nirupte yatībhāvaḥ paryavasyati na śakyam vaditum na kiṃcid niruptam iti na ca nirupte nirvāpaḥ na kṛtaḥ syāt na ca muṣṭi mātreṇa niruptena na prayojanam na hi ekasmin anirupte catvāraḥ saṃbhavanti muṣṭi samāna adhikaraṇaḥ hi catur śabdaḥ tasmāt muṣṭinā anusamayaḥ kāryaḥ evam kapālān upadadhāti iti tathā madhyāt avadyati pūrva ardhāt avadyati tathā aṅkte abhyaṅkte vapati pāvayati iti 
[I,559,i_I,559,ii]	sarvāṇi tu eka kāryatvāt eṣām tad guṇa tvāt sarvāṇi tu parisamāpya anusameyāt na eka muṣṭi nirvāpaḥ padārthaḥ catur saṃkhya tvāt nirvāpasya katham catur saṃkhya tā catur śabdasya nirvapatinā saṃbandhāt evam saha karmaṇā aneka guṇa vidhānam nyāyyam itarathā muṣṭi saṃbandhe sati vākya bhedaḥ prasajyeta anirvāpa aṅgam ca syāt tathā upadhāna ādiṣu api aṣṭākapālam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapati iti nirdeśāt dvis avadyati tris abhyaṅkte ekaviṃśatyā pāvayati iti saṃkhyā ādīnām kriyā guṇa tvam bhavati tasmāt samudāyena anusamayaḥ iti 
[I,559,iii_I,559,iv]	saṃyukte tu prakramāt tad aṅgam syāt itarasya tad artha tvāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate dvis haviṣaḥ avadyati iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim avadānena anusamayaḥ uta avadānena pradāna antena iti kim prāptam avadānena iti brūmaḥ kutas pṛthak padārtha tvāt pṛthak padārthaḥ hi avadānam yatī bhāvasya paryavasānāt avadyati vacanāt evam prāpte brūmaḥ saṃyukte tu prakramāt tad aṅgam syāt itarasya tad artha tvāt na avadānam pṛthak padārthaḥ pradānasya saḥ upakramaḥ itarathāvat yateḥ adṛṣṭa artha tā syāt saṃkhyā viśeṣa vidhāna artham ca punarvacanam tasmāt padārtha avayavaḥ avadānam na ca avayava saha tvam prayoga vacanena ucyate tasmāt pradāna antena anusamayaḥ iti 
[I,560,i_I,560,ii]	vacanāt tu parivyāṇa antam añjana ādi syāt jyotiṣṭome agnīṣomīya paśau yūpasya añjana ādyāḥ padārthāḥ śrūyante teṣu yūpa ekādaśinyām prāpteṣu saṃśayaḥ kim añjana ādīnām ekaikena anusamayaḥ uta añjana ādinā parivyāṇa antena iti kim prāptam parivyāṇa antam añjana ādi syāt kutas vacanāt vacanam idam bhavati añjana ādi yajamānaḥ yūpam na avamṛjet āparivyāṇāt iti na ca śakyam bahuṣu añjana ādinā anusamayaḥ kartum na ca anavasraṣṭum tasmāt parivyāṇa antena anusamayaḥ 
[I,560,iii_I,560,iv]	kāraṇāt vā anavasargaḥ syāt yathā pātra vṛddhiḥ sahatvasya prāpakaḥ prayoga vacanaḥ anugrahīṣyate iti padārthena anusamayaḥ anavasargaḥ ca prakṛtau arthāt kṛtaḥ sāhāyyam yajamānena adhvaryoḥ evam dṛṣṭa artha tānavasargasya itaratha adṛṣṭa artha tā syāt na ca arthāt kṛtam ca udakaḥ prāpayati tasmāt yūpa antareṇa ucchrayitavyena kāraṇena avasṛjet yathā pṛṣadājyena anuyājān yajati iti arthāt tasya dhāraṇa artham pātram bhidyate 
[I,561,i_I,561,ii]	na vā śabda kṛta tvāt nyāya mātram itarat arthāt pātra vivṛddhiḥ na vaitad padārthena anusamayaḥ iti parivyāṇa antena padārtha kāṇḍena anusamayaḥ syāt śabda kṛtam hi prakṛtau anavasarjanam śaknoti hi ṛte api yajamānāt adhvaryuḥ yūpam ucchrayitum saukaryam iti ced vidhi śabdaḥ bādhyeta dṛṣṭa artha tā evam hi niyamyeta bhojane prāṅmukha tā iva atas asaṃbhavāt padārtha kāṇḍena anusamayaḥ prayoga vacanasya ca nyāya mātra tvam ca udakaḥ tatas balīyān pātra vivṛddhiḥ tu arthāt kartavyā 
[I,561,iii_I,561,iv]	paśu gaṇe tasya tasya apavarjayet paśu eka tvāt vājapeye prājāpatyāḥ paśavaḥ teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim ekaikasya paśoḥ daivatāni avadāya tatas sauviṣṭa kṛtāni tatas aiḍāni atha daivataiḥ devatānām anusamayaḥ sauviṣṭa kṛtaiḥ sauviṣṭa kṛtānām aiḍaiḥ aiḍānām iti kim tāvat prāptam ekaikasya kṛtsnāni avadāya tatas hotavyam prakṛtau vacanāt etat kṛtam prājāpatyeṣu api ca udakena eva prāpnoti 
[I,561,v_I,561,vi]	daivataiḥ vā eka karmyāt na etat evam daivataiḥ devatānām sauviṣṭa kṛtaiḥ sauviṣṭa kṛtānām aiḍaiḥ aiḍānām iti kasmāt aika karmyāt evam saha kṛtam bhavati yat ca vacanāt prakṛtau kṛtsnā avadānam iti daivatāni avadāya na tāvatī eva hotavyam sauviṣṭakṛtāni avadeyāni sauviṣṭakṛtāni avadāya na tāvatī eva hotavyam aiḍāni avadeyāni iti prakṛtau śrūyate tat iha daivataiḥ daivatānām anusamayam kurvan na enam prākṛtam dharmam bādheta daivatāni avadāya na eva juhoti sauviṣṭakṛtāni avadyati iti atha sauviṣṭakṛtāni avadāya na eva juhoti aiḍāni avadyati iti tasmāt padārtha mātreṇa anusamayaḥ iti 
[I,562,i_I,562,ii]	mantrasya ca arthavat tvāt evam manotā mantraḥ tantram bhaviṣyati itarathā paryāyeṇa eva syāt tasmāt daivataiḥ daivatānām sauviṣṭa kṛtaiḥ sauviṣṭa kṛtānām aiḍaiḥ aiḍānām iti 
[I,562,iii_I,562,iv]	nānā bījeṣu ekam ulūkhalam vibhavāt asti rājasūye nānā bīja iṣṭiḥ agnaye gṛhapataye sutīnām aṣṭākapālam nirvapet somāya vanaspataye śyāmākam carum iti evamādi asti tu tatra prākṛtaḥ avahantiḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim tatra ekam ulūkhalam paryāyeṇa uta yaugapadyena bahūni iti kutas saṃśayaḥ yadi kṛṣṇa ajina adhastaraṇa ādayaḥ pṛthak padārthāḥ tatas bhedaḥ atha kṛṣṇa ajina āstaraṇa ādiḥ taṇḍula nirvṛtti ante ekaḥ padārthaḥ tatas tantram iti kim tāvat prāptam ekam iti kutas paryāyeṇa vibhavāt ekasya upādānena siddheḥ dvitīyasya upādānam anarthakam syāt tasmāt tantram iti 
[I,563,i_I,563,ii]	vivṛddhiḥ vā niyama ānupūrvyasya tad artha tvāt vivṛddhiḥ ulūkhalānām syāt niyatam hi ānupūrvyam pāṭha kṛtam sahatve sati upapadyate padārthānām ca anusamayaḥ pṛthak padārthāḥ ca adhastaraṇa ādayaḥ yatībhāvasya paryavasānāt adhas taraṇa ādibhiḥ ca padaiḥ abhidhānāt tasmāt vivṛddhiḥ iti 
[I,563,iii_I,563,iv]	ekam vā taṇḍula bhāvāt dhanteḥ tad artha tvāt ekam vā ulūkhalam paryāyeṇa syāt ekaḥ hi adhas taraṇa ādiḥ taṇḍula paryantaḥ padārthaḥ staraṇa ādiḥ hanteḥ upakramaḥ phalīkaraṇa antaḥ ca tasya eva śeṣaḥ yatas hantiḥ taṇḍula niṣpatti arthaḥ evam staraṇa ādīnām hanteḥ ca na adṛṣṭa artha tā bhaviṣyati tasmāt tantram iti 
[I,563,v_I,563,vi]	vikāre tu anuyājānām pātra bhedaḥ artha bhedāt syāt asti jyotiṣṭome paśuḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ tatra śrūyate pṛṣadājyena anuyājān yajati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim prayāja anuyājānām ekam pātram ājyasya pṛṣat ājyasya ca dhāraṇa artham uta bhidyate kim prāptam ekam iti kutas prakṛtau ekam prakṛti vat iha api ekena bhavitavyam 
[I,563,vii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ pātra bhedaḥ syāt kutas artha bhedāt śuddhasya prayājāḥ arthaḥ pṛṣataḥ api anuyājāḥ pṛṣati gṛhyamāṇe prayājānām vaiguṇyam śuddhe anuyājānām na ca ekasmin pātre viviktam śakyam kartum maryādāyām api kriyamāṇāyām pradīyamānam saṃsṛjyeta api ca ākāra bhedāt upabhṛtaḥ upabhṛt tvam vihanyeta prāṇi mātra puṣkarā hi sā eka puṣkarā ca 
[I,564,i]	atha ucyeta pṛṣadājyam api ājyam eva iti na miśra tvam doṣāya iti na etat evam prakṛtau utpavana avekṣaṇayoḥ prayojanam etat yat ājyasya apareṇa dravyeṇa asaṃsargaḥ evam ced anupapannam yat prayājā pṛṣadājyena ijyeran iti api ca evam sati avaśyam haviṣaḥ kācid mātrā apanīyate na ca śakyam prayāja kārye avasite anuyāja artham grahītum prakṛtau eka kālam grahaṇam iha api eka kālam eva kartavyam tasmāt pātra bhedaḥ iti
