[I,564,ii_I,564,iii]	prakṛte pūrva ukta tvāt apūrvam ante syāt na hi acoditasya śeṣa āmnānam agnau nakṣatreṣṭyām śrūyate agnaye kṛttikābhyaḥ puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālam nirvapet saḥ atra jūhoti agnaye svāhā kṛttikābhyaḥ svāhā iti evamādi homāḥ samāmnātāḥ santi tu prakṛtau na ariṣṭa homāḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim na ariṣṭa homāḥ pūrvam uta upahomā iti saṃśaye ucyate prākṛtam pūrvam vaikṛtam ante syāt iti kutas coditasya paripūrṇasya śeṣaḥ āmnāyate yathā jātasya putrasya krīḍanakam 
[I,565,i_I,565,ii]	mukhya ānantaryam ātreyaḥ tena tulya śruti tvāt aśabda tvāt prākṛtānām vyavāyaḥ syāt ātreyaḥ manyate sma mukhya ānantaryam vaikṛtasya paścāt tu prākṛtam prayujyeta pradhāna anantaram vaikṛtasya pāṭhaḥ pratyakṣaḥ tasmāt pūrvam upahomāḥ tatas nāriṣṭha homā iti prākṛtānām vyavāyaḥ syāt yatas te na śrūyante 
[I,565,iii_I,565,iv]	ante tu bādarāyaṇaḥ teṣām pradhāna śabda tvāt bādarāyaṇaḥ tu ācāryaḥ manyate sma ante vaikṛtānām prayogaḥ iti kutas pradhāna śabda gṛhīta tvāt prākṛtānām aṅgānām pradhāna śabda gṛhīta tvam tad pradhāna śabda gṛhītāni hi prākṛtāni aṅgāni tasmāt ca pradhāna śabdāt param etat saḥ atra juhoti agnaye svāhā kṛttikābhyaḥ svāhā iti evamādi tasmāt pratyakṣāt eva kramāt na ariṣṭa homebhyaḥ parām ca upahomā iti 
[I,565,v_I,565,vi]	tayā ca anya artha darśanam anya arthaḥ api ca etam artham darśayati adhvarasya pūrvam atha agneḥ upapraiti etat karma yat agnikarma iti paścāt samāmnātasya paścāt prayogam darśayati 
[I,565,vii_I,565,viii]	kṛta deśāt tu pūrveṣām sa deśaḥ syāt tena pratyakṣa saṃyogāt nyāya mātram itarat rājasūye śrūyate akṣaiḥ dīvyati śaunaḥśeṣam ākhyāpayati abhiṣicyate iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim devana ādīnām ante prayogaḥ uta abhiṣekāt pūrvam iti kim prāptam ante tu bādarāyaṇaḥ iti ante prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ kṛta deśāt abhiṣekāt pūrvam tu prayogaḥ kṛta deśaḥ hi abhiṣekaḥ māhendrasya stotram pratyabhiṣicyate iti pratyakṣa anugrahāya abhiṣekāt pūrvam prayoktavyam nyāya mātram itarat ante tu bādarāyaṇaḥ iti 
[I,566,i_I,566,ii]	prākṛtāt ca purastāt yat asti agniḥ yaḥ evam vidvān agnim cinutaḥ iti tatra dīkṣaṇīyāyāḥ pūrvam sāvitra homāḥ ukha asaṃbharaṇam iṣṭakāḥ paśuḥ ca iti etat āmnātam kim tat eva pūrvam kartavyam uta dīkṣaṇīya iti kim prāptam vaikṛtānām ante prayogaḥ ante tu bādarāyaṇaḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ pūrvam sāvitra homāḥ iṣṭakāḥ paśuḥ ukha asaṃbharaṇam ca kutas pratyakṣa pāṭhāt punar tatra dīkṣaṇīyāmnātā tasyāḥ ca purastāt sāvitra homāḥ iṣṭakāḥ paśuḥ ukha asaṃbharaṇam ca tasmāt teṣām pūrvam prayogaḥ iti 
[I,566,iii_I,566,iv]	saṃnipātaḥ ced yathoktam ante syāt agnau dīkṣaṇīyāyāḥ paratas rukma pratimocana ādi āmnātam tasmin eva krame ca udakena dīkṣita saṃskārāḥ prāptāḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim aniyamaḥ uta pūrvam rukma pratimocana ādi uta dīkṣita saṃskārāḥ iti kim prāptam aniyamaḥ athavā yathā pratyakṣa pāṭha kramāt dīkṣaṇīyāyāḥ puratas ukha asaṃbharaṇa ādayaḥ evam rukma pratimocana ādīni iti 
[I,567,i_I,567,iv]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ dīkṣita saṃskārāḥ pūrvam kartavyāḥ iti kutas dīkṣaṇīyām prati yaḥ pāṭha kramaḥ yathā ca ca udakaḥ tathā ubhaye api parastāt dīkṣaṇīyāyāḥ kāryāḥ yaḥ teṣām paraspara apekṣaḥ kramaḥ tatra na kaścid ukha asaṃbharaṇasya iva pratyakṣaḥ pāṭha kramaḥ pūrva tvam sādhayati asti tu saṃskāraṇām prakṛtau pūrvam pāṭhaḥ vikṛtau rukma pratimocanasya uttaraḥ tena yathā uktaḥ eva kramaḥ syāt ante vaikṛtam iti atha kim artham saṃnipātaḥ āśaṅkyate nanu ayam saṃnipātaḥ eva vyaktaḥ asaṃdigdhe saṃdigdha vacanam etat yathā ījānāḥ bahubhiḥ yajñaiḥ brāhmaṇāḥ vedapāragāḥ śāstrāṇi ced pramāṇam syuḥ prāptāḥ te paramām gatim iti tasmāt na doṣaḥ iti 
[I,568,i_I,568,ii]	vivṛddhiḥ karma bhedāt pṛṣadājya vat tasya tasya upadiśyeta agnīṣomīye paśau śrūyate ekādaśa prayājān yajati ekādaśa anuyājān yajati iti cāturmāsyeṣu nava prayājān yajati nava anuyājān yajati iti agnau śrūyate ṣaṣ upasadaḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim prati prayājam ekādaśa saṃkhyā prati anuyājam ca tathā cāturmāsyeṣu nava saṃkhyā tathā agnau ca upasatsu ṣaṣ saṃkhyā uta sarva saṃpādyā saṃkhyā iti kim prāptam pratipradhānam saṃkhyā bhidyate iti kutas bhinnāni hi tāni karmāṇi tāni ca pradhānāni prati saṃkhyā śrūyate pradhāna saṃnidhau ca guṇaḥ śiṣyamāṇāḥ pratidhānam bhidyate yathā pṛṣadājyena anuyājān yajati iti pratyanuyājam pṛṣattā guṇaḥ bhidyate evam iha api iti 
[I,568,iii_I,568,iv]	api vā sarva saṃkhya tvāt vikāraḥ pratīyeta sarva saṃpādyā saṃkhyā kalpyeta kutas pṛthaktva niveśinī hi saṃkhyā asati pṛthaktve abhyāsena kalpyeta yāvatī asaṃbhavaḥ bhedasya tāvatī eva abhyasyeta yāvati saṃbhavati tāvati pṛthaktva niveśaḥ eva nyāyyaḥ tasmāt sarva saṃpādya eva saṃkhyā yat tu pṛṣadājya vat iti na pṛṣattāḥ ekasya na saṃbhavati na asau pṛthaktva niveṣinī na ca ekasya kriyamāṇā sarveṣām tantreṇa upakaroti iti tasmāt avaśyam bhettavyā tantreṇa tu upakaroti saṃkhyā itara apekṣā hi sā bhavati evam sati sahatvasya prāpakaḥ prayoga vacanaḥ anugrahīṣyate iti 
[I,569,i_I,569,ii]	sva sthānāt tu vivṛdhyeran kṛta ānupūrvya tvāt upasatsu saṃdehaḥ kim āvṛttiḥ daṇḍa kalita vat uta sva sthānāt vivardhante iti kim tāvat prāptam āvartanīyānām arthānām eṣa dharmaḥ yat uta daṇḍa kalita vat yaḥ hi ucyate tris anuvākaḥ paṭhyatām iti saḥ āditas ārabhya parisamāpya punar āditas ārabhyate tasmāt daṇḍa kalita vat āvṛttiḥ 
[I,569,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ sva sthānāt vivardhitum arhati kutas kṛta ānupūrvya tvāt kṛtam ānupūrvyam upasatsu prathamām kṛtvā madhyamā kartavyā tatas uttama iti tatra yadi daṇḍa kalita vat āvṛttiḥ syāt uttamām kṛtvā punar ādyāyāḥ abhyāse kriyamāṇe asthāne sā vivṛddhiḥ kṛtā bhavati sva sthāna vivṛddhau na eṣa doṣaḥ tasmāt sva sthāne vivṛddhiḥ iti 
[I,569,iv_I,569,v]	samidhyamānavatīm samiddhavatīm ca antareṇa dhāyyāḥ syuḥ dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ antarāle samarhaṇāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ sāmidhenyaḥ sāmidhenīḥ anvāha iti tatra kāmyāḥ sāmidhenī kalpāḥ ekaviṃśatim anubrūyāt pratiṣṭhākām asya iti evamādayaḥ tatra āgamena saṃkhyā pūraṇam vakṣyate tatra saṃdehaḥ kim āgantūnām ante niveśaḥ uta samidhyamānavatīm samiddhavatīm ca antareṇa niveśaḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam ante niveśaḥ ante tu bādarāyaṇaḥ iti anena nyāyena iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ samidhyamānavatīm samiddhavatīm ca antareṇa niveśaḥ iti kutas dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ antarāle samarhaṇāt saṃstavāt iti arthaḥ iyam vai samidhyamānavatī asau samiddhavatī yat antarā tat dhāyyā iti antarikṣa saṃstute asmin antarāle vidhīyante tasmāt na ante syuḥ iti 
[I,570,i_I,570,iii]	tad śabdaḥ vā atha vā yāḥ dhāyyā śabdikāḥ tāḥ tatra bhavitum arhanti tena hi śabdena tatra saṃstavaḥ saṃstavāt ca vidhānam yathā pṛthu pājavatyau dhāyye uṣṇikkakubhau dhyāyye iti kāḥ punar etāḥ dhāyyāḥ iti nāma na asya śabdasya prasiddhim upalabhāmahe ucyate sāmidhenyaḥ dhyāyyāḥ kutas evam hi bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ vacanam pāyyasāṃnāyya nikāyya dhāyyāḥ māna haviḥ nivāsa sāmidhenīṣu iti asmāt vacanāt śrutim anumimīmahe katamāsu sāmidhenīṣu iti ucyate aviśeṣāt sarvāsu ati gamyate iha tu samidhyamānavatīm samiddhavatīm ca antareṇa dhyāyyāḥ syuḥ iti sarvāsu sāmidhenīṣu satīsu dhyāyyā vacanāt viśiṣṭānām sāmidhenīnām dhāyyā śabdaḥ iti gamyate nanu pāṇinivacanāt viśeṣeṇa sarvāḥ dhāyyāḥ na iti āha viśiṣṭāsu api vacanam upapadyate eva yadi viśiṣṭāḥ tatas kā iti ucyate yāsu dhāyyā śabdaḥ śrūyate tāḥ tāvat dhāyyāḥ tāsu ca dhāyyāsu satīṣu vacanam arthavat bhavati arthavati ca sati vacane na anyāḥ dhāyyāḥ pramāṇa abhāvāt iti 
[I,571,i_I,571,ii]	uṣṇikkakubhoḥ ante darśanāt uṣṇih kakubhoḥ ca ante prayogaḥ dṛśyate yat jagatyā paridadhyāt antam yajñam gacchet atha yat triṣṭubhā paridadhāti na antam gacchati iti nanu triṣṭubh atra ante dṛśyate na uṣṇikkakubhau iti ucyate triṣṭubham eva ayam uṣṇikka kumau iti brūte katham triṣṭubhaḥ vīryam iti evam ante saṃstuteḥ triṣṭubhaḥ vai etat vīryam yat uṣṇih kakubhau iti kāraṇe kārya vat upacāraḥ kṛtaḥ 
[I,571,iii_I,571,iv]	stoma vivṛddhau bahiṣpavamāne purastāt paryāsāt āgantavaḥ syuḥ tathā hi iṣṭam dvādaśa ahe santi vivṛddha stomakāḥ kratavaḥ ekaviṃśena atirātreṇa prajā kāmam yājayeyuḥ triṇavena ojaskāmam trayastriṃśena pratiṣṭhā kāmam iti tatra āgamena saṃkhyā pūraṇam vakṣyate atha bahiṣpavamāne vaikṛteṣu ānīyamāneṣu bhavati saṃśayaḥ kim vaikṛtānām ante niveśaḥ uta prāk paryāsāt iti kim prāptam purastāt paryāsāt āgantavaḥ syuḥ tathā hi dṛṣṭam dvādaśa ahe stotrīya anurūpau tṛcau bhavataḥ vṛṣaṇvantaḥ tṛcāḥ bhavanti tṛcaḥ uttamaḥ paryāsaḥ iti iha api prāk paryāsāt āgantubhiḥ bhavitavyam 
[I,572,i_I,572,ii]	paryāsaḥ iti ca antā ākhyā prayāsa śabdaḥ ca anta vacanaḥ loke dṛśyate yathā kṣetra paryāsaḥ nadī paryāsaḥ iti evam paryāsaḥ ante kṛtaḥ bhaviṣyati 
[I,572,iii_I,572,iv]	ante vā tat uktam ante vaivaṃjātīyakam vaikṛtam syāt uktam ante tu bādarāyaṇaḥ iti 
[I,572,v_I,572,vi]	vacanāt tu dvādaśa ahe atha yat uktam tathā hi dṛṣṭam dvādaśa āhe iti tat parihartavyam atra ucyate vacanāt dvādaśa ahe bhavati stotrīya anurūpau tṛcau bhavataḥ vṛṣaṇvantaḥ tṛcāḥ bhavanti tṛcaḥ uttamaḥ paryāsaḥ iti na hi vacanasya atibhāraḥ asti 
[I,572,vii_I,572,viii]	atad vikāraḥ ca na ca ayam tad vikāraḥ yat tatas dharmān gṛhaṇīyāt iti 
[I,572,ix_I,572,x]	tad vikāre api apūrva tvāt yaḥ api tad vikāraḥ tatra api ante eva niveśaḥ kutas apūrvāt vṛṣaṇvatām tṛcānām vṛṣaṇvantaḥ eva prāc paryāsāt yāvat vacanam vācanikam na sadṛśam upasaṃkrāmati 
[I,572,xi_I,572,xii]	ante tu uttarayoḥ dadhyāt iha api vivṛddha stomakāḥ kratavaḥ udāharaṇam tatra uttarayoḥ pavamānayoḥ sāmnām āgamaḥ iti vakṣyate tatra agamyamāneṣu sāmasu saṃdehaḥ kim teṣām ante niveśaḥ uta gāyatrī bṛhatī anuṣṭupsu iti kim prāptam antaḥ uttarayoḥ dadhyāt uktaḥ atra nyāyaḥ ante bādarāyaṇaḥ iti tasmāt ante niveśaḥ iti 
[I,573,i_I,573,ii]	api vā gāyatrī bṛhatī anuṣupsu vacanāt gāyatrī bṛhatī anuṣṭu upsu niveśaḥ kasmāt vacanāt trīṇi ha vai yajñasya udarāṇi gāyatrī bṛhatī anuṣṭubh iti atra hi eva avapanti atas eva udvapanti iti vacanena asti upālambhaḥ tasmāt na eṣām ante niveśaḥ iti 
[I,573,iii_I,573,iv]	graha iṣṭakam aupānu vākyam savana citi śeṣaḥ syāt aupānu vākye kāṇḍe grahāḥ iṣṭakāḥ ca samāmnātāḥ eṣa vai haviṣā haviḥ yajate yaḥ dābhyam gṛhītvā somāya yajate iti tathā parā vai etasya āyuḥ prāṇaḥ eti yaḥ aśum gṛhṇāti iti tathā iṣṭakāḥ citriṇīḥ upadadhāti vajriṇīḥ upadadhāti bhūta iṣṭakā upadadhāti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim graha iṣṭakam aupānu vākyam savana śeṣaḥ citiśeṣaḥ ca atha kim kratu śeṣaḥ agni śeṣaḥ ca iti kim prāptam savana citi śeṣaḥ kutas grahaiḥ savanāni ārabhyante iṣṭakābhiḥ citayaḥ yat ca yena ārabhyate tat tat aṅgam 
[I,574,i_I,574,ii]	kratu agni śeṣaḥ vā codita tvāt acodana anupūrvasya kratu agniśeṣaḥ syāt kutas codita tvāt agniḥ cetavyaḥ śrūyate yaḥ evam vidvān agnim cinutaḥ iti na citiḥ cetavyā iṣṭakā cayanena agniḥ cetavyaḥ śrūyate agnim iti dvitīya anirdeśāt tathā yaḥ dābhyam gṛhītvā somāya yajate iti adābhyasya yajatinā saṃbandhaḥ tathā aṃśoḥ tasmāt sakṛt yāga saṃbandham kṛtvā kṛtārthaḥ śabdaḥ bhavati śrutam saṃbandham abhinirvartya tathā sakṛt agni saṃbandham kṛtvā kṛtī manyeta acodanā citi savanayoḥ na hi te kartavya tayā codyete para artham hi tayoḥ śravaṇam kim prayojanam savana citi śeṣa tve pratisavanam grahaṇam praticiti ca iṣṭakā upadhānam kratu agni śeṣa tve sakṛt grahaṇa upadhāne 
[I,574,iii_I,574,iv]	ante syuḥ avyavāyāt aupānu vākye śrūyate citriṇīḥ upadadhāti vajriṇīḥ upadadhāti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim etāḥ pañcabhyām citau upadheyāḥ uta madhyamāyām iti kim prāptam pañcabhyām eva iṣṭakāḥ kṛta kramāḥ anyāḥ na etābhiḥ vyaveṣyante 
[I,574,v_I,574,vi]	liṅga darśanāt ca āvapanam vā uttamā citiḥ anyā iṣṭakā upadadhāti iti 
[I,575,i_I,575,ii]	madhyamāyām tu vacanāt brāhmaṇavatyaḥ na eva etāntyāyām citau kasyām tarhi madhyamāyām kutas brāhmaṇavatyaḥ etāḥ iṣṭakāḥ tāsām madhyamā citiḥ āmnāyate yām vai kāṃcid brāhmaṇavatīm iṣṭakām abhijānīyāt tām madhyamāyām citau upadadhyāt iti nanu sarvāḥ eva iṣṭakāḥ brāhmaṇavatyaḥ na iti āha aparā liṅga kramāt samākhyānāt ca tasmāt etāḥ na ante syuḥ iti 
[I,575,iii_I,575,iv]	prāk lokaṃpṛṇāyāḥ tasyāḥ saṃpūraṇa artha tvāt aupānu vākye kāṇḍaḥ iṣṭakāḥ samāmnātāḥ vajriṇīḥ upadadhāti citriṇīḥ upadadhāti bhūta iṣṭakā upadadhāti iti tatra idam samadhigatam madhyamāyām citau upadheyāḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim prāk lokāṃpṛṇāyāḥ uta paścāt iti kim prāptam ante tu bādarāyaṇaḥ iti evam prāpte ucyate prāk lokaṃpṛṇāyāḥ tasyāḥ saṃpūraṇa artha tvāt saṃpūraṇa artha tā tasyāḥ śrūyate yat eva āsya ūnam yat chidram tat anayā pūrayati lokam pṛṇa chidram pṛṇaḥ iti apūrva tvāt vā arthasya vidhiḥ eva ayam saṃstavena iti gamyate tasmāt prāk lokaṃpṛṇāyāḥ syāt 
[I,576,i_I,576,iii]	saṃskṛte karma saṃskārāṇām tad artha tvāt ādhāne santi pavamāna iṣṭayaḥ santi ca niyatāni karmāṇi agnihotra ādīni aniyatāni ca aindra agna ādīni tatra saṃdehaḥ kim pavamāna iṣṭīḥ kṛtvā karmāṇi pratipattavyāni uta ahita mātreṣu agniṣu iti kim prāptam āhita pātreṣu iti kutas āhita mātreṣu asau agniṣu karmāṇi kartum samarthaḥ bhavati yathā āhitāgniḥ na klinnam dārvāḥ dadhyāt iti darśayati ca agnim vai sṛṣṭam agni hotreṇa anudravanti iti āhita mātreṣu agnihotram darśayati tasmāt na pavamāna iṣṭayaḥ pratīkṣitavyāḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ pavamāna iṣṭibhiḥ saṃskṛteṣu agniṣu karmāṇi varteran kutas saṃskārāṇām tad artha tvāt saṃskāra śabdāḥ ete āhavanīya ādayaḥ saṃskārasya kasyacid abhāvena āhavanīya ādiṣu pratipattiḥ syāt tasmāt saṃskṛteṣu agniṣu karmāṇi iti 
[I,576,iv_I,576,v]	anantaram vratam tad bhūta tvāt yat tu āhitāgniḥ na klinnam dārvāḥ dadhyāt iti evamādi yuktam yat āhita mātreṣu kriyate āhitāgneḥ tad vratam ucyate sa ca āhita mātreṣu āhitāgniḥ saṃvṛttaḥ tasmāt anantaram vratam syāt tad bhūta tvāt 
[I,576,vi_I,576,vii]	pūrvam ca liṅga darśanāt atha yat uktam āhita mātreṣu agnihotram darśayati pūrvam iṣṭibhyaḥ iti tasya kaḥ parihāraḥ iti ābhāṣā antam sūtram 
[I,577,i_I,577,ii]	artha vādaḥ vā arthasya vidyamāna tvāt artha vādaḥ eṣaḥ kutas arthasya vidyamāna tvāt vidyamānaḥ hi tatra anyaḥ eva agnihotra homaḥ katham hotavyam agni hotram na hotavyam iti mīmāṃsante brahma vādinaḥ yat yajuṣā juhuyāt ayathāpūrvam āhutī juhuyāt yadi na juhuyāt agniḥ parāpatet tūṣṇīm eva hotavyam iti tasya tūṣṇīm homasya praśaṃsā arthaḥ ayam artha vādaḥ 
[I,577,iii_I,577,iv]	nyāya vipratiṣedhāt ca nyāya vipratiṣedhaḥ ca bhavet yadi anantaram agni hotra ādayaḥ syuḥ yaḥ pūrva uktaḥ nyāyaḥ sa vipratiṣidhyeta na vā tāsām tad artha tvāt iti tasmāt saṃskṛte karmāṇi bhaveyuḥ iti 
[I,577,v_I,577,vi]	saṃcite tu agni cit yuktam prāpaṇāt nimittasya agni cit varṣati na dhāvet na striyam upeyāt tasmāt agni citāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ nāśitavyāḥ iti evamādayaḥ padārthāḥ śrūyante teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim saṃcita mātre pratipattavyāḥ uta kratu antaḥ iti kim prāptam saṃcita mātraḥ eva iti agnim yaḥ citavān saḥ agnicit iti tasya śrūyamāṇāḥ citavataḥ anantaram eva prāpnuvanti prāpte nimitte naimittikam kartavyam tasmāt anantaram eva 
[I,578,i_I,578,iii]	kratu ante vā prayoga vacana abhāvāt prayoga vacanaḥ hi atra tān padārthān prāpayati yeṣām kratu artha tvam na ca eṣām kratu artha tvam asti puruṣa arthāḥ hi ete katham pratiṣedhe puruṣaḥ śrūyate varṣati na dhāvet na striyam upeyāt iti evamādi na ca kratu arthāḥ ete prasaktāḥ yena pratiṣedhaḥ kratoḥ upakuryāt nanu puruṣa arthāḥ api citavataḥ śravaṇāt cayana anantaram prāptāḥ na iti brūmaḥ 
[I,578,iv_I,578,v]	agneḥ karma tva anirdeśāt agni artham cayanam tat yat agneḥ svam kāryam kurvataḥ sāhāyye vartate tat tad artham kaḥ ca tasya sva arthaḥ yāga asiddhiḥ siddhe ca yāge cayanena upakṛtam bhavati tasmāt siddhe yāge agni cit tena kratu antaḥ iti 
[I,578,vi_I,578,vii]	pareṇa āvedanāt dīkṣitaḥ syāt sarvaiḥ dīkṣā abhisaṃbandhāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet dīkṣiṣyamāṇaḥ iti tathā daṇḍena dīkṣayati mekhalayā dīkṣayati kṛṣṇājinena dīkṣayati iti evamādi tatra saṃdehaḥ kim sarvaiḥ dīkṣitaḥ bhavati atha veṣṭyante dīkṣitaḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam sarvaiḥ iti kutas dīkṣā abhisaṃbandhāt dīkṣā saṃbandhaḥ bhavati daṇḍena dīkṣayati dīkṣām asya karoti iti arthaḥ yadi iṣṭi ante dīkṣitaḥ syāt katham asya daṇḍena dīkṣām kuryāt tena iṣṭyā na dīkṣitaḥ na ca asya iṣṭi ante dīkṣita śabdam paśyāmaḥ āvedane tu asya dīkṣita śabdaḥ tasmāt na tāvati dīkṣitaḥ syāt na ca saṃbhavati samuccaye vikalpaḥ nyāyyaḥ pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt tatra prayoga vacanaḥ bādhyeta tasmāt bhinneṣu api dīkṣā saṃbandha vākyeṣu prayoga vacanena saha ekavākyatā iti āvedana kāle dīkṣitaḥ syāt 
[I,579,i_I,579,ii]	iṣṭi ante vā tad arthāḥ hi aviśeṣa artha saṃbandhāt iṣṭi ante vā dīkṣitaḥ syāt tad arthā hi sā dīkṣaṇa arthā katham dīkṣiṣyamāṇasya adīkṣitasya sā bhavati yadi tasyāḥ uttara kāle dīkṣitaḥ evam sā dīkṣiṣyamāṇasya tasmāt vākyāt avagamyate bhavati tadā dīkṣitaḥ iti dīkṣā kāraṇe padārthe nirvṛtte kim iti na dīkṣitaḥ syāt vākyam hi nirapekṣam dīkṣitaḥ iti jñāpayati 
[I,579,iii]	yat tu dīkṣā saṃbandhaḥ daṇḍena dīkṣayati iti katham sa dīkṣita tve syāt iti daṇḍena evam dīkṣitam saṃpādayati iti avagacchāmaḥ yat tu anantaram dīkṣita śabdaḥ na asti iti na śabdasya aprayogaḥ artha abhāve hetuḥ sati api arthe tad avasara abhāvāt na prayujyate śabdaḥ anyena ca dīkṣitaḥ iti avagamyate vākyena āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet dīkṣyamāṇaḥ iti yat ca āvedana kāle dīkṣita śabdaḥ iti iṣṭyante api dīkṣitasya asau aviruddhaḥ prayoga vacanaḥ ca aviruddhaḥ yatas ekam dīkṣā kāraṇam anyaiḥ dīkṣitam saṃpādayati iti gamyate 
[I,580,i_I,580,ii]	samākhyānam ca tadvat itas ca paśyāmaḥ iṣṭa dīkṣaṇa arthā iṣṭi ante ca pravṛttiḥ iti kasmāt samākhyānam ca tadvat iti yadvat nyāya upadiṣṭaḥ katham dīkṣaṇīyā iti tādarthya karī samākhyā bhavati yathā snānīyam bhojanīyam ca iti tasmāt ca paśyāmaḥ iṣṭiḥ dīkṣaṇa arthā iṣṭi ante ca pravṛttiḥ iti 
[I,580,iii_I,580,iv]	aṅga vat kratūnām ānupūrvyam iha kāmyāḥ iṣṭayaḥ udāharaṇam aindrāgnam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet iti evamādayaḥ gavā ādayaḥ somāḥ saumya ādayaḥ paśavaḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim yena krameṇa adhītāḥ tena eva krameṇa prayoktavyāḥ uta aniyamaḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam kratūnām ānupūrvyam yat pāṭhe tat eva prayoge bhavitum arhati evam pāṭha kramaḥ anugṛhītaḥ bhaviṣyati itarathā pāṭha kramaḥ bādhyeta tat mā bhūt iti krameṇa anuṣṭhātavyam 
[I,580,v_I,580,vi]	na vā asaṃbandhāt na vā ayam kramaḥ niyamyeta kutas asaṃbandhāt pṛthak pṛthak eṣām karmaṇām prayoga vacanāni tāni sva padārthānām upasaṃhārakāṇi yaḥ yasya na upakārakaḥ sa tasya na krameṇa na utkramaṇa yaḥ yasya upakaroti kasyacid tasya upakurvataḥ kramaḥ sāhāyye vartate na ca etāni karmāṇi anyonyasya upakurvanti tasmāt na eṣām kramaḥ sāhāyye vartate tasmāt asaṃbandhaḥ iti 
[I,581,i_I,581,ii]	kāmya tvāt ca kāmyāni ca etāni karmāṇi kāmāḥ ca krameṇa utpadyante tena nimittasya ākrama tvāt na kramavantaḥ iti 
[I,581,iii_I,581,iv]	ānarthakyāt na iti ced iti yat uktam pūrva pakṣe tat eva punar ucyate parihartum evam krameṇa pāṭhaḥ arthavān bhaviṣyati iti etat ābhāṣā antam sūtram 
[I,581,v_I,581,vi]	syāt vidyā artha tvāt yathā pareṣu sarva svārāt syāt arthavān krama pāṭhaḥ asati api prayoge krame vidyā grahaṇa artha tvāt karma avabodhana arthāyām vidyāyām krama niyama adṛṣṭam tad āśrayam eva bhaviṣyati iti yathā tvad pakṣe pareṣu sarva svārāt yasya api kramaḥ aṅgam iti pakṣaḥ tasya api sarva svārāt pareṣām sarva svāreṇa yaḥ kramaḥ tasya adṛṣṭa artha tā avaśyam kalpanīyā 
[I,581,vii_I,581,viii]	yaḥ etena iti agniṣṭomaḥ prakaraṇāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate eṣa vāva prathamaḥ yajñānām yat jyotiṣṭomaḥ yaḥ etena aniṣṭvā atha anyena yajeta gartapatyam eva tat jāyate pra vā mīyate iti tatra saṃdehaḥ yaḥ etena iti kasya ayam vādaḥ iti praśnena eva upakramaḥ ucyate yaḥ etena iti agniṣṭomasya vādaḥ kutas prakaraṇāt tasya hi prakaraṇe bhavati etat vacanam prakṛta vācīni ca sarva nāmāni bhavanti 
[I,582,i_I,582,ii]	liṅgāt ca liṅgam api bhavati tatra śrūyate yasya navati śatam stotrīyāḥ iti agniṣṭomasya hi bhavanti navati śatam stotrīyāḥ katham trivṛt bahiṣpavamānam pañcadaśāni ājyāni tāni catvāri sā ekonasaptatiḥ pañcadaśaḥ mādhyaṃdinaḥ pavamānaḥ tena caturaśītiḥ saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni tāni catvāri sa aṣṭaṣaṣṭiḥ caturaśītyā saha dvipañcāśat śatam saptadaśaḥ ārbhavaḥ pavamānaḥ tena ṣaṣṭi adhikam śatam nava ca ekaviṃśam yajñāyajñīyam iti tat etat navati śatam agniṣṭomasya tasmāt api agniṣṭomaḥ 
[I,582,iii_I,582,iv]	atha anyena iti saṃsthānām saṃnidhānāt atha anyena iti kim saṃsthānām vādaḥ atha jyotiṣṭoma vikārāṇām eva ekāha ādīnām iti kim tāvat prāptam saṃsthānām iti kutas saṃnidhānāt saṃnihitāḥ tasmin prakaraṇe saṃsthāḥ tāsām vādaḥ prakaraṇa anugrahāya 
[I,582,v_I,582,vi^1]	tad prakṛteḥ vā āpatti vihārau hi na tulyeṣu upapadyete tad prakṛteḥ vā gavādeḥ vādaḥ syāt āpatti vihārau hi prakṛti vikāra mātreṣu upapadyete na tulya śabdeṣu eva jyotiṣṭoma śabdakeṣu na evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate atha anyena jyotiṣṭoma śabdakena iti katham tarhi anyena iti prakṛtāt itarat bravīti na sa jyotiṣṭomena viśiṣyate na hi śabdasya arthaḥ samīpa gatena kṛta prayojanena eka deśe avasthāpayitavyaḥ bhavati na hi vākyena śrutiḥ bādhyate atha jyotiṣṭomāt anyena iti abhisaṃbadhyate tatas natarām saṃsthā vādaḥ katham punar āpatti vihārau prajāpatiḥ vā agniṣṭomaḥ saḥ uttarān eka ahān asṛjata te sṛṣṭvā abruvan na vai svena ātmanā prabhavāmaḥ iti 
[I,582,vi^2]	tebhyaḥ svātantryam prāyacchat tathā ca te prābhavan tat yathā vai idam agneḥ jātāt adhi agnayaḥ vihriyante evam vā etasmāt yajñāt anye yajña kratavaḥ vihriyante yaḥ vai trivṛt anyam yajña kratum āpadyate sa tam dīpayati yaḥ pañcadaśam sa tam yaḥ saptadaśam sa tam yaḥ ekaviṃśam sa tam iti evam āhuḥ ekaḥ yajñaḥ iti ete vai sarve jyotiṣṭomāḥ bhavanti iti evam vaikṛtānām saṃkīrtanāt teṣām eva vādaḥ iti gamyate katham atha anyena iti yaḥ asau anyaḥ tatra prākṛtān dharmān vihṛtān darśayati atas manyāmahe yasya yatas vihṛtiḥ tena anyena iti 
[I,583,i_I,583,ii]	praśaṃsā vā viharaṇa abhāvāt yadi evam na tarhi tad vikārāṇām vādaḥ tatra na vihāraḥ na āpattiḥ prakaraṇa ādibhiḥ te dharmāḥ jyotiṣṭomasya yadi hi gavā ādayaḥ vihriyeran prakaraṇa ādīni bādhyeran tad āpattiḥ pratyakṣa viruddhā praśaṃsā tu eṣā āpatti vihāra abhāvāt 
[I,584,i_I,584,ii]	vidhi pratyayāt vā na hi akasmāt praśaṃsā syāt atra ucyate yadi api āpatti vihārau na vidhīyete te tathā api ca udakena vidhīyete ye prakṛtau kartavyāḥ te ca udaka vacanāt vikṛtau api kartavyāḥ gamyante tad āpatti vihārau iva yatra bhavataḥ tena anyena iti gamyate na hi akasmāt praśaṃsā syāt yaḥ asau anyaḥ sa katham anayā praśaṃsayā lakṣyeta iti evam arthā praśaṃsā 
[I,584,iii_I,584,iv]	eka stome vā kratu saṃyogāt yaḥ etena aniṣṭvā atha anyena yajeta iti śrūyate tatra eṣaḥ arthaḥ samadhigataḥ tad vikārāṇām vādaḥ iti atha idānīm saṃdihyate kim eka stomakasya aneka stomakasya ca iti kim prāptam eka stomakasya vādaḥ kutas kratu saṃyogāt eka stome kratu saṃyogaḥ bhavati yaḥ vai trivṛt anyam yajña kratum āpadyate sa tam dīpayati yaḥ pañcadaśam sa tam yaḥ saptadaśam sa tam yaḥ ekaviṃśam sa tam trivṛt ādayaḥ eka stomakāḥ tasmāt teṣām vādaḥ iti 
[I,584,v_I,584,vi]	sarveṣām vā codanā viśeṣāt praśaṃsā stomānām sarveṣām ca eṣa vādaḥ eka stomakānām aneka stomakānām ca kutas aviśeṣa vacanāt anya śabdasya nanu eka stomakāḥ kratavaḥ saṃkīrtyante satyam saṃkīrtyante praśaṃsā artham na viśeṣa artham kaḥ punar praśaṃsā arthaḥ yaḥ vai trivṛt anyam yajña kratum āpadyate sa tam dīpayati ca udaka prāptāḥ dharmāḥ abhyastāḥ prakṛtau vikṛtau sukham pratipadyante 
[I,586,i_I,586,ii]	kramakaḥ yaḥ artha śabdābhyām śruti viśeṣāt artha paratvāt ca iha pāṭha kramasya śruti artha kramābhyām saha bādhām prati vicāraṇam kim pāṭha kramaḥ tābhyām tulyaḥ uta bādhyate iti kim prāptam tulya balau etau pāṭhaḥ api hi kāraṇam śruti arthau api na ca prāmāṇye kaścid viśeṣaḥ asti tasmāt aniyamaḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ pāṭha kramaḥ hi bādhyate śrutyā arthena ca kutas śruti viśeṣāt artha paratvāt ca śruti viśeṣaḥ kaḥ yatra śravaṇam tatra pratyakṣam kāraṇam pāṭha kramaḥ tu ānumānikaḥ pāṭha krameṇa smaraṇam evam abhinirvartayitavyam iti avagamyate tasya arthavat tvena ekayā upapattyā tasya eva anuṣṭhānam śrutyā punar anuṣṭhānam eva evam bhavati iti pratyakṣāt avagamyate 
[I,586,iii_I,586,iv]	tathā arthena kutas artha paratvāt artha artham hi sarvam pradhāna artham pradhānam abhinirvartayati iti sarvam kriyate tasmāt pāṭhaḥ tābhyām bādhyate kim udāharaṇam prayojanam ca śrutyām āśvinaḥ daśamaḥ gṛhyate tam tṛtīyam juhoti atra pāṭha kramasya balīyaḥ tve tṛtīyasya grahaṇam siddhānte tu daśamasya arthe agnihotra homaḥ pūrvam āmnāyate paścāt śrapaṇam evam kartavyam yadi pāṭhaḥ balavān siddhānte śrapaṇam pūrvam tatas homaḥ 
[I,587,i_I,587,ii]	avadāna abhighāraṇa āsādaneṣu ānupūrvyam pravṛttyā syāt staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra pūrvam dadhnaḥ dharmāḥ samāmnātāḥ paścāt āgneyasya pradānam ca āgneyasya pūrvam tatra saṃdehaḥ kim prāvṛttikena krameṇa pūrvam dadhnaḥ avadāna abhighāraṇa āsādanāni uta mukhya krameṇa pūrvam āgneyasya iti kim prāptam aniyamaḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ avadāna ādiṣu prāvṛttikena pūrvam dadhnaḥ iti kutas evam anujñātebhyaḥ vyavadhāyakebhyaḥ na abhyadhikaḥ anyaḥ vā vyavadhāyakaḥ kalpitaḥ bhaviṣyati darśayati ca dadhnaḥ pūrvam eva deyam iti 
[I,587,iii_I,587,iv]	yathā pradānam vā tad artha tvāt yathā pradānam vā kartavyāni yasya pradānam pūrvam tasya avadānāni pūrvam tasmāt āgneyasya kutas pradāna codanā gṛhīta tvāt avadāna ādīnām pradāna upakramāḥ ete na pṛthak padārthāḥ ete iti uktam abhighāraṇam avadānam ca tasya pradāna cikīrṣayā eva kriyate āsādanam api pradāna artham eva āsan akaraṇam evam dṛṣṭa artha tā bhavati tasmāt mukhya krameṇa aṅgānām prayogaḥ iti 
[I,587,v]	yat tu dadhnaḥ pūrvam pravṛttiḥ iti arthāt pūrvam pravṛttiḥ na pāṭhāt prāvṛttikāt ca mukhya kramaḥ balīyān mukhya krame gṛhyamāṇe prathamaḥ ekaḥ padārthaḥ viprakṛṣṭa kālaḥ syāt prāvṛttike punar gṛhyamāṇe sarveṣām viprakarṣaḥ tasmāt mukhya kramaḥ balīyān iti atha yat liṅgam uktam dadhnaḥ pūrvam avadeyam iti atra ucyate śṛta abhiprāyam etat bhaviṣyati tasmāt adoṣaḥ 
[I,588,i_I,588,ii]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam api asmin arthe bhavati sa vai dhruvām eva agre abhighārayati tatas hi prathamau ājya bhāgau yakṣyan bhavati iti tasmāt api mukhya krameṇa niyamaḥ iti 
[I,588,iii_I,588,iv]	vacanāt iṣṭi pūrva tvam iṣṭi pūrva tvam samānātam tatra saṃdehaḥ kim iṣṭi pūrva tvam soma pūrva tvam vā vikalpaḥ athavā iṣṭi pūrva tvam eva iti kim prāptam iṣṭi pūrva tvam eva syāt kutas vacanāt vacanam idam bhavati eṣa vai devarathaḥ yat darśa pūrṇamāsau yaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau iṣṭvā somena yajate ratha spaṣṭaḥ eva avasāne vare devānām avasyati iti na asti vacanasya ati bhāraḥ tasmāt iṣṭi pūrva tvam eva iti 
[I,588,v_I,588,vi]	somaḥ ca ekeṣām agni ādheyasya ṛtu nakṣatra atikrama vacanāt tad antena anarthakam hi syāt iṣṭi pūrva tvam iti etat gṛhṇīmaḥ kim tu somaḥ ca ekeṣām pūraḥ darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ syāt kutas agni ādheyasya ṛtu nakṣatra atikrama vacanāt yaḥ somena yakṣyamāṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta naṛtum sa pratīkṣet na nakṣatram iti yaḥ soma yāgam kartum ādadhīt sa na pratīkṣeta nakṣatram na api ṛtum tāvatī eva āt adhīta iti ānantaryam ucyate itarathā ṛtu nakṣatra atikrama vacanam anarthakam syāt ānantarye anapekṣyamāṇe yasya eva ṛtu nakṣatre ukte tasya eva tayoḥ anādaraḥ kīrtitaḥ syāt tasmāt asti somādhānayoḥ ānantaryam iti api ca vispaṣṭā ca ādyatanī vibhaktiḥ somena yakṣyamāṇaḥ iti sā ca na iṣṭi pūrva tvam anujñāya vivakṣyate na tadādyatana kāla vivakṣā tatra ayam śabdaḥ vipratiṣidhyeta tasmāt ānantarya vivakṣā iti avagamyate 
[I,589,i_I,589,ii]	tad artha vacanāt ca na aviśeṣāt tad artha tvam itas ca somādhānayoḥ ānantaryam kutas tad artha vacanāt yaḥ somena yajeta sa agnim ādadhīta iti ca sarvaiḥ api asau yakṣyamāṇaḥ agnim ādhatte somena agnihotra ādibhiḥ ca na asati somasya viśeṣe soma artha tā syāt ayam asau viśeṣaḥ syāt yat ānantaryam somādhānayoḥ iti 
[I,589,iii_I,589,iv]	ayakṣyamāṇasya ca pava māna haviṣām kāla nirdeśāt ānantaryāt viśaṅkā syāt somena ayakṣyamāṇasya ca pava māna haviṣām kālaḥ nirdiśyate yaḥ somena ayakṣyamāṇaḥ agnim ādadhīta sa purā saṃvatsarāt dhavīṃṣi nirvapet iti na khalu kaścid ayakṣyamāṇaḥ sarvasya vihita tvāt tasmāt anantaram ayakṣyamāṇaḥ iti gamyate 
[I,589,v_I,589,vi]	iṣṭiḥ ayakṣyamāṇasya tādarthye soma pūrva tvam idam prayojana sūtram varṇyate kṣīṇam adhikaraṇam kim prayojanam cintāyāḥ iṣṭiḥ ayakṣyamāṇasya somena nirabhisaṃdhikaḥ ādhāne tad artha tve tu soma pūrva tvam soma artha tāyām tu ādhānasya soma pūrva tvam syāt 
[I,590,i_I,590,ii]	utkarṣāt brāhmaṇasya somaḥ syāt asti ādhānam tatra eṣaḥ arhaḥ samadhigataḥ iṣṭi pūrva tvam soma pūrva tvam ca iti idānīm saṃdehaḥ kim trayāṇām varṇānām iṣṭi pūrva tvam soma pūrva tvam vā uta brāhmaṇasya soma pūrva tvam eva uta kevalā paurṇamāsī utkṛṣyate brāhmaṇasya ubhau kalpau iti atha vā karma antaram idam yat ūrdhvam somāt atha vā ekam haviḥ utkṛṣyate brāhmaṇasya ubhau eva kalpau iti kim prāptam trayāṇām varṇānām iṣṭi pūrva tvam soma pūrva tvam vā kutas aviṣeśāt na kiṃcid viśeṣam avagacchāmaḥ evam prāpte brūmaḥ brāhmaṇasya soma pūrva tvam syāt kasmāt utkarṣāt utkarṣaḥ hi śrūyate āgneyaḥ vai brāhmaṇaḥ devatayā sa somena iṣṭvā agnī somīyaḥ bhavati yat eva ādaḥ paurṇamāsam haviḥ tatra hi anunirvapet tarhi ubhaya devatyaḥ bhavati iti kim iva hi vacanam na kuryāt tasmāt brāhmaṇasya soma pūrva tvam eva iti 
[I,590,iii_I,590,iv]	paurṇamāsī vā śruti saṃyogāt yat uktam brāhmaṇasya soma pūrva tvam eva iti tat na tasya api ubhau kalpau kutas aviśeṣāt na hi kalpayoḥ brāhmaṇasya kaścid viśeṣaḥ āmnāyate nanu idānīm eva uktam brāhmaṇasya utkarṣaḥ iti na iti brūmaḥ paurṇamāsī mātrasya tatra utkarṣaḥ śruti saṃyogaḥ paurṇamāsyāḥ tatra yat eva ādaḥ paurṇamāsam haviḥ iti yāvat vacanam vācanikam tatra na nyāyaḥ kramate tulyayoḥ eka deśaḥ utkṛṣṭe nūnam aparaḥ api eka deśaḥ utkṛṣyate iti 
[I,591,i_I,591,ii]	sarvasya vā eka karmyāt yat ucyate kevalā paurṇamāsī utkṛṣyate iti tat na kṛtsnasya darśa pūrṇamāsa karmaṇaḥ utkarṣaḥ evam phalena saṃbandhaḥ itarathā na syāt phalam eka deśa tvāt paurṇamāsyāḥ kevalāyām utkṛṣyamāṇāyām avaśiṣṭasya pūrvatra kriyamāṇasya na phalam syāt eka deśa tvāt aphala tvāt ca uktam api na kriyeta samudāye ca utkṛṣyamāṇe bhavati phalam tasmāt arthāt samudāyasya utkarṣaḥ evam kṛtsnā upadeśaḥ arthavān bhaviṣyati iti tasmāt sarvasya utkarṣaḥ soma pūrva tvam eva brāhmaṇasya iti 
[I,591,iii_I,591,iv]	syāt vā vidhiḥ tad arthena na etat asti yat evam samudāyasya asati vacanaḥ utkarṣaḥ parikalpyeta tasmāt anyat eva evam nāmakam karma ūrdhvam somāt syāt evam eka deśasya aśrutam phalam na kalpayitavyam bhaviṣyati nāmadheyam tu dvayoḥ karmaṇoḥ ekam akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ iti yathā paurṇamāsa dharmakam vā karma antaram ca udyate iti karma vidhānam śruteḥ etat bhavati tat vākyasya bādhakam tasmāt karma antaram iti 
[I,591,v_I,591,vi]	prakaraṇāt tu kālaḥ syāt karma antarasya etat vācakam iti pramāṇa abhāvaḥ prakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ vācakam iti pratyakṣam yat ca sa pramāṇakam tat grāhyam anyāyaḥ ca aneka artha tvam dharma grahaṇe lakṣaṇā śabdaḥ śruti saṃbhave kalpyaḥ syāt api ca asya rūpam na gamyate rūpāvacanāt na karma antaram tasmāt prasiddhena nāmnā prakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ grahaṇam kāla vidhāna artham syāt phalavat tvāt ca kṛtsnasya utkarṣaḥ brāhmaṇasya ca tathā eva yat tu śrutiḥ vākyāt balīyasi iti atra ucyate yatra phalam na śrūyate vākya arthaḥ api tāvat tatra gṛhyate na ca iha phalasya śravaṇam asti kalpyam phalam iti yat ucyate na tat phala vacanam antareṇa tatra phala vacanaḥ śabdaḥ kalpyeta tena ca saha eka vākyatā kāla vacanena tu saha pratyakṣeṇa ekavākyatā iti tasmāt na karma antaram sthitam tāvat aparyavasitam adhikaraṇam 
[I,592,i_I,592,ii]	sva kāle syāt avipratiṣedhāt yaḥ somena yakṣyamāṇaḥ agnim ādadhīta naṛtum sa pratīkṣet na nakṣatram iti atra saṃdehaḥ kim ādhānasya ayam kāla viśeṣa bādhaḥ uta somasya iti kim prāptam ādhānasya kāla bādhaḥ sva kāle syāt somaḥ kutas avipratiṣedhāt aṅgam ādhānam tasya kāla bādhaḥ nyāyyaḥ na pradhānasya aṅga guṇa virodhe ca tādarthyāt iti vakṣyate 
[I,592,iii_I,592,iv]	apanayaḥ vā ādhānasya sarva kāla tvāt apanayaḥ vā ādhānāt soma kālasya syāt kutas ādhānasya sarva kāla tvāt na eva ādhāne kaścid kāla niyamaḥ asti yat ahar eva enam śraddhā upanamet tat ahar ādadhīta iti aprāptam eva tat ādhānasya yat pratiṣidhyate tasmāt somasya kāla bādhaḥ iti 
[I,593,i_I,593,ii]	paurṇamāsi ūrdhvam somāt brāhmaṇasya vacanāt sthitāt uttaram na vā etat asti kṛtsnau darśa pūrṇamāsau utkṛṣyete ūrdhvam somāt kevalā paurṇamāsī utkṛṣyate kutas vacanāt vacanam idam yat eva ādaḥ paurṇamāsam haviḥ tat tarhi anunirvapet iti na asti vacanasya ati bhāraḥ tasmāt paurṇamāsī mātram utkṛṣyeta yat tu phalam na asti iti samudāyāt eva phalam bhaviṣyati iti vacanāt evam vijñānāt tasmāt adoṣaḥ 
[I,593,iii_I,593,iv]	ekam śabda sāmarthyāt prāk kṛtsna vidhānāt ekam vā haviḥ utkṛṣyeta na kṛtsnā paurṇamāsī kutas śabda sāmarthyāt ekam haviḥ utkraṣṭum śabdaḥ samarthaḥ yat eva ādaḥ paurṇamāsam haviḥ iti śrūyate yāvat vacanam vācanikam tāvat vacanena utkraṣṭum śakyate na anyat api prāk somāt kṛtsnam vidhīyate tatas yat vacanena utkṛṣyate tat ūrdhvam somāt yat na utkṛṣyate tat prāk bhavitum arhati tasmāt ekam haviḥ utkraṣṭavyam brāhmaṇasya ubhau kalpau iti 
[I,593,v_I,593,vi]	puroḍāśaḥ tu anirdeśe tad yukte devatā bhāvāt idam śrūyate āgneyaḥ vai brāhmaṇaḥ devatayā sa somena iṣṭvā agnīṣomīyaḥ bhavati yat eva ādaḥ paurṇamāsam haviḥ tat tarhi anunirvapet tarhi ubhaya devatyaḥ bhavati iti yasmāt tasmin kāle saḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ bhavati na prācīne kāle tasmāt adaḥ haviḥ anunirvapet iti agnīṣomīyatvam vidhāya dvi devatāka tvam hetu tvena nirdiśyate tasmāt agnīṣomīyam haviḥ hetumat syāt na anya devatākam tadā asau agnīṣomau yaṣṭum arhati na prāk sā asya devatā iti bhavati puruṣasya api yaṣṭuḥ devatā abhisaṃbandhaḥ tasmāt puroḍāśaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ na anyat dhaviḥ iti siddham 
[I,594,i_I,594,ii]	ājyam api iti ced iti ced paśyasi agnīṣomīyatvāt puroḍāśaḥ iti ājyam api hi agnīṣomīyam tasmāt tat api utkṛṣyeta 
[I,594,iii_I,594,iv]	na miśra devata tvāt aindra agna vat miśradevatam hi ājyam agnīṣomīyam prājāpatyam vaiṣṇavam iti ca puroḍāśaḥ tu agnīṣomīya eva na tu atra miśra devatasya vādaḥ miśra devatasya hi prāk api bhāvaḥ avakalpyate yat api tadānīm yajamānaḥ na agniṣomīyaḥ tad devatā arhaḥ tathā api ājyam haviḥ kariṣyati eva prajāpatim yakṣyati viṣṇum vā tasmāt tasya ūrdhva bhāve naḥ eṣa hetuḥ agnīṣomīyatvam nāma yathā caturdhā karaṇam miśra devata tvāt aindra agnena bhavati tadvat tatra āgneyaḥ iti aindrāgnaḥ na śakyate vaditum tat dhitaḥ sa ākāṅkṣāt na utpadyate iti evam iha agnīṣomīya śabdena na śakyam ājyam vaditum agnīṣomīyaḥ hi asau tasmāt śakyam prāk yajamānena kartum iti tasmāt na tasya utkarṣe agnīṣomīyatā yajamānasya hetuḥ iti miśra devatasya grahaṇa sāmānyāt aindra agna vat iti uktam 
[I,595,i_I,595,ii]	vikṛteḥ prakṛti kāla tvāt sadyaskāla uttarā vikṛtiḥ tayoḥ pratyakṣa śiṣṭa tvāt iha vaikṛtāni karmāṇi udāharaṇam aindrāgnam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet iti evamādīni tatra saṃdehaḥ kim etāḥ vikṛtayaḥ sadyaskālāḥ uta dvi aha kālāḥ iti kim prāptam vikṛtiḥ prākṛtān dharmān ca udakena gṛhṇāti atas te dharmāḥ ānumānikāḥ paurṇamāsī ca anyaḥ kālaḥ sa yadi vā prakṛtyā gṛhyeta yadi vā vikṛtyā asaṃbhave anyatarasyāḥ kālaḥ tyaktavyaḥ tatra anumānikaḥ vaikṛtasya tyajyatām na pratyakṣa śrutaḥ prākṛtasya iti nyāyyam tasmāt sadyaskālāḥ etāḥ vikṛtayaḥ bhaveyuḥ iti 
[I,595,iii_I,595,iv]	dvaiyahakālye tu yathānyāyam dvaiyahakālye kriyamāṇe yathānyāyam kṛtam bhavati tasmāt dvaiyahakālyam syāt ca udakaḥ tathā anugṛhītaḥ bhavati prakṛtau hi śrūyate pūrvedyus agnim gṛhṇāti uttaram ahar devatām yajati iti tasmāt dvi ahakālam ekam abhinirvartyam tat ahar eva upakramya aparedyus parisamāpayet 
[I,595,v_I,595,vi]	vacanāt vā eka kālyam syāt na etat evam dvi aha kālāḥ vikṛtayaḥ bhaveyuḥ iti sadyaskālāḥ syuḥ kasmāt vacanam idam bhavati iṣṭyā paśunā somena āgrayaṇena vā yakṣyamāṇaḥ sa paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām vā yajeta iti sāṅgasya etat vacanam tasmāt sāṅgam paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām vā kurvīta iti gamyate tena sadyaskālāḥ vikṛtayaḥ 
[I,596,i_I,596,ii]	sāṃnāyya agnīṣomīya vikārāḥ ūrdhvam somāt prakṛti vat iha sāṃnāyya vikārāḥ ca agnīṣomīya vikārāḥ ca udāharaṇam sāṃnāyya vikārāḥ tāvat yathā āmikṣā paśuḥ iti agnīṣomīyam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet śyāmākam brāhmaṇaḥ vasante brahmavarcaskāmaḥ iti evamādyaḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ete prāk ūrdhvam ca somāt uta ūrdhvam iti kim prāptam prāk ūrdhvam ca viśeṣān avagamāt evam prāpte brūmaḥ ūrdhvam somāt syuḥ iti prakṛtiḥ hi eṣām ūrdhvam somāt ca udakena ebhiḥ api ūrdhvam somāt bhavitavyam sānnāyyasya ūrdhvam somāt vacanena asoma yājī saṃnayet iti agnīsomīyasya api āgneyaḥ vai brāhmaṇaḥ devatayā sa somena iṣṭvā bhavati yat eva ādaḥ paurṇamāsam haviḥ tat tarhi anunirvapet iti tarhi saḥ ubhaya devatyaḥ bhavati iti tad vikṛtiḥ api somāt ūrdhvam bhavitum arhati 
[I,596,iii_I,596,iv]	tathā soma vikārāḥ darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām soma vikārāḥ gavā ādayaḥ eka ahāḥ teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim darśa pūrṇamāsāt prāk ūrdhvam ca prayoktavyāḥ uta ūrdhvam iti kim prāptam aniyamaḥ aviśeṣāt evam prāpte brūmaḥ tathā soma vikārāḥ darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām ūrdhvam syuḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām ūrdhvam bhavati darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeta iti ca udakena eṣa dharmaḥ gavā ādiṣu api eka aheṣu prāpnoti tasmāt te api darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām ūrdhvam kartavyāḥ iti 
[I,598,i_I,598,iii]	dravyāṇām karma saṃyoge guṇa tvena abhisaṃbandhaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti evamādi samāmnāyate tatra saṃdehaḥ kim svargaḥ guṇataḥ karma pradhānataḥ uta karma guṇataḥ svargaḥ pradhānataḥ iti kutas saṃśayaḥ iha svarga kāmaḥ api nirdiśyate yajeta iti api atra svarga kāma yāgayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ gamyate tasmin ca saṃbandhe kim yāgaḥ sādhana tvena saṃbadhyate uta sādhya tvena iti bhavati vicāraṇā tatra yadi svarga kāmasya puruṣasya yāgaḥ kartavya tayā codyate svarga kāmena yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ iti svarga icchā viśiṣṭasya sa sidhyati iti gamyate svarga icchā tatra puruṣasya yāgam pratyupadiśyate tena tasya sa sidhyati na anyasya iti yaḥ svarga kāmaḥ sa śaknoti puruṣaḥ yāgam sādhayitum 
[I,598,iv]	atha svarga kāmasya kāmaḥ kartavya tayā codyate tatas yāga viśiṣṭā kartavyatā iti yāgaḥ sādhakaḥ abhyupagamyate sa ca ayam ubhayoḥ api arthaḥ ekasmāt uccaritāt vākyāt gamyate yāgaḥ vā kartavyaḥ kāmaḥ vā iti na ca etat yaugapadyena saṃbhavati yadā kāmaḥ na tadā yāgaḥ yadā yāgaḥ na tadā kāmaḥ vacana vyakti bhedāt upapannaḥ saṃśayaḥ tathā idam aparam saṃdigdham kim prītiḥ svargaḥ uta dravyam iti yadi dravyam svargaḥ tatas pradhānam karma dravyam guṇa bhūtam atha prītiḥ svargaḥ tatas yāgaḥ guṇa bhūtaḥ svargaḥ pradhānam iti kutas saṃśayaḥ na asti atra kāmasya guṇa tvena prādhānyena vā śrutiḥ saṃbandha mātram tu asya yāgena gamyate dravyasya tu karma artha tā svabhāvataḥ puruṣa prayatnasya ca phala artha tā 
[I,599,i]	kim tāvat prāptam svargaḥ guṇataḥ karma pradhānataḥ iti tatra tāvat varṇayanti dravyam svargaḥ iti katham avagamyate sarveṣām eva śabdānām artha jñāne laukikaḥ prayogaḥ abhyupāyaḥ tasmin ca laukike prayoge dravya vacanaḥ svarga śabdaḥ lakṣyate kauśikāni sūkṣmāṇi vāsāṃsi svargaḥ candanāni svargaḥ dvi aṣṭa varṣāḥ striyaḥ svargaḥ iti yat yat prītimat dravyam tat tat svarga śabdena ucyate tena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt prītimat dravyam svargaḥ iti mānyām ahe upamānāt śabda pravṛttiḥ iti ced na hi kasmiṃścid anupamite loke prasiddhaḥ yasya etat upamānam syāt tasmāt na upamānam atas dravyam svargaḥ iti 
[I,599,ii_I,599,iii]	na iti āha prītiḥ svargaḥ iti na dravyam vyabhicārāt tat eva hi dravyam kasyāṃcid avasthāyām na svarga śabdaḥ abhidhāti prītim tu na kasyāṃcid avasthāyām na na abhidadhāti tasmāt anvaya vyatirekābhyām etat avagamyate prītau svarga śabdaḥ vartate iti na etat asti prīteḥ abhidhāyakaḥ svarga śabdaḥ iti kutas viśeṣaṇa tvāt yat viśeṣaṇam na tat śabdena ucyate tat yathā daṇḍī iti daṇḍa nimittaḥ puruṣa vacanaḥ daṇḍaḥ asya nimittam nābhidheyaḥ evam eṣa na prīti vacanaḥ prīti sādhana vacanaḥ tu eṣa svarga śabdaḥ iti 
[I,600,i_I,600,ii]	nanu svarga śabdaḥ loke prasiddhaḥ viśiṣṭe deśe yā asmin na uṣṇam na śītam na kṣudh na tṛṣṇā na aratiḥ na glāniḥ puṇya kṛtaḥ eva pretya tatra gacchanti na anye atra ucyate yadi tatra kecid amṛtvā gacchanti tatas āgacchanti ajanitvā na tarhi sa pratyakṣaḥ deśaḥ evaṃjātīyakaḥ na tu anumānāt gamyate nanu ca anye siddhāḥ kecid dṛṣṭavantaḥ te ca ākhyātavantaḥ iti ced na tatra pramāṇam asti siddhāḥ evaṃjātīyakāḥ santi te ca dṛṣṭvā ācakṣīran iti tasmāt evaṃjātīyakaḥ deśaḥ eva na asti 
[I,600,iii]	nanu ca lokāt ākhyānebhyaḥ vedāt ca avagamyate deśaḥ evaṃjātīyakaḥ svargaḥ iti tat na puruṣāṇām evaṃvidhena deśena asaṃbandhāt apramāṇam vacaḥ ākhyānam api puruṣa praṇīta tvāt anādaraṇīyam vaidikam api svarga ākhyānam vidhi param na asti eva bhavati tu vidhi antareṇa eka vākya bhūtam stuti param yadi api kevala sukha śravaṇa artha āpattyā tādṛśaḥ deśaḥ syāt tathā api asmad pakṣasya avirodhaḥ prīti sādhane svarga śabdaḥ iti tena deśena vyavahāra abhāvāt kutas tasya abhidhāyakaḥ svarga śabdaḥ bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,600,iv]	yadā prītimat dravyam svargaḥ tadā brūmaḥ dravyāṇām karma saṃyoge guṇa tvena abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti yāgaḥ atra kartavyaḥ iti śrūyate svarga kāmasya tatra avaśyam svargasya yāgasya ca saṃbandhaḥ tatra bhūtam dravyam bhavyam karma bhūtasya ca bhavya artha tā nyāyyā dṛṣṭa artha tvāt na tu bhavyasya bhūtārtha tā tatra dṛṣṭaḥ upakāraḥ tyajyeta 
[I,600,v]	katham punar avagamyate yāgaḥ kartavya tayā ca udyate iti yadā kāmasya api kartavyatā asmāt vākyāt avagamyate ucyate kāmasya kartavyatā vākyāt yaji arthasya kartavyatā śruteḥ śrutiḥ ca vākyāt balīyasī tasmāt ayam arthaḥ svarga kāmaḥ yāgam kuryāt iti svarga kāmasya yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ iti kartavyaḥ ca sukhavān akartavyaḥ duḥkhavān kartavyaḥ iti ca enam brūte tasmāt sukhaphalaḥ yāgaḥ bhaviṣyati sa tu yasya icchā tasya sidhyati na anyasya iti gamyate tena svarga icchā yāgasya guṇa bhūtā sarvasya api karmaṇaḥ dravya icchā bhavati guṇa bhūtā tayā dravyam ānetum yatate dṛṣṭena eva dvāreṇa iha tu svarga saṃjñaka dravya icchā eva niyamyate yathā eva sā guṇa bhūtā prāptā tathā eva sati niyamyate dṛṣṭena eva dvāreṇa na adṛṣṭena upakāreṇa tena svarga īchayā guṇa bhūtayā svarga dravyam prati yatiṣyate yāgam sādhayitum atha api adṛṣṭena tathā api na doṣaḥ 
[I,601,i_I,601,ii]	asādhakam tu tādarthyāt tuśabdena pakṣaḥ vyāvartyate tatas etāvat tāvat varṇayanti prītiḥ svargaḥ iti kutas evam uktam bhavatā prīti viśiṣṭe dravye svarga śabdaḥ vartate iti yadi evam pūrvam tarhi prītau vartitum arhati tām hi sa na vyabhicarati vyabhicarati punar dravyam yasya eva prīti sādhanasya dravyasya vaktā svarga śabaḥ tat eva yadā na prīti sādhanam bhavati tadā na svarga śabdena abhidhīyate tasmāt prīti vacanaḥ ayam 
[I,601,iii_I,601,iv]	yat tu uktam daṇḍi śabda vat iti saḥ api prīte śabdāt daṇḍe daṇḍini pratyayam ādadhāti antargataḥ tatra daṇḍa śabdaḥ sa daṇḍasya vācakaḥ iha punar svarga śabdaḥ eva prīteḥ abhidhātā prīti vacanaḥ ced yāgaḥ guṇa bhūtaḥ prītiḥ pradhānam kutas tādarthyāt puruṣa prayatnasya prīti artham hi puruṣaḥ yatate tena na prītiḥ yāga sādhanam iti vijñāyate dravyam hi yāga sādhanam na ṛte dravyāt yāgaḥ bhavati yasmāt dravya devatā kriye yajati śabdaḥ vartate asatyām api prītyām bhavati yāgaḥ yadi ca yāgaḥ na prīti arthaḥ bhavet asādhakam karma bhavet sādhayitāram na adhigacchet yaḥ hi prīti arthaḥ sa śadhyate na anyaḥ 
[I,602,i]	nanu kartavya tayā yāgaḥ śrūyate ucyate satyam kartavya tayā śrūyate kāmaḥ api kartavya tayā avagamyate āha śrutyāḥ yāgasya vākyena kāmasya na ca ubhayoḥ vākya bhedaḥ prasaṅgāt ucyate yadi api yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ śrūyate tathā api na kartavyaḥ sukha daḥ kartavyaḥ bhavati duḥkha daḥ yāgaḥ tasmāt pratyakṣeṇa ākartavyaḥ pratyakṣeṇa ca duḥkha daḥ kartavyatā vacanāt anumānena sukha daḥ bhavati iti ucyate anumānam ca pratyakṣa virodhāt na pramāṇam tasmāt akartavyaḥ yāgaḥ yadi na prīti arthaḥ 
[I,602,ii]	atha anyena phala vacanena saṃbhantsyate iti ucyate saṃbadhyamānaḥ api avidhīyamānaḥ na samīpa vacana mātreṇa phalavān vijñāyate tasmāt anarthakaḥ mā bhūt iti svargasya kartavyatā gamyate puruṣa prayatnaḥ ca yāga viśiṣṭaḥ iti yāgaḥ tasya karaṇam syāt tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam yāgaḥ guṇa bhūtaḥ svargaḥ pradhāna bhūtaḥ iti 
[I,602,iii_I,602,iv]	pratyartham ca abhisaṃyogāt karmataḥ hi abhisaṃbandhaḥ tasmāt karma upadeśaḥ syāt na kevalam ānarthakya bhayāt yāgasya guṇa bhāvam brūmaḥ kim tarhi svarga saṃjñakam artham prati karaṇa tvena yāgaḥ vidhīyate nanu yāgaḥ kartavya tayā śrutyā vidhīyate satyam evam ānarthakyam tu tathā bhavati svargam pratyavihite yāge svarga kāmaḥ tasmin niṣphale vidhīyamānaḥ api niṣprayojanaḥ syāt tatra āsya upadeśa vaiyarthyam dvayoḥ ca vidhīyamānayoḥ paraspareṇa asaṃbaddhayoḥ vākya bhedaḥ prasaṅgaḥ atas na svarga kāma padena sva arthaḥ vidhīyate kim tarhi uddiśyate tatra vākyāt avagatasya kāmasya kartavyatā avagamyate yāgasya ca karaṇa tā evam ca yāga kartavyatāyām na pratyakṣa virodhaḥ bhaviṣyati tasmāt karma upadeśaḥ syāt karma svargam prati upadiśyate na svargaḥ karma prati 
[I,603,i_I,603,iii]	kim atas yadi svargaḥ na upadiśyate etat atas bhavati na hi anupadiṣṭaḥ artha prāptaḥ ca guṇaḥ bhavati tasmāt svargaḥ pradhānataḥ karma guṇataḥ iti api ca yasya svargaḥ iṣṭaḥ syāt sa yāgam nirvartyet iti asaṃbaddham iva anyat icchati anyat karoti iti atha matam tatas svargaḥ bhavati iti saṃbandhāt idam gamyate iti na śabda pramāṇa kāmām antareṇa śabdam avagatiḥ nyāyyā vākyāt eva asmāt imam saṃbandham avagacchāmaḥ yathā kāṣṭhāni āhartu kāmaḥ araṇyam gacchet iti yadi brūyāt brūyāt etat dṛṣṭam tatra pramāṇa antareṇa araṇya āgamanasya kāṣṭha āharaṇa sāmarthyam vidyate iti 
[I,603,iv]	atha manyate upadeśa ānarthakyam mā bhūt iti arthāpattiḥ bhaviṣyati iti ucyate na upadeśa anarthakyasya etat sāmarthyam yat antareṇa phala vacanam yāgasya prītiḥ phalam avagamyeta kāmam asya ānarthakyam bhavatu na jātucit sāmarthyam asya jāyate na hi dagdhu kāmasya udaka upādānam asati dāhe anarthakam iti dahana śaktim asya janayet atha vā svarga kāmasya yāgaḥ vidhīyate iti pakṣa antara avalambena asya arthavattā bhaviṣyati 
[I,603,v]	nanu itarasmin api pakṣe svarga kāmasya yāgaḥ vidhīyate na yāgāt svargaḥ na etat evam tasmin khalu pakṣe svargam prārthayamānasya anuṣṭhānam anūdya yāgaḥ tasya upāya tvena vidhīyate iti na doṣaḥ tat anuṣṭhānam svargam prati iti na asti vacanam iti ced iṣṭam artham prati anuṣṭhānam bhavati svarga kāmasya ca svargaḥ iṣṭaḥ tad anuṣṭhāna viśeṣa grahaṇa artham eva svarga kāma viśeṣaṇa grahaṇam iti niravadyam tasmāt svarga kāmasya yāga karma upadeśaḥ syāt atas svargaḥ pradhānataḥ karma guṇataḥ iti svarga kāmam adhikṛtya yajeta iti vacanam iti adhikāra lakṣaṇam idam siddham bhavati 
[I,604,i_I,604,ii]	phala artha tvāt karmaṇaḥ śāstram sarva adhikāram syāt idam āmnananti darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti evamādi tatra saṃdehaḥ kim yāvat kiṃcid sattvam tat sarvam adhikṛtya etat ucyate uta samartham adhikṛtya iti kim prāptam sarva adhikāraḥ aviśeṣāt nanu vṛkṣa ādayaḥ na kiṃcid kāmayante katham teṣām adhikāraḥ syāt ucyate mā bhūt acetanānām tiraścaḥ tu adhikṛtya yajeta iti brūyāt nanu tiryaṃcaḥ api na kiṃcid kāmayante na iti brūmaḥ kāmayante sukham evam hi dṛśyate dharma upataptāḥ chāyām upasarpanti śītena pīḍitāḥ ātapam 
[I,604,iii]	āha nanu tiryaṃca āsannam phalam cetayante na kāla antara phalam prārthayante kāla antara phalāni ca vaidikāni karmāṇi ucyate kāla antare api phalam kāmayamānāḥ lakṣyante śunaḥ caturdaśyām upavasataḥ paśyāmaḥ śyenān ca aṣṭamyām na ca eṣām vyādhi āśaṅkā niyata nimitta tvāt nānā āhārāṇām api tasmin kāle darśanāt samāna āhārāṇām api anyasmin kāle adarśanāt liṅgāni ca vede bhavanti devāḥ vai satram āsatā iti evamādīni devatānām ṛṣīṇām vanaspatīnām adhikāram darśayanti 
[I,605,i]	nanu kārtsnyena vidhim upasaṃhartum na śaknuvanti iti anadhikṛtāḥ ucyate yāgam kartum śaknuvanti kecid tasmāt yajeta iti evamādīni adhikariṣyanti śaknuvataḥ viṣṇukrama ādi vacanāni tu aśaktān na adhikariṣyanti tatra yaḥ anupadiṣṭa viṣṇukrama ādikaḥ sa kevalam yāgam kariṣyati kaḥ tasya doṣaḥ dravya parigrahaḥ api deva grāmaḥ hastigrāmaḥ ṛṣabhasya grāmaḥ iti upacārāt asti eva iti tasmāt amanuṣyāṇām api śaknuvatām adhikāraḥ iti 
[I,605,ii_I,605,iii]	kartuḥ vā śruti saṃyogāt vidhiḥ kārtsnyena gamyate vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na ca etat asti tiryak ādīnām api adhikāraḥ iti kasya tarhi yaḥ samarthaḥ kṛtsnam karma abhinirvartayitum na ca ete śaknuvanti tiryak ādayaḥ kṛtsnam karma abhinirvartayitum tasmāt eṣām na sukhasya abhyupāyaḥ karma iti katham yaḥ na śakyate kartum saḥ abhyupāyaḥ syāt iti na devānām devatā antara abhāvāt na hi ātmānam upadiśya tyāgaḥ saṃbhavati tyāgaḥ eva asau na syāt na ṛṣīṇām ārṣeya abhāvāt na bhṛgu ādayaḥ bhṛgu ādibhiḥ sagotrāḥ bhavanti na ca eṣām sāmarthyam pratyakṣam api ca niryañcaḥ na kāla antara phalena arthinaḥ āsannam hi te kāmayante 
[I,606,i]	nanu ca uktam kāla antara phala arthinaḥ tiraścaḥ paśyāmaḥ śunaḥ śyenān caturdaśyām aṣṭabhyām ca upavasate iti ucyate na janma antara phala arthinaḥ upavasanti katham avagamyate veda adhyayana abhāvāt ye vedam adhīyate te etat viduḥ idam karma kṛtvā idam phalam amutra prāpnoti iti na ca ete vedam adhīyate na api smṛti śāstrāṇi na api anyebhyaḥ avagacchanti tasmāt na vidanti dharmam avidvāṃsaḥ katham anutiṣṭheyuḥ tasmāt na dharmāya upavasanti iti 
[I,606,ii]	kim artham tarhi eṣām upavāsaḥ ucyate rogāt aruciḥ eṣām katham punar niyate kāle rogaḥ bhavati ucyate niyata kālāḥ api rogāḥ bhavanti yathā tṛtīyakāḥ cāturthakāḥ ca iti tasmāt manuṣyāṇām adhikāraḥ iti na ca tiraścām dravya parigrahaḥ na hi ete dravyam sva icchayā upayuñjānāḥ dṛśyante tasmāt anīśānā dhanasya yat tu deva grāmaḥ hastigrāmaḥ iti upacāra mātram tat tasmāt api na tiraścām adhikāraḥ iti 
[I,606,iii]	yāni punar liṅgāni devāḥ vai satram āsata iti evamādīni artha vādāḥ te vidhi prarocana arthāḥ vidyate hi vidhiḥ anyaḥ teṣu sarveṣu na ca vidheḥ vidhinā eka vākya bhāvaḥ bhavati vacana vyakti bhedāt stutiḥ tu sā ittham nāma satrāṇi āsitavyāni yat kṛtakṛtyāḥ api āsate devāḥ āsanna cetanāḥ api tiryañcaḥ acetanāḥ api vanaspatayaḥ kim aṅga punar vidvāṃsaḥ manuṣyāḥ iti 
[I,606,iv_I,607,i]	nanu viṣṇukrama ādiṣu anadhikṛtāḥ kevalam yāgam kariṣyanti na evam guṇāḥ yāgam prati upadiśyante na kartāram prati tena yāga mātre kriyamāṇe vaiguṇyam iti na phala saṃbandhaḥ syāt katham punar yāgam prati upadiśyante iti ced itikartavya tā kāṅkṣasya yāga vacanasya antikāt upanipatitāḥ śaknuvanti tam nirākāṅkṣīkartum itarathāḥ hi kartṝn adhikurvatsu guṇa vacaneṣu anivṛtta ākāṅkṣam phala vacanam anarthakam eva syāt anuṣaṅgaḥ ca phala vacanam abhiviṣyat tatra sa ākāṅkṣa tvāt vākyam uparotsyate atha etat eva vākyam samarthānām sa guṇam karma vidhāsyati asamarthānām viguṇam iti tat na sakṛt uccāraṇaḥ ubhaya śakti virodhāt vākyam bhidyeta sa ākāṅkṣam hi tat itikartavya tām prati tasmāt sa aṅga yāga upadeśaḥ saḥ iti niraṅga yāga upadeśa abhāvaḥ tasmāt manuṣyāṇām eva adhikāraḥ iti prayojanam pakṣa uktam kecid āhuḥ sahasra saṃvatsaram karma na niyogataḥ divaseṣu kalpayitavyam pūrva pakṣe tad āyuṣām devatā ādīnām saṃbhavāti iti siddhānte tatra saṃbhavat api divaseṣu eva kalpayitavyam iti tat tu upariṣṭāt vyākhyāsyāmaḥ 
[I,607,ii_I,607,iii]	liṅga viśeṣa nirdeśāt puṃyuktam aitiśāyanaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti evamādi samāmnāyate tatra saṃdehaḥ kim svarga kāmam pumāṃsam adhikṛtya yajeta iti eṣa śabdaḥ uccaritaḥ atha vā aniyamaḥ striyam pumāṃsam ca iti kim prāptam puṃliṅgam adhikṛtam mene aitiśāyanaḥ kutas liṅga viśeṣa nirdeśāt puṃliṅgena viśeṣeṇa nirdeśaḥ bhavati svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti tasmāt pumān uktaḥ yajeta iti na strī 
[I,608,i_I,608,iii]	tad ukti tvāt ca doṣa śrutiḥ avijñāte avijñāte garbhe hate bhrūṇa hatyā anuvādaḥ bhavati tasmāt avijñātena garbheṇa hatena bhrūṇa hā bhavati iti bhrūṇa hā pāpa kṛttamaḥ yaḥ ca ubhayoḥ lokayoḥ upakaroti tasya hantā bhrūṇā hā yajñahantā bhrūṇa hā sa yajña sādhana badha kārī tasmāt yajñam bhrūṇa śabdena abhidadhāti sa hi bibharti vā sarvam bhūtim vā ānayati atas bhrūṇa hā yajña badha kārī sa puṃyukta tvāt anuvādaḥ avakalpate avijñāte garbhe hanyamāne kadācid pumān hanyeta tatra yajña adhikṛtasya hata tvāt yajña badhaḥ bhrūṇa hatyā syāt itarathā yadi ubhayoḥ adhikāraḥ tatas vijñāte ca avijñāte ca yajña vadhaḥ syāt tatra avijñāta grahaṇam atantram iti kalpyeta tasmāt vivakṣitā puṃliṅgasya vācikā vibhaktiḥ iti tathā ātreyīm hatvā bhrūṇa hā bhavati ātreyīm āpanna garbhām āhuḥ atra kukṣau asyāḥ vidyate iti ātreyī tasmāt api puṃsaḥ adhikāraḥ gamyate yathā paśum ālabheta iti puṃpaśuḥ eva ālabhyate liṅga viśeṣa nirdeśāt evam iha api draṣṭavyam iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ 
[I,608,iv_I,608,v]	jātim tu bādarāyaṇaḥ aviśeṣāt tasmāt strī api pratīyeta jāti arthasya aviśiṣṭa tvāt tuśabaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na etat asti puṃsaḥ eva adhikāraḥ iti jātim tu bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ adhikṛtām manyate sma āha kim ayam svarga kāmaḥ iti jāti śabdaḥ samadhigataḥ na iti āha katham tarhi yaugikaḥ svarga icchā yogena vartate kena tarhi śabdena jātiḥ uktā yā adhikṛtā iti gamyate na eva ca vayam brūmaḥ jāti vacanaḥ iha śabdaḥ adhikārakaḥ iti kim tarhi svarga kāma śabdena ubhau api strīpuṃsau adhikriyete iti atas na vivakṣitam puṃliṅgam iti kutas aviśeṣāt na hi śaknoti eṣā vibhaktiḥ svarga kāmam liṅgena viśeṣṭum katham lakṣaṇa tvena śravaṇāt svarge kāmaḥ yasya tam eṣa lakṣayati śabdaḥ tena lakṣaṇena adhikṛtaḥ yajeta iti śabdena ucyate tat ca lakṣaṇam aviśiṣṭam striyām puṃsi ca tasmāt śabdena ubhau api strīpuṃsau adhikṛtau iti gamyate tatra kena adhikāraḥ striyā nivartyate 
[I,609,i]	vibhaktyā iti ced tat na kasmāt puṃvacana tvāt strī nivṛttau aśaktiḥ puṃsaḥ vibhaktyā punarvacanam anarthakam iti ced na ānarthakye api strī nivṛtteḥ abhāvaḥ parisaṃkhyāyām sva artha hāniḥ para artha kalpanā prāpta bādhaḥ ca na ca ānarthakyam nirdeśa artha tvāt tasmāt strī api pratīyeta jāti arthasya aviśiṣṭa tvāt 
[I,609,ii_I,609,iii]	codita tvāt yathāśruti atha yat uktam paśum ālabheta iti puṃpaśuḥ ālabhyate puṃliṅga vacana sāmarthyāt evam iha api puṃliṅga vacana sāmarthyāt pumān adhikriyate yāga vacanena iti tat parihartavyam atra ucyate na atra jātiḥ dravyasya lakṣaṇa tvena śrūyate yadi hi lakṣaṇa tvena śrūyate tatas striyāḥ api yāgaḥ uktaḥ na puṃvacanena nivartyeta idam tu paśu tvam yāgasya viśeṣaṇātvena śrūyate tatra paśutvasya yāgasya ca saṃbandhaḥ na dravya yāgayoḥ yathā paśu tvam yāga saṃbaddham evam puṃstvam eka tvam ca saḥ ayam aneka viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭaḥ yāgaḥ śrūyate sa yathāśruti eva kartavyaḥ upādeya tvena codita tvāt 
[I,610,i]	yat ca doṣa śrutiḥ avijñāte garbhe hate ātreyām ca puṃyukta tvena iti tat parihartavyam atra ucyate avijñātena garbheṇa iti anuvādaḥ praśaṃsā arthaḥ ātreyī ca na hantavyā iti ittham garbhaḥ na hantavyaḥ yat avyaktena api enasvī bhavati puṃliṅga vibhaktiḥ śrūyamāṇāḥ na śaknoti striyam nivartayitum kim aṅga punar avijñāta garbha vacanam liṅgam tathā gotra praśaṃsā artham ātreyāḥ abadha saṃkīrtanam na ca āpannasattvā ātreyī gotram hi etat na hi atra śabdāt ayam tat hitaḥ utpannaḥ samarthānām hi tat hitaḥ utpadyate na ca atra śabdasya sāmarthyam asti 
[I,610,ii_I,610,iii]	dravyavat tvāt tu puṃsām syāt dravya saṃyuktam kraya vikrayābhyām adravya tvam strīṇām dravyaiḥ samāna yogi tvāt puṃsām tu syāt adhikāraḥ dravyavat tvāt dravyavantaḥ hi pumāṃsaḥ na striyaḥ dravya saṃyuktam ca etat karma vrīhibhiḥ yajeta yavaiḥ yajeta iti evamādi katham adravya tvam strīṇām kraya vikrayābhyām kraya vikraya saṃyuktāḥ hi striyaḥ pitrā vikrīyante bhartrā krīyante vikrīta tvāt ca pitṛ dhanānām anīśiyaḥ krīta tvāt ca bhartṛ dhanānām vikrayaḥ hi śrūyate śatam adhiratham duhitṛ mate dadyāt ārṣe go mithunam iti na ca etat dṛṣṭa arthe sati ānamane adṛṣṭa artham bhavitum arhati evam dravyaiḥ samāna yogi tvam strīṇām 
[I,610,iv_I,610,v]	tathā ca anya artha darśanam yā patyā krītā sati atha anyaiḥ carati iti krīta tām darśayati 
[I,611,i_I,611,iv]	tādarthyāt karma tādarthyam āha yat anayā bhakta utsarpaṇena vā kartanena vā dhanam upārjitam tena yakṣyate iti ucyate tat api asyāḥ na svam yadā hi sā anyasya sva bhūtā tadā yat tadīyam tat api tasya eva api ca svāminaḥ tayā karma kartavyam na tat parityajya sva karma arhati kartum yat tayā anyena prakāreṇa upārjyate tat patyuḥ eva svam bhavitum arhati iti evam smarati bhāryā dāsaḥ ca putraḥ ca nirdhanāḥ sarve eva te yat te samadhigacchanti yasya te tasya tat dhanam iti 
[I,611,v_I,611,vi]	phala utsāhā viśeṣāt tu tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na ca etat asti nirdhanā strī iti dravyavatī hi sā phala utsāhā viśeṣāt smṛti prāmāṇyāt asvayā tayā bhavitavyam phala arthinyā api śruti viśeṣāt phala arthinyāḥ yaṣṭavyam yadi smṛtim anurudhyamānā para vaśā nirdhanā ca syāt yajeta iti ukte sati na yajeta tatra smṛtyā śrutiḥ bādhyeta na ca etat nyāyyam tasmāt phala arthinī satī smṛtim apramāṇīkṛtya dravyam parigṛhṇīyāt yajeta ca iti 
[I,611,vii_I,611,viii]	arthena ca samaveta tvāt arthena ca asyāḥ samaveta tvam bhavati evam dāna kāle saṃvādaḥ kriyate dharme ca arthe ca kāme ca na ati caritavyā iti yat tu ucyate bhāryā ādayaḥ nirdhanāḥ iti smaryamāṇam api nirdhana tvam anyāyyam eva śruti virodhāt tasmāt asvātantryam anena prakāreṇa ucyate saṃvyavahāra prasiddhi artham 
[I,612,i_I,612,ii]	krayasya dharma mātra tvam yat tu krayaḥ śrūyate dharma mātram tu tat na asau krayaḥ iti krayaḥ hi ucca nīca paṇya paṇaḥ bhavati niyatam tu idam dānam śatam atiratham śobhanām aśobhanām ca kanyām prati smārtam ca śruti viruddham vikrayam na anumanyante tasmāt avikrayaḥ ayam iti 
[I,612,iii_I,612,iv]	sva vat tām api darśayati patnī vai pāriṇayyasya iṣṭe patyā eva gatam anumatam kriyate tathā bhasadā patnīḥ saṃyājayanti bhasadvīryāḥ hi patnayaḥ bhāsa dāḥ vai etāḥ para gṛhāṇām aiśvaryam avarundhate iti 
[I,612,v_I,612,vi]	svavatoḥ tu vacanāt aika karmyam syāt svavantau ubhau api daṃpatī iti evam tāvat sthitam tatra saṃdehaḥ kim pṛthak patnī yajeta pṛthak yajamānaḥ uta saṃbhūya yajeyātām iti kim prāptam pṛthaktvena kutas eka vacanasya vivakṣita tvāt upādeya tvena kartā yajeta iti śrūyate tasmāt eka vacanam vivakṣyate yathā na dvau puruṣau saṃbhūya yajeyātām tathā atra api draṣṭavyam 
[I,612,vii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ svavatoḥ tu vacanāt aika karmyam syāt vacanāt tayoḥ sahakriyā evam hi smaranti dharme ca arthe ca kāme ca na ati caritavyā iti tathā sahadharmaḥ caritavyaḥ saha apatyam utpādayitavyam iti ucyate smṛti vacanena na śruti vacanam yuktam bādhitum na iti brūmaḥ iha kiṃcid karma strīpuṃsa kartṛkam eva yathā darśa pūrṇamāsau jyotiṣṭomaḥ iti yatra patnī avekṣitena yajamāna avekṣitena ca ājyena homaḥ ucyate tatra anyatara abhāve vaiguṇyam 
[I,613,i]	nanu puṃsaḥ yajamānasya yajamāna avekṣitam ājyam striyāḥ yajamānāyāḥ patnī avekṣitam bhaviṣyati iti na iti āha na ayam īkṣitṛ saṃskāraḥ īkṣituḥ saṃskāraḥ yadi tadā evam syāt ājya saṃskāraḥ ca ayam guṇa bhūtau īkṣitārau tatra anyatara apāye niyatam vaiguṇyam sarva aṅga upasaṃhārī ca prayoga vacanaḥ tatra etat syāt strī yajamānā pumāṃsam parikreṣyati ājyasya īkṣitāram pumān ca striyam tu avekṣitrīm iti tat ca na patnī iti hi yajñasya svāminī iti ucyate na krītā patnī iti saṃbandhi śabdaḥ ayam yajamānaḥ iti ca svāmī na krītaḥ tasmāt strīpuṃsayoḥ ekam evaṃjātīyakam karma iti 
[I,613,ii^1]	tatra śruti sāmarthyāt yaḥ kaścid yayā kayācid saha saṃbhūya yajeta iti prāpte idam ucyate yaḥ tvayā kaścid dharmaḥ kayācid saha kartavyaḥ saḥ anayā saha iti tena na śruti virodhaḥ smṛteḥ iti gamyate atha yat uktam kevalasya puṃsaḥ adhikāraḥ kevalāyāḥ ca striyā yajeta iti eka vacanasya vivakṣita tvāt iti tat parihartavyam idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ yajeta iti eka vacane vivakṣite katham ṣoḍaśabhiḥ ṛtvigbhiḥ saha yāgaḥ bhavati iti evam ucyate pratikārakam kriyā bhedaḥ yajamānān eva padārthān parikraya ādīn kurvan yajate iti ucyate yajamānaḥ ādhvaryavān eva kurvan adhvaryuḥ yajati iti evam ucyate yathā saṃbharaṇam eva kurvatī sthālī paktim karoti iti ucyate yasya ca kārakasya yaḥ ātmīyaḥ vyāpāraḥ saḥ eka vacane vivakṣitaḥ ekena kartavyaḥ bhavati iti 
[I,613,ii^2]	evam ced yāvān vyāpāraḥ yajamānasya sa tāvāt na saṃbhūya kartavyaḥ ekena ekaḥ yājamānaḥ apareṇa aparaḥ dvādaśaḥ vā śatas ekena ṣaṭpañcāśat apareṇa api ṣaṭpañcāśat iti iha tu patnī vyāpāraḥ anyaḥ eva na tatra patnī pravartamānā yajamānasya ekatvam vihanti yathā adhvaryuḥ ādhvaryaveṣu pravartamānaḥ avaśyam ca saha patnyā yaṣṭavyam madhyakam hi idam daṃpatyoḥ dhanam tatra yāgaḥ avaśyam saha patnyā kartavyaḥ itaratha anyatarān icchāyām tyāgaḥ eva na saṃvarteta tathā hi dvitīyayā patnyā vinā tyāgaḥ na eva avakalpate yasya dvitīyā patnī asti tatra kratu arthān ekā kariṣyati kartṛ saṃskāra artheṣu na eva doṣaḥ saṃbhavanti hi tāni sarvatra iti 
[I,614,i_I,614,ii]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam khalu api dṛśyate yoktreṇa patnīm saṃnahyati mekhalayā yajamānam mithuna tvāya iti yadi strī puṃsau ekatra yoktrasya mekhalāyāḥ ca vibhāgaḥ vākyāt gamyate mithuna saṃstavaḥ ca tat etat strīpuṃsa sādhanake karmaṇi upapadyate na anyathā 
[I,614,iii_I,614,iv]	krīta tvāt tu bhaktyā svāmi tvam ucyate sthitāt uttaram ucyate tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na etat asti yat uktam svavatī strī iti krītā hi sā dṛṣṭa artha tvāt adhiratha śata dānasya atas yat asyāḥ svāmi tvam ucyate tat bhaktyā yathā pūrṇakaḥ asmākam balīvardānām īṣṭaḥ iti evam patnī api pāriṇayyasya iṣṭaḥ iti 
[I,615,i_I,615,ii]	phala arthi tvāt tu svāmi tvena abhisaṃbandhaḥ na etat asti krayaḥ mukhyaḥ gauṇam svāmi tvam iti phala arthinī hi sā smṛtiḥ na adariṣyate smṛti anurodhāt asvā syāt svavatī śruti anurodhāt 
[I,615,iii_I,615,iv]	phalavat tām ca darśayati sam patnī patnyā sukṛtena gacchatām yajñasya dhurya ayuktau abhūtām saṃjānānau vijahītām arātīḥ divi jyotiḥ ajara māram etām iti daṃpatyoḥ phalam darśayati tasmāt api ubhau adhikṛtau iti siddham 
[I,615,v_I,615,vi]	dvi ādhānam ca dvi yajña vat asti ādhānam yaḥ evam vidvān agnim ādhattaḥ iti tatra idam āmananti kṣaume vasānau agnim ādadhīyātām iti tatra eṣaḥ arthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ kim dvau puruṣau ādadhīyātām uta ekaḥ puruṣaḥ iti katham saṃśayaḥ ucyate iha etat śrūyate vasānau ādadhīyātām iti tatra vacanam artha prāptam punar śrūyate tat kim puṃliṅga saṃbandha artham uta kṣauma vidhi artham iti ubhayoḥ vidyamāna tvāt bhavati saṃśayaḥ yadi liṅga saṃbandha artham ubhau puruṣau ādhāsyete atha kṣauma saṃbandha artham tatas ekaḥ 
[I,615,vii]	kim prāptam dvi ādhānam tu dvi yajña vat syāt yathā etena dvau rāja purohitau sāyujya kāmau yajeyātām iti dvayoḥ puruṣayoḥ dvi yajñaḥ bhavati evam dvi ādhānam dvayoḥ puruṣayoḥ syāt tatas aviśeṣāt vasānau iti śravaṇāt eva puruṣau gamyete na pada antara gatena kṣaumeṇa asya saṃbandhaḥ śruti avagatam hi śravaṇāt avagatam pada antara saṃbandham vākyāt avagatam śrutiḥ ca vākyāt balīyasī vasāna śabda gataḥ ca arthe ādhānena saṃbadhyate na kṣauma śabda gataḥ 
[I,616,i]	āha vasānau iti na ayam kevalam puṃliṅgaḥ eva strīpuṃsayoḥ api abhidhāyakaḥ bhavati yathā kukkuṭaḥ ca kukkuṭī ca kukkuṭau śūkaraḥ ca śūkarī ca śūkarau iti evam vasānaḥ ca vasānā ca vasānau syātām iti atra ucyate yatra na arthaḥ prakaraṇam vā viśeṣakam vidhāyakaḥ ca śabdaḥ na asti anuvādas tatra dvau pumāṃsau gamyete yathā dvau ānaya iti uktaḥ pumāṃsau ānayati dve ānaya iti striyau tena striyaḥ vācakam ekāra antam dvivacanam iti gamyate aukāra antam api dvayoḥ puṃsoḥ vācakam iti yatra idānīm strīpuṃsayoḥ prayujyamānam aukāra antam dṛśyate tatra kim pumān sa dvitīyaḥ tasya nimittam uta strī sa dvitīyāḥ iti ucyate puṃsi sa dvitīye dṛṣṭaḥ yathā brāhmaṇau ānaya iti iha api pumān sa dvitīyaḥ arthaḥ tasmāt puṃnimittam iti gamyate 
[I,616,ii]	atra āha prayogaḥ yadi dṛṣṭam pramāṇam dvayoḥ puṃsoḥ dṛṣṭaḥ katham ekasmin syāt atra ucyate puṃsi ca dvi tve ca dṛṣṭaḥ iti śakyate vaditum na dvayoḥ dravyayoḥ iti puṃbhāvam dvi tvam ca eṣa śabdaḥ na vyabhicarati dravyam punar vyabhicarati api ca yugapad adhikaraṇa vacanāyāḥ dvaṃdva smṛteḥ dvi vacana bahu vacana upapatteḥ ca pra mitrayoḥ varuṇayoḥ iti ca darśanāt itaretara yoge ca arthe samāsa vidhānāt dvandva apavāda tvāt ca eka śeṣasya yathā eva khadirau ca dhavalau ca iti nirdarśanam kriyate evam atra api draṣṭavyam tasmāt puṃsi dvi tve ca vartate iti gamyate na ca strī dvi tve dṛṣṭaḥ 
[I,617,i]	atra āha nanu atra eva darśanāt strīpuṃsayoḥ vācakaḥ iti gamyate atra ucyate uktam etat anyāyaḥ ca uneka artha tvam iti pumān sa dvitīyaḥ asya arthaḥ bhaviṣyati strī puṃsau ca iti anyāyyam atha idānīm sa dvitīyasya puṃsaḥ vidhau kaḥ anyaḥ sahāyaḥ iti striyāḥ anabhidheya tvāt avaśyam bhāvi tvāt ca dvitīyasya aparaḥ sa dvitīyaḥ pumān evam itaraḥ api itareṇa sa dvitīyaḥ itaraḥ api itareṇa iti dvau eva pumāṃsau upādīyete tasmāt iha dvau pumāṃsau ādhāne vidhīyeta iti ucyate 
[I,617,ii]	nanu strīpuṃsayoḥ vācakam aukāra antam dvivacanam smaranti na eṣā smṛtiḥ asti iti brūmaḥ āha bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ vacanāt smṛtim anumāsyāmahe pumān striyāḥ iti ucyate na pāṇineḥ vacanam kukkuṭau iti aukāraḥ strīpuṃsayoḥ vācakaḥ iti katham tarhi yatra strīpuṃsayoḥ saha vacanam tatra sa dvitīyaḥ vā pumān iti kṛtvā ākāra antasya aukāraḥ prāpnoti sa dvitīyā vā strī iti kṛtvā aikāraḥ puṃśabdaḥ tatra sādhuḥ na strī śabdaḥ iti pāṇineḥ vacanam pumān śiṣyate iti ca brūte tena sutarām gamyate puṃsoḥ vācakaḥ aukāraḥ iti tasmāt dvayoḥ puṃsoḥ adhikāraḥ iti 
[I,617,iii]	nanu kṣauma vidhāna param etat vākyam syāt kṣauma saṃbandhasya arthavat tvāt itarathā kṣauma vacanam anarthakam syāt atra ucyate vasānau ādadhīyātām iti asti saṃbandhaḥ na kṣaume ādadhīyātām iti tasmāt saṃnikṛṣṭam api na tad saṃbaddham ādhānena āha vasāna śabdena saha saṃbadhyamānam arthavat bhaviṣyati vasāna saṃnikṛṣṭe api kṣaume na vidhīyate vidhāyakasya śabdasya abhāvāt na hi vasāna śabdaḥ vidhāyakaḥ na kṣauma śabdaḥ na anayoḥ samudāyaḥ kaḥ tarhi vidhātum śaknoti ādadhīyātām iti atra yā liṅ 
[I,618,i]	āha sā khalu vidhāsyati ucyate sā sva śabda gatam ādhānam śaknoti vidhātum śravaṇāt vihita tvāt ādhānasya ānarthakye vasānau iti śaknoti vākyena vidhātum bhavati hi vasānayoḥ ādhāna saṃbandhaḥ tatra na atyantāya sva arthaḥ parityaktaḥ bhavati kṣaumavasān a saṃbandhe tu vidhātavye ādadhīyātām iti ādhānam utsṛjya vidadhānaḥ atyantāya śrutim jahyāt ādhāna saṃnikṛṣṭe ca liṅge vidhātavye śrutiḥ viprakṛṣṭam na kṣaumavasān a saṃbandham vidhātum utsahate artha viprakarṣāt api ca utsṛjya śrutim kṣaumavasān a saṃbandhe vidhīyamāne kṣaumam vasān asya aṅgam syāt na ādhānasya tatra kṣauma abhāve api na ādhānam viguṇam iti kṣauma abhāve api ādhānam syāt 
[I,618,ii]	āha vasāna guṇa tāyām tarhi kaḥ arthaḥ vivakṣyate ucyate na kaścid atas eva asya pakṣasya parityāgaḥ āha kṣaumavasān a śravaṇam idānīm katham iti ucyate na śakyataḥ ubhayam vidhātum kṣaumam liṅgam ca bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam tasmāt akṣaumayoḥ kṣauma śabdaḥ anuvādaḥ artha prāpte ca vasane vasānau pumāṃsau iti arthaḥ te ca prāyeṇa viceṣṭamānasya maline kṣauma sadṛśe bhavataḥ viceṣṭamānasya vā vasane śabdavatī bhavataḥ iti tasmāt dvayoḥ puṃsoḥ adhikāraḥ iti 
[I,619,i_I,619,ii]	guṇasya tu vidhāna tvāt patnyā dvitīya śabdaḥ syāt tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na etat asti yat uktam dvau puruṣau ādadhīyātām iti ekaḥ eva ādadhīta vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnim ādadhīta iti eka vacanam hi vivakṣitam tasmāt ekaḥ eva ādadhīta nanu idam vacanam dvau pumāṃsau ādadhīyātām iti na iti āha guṇasya tu vidhāna tvāt kṣauma vidhānam asmin vākye nyāyyam tathā hi apūrvaḥ arthaḥ vihitaḥ bhavati gamyate hi viśeṣa niyamaḥ itarathā kṣauma vacanam anuvāda mātram syāt vāda mātram ca anarthakam pakṣe ca anuvādaḥ na ca eka pakṣa vacanaḥ eṣa śabdaḥ gauṇa tve ca sādhāraṇam sādṛśyam tasmāt pramāda adhyayanam avagamyeta vinā eva hetunā 
[I,619,iii]	āha nanu pumāṃsau vidheyau tad vidhāne ca na kṣauma vidhānam vākya bhedaḥ hi tathā syāt śruti gamyau ca pumāṃsau vākya gamyam ca kṣaumam bādheyātām iti atra ucyate na pumāṃsau vidheyau prāptaḥ eva atra sa dvitīyaḥ pumān saḥ anūdyate katham ekaḥ atra pumān śrūyate tasya patnyā dvitīya śabdaḥ syāt na ca yat prāk vacanāt gamyate tat vidheyam bhavati tasmāt kṣauma vidhānam na vākya bhedaḥ bhavati 
[I,619,iv]	yat ucyate na kṣaumasya vidhāyakaḥ asti iti tat ucyate ādadhīyātām iti tat vidhāsyati nanu etat ādhānam śrutyā vidhātum samartham na anyat iti ucyate śabda antareṇa vihita tvāt ādhānasya na vidhāyakam vihita tvāt ca puṃsaḥ sa dvitīyasya tasya api na vidhāyakam atas tad asaṃbhavāt kṣaumasya vidhāyikā liṅ bhaviṣyati vākya sāmarthyāt yat tu asmin pakṣe atyantāya sva artham jahāti iti na atyantāya hāsyati ādhāne vāsaḥ kṣaumam kuryāt iti asmin pakṣe puṃśabdaḥ strīpuṃsayoḥ vṛttaḥ iti gamyate asti hi tatra tasya nimittam pumān sa dvitīyaḥ evamādi ca dṛṣṭvā bhagavatā pāṇininā sūtram praṇītam pumān striyāḥ iti tasya viṣayaḥ puṃśabdaḥ śiṣyamāṇaḥ sādhuḥ bhavati na strī śabdaḥ iti tasmāt ekaḥ pumān ādadhīta na dvau iti 
[I,620,i_I,620,iii]	tasyāḥ yāvat uktam āśīḥ brahmacaryam atulya tvāt darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti evamādiṣu etat uktam strīpuṃsayoḥ saha adhikāraḥ iti atha idānīm saṃdihyate kim sarvam yājamānam patnyā kartavyam uta yāvat uktam āśīḥ brahmacaryam ca iti kim prāptam sarvam yājamānam patnyāḥ syāt sā api hi yajamānā tulya tvāt tasmāt sarvam tasyāḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ tasyāḥ yāvat uktam syāt vacana prāmāṇyāt āśīḥ brahmacaryam ca syāt kasmāt atulya tvāt atulyāḥ hi strīpuṃsāḥ yajamānaḥ pumān vidvān ca patnī strī ca avidyā ca 
[I,620,iv]	kim atas yadi evam hi etat atulya tvam etat atas bhavati kratu artheṣu yāni yājamānāni śravaṇāni teṣu upādeya tvena śravaṇāt vivakṣitam liṅgam tena teṣu patnī na syāt yāni ca kratu arthāni sa mantrakāṇi teṣu avidya tvāt patnī na syāt tat patnyāḥ adhyayanasya prayojakam syāt iti yadi ucyeta tat na asatī api prayojaka tve tasya nirvṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati asti hi tasya pumān nirvartakaḥ yat ca kartu artham tat ekena yena kenacid nirvartayitavyam tasmāt pratiṣiddhasya patnyāḥ adhyayanasya punar prasave na kiṃcid asti pramāṇam atas tat api patnī na kuryāt yāḥ tu āśiṣaḥ yat ca brahmacaryam tat puruṣam prati guṇa bhūtam na tatra anyatareṇa kṛte sidhyati anyatarasya hi saṃskāraḥ hīyeta na ca tatra upādeya tvena yajamānasya śravaṇam tasmāt liṅgam api avivakṣitam atas āśīḥ brahmacaryam ca ubhayoḥ api syāt yat ca āhatyā ucyate yathā patnī ājyam avekṣate iti tasmāt atulya tvāt asamāna vidhānā patnī yajamānena bhavitum arhati iti 
[I,621,i_I,621,ii]	cāturvarṇyam aviśeṣāt āgnihotra ādīni karmāṇi udāharaṇam teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim caturṇām varṇānām tāni bhaveyuḥ uta apa śūdrāṇām trayāṇām varṇānām iti kim tāvat prāptam cāturvarṇyam adhikṛtya yajeta juhuyāt iti evamādi śabdam uccarati vedaḥ kutas aviśeṣāt na hi kaścid viśeṣaḥ upādīyate tasmāt śūdraḥ na nivartate 
[I,622,i_I,622,ii]	nirdeśāt vā trayāṇām syāt agnyādheye hi asaṃbandhaḥ kratuṣu brāhmaṇa śrutiḥ iti ātreyaḥ vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati trayāṇām adhikāraḥ syāt kutas agnyādheye nirdeśāt agnyādheye trayāṇām nirdeśaḥ bhavati vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta grīṣme rājanyaḥ śaradi vaiśyaḥ iti śūdrasya ādhāne śrutiḥ na asti iti anagniḥ śūdraḥ asamarthaḥ agnihotra ādi nirvartayitum tasmāt agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti evamādiṣu śūdrasya prāpikā śrutiḥ na asti brāhmaṇa ādīn eva adhikṛtya sā pravartate te hi samarthāḥ agnimat tvāt āhavanīya ādayaḥ na śūdrasya avidhānāt saṃskāra śabda tvāt ca āhavanīya ādīnām tasmāt anadhikṛtaḥ agnihotra ādiṣu śūdraḥ iti ātreyaḥ manyate sma 
[I,622,iii_I,622,v]	nimitta arthena bādariḥ tasmāt sarva adhikāram syāt yat uktam anadhikāraḥ śūdrasya iti tat na sarvam hi arthinam adhikṛtya yajeta iti ucyate saḥ asati pratiṣedha vacane śūdrāt na vyāvarteta yat tu asamarthaḥ agni abhāvāt iti syāt eva asya agniḥ artha prāptaḥ kāma śruti parigṛhīta tvāt atra āha nanu agni ādheya codanā brāhmaṇa ādi saṃyuktā na śūdrasya iti ucyate nimitta arthena tāḥ śrutayaḥ na prāpikāḥ katham nimitta svabhāvāḥ ete śabdāḥ brāhmaṇaḥ ādadhānaḥ vasante rāji an yaḥ grīṣme vaiṣyaḥ śaradi iti brāhmaṇa ādīnām vasanta ādibhiḥ saṃbandhaḥ gamyate tena vasanta ādi saṃbandha arthāḥ brāhmaṇa ādayaḥ iti eva gamyate tathā ca ādadhātiḥ na vākyena śūdrāt vyāvartitaḥ bhaviṣyati tasmāt bādariḥ sarva adhikāram śāstram manyate sma iti gamyate 
[I,623,i_I,623,ii]	api vā anya artha darśanāt yathāśruti pratīyeta api vā iti pakṣaḥ vyāvartyate yathāśruti eva pratīyeta brāhmaṇa ādayaḥ hi ādhāne śrūyante tena brāhmaṇa ādi kartṛkam ādhānam vasanta ādi śravaṇāt ca vasanta ādi kālakam tathā ca idam śūdra varjitānām eva anukramaṇam bhavati bārhadgiram brāhmaṇasya brahmasāma kuryāt pārthu raśyam rājanyasya rāyovājīyam vaiśyasya iti śūdrasya sāma nāmananti tathā payaḥ vratam brāhmaṇasya yavāguḥ rājanyasya āmikṣā vaiśyasya iti tathā ādhāne aṣṭasu prakrameṣu brāhmaṇaḥ agnim ādadhīta ekādaśasu rājanyaḥ dvādaśasu vaiśyaḥ iti evam abrahma sāmakam avratakam aprakramakam ca śūdrasya prayuktam api karma niṣphalam syāt tasmāt na śūdraḥ juhuyāt yajeta vā 
[I,623,iii_I,623,iv]	nirdeśāt tu pakṣe syāt na etat evam śūdrasya agni abhāvāt anadhikāraḥ agnihotra ādiṣu iti asti hi śūdrasya ādhānam yaḥ evam vidvān agnim ādhattaḥ iti śāstram sāmānyena idam api nimitta artham bhaviṣyati tasmāt sarva adhikāram śāstram bhavitum arhati iti 
[I,623,v_I,623,vi]	vaiguṇyāt na iti ced atha yat uktam abrahma sāmakam avratakam aprakramakam ca śūdrasya karma prayuktam api phalam na sādhayet viguṇam iti tat parihartavyam 
[I,624,i_I,624,ii]	na kāmya tvāt saḥ eṣa parihāraḥ krāmya tvāt kāmayiṣyate śūdraḥ abhīvartam nāma brahmasāma tat dhi anārabhya kiṃcid āmnātam aviśeṣeṇa cakṣuḥ vimitaḥ ādadhyāt iti aniyata prakrameṣu śūdrasya niyamyate vrate api mastu śūdrasya iti saṃbandha darśanāt adhyavasīyate mastu eva śūdrasya tasmāt cāturvarṇyam adhikriyeta 
[I,624,iii_I,624,iv]	saṃskāre ca tad pradhāna tvāt vrate ca viśeṣaḥ avagamyate tat prādhānyam puruṣa prādhānyam hi vrate kim atas yat puruṣa pradhāna tā etat atas bhavati puruṣa pradhānaḥ saṃskāraḥ na śaknoti anupasaṃhriyamāṇaḥ tasya adhikāram vyāvartayitum tat katham iti yajeta iti hi svarga kāme abhidhīyamāne tad kāmaḥ śūdraḥ na abhihitaḥ iti katham gamyate kim hi sa yāgasya puruṣa nirvartyam na nirvartayati vratam iti ced na sāmarthya upajananāya hi tat yasya eva ucyeta tasya eva tena vinā na sāmarthyam na anyasya eṣaḥ eva hi vratasya aṅga bhāvaḥ yat kartāram samartham karoti yasya tu tena prayojanam sa tad anapekṣya eva yāgam abhinirvartayati tasmāt api na śūdra varjanam 
[I,624,v_I,624,vi]	api vā veda nirdeśāt apaśūdrāṇām pratīyeta evam na prāpakāṇi śravaṇāni iti uktam śakyate tu vaktum prāpakāṇi iti na ca sūtrakāreṇa tat vyapadiṣṭam naimittikeṣu api teṣu satsu śakyaḥ eva śūdra paryudāsaḥ vaktum iti na tat ādṛtam hetu antaram vyapadiṣṭam api vā iti pakṣa vyāvartanam evam api sati naimittike api brāhmaṇa ādi śravaṇe sati apaśūdrāṇām eva adhikāraḥ kutas veda nirdeśāt vede hi trayāṇām nirdeśaḥ bhavati vasante brāhmaṇam upanayīta grīṣme rājanyam śaradi vaiśyam iti veda abhāvāt asamarthaḥ śūdraḥ yaṣṭum tasmāt na adhikriyeta 
[I,625,i_I,625,ii]	guṇa arthi tvāt na iti ced guṇena adhyayanena arthaḥ śūdraḥ anupanītaḥ svayam upetya adhyeṣyate tathā asya sāmarthyam janiṣyate iti 
[I,625,iii_I,625,iv]	saṃskārasya tad artha tvāt vidyāyām puruṣa śrutiḥ ucyate vidyāyām eva eṣā puruṣa śrutiḥ upanayanasya saṃskārasya tad artha tvāt vidyā artham upādhyāyasya samīpam ānīyate na adṛṣṭa artham kuḍyam vā kartum sā eṣā vidyāyām puruṣa śrutiḥ katham avagamyate ācārya karaṇam etat abhidhīyate kutas ātmanepada darśanāt nayatiḥ ācārya karaṇe vartate tad artha saṃbandhāt upanayanam ācārya karaṇa prayuktam veda adhyāpanena ca ācāryaḥ bhavati tasmāt veda adhyayane brāhmaṇa ādayaḥ śrutāḥ śūdrasya na śrutam veda adhyayanam atas avedātvāt asamarthaḥ śūdraḥ na abhikriyate iti 
[I,625,v_I,625,vi]	vidyā nirdeśāt na iti ced iti ced paśyasi avaidya tvāt asāmarthyāt anadhikṛtaḥ śūdraḥ iti na eṣa doṣaḥ vidyā nirdeśāt vidyām nirdekṣyati anuktām api adhyeṣyate iti śakyate hi anuktam api adhyetum tasmāt cāturvarṇyasya api adhikāraḥ 
[I,626,i_I,626,iii]	avaidya tvāt abhāvaḥ karmaṇi syāt na ca etat asti śūdraḥ adhyeṣyate iti pratiṣiddham asya adhyayanam śūdreṇa na adhyetavyam iti adhīyānasya api adhyayanam saphalam na bhavati doṣaḥ ca jāyate atas avaidyaḥ śūdraḥ asya abhāvaḥ karmaṇi iti siddham atha api vaidya tvena sidhyet tathā api anagni tvāt abhāvaḥ karmaṇi syāt atha katham anagnitā iti prāpakāṇi hi brāhmaṇa ādīnām ādhāne vākyāni nanu yaḥ evam vidvān agnim ādhattaḥ iti ādhānasya vidhāyakam tatra brāhmaṇasya vasante agnim ādadhīta iti nimitta arthāni vacanāni iti gamyate atra ucyate brāhmaṇaḥ agnim ādadhīta iti śrutyā vidhānam gamyate yaḥ evam vidvān agnim ādhattaḥ iti stutyā tat ānumānikam pratyakṣa śrutāt durbalam tasmāt prāpakāṇi vacanāni atas śūdrasya anadhikāraḥ 
[I,626,iv_I,626,v]	tathā ca anya artha darśanam anya artha darśanam ca bhavati yathā na śūdrasya adhyayanam iti kim liṅgam bhavati yadyu vai etat śmaśānam yat śūdraḥ tasmāt śūdra samīpe na ādhyeyam iti anadhyayanam śūdrasya darśayati tasmāt apaśūdrāṇām adhikāraḥ nanu āhavanīyāt vinā api yāgaḥ vacana prāmāṇyāt śūdrasya vidhīyate ucyate na atra yāga sadbhāvaḥ vidhīyate svarga kāmasya kim tarhi svarga phala tā viśiṣṭasya yāgasya tasmāt asaṃbhavaḥ śūdrasya agnihotra ādiṣu 
[I,627,i_I,627,ii]	trayāṇām dravya saṃpannaḥ karmaṇaḥ dravya siddhi tvāt agnihotra ādiṣu eva saṃdehaḥ kim adravyasya adhikāraḥ na iti ucyate trayāṇām dravya saṃpannaḥ adhikriyeta na adravyaḥ kutas na hi śaknoti adravyaḥ dravya saṃyuktam karma anuṣṭhātum tasmāt adravyasya anadhikāraḥ 
[I,627,iii_I,627,iv]	anitya tvāt tu na evam syāt arthāt dhi dravya saṃyogaḥ na evam syāt yat uktam adravyasya anadhikāraḥ iti kutas anitya tvāt anityaḥ adravya saṃyogaḥ na hi kaścid jātyā dravyaḥ eva puruṣaḥ asti upāyaḥ yena dravyavān bhavati yaḥ śaknoti yaṣṭum tasya yajeta iti vācakaḥ bhavati yaḥ na kathaṃcid api śaknoti yāgam abhinirvartayitum tam na adhikaroti yajeta śabadaḥ yaḥ tu kenacid prakāreṇa śaknoti na tam varjayitvā pravartate arthāt ca dravya saṃyogaḥ bhaviṣyati jīviṣyati vinā dhanena iti etat anupapannam tasmāt arthāt eva dravya saṃyogaḥ 
[I,628,i_I,628,ii]	aṅga hīnaḥ ca tad dharmā agnihotra ādiṣu eva aṅga hīnam prati saṃdehaḥ kim asau adhikriyate uta na iti tatra api adhikaraṇa atideśaḥ asamarthaḥ iti kṛtvā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ śakteḥ vidyamāna tvāt uttaraḥ tat idam abhidhīyate aṅga hīnaḥ ca tad dharmā kiṃdharmā adravya dharma iti 
[I,628,iii_I,628,v]	utpattau nitya saṃyogāt yasya tu apratisamādheyam aṅga vaikalyam tam prati vicāraḥ kim adhikriyate na iti pūrva adhikaraṇena adhikriyate iti prāpte brūmaḥ na adhikriyate iti kutas śakti abhāvāt na asau kenacid api prakāreṇa śaknoti yaṣṭum tasmāt tasya adhikāraḥ na gamyate nanu yat śaknoti tatra adhikriyate iti cakṣuḥ vikalaḥ vinā ājya avekṣaṇena vinā viṣṇukramaiḥ paṅguḥ vinā praiṣa ādi śravaṇena ca badhiraḥ etān padārthān prati cakṣuḥ vikala ādīnām anadhikāraḥ iti na iti ucyate na ājya avekṣaṇa ādi puruṣam prati nirdiśyate yadi hi tam prati nirdeśyeta tatas vikalaḥ api adhikriyeta kratum prati eṣām upadeśaḥ prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt puruṣasya ca ākhyātena anabhidhānāt iti uktam etat vidhiḥ vā saṃyoga antarāt iti atra taiḥ ca vinā viguṇam karma prayuktam api na phalam sādhayet tasmāt tasya anadhikāraḥ 
[I,629,i_I,629,ii]	atri ārṣeyasya hānam syāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate ārṣeyam vṛṇīte ekam vṛṇīte dvau vṛṇīte trīn vṛṇīte na caturaḥ vṛṇīte na pañcāti vṛṇītaḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim atri ārṣeyasya adhikāraḥ uta na iti kim prāptam atri ārṣeyaḥ api adhikriyate iti kutas ārṣeyam vṛṇītaḥ iti sāmānya vacanam tasmāt ekam variṣyati dvau vā tat ca darśayati ekam vṛṇīte dvau vṛṇītaḥ iti tathā pratiṣedhati na caturaḥ vṛṇītaḥ iti na pañcāti vṛṇītaḥ iti na hi aprāptasya pratiṣedhaḥ avakalpate tasmāt atri ārṣeyaḥ api adhikriyeta 
[I,629,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ yaḥ na tri ārṣeyaḥ sa na adhikriyeta kutas trīn vṛṇītaḥ iti viśeṣa vacanāt vidhiḥ ca aprāpta tvāt nanu ekam vṛṇītaḥ iti api viśeṣa vacanam asti na iti ucyate vidhāyikāyāḥ vibhakteḥ abhāvāt nanu stutyāḥ vidhāsyante yathā trīn vṛṇītaḥ iti ucyate trayāṇām eva stutiḥ sā tritvam vidhāsya iti ekam vṛṇītaḥ iti avayutyavādaḥ ayam trayāṇām eva tatra api tritvam eva stūyate vidhātum ekam eka vākyena vidhānam bhaviṣyati iti na caturaḥ vṛṇīte na pañca ati vṛṇītaḥ iti nitya anuvādaḥ bhaviṣyati tasmāt tri ārṣeyasya adhikāraḥ na anyasya iti 
[I,630,i_I,630,ii]	vacanāt rathakārasya ādhāne asya sarva śeṣa tvāt ādhāne śrūyate varṣāsu rathakāraḥ ādadhīta iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim traivarṇikānām anyatamaḥ rathakāraḥ āhosvit atra eva ṛṇikaḥ iti kim prāptam rathakārasya atra eva ṛṇikasya ādhānam etat kutas vacanāt na hi vacanasya kiṃcid akṛtyam asti sarva śeṣaḥ ca atra eva ṛṇika ādhāne brāhmaṇa rājyanyaviśām uktam ādhānam pariśeṣāt atra eva ṛṇikaḥ rathakāra syāt 
[I,630,iii_I,630,iv]	nyāyyaḥ vā karma saṃyogāt śūdrasya pratiṣiddha tvāt nyāyyaḥ vā syāt traivarṇikaḥ rathakāraḥ rathakarmaṇā viśeṣeṇa ucyate śūdraḥ hi asamartha tvāt pratiṣiddhaḥ tasmāt traivarṇikaḥ rathakāraḥ syāt 
[I,630,v_I,630,vi]	akarma tvāt tu na evam syāt na asti traivarṇikaḥ rathakāraḥ pratiṣiddham hi tasya śilpa upajīvi tvam atra eva ṛṇikaḥ tu asti tasmāt vacana prāmāṇyāt saḥ ādhāsyate 
[I,631,i_I,631,ii]	ānarthakyam ca saṃyogāt brāhmaṇa ādiṣu vasanta ādayaḥ niyatāḥ tān prati varṣāḥ ucyamānāḥ api asaṃbandhāt ānarthakyam prāpnuyuḥ tasmāt atra eva ṛṇikaḥ rathakāraḥ iti 
[I,631,iii_I,631,iv]	guṇa arthena iti ced evam ced paśyasi na asti traivarṇikaḥ rathakāraḥ pratiṣiddha tvāt śilpā upajīvi tvasya iti guṇa arthena kaścid bhaviṣyati rathakāraḥ vaitathyena tasya idam ādhānam vijñāyate
