[I,631,v_I,631,vi]	uktam animitta tvam uktam etat asmābhiḥ na nimitta arthāni etāni śravaṇāni iti kim atas yadi na nimitta arthāni etat atas bhavati prāpakāṇi iti prāpti tvāt teṣām ādhānasya punar prāpakam anarthakam tena yasya aprāptam tasya bhaviṣyati iti atha ucyeta etat ekam nimitta artham bhaviṣyati iti na etat evam avakalpate vasanta ādi saṃyuktam tat katham iva varṣābhiḥ saṃbadhyeta api ca prāpaka pakṣaḥ ādhānam vidhīyate śrutyā nimitta pakṣe punar varṣāḥ vidhātavyāḥ vākyena śrutiḥ ca vākyāt balīyasi iti tasmāt atra eva ṛṇikasya idam ādhānam iti 
[I,631,vii_I,631,viii]	saudhanvanāḥ tu hīna tvāt mantra varṇāt pratīyeran na tu sarve eva atra eva ṛṇikaḥ rathakāraḥ saudhanvanāḥ iti eṣa jāti vacanaḥ śabdaḥ saudhanvanā nāma jātiḥ abhidhīyate hīnāḥ tu kiṃcid traivarṇikebhyaḥ jāti antaram na tu śūdrāḥ na vaiśyāḥ na kṣatriyāḥ teṣām idam ādhānam katham avagamyate prasiddheḥ mantra varṇāt ca mantra varṇaḥ hi bhavati saudhanvanāḥ ṛbhavaḥ sūra cakṣasaḥ iti ṛbhūṇām tu iti rathakārasya ādhāna mantraḥ tasmāt saudhanvanāḥ ṛbhavaḥ iti ṛbhavaḥ ca rathakārāḥ api ca nemim nayanti ṛbhavaḥ yathā iti ye nemim nayanti te ṛbhavaḥ iti ucyante rathakārāḥ ca nemim nayanti tasmāt atra eva ṛṇikānām aśūdrāṇām etat ādhānam iti 
[I,632,i_I,632,ii]	sthapatiḥ niṣādaḥ syāt śabda sāmarthyāt vāstu madhye raudram carum nirvapet yatra rudraḥ prajāḥ śamayet iti etām iṣṭim prakṛtyā ucyate etayā niṣāda stha patim yājayet iti niṣāda stha patim prati saṃdehaḥ kim adhikṛtānām anyatamaḥ uta anyaḥ eva iti anyatamaḥ iti brūmaḥ sa hi samarthaḥ vidvat tvāt agnimat tvāt ca anyaḥ avidvat tvāt anagni tvāt asamarthaḥ iti 
[I,632,iii]	nanu niṣāda stha pati śabdaḥ tatra na upapadyate ucyate na na upapadyate niṣādānām sthapatiḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati śreṣṭhaḥ niṣādānām tasmāt adhikṛta adhikāram etat śāstram iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ sthapatiḥ niṣādaḥ syāt śabda sāmarthyāt niṣādaḥ eva sthapatiḥ bhavitum arhati kasmāt śabda sāmarthyāt niṣādam hi niṣāda śabdaḥ śaknoti vaditum śravaṇena eva niṣādānām tu sthapatim lakṣaṇayā brūyāt śruti lakṣaṇa aviśaye ca śrutiḥ nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā atha ucyate na eṣa doṣaḥ niṣāda śabdaḥ niṣāda vacanaḥ eva ṣaṣṭhī saṃbandhasya vācikā iti tat na ṣaṣṭhī a śravaṇāt na atra ṣaṣṭhīm śṛṇumaḥ āha lopa sāmarthyāt ṣaṣṭhī arthaḥ avagamyate iti satyam avagamyate na tu lopena kena tarhi niṣada śabda lakṣaṇayā tasyāḥ ca daurbalyam iti uktam samāna adhikaraṇa samāsaḥ tu balīyān tatra hi sva arthe śabdau vṛttau bhavataḥ dvitīyā ca vibhaktiḥ tantreṇa ubhābhyām saṃbadhyate tena dvitīya anirdiṣṭaḥ niṣādaḥ gamyate tatra ṣaṣṭhī artham kalpayan aśrutam gṛhaṇīyāt tasmāt niṣādaḥ eva sthapatiḥ syāt 
[I,633,i_I,633,ii]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam dṛśyate kūṭam dakṣiṇā iti niṣādasya dravyam darśayati kūṭam hi niṣādānām eva upakārakam nāryāṇām evam svam eva tat niṣādānām iti 
[I,634,i_I,634,ii]	puruṣa artha eka siddhi tvāt tasya tasya adhikāraḥ syāt dvādaśa ahena prajā kāmam yājayet ṛddhi kāmāḥ upeyuḥ tathā tatra tatra evaṃkāmāḥ satram upeyuḥ saptadaśa avarāḥ caturviṃśati paramāḥ satram āsīran iti teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim tasya tasya kṛtsnena phalena arthinaḥ satre adhikāraḥ uta parṣadaḥ arthinyāḥ adhikāraḥ iti āha nanu arthinaḥ bahu saṃkhyā viśiṣṭāḥ nirdiśyante katham eṣām ekaśas adhikāraḥ bhaviṣyati iti ucyate ṛddhi kāmāḥ iti evamādi vidhīyamānam ṛddhi lakṣiteṣu samasteṣu vyasteṣu ca prāptam na śakyam bahuvacanena viśeṣe avasthāpayitum tena tam tam adhikuryāt parṣadam vā iti bhavati saṃdehaḥ 
[I,634,iii_I,634,iv]	kim tāvat prāptam ekaikaḥ na samarthaḥ bahu kartṛkam satram racayitum parṣadam tu kartrīm arthinīm avagacchāmaḥ na ca akartuḥ phalam bhavati na ca ekaḥ kartā ucyate tasmāt samastānām phalam ekaikasya phala avayayaḥ madhyakam syāt kṛtsnam phalam iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ tasya tasya arthinaḥ kṛtsnam phalam satrāt nirvartate kutas puruṣa arthasya ekaikasya siddhiḥ yatas bhavati sahakriyamāṇe sarve ekaikaḥ puruṣa artham sādhayati tantreṇa kartṝṇām phalam ca bhavati ekaikaḥ ca atra kartā āha nanu etat uktam ekaikaḥ na śaknoti bahu kartṛkam kartum iti ucyate śaknoti ekaikasya svātantrya vivakṣāyām yadā ekaikaḥ svātantryeṇa pravartate tadā anyān saṃkhyā nirvṛtti artham sāma ādibhiḥ prayokṣyate ekam ekaḥ puruṣa artham sādhayati itaraḥ itaraḥ ca tena sarve kartāraḥ sa vyapekṣāḥ bhaviṣyanti sarve ced kartāraḥ pṛthak pṛthak eva phalena saṃbhantsyante 
[I,635,i_I,635,iii]	api ca utpatti saṃyogāt yathā syāt sattva darśanam tathā bhāvaḥ avibhāge syāt api ca na etat viruddham yat ekam karma bahubhiḥ kriyate iti yadi ucyate viruddham ekena karmaṇi kṛte dvitīyaḥ kim kuryāt iti atra ucyate paryāyeṇa kriyāyām evam doṣaḥ tantreṇa tu kriyāyām bhavati kvacid saṃbhavaḥ yathā syāt sattva darśanam tathā bhāvaḥ avibhāge syāt yathā ekaikasya sattvasya hastinaḥ aśvasya vā darśanam ekaikena kṛtsnam abhinirvartyate evam eva satre tantra bhāvaḥ bhavet sarveṣām madhyakam dravyam madhyakasya āhavanīyasya upari adhvaryuḥ apavidhyati tatra sarve kartāraḥ tantreṇa bhavanti na ca atra utpanna saṃyogaḥ utpattyā eva tu saṃkhyayā karma saṃyujyate yadi hi utpannam saṃyujyeta tatas aneka saṃbandha artham iti vacanam gamyeta utpatti saṃyoge tu etat na asti tasmāt ekaikasya kṛtsnena phalena abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti 
[I,635,iv_I,635,v]	prayoge puruṣa śruteḥ yathākāmī prayoge syāt darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti śrūyate atra saṃdehaḥ kim aniyamena ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ vā yajeran athavā ekaḥ eva yajeta iti nanu tṛtīyaḥ uktam śāstra phalam prayoktarī iti yadā prayoktari tadā vivakṣitam eka tvam yathā tathā vakṣyāmaḥ iha tu tat eva ākṣipyate punar ca nirṇeṣyate iti 
[I,636,i^1]	kim prāptam yathākāmī prayoge syāt kutas puruṣa śruteḥ puruṣaḥ śrūyate puruṣe yāgam śrāvayitvā kṛtārthaḥ śabdaḥ ekasya dvayoḥ bahūnām vā yāgam na vārayati na asau puruṣaḥ yāge śrūyate yāgam abhinirvartayet yāgena vā phalam abhinirvartayet iti katham tarhi yāgena phalam prāpnuyāt iti yāgasya vā phala nirvṛtteḥ vā na aṅgam puruṣaḥ yadi hi aṅgam abhaviṣyat yāge phala nirvṛttau vā tadā saṃkhyā guṇa bhūtā tad aṅgam puruṣam paricchindyāt atha punar aṅga bhūtam puruṣam prakāśayan lakṣaṇa tvena eva puruṣe abhisaṃbadhyeta na guṇa vacana tayā 
[I,636,i^2]	tatra ca avivakṣitam saṃkhyā vacanam yāvān arthī samarthaḥ ca tāvantam sarvam adhikṛtya etat ucyamānam na śakyate ekena vacanena viśeṣayitum katham ca puruṣa prādhānyam na phala utpattyā kiṃcid prayojanam asti na yāga utpattyā ātmā tu phala saṃbaddhaḥ sarvasya iṣṭaḥ tad artham karma kartavyam itaratha ucyamānam api na kriyeta tatra vacana arthakyam syāt tasmāt yāthākāmyam syāt ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ vā yajeran iti tathā ca darśayati yuvam hi sthaḥ su arpatī iti dvayoḥ yajamānayoḥ pratipadam kuryāt iti ete asṛgram indavaḥ iti bahubhyaḥ yajamānebhyaḥ iti dvayoḥ bahūnām ca yāgam pradarśayati 
[I,636,ii_I,636,iii]	pratyartham śruti bhāvaḥ iti ced iti ced idam ced paśyasi pratyartham śruti bhāvaḥ syāt yāgam abhinirvartayet tatas ca phalam prāpnuyāt iti kutas etat ubhayam hi etasmāt avagamyate katarat atra jahīmaḥ iti na adhyavasyāmaḥ tasmāt ubhayam api pratyetavyam āha nanu eka artha vacana tā na nyāyya iti ucyate yat avagamyate tat nyāyyam ubhayam ca pratīyate tasmāt ubhaya artha vacana tā eva nyāyyā yāgam prati ca guṇa bhāvāt vivakṣitam eka vacanam 
[I,637,i_I,637,ii]	tādarthye na guṇa artha tā nukte artha antara tvāt kartuḥ pradhāna bhūta tvāt na etat evam tādarthye puruṣe pradhāna bhūte sati na aṅga bhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ pratīyate anukte hi nyāye na pratīmaḥ artha antaram yatas guṇa bhāvāt pradhāna bhāvaḥ pradhāna bhūtaḥ ca atra kartā vacanasya arthavat tvāt atas na guṇa bhāvaḥ kartuḥ avakalpate codana eka tvāt ekā hi vidhāyikā codanā sā yadi phala utpattim yāga utpattim vā vidhatte tadā kartā na sva arthena yadā punar sva arthena tadā yāgaḥ phalam vā tādarthyena na ca etat yaugapadyena bhavati sva arthaḥ ekaḥ tad arthaḥ itaraḥ vaiparītyena vā iti yathā ubhābhyām bāhubhyām iṣūn asyati devadattaḥ iti gamyate na ca yaugapadyena yadā dakṣiṇena āsyati tadā savyena dhanuḥ pṛṣṭham namayati na tena api asyati iti gamyate tatra vyāpṛta tvāt evam yadā puruṣa prādhānyam tadā yāgasya phalasya vā guṇa bhāvaḥ gamyate tatra vyāpṛta tvāt na tayoḥ prādhānyam api gamyate tasmāt na yāge phale vā puruṣasya guṇa bhāvaḥ atas yāthākāmyam syāt ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ vā yajeran iti 
[I,638,i_I,638,ii^1]	api vā kāma saṃyoge saṃbandhāt prayogāya upadiśyeta pratyartham hi vidhi śrutiḥ viṣāṇa avat api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ prayogāya upadiśyeta kartā na sva arthena katham yajeta iti asya arthaḥ yāgam kuryāt yāgena vā kuryāt iti sattā abhivyakti mātram gamyate na phalasya kartā dhātā vā svarga kāma śabdaḥ ca svarga kāma mātre vartate na viśeṣam avalambate ātmanaḥ parasya vā iti śabda pramāṇakāḥ ca vayam īdṛśeṣu artheṣu katham tarhi kāmasya ātma saṃbandhaḥ avagamyate saṃbandhāt phala kāmaḥ anukte api śabdena ātmanaḥ eva phalam kāmayate na parasya yatra tu ubhau arthau vaktavyau bhavataḥ pratyartham tatra vidhiḥ śrūyate yathā kṛṣṇa viṣāṇayā kaṇḍūyati cātvāle kṛṣṇa viṣāṇām prāsyati iti yatra evam dve śrutī vidhātryau bhavataḥ tatra guṇa bhāvaḥ prādhānyam ca gamyate na tu atra evam dve vidhāyike śrutī vidyete guṇa bhūtaḥ tu puruṣaḥ śrūyate bhāvayet iti tatra yaji arthaḥ karaṇam karma vā saṃbandhāt tu puruṣa prādhānyam na kasyacid sukhena utpannena prayojanam sukha saṃbandhena ātmanaḥ tu kṛtyam tasmāt saṃbandhāt puruṣa prādhānyam gamyate na śruteḥ atas guṇa bhūtasya puruṣasya saṃkhyā vivakṣitā iti 
[I,638,iii_I,638,iv]	anyasya syāt iti ced iti ced bhavān paśyati evam sati yadi svarga kāmaḥ anyasya api svargam kāmayamānaḥ bhavati anyasya svargam kāmayamānaḥ api anyaḥ yajeta tatra pūrva uktaḥ nyāyaḥ pratyuddhṛtaḥ bhavati śāstra phalam prayoktarī iti 
[I,639,i_I,639,ii]	anya arthena abhisaṃbandhaḥ na parasya svarga kāmaḥ iti evam na yajeta na anyasya svarga kāma śabdaḥ na vācakaḥ iti katham tarhi phalam asau na prāpnoti iti katham punar phalasya aprāptiḥ upagraha viśeṣa śravaṇāt yajeta iti yat vā ādhāne brāhmaṇaḥ vasante agnim ādadhīta iti tadā tu kāma śrutau upagrahaḥ anuvādaḥ eva 
[I,639,iii_I,639,iv]	phala kāmaḥ nimittam iti ced evam ced bhavān manyate na svarga kāma śabdaḥ na vācakaḥ iti anyaḥ na yajeta phala abhāvāt na asya yāgaḥ iti sūktavāka phala arthi tayā tarhi yajeta āśāste ayam yajamānaḥ āyuḥ āśāste iti prayojayitāram nirdekṣyati hotā phala vidhiḥ ca sūktavākena prastaram praharati iti vidhānāt yadi phala vidhiḥ ayam māntra varṇikaḥ tarhi sūktavākena prastaraḥ prahṛtaḥ bhavati itaratha adṛṣṭam kalpyeta tasmāt ānuṣaṅgika phala artham anyasya svarga kāmaḥ anyaḥ yajeta iti 
[I,639,v_I,639,vi]	na nitya tvāt na etat asti yasya eva pradhāna karma phalam tasya eva ānuṣaṅgikam api bhavitum arhati evam sva arthena ādhānam kṛtam bhavati na hi ādhānasya sva artha tāyām asti viśeṣaḥ pradhāna phalam vānuṣaṅgikam vā sarvam eva ādhātari samavetum arhati nitya kāmyatā ca virudhyeta yadi āyuḥ ādi kāmaḥ yajeta na tarhi nityam yadi nityam na āyuḥ ādi kāmaḥ tasmāt na avasthitaḥ nyāyaḥ pratyuddhriyeta na ca puruṣaḥ pradhāna bhūtaḥ codyate guṇa bhāvāt tu asya vivakṣitam eka tvam tasmāt ekaḥ eva yajeta 
[I,640,i_I,640,ii]	karma tathā iti ced atha yat uktam dvayoḥ bahūnām ca yāgam darśayati yuvam hi sthaḥ svaḥpatī iti dvayoḥ yajamānayoḥ pratipadam kuryāt ete asṛgram indavaḥ iti bahubhyaḥ yajamānebhyaḥ pratipadam kuryāt iti dvi yajamānake bahu yajamānake ca karmaṇi pratipad vidhāne karma tathā yuktam syāt iti tat parihartavyam 
[I,640,iii_I,640,iv]	na samavāyāt na etat evam samavetam hi karma vidyate dvābhyām yajamānābhyām bahubhiḥ ca yajamānaiḥ vacanena yathā hīnāḥ teṣu pratipad vidhānam arthavat bhaviṣyati tasmāt ekaḥ yajeta iti 
[I,640,v_I,640,vi^1]	prakramāt tu niyamyeta ārambhasya kriyā nimitta tvāt prajā kāmaḥ yajeta grāma kāmaḥ yajeta iti evamādi karma samāmnāyate tatra saṃdehaḥ kim prakrāntam niyogataḥ samāpanīyam uta icchayā kāryam heyam vā iti kim prāptam niyogataḥ parisamāpayitavyam iti kutas evam hi śrūyate idam kāmaḥ yajeta iti evam tasya ākhyātasya artham upadiśanti upakrama prabhṛti apavarga paryantam āha iti upakramāt ārabhya yāvat parisamāptiḥ iti etāvān vyāpāra viśeṣaḥ tasya arthaḥ na yathā pākaḥ tyāgaḥ iti tatra hi pāka sattā mātram nirdiśyate na ārabhya parisamāpayitavyam iti evam ca ākhyāta artham laukikāḥ api pratipadyante tatra na ārambhe puruṣa prayatnaḥ ca udyate iti gamyate 
[I,640,vi^2]	yatas coditam na niyogataḥ ārabhante niyogataḥ punar parisamāpayanti tena na ubhe ārambha parisamāptī śabda arthaḥ kim tarhi parisamāptiḥ śabda arthaḥ parisamāptyām artha prāpta tvāt ārambhasya tasmāt parisamāptiḥ śabda arthaḥ iti gamyate sā ced śabda arthaḥ sā kartavya tayā codyate ārambhe na asti kartavyatā vacanam tena na niyogataḥ ārambhaḥ niyogataḥ tu parisamāptiḥ tena upakrānte karmaṇi yadi vīyāt phala icchā avāpnoti vā phalam tasyām api avasthāyām kartavyam eva upakrāntasya parisamāpanam 
[I,641,i]	nanu arthinaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ saḥ atra kartavyatayā ucyate na etat evam vākya arthaḥ hi sa bhavati yāgasya tu kartavyatā śrutyā gamyate tasmāt grāma kāmena yāgaḥ ārabdhaḥ parisamāpanīyaḥ grāma ādi kāmanā vacanam nimitta tvena tadā bhavati nimitte ca utpanne yat kartavyam iti ucyate tad vinaṣṭe api nimitte kartavyam eva upakrāntasya samāpanam kartavyam na hi tat vinaṣṭam anutpannam bhavati utpattiḥ ca nimittam na bhāvaḥ tasmāt vītāyām api phala icchāyām upakrāntam parisamāpayitavyam kriyāyāḥ hi nimittam ārambhaḥ saḥ api parisamāpteḥ iti 
[I,641,ii_I,641,iii]	phala arthi tvāt vā aniyamaḥ yathā anupakrānte vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati aniyamaḥ vā kasmāt phala arthi tvāt phala arthinaḥ phalam cikīrṣamāṇasya upāyaḥ ayam vidhīyate na kartavyatā sā hi vidhīyamānā phalasya vā yāgasya vā syāt phalasya na tāvat vaktavyā na hi yaḥ yat kāmayate tasya tat kartavyatā upadeṣṭavyā veda eva asau mayā eva etat kartavyam iti upāyam tu na veda tam ākāṅkṣate idam upadiśyate yāgaḥ upāyaḥ iti yāgena kriyate iti na ca yāgasya kartavyatā pratyakṣa virodhāt pratyakṣaḥ tu kleśaḥ yāgaḥ yadi yāgena anyasya kartavyatā tadā na virodhaḥ yāga kartavyatāyām phalam kalpyam na ca kalpyamānasya pramāṇam asti kartavyā upadeśaḥ ca śakya ādiṣu artheṣu bhavati tasmāt na yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ phala kāmasya yat iṣṭam tat kartavyam anūdya yathāprāptam yāgasya sādhana tā vidhīyate tena na avaśyam samāpanīyam bhavati yathā anukrāntam na avaśya upakramitavyam evam upakrāntam na avaśyam samāpayitavyam yat tu vākya arthaḥ śrutyā bādhyate iti yatra śruti arthaḥ na saṃbhavati tatra vākya arthaḥ gṛhyate iti uktam eva tasmāt aniyamaḥ 
[I,642,i_I,642,ii]	niyamaḥ vā tad nimitta tvāt kartuḥ tat kāraṇam syāt ārambhaḥ hi nimittam samāpteḥ katham tat kartuḥ kāraṇam syāt kim kāraṇam satya saṃkalpa tā yaḥ hi ārabdham evaṃjātīyakam samāpayati na tam śiṣṭāḥ vigarhante prākramikaḥ ayam asaṃvyavahāryaḥ iti śiṣṭa vigarhaṇā ca doṣaḥ tasmāt ārabhya samāpayitavyam āha śiṣṭāḥ punar kim artham vigarhantaḥ iti ucyate vigarhante tāvat kim naḥ viditena kāraṇena iti 
[I,643,i_I,643,ii]	loke karmāṇi veda vat tatas adhi puruṣa jñānam kenacid gṛham upakrāntam bhavati śakaṭam rathaḥ vā vītā asya phala icchā avāpnoti vā phalam tatra saṃdehaḥ kim tena niyogataḥ parisamāpayitavyam uta icchayā utsraṣṭavyam api iti kim prāptam loke karmāṇi evaṃjātīyakāni upakramya parisamāpayitavyāni yathā eva vaidikāni tathā eva tāni niyogataḥ parisamāpayīyāni kutas tatas adhi puruṣa jñānam tatas tatpuruṣa jñānam bhavitum arhati kutas śāstrāt āmnāyate hi takṣṇām śāstram tatra api devatā vyāpāraḥ aṅgīkriyate pūrvasyām diśi etāḥ devatāḥ itarāsu etāḥ iti yadi śāstra kṛte devatā vyāpāraḥ upakamya aparisamāpyamāne śiṣṭa vigarhaṇam evam iha api bhavitum arhati 
[I,643,iii_I,643,iv]	aparādhe api ca taiḥ śāstram teṣām ca laukikānām aparādhe taiḥ takṣabhiḥ prāyaścitta śāstram āmnāyate āre bhagnaḥ indra bāhuḥ baddhavyaḥ pāyasam ca brāhmaṇaḥ bhojayitavyaḥ iti prāyaścittam ca yadi adṛṣṭa artham na śāstrāt ṛte atha prasaṅga parihāra artham tatas api adṛtam eva tat iti gamyate 
[I,644,i_I,644,ii]	aśāstrā tu upasaṃprāptiḥ śāstram syāt na prakalpakam tasmāt arthena gami eta aprāpte vā śāstram arthavat tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati aśāstrā tu eṣām upasaṃprāptiḥ iti brūmaḥ smṛteḥ asyāḥ śāstram bhavatā anumīyate na śāstram antareṇa smṛtiḥ na ca smṛtim antareṇa takṣṇām granthaḥ upapadyate iti atas ucyate bhavati atra smṛtiḥ evam idam gṛha ādi karma ramaṇīyam bhavati iti na asmāt karmaṇaḥ adṛṣṭam kiṃcid iti yā ca asau ramaṇīya tā sa antareṇa api śāstram śakyāḥ jñātum jñātvā ca smaryate tasmāt na asyāḥ smṛteḥ śāstram
[I,644,iii]	prakalpyam yadi antareṇa śāstram na prāpyeta tatas śāstram atra arthavat iti prakalpyeta tasmāt na idam śāstra uktam śāstra ukte ca sāmi kṛte tyakte atyantam śiṣṭāḥ garhante devatā āśraye ca nanu atra api devatāḥ parigṛhītāḥ asyām diśi iyam devatā yakṣyate asyām iyam iti ucyate puruṣam anu devatāḥ śiṣṭāḥ smaryante na graham anu tasmāt adoṣaḥ iti 
[I,644,iv^1]	pratiṣedheṣu akarma tvāt kriyā syāt pratiṣiddhānām vibhakta tvāt akarmaṇām idam hi upadiśanti na kalañjam bhakṣayitavyam na laśunam na gṛñjanam ca iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim evaṃjātīyakam phala kāmena na bhakṣayitavyam niṣkāmeṇa ādyam atha vā niyogataḥ varjayitavyam eva iti kim prāptam phala arthinā na bhakṣayitavyam anarthinaḥ aniyamaḥ iti kutas niyamaḥ hi ayam ucyate idam na bhakṣayitavyam iti evam ukte dvayam āpatati yadi vā abhakṣaṇam kartavyam iti yadi vā bhakṣaṇam na kartavyam iti yadi nañviśiṣṭam bhakṣaṇam kartavyam iti abhyupagamyate tatas abhakṣaṇam śrutyā tavyaḥ vidadhāti nan bhakṣayati viśeṣaṇam 
[I,644,iv^2]	tad vyāpārāt ca kartavya tayā nan na saṃbadhyate atha nañarthaḥ kartavyaḥ tatas vākyena nidhānam bhakṣayatiḥ ca nañviśeṣaṇam śrutiḥ ca vākyāt balīyasī tasmāt abhakṣaṇam kartavyam iti gamyate abhakṣaṇam ca bhakṣaṇa abhāvaḥ na tasya kartavyatā asti tasmāt yaḥ tatra mānasaḥ vyāpāraḥ saḥ iha upadiśyate yena upāyena nañviśiṣṭam bhakṣaṇam bhavati pūrvam nañbha kṣayatyoḥ saṃbandhaḥ tatas vidhānam yathā na udyantam ādityam īkṣeta iti evamādiṣu prajāpati vrateṣu kurvataḥ phalam akurvataḥ na phalam na doṣaḥ evam iha api vibhakta tvāt akarmaṇām na atra karma pratiṣidhyate akarma mātram upadiśyate anyat dhi karma bhakṣaṇam pratiṣidhyamānam anyat akarma mānasaḥ saṃkalpaḥ iti 
[I,645,i_I,645,ii]	śāstrāṇām tu arthavat tvena puruṣa arthaḥ vidhīyate tayoḥ asamavāyi tvāt tādarthye vidhi atikramaḥ upavarṇanā parihāraḥ tāvat ucyate yuktam yat prajāpati vrateṣu śāstrāṇām arthavat tvena puruṣa arthaḥ vidhīyate tatra niyamaḥ kartavyatayā upadiśyate yaḥ ca kartavyaḥ sa kalyāṇa udayaḥ yaḥ na kartavyaḥ sa pāpa udayaḥ katham punar prajāpati vrateṣu niyamaḥ kartavya tayā ca udyate iti ucyate tasya vratam iti prakṛtya prajāpati vratāni samāmnātāni vratam iti ca mānasam karma ucyate idam na kariṣyāmi iti yaḥ saṃkalpaḥ katamat tat vratam na udyantam ādityam īkṣeta iti yathā tad īkṣaṇam na bhavati tathā mānasaḥ vyāpāraḥ kartavyaḥ tasya ca pālanam tatra tasmāt puruṣa arthaḥ asti iti avagantavyam tatra ca etāni eva prakṛtyā ucyate etāvatā ha ena sā yuktaḥ bhavati iti etāvatā kṛtena ayuktaḥ enasā bhavati iti 
[I,646,i]	atha iha tayoḥ asamavāyi tvam iha kriyā pratiṣidhyate na akriyā upadiśyate na hi kalañjam bhakṣayan pratiṣedha avidhim na atikrāmati iha punar ādityam paśyan na atikrāmati vidhim na hi tasya darśanam pratiṣiddham niyamaḥ tatra upadiṣṭaḥ yaḥ tam niyamam karoti sa phalena saṃbadhyate iha tu pratiṣidhyate kalañja ādi katham avagamyate na atra tasya vratam iti prakṛtya vacanam asti na ca na bhakṣayitavyam iti asya mānasaḥ vyāpāraḥ arthaḥ bhakṣayitavyam iti ca bhakṣaṇam kartavyam śabdena ucyate na iti tat pratiṣidhyate śrutyā eva evam prasiddhaḥ arthaḥ anugṛhītaḥ bhavati itarathā lakṣaṇā syāt śruti lakṣaṇa aviśaye ca śrutiḥ nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā tasmāt iha pratiṣedhaḥ 
[I,646,ii]	ucyate astu pratiṣiddham nāma doṣaḥ atra na śrūyate tasmāt pratiṣiddham api anuṣṭhātavyam iti kalpayiṣyate iti ced na pramāṇa abhāvāt arthāpattiḥ pramāṇam upadeśa vaiyartha prasaṅgāt iti yadi ucyeta na etat evam vyarthaḥ api hi upadeśaḥ ajñānāt saṃbhavati tasmāt na kalpyaḥ doṣaḥ iti ucyate satyam na kalpanīyaḥ kim tu kḷptaḥ eva katham anantaram eva enam śiṣṭāḥ varjayeyuḥ patitaḥ karma phalebhyaḥ iti vadantaḥ mahān ca eṣa doṣaḥ yat śiṣṭāḥ varjayanti tasmāt niyogataḥ kalañja ādi na bhakṣayitavyam iti yathā na sarpāya aṅgulim dadyāt tatra doṣa darśanāt niyogataḥ na sarpāya aṅguliḥ dīyate kaṇṭakaḥ vā na pādena adhiṣṭhīyate evam idam api iti 
[I,647,i_I,647,ii]	tasmin tu śiṣyamāṇāni jananena pravarteran iha smārtāḥ padārthāḥ udāharaṇam pratyupasthita niyamāḥ ca ācārāḥ guruḥ anugantavyaḥ abhivādayitavyaḥ ca vṛddha vayāḥ pratyuttheyaḥ saṃmantavyaḥ ca iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim jāta mātrāṇām ime padārthāḥ uta upanītānām iti kim prāptam aviśeṣa upadeśāt jāta mātrāṇām kutas puruṣe te śiṣyante jāta mātraḥ ca puruṣaḥ bhavati tasmāt jāta mātrāṇām ime padārthāḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ 
[I,647,iii_I,647,iv]	api vā veda tulya tvāt upāyena pravarteran api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ upāyena pravarteran upanayanena saha pravarteran veda tulya tvāt veda tulyā hi smṛtiḥ vaidikāḥ eva padārthāḥ smaryante iti uktam vaidikāḥ ca padārthāḥ upanayana uttara kāle samāmnātāḥ smārtāḥ ca ete vaidikāḥ eva tasmāt upanayana uttara kālāḥ ete iti 
[I,648,i_I,648,ii]	abhyāsaḥ akarma śeṣa tvāt puruṣa arthaḥ vidhīyate idam āmnanati yāvāt jīvam agnihotram juhoti yāvajjīvam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti puruṣa arthaḥ ayam yāgaḥ vidhīyate na ayam abhyāsaḥ karma śeṣaḥ iti uktam iha idānīm saṃdihyate kim sātatyena hotavyam uta na sātatyena iti kim prāptam puruṣam pratyupadiṣṭa tvāt sātatyena ayam puruṣaḥ iti sātatyena anuṣṭhātavyam nanu pradoṣam agnihotram hotavyam vyuṣṭāyām prātar iti śrūyate paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsyena yajeta amāvāsyāyām amāvāsyayena yajeta iti na eṣa sarva aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa prayogaḥ atas kāla mātre hīne na doṣaḥ 
[I,648,iii_I,648,iv]	tasmin asaṃbhavan arthāt na etat asti yat juhudhi juhudhi iti eva hotavyam iti yathā śaknoti tathā juhuyāt iti ucyate na ca sātatyena śakyate avaśyam anena āhāra vihārāḥ kartavyāḥ tasmāt artha aviruddheṣu kāleṣu satatam hotavyam iti 
[I,648,v_I,648,vi]	na kālebhyaḥ upadiśyante na ca etat asti yat uktam artha aviruddheṣu kaleṣu satatam hotavyam iti kālaḥ eṣaḥ śrūyate pradoṣam agnihotram hotavyam vyuṣṭāyām prātar iti tathā paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsyena yajeta amāvāsyāyām amāvāsyayena yajeta iti tasmāt na sātatyam iti āha nanu viguṇasya api prayogāt na kālaḥ ādaraṇīyaḥ iti atra ucyate na kālaḥ guṇaḥ nimittam hi etat iti uktam tasmāt anyeṣu kāleṣu avihita tvāt kṛtam api akṛtam syāt tasmāt āśrita kālasya yāvajjīvam prayogaḥ iti 
[I,649,i_I,649,ii]	darśanāt kāla liṅgānām kāla vidhānam liṅgam ca bhavati apa vai eṣa svargāt lokāt chidyate yaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsa yājī san paurṇamāsīm amāvasyām vā atipātayet iti yadi sarvasmin kāle homaḥ tadā kasya atipattiḥ syāt tasmāt api na satatam abhyāsaḥ 
[I,649,iii_I,649,iv]	teṣām autpattika tvāt āgamena pravarteta pradoṣe agnihotram hotavyam vyuṣṭāyām prātar iti tathā paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsyena yajeta amāvāsyāyām āmāvāsyayena yajeta iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim sakṛt pradoṣa hotavyam uta pradoṣe pradoṣaḥ iti tathā sakṛt vyuṣṭāyām prātar uta vyuṣṭāyām vyuṣṭāyām iti tathā kim sakṛt paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām vā uta āgataḥ āgate kālaḥ iti kim prāptam sakṛt kṛtvā kṛtārthaḥ śabdaḥ na niyamaḥ paunaḥpunye 
[I,649,v]	iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ āgamena pravarteta āgataḥ āgate kāle prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ iti kutas teṣām autpattika tvāt utpadyamānam karma kāla saṃyuktam eva utpadyate tat uktam nimitta arthāḥ kālaśrutayaḥ iti nimitte ca saṃprāpte naimittikaḥ arthaḥ kartavyaḥ bhavati tasmāt āgataḥ āgate kāle prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ 
[I,650,i_I,650,ii]	tathā hi liṅga darśanam apa vai eṣa svargāt lokāt chidyate yaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsa yājī san paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyām vā atipātayet iti āgataḥ āgate kāle prayogam darśayati 
[I,650,iii_I,650,iv]	tathā antar kratu prayuktāni bhinne juhoti skanne juhoti iti darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate tatra saṃdehaḥ sakṛt bhinne skanne ca hutvā kṛtārthaḥ uta bhinne bhinne skanne skanne ca iti tatra adhikaraṇa atideśaḥ yaḥ pūrvatra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ saḥ iha pūrvaḥ yaḥ uttaraḥ saḥ iha uttaraḥ iti sakṛt kṛtvā kṛtārthaḥ iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ nimitta tvāt punar prayogaḥ iti uttaraḥ 
[I,650,v_I,650,vi]	ācārāt gṛhyamāṇeṣu tathā syāt puruṣa artha tvāt guruḥ anugantavyaḥ abhivādayitavyaḥ ca vṛddha vayāḥ pratyuttheyaḥ saṃmantavyaḥ ca iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim āgataḥ āgate gurau vṛddha vayasi ca yat uktam tat kartavyam uta sakṛt kṛte kṛtārtha iti ācārāt gṛhyamāṇeṣu tathā syāt puruṣa artha tvāt iti adhikaraṇa atideśaḥ tatra yaḥ pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ saḥ iha pūrvaḥ yaḥ uttaraḥ saḥ uttaraḥ sakṛt kṛtvā kṛtārthaḥ iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ nimitta tvāt punar prayogaḥ iti uttaraḥ 
[I,651,i_I,651,iii]	brāhmaṇasya tu soma vidyā prajam ṛṇa vakyena saṃyogāt idam śrūyate somena yajeta garbha aṣṭameṣu brāhmaṇam upanayīta prajām utpādayet iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim nityāni etāni uta anityāni iti kim prāptam kāma saṃyogāt anityāni iti prāptaḥ ucyate brāhmaṇa ādīnām soma ādīni nityāni iti kutas ṛṇa vākyena hi saṃyogaḥ bhavati jāyamānaḥ ha vai brāhmaṇaḥ tribhiḥ ṛṇavā jāyate yajñena devebhyaḥ brahmacaryeṇa ṛṣibhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhyaḥ iti sa vai tarhi anṛṇaḥ yadā yajvā brahmacārī prajāvān iti ṛṇa saṃstavaḥ avaśya kartavyānām bhavati tasmāt nityāni iti 
[I,651,iv]	nanu liṅgam asādhakam nyāyaḥ ucyatām yasya etat dyotakam iti ucyate akāma saṃyuktāni eṣām pṛthak vākyāni bhavanti vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta yāvajjīvam agnihotram juhoti yāvajjīvam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta tathā vidyām adhīyīta tathā prajāḥ utpādayitavyā iti evam nityatāyāḥ prāptāyāḥ idam liṅgam bhavati iti 
[I,651,v]	atha vā ayam anyaḥ arthaḥ brāhmaṇasya tu soma vidyā prajam ṛṇa vākyena saṃyogāt soma ādayaḥ niyatāḥ kim brāhmaṇasya eva rājanya vaiśyayoḥ aniyatāḥ uta sarveṣām niyatāḥ iti kim prāptam brāhmaṇasya eva niyatāḥ na itarayoḥ iti kutas evam śrūyate jāyamānaḥ ha vai brāhmaṇaḥ iti brāhmaṇasya niyamaḥ dṛśyate na itarayoḥ brāhmaṇa saṃkīrtanāt evam prāpte brūmaḥ sarveṣām niyamaḥ kutas aviśeṣeṇa niyama vidhānam yat tat akāma saṃyuktam vacanam niyāmakam tat aviśiṣṭam sarveṣām tasmāt sarveṣām niyamaḥ iti 
[I,652,i]	nanu jāyamānaḥ ha vai brāhmaṇaḥ iti brāhmaṇasya saṃkīrtanam ucyate bhavati asmin vacane brāhmaṇa saṃkīrtanam na tu etat niyamasya vidhāyakam etaiḥ akāma saṃyuktaiḥ vacanaiḥ vihitabhya niyamasya anuvādaḥ ayam avadānaḥ tuti arthaḥ tasmāt na atra brāhmaṇa saṃkīrtanena rājanyasya vaiśyasya vā aniyamaḥ vijñāyate brāhmaṇa grahaṇam tu pradarśana artham jāyamānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ rājanyaḥ vaiśyaḥ vā iti tathā jāyamānaḥ jātaḥ ca iti 
[I,653,i_I,653,ii]	sarva śaktau pravṛttiḥ syāt tathābhūta upadeśāt bahvṛca brahmaṇe śrūyate yāvajjīvam agnihotram juhoti yāvajjīvam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti nityam agnihotram nityau ca darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra yat etat kāma śravaṇāt anyat akāma śravaṇam dvitīyam tatra saṃdehaḥ kim yaḥ kārtsnyena vidhim upasaṃhartum śaknoti tasya eva adhikāraḥ uta viguṇam api tat prayoktavyam iti ekādaśe kāma saṃyukte prathame śravaṇe cintayiṣyate sa aṅge iha nitye śravaṇe dvitīyaḥ iti 
[I,653,iii]	kim prāptam sarva śaktau pravṛttiḥ syāt tathābhūta upadeśāt yaḥ kārtsnyena vidhim upasaṃhartum śaknoti saḥ eva anutiṣṭhet tathābhūta upadeśāt yathābhūtam hi tat kāma saṃyuktam śrutam tathābhūtam eva nityam api upadiśyate tasmāt sarva aṅga upahāreṇa prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsa śabdaḥ ca sāṅgasya eva vācakaḥ katham paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām ca sāṅgam vidhīyate yat ca paurṇamāsyām vihitam sā ca paurṇamāsī yat amāvāsyāyām vihitam sā ca amāvāsya iti sāṅgam amāvāsyāyām vihitam paurṇamāsyām ca tasmāt sāṅgam darśa pūrṇamāsa śabdena ucyate iti jaiminiḥ manyate sma 
[I,654,i_I,654,ii]	api vā api eka deśe syāt pradhāne hi artha nivṛttiḥ guṇa mātram itarat tad artha tvāt api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ api eka deśe aṅgānām syāt eva prayogaḥ yatas sāṅgasya api anaṅgasya api prayujyamānasya pradhānāt eva ayam arthaḥ niṣpadyate guṇa mātram sarva aṅga prayogeṇa bhavati kaḥ guṇaḥ sa aṅgāt svarga abhinirvṛttiḥ pradhāna mātrāt idam anyat phalam tasmāt svarga prāpti artham saṃpūrṇa aṅgam kariṣyāmi iti ārabdham yadi kānicid aṅgāni na śaknoti kartum tathā api asmāt eka deśa aṅga guṇa yuktāt pradhānāt phalam bhaviṣyati tasmāt pradhāna mātrasya prayogam āha na aṅgānām darśa pūrṇam āśabdakaḥ agnihotra śabdakaḥ ca pradhāna padārthaḥ anyāni aṅgāni tad arthāni iti 
[I,654,iii_I,654,iv]	tad akarmaṇi ca doṣaḥ tasmāt tatas viśeṣaḥ syāt pradhānena abhisaṃbandhāt pradhāna atikrame doṣaḥ śrūyate apa vai eṣa svargāt lokāt chidyate yaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsa yājī san paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyām vā atipātayet iti pradhāna atikrame doṣam bruvan tasya nityatām darśayati 
[I,654,v_I,654,vi]	karma abhedam tu jaiminiḥ prayoga vacana eka tvāt sarveṣām upadeśaḥ syāt iti yat uktam na asti bhedaḥ imāni aṅgāni imāni pradhānāni iti prayoga vacana eka tvāt iti jaiminiḥ āha sma sarveṣām upadeśakaḥ paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsyāḥ yajeta amāvāsyāyām amāvāsyayā yajeta iti 
[I,655,i_I,655,ii]	arthasya vyapavargi tvāt ekasya api prayoge syāt yathā kratu antareṣu eka aṅga prayoge api syāt viguṇāt api phalam iti arthaḥ kutas arthasya vyapavargi tvāt vyapavṛktam aṅgebhyaḥ pradhānam agnihotra saṃjñakāt darśa pūrṇamāsa saṃjñakāt ca phalam iha bhavati tat dhi kartavyatayā upadiśyate yat paurṇamāsyām upadiṣṭam sā paurṇamāsī yat amāvāsyāyām sā amāvāsyā yat āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ amāvāsyāyām paurṇamāsyām ca acyutaḥ bhavati iti tasmāt agnaye puroḍāśaḥ agnīṣomābhyām ca ājyam ca agnīṣoma ādibhyaḥ paurṇamāsyām āgneya sāṃnyāyya ādīnām amāvāsyāyām 
[I,655,iii]	yat uktam paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsyāḥ yajeta amāvāsyāyām amāvāsyayā yajeta iti sāṅgasya vidhānāt sāṅgam darśa pūrṇamāsa śabdena abhidhīyate iti na etat evam siddhe hi darśa arthe pūrṇamāsa arthe ca sāṅgam phale vidhīyate tasmāt na sāṅgam agnihotra pada vācyam darśa pūrṇamāsa pada vācyam ca yat ca agnihotram tat iha codyate kartavya tayā yau ca darśa pūrṇamāsau tasmāt viguṇam api kartavyam eva agnihotram darśa pūrṇamāsau ca yathā kratu antareṣu prakṛti vikṛtiṣu parasya dharmāḥ parasya na bhavanti evam na kāma saṃyuktasya dharmāḥ nityasya bhavitum arhanti 
[I,655,iv_I,655,v]	vidhi aparādhe ca darśanāt samāpteḥ vidhi aparādheṣu ca samāptim darśayati tat eva yādṛś tādṛś hotavyam iti viguṇasya samāptim darśayati 
[I,656,i_I,656,ii]	prāyaścitta vidhānāt ca vidhi aparādhe ca prāyaścittāni vidhīyante nimitte karma aṅga bhūtāni yathā bhinne juhoti iti viguṇe niṣphale sati kasya aṅga bhūtaiḥ prayojanam syāt tasmāt viguṇānām api prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ iti 
[I,656,iii_I,656,iv]	kāmyeṣu ca evam arthi tvāt aindrāgnam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet prajā kāmaḥ sauryam carum nirvapet brahmavarcaskāmaḥ vaiśvadevīm sāṃgrāhāyaṇīm nirvapet grāma kāmaḥ iti evamādiṣu saṃdehaḥ kim viguṇam api phalavat uta aviguṇam eva phalavat iti kim prāptam kāmyeṣu ca evam syāt viguṇam api phalavat iti kutas arthi tvāt yadi viguṇam api phalavat evam arthi mātram adhikṛtam bhaviṣyati anyathā sāmānya śabdaḥ antareṇa viśeṣam viśeṣe avasthāpitaḥ bhaviṣyati asamartha tvāt na adhikriyate iti ced sāṅgam na samarthaḥ kartum pradhāna mātram tu śaknoti pradhāna mātre adhikariṣyati 
[I,656,v_I,656,vi]	asaṃyogāt tu na evam syāt vidheḥ śabda pramāṇa tvāt tuśabdāt pakṣaḥ viparivartate na evam syāt yat uktam viguṇam api phalavat iti asaṃyogāt pradhāna mātrasya phalena sa aṅgāt dhi phalam śrūyate pradhānāt na kevalāt tena yadi api kevalam ucyate tathā api na evaṃjātīyakam tat kuryāt na kevalasya phalena saṃyogaḥ iti śabda pramāṇakaḥ ca ayam arthaḥ vidhīyate śabdaḥ ca sa aṅgāt phalam āha iti vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt na viguṇam karma kartavyam evaṃjātīyakam iti 
[I,657,i_I,657,ii]	akarmaṇi ca apratyavāyāt na ca atra pradhāna mātrasya akarmaṇi pratyavāyaḥ ucyate yathā darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ tasmāt api na viguṇam evaṃlakṣaṇakam karma prayoktavyam iti 
[I,657,iii_I,657,iv]	kriyāṇām āśrita tvāt dravya antare vibhāgaḥ syāt darśa pūrṇamāsa yāgaḥ puroḍāśena uktaḥ sa ca puroḍāśaḥ vrīhi mayaḥ kartavyaḥ iti śrūyate tatra etat cintyate yadi nīvāra mayena puroḍāśena yāgaḥ kriyeta kim saḥ eva yāgaḥ syāt uta anyaḥ iti kim prāptam dravya antare vibhāgaḥ syāt anyaḥ yāgaḥ kutas āśrita tvāt āśraya bhedāt dhi gamyate viśeṣaḥ ayam anyaḥ nīvāra āśrayaḥ vrīhi āśrayāt iti āśraya bhedaḥ tāvat vispaṣṭaḥ eva tad bhedāt rūpam api bhinnam gamyate tasmāt anyaḥ yāgaḥ dravya antaraḥ iti 
[I,657,v_I,657,vi]	api vā avyatirekāt rūpa śabda avibhāgāt ca go tva vat aikarmyam syāt nāmadheyam ca sattva vat api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ aika karmyam syāt dravya antare api yadā kriyā bhavati calanam patanam vā tadā api tāvān eva saḥ arthaḥ na ca kaścid tatra vyatiriktaḥ viśeṣaḥ hīnaḥ vā no khalu api anyat eva rūpam na ca śabda antaram vācakam 
[I,658,i]	nanu āśraya bhedaḥ vispaṣṭaḥ ucyate bhinnam eva vayam āśrayam pratijānīmahe na tu tad bhedāt āśritasya bhedaḥ anya tvat na hi sraji vā asati vā bhinne tad bhedāt puruṣa bhedaḥ gamyate saḥ api tasya ātmā bhinnaḥ iti ced na etat evam viśeṣam upalabhamānaiḥ evam śakyam vaktum na ca asya viśeṣaḥ upalabhyate 
[I,658,ii]	nanu ayam eva viśeṣaḥ yat ekaḥ api vinaṣṭaḥ ekaḥ api vartate na vinaṣṭaḥ iti yat ucyate tat na prāk asya upalambhanāt sattve pramāṇam na asti tasmāt vinaṣṭaḥ na ca pratyabhijñāyate tat dravya atiriktaḥ bheda anupalambhāt katham tarhi calati iti pratyayaḥ iti ced ucyate deśa antare saṃpratipatti darśanāt tat deśa antaram gacchat āgacchat ca calati iti ucyate tatra gantā api pratyakṣaḥ deśān atram api tena gataḥ iti ca ucyate āgataḥ iti ca ucyate satyam vinaṣṭāt avinaṣṭaḥ anyaḥ yaḥ api tu asau anyaḥ saḥ api yajati śabda vācyaḥ eva yajati sāmānyam na bhidyate na ca śabdena na ucyate tasmāt yaḥ api nīvāraiḥ yāgam kuryāt tena api coditam eva kṛtam coditam ca kurvataḥ īpsitam bhavati na apūrva kṛtam nāmadheyam ca darśayati darśaḥ iti vā pūrṇamāsaḥ iti vā asya eva sāmānyasya yathā sattveṣu sāmānyasya nāmadheyam na vyaktīnām kim prayojanam cintāyāḥ uttareṇa adhikaraṇena etat vicāryate 
[I,659,i_I,659,ii]	śruti pramāṇa tvāt śiṣṭa abhāve na āgamaḥ anyasya āśiṣṭa tvāt agnihotra ādīni nityāni karmāṇi udāharaṇam teṣu śruta dravya apacāre bhavati saṃdehaḥ kim pratinidhim upādāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ uta tad antam karma utsraṣṭavyam iti kim prāptam śiṣṭasya abhāve na āgamaḥ anyasya tad antam eva utsraṣṭavyam kutas aśiṣṭa tvāt yat vrīhi yava guṇakam śrutam phalavat tat nīvāra guṇakam kriyamāṇam aphalakam bhavati tasmāt tad antam eva utsraṣṭavyam iti 
[I,659,iii_I,659,iv]	kvacid vidhānāt ca kvacid vidhīyate yadi somam na vindet pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyāt iti yadi ca pratinidhim upādāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ syāt na vidhīyeta vidhīyate tu tasmāt yat ca na vidhīyate na tatra pratinidhiḥ iti 
[I,660,i_I,660,ii]	āgamaḥ vā codanā artha aviśeṣāt āgamaḥ vā pratinidheyasya dravyasya kutas codanā artha aviśeṣāt yajati codanā coditaḥ hi arthaḥ na viśiṣyate vīhibhiḥ nīvāraiḥ vā kriyamāṇaḥ yāgaḥ ca avaśya kartavyaḥ nityeṣu anityeṣu ca prārabdheṣu 
[I,660,iii_I,660,iv]	niyama arthaḥ kvacid vidhiḥ atha yat uktam kvacid vidhānāt iti ucyate niyama arthaḥ kvacid vidhiḥ soma abhāve bahuṣu sadṛśeṣu prāpteṣu niyamaḥ kriyate pūtīkāḥ eva abhiṣotavyāḥ iti tasmāt pratinidhim upādāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ iti 
[I,660,v_I,660,vi]	tat nityam tat cikīrṣā hi katham punar idam avagamyate niyama artham eva tat vacanam iti ucyate yatas prāptāḥ pūtīkāḥ katham ca te prāptāḥ tat cikīrṣā hi tatra sādṛśya cikīrṣā iti etat vakṣyāmaḥ tad cikīrṣayā ca prāptāḥ pūtīkāḥ tasmāt tat nityam vacanam etat niyamāya nityam iti gamyate 
[I,660,vii_I,660,viii]	na devatā agni śabda kriyam anya artha saṃyogāt devatāḥ āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ iti evamādyāḥ agniḥ yat āhavanīye juhvati tena saḥ asya abhīṣṭaḥ prītaḥ bhavati iti śabdaḥ mantraḥ barhiḥ deva sadanam dāmi iti evamādiḥ kriyāḥ samidhaḥ yajati tanūnapātam yajati iti evamādyāḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ devatā agni śabda kriyāṇām apacāre pratinidhiḥ upādeyaḥ uta na iti kim prāptam pūrva adhikaraṇa nyāyena pratinidhāya anyat prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ iti 
[I,661,i]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ na devatā agni śabda kriyāṇām apacāre pratinidhinā bhavitavyam iti kutas anya artha saṃyogāt pratinidhīyamānam anyat etebhyaḥ anyat ca teṣām artham na śaknuyāt kartum kaḥ ca teṣām arthaḥ devatā tāvat uddeśena artham sādhayati agnim uddiśya aṣṭākapālaḥ paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām ca tyajyate yat ca anyeṣu haviḥṣu vihitam na tatas darśa pūrṇamāsau bhavataḥ tatra anya uddiśyamānāḥ na śrutāyāḥ uddeśyāyāḥ artham kuryāt na hi anyasyām uddiśyamānāyām darśa pūrṇamāsau bhavataḥ tasmāt na devatā pratinidhīyate 
[I,661,ii]	tathā yat āhavanīye juhvati iti āvahanīya apacāre na anyaḥ agniḥ pratinidhātavyaḥ anyat vā dravyam iti kutas anya artha saṃyogāt pratinidhīyamānam āhavanīya kārye na vartate katham adṛṣṭam āhavanīyasya kāryam āhavanīyasya upari tyajyamāne yat bhavati na tat anyasya upari na hi yajati śabdena sāmarthyāt tat gṛhyate yasya upari tyajyate na hi upari yajyamānasya deśaḥ kiṃcid upakaroti iti tasmāt na agneḥ pratinidhiḥ 
[I,661,iii_I,662,i]	tathā mantra apacāre na anyaḥ mantraḥ pratinidhīyate mantrasya hi etat prayojanam yat smārayati kriyām sādhanam vā asati smaraṇe na kriyā saṃvarteta tat apacarite mantre yadi tasya arthe anyam śabdam uccārayati pūrvam pratīte arthe śabdam uccārayan na śabdena artham pratīyāt atha pratītam api punar pratinidhi śabda uccāraṇena pratīyāt śabdāt pratītim kuryāt evam ca pratinidhi śabda uccāraṇa anurodhaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt na hi śabdena pratyāpayitavyam iti kiṃcid pramāṇam asti yat asti tat viśeṣeṇa eva anena śabdena barhirādinā iti evam tad abhāve śabda antara anurodhaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt tasmāt na śabdasya pratinidhiḥ kriyā apacāre na kriyā antaram anya artha saṃyogāt samidh yajimantau darśa pūrṇamāsau kartavyau tau anyasyām kriyamāṇāyām na tad vantau bhavataḥ tasmāt kriyāyām na pratinidhiḥ iti 
[I,662,ii_I,662,iii]	devatāyām ca tad artha tvāt devatāyām aparaḥ viśeṣaḥ yena na pratinidhīyate devatāḥ nāma yat artham kiṃcid codyate sā anyā tasyāḥ sthāne pratinidhīyamānā na devatā syāt coditā hi devatā bhavati na ācoditā saṃbandhi śabdaḥ ca eṣaḥ yā yat artham codyate sā tasya eva devatā na anyasya devatā iti saṃbandhi śabdaḥ na jāti śabdaḥ tasmāt api na devatāyāḥ pratinidhiḥ iti 
[I,662,iv_I,662,v]	pratiṣiddham ca aviśeṣeṇa hi tad śrutiḥ atha yat pratiṣiddham ayajñiyāḥ vai varakāḥ kodravāḥ ayajñiyāḥ vai māṣāḥ iti kim tat śruta dravya apacāre pratinidhātavyam uta na iti kim prāptam pratinidheyam iti āgamaḥ vā codanā artha aviśeṣāt iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ pratiṣiddham ca na pratinidhātavyam iti aviśeṣeṇa hi etat ucyate na yajña arhāḥ māṣāḥ varakāḥ kodravāḥ ca iti yajña saṃbandhaḥ eṣām pratiṣidhyate na ete yajña aṅga bhāvam netavyāḥ iti pratinidhīyamānāḥ ca aṅga bhāvam nītāḥ syuḥ tasmāt na ete pratinidhātavyāḥ iti 
[I,663,i_I,663,ii]	tathā svāminaḥ phala samavāyāt phalasya karma yogi tvāt agnihotra ādīni karmāṇi udāharaṇam teṣu svāmini apacarati saṃdehaḥ kim anyaḥ pratinidhātavyaḥ na iti kim prāptam pratinidhātavyaḥ iti kutas āgamaḥ vā codanā artha aviśeṣāt iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ tathā svāminaḥ syāt kaḥ arthaḥ na pratinidhiḥ kutas phala samavāyāt yaḥ arthī sva tyāgena ṛtvijaḥ parikrīṇīte yaḥ ca svam pradeyam tyajati sa svāmī yadi sa pratinidhīyate svāminā yat kartavyam tat sarvam kuryāt tat sarvam kurvan svāmi eva syāt na pratinidhiḥ saḥ eva hi phalena saṃbadhyate yaḥ utsargam karoti sa phalavān bhavati tat uktam śāstra phalam prayoktarī iti tasmāt na svāminaḥ pratinidhiḥ iti 
[I,664,i_I,664,ii]	bahūnām tu pravṛtte anyam āgamayet avaiguṇyāt satrāṇi udāharaṇam saptadaśa avarāḥ satram āsīran iti teṣu kasmiṃścid svāmini apacarati saṃdehaḥ kim tatra anyaḥ pratinidhātavyaḥ uta na iti kim prāptam na svāminaḥ pratinidhiḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ bahūnām yajamānānām pravṛtte karmaṇi apacarite kasmiṃścid svāmini anyam āgamayet kutas evam avaiguṇyam bhavati iti svāmi gatā saptadaśa ādi saṃkhyā tatra aṅgam tayā vinā karma viguṇam tad saṃpādanāya anyaḥ āgamayitavyaḥ 
[I,664,iii]	nanu svāmi gatā saṃkhyā na tu āgamyamānaḥ svāmī iti vakṣyāmaḥ tena aśakyā eva sā saṃkhyā upādātum iti ucyate svāmi gatā na hi bhaviṣyati na hi sā śakyā kartum iti idam tu śakyam kartum ye svāminām padārthāḥ te iha saptadaśa avaraiḥ kartavyā iti etat upapāditam bhaviṣyati tasmāt pratinidhātavyam tatra iti 
[I,664,iv_I,664,v]	sa svāmī syāt tad saṃyogāt tasmin āgamyamānaḥ idānīm saṃdehaḥ kim asau svāmī uta karmakaraḥ iti kim prāptam sa svāmī syāt kasmāt tad saṃyogāt tena svāmi tvena saṃyogaḥ yaḥ hi asau ānīyate sa svāmī kriyate svāmini apacarite anyaḥ yadi svāmī kriyate tatas sa pratinidhiḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati tasmāt svāmī iti 
[I,665,i_I,665,ii]	karmakaraḥ vā bhṛta tvāt karmakaraḥ vā sa syāt kutas bhṛta tvat bhṛtaḥ hi asau taiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ svāmibhiḥ prayuktaḥ parikrīyamāṇaḥ na svāmī bhavati yaḥ phalam prāpnoti sa svāmī yaḥ parasya upakāre vartate sa karmakaraḥ na eva asau phalam prāpnoti kutas yaḥ hi ārabhya parisamāpayati sa phalavān eṣa hi ākhyāta arthaḥ sa hi upakrama prabhṛti apavarga paryantam āha nanu te api tatra viguṇam kurvanti saptadaśānām svāminām abhāvāt tasmāt te api na svāminaḥ no ced svāminaḥ na phalam prāpnuvanti ucyate na saptadaśa avarāḥ phala samavāye bhaveyuḥ iti śrūyate na saṃkhyā phala parigrahe guṇa bhūtā kim tarhi padārtheṣu saptadaśa avaraiḥ yājamānāḥ padārthāḥ kartavyāḥ iti te ca pratinihitena kriyante aphala tve api ca satyam saṃkalpam kartum anyam ānayanti ānīyamānasya ca na tena prayojanam 
[I,665,iii_I,665,iv]	tasmin ca phala darśanāt tasmin ca diṣṭām gatim gate phalam darśayati yaḥ dīkṣitānām pramīyeta api tasya phalam iti tasmāt karmakaraḥ iti 
[I,665,v_I,665,vi]	sa tat dharmā syāt karma saṃyogāt bahūnām kasmiṃścid apacarite pratinidheyaḥ anyaḥ iti etat samadhigatam idam idānīm tatra saṃdigdham kim asau svāmidharmā syāt uta ṛtvij dharmā kim prāptam ṛtvij dharmā kutas para artham hi sa yajati yaḥ ca para artham yajati saḥ ṛtvij iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ sa tat dharmā syāt svāmi dharmā tasya hi kārye śūyate yaḥ ca yasya kāryam adhitiṣṭhati sa tad dharmaiḥ saṃbadhyate yathā sruc dharmaiḥ svadhitiḥ iti 
[I,666,i_I,666,ii]	sāmānyam tat cikīrṣā hi śrute dravye apacarati pratinidhim upādāya prayoktavyam iti sthitam tatra saṃdehaḥ kim yat kiṃcid dravyam upādāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ uta sadṛśam iti kim prāptam yat kiṃcid upādāya iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ sāmānyam yatra gṛhyate tat upādātavyam sadṛśam iti kutas sarve hi ākṛti vacanāḥ śabdāḥ ākṛtiḥ ca yadi api aṅga bhāvena śrūyate tathā api na sākṣāt tasyāḥ kriyām pratyaṅga bhāvaḥ yat tu kriyā sādhanam dravyam arthāt aṅga bhūtam prāptam tat paricchindatī kriyāyām aṅga bhāvam yāti vyakteḥ ca ākṛtyāḥ viśeṣāḥ paricchidyante te viśeṣāḥ aṅga bhūtāḥ atha tasyām ākṛtau apacaritāyām artha prāptam dravyam grahītavyam eva yasmin ca sadṛśe gṛhyamāṇe teṣām viśeṣāṇām kecid saṃgṛhītāḥ bhavanti sa tatra lābhaḥ labhyate iti tad sadṛśam dravyam upādātavyam bhavati tasmāt vrīhīṇām apacāre nīvārāḥ pratinidheyāḥ iti 
[I,667,i_I,667,ii]	nirdeśāt tu vikalpe yat pravṛttam asti jyotiṣṭome paśuḥ agniṣomīyaḥ yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yat agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhate iti tatra śrūyate khādire paśum badhnāti pālāśe badhnāti rauhitake badhnāti iti tatra kadācid khadira guṇake prayogaḥ ārabdhe khadiraḥ vinaṣṭaḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ kim vaikalpikasya upādānam uta khadira sadṛśasya iti kim prāptam vaikalpikasya iti kutas sa hi śrutaḥ khadira sadṛśaḥ na śrūyate tasmāt vaikalpikasya upādānam iti 
[I,667,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ vikalpe yat pravṛttam tad sadṛśam upādeyam yat pravṛttam yasmin prayoge tat nirdiṣṭam tat aṅga bhūtam vaikalpikam anaṅgam āśrita khadire prayoge palāśa rauhitakau anaṅga būtau tau na śakyete yadā khadiraḥ tadā eva kartum aśakyam ca aśrutam tasmāt āśrita khadire prayogaḥ itarau na upādeyau anaṅga bhūta tvāt khadirasya sadṛśam anveṣitavyam iti 
[I,667,iv_I,667,v]	aśabdam iti ced iti ced paśyasi khadira sadṛśam upādeyam iti aśabdam evam kṛtam bhavati tasmāt śabdavat tvāt vaikalpikam upādeyam 
[I,667,vi_I,667,vii]	na anaṅga tvāt na etat evam anaṅgam tasmin prayoge vaikalpikam āśrita khadiraḥ hi sa prayogaḥ yaḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ tasya nirdeśāt itarau aśrutau nanu nirdeśa abhāve aṅga bhāva virodhaḥ tena śrutau iti kim atas yadi evam yadā upāttasya abhāvaḥ tadā śravaṇam na etat evam naimittikam hi tathā pratijñāyeta sati vacane nimitte asati khadiraḥ itarau śrutau iti tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ saḥ eva apekṣitaḥ anapekṣitaḥ ca iti virodhaḥ bhavet saṃskārāḥ ca khadire kartavyāḥ khadira sadṛśe tad buddhyāḥ gṛhyamāṇe śruta buddhyā kṛtāḥ bhavanti vaikalpikena tu śrutena asaṃbaddhāḥ tasmāt upātta sadṛśaḥ grāhyaḥ iti 
[I,668,i_I,668,ii]	vacanāt ca anyāyyam abhāve tad sāmānyena pratinidhiḥ abhāvāt itarasya idam āmananti yadi na somam vindet pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyāt iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ayam abhāve nimitte vidhiḥ uta pratinidhi niyamaḥ iti kim prāptam abhāve vidhiḥ iti kutas vidhānāt na hi pratinidhiḥ vidhīyate sādhya siddhaye sādhanam svayam eva upādīyate idam tu vidhīyate tat kalpa antarapekṣe arthavat bhavati tasmāt na pratinidhiḥ 
[I,668,iii]	iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ pratinidhiḥ syāt kutas vinaṣṭe hi sādhane sādhya siddhi artham sādhana antaram upādīyate śrutasya abhāvāt nanu anyāyyāḥ pūtīkāḥ anyat dhi sadṛśa antaram asti iti tat ucyate vacanāt sadṛśe prāpte bahuṣu vā sadṛśeṣu pūtīkāḥ alpa sadṛśāḥ niyamyante katham tat dhi prakrāntam karma avaśyam kartavyam tasyām avasthāyām antareṇa eva vacanam pratinidheyam dravya antaram prāptam eva prāpte vacanam na vidhiḥ iti gamyate prāptasya anuvādaḥ bhavitum arhati kim artham anuvādaḥ iti ced ucyate alpa sādṛśyam aprāptam tad vidhāna artham anuvādaḥ prayojanam pakṣa uktam pratinidhi pakṣe soma sadṛśasya upādānam pūtīka vināśe dravya antara vidhau pūtīka sadṛśam upādeyam 
[I,669,i_I,669,ii]	na pratinidhau sama tvāt idam vicāryate śrute dravyaḥ upātte apacarite pratinidhim upādāya prayogaḥ prāptaḥ yadā saḥ api vinaṣṭaḥ pratinihitaḥ tadā kim pratinidhi sadṛśam upādeyam uta upāttasya vinaṣṭasya iti kim prāptam pratinihite vinaṣṭe tad sadṛśam upādeyam pūrveṇa nyāyena evam prāpte brūmaḥ pratinidhau na syāt pratinidhiḥ iti kutas sama tvāt yathā eva asau pūrvaḥ pratinihitaḥ śruta cikīrṣayā na pratinidhi cikīrṣayā evam ayam api śruta cikīrṣayā na pratinidhi cikīrṣayā tasmāt na pratinidhi sadṛśam upādeyam upātta naṣṭasya eva sadṛśaḥ anveṣitavyaḥ iti 
[I,669,iii_I,669,iv]	syāt śruti lakṣaṇe niyata tvāt atha śruti lakṣaṇe katham yathā yadi somam na vindet pūtīkān abhiṣuṇuyāt iti pūtīkeṣu vinaṣṭeṣu pūtīka sadṛśam upādeyam uta soma sadṛśam iti kim prāptam syāt śruti lakṣaṇe pratinidhau pratinidhi sadṛśasya upādānam kartavyam soma abhāve pūtīka vyaktayaḥ vihitāḥ sa ca ayam śrutaḥ soma abhāvaḥ tasmāt pūtīka vyaktayaḥ upādeyāḥ iti 
[I,670,i_I,670,ii]	na tad īpsā hi na etat evam na hi pūtīka vyaktīnām īpsā pūtīkeṣu yat soma sādṛśyam tat niyamyate tathā hi pūtīka vidhānam dṛṣṭa artham asadṛśa vidhāne adṛṣṭam kalpyeta atas yasmin tat apūtīka sadṛśe api dravye bhavati tat grahītavyam na pūtīka sādṛśyam ādriyeta iti 
[I,670,iii_I,670,iv]	mukhya adhigame mukhyam āgamaḥ hi tad abhāvāt atha yatra vinaṣṭe śrute pratinidhim upādātum prasthitaḥ mukhyam eva upalabhate tatra kim pratinidhim eva upādadīta uta tam eva mukhyam iti kim tāvat prāptam pratinidhim upādātavyaḥ iti evam saṃkalpitavān asau pratinidhim upādadānaḥ eva satya saṃkalpaḥ bhavati tasmāt pratinidhātavyam iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ mukhya adhigame tam eva upādadīta abhāve hi śrutasya anukalpaḥ pratinidhiḥ śrute hi sakalāḥ vyaktayaḥ pratinidhau vikalāḥ atha yat uktam saṃkalpa bheda doṣaḥ iti śruteṣu asau śiṣṭa vigarhaṇāyām vā 
[I,671,i_I,671,ii]	pravṛtte api iti ced atha agnihotra ādiṣu karmasu śruta dravya apacāre pratinidhau upātte kṛteṣu keṣucid saṃskāreṣu yadi tat eva śrutam upalabhyeta kim śrutam upādīyeta uta tena eva pratinihitena samāpayitavyam iti kim prāptam śrutam upādīyeta pravṛtte api tat uktam āgamaḥ hi tad abhāvāt iti tasmāt na pratinidhātavyam iti 
[I,671,iii_I,671,iv]	na anarthaka tvāt na etat evam yena hi khadira abhāve kadare paśuḥ niyuktaḥ bhavati atha khadiram upalabhate pravṛtte arthe kim khadireṇa kuryāt artha artham hi khadira upādānam na khadira upādāna artham eva tasmāt na śrutam upādīyeta 
[I,671,v_I,671,vii]	dravya saṃskāra virodhe dravyam tad artha tvāt pravṛtte paśu karmaṇi yūpa kāle asti mahat kadaram dravyam takṣaṇa ādi saṃskāra kṣamam asti khadira dravyam anevaṃjātīyakam tatra kim upādeyam iti saṃskārāḥ na parilopsyante iti kadaraḥ upādīyeta iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ dravya saṃskāra virodhe dravyam prati ādriyeran na saṃskārān kutas tad artha tvāt saṃskārāḥ hi dravyam karma yogyam kurvanti tatra saṃskāra parilope dravyam api tāvat gṛhyate dravya abhāve na dravyam na saṃskārāḥ dravyam teṣām dvāram vacana prāmāṇyāt tad abhāve naṣṭa dvāram na apūrvam gaccheyuḥ tasmāt khadiram upādadīran iti 
[I,672,i_I,672,ii]	artha dravya virodhe arthaḥ dravya abhāve tad utpatteḥ dravyāṇām artha śeṣa tvāt asti yūpa kāle khadira latā paśoḥ aprāgalbhye na samarthāḥ kadara dravyam tu tat samartham tatra saṃdehaḥ kim upādeyam khadira dravyam uta kadara dravyam iti khadira dravyam iti āha tat dhi śrutam tad upādānaḥ śāstra vihitam karoti pratinidhau aśruta kārī syāt tasmāt na pratinidhātavyam iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ artha dravya virodhe artham prati ādartavyam tad artham hi dravya upādānam niyojanāt aprāgalabhyam paśoḥ bhaviṣyati iti na dravyam eva upādīyeta iti kadaram upādadānaḥ dravya śrutim bādhate artham tu anugṛhṇāti khadira latām upādadānaḥ ubhayam bādhate tasmāt kadara dravyam upādeyam dravya abhāve hi tad utpattiḥ pratinidheḥ utpattiḥ uktā dravyāṇi artham prati śeṣa bhūtāni 
[I,672,iii_I,672,iv]	vidhiḥ api eka deśaḥ syāt santi vrīhayaḥ yāvantaḥ dvi avadāna mātram nirvartayanti tathā santi nīvārāḥ śeṣa kāryāṇām api paryāptāḥ tatra kim upādeyam iti kim prāptam api eka deśe dvi avadāna mātre api nirvartyamāne pratinidhiḥ upādeyaḥ kim kāraṇam śeṣa kāryāṇām saṃpattiḥ bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,673,i_I,673,ii]	api vā arthasya śakya tvāt eka deśena nirvarteta arthānām avibhakta tvāt guṇa mātram itarat tad artha tvāt api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ eka deśena vrīhīṇām pradhāna mātram nirvartayitavyam kutas arthasya śakya tvāt yaḥ atra arthaḥ yena kāryam tat tāvat nirvartyate śeṣa kāryāṇi yadi na śakyāni na aṅga anurodhena pradhānasya guṇaḥ bādhitavyaḥ tat dhi aṅgam yat pradhānasya upakaroti na yat apakāre vartate tatra ca śeṣa kāryāṇi kriyamāṇāni pradhāne vrīhi tvam guṇam vihanyuḥ vrīhi tvam ca pradhāne sākṣāt aṅga bhūtam śrūyate vrīhibhiḥ yajeta iti tasmāt na teṣu anurodhaḥ kāryaḥ asati hi aṅga pradhāna vibhāgaḥ etat evam syāt asti hi asau tasmāt na pratinidhiḥ iti tathā ca anya artha darśanam api bhavati tat eva yādṛś tādṛś hotavyam iti 
[I,674,i_I,674,ii]	śeṣāt dvi avadāna nāśe syāt tad artha tvāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate : yat āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ amāvāsyāyām paurṇamāsyām vācuyataḥ bhavati iti tatra yadi dvi avadāna mātram uddhṛtam vyāpadyate kim śeṣāt punar avadeyam na iti bhavati saṃśayaḥ kim prāptam dvi avadāna nāśe śeṣāt punar avadeyam kutas tad artha tvāt agni artham hi tat dhaviḥ agnaye yāgaḥ nirvartayitavyaḥ iti tad avadāne vinaṣṭe yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate prayojanam ca yāgena sa ca āgneyena kriyamāṇaḥ śrutaḥ eva abhinirvartitaḥ bhavati iti kim iti na kriyeta tasmāt śeṣāt avadātavyam iti 
[I,674,iii_I,674,iv]	nirdeśāt vā anyat āgamayet atha vā anyat dhaviḥ āgamayet na śeṣāt avadātavyam kutas nirdeśāt nirdeśaḥ hi bhavati madhyāt pūrva ardhāt avadeyam iti dvi avadānam ca homa saṃbaddham dvi avadānam juhoti iti tatra anyat śiṣṭam madhyasya pūrva ardhasya viśeṣaṇa artham yat ca tat dhoma saṃyuktam tat vinaṣṭam tat śeṣeṇa kriyamāṇam amadhyena apūrva ardhena ca kṛtam syāt nanu avatte yat śiṣṭam tatas madhyāt pūrva ardhāt ca grahīṣyate ucyate kṛtsnasya yat madhyam pūrva ardham ca tat coditam na itarasya 
[I,674,v_I,675,i]	atha vā nirdeśāt iti vinaṣṭe hi anyat dravyam nirdiśyate yasya sarvāṇi havīṃṣi naśyeyuḥ duṣyeyuḥ vā apahareyuḥ vai ājyena tāḥ devatāḥ parisaṃkhyāya yajeran iti haviṣaḥ nāśaḥ ājyam prāptam tena na śeṣāt avadātavyam iti aparaḥ āha śeṣa nirdeśāt iti nirdiśyate hi tat śiṣṭam aparebhyaḥ śeṣa kāryebhyaḥ iti tat na upapadyate na hi tāni śeṣa kāryāṇi havīṃṣi prayojayanti na ca anivṛtta prayojanam haviḥ anyatra pratipādyam tasmāt na ayam arthaḥ 
[I,675,ii_I,675,iii]	api vā śeṣa bhājām syāt viśiṣṭa kāraṇa tvāt atha sviṣṭakṛt artham avattam yadi vinaśyati tatra kim śeṣāt avadeyam uta na iti kim prāptam punar śeṣāt avadeyam iti kutas na atra kṛtsnasya uttara ardhāt avadīyate kasya tarhi saṃnihitasya sati hi prayojane saṃnihitasya avadeyam iti tasmāt avadīyamāne śrutam kṛtam bhavati tasmāt śeṣāt avadeyam iti 
[I,675,iv]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ śeṣa bhājām syāt lopaḥ kutas viśiṣṭa kāraṇāt viśiṣṭam hi kāraṇam tasya avadāne katham pratipādyeta iti pratipattiḥ ca vivikta karaṇena upakaroti tasya vivikta karaṇāya pratipādyamānasya niyamaḥ ayam sviṣṭakṛt dhomena pratipādayitavyaḥ tathā hi sa pratipāditaḥ bhavati sa yadi homāya uddhṛtaḥ vipadyeta kṛte viveke na punar grahaṇam prayojayet pratipādyamānaḥ ca sviṣṭakṛt dhomena pratipādayitavyaḥ iti pratipādyamāna abhāvāt lopaḥ eva sviṣṭakṛtaḥ syāt pradhāne kṛte śiṣṭam sarva śeṣa kārya sādhāraṇam tatra ekasya uddhṛtau śiṣṭam anyatra pratipādanīyam 
[I,676,i_I,676,ii]	nirdeśāt śeṣa bhakṣaḥ anyaiḥ pradhāna vat staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra bhakṣāḥ prāśitra caturdhā karaṇa śaṃyuvāka kālāḥ teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim anyaḥ eva teṣām bhakṣayitāraḥ uta prakaraṇa gatāḥ iti kim prāptam śeṣa bhakṣaḥ anyaiḥ aprakaraṇa sthaiḥ kartavyaḥ kutas nirdeśāt nirdiśyante hi adhvarya ādayaḥ iḍā bhakṣe yajamāna pañcamāḥ iḍām bhakṣayanti iti sarveṣu bhakṣayitṛṣu prāpteṣu parisaṃkhyāna arthaḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyate iḍām eva ete bhakṣayeyuḥ iti yathā āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ iti sarvasmin avayavini yāga aniyame prāpte dvi avadāna mātram śrūyate vidhiḥ vā na prāpta tvāt na anuvādaḥ anarthaka tvāt parisaṃkhyā tu arthavat tāya evam eṣām parisaṃkhyā iti api ca yadi prakṛtāḥ eva bhakṣayeyuḥ aśvamedhe doṣaḥ syāt bahu tvāt bhakṣāṇām bhakṣayantaḥ mriyeran 
[I,676,iii_I,676,iv]	sarvaiḥ vā samavāyāt syāt sarvaiḥ vā prakṛtaiḥ eva bhakṣyeta tat dhi bhakṣaṇam puruṣa saṃskāra artham puruṣāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ pracariṣyanti iti teṣu vinigamanāyāḥ abhāvāt yāvantaḥ prakaraṇe samavetāḥ te sarve bhakṣayeyuḥ iti 
[I,676,v_I,676,vi]	nirdeśasya guṇa artha tvam atha yat uktam nirdeśāt iti guṇa arthaḥ saḥ anye karmakara tvāt eva prāptāḥ tatra yajamānaḥ teṣām pañcamaḥ vacanāt nirdiśyate tad prāpti artham ca idam vacanam tatas na parisaṃkhyā 
[I,677,i_I,677,ii]	pradhāne śruti lakṣaṇam yat tu dvi avadāna mātram pradhāne nirdiśyate tat vacana prāmāṇyāt parisaṃkhyāna artham na hi tatra kasyacid apūrvasya vidhiḥ iha yajamānaḥ vidhīyate vidhi parisaṃkhyā saṃśaye vidhiḥ jyāyān tatra sva arthe śabdaḥ parisaṃkhyāyām trayaḥ doṣāḥ sva artha hānam asva artha parigrahaḥ prāpta bādhaḥ ca iti tasmāt prākṛtāḥ eva bhakṣayeyuḥ iti 
[I,677,iii_I,677,iv]	arthavat iti ced atha yat uktam aśvamedhe virodhaḥ syāt bahu tvāt bhakṣāṇām iti tat parihartavyam 
[I,677,v_I,677,vi]	na codanā virodhāt aśvamedhe na sarvam bakṣayiṣyanti arthāt sarvam bhakṣayantaḥ aśvamedham na samāpayeyuḥ tatra aśvamedha śrutiḥ pratyakṣā sā virudhyamānā ca udaka prāptam sarva bhakṣaṇam bādhate prakṛtau tu na virodhaḥ tasmāt sarvam prakṛtāḥ bhakṣayeyuḥ iti 
[I,677,vii_I,677,viii]	artha samavāyāt prāyaścittam eka deśe api staḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau tatra āmananti bhinne juhoti skanne juhoti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim kṛtsne bhinne skanne ca prāyaścittam uta eka deśe api bhinne skanne ca iti kim punar sarva bhinnam kim eka deśa bhinnam iti cūrṇīkṛtam ayogyam prayojanāya kṛtsna bhinnam yat śakale vigate api prayojana samartham tat eka deśa bhinnam iti kim prāptam eka deśa bhinne api prāyaścittam kasmāt artha samavāyāt samavetam tatra bhedanam eka deśa bhinnam api bhinnam iti evam prāpte nimitte naimittikam kartavyam bhavati 
[I,678,i_I,678,ii]	na tu aśeṣe vaiguṇyāt tad artham hi tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na aśeṣe bhinne prāyaścittam syāt vinaṣṭa saṃskāra artham hi prāyaścittam kutas etat bhedanavatā prayojanam asti na homena tena saṃskṛtena prayogaḥ kariṣyante iti prāyaścittam kriyate na ca tena cūrṇīkṛtena prayogaḥ śakyate kartum tasmāt prāyaścittam anarthakam eka deśa bhinnena tu saṃskṛtena śakyate prayogaḥ tasmāt eka deśa bhinne prāyaścittam syāt iti 
[I,678,iii_I,678,iv]	syāt vā prāpta nimitta tvāt atad dharmaḥ nitya saṃyogāt na hi tasya guṇa arthena anitya tvāt syāt vā prāyaścittam kṛtsna bhinne api kutas prāpta nimitta tvāt prāptam hi nimittam bhedanam prāpte ca nimitte naimittikam kartavyam yat ca uktam vyāpanna saṃskāra artham prāyaścittam iti na ayam tasya dharmaḥ kutas nitya saṃyogāt nitya vat dhomaḥ anityam hi bhedanam na hi nityam anityasya upakartum codyate yadi nityam darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ aṅgam na anityasya upakārāya kutas kadācid anityam na eva syāt tatra katham tasya upakārakam bhavet tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ na śakyam nityena upakartum tena nityam upakuryāt iti vacanam pralāpaḥ eva atha naimittikam na doṣaḥ bhavati tasmāt asmat pakṣaḥ eva asmin pakṣe yadā bhinnam tadā homaḥ yadā na bhinnam tadā na eva homaḥ vidhīyate bhavadīye pakṣe bhavati doṣaḥ nitya anityayoḥ na asti saṃbandhaḥ iti tasmāt bhinna mātre prāyaścittam iti 
[I,679,i_I,679,ii]	guṇānām ca parārtha tvāt vacanāt vyapāśrayaḥ syāt asti vacane na guṇaḥ guṇa arthaḥ bhavitum arhati prakaraṇataḥ sarvam pradhāna artham bhinnam api homaḥ api na ca bhinnam ādhāra bhāvena upadiśyate bhinnasya ādhāra bhāve hi na homa antaram vidhīyeta pradhānasya eva hi tadā bhinnaḥ guṇaḥ iti gamyate tatra āhavanīya saṃyogaḥ bādhyeta vacanāt vikalpaḥ iti ced na nimitta tvena saṃbhavāt homasya ca śrutyā vihita tvāt yadā homaḥ vidhīyate tadā śrutyā yadā bhinnaḥ guṇaḥ tadā vākyena tasmāt na ādhāraḥ bhinnaḥ yadi ucyeta nimitta pakṣe api na homa antaram prakṛtasya eva homasya nimittam vidhīyeta iti tat na anupādīyamānam hi nimittam iti ucyate yadi hi vidhīyeta nimittam eva tat na syāt yadi ca yasya api nimittam saḥ api uddiśyeta tatra dvayoḥ uddiśyamānayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ eva na syāt na ca atra bhedanam kuryāt iti vidhīyate bhedane nirvṛtte yat anyat śrūyate tat vidhīyate 
[I,679,iii_I,679,iv]	bheda artham iti ced atha ucyate evam upāyam tad kapālam saṃdhīyate gāyatryā tvā śata akṣarayā saṃdadhīta iti tad kapālam saṃdadhyām iti tatra vakṣyāmaḥ 
[I,680,i_I,680,ii]	śeṣa bhūta tvāt na bhedanasya śeṣa bhūtam yujyate na tat saṃdhātum śakyate homena mantreṇa vā mṛdā api saṃdhīyamānasya bhinna buddhiḥ na eva apeyāt 
[I,680,iii_I,680,iv]	anarthakaḥ ca sarva nāśe syāt sarva nāśe ca śrūyate bhinnam kapālam apsu pravahanti iti tatra anarthakaḥ saṃskāraḥ nanu tatas uddhṛtya upadhāyiṣyate na iti brūmaḥ anyat upadadhāti iti hi āmananti tasān naimittikam karma aṅgam bhinne juhoti iti 
[I,680,v_I,680,vi]	kṣāme tu sarva dāhe syāt eka deśasya āvarjanīya tvāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate atha yasya puroḍāśau kṣāyataḥ tam yajñam varuṇaḥ gṛhṇāti yadā tat dhaviḥ saṃtiṣṭheta atha tat eva haviḥ nirvapet yajñaḥ hi yajñasya prāyaścittiḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim sarva kṣāme prāyaścittam uta eka deśa kṣāmaḥ iti kim prāptam prāpta nimitta tvāt kṛtsne vā eka deśe vā evam prāpte brūmaḥ kṣāme tu sarva dāhe syāt iti tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati kṣāme sarva dāhe prāyaścittam syāt kutas eka deśasya āvarjanīya tvāt na śakyate eka deśa kṣāma tā varjayitum niyatam agni saṃyoge dāhyasya sūkṣmāḥ avayavāḥ kṣīyante tapteṣu ca kapāleṣu adhas pāka artham puroḍāśaḥ adhiśrīyate upari ca aṅgārāḥ abhyuhyante tat avarjanīyam nimitta tvena api śrūyamāṇam nityam eva syāt tatra yasya iti nimitta śravaṇam vivakṣitam syāt tasmāt sarva kṣāme prāyaścittam iti 
[I,681,i_I,681,ii]	darśanāt vā eka deśe syāt na ca etat asti sarva dāhe prāyaścittam iti eka deśe kṣāyati bhavitum arhati nimittam hi upasaṃprāptam kṣāṇam nāma eka deśa kṣāṇam api kṣāṇam eva yadi tatra na kriyate śrutam na kriyeta na ca etat yuktam api ca darśayati yadā tat dhaviḥ saṃtiṣṭheta atha etat eva haviḥ nirvapet iti tena eva haviṣā saṃsthānam darśayati tat sarvakṣāṇe na avakalpate tasmāt eka deśaḥ eva kṣāyati prāyaścittam iti 
[I,681,iii_I,681,iv]	anyena vā etat śāstrāt dhi kāraṇa prāptiḥ vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na ca etat asti yat uktam eka deśe api kṣāyati prāyaścittam iti kim tarhi kṛtsna kṣāmaḥ eva prāyaścittam upasaṃprāptam hi nimittam yat śāstra uktam puroḍāśau kṣāyate iti kṛtsnasya kṣātiḥ na avayavasya na ca eka deśa kṣāme tasya āvarjanīya tvāt atha yat uktam kṣāmeṇa haviṣā samāptiḥ dṛśyate yadā tat dhaviḥ saṃtiṣṭheta iti ucyate saṃsthāne nimitte prāyaścittam yadā api anyena api haviṣā tat saṃsthāpyate tadā api prāyaścittam iti na doṣaḥ 
[I,682,i_I,682,ii]	tat haviḥ śabdāt na iti ced evam ced ucyate anyena haviṣā yadā saṃsthāpyate iti na evam tat ha viḥ śabdāt tat haviḥ śabdaḥ atra bhavati yadā tat haviḥ saṃtiṣṭheta iti atra anyena haviṣā saṃsthāpyamāne tat haviḥ śabdaḥ na avakalpyeta iti 
[I,682,iii_I,682,iv]	syāt anyāya tvāt ijyā gāmī haviḥ śabdaḥ tad liṅga saṃyogāt syāt ijyā gāmī haviḥ śabdaḥ tat haviḥ saṃtiṣṭheta tat haviṣka karma saṃtiṣṭheta iti nanu mukhya abhāve gauṇaḥ gṛhyate na anyathā iti ucyate mukhya abhāvaḥ eva ayam katham yadā saṃtiṣṭheta tat karma tena haviṣā iti vākyam bhidyeta avācakam ca syāt karma eva hi saṃtiṣṭhate na haviḥ tena nimittam tat dhaviḥ iti anuvādaḥ anuvādaḥ ced anya haviṣke api karmaṇi saṃsthite prāyaścittam iti gamyate katham punar haviḥ śabdaḥ karmaṇi vartate iti tad liṅga saṃyogāt haviḥ saṃbaddham karma haviḥ śabdena haviḥ saṃbandhāt avagamyate yathā prasahya kāri tayā deva datta saṃbaddhayā lakṣyate siṃhaḥ evam haviṣā api karma lakṣyate tasmāt kṛtsna kṣāme prāyaścittam iti 
[I,682,v_I,683,i]	yathāśruti iti ced darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti śrūyate tatra idam asti vacanam yasya ubhayam haviḥ ārtim ārcchet aindram pañcaśara avam odanam nirvapet iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ubhayasmin ārte pañca śarāvaḥ nirvaptavyaḥ uta anyatarasmin iti kim prāptam iti ced paśyasi evaṃjātīyakaḥ ekasmin iti tatra brūmaḥ ubhayoḥ iti kutas yathāśruti bhavitum arhati yat yat śrūyate tat avagamyate ubhayoḥ ca ārtau śrūyate śrūyamāṇam ca vivakṣitum nyāyyam itarathāḥ yāvat eva haviḥ iti tāvat eva ubhayam haviḥ iti syāt tasmāt ubhayoḥ ārtyām pañcaśarāvaḥ iti 
[I,683,ii_I,683,iii]	na tad lakṣaṇa tvāt upapātaḥ hi kāraṇam na etat evam upapātaḥ hi ārti saṃbaddham dravyam tad kāraṇam tasya lakṣaṇam haviḥ ārtiḥ tat vyastam samastam ca nimittam na hi ubhaya śabdena śakyam viśiṣṭum viśiṣyamāṇe hi vākyam bhidyeta haviṣaḥ ārtau pañca śarāvaḥ sa ca ubhayasya haviṣaḥ iti 
[I,683,iv]	āha yadi viśeṣaṇam na mṛṣyate haviṣā api te viśeṣaṇam na prāpnoti tat abhidhīyate mṛṣyāmahe haviṣā viśeṣaṇam aviśeṣyamāṇe anarthakam syāt yasya ārtim ārcchet iti aviśeṣe yat kiṃcid iti gamyate tatra sarvasya eva kiṃcid ārtim ṛcchati antatas caritam nimiṣitam cintitam iti tatra yasya iti nimitta vacanam nityam anupapannam gamyate tasmāt avaśyam ārtiḥ viśeṣṭavyā sā ca haviṣā viśiṣyate tathā haviḥ ārti saṃbandha nirvṛttiḥ animittam pañca śarāvasya śaknoti hi śrutyā tam saṃbandham vaktum haviḥ ubhaya saṃbandham tu vākyena brūyāt durbalam ca vākyam śruteḥ 
[I,684,i]	nanu haviḥ ārti saṃbandhaḥ api vākyena eva ucyate ārti nirvṛttiḥ api tatra gamyate sā ca śrutyā haviḥ ubhaya saṃbandhe atyantam śrutiḥ avahīyate tasmāt na tad saṃbandhaḥ nirvartyamānaḥ nirdiśyate iti katham tarhi ubhaya śabdaḥ ubhayam iti nitya anuvādaḥ ekasmin api ārte aparasmin api tasmāt uktam yasya ubhayam haviḥ ārtim ārcchet iti 
[I,684,ii]	atha kasmāt na pada dvaya viśiṣṭa ārtiḥ nimittam pratīyate iti yasya ubhaya guṇa viśiṣṭam haviḥ ārtim ārcchet iti atra ucyate katham tāvat bhavān manyate viśiṣṭena arthena viśiṣṭa ārtiḥ nimittam iti āha viśiṣṭa arthasya saṃnidhānāt viśiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ ārti saṃnihitaḥ kim punar syāt yadi evam bhavet tatas ubhaya viśiṣṭa ārtiḥ nimittam iti gamyate 
[I,684,iii_I,684,iv]	atra ucyate idam tāvat devānāṃpriyaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ yasya api hi viśiṣṭa arthaḥ ārti saṃnihitaḥ bhavati kim tasya aviśiṣṭaḥ daṇḍaiḥ parāṇudyate kim atas yat na parāṇudyate etat atas bhavati aviśiṣṭa gatā api ārtiḥ nimittam pañca śarāvasya bhavati nanu ubhaya śabdaḥ haviḥ viśekṣyati na haviḥ śabdena asaṃbadhyamānaḥ tat na śaknoti viśeṣṭum ānantaryāt saṃbhantsyate tarhi tathā api na samarthaḥ na hi asau nivṛttim prayojayati āha viśeṣa vacana tvāt tat nirvartakaḥ bhaviṣyati yathā śuklāḥ gauḥ a ānīyatām iti na evam abhihite kṛṣṇām ānayanti śukla śabdaḥ enām gām kṛṣṇa ādibhyaḥ nivartayati 
[I,684,v^1]	ucyate viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ na tatra gavā ākṛtyā dravyam lakṣayitvā tasya ānayanam ucyate tatra api ced evam abhaviṣyat na eva enām śukla śabdaḥ vyaśekṣyata ubhaya viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭam tu tatra ānayanam pradhānam ucyate iha punar ārti haviṣṭva lakṣite dravye pañca śarāvaḥ kim punar kāraṇam pradhāna bhūtaḥ ākhyāta arthe saṃhatya viśeṣaṇam bhavati para arthe punar viyujya iti ucyate pradhāna bhūtaḥ ākṛtiḥ guṇaḥ vā tad saṃbandha artham ucyate tatra ubhaya viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭaḥ ekasmāt vākyāt avagamyate tat viśiṣṭam ca kṛtvā kṛtī bhavati anyatara viśiṣṭam kurvan aśrutam kuryāt 
[I,684,v^2]	yatra punar ākṛti lakṣite dravyaḥ ākhyāta arthaḥ kīrtyate tatra sarveṣu eva tad jātīyeṣu uktaḥ bhavati na tatra ekasmin nirvṛtte kṛtam manyeta aparasmin api hi ākṛti lakṣite tat uktam eva tatra uktam apratiṣiddham ca kim iti na kriyeta ākhyāta arthe punar pradhāne na tasya ākṛti lakṣitena saṃbandhaḥ tatra tad ākṛtika antare anupasaṃhriyamāṇe api kṛtam eva pradhānam sa guṇam ca pradhānam bhavati na ca kiṃcid śrutam hīyeta iti tasmāt tatra viśeṣaṇam yuktam na tu iha tathā iha hi haviḥ ākṛtikasya dravyasya ārtau pañcaśarāvaḥ iti uktam tat na śakyam viśeṣa vacanena pratiṣedha avācakena nivartayitum 
[I,685,i]	api ca ubhaya śabde haviṣā saṃbadhyamāne api na eva ubhaya viśiṣṭa ārtiḥ pratīyate kim kāraṇam haviṣā ubhaya śabdaḥ saṃbadhyate na ārtim ārcchet iti anena padena tatra saṃnihite api ubhaya śabde haviḥ śabdasya yāvān arthaḥ tāvatā eva ārtiḥ saṃbadhyate aviśiṣṭaḥ ca tatra arthaḥ tasmāt na ubhaya viśiṣṭa ārtiḥ nimittam iti 
[I,685,ii]	atha ārti āśraya vibhakti yogāt ubhaya śabdasya ubhaya viśiṣṭa ārtiḥ iti ucyate tat na vibhakti saṃyogaḥ hi haviḥ viśeṣaṇam ubhaya śabdam śaknuyāt kartum samabhivyāhārāt na ārti viśeṣaṇam na hi asya ārtyā haviḥ viśiṣṭasya samabhivyāhāraḥ asti atha ucyate asati api samabhivyāhāraḥ ārti śabda saṃnidhānāt tad viśiṣṭā eva arthiḥ pratyeṣyate iti tat na asatyām hi ākāṅkṣāyām saṃnidhānam akāraṇam bhavati yathā bhāryā rajñaḥ puruṣaḥ devadattasya iti eka vākya gata tvāt tad viśiṣṭam gamyate iti ced na etat evam ekasmin api vākye tad avayava bhūtasya anapekṣitasya na eva bhavati saṃbandhaḥ yathā aśvena vrajati śvetena paṭena āvṛtaḥ iti na anapekṣitasya aśvasya śvaityam viśeṣaṇam bhavati 
[I,686,i_I,686,ii]	atha ucyate ārti viśiṣṭena haviṣā ubhayasya saṃbandhaḥ iti tat api na upapadyate na hi ārtim ārcchet iti haviḥ viśeṣaṇa tvena upādīyate kim tarhi pañca śarāvasya nimitta tvena haviḥ ārteḥ ubhaya pañca śarāva saṃbandhe yaugapadyena abhyupagamyamāne vākyam bhidyeta atha haviḥ ākṛti lakṣitena saṃbaddham ārcchet iti punar haviḥ viśiṣṭena ubhaya śabdena saṃbadhyeta tathā api vākyam bhidyeta tasmāt na ubhaya viśiṣṭa ārtiḥ nimittam 
[I,686,iii]	āha yathā eva ākhyāta artha prādhānyaḥ ubhaya viśiṣṭa ucyate iti na anyatara viśiṣṭā nimittam gamyate evam itarasmin api pakṣe ubhaya viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭā sā ucyate iti yadi api svena ātmanā viśiṣṭa aviśiṣṭā tathā api anyatara viśiṣṭā bhavantī na nimittam bhavitum arhati iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti tat abhidhīyate mad pakṣaḥ upādeya tvena viśeṣaṇa dvayam tvad pakṣe punar lakṣaṇa tvena āha kim atas yat lakṣaṇa tvena ucyate etat atas bhavati haviḥ ākṛtyā lakṣyate dravyam tasya kiṃcid vaktavyam iti tat alakṣitam ucyamānam na vijñāyeta kasya syāt iti athavā sarvasya eva dravyasya iti gamyeta tasmin ubhayasmin api aviśiṣṭe sati tasya āśrayam lakṣayitum haviḥ ākṛtiḥ ucyate tatra dvayam āpatati yat dhaviḥ ākṛtikam tadā ārtam iti yat vā yat dhaviḥ ākṛtikam tat ubhayam iti yadi tāvat yat dhaviḥ ākṛtikam tadā ārtam iti apekṣyate tatas haviḥ ākṛtikam ubhayam anubhayam vārtam nimittam gamyate 
[I,687,i]	atha yat dhaviḥ ākṛtikam tat ubhayam iti tatas na ārtiḥ haviṣā viśeṣyate haviṣā viśiṣyamāṇā ayam artau ubhaya śabdaḥ haviḥ viśekṣyati iti na etat avakalpate katham iti evam kila viśeṣyeta yat dhaviḥ ākṛtikam ubhayam iti tatra punar vaktavyam yat dhaviḥ ākṛtikam ubhayam tat ced ārtam iti katham tena viśiṣṭena ārtiḥ saṃbadhyeta iti na punar ubhaya haviḥ śabdau ca ārti viśeṣaṇa artham uccāryeyātām atha punar uccāraṇam na kriyate tathā yadi api haviḥ śabdaḥ tantreṇa ārti ubhaya āśraya lakṣaṇa artham na uccāryeta aviśiṣṭam ārteḥ lakṣaṇam syāt aviśiṣṭam ubhayasya viśiṣṭe iṣṭe punar uccāraṇam kartavyam tatra vākya bhedaḥ 
[I,687,ii_I,687,iii]	evam ubhaya śabdaḥ yadi ārcchatinā saṃbadhyeta na haviḥ viśiṣṭam syāt tatra aviśiṣṭasya haviṣaḥ ārtiḥ nimittam syāt atha haviḥ śabdena saṃbadhyeta punar ārti saṃbandha artham haviḥ śabda sahitam uccāryeta tat ca etat iti vā sarva nāmnā nirdiśyeta tatra saḥ eva vākya bhedaḥ upādeya tve punar na anyonya viśeṣaṇa tvena prayojanam dvayam api ārtim viśeṣṭum uccāryeta tatra na anyatara viśiṣṭa ārtiḥ nimittam bhaviṣyati lakṣaṇa tve tu anyatara viśiṣṭā bhavati iti eṣa viśeṣaḥ 
[I,687,iv]	api ca sarvasva eva padasya pada antara saṃbandhe sati ca śabdāt ṛte tṛtīyena padena satyām gatau saṃnihitena api saṃbandhaḥ na yuktaḥ na hi bhavati bhāryā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ devadattasya iti atra rājā puruṣa viśeṣaṇam asatyām tu gatau upādeyasya anekasya api pradhānena saṃbandhaḥ avakalpate vyavahitena api vyavadhānāt arthaḥ balīyān iti lakṣaṇa tve tu lakṣaṇa dvaya saṃnipāte avaśyam heye anyatam asmin vyavahitaḥ guṇaḥ vā hātavyaḥ bhavati 
[I,688,i_I,688,iii]	homa abhiṣava bhakṣaṇam ca tadvat jyotiṣṭome śrūyate havirdhāne grāvabhiḥ abhiṣutya āhavanīye hutvā pratyañcaḥ paretya sadasi bhakṣān bhakṣayanti iti tatra anyena vacanena abhiṣavaḥ uktaḥ yajatinā homaḥ tau tāvat na vidhīyate na ca tayoḥ kramaḥ arthāt eva hi sa prāptaḥ tasmāt eka kartṛkam homa abhiṣavābhyām bhakṣaṇam vidhīyate abhiṣave kṛte home ca tad kartṛbhiḥ bhakṣaṇam kartavyam iti tatra eṣa saṃdehaḥ kim ubhayam yaḥ karyāt saḥ eva bhakṣayet uta anyatareṇa api bhakṣaṇam iti kim prāptam homa abhiṣava bhakṣaṇam ca tadvat tadvat eva syāt yadvat dhaviṣaḥ ārtiḥ katham na etat evam saṃbadhyate abhiṣutya tatas hutvā tatas bhakṣayet iti na anena abhiṣavasya homasya ca kramaḥ kīrtyate abhiṣutya ye juhvati te bhakṣayanti iti vākyam hi evam bhidyeta abhiṣutya bhakṣayanti hutvā bhakṣayanti iti tasmāt dhoma abhiṣavayoḥ paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ na asti iti ekena api bhakṣaṇam saṃbadhyeta apareṇa api abhiṣutya bhakṣayanti iti tasmāt anyatareṇa nimittena bhakṣaṇam bhavati iti 
[I,688,iv_I,688,v]	ubhābhyām vā na hi tayoḥ dharma śāstram ubhābhyām vā nimittābhyām bhakṣayet na bhakṣaṇam homa abhiṣavayoḥ dharmaḥ vidhīyate kim hi syāt yadi tayoḥ dharmaḥ vidhīyeta homa abhiṣavau pradhānam iti bhakṣaṇam guṇaḥ pratipradhānam bhidyeta atha punar ubhābhyām nimittābhyām bhakṣaṇam vidhīyate tasmin vihitaḥ ekaḥ arthaḥ vihitaḥ bhavati tena ekam vākyam tat etāvati paryavasitam bhavati abhiṣutya hutvā bhakṣayanti iti tatra etat avāntaram vākyam hutvā bhakṣayanti iti na ca mahā vākye sati avāntara vākyam pramāṇam bhavati pada antarasya bādhanāt yathā na udyantam ādityam īkṣeta iti pratiṣedhaḥ gamyate mahā vākyāt avāntara vākyāt īkṣaṇa vidhānam tasmāt anyatara nimittam bhakṣaṇam aśrutam mahā vākyāt idam avagamyate dve nimitte bhakṣaṇasya iti bhakṣaṇam ca anyathā kurvan chrutam parityajet tasmāt ubhābhyām bhakṣaṇam iti 
[I,689,i_I,689,ii]	punar ādheyam odana vat agnihotre śrūyate yasya ubhau anugatau agnī abhinimlocet yasya vā abhyudiyāt punar ādheyam eva tasya prāyaścittiḥ iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim anyatara anugamane punar ādheyam uta ubhaya anugamane iti kim prāptam punar ādheyam odana vat syāt yathā pañca śarāvaḥ anyatarasya ārtau bhavati evam punar ādheyam anyatara anugamane bhavitum arhati vākya bheda prasaṅgāt iti yathā iha yakṣye iha sukṛtam kariṣyāmi iti evam eva abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti 
[I,690,i_I,690,ii]	dravya utpatteḥ vā ubhayoḥ syāt dravye vinaṣṭe tasya eva dravyasya utpattiḥ atra prāyaścittam tasya dṛṣṭam prayojanam katham dravyam bhavet iti punar ādhānam kriyate tatra eṣa dharmaḥ dvau agnī saha utpadyete na pṛthaktvena tatra anyatara anugamane na śakyate ekaḥ eva ādhātum viguṇam syāt atha dvitīyam api ādadhīta sa yadi tāvat āhavanīyaḥ tatra āhavanīyaḥ anyaḥ homa arthaḥ vidyate eva iti na sa homāya syāt yaḥ ca homa artham utpādyate saḥ āhavanīyaḥ yatas eṣa saṃskāra śabdaḥ saṃskāra śabdaḥ ca ekena api saṃskāreṇa vinā na bhavati eṣaḥ api ca saṃskāraḥ yat dhoma artha tā yat āhavanīye juhoti iti śrūyate tat ekasmin anugate ekasmin ādhīyamāne vaiguṇyam dvayoḥ api hi vaiguṇyam eva tasmāt na ekasmin anugate punar ādheyam aśakya tvāt iti 
[I,690,iii_I,690,iv]	pañcaśarāvaḥ tu dravya śruteḥ pratinidhiḥ syāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate yasya ubhayam haviḥ ārtim ārcchet aindram pañcaśara avam odanam nirvapet iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim haviṣi ārte pañca śarāvaḥ pratinidhiḥ uta nimitte karma antaram iti katham pratinidhiḥ katham karma antaram iti yadi evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ bhavati pañcaśarāvam nirvapet kuyāt iti tatas sāṃnyāyasya kārye pañca śarāvaḥ pratinidhiḥ iti atha na pañca śarāvaḥ nirvapatinā kim tu devatayā saṃbadhyate pañca śarāvam aindram kuryāt iti tatas nimitte yajatiḥ vidhīyate kim tāvat prāptam pañcaśarāvaḥ tu dravya śruteḥ pratinidhiḥ syāt pañca śarāvaḥ sāṃnyāyyasya pratinidhiḥ kutas dravya śruteḥ dravyasya nirvāpe śravaṇam na indra saṃbandhaḥ kutas evam nirvāpa vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tatra śrutiḥ vidhāyikā itarathāḥ dravya devatā saṃbandhe vākyam syāt tat ca durbalam śruteḥ tasmāt pratinidhiḥ iti 
[I,691,i_I,691,ii]	codanā vā dravya devatā vidhiḥ avācye hi nimitte vā yajatiḥ karma ānataram dravya devatā vidhiḥ dravya devatam iha śrūyate pañca śarāvam aindram kuryāt iti itarathāḥ hi aindram iti pramāda pāṭhaḥ avagamyeta aindra māha indrayoḥ vā ayatha artha anuvāda aindram iti syāt avācye hi te devate aindra śabdena indraḥ mahā indraḥ ca na śakyaḥ anuvaditum viśeṣaṇa tve vākya bhedaḥ nanu śrutiḥ balīyasi iti uktam satyam evam kim tu itarasmin pakṣe bādhyatetarām śrutiḥ aindra śabdasya atantra tvāt 
[I,691,iii_I,691,iv]	sa pratyāmanet sthānāt saḥ eṣa naimittikaḥ yāgaḥ kim amāvāsyām pratyāmanet na iti kim prāptam sa pratyāmanet sthānāt saḥ eṣa yāgaḥ amāvāsyām pratyāmnātum arhati kutas sthānāt yāge vinaṣṭe yāgaḥ eṣa śrūyamāṇaḥ yadi na naṣṭasya aṅgam tatas arthavān bhavati atha aṅgam niṣprayojanasya artham kriyamāṇam niṣprayojanam eva bhavitum arhati viguṇam ca niṣprayojanam eva vinaṣṭam āmauvāsyam iti pratyakṣam idam api kartavyam iti śābdam yat vinaṣṭam tat niṣphalam iti na kartavyam idam ca kartavyam iti pratyāmnāyaḥ avagamyate 
[I,692,i_I,692,ii]	aṅga vidhiḥ vā nimitta saṃyogāt aṅgam vā etat vidhīyate haviṣi ārtau nimitte yāgaḥ śrūyate tatra trayam āpatati yat vā nimitte svatantram kalpyam phalam yat vā amāvāsyāyāḥ yat kāryam tat asya yat vā tasya aṅgam iti sva pradhānam tāvat na kalpya tvāt phalasya na amāvāsyāyāḥ kārye kim kāraṇam aśravaṇāt na evam śrūyate tasyāḥ kārye vartate iti kartavyā upadeśena api na anyatama adhyavasānam triṣu eṣu pakṣeṣu teṣu ca pakṣeṣu vivakṣiteṣu kartavyā upadeśaḥ avakalpyate 
[I,692,iii]	nanu evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ bhaviṣyati yasya ubhayam haviḥ ārtim ārcchet saḥ etena yāgena sādhayet yat sādhayitu kāmaḥ kim ca asau sādhayitu kāmaḥ yat amāvāsyāyāḥ phalam iti atra ucyate phala padena saṃbandha abhāvāt saṃbandhasya vidhāyakam vākyam śrutyā ca yāga kartavyatā vidhīyate sā ca vākyāt balīyasī tasmāt na tad kārye vartate iti kim tarhi prayojanam tasyāḥ amāvāsyāyāḥ aṅgam nanu etat api na asti tasyāḥ aṅgam iti atra ucyate tad saṃbandhena samāmnānāt tad prayoga vacanena gṛhyate darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām phalam sādhayet sarvaiḥ aṅgaiḥ saha asyām ca ārtau eṣa yāgaḥ itikartavyatā iti tasmāt evam avagamyate vinaṣṭe haviṣi āmauvāsyam yat na śaknoti sva kāryam kartum tat anayā iti kartavya tayā sahitam śaknoti iti tasmāt nimitte karma aṅgam iti 
[I,693,i_I,693,ii]	viśva jit tu apravṛtte bhāvaḥ karmaṇi syāt etat āmnāyate sarvābhyaḥ vai eṣa devatābhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pṛṣṭhebhyaḥ ātmānam āgurate yaḥ sarvatra āyāgurate viśva jitā atirātreṇa sarva pṛṣṭhena sarva vedasa dakṣiṇena yajeta sarvābhyaḥ eṣa devatābhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pṛṣṭhebhyaḥ ātmānam niṣkrīṇīte iti sarvatra agoraṇe nimitte viśvajit śrūyate tatra saṃdehaḥ kim sarvatra āgūrya yaḥ sarvatram prayuṅkte tasya viśva jit uta yaḥ na prayuṅkte tasya iti kim tāvat prāptam yaḥ ca prayuṅkte yaḥ ca na iti aviśeṣāt athavā prayuñjānasya kutas nimitte karma aṅgam evaṃjātīyakam iti uktam tat aprayujyamānasya katham aṅgam syāt iti 
[I,693,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ viśva jit tu apravṛtte bhavet sarvasya kriyāyāḥ abhāve viśva jit kim kāraṇam evam hi śrūyate yaḥ satrāya agurate sa viśva jitā atirātreṇa yajeta iti yaḥ satram kariṣyāmi iti evam āgurate sa viśvajitā yāgena sādhayet iti yat artham asau satram kartum icchati tat artham iti gamyate katham yaḥ āgurate sa tena yajeta yāgena nirvartayet iti vākya arthaḥ gamyate na yāgam nirvartayet iti kutas yāgasya guṇa tvena śravaṇāt katham tasya guṇa tvam tṛtīyā nirdeśāt prādhānye hi phalam kalpyeta itarasmin tu pakṣe pratyakṣāt vākyāt phala avagamaḥ 
[I,694,i_I,694,ii]	niṣkraya vādāt ca evam tatra śrūyate sarvābhyaḥ vai eṣa devatābhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pṛṣṭhebhya yat ātmānam niṣkrīṇīte iti niṣkraya dvāreṇa ca saṃstavaḥ pravṛtte na yujyate tasmāt apravṛtte viśva jit iti atha kasmāt na evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate āgūrya satrāya viśvajitā yajeta iti viśvajitaḥ satrasya ca saṃbandhaḥ vijñāyeta āgoraṇa velāyām iti na evam āgoraṇa viśeṣaṇam hi satram satra viśva jit saṃbandhe vyavahita kalpanā syāt śrutiḥ ca puruṣeṇa viśvajitam saṃbandhayati viśvajitā yajeta puruṣaḥ iti na satreṇa satrasya viśva jit yāgaḥ iti āgūrya iti ca evam śravaṇam arthavat bhavati satra aṅga tve tu artha prāptam na vaktavyam na ca āgūrya yajeta iti āgoraṇa ānantaryam śakyam vidhātum aśabda arthaḥ hi tadā aśrīyeta samāna kartṛka tā hi śabdavatī pūrva kāla bhāvasya ca artha prāpta tvāt na vaktavyatā tasmāt āgūrya iti atra eva viśvajitaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sa ced āgūrya na satreṇa yajeta tasya viśva jit iti 
[I,694,iii_I,694,iv]	vatsa saṃyoge vrata codanā syāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate barhiṣāḥ vai paurṇamāse vratam upayanti vatsena amāvāsyāyām iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim vatsa sādhanakam vratam vidhīyate uta vratasya kālaḥ iti atha vatsaḥ vrata aṅgam iti kim prāptam vatsa sādhanakam vratam vidhīyate iti amāna asyāyām vatsaiḥ vratam kuryāt iti vatsa vrata saṃyogaḥ apūrvaḥ sa vidhīyate tasmin ca vidhīyamānaḥ ubhayam api vihitam bhavati vatsaḥ vratam ca 
[I,695,i_I,695,ii]	kālaḥ vā utpanna saṃyogāt yathā uktasya yathā uktasya vacana antareṇa prāptasya kālaḥ ayam vidhīyate kutas utpanna saṃyogāt utpanna saṃyogaḥ ayam vratasya na utpatti saṃyogaḥ katham amāṣam a māṃsam bahu sarpiṣkam vratam vratayanti iti vihitam pūrvam vratam aprajñātaḥ ca kālaḥ tasmāt kāla vidhiḥ iti 
[I,695,iii_I,695,iv]	artha aparimāṇāt ca na ca śakyaḥ atra arthaḥ parimātum vatsena vratam upayanti iti kim vatsaḥ atra vratayitavyaḥ evam vatsena vratam upagatam bhavati kim vatsena hasta sthānīyena vratayitavyam iti evam tat upetam bhavati uta vatsam saṃnidhāya tat upeyāt iti na eva vyavatiṣṭhate śāstra arthaḥ karaṇam hi etat nirdiṣṭam na itikartavyatā etāvat uktam vatsa sādhanam vratam kuryāt katham iti etat aviśeṣa ākāṅkṣam eva avatiṣṭheta na eva arthaḥ paricchidyate vrate kim vatsena kriyate iti athavā yat vā tat vā iti tathā vatsaḥ vratena saṃbadhyamānaḥ iṣṭaḥ syāt apara artha tām āpadyeta para artha tām ca asya dyotayati vibhaktiḥ tṛtīyā sādhakatame hi sā bhavati tasmāt api kāla arthaḥ saṃyogaḥ 
[I,695,v_I,695,vi]	vatsaḥ tu śruti saṃyogāt tad aṅgam syāt yat uktam vihita tvāt vratasya anuvādaḥ iti satyam etat yat uktam kāla vidhāna arthaḥ iti tat na vatsaḥ tad aṅga tvena vidhīyate kutas śruti saṃyogāt vatse aṅge vidhīyamāne śrutiḥ nimittam kāle lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ syāt śruti lakṣaṇa aviśaye ca śrutiḥ nyāyyā tasmāt aṅgam vatsyaḥ iti 
[I,696,i_I,696,ii]	kālaḥ tu syāt acodanā kālaḥ tu eṣa nirdiśyate na vatsaḥ aṅgam vidhīyate na eṣa codanā barhiṣāḥ vai paurṇamāse vratam upayanti vatsena amāvāsyāyām iti katham avagamyate vidhinā eka vākya tvāt parastāt ca vidhiḥ samāmnāyate purā vatsānām upākartoḥ daṃpatī aśrīyatām iti yadi eṣaḥ api vidhiḥ syāt vākyam bhidyeta anuvādaḥ ca tathābhūtasya arthasya bhavati na ca vatsa aṅga tā aprāptā aprāptaḥ tu kālaḥ 
[I,696,iii_I,696,iv]	anarthakaḥ ca karma saṃyoge na ca śakyaḥ vatsaḥ atra vratayitum karma saṃyoge vatsena na arthaḥ śakyate kaścid kartum tasmāt api na vatsaḥ aṅgam 
[I,696,v_I,696,vi]	avacanāt ca sva śabdasya na ca etat ucyate viśvasya śrapitam vatsam vratayiṣyate iti na ca asya arthasya sva śabdaḥ śrūyate vatsaḥ iti ākṛti śabdaḥ māṃse na vartate tasmāt eṣa kālaḥ iti 
[I,696,vii_I,696,viii]	kālaḥ ced saṃnayat pakṣe tad liṅga saṃyogāt kāla arthaḥ saṃyogaḥ iti etat samadhigatam idānīm saṃdehaḥ kim saṃnayat pakṣaḥ eva kālaḥ uta asaṃnayataḥ api iti kim prāptam saṃnayat pakṣe kutas evam śrūyate purā vatsānām apākartoḥ iti na ca asaṃnayataḥ vatsa apākaraṇam asti tasmāt saṃnayat pakṣaḥ eṣa kālaḥ apākaraṇam liṅgam iti
