[I,697,i_I,697,ii]	kāla artha tvāt vā ubhayoḥ pratīyeta vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na saṃnayat pakṣaḥ eva asaṃnayataḥ api eṣa kālaḥ syāt kutas kāla artha tvāt na vatsa apākaraṇena vrate kiṃcid prayojanam asti kālena tu prayojanam yena ca tatra prayojanam sa lakṣyate katham punar vatsa apākaraṇam kāla artham iti para artha tvāt payase hi te apākriyante tathā hi dṛṣṭa artha tā bhavati itaratha adṛṣṭa artha tā syāt tasmāt na upādeya tvena vatsa apākaraṇam śrūyate iti yat tu uktam tad liṅga saṃyogāt saṃnayat pakṣaḥ eva iti tat na asaṃnayataḥ api kāla āhānāt yasya api na sāṃnāyyam tasya api vatsa apākaraṇam eva na syāt na tu vatsa apākaraṇa kālaḥ api kālena ca naḥ prayojanam na vatsa apākaraṇena yathā śaṅkha velāyām āgantavyam iti yasmin api grāme śaṅkhaḥ na adhmāyate tasmin api sa tathā akālaḥ asti iti na āgamanam parihāsyate evam iha api asati api vatsa apākaraṇe tad kāle bhidyamāne vratam tasmin kāle na parihāsyate iti 
[I,697,iii_I,697,iv]	prastare śākhā śrayaṇa vat darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti tatra śrūyate saha śākhayā prastaram praharati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim śākhā prastarasya aṅga bhūtā aṅga prayojana saṃbandhaḥ tayoḥ atha kāla arthaḥ saṃyogaḥ prastara praharaṇa kāle śākhā prahartavyā iti kim prāptam prastare śākhā śrayaṇa vat prastarasya aṅga bhūtā śākhā kutas saha śākhayā prastaram praharati iti saha yukte apradhāne tṛtīyā vibhaktiḥ bhavati sā ca śākhāyām tṛtīyā tasmāt prastarasya śākhā guṇa bhūtā prastare ca dvitīyā saha yoge ca tṛtīyā tṛtīyā guṇataḥ dvitīyā pradhānataḥ nanu na śākhayā prastarasya kaścid upakāraḥ kriyate satyam na dṛṣṭam kriyate kim tu adṛṣṭam kriyate śrayaṇa vat yathā payasā maitrāvaruṇam śrīṇāti iti dvitīya atṛtīyā saṃyogāt adṛṣṭaḥ ca upakāraḥ gamyate evam iha api iti 
[I,698,i_I,698,ii^1]	kāla vidhiḥ vā ubhayoḥ vidyamāna tvāt kāla vidhiḥ vā syāt kutas ubhayoḥ vidyamāna tvāt prastaraḥ tāvat sruc dhāraṇa arthaḥ prāptaḥ vidyate tasya praharaṇam api viśiṣṭe kāle vākya antareṇa vihitam tatas śākhāyāḥ pratipādana artham tasya etat punarvacanam ucyate bhavatu prastarasya punarvacanam śākhā tu atra vidhīyate iti ucyate ubhayoḥ api vidyamāna tvāt śākhā pūrvam vihitā vatsa apākaraṇa arthā idānīm punar kim guṇa bhūtā codyate uta pratipādyate iti pratipādyamānāyām dṛṣṭam prayojanam deśa viyogāt pracaritum avakāśaḥ syāt yā yāvatī ca mātrā deśa antara saṃyogasya na dṛṣṭam kiṃcid asti 
[I,698,ii^2]	tasmāt praharaṇam pratipattiḥ tasyāḥ tasmāt paratas prayojana abhāvāt kāla niyamaḥ kriyate nanu tṛtīyā apradhānaḥ bhavati sā ca śākhāyām atra ucyate yā asau śākhāyām tṛtīyā sā dvitīya arthe yā ca prastare dvitīyā sā tṛtīya arthe katham avagamyate saha yoge ekasmin kālaḥ ubhayam api prahartavyam iti atra yasya nirjñātaḥ kālaḥ tasya anuvādaḥ yasya tu anirjñātaḥ tasya vidhiḥ śākhāyāḥ ca anirjñātaḥ prastarasya nirjñātaḥ tasya punar uccāraṇam anirjñāta artham tat apradhānam itarasya uccāraṇam pradhānam prādhānyam ca dvitīya arthaḥ tatra tṛtīyā pārārthyam api tṛtīya arthaḥ tatra dvitīyā tasmāt ayathārtham vibhakti vacanam 
[I,699,i_I,699,ii]	atad saṃskāra artha tvāt ca na ca śākhayā prastarasya upakāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kriyate kāṣṭam dahyamānasya tṛṇasya na upakāre vartate tṛṇam tu kāṣṭhasya upakuryāt tasmāt na śākhā prastara arthā 
[I,699,iii_I,699,iv]	tasmāt ca viprayoge syāt kim bhavati prayojanam yadi prastarasya guṇa bhūtā tathā api prastara prahāra kāle śākhā pratipādyate iti ucyate yadi prastarasya prahriyamāṇasya aṅga bhūtā śākhā tatas vinā prastareṇa na prahartavyā bhavati atha aṅga bhūtā vinā api prastareṇa prahartavyā asmābhiḥ uktam prastara kāle prahartavyā iti tasmāt ca viprayoge syāt tasmāt eva kāraṇāt prastara viprayoge api śākhāyāḥ praharaṇam syāt iti 
[I,699,v_I,699,vi]	upaveṣaḥ ca pakṣe syāt yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ tathā sati sāṃnyāyye sati asati ca śākhā vidyate iti upaveṣaḥ sati ca asati ca syāt yathā tu siddhāntaḥ tathā sāṃnyāyya pakṣe śākhā satī hi pratipādyate iti tatra eva upaveṣaḥ na anyatra iti 
[I,701,i_I,701,ii]	abhyudaye kāla aparādhāt ijyā codanā syāt yathā pañca śarāve idam āmananti vi vai enam prajayā paśubhiḥ ardhayati vardhayati asya bhrātṛvyam yasya haviḥ niruptam purastāt candramāḥ abhyudeti tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajet ye madhyamāḥ syuḥ tān agnaye dātre puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālam nirvapet ye sthaviṣṭhāḥ tān indrāya pradātre dadhan carum ye kṣodiṣṭāḥ tān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte carum iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim kāla aparādhe yāga antaram idam codyate uta teṣu eva prakṛteṣu karmasu nimitte devatā apanayane iti 
[I,701,iii]	kim prāptam abhyudaye yaḥ kāla aparādhaḥ tatra ijyā codanā syāt katham puroḍāśam agnaye dātre madhyamān kurvate ye sthaviṣṭhāḥ tān indrāya pradātre dadhani carum kuryāt kṣodiṣṭhān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya iti yajatiḥ tu phala bhoktṛ saṃyogāt iti vidhānam gamyate yathā pañca śarāve dravya devatā saṃbandhena karma antaram gamyate yathā paśu kāma iṣṭyām yaḥ paśu kāmaḥ syāt saḥ amāvāsyāyām iṣṭvā vatsān apākuryāt ye sthaviṣṭhāḥ tān agnaye sa nimate aṣṭākapālam nirvapet ye madhyamāḥ tān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte carum ye aṇiṣṭhāḥ tān indrāya pradātre dadhan carum iti evam iha api iti api ca na prakṛte dravye devatā śrūyate śṛte carum iti hi tatra bhavati vacanam na ca abhyudaya kāle śrapaṇam kṛtam asti tasmāt karma antaram 
[I,702,i_I,702,ii]	apanayaḥ vā vidyamāna tvāt devatā apanayaḥ vā kutas vidyamāna tvāt vidyante hi karmāṇi prakṛtāni teṣu vidyamāneṣu punar devatā saṃbandhaḥ haviṣaḥ na upapadyate yasya anupapattyā yāgaḥ kalpyeta tasmāt na yāga antaram teṣu eva haviḥṣu devatā antarāṇi vidhīyante 
[I,702,iii_I,702,iv]	tad rūpa tvāt ca śabdānām devatā apanaya sarūpāḥ ca amī śabdāḥ bhavanti ye madhyamāḥ teṣām devatā antaram vidhīyate tatra dravyam prāptam aprāptā devatā vidhīyate katham punar devatā vidhāna arthe na aneka guṇvidhāna doṣaḥ jāyeta iti ucyate na eva atra an ekaḥ guṇaḥ vidhīyate kasmiṃścid vākye taṇḍulān vibhajet iti atra tāvat vibhāga mātram vidhīyate anyat sarvam anūdyate tasmāt adoṣaḥ ye madhyamāḥ teṣām agniḥ devatā vidhīyate anyat puroḍāśa ādi anūdyate ye sthaviṣṭhāḥ teṣām dadhi sahitānām indraḥ devatā asmin vākye vidhīyate tatra artha prāpte śrapaṇe sati carutā saha saptamī arthena artha prāptena eva asmin vākye anūdyate ye kṣodiṣṭhāḥ teṣām śṛta sahitānām viṣṇuḥ śipiviṣṭaḥ devatā vidhīyate anyat sarvam anūdyate tasmāt adoṣaḥ 
[I,702,v_I,702,vi]	ātañcana abhyāsasya darśanāt ātañcana abhyāsam ca darśayati katham evam śrūyate yadi bibhīyāt abhimodeṣyati iti mahārātre havīṃṣi nirvapet phalīkṛtaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ upāsīta ardham dadhi haviḥ ātañcana artham nidadhyāt ardham na yadi abhyudiyāt anena atacya pracaret yadi u na brāhmaṇam bhojayet iti yadi karma antaram upādeya tvena tadā taṇḍulāḥ dadhi śṛtam ca tasmāt laukikāni upādeyāni na hi eṣa tadā prakṛtānām vyāpāraḥ tatra avinaṣṭe dadhani aparedyus āmāvāsye kriyamāṇe vidyate dadhi iti na ātañcanam āvarteta tasyām eva abhyudita iṣṭau dadhi vidyate iti na ātañcanam syāt atha nimitte devatā apanayaḥ tatas tasmin dadhani caruḥ kṛtaḥ iti punar āmāvāsye dohe ātañcanena kāryam evam ātañcana abhyāsasya darśanam devatā vidhāne yujyate iti 
[I,703,i_I,703,ii]	apūrva tvāt vidhānam syāt atha yat uktam yathā paśu kāma iṣṭyām karma antaram yaḥ paśu kāmaḥ syāt saḥ amāvāsyām iṣṭvā vatsān apākuryāt iti tat parihartavyam tatra ucyate yuktam yat tatra karma antara vidhānam kutas apūrva tvāt na tatra kaścid pūrva prāptaḥ yāgaḥ vidyate saḥ amāvāsyām iṣṭvā iti hi parisamāpte tasmin idam ārabhyate tatra dravya devatā saṃyuktaḥ nirvapati śabdaḥ na antareṇa utsargam dravya devatayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ vidyate iti yajatim gamayati na tu iha evam iha hi yāgaḥ prakṛtaḥ gamyate tasmin eva vidyamānasya dravyasya devatā saṃbandha mātram vidhīyate iti na doṣaḥ bhavati 
[I,703,iii_I,703,iv]	payaḥ doṣāt pañca śarāve aduṣṭam hi itarat atha yat upavarṇitam yathā pañca śarāve karma antaram vidhīyate evam iha api iti tat parihartavyam iti atra ucyate yuktam pañca śarāve karma antaram duṣṭam hi tatra dravyam yasya devatā vidhīyate tatra avaśyam dravyam upādeya tvena codayitavyam tasmin upādīyamāne devatā antare ca apūrvaḥ saṃbandhaḥ vidhīyate tat yāga antaram bhavati iti itarat iha dravyam aduṣṭam tat anūdya prakṛte yāge devatā vidhīyate iti uktam tasmāt adoṣaḥ iti 
[I,704,i_I,704,ii]	sāṃnyāyye api tathā iti ced evam ced paśyasi sāṃnyāyye api doṣaḥ tat api hi abhyudaye tad kāla apabhraṃśāt duṣṭam iti 
[I,704,iii_I,704,iv]	na tasya aduṣṭa tvāt aviśiṣṭam hi kāraṇam na etat evam pañca śarāve hi duṣṭam dravyam iha tādṛśam eva avatiṣṭhate nanu kāla apabhraṃśena duṣṭam na duṣyati aviśiṣṭam hi kāraṇam abhyudaye prāyaścitta vidhānam duṣṭe api upapadyate kāla aparādhe aduṣṭe api tat akāle hi abhipravṛttasya śakyate devatā vidhānam na tu vinaṣṭasya 
[I,704,v_I,704,vi]	lakṣaṇa arthā śṛtaśrutiḥ atha yat uktam na prakṛte dravye devatā śrūyate śṛte carum iti tatra bhavati vacanam na ca abhyudaya kāle śrapaṇam kṛtam asti iti tat parihartavyam atra ucyate lakṣaṇa arthā iyam śṛtaśrutiḥ dharma lakṣaṇa arthā śṛte śṛta sahacarita dharmakaḥ iti 
[I,705,i_I,705,ii]	upāṃśuyāje avacanāt yathāprakṛti tasmin eva abhyudaye saṃśayaḥ kim upāṃśu yāge api devatā apanayaḥ bhavet na iti kim prāptam upāṃśu yājaḥ yathāprakṛti syāt kasmāt avacanāt yathā amīṣu vacanam madhyamānām agnaye dātre puroḍāśāḥ sthaviṣṭhānām indrāya pradātre dadhani caruḥ kṣodiṣṭhānām viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caru iti na etat upāṃśuyāje asti tasmāt sa yathādevatam syāt 
[I,705,iii_I,705,iv]	apanayaḥ vā pravṛttyā yathā itareṣām vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati upāṃśu yājasya apanayaḥ kena kāraṇena pravṛttyā akāle tantra pravṛttiḥ devatā apanayasya kāraṇam kutas na hi atra abhyudaye sati taṇḍulāḥ vibhāga artham upādīyante kim tarhi abhyuditasya haviṣaḥ vibhāgaḥ ucyate abhyudayena aparāhnasya iti katham avagamyate yasya abhyudiyāt iti aviśeṣa śravaṇāt sarvasya eva hi aparādhena abhyudeti aparādhaḥ ca akāle tantra pravṛttiḥ evam ca sati na tat dhaviḥ taṇḍulaiḥ śakyam viśeṣṭum tasmāt upāṃśu yāgasya api vibhāgaḥ tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajet iti hi anena vākyena devatā apanayaḥ kriyate vidhiḥ hi atra vibhajet iti vibhāgam kuryāt iti arthaḥ katham iti vibhāge viśeṣa parāṇi uttarāṇi vākyāni idam idam ca dravyam asyai devatāyai idam idam ca asyāḥ iti yasya dravyasya viśeṣa vibhāgaḥ na asti tasya api vibhajet iti sāmānya vibhāgaḥ tasmāt yathā eva itareṣām vibhāgaḥ evam upāṃśu yājasya api iti athavā upāṃśuyāja dravyāt pūrveṇa vākyena apanītā devatā na tat apareṇa vākyena devatā antare saṃyojitam tasmāt prahīṇam eva tat 
[I,706,i_I,706,ii]	nirupte syāt tad saṃyogāt asmin eva udāharaṇe saṃśayaḥ kim yadi nirupte abhyudayaḥ avagamyate tadā abhyudita iṣṭiḥ uta anirupte api iti kim prāptam nirupte avagate abhyudita iṣṭiḥ syāt kutas tad saṃyogāt nirvāpa saṃyogaḥ hi bhavati yasya haviḥ niruptam iti tasmāt anirupte na etat vidhānam iti 
[I,706,iii_I,706,iv]	pravṛtte vā prāpaṇāt nimittasya vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati akāle tantra pravṛtti mātre syāt etat vidhānam prāptam hi tāvatī eva nimittam yasya haviḥ abhyudeti iti haviḥ grahaṇam lakṣaṇa tvena yasya haviḥ abhyudeti iti haviḥ lakṣitaḥ udayaḥ nimittam pravṛttam haviḥ lakṣayati na udāsīnam tasmāt haviḥ abhyudeti iti ucyamāne pravṛttam haviḥ abhyudeti iti gamyate na hi tat niruptam iti etena śakyam viśeṣayitum bhidyeta hi tadā vākyam yasya haviḥ niruptam na aniruptam iti evam apekṣyamāṇe haviḥ abhyudeti iti na śakyate vidhātum tasmāt anirupte api īṣṭiḥ iti 
[I,707,i_I,707,ii]	lakṣaṇa mātram itaram atha yat uktam nirupta saṃyogaḥ bhavati yasya haviḥ niruptam iti lakṣaṇa mātram etat niruptam iti kasmiṃścid padārthe tasya pravṛttaḥ iti arthaḥ 
[I,707,iii_I,707,iv]	tathā ca anya artha darśanam anya arthaḥ api ca etam artham darśayati sa yadi agṛhītam haviḥ abhyudiyāt prajñātam eva tadā eṣā vrata caryā yat pūrvedyus dugdham dadhi haviḥ ātañcanam tat kurvanti pratimuñcanti vatsān tān eva tat punar apākurvanti tān aparāhṇe parṇa śākhayā apākaroti tat yathā eva ādeḥ prajñātam āmauvāsyam haviḥ evam eva tat yadi u vrata caryām vā na udāśaṃseta gṛhītam vā haviḥ abhyudiyāt itarathā tarhi kuryāt etān eva taṇḍulān sakṛt phalīkṛtān iti agṛhīte haviṣi anyam vidhim bruvan gṛhīte api anirupte vā abhyudaye prāyaścittam darśayati 
[I,707,v_I,707,vi]	anirupte abhyudite prākṛtībhyaḥ nirvapet iti āśmarathyaḥ taṇḍula bhūteṣu apanayāt pravṛtta mātram nimittam iti sthitam naimittikaḥ tu devatā apanayaḥ devatā antara saṃyogaḥ ca kim nirvāpa uttara kālam taṇḍula avasthe haviṣi kartavyaḥ nirvāpaḥ tu prākṛtībhyaḥ eva syāt jñāte abhyudaye uta vaikṛtībhyaḥ eva iti saṃśayaḥ kim tāvat prāptam anirupte abhyudite prākṛtībhyaḥ nirvapet iti āśmarathya ācāryaḥ manyate sma kutas taṇḍula bhūteṣu apanayāt taṇḍula bhūteṣu apanayaḥ śrūyate yasya haviḥ niruptam purastāt candramāḥ abhyudeti tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajet iti abhyudaya avagamāt anantaram taṇḍula vibhāgam āha saḥ ataṇḍula bhūteṣu na avakalpate tasmāt anirupte taṇḍula abhāvāt anapanītāḥ devatāḥ prākṛtyaḥ iti prākṛtībhyaḥ eva nirvapet iti 
[I,708,i_I,708,ii]	vyūrdhva bhāgbhyaḥ tu ālekhanaḥ tad kāri tvāt devatā apanayasya tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati vyūrdhvam yāḥ bhajante karma tābhyaḥ nirvapet iti ālekhanaḥ ācāryaḥ manyate sma kutas tad kāri tvāt devatā apanayasya yasmāt akāle tantra pravṛtti kāritaḥ devatā apanayaḥ tasmāt apanītā devatā iti vyūrdhva bhāgbhyaḥ nirvaptavyāḥ 
[I,708,iii_I,708,iv]	vinirupte na muṣṭīnām apanayaḥ tad guṇa tvāt atha prārabdhe catur muṣṭiḥ nirvāpe aparisamāpte bhavati saṃśayaḥ yat niruptam tat niruptam eva avaśiṣṭam kim prākṛtībhyaḥ nirvaptavyam kim vaikṛtībhyaḥ uta tūṣṇīm eva iti kim prāptam vinirupte sāminiruptaḥ iti arthaḥ na tatra devatā apanayaḥ syāt kutas tad guṇa tvāt nirvāpasya guṇaḥ devatā na muṣṭīnām sa ca nirvāpaḥ tat devatākaḥ kutas catur saṃkhyā pūraṇa artha tvāt abhyāsa mātram kartavyam tat ca abhyāsa mātram punar kriyate pūrvam eva kṛte tasmin nirvāpe na devatā apanītā saḥ eva ayam punar kriyate punar api kriyamānasya anapanītā eva devatā bhavitum arhati iti prākṛtībhyaḥ eva nirvaptavyam na ca uttaraḥ muṣṭiḥ pṛthak padārthaḥ yena devatā apanayaḥ bhavet kṛtasya nirvāpasya saṃkhyā pūraṇam etat kriyate tasmāt anapanayaḥ iti 
[I,709,i_I,709,iii]	aprākṛtena hi saṃyogaḥ tad sthānīya tvāt na prākṛtībhyaḥ nirvaptavyam kābhyaḥ tarhi vaikṛtībhyaḥ kutas aprākṛtena devatā viśeṣeṇa saṃyogaḥ śrūyate na adhikṛtena tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajet iti prākṛtībhyaḥ ācchidya vaikṛtībhyaḥ nirvaptavyaḥ vidhīyate tāḥ idānīm tad sthānīyāḥ tasmāt vinirupte nivṛttāḥ devatāḥ anyāḥ anyāḥ ca upajātāḥ tasmāt vaikṛtīnām saṃyogena nirvāpa śeṣaḥ kartavyaḥ iti 
[I,709,iv_I,709,v]	abhāvāt ca itarasya syāt abhāvāt itarasya ardhasya devatā saṃyuktasya na nirvāpaḥ bhavati devatā saṃyuktaḥ yadi nirvāpaḥ ardham anya devatyaḥ ardhaḥ api anyasyai devatāyai na eva nirvāpaḥ itara devatākaḥ vā itara devatākaḥ vā tasmāt tūṣṇīm eva nirvaptavyam avaśyam anyataratra saṃkalpa bhedaḥ bhavati 
[I,710,i_I,710,ii]	sāṃnāyya saṃyogāt na asaṃnayataḥ syāt abhyuhita iṣṭiḥ eva udāharaṇam tatra śrūyate dadhani carum śṛte carum iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim saṃnayataḥ bhavati abhyudaye prāyaścittam uta aviśeṣeṇa iti kim prāptam saṃnayataḥ abhyudaye prāyaścittam kutas sāṃnāyya saṃyogāt saṃnyāyya saṃyogaḥ hi bhavati śṛte carum dadhani carum iti śṛta ādi abhāvāt na asaṃnayataḥ bhavitum arhati vaiguṇyam hi tathā syāt 
[I,710,iii_I,710,iv]	auṣadha saṃyogāt vā ubhayoḥ vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati ubhayoḥ api syāt na kevalasya saṃnayataḥ auṣadha saṃyogāt ye madhyamāḥ ye sthaviṣṭhāḥ ye kṣodiṣṭhāḥ iti bhavati auṣadha saṃyogaḥ sa ca śakyaḥ asaṃnaya tā api iti tasmāt na asati kāraṇe asaṃnayataḥ nivarteta ubhayoḥ api pakṣayoḥ prāyaścittam iti 
[I,710,v_I,710,vi]	vaiguṇyāt na iti ced iti yat uktam asaṃnayataḥ dadhnaḥ śṛtasya ca abhāvāt tad adhikaraṇa tā na asti tasmāt vaiguṇyam tasmin pakṣaḥ iti tat parihartavyam iti 
[I,710,vii_I,710,viii]	na atad saṃskāra tvāt na etat evam na hi dadhi adhikaraṇa caroḥ śrapaṇe śrūyate kim tu yathā sthaviṣṭhā indrāya pradātre evam dadhi api devatā saṃbandha artham vidhīyate na caru saṃbandha artham iti bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam sthaviṣṭhā devatāyai dadhani ca te kartavyāḥ iti saptamī saṃyogaḥ tu prāpte arthe anuvādaḥ tasmāt avivakṣitam teṣām sāhityam lakṣaṇa tvena hi te śrūyante iti na hi payaḥ dadhi ca na asti iti sthaviṣṭhānām na devatā apanayaḥ bhavati asaṃnayataḥ api arthāt apsu śrapayiṣyate iti 
[I,711,i_I,711,ii]	sāmī utthāne viśvajit krīte vibhāga saṃyogāt idam āmananti yadi satrāya dīkṣitāḥ atha sāmyut tiṣṭheran somam apabhajya viśvajitā atirātreṇa sarva stomena sarva pṛṣṭhena sarva vedasa dakṣiṇena yajeran iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim krīta rājakasya utthāne viśva jit uta pravṛtta mātrasya iti kim prāptam sāmi utthāne viśva jit krīte syāt kutas vibhāga saṃyogāt somam apabhajya viśva jitā yajeran iti ye hi akrīte rājani uttiṣṭanti teṣām soma vibhāga abhāvāt vaiguṇyam syāt tasmāt krīta rājakāḥ uttiṣṭhantaḥ viśvajitam kuryuḥ 
[I,711,iii_I,711,iv]	pravṛtte vā prāpaṇāt nimittasya vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati pravṛtta mātrasya utthāne syāt kutas prāpaṇāt nimittasya sāmi utthānam nimittam viśvajitaḥ tat ca prāptam na ca tat śakyam viśeṣayitum krīte some sāmi utthānam iti 
[I,712,i_I,712,ii]	ādeśa artha itarā śrutiḥ atha yat uktam akrīte rājani uttiṣṭhantaḥ vibhāga abhāvāt viguṇam kuryuḥ iti tat pratihartavyam atra ūcayate na vibhāgaḥ vidhīyate bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam sāmi utthāne viśvajitāḥ yajeran somasya tu apabhāgam kṛtvā iti tena apabhajya iti anuvādaḥ katham prāptiḥ iti ced arthāt uttiṣṭhatām vibhāgaḥ bhavati dhanasya saḥ ayam sarva dravyāṇām vibhāgaḥ soma vibhāgena lakṣyate somam vibhajya anyāni ca dravyāṇi iti ādeśa artha itarā śrutiḥ bhavati tasmāt krīte ca akrīte ca rājani uttiṣṭhatām viśva jit iti 
[I,712,iii_I,712,iv]	dīkṣā parimāṇe yathākāmya viśeṣāt jyotiṣṭomam prakṛtya śrūyate ekā dīkṣā tisraḥ upasadaḥ pañcamīm prasutaḥ iti tisraḥ dīkṣāḥ dvādaśa dīkṣā iti bahūni dīkṣā parimāṇāni āmnātāni teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim aniyamaḥ yat vā tat vā parimāṇam upādeyam uta dvādaśa dīkṣā iti kim prāptam dīkṣā parimāṇe yathākāmī syāt na asti niyamaḥ kutas aviśeṣāt na kaścana viśeṣaḥ upādīyate tasmāt yat kiṃcid parimāṇam upādeyam iti 
[I,713,i_I,713,ii]	dvādaśa ahaḥ tu liṅgāt syāt dvādaśa ahe eva parimāṇam upādīyeta kutas liṅgāt sāmarthyāt iti arthaḥ kim sāmarthyam dvādaśa rātrīḥ dīkṣitaḥ bhṛtim vanvīta iti nitya vat āmnāyate na pākṣikam tat eva nityam kurvan na śaknoti anyat parimāṇam upādātum tasmāt dvādaśa ahe eva parimāṇam niyamyeta anyāni parimāṇāni vikṛtau bhaviṣyati iti na eṣām ānarthakyam iti 
[I,713,iii_I,713,iv]	paurṇamāsyām aniyamaḥ aviśeṣāt gavāmayane śrūyate purastāt paurṇamāsyāḥ caturahe dīkṣeran iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kasyāḥ paurṇamāsyāḥ iti kim prāptam paurṇamāsyām aniyamaḥ iti kutas aviśeṣāt na atra kaścid viśeṣa vacanaḥ śabdaḥ upādīyate 
[I,713,v_I,713,vi]	ānantaryāt tu caitrī syāt tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na etat aniyamaḥ iti caitrī paurṇamāsī tu bhavet kutas ānantaryāt paurṇamāsīm uktvā anantaram vākya śeṣe caitrī saṃkīrtyate purasāt paurṇamāsyāḥ caturahe dīkṣeran ṛtu mukham vā eṣā paurṇamāsī saṃvatsarasya yā caitrī paurṇamāsi iti atra saṃdigdheṣu vākya śeṣāt iti caitrī niyamyeta 
[I,714,i_I,714,ii]	māghī vā eka aṣṭakā śruteḥ vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na ca etat asti caitri iti kim tarhi māghī iti kutas ekāṣṭakā śruteḥ kraye hi ekāṣṭakā śrutiḥ bhavati teṣām ekāṣṭakāyām krayaḥ saṃpadyate iti tasmāt māghyāḥ purastāt catur ahe dīkṣitasya ekāṣṭakāyām krayaḥ śakyate kartum na caityāḥ tat etat sāmarthyam nāma liṅgam tat vākyasya bādhakam bhavati tasmāt māghī paurṇamāsī iti 
[I,714,iii_I,714,iv]	anyā api iti ced iti ced paśyasi māghī paurṇamāsī evam ekāṣṭakāyām krayaḥ saṃpatsyate iti tat na asarvāḥ aṣṭamyaḥ ekāṣṭakāḥ dvādaśa ekāṣṭakāḥ iti tena na doṣaḥ 
[I,714,v_I,714,vi]	na bhakti tvāt eṣā hi loke na etat evam bhāktaḥ hi anyāsu aṣṭamīṣu ekāṣṭakā śabdaḥ eṣā hi mukhyā yā māghyām vṛttāyām mukhya gauṇayoḥ ca mukhye saṃpratyayaḥ tasmāt māghī eva paurṇamāsi iti 
[I,714,vii_I,715,iii]	dīkṣā aparādhe ca anugrahāt ekāṣṭakāyām dīkṣeran eṣā vai saṃvatsarasya patnī yat ekāṣṭakā iti uktvā punar catur ahe purastāt paurṇamāsyāḥ dīkṣām vidhāya teṣām ekāṣṭakāyām krayaḥ saṃpadyate tena ekāṣṭakām na chaṃvaṭ kurvanti iti dīkṣātaḥ pracyutām ekāṣṭakām krayeṇa tu gṛhṇan māghyāḥ paurṇamāsyāḥ adhikāram darśayati asyām ca māghyām aṣṭamyām abhījyamānāyām bhavati mantraḥ yām janāḥ pratinandanti rātrīm dhenum iva āyatīm saṃvatsarasya yā patnī sā naḥ astu sumaṅgalī iti aṣṭakāyai surādhase svāhā iti yā asau māghī aṣṭamī tām ekāṣṭakām darśayati 
[I,715,iv_I,715,v]	utthāne ca anuprarohāt utthāne ca anupraroham darśayati tān uttiṣṭhate auṣadhayaḥ vanaspatayaḥ anuttiṣṭhanti iti vasantaḥ utthānam darśayati tasmin oṣadhayaḥ vanaspatayaḥ ca uttiṣṭhanti tasmāt api sā niyamyate 
[I,715,vi_I,715,vii]	asyām ca sarva liṅgāni ārtam vai ete saṃvatsarasya abhidīkṣante yaḥ ekāṣṭakāyām dīkṣantaḥ iti ārtāḥ yasmin kāle bhavanti saḥ ārtaḥ kālaḥ śītena ca ārtāḥ bhavanti tasmāt māghī aṣṭamī ekāṣṭaka iti tathā vyastam vai ete saṃvatsarasya abhidīkṣante yaḥ ekāṣṭakāyām dīkṣantaḥ iti ayana parivṛttiḥ vyasta śabdena ucyate tathā apaḥ na abhinandantaḥ avabhṛtham abhyavayanti iti caitryām dīkṣitāḥ abhinandantaḥ abhyaveyuḥ tasmāt api māghī paurṇamāsī iti 
[I,716,i_I,716,ii]	dīkṣā kālasya śiṣṭa tvāt atikrame niyatānām anutkarṣaḥ prāpta kāla tvāt idam śrūyate tasmāt dīkṣitaḥ na dadāti na pacati na juhoti iti jyotiṣṭome samāmananti yadi tu daivāt mānuṣāt vā pratibalāt dīkṣitā kālaḥ utkṛṣyate tatra saṃdehaḥ kim dāna homa pākānām utkarṣaḥ uta na iti kim prāptam anutkarṣaḥ niyatāḥ hi dāna homa pākāḥ yāvat jīvam agnihotram juhoti iti evamādibhiḥ śrutibhiḥ teṣām apavādaḥ yeṣu ahaḥsu sa aṅgaḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ vihitaḥ tāvanti ahāni muktvā anyeṣu ahaḥsu kartavyāḥ jyotiṣṭoma vidhāna kālāt paratas apratiṣiddhāḥ tasmāt kartavyāḥ prāptaḥ hi teṣām kālaḥ iti 
[I,716,iii_I,716,iv]	utkarṣaḥ vā dīkṣita tvāt aviśiṣṭam hi kāraṇam vā śabdāt pakṣaḥ viparivartate yat uktam na eṣam utkarṣaḥ iti na etat evam utkṛṣṭavyāḥ kutas dīkṣita tvāt dīkṣitasya te pratiṣiddhāḥ na dīkṣitaḥ yasmin kāle lakṣaṇāḥ hi evam syāt yathā tu vayam brūmaḥ tathā śrutiḥ kāraṇam prāk ca avabhṛthāt ayam dīkṣitaḥ eva aviśiṣṭam hi kāraṇam yat eva jyotiṣṭoma vidhāna kāle tat eva atikrānte api ubhayatra hi dīkṣita tvam hi kāraṇam tasmāt teṣām utkarṣaḥ iti 
[I,717,i_I,717,iii]	tatra pratihomaḥ na vidyate yathā pūrveṣām tatra utkṛṣyamāṇe jyotiṣṭome akṛteṣu homeṣu kim parisaṃkhyāya homāḥ kartavyāḥ uta na iti kim prāptam parisaṃkhyāya homāḥ kriyeran kim kāraṇam avaśya kartavya tayā hi te vihitāḥ homāḥ atipannāḥ api kartavyāḥ eva tathā hi eṣām avaśya kartavyatā anugṛhītā bhaviṣyati pradhāna mātram tu niyatam na atra kāla anurodhaḥ kartavyaḥ nadī vega sthānīya tvāt yadi api atikrāntāḥ kālāḥ atikrāntānām parisaṃkhyāya pradhāna mātrāṇi kartavyāni yathā vaśya kartavyam bhukti bhṛtaka dāna ādi yat atikrāntam bhavati tat parisaṃkhyāya kriyate evam idam api iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ tatra pratihomaḥ na vidyate yathā pūrveṣām kartavyam akṛtvā kuryāt na akartavyam akartavyāḥ ca ete pratiṣiddha tvāt yathā pūrveṣām asati kāla atikrame akṛtānām na pratihomaḥ evam eṣām api iti 
[I,717,iv_I,717,v]	kāla prādhānyāt ca kāla prādhānyam ca bhavati nimitta tvena tasya śruta tvāt tad abhāve vihitam eva na bhavati pradhāna mātram yadi api niyamyeta tathā api nimitte kāle sa ca nadī vega sthānīyaḥ kāle atikrāntaḥ atas na pratihomaḥ kartavyaḥ iti 
[I,718,i_I,718,ii]	pratiṣedhāt ca ūrdhvam avabhṛthāt eṣṭeḥ ūrdhvam avabhṛthāt ā udavasānīyāyāḥ iṣṭeḥ ye homāḥ teṣu atipanneṣu daivena mānuṣeṇa vā pratibalena bhavati saṃśayaḥ kim pratihomaḥ kartavyaḥ uta na iti kim prāptam kartavyaḥ iti unmukta dīkṣaḥ hi sa tadā bhavati dīkṣāṇām unmocana arthaḥ hi avabhṛthaḥ tasmāt kartavyāḥ te na kṛtā iti 
[I,718,iii]	evam prāpte brūmaḥ ūrdhvam avabhṛthāt ā udavasānīyāyāḥ iṣṭeḥ atipannānām na pratihomaḥ syāt kutas pratiṣedhāt pratiṣedhaḥ hi bhavati etayā punar ādheya sa smitayā iṣṭyā agnihotram hotavyam iti prāk udavasānīyāyāḥ homasya pratiṣedhaḥ yāvat udavasānīya utkṛṣyate tāvat pratiṣedhaḥ evam śrutiḥ itarathā lakṣaṇā syāt tasmāt akartavyāḥ te na kṛtā iti na syāt pratihomaḥ iti 
[I,718,iv_I,718,v]	pratihomaḥ ced sāyam agnihotra prabhṛtīni hūyeran eteṣu eva udāharaṇeṣu bhavati saṃśayaḥ kim pratihome sāyam agnihotra prabhṛtīni ārabhyeran uta prātar agnihotra prabhṛtīni iti nanu na asti eva pratihomaḥ iti sthitam ucyate asti iti kṛtvā cintayāmaḥ kṛtvā cintā iyam anyeṣu sadṛśa nyāyeṣu udāharaṇeṣu asyāḥ prayojanam asti iti cintyate kim prāptam aniyamaḥ artha kṛta tvāt evam prāpte brūmaḥ yadi pratihomaḥ kriyate sāyam agnihotra prabhṛtīni hūyeran kutas sāyam agni hotrāt ārabhya atipannāni tena eva ānupūrveṇa pratihotavyāni iti 
[I,719,i_I,719,ii]	prātar tu ṣoḍaśini ṣoḍaśi saṃsthe somaḥ atipanneṣu homeṣu saṃdehaḥ kim sāyam agni hotreṇa iti uta prātar iti kim prāptam sāyam agni hotreṇa iti pūrvasmin adhikaraṇaḥ uktam utsargeṇa sarvatra evam iti prāptam tathā prāptaḥ ucyate prātar tu ṣoḍaśini ṣoḍaśi saṃsthe prātar agnihotra ādīni atipannāni iti prātar agnihotrāt eva samārabhyāni iti 
[I,719,iii_I,719,iv]	prāyaścittam adhikāre sarvatra doṣa sāmānyāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate bhinne juhoti skanne juhoti iti tatra kim darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ eva etat bhinne skanne ca prāyaścittam uta yatra bhidyate skandati ca iti kim prāptam prakaraṇe yat prāyaścittam evaṃjātīyakam kiṃcid utpannam tat sarvatra yatra yatra bhidyate skandati vā tatra tatra syāt kasmāt doṣa sāmānyāt samānam nimittam skandanam bhedanam vā saḥ eva atra doṣaḥ iti abhipretam prakaraṇāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ prāyaścittam vākyāt anyatra api prakaraṇāt ca vākyam balīyaḥ tasmāt sarvatra skanne bhinne ca prāyaścittam iti 
[I,720,i_I,720,ii]	prakaraṇe vā śabda hetu tvāt prakaraṇaḥ eva bhinne skanne vā prāyaścittam kutas śabda hetu tvāt tena prākṛtena arthena saha eka vākyatā eṣām homānām tatas homavataḥ yāgasya pratyāyane prakṛtaḥ yajeta iti śabdaḥ hetuḥ evam ced tad upakāreṇa arthavān bhaviṣyati iti itarathāḥ vinā vākyena phalam kalpayitavyam syāt tasmāt vākyam phala abhāvena eva bādhitam iti kṛtvā prakaraṇam anugṛhītavyam iti 
[I,720,iii_I,720,iv]	atad vikāraḥ ca na ca atad vikāraḥ agnihotram jyotiṣṭomaḥ vā na darśa pūrṇamāsa vikāraḥ yadi tad vikāraḥ bhavet tatra api skanne bhinne vā prāyaścittam syāt iti 
[I,720,v_I,720,vi]	vyāpannasya apsu gatau yat abhojyam āryāṇām tat pratīyeta vyāpannam apsu praharati iti śrūyate kim vyāpannam iti ucyate iti tat abhidhīyate vyāpannam dūṣitam yena kāryena kriyate kim tat yat abhojyam āryāṇām keśa kīṭau apannam anyena vā upaghātena upahatam tat vyāpannam iti 
[I,721,i_I,721,ii]	vibhāga śruteḥ prāyaścittam yaugapadye na vidyate prastotrudgātroḥ udgātṛ pratihartoḥ vā yatra apacchedaḥ kim tatra prāyaścittam syāt na iti bhavati saṃśayaḥ kim tāvat prāptam prāyaścittam yaugapadye na vidyate kutas vibhāga śruteḥ vibhakte apacchede prāyaścittam āmananti apacchedaḥ ca ayam vibhāgaḥ saḥ ubhābhyām sādhyate iha ca ekena sādhyamāne śrūyate prāyaścittam udgātrā pratihartrā vā na ca yat apareṇa saha kriyate tat kevalena kṛtam bhavati yadi hi kevalena kṛtam syāt tena kṛtam aparaḥ kim kuryāt tasmāt na yugapad apacchinnayoḥ prāyaścittam iti 
[I,721,iii_I,721,iv]	syāt vā prāpta nimitta tvāt kāla mātram ekam syāt vā prāyaścittam yaugapadye api prāptam hi nimittam apacchedaḥ udgātuḥ pratihataḥ ca yatra hi dvayoḥ apacchedaḥ tatra dvau api apacchinnau ekaḥ api aparaḥ api saṃyuktasya hi pṛthagbhāvaḥ apacchedaḥ sa ca ubhaya sthaḥ api ekena api tatra āpacchedaḥ kriyate anapekṣya aparam apareṇa api kāla mātram tu tatra ekam na ca kāla aikyāt apacchedayoḥ aikyam bhavati tasmāt prāyaścittam yugapad apacchede api 
[I,722,i_I,722,ii]	tatra vipratiṣedhāt vikalpaḥ syāt yadi udgātṛ pratihartroḥ yugapad apacchedaḥ bhavati tatra saṃdehaḥ kim adākṣiṇyam sarva svam vā vikalpaḥ uta samuccayaḥ iti kim prāptam tatra vipratiṣedhāt vikalpaḥ syāt viruddhau hi etau kalpau sarva svam adākṣiṇyam ca tasmāt vikalpaḥ bhavitum arhati 
[I,722,iii_I,722,iv]	prayoga antare vā ubhaya anugrahaḥ syāt vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na ca etat asti vikalpaḥ iti ubhayoḥ vidhānāt sarva aṅga upasaṃhārī prayoga vacanaḥ evam upapadyate vikalpe hi pakṣe bādhaḥ tasmāt samuccayaḥ atha yat uktam virodhāt vikalpaḥ iti ucyate prayoga antare vā ubhaya anugrahaḥ syāt tena punar yajeta iti ucyate dvis tasya prayogaḥ tatra ekasmin prayoge ekaḥ kalpaḥ anyasmin aparaḥ bhaviṣyati evam avirodhaḥ tasmāt ubhayam prāyaścittam iti 
[I,722,v_I,722,vi]	na ca eka saṃyogāt na ca etat evam kutas eka saṃyogāt saḥ eva yāgaḥ punar kriyeta yadi anyatareṇa vinā vaiguṇyam iti avadhāryeta sarva sve kriyamāṇe adakṣiṇya abhāvāt viguṇaḥ syāt na anyasmin prayoge kriyamāṇe anyaḥ prayogaḥ anugṛhyate na ca adākṣiṇyasya sarva sva dānasya ca prādhānyam guṇavatā prayogeṇa karma saṃbandhayitavyam tasmāt vikalpaḥ 
[I,723,i_I,723,iii]	paurvāparye pūrva daurbalyam prakṛti vat yatra ānupūrveṇa bhavati apacchedaḥ tatra kim pūrva nimittam prāyaścittam uta uttara nimittam iti bhavati saṃśayaḥ kim prāptam pūrvasya balīyaḥ tvam pūrva āpacchede yat naimittikam prāptam tasmin sati tad viruddham na śakyam kartum na ca aśakyam upadeśa arham bhavati pūrva vijñānam prāptam iti na saṃśayaḥ tasmāt tad avirodhena anyat kāryam na viruddham kva tarhi tat syāt yatra kevalam nimittam tasmāt pūrva vijñānam balavat evam prāpte brūmaḥ paurvāparye pūrva daurbalyam syāt kutas ākhyātena hi yaḥ arthaḥ kartavyaḥ iti ucyate tatra etat anubuddham yathā śakyeta tathā iti tat pūrva vijñāna bādhena śakyate na anyathā tena pūrva vijñānam bādhitvā idam kartavyam iti bhavati śabda arthaḥ 
[I,723,iv_I,723,v]	nanu pūrva vijñānaḥ idam upapadyate yat anyat virodhakam vijñānam bhaviṣyati tat mithyā iti abhūtam hi tat na śakyam āśrayitum idam nāma tat iti na ca apratiṣiddhe tasmin na pūrva vijñānam saṃbhavati tasmāt apratiṣiddham bhaviṣyat yadā tu tat bhavati tadā pūrva vijñānam bādhamānam eva utpadyate tat idānīm bādhitam na śaknoti uttaram bādhitum iti prakṛti vat yat dhi prākṛtam vaikṛtena bādhyate tatra api etat eva kāraṇam na ābādhitvā pūrva vijñānam vaikṛtam saṃbhavati iti prākṛtam ca pūrvam yatas vikṛtau tat apekṣā pratyakṣa tvāt vaikṛtam ānumānikam prākṛtam bādhataḥ iti ced pratyakṣa tve api sati na eva bādheta yadi yathā āvarṇitaḥ ayam ākhyāta arthaḥ na bhavet sati pūrva vijñāne aśakya tvāt prākṛtam bādheta eva tasmāt para balīyaḥ tvam nyāyyam eva iti 
[I,724,i_I,724,iii]	yadi udgātā jaghanyaḥ syāt punar yajñe sarva vedasam dadyāt yathā itarasmin yadā pratihartuḥ pūrvam apacchedaḥ tatas udgātuḥ tatra adakṣiṇena iṣṭvā punar yaṣṭavyam tatra saṃdehaḥ punar yāge kim dvādaśa śatam dātavyam uta sarva svam iti kim prāptam dvādaśa śatam kutas evam hi āmnāyate tatra tat dadyāt yat pūrvasmin dāsyan syāt pūrvasmin ca prayoge jyotiṣṭoma dakṣiṇā eva prāptā tasmāt dvādaśa śatam iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ tatra punar yajñe sarvam dadyāt yathā itarasmin pūrvasmin ahani sarva svam katham tatra sarva svam iti ced pratihartuḥ apacchedāt pratihartari apacchinne dvādaśa śatam bādhitvā sarva svam dāsyan bhavati 
[I,724,iv]	nanu pūrvasmin ahani dvādaśa śatam api asau dāsyan āsīt satyam sarva sva dānena te ubhayam pradattam bhavati tasmāt tat deyam nanu arvāk api dvādaśa śatāt sarva svam na etat evam adhikṛte dvādaśa śate sarva svam api adhikam bhavati api ca pūrvasmin ahani na eva dvādaśa śatam dāsyan bhavati iti etāvat dāsyan iti ucyate yasya uttara kāle tāvat dānam bhavati na ca pūrvasmin ahani dvādaśa śatam dīyate tasmāt na tat dāsyan iti avagamyate mithyā buddhiḥ sā tattvena vyavahāraḥ nanu ca sarva svam api pratiṣiddham bhavati tat api asau na dāsyan iti sā api asya mithyā buddhiḥ na iti āha sa abhyāsasya jyotiṣṭomasya prayogaḥ tatra prathama prayoge adākṣiṇya virodhāt sarva svam bādhyate dvitīya prayoge tat dānam codyate tatra virodhaḥ na asti tasya eva yajñasya saḥ eva prayogaḥ pratihartā ca tasmin apacchinnaḥ iti dvādaśa śatam bādhitvā sarva svam eva dāsyan bhavati tasmāt sarva svam tatra deyam iti 
[I,725,i_I,725,ii]	ahar gaṇe yasmin apacchedaḥ tat āvarteta karma pṛthaktvāt ahar gaṇe yadā bhavati kasmiṃścid ahani udgātuḥ apacchedaḥ tadā saṃdehaḥ kim kṛtsnaḥ ahar gaṇaḥ āvartate uta tat eva ahar iti kim prāptam kṛtsnaḥ ahar gaṇaḥ kutas aparaiḥ ahobhiḥ vinā tadā viguṇam bhavati tasmāt gaṇaḥ eva āvarteta iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ yasmin apacchedaḥ tat eva āvarteta kutas karma pṛthaktvāt pṛthak etāni karmāṇi na anyat ahar anyasya guṇa bhūtam iṣṭvā iti ca yāgam parisamāpya iti gamyate na sāṅgam iti yāni ahar antarāṇi sāhāyyena upakariṣyanti vidyante eva tāni atas sāhāyyam kariṣyanti iti tasmāt tat eva āvarteta 
[I,726,i_I,726,ii]	saṃnipāte avaiguṇyāt prakṛti vat tulya kalpāḥ yajeran satrāṇi udāharaṇam saptadaśa avarāḥ satram āsīran yaḥ evam vidvāṃsaḥ satram āsate yaḥ evam vidvāṃsaḥ satram upayanti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim samāna kalpānām bhinna kalpānām ca saha adhikāraḥ uta samāna kalpānām eva iti ke punar samāna kalpāḥ rājanyātri badhryaśva vasiṣṭha vainya śunakānām kaṇva kaśyapa saṃkṛtīnām nārāśaṃsaḥ dvitīyaḥ prayājaḥ tanūnapāt itareṣām evam kecid nārāśaṃsa kalpāḥ kecid tanūnapāt kalpāḥ tatra kim tāvat prāptam saṃnipāte bahūnām yajamānānām yaḥ eva tulya kalpāḥ te eva saha satram āsīran kutas avaiguṇyāt itarathāḥ yasya kalpaḥ na upasaṃhriyeta tasya vaiguṇyam syāt yathā prakṛtau eva vinā sādguṇyena phala abhāvaḥ evam iha api iti 
[I,726,iii_I,726,iv]	vacanāt vā śirovat syāt vā śabdāt pakṣaḥ viparivartate na ca etat asti bhinna kalpānām anadhikāraḥ iti te api adhikriyeran kutas aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣām yajamānānām prāptiḥ na ca bhinna kalpānām pratiṣedhaḥ nanu vaiguṇyam bhinna kalpānām atra ucyate vacanāt sāmānya vacanena bhinna kalpāḥ api gṛhītāḥ tatra śiraḥ vat bhādhaḥ syāt yathā puruṣa śīrṣam upadadhāti iti vacana sāmarthyāt śava śirasām sparśanam smṛti vipratiṣiddham api kriyate evam iha api athavā āśiḥ avat yathā ṛtapeye ghṛta vrataḥ bhavati iti vacanāt vrata duhi nivṛttāyām anya āmāśire gām kalpayanti evam etat api vacanāt bhaviṣyati 
[I,727,i_I,727,ii]	na vā anārabhyavāda tvāt na etat asti yat uktam bhinna kalpānām api adhikāraḥ iti samāna kalpāḥ eva adhikriyeran kutas avaiguṇyāt atha yat uktam vacanāt vaiguṇyena api setsyati iti tat na anārabhyavāda tvāt tat dhi vacanāt prakalpyate yasmin akalpyamāne vacanam anarthakam bhavati yadi hi ārabhya bhinna kalpān etat ucyeta tatas vacanam anarthakam bhavati iti bhinna kalpānām api satram abhyupagamyeta na tu ārabhya bhinna kalpān etat ucyate samāna kalpeṣu arthavat tā asya vacanasya bhaviṣyati tasmāt na bhinna kalpānām adhikāraḥ iti 
[I,727,iii_I,727,iv]	syāt vā yajña artha tvāt audumbarī vat syāt vā bhinna kalpānām adhikāraḥ kutas yajña artha tvāt kalpasya vasiṣṭha ādīnām nārāśaṃsa kalpaḥ yajñasya sādhakaḥ sa ca yajñaḥ sarveṣām sādhāraṇaḥ para kalpena api siddhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati yathā yajamānena saṃmāya audumbarīm parivāsayanti iti yasya kasyacid parimāṇena siddhaḥ yajñaḥ anyeṣām api siddhaḥ bhavati ucyate nanu prayājasya vākyena puruṣa saṃbandhaḥ sa ca prakaraṇa prāptām yāga artha tām bādhiṣyate iti na iti brūmaḥ phalam hi tadā kalpayitavyam nanu itarathā api adṛṣṭam avaśyam kalpanīyam tatra ucyate satyam kalpanīyam pramāṇena tu prayoga vacana eka vākyena dvitīye tu pakṣe kalpayitvā śabdam tena eka vākyatā syāt atha ucyeta kvacid samāmnātena saha eka vākyatā bhaviṣyati tathā api aprakṛtena vyavahitena ca kalpyamānā prakṛta kalpanāyāḥ gurutarā syāt 
[I,728,i_I,728,ii]	na tad pradhāna tvāt na etat evam tad pradhāna tvāt puruṣa arthaḥ hi eṣa kalpaḥ katham vasiṣṭha ādīnām nārāśaṃsaḥ yajña aṅgam iti yat ca yasya yajña aṅgam tena saha phala dam karma tasya bhavati tena evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate vasiṣṭhānām nārāśaṃsena sahitam karma phala dam bhavati iti 
[I,728,iii_I,728,iv]	audumbaryāḥ para artha tvāt kapāla vat atha yat upavarṇitam yathā audumbarī tathā iha iti pārārthyam audumbaryāḥ yajamānaḥ guṇa tvena śrūyate nanu tatra api prayoga vacanaḥ puruṣa prādhānyam kuryāt na eṣa doṣaḥ ekena api yajamānena saṃmitā ca iyam sarveṣām yajamāna saṃmitā bhavati na tu iha ekasya saṃgṛhīte sarveṣām saṃgṛhītaḥ tasmāt audumbaryāḥ pārārthyam kapāla vat yathā puroḍāśa kapālena tuṣāḥ upavapanti iti para artha kapālena tuṣāḥ upavaptavyāḥ iti upādīyate evam etat api iti 
[I,728,v_I,728,vi]	anyena api iti ced evam ced bhavān paśyati yajamānena saṃmānam tat prayojanam svena anyena vā yajamānena iti tathā prayoga antare yaḥ yajamānaḥ tena api saṃmānam prāpnoti 
[I,729,i_I,729,ii]	na eka tvāt tasya ca anadhikārāt śabdasya ca avibhakta tvāt atra ucyate na prayoga antarasya yajamānaḥ prasajyate na tu yajamāna śabde kaścid viśeṣaḥ yatas yajamāna śabdāt vyavasthā syāt kim tarhi eka tvasya vivakṣita tvāt na dvābhyām yājamānāni kartavyāni iti na anyaḥ ānīyate āha anyaḥ eva tarhi sarva yājamāneṣu bhavatu na evam kāminam hi adhikṛtya sāṅgasya yāgasya vacanam yajamāna śabdaḥ ca avibhaktaḥ iha audumbaryāḥ saṃmāne tasmāt na anyaḥ bhaviṣyati 
[I,729,iii_I,729,iv]	saṃnipātāt tu nimitta vighātaḥ syāt bṛhadrathantara vat vibhakta śiṣṭa tvāt vasiṣṭha nirvartye tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati bahuṣu yajamāneṣu saṃnipātāt nimitta vighātaḥ syāt kutas vibhakti śiṣṭa tvāt vasiṣṭha nirvartye prayoge nārāśaṃsaḥ naimittikaḥ anyasmin tanūnapāt naimittikaḥ yatra idānīm ubhaye kartāraḥ sa mahāyena tatra nirvṛttiḥ na kevalena tasmāt na kevalaḥ kartā na ced vāsiṣṭhaḥ kevalaḥ kartā tasmāt tad nimittam tatra na kartavyam na ca itara nimittam ubhayoḥ api anyonyena vighātaḥ bṛhadrathantara vat tat yathā bṛhat rathantaram pṛṣṭham bhavati iti na bṛhat sādhanakam na rathantara sādhanakam iti na eva tatra bṛhat nimittam bhavati na rathantaram vā evam iha api iti 
[I,730,i_I,730,ii]	api vā kṛtsna saṃyogāt avighātaḥ pratīyeta svāmi tvena abhisaṃbandhāt api vā iti pakṣam vyāvartayati kṛtsnam prati kevalasya kartṛ tvena saṃyogaḥ bhavati tasmāt avighātaḥ naimittikānām katham punar kārtsnyena kartavya tvam svāmi tvena abhisaṃbandhāt karma prati svāmi tvena kevalānām vasiṣṭha ādīnām abhisaṃbandhaḥ bhavati karma puruṣāṇam upakārakam tat dhi ekaikasya śaknoti phalam nirvartayitum tasmāt ekaikaḥ kṛtsnasya kartā iti tat naimittikam sarvam prāpnoti yathā tuṇḍa mātre dīyatām iti yadi api sā tuṇḍaḍa pitthayoḥ mātā tathā api tasyai dīyate kārtsnena hi tasya sā mātā bhavati na hi vyāsajyate mātṛ tvam tadvat iha api draṣṭavyam tasmāt asamāna kalpānām anadhikāraḥ 
[I,730,iii_I,730,iv]	sāmnoḥ karma vṛddhyā eka deśena saṃyoge guṇa tvena abhisaṃbandhaḥ tasmāt tatra vighātaḥ syāt atha yat uktam bṛhat rathantara vat iti tat pariharaṇīyam bṛhat rathantarayoḥ sāmnoḥ naimittika karma vṛddhyā eka deśena saṃyogaḥ bhavati tatra hi ubhayoḥ sādhaka tvam na ekasya stotra eka deśena tu tatra sāmnoḥ saṃbandhaḥ na kṛtsnena stotreṇa guṇa tvena hi tatra sāma śrūyate stotram prādhānyena tasmāt tatra vighātaḥ syāt 
[I,730,v_I,730,vi]	vacanāt tu dvi saṃyogaḥ tasmāt ekasya pāṇi tvam idam samāmananti etena rāja purohitau sāyujya kāmau yajeyātām iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim rājñaḥ dvau purohitau yajeyātām uta rājā ca purohitaḥ ca iti kim prāptam rājñaḥ dvau purohitau iti kutas purohita śabdāt param dvivacanam śrūyate tad śabda vācyasya dvi tvam śaknoti vaditum purohitaḥ ca tat śabda vācyaḥ śrutyā na rājā purohita vacanaḥ purohita śabdaḥ lakṣaṇayā yugapad adhikaraṇa vacana tāyām hi tat bhavati nanu ekasya dvau purohitau na staḥ purohitam vṛṇītaḥ iti hi upādīyamānasya vivakṣitam eka tvam iti ucyate vacanāt etat bhaviṣyati kim hi vacanam na kalpayet etena eva kāraṇena dvau bhaviṣyataḥ yathā vacanena añjalinā juhoti iti ekasya eva dvau pāṇī bhavataḥ yadi api savyaḥ prāptaḥ tathā api iti 
[I,731,i_I,731,ii]	artha abhāvāt tu na evam syāt tuśabdāt pakṣaḥ viparivartate na evam syāt dvau purohitau iti kutas artha abhāvāt na eva ayam arthaḥ asti dvau purohitau iti ekasya rājñaḥ ekaḥ eva purohitaḥ upādeya tvena hi śrūyate purohitam karoti iti eka tvam vivakṣitam nanu vacanāt iti uktam ucyate na tu vacanāt etat śakyam saṃskāra nimitta tvāt purohita śabdasya kriyamāṇaḥ api na purohitaḥ syāt 
[I,731,iii_I,731,iv]	arthānam ca vibhakta tvāt na tat śrutena saṃbandhaḥ arthānām ca vibhakta tvam śrūyate tejaḥ saṃstavaḥ brāhmaṇasya vīrya saṃstavaḥ rājanyasya tābhyām varṇābhyām tena tena phalena saṃbandhaḥ anūdyate tasmāt api na dvau purohitau iti 
[I,732,i_I,732,ii]	pāṇeḥ pratyaṅga bhāvāt asaṃbandhaḥ pratīyeta atha yat uktam etasmāt eva kāraṇāt ekasya eva puruṣasya dvau pāṇī bhavataḥ iti yuktam tatra pāṇeḥ pratyaṅga bhūta tvāt añjalim pratyaṅga bhūtaḥ dakṣiṇasya pāṇeḥ svayaḥ pāṇiḥ tena vinā añjaliḥ eva na bhavati na hi dvābhyām dakṣiṇābhyām añjaliḥ iti ucyate tasmāt rājā ca purohitaḥ ca syāt nanu tatra rāja purohitaḥ ca rāja purohitaḥ ca rāja purohitau yajeyātām iti ucyate na tau sāyujya kāmau bhavataḥ sa rājā purohitena saha eka kāryaḥ bhavati na tu purohitaḥ purohitena ubhau api tau hi rājānam abhicarantau purohitau iti ucyete na hi tau icchantau saṃskāra śabdaḥ hi purohitaḥ iti nanu lakṣaṇā bhavati bhavat pakṣe ucyate śruti abhāve lakṣaṇayā api vyavahāraḥ bhavati yathā agnau tiṣṭhati avaṭe tiṣṭhati iti tasmāt rājā ca purohitaḥ ca rāja purohitau iti 
[I,732,iii_I,732,iv]	satrāṇi sarva varṇānām aviśeṣāt iha satrāṇi udāharaṇam yaḥ evam vidvāṃsaḥ satram āsate yaḥ evam vidvāṃsaḥ satram upayanti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim satrāṇi trayāṇām api varṇānām uta brāhmaṇānām eva iti kim prāptam satrāṇi sarva varṇānām bhaveyuḥ iti kasmāt aviśeṣāt na hi kaścid viśeṣaḥ āśrīyate amīṣām varṇānām satrāṇi bhavanti amīṣām na iti tasmāt trayāṇām api varṇānām adhikāraḥ iti 
[I,733,i_I,733,ii]	liṅga darśanāt ca itas ca paśyāmaḥ trayāṇām satrāṇi iti kutas liṅga darśanāt kim liṅgam bhavati evam āha bārhadgiram brāhmaṇasya brahmasāma kuryāt pārthu raśyam rājanyasya rāyovājīyam vaiśyasya iti dvādaśa ahe bhavati vacanam brāhma sāma vidhāna param tasmin rājanya vaiśyānām darśanam bhavati tasmāt api sarva varṇānām adhikāraḥ iti 
[I,733,iii_I,733,iv]	brāhmaṇānām vā itarayoḥ ārtvijyā bhāvāt vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na ca etat asti trayāṇām api varṇānām iti kim tarhi brāhmaṇānām eva syāt kutas itarayoḥ ārtvijyā bhāvāt itarayoḥ hi varṇayoḥ rājanya vaiśyayoḥ ārtvijyam pratiṣiddham svayam eva ārtvijyena ca vinā viguṇa tvam tasmāt brāhmaṇānām eva syāt 
[I,733,v_I,733,vi]	vacanāt iti ced iti ced paśyasi rājanya vaiśyayoḥ vaiguṇyam āpadyate iti vacanāt yajamānāḥ santaḥ ṛtvijaḥ bhaviṣyanti ye yajamānāḥ te ṛtvijaḥ iti ke punar yajamānāḥ ye tatra phalam kāmayamānāḥ satra karmaṇi pravṛttāḥ te rājanyāḥ api vaiśyāḥ api teṣām ṛtvij karma vidhīyate tatra etat syāt yeṣām ārtvijyam śakyam kartum teṣām eva tat brāhmaṇānām pratiṣiddham hi rājanya vaiśyānām na teṣām idam ārtvijya vidhānam iti na etat evam yathā eva brāhmaṇānām yajamānānām aprāptam vacana vidhānāt bhavati evam abrāhmaṇānām api yajamānānām vacana prāmāṇyāt eva bhavitum arhati iti tasmāt ārtvijya saṃskṛtāḥ rājanya vaiśyāḥ api satram āsīran iti 
[I,734,i_I,734,ii^1]	na svāmi tvam hi vidhīyate na etat evam svāmi tvam anena vacanena vidhīyate evaṃkāmāḥ satram āsīran iti vidhīyate na ārtvijyam atha ye yajamānāḥ te ṛtvijaḥ iti anena vacanena vihitam ārtvijyam iti ucyate tat api na katham na atra eṣā vacana vyaktiḥ ye yajamānāḥ iti uddeśa padam ṛtvijaḥ iti vidheya padam tathā hi sati ārtvijyam aṅgam yajamāna saṃskārakam vidhīyeta na yajamānāḥ ārtvijyasya aṅgam tatra prākṛtārtha tā na eṣām ārtvijyānām syāt saṃskāraḥ ca adṛṣṭaḥ kalpyeta sa ca yajamāna viṣayaḥ iti punar adṛṣṭam tasmāt na yajamānānām satām ārtvijyāḥ padārthāḥ vidhīyante 
[I,734,ii^2]	kim tarhi ārtvijānām padārthānām ananya kartṛka tā eṣā ca vacana vyaktiḥ ṛtvijaḥ iti uddeśa padam te iti vidhīyate ye yajamānāḥ te eva ṛtvijaḥ bhavanti na anyaḥ iti ārtvijeṣu padārtheṣu yajamānāḥ kartāraḥ vidhīyante pratyāmnānāt anye nivartante evam sati prākṛta prayojanāḥ eva ārtvijāḥ padārthāḥ na yajamāna saṃskāraḥ adṛṣṭaḥ vidhīyate iti yajamāna kartṛ kalpanāyām api eṣām adṛṣṭam iti yadi kalpyeta tatra brūmaḥ itarasmin api pakṣe yajamāna viṣayaḥ saḥ adṛṣṭaḥ saṃskāraḥ iti avaśyam kalpanīyam yaḥ ca ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ doṣaḥ na tam ekaḥ codyaḥ bhavati 
[I,735,i_I,735,ii]	gārhapate vā syātām avipratiṣedhāt gārhapate padārthe rājanya vaiśyau bhaviṣyataḥ na ca tatra ārtvija prayojanam tasmāt avipratiṣedhaḥ teṣām iti 
[I,735,iii_I,735,iv]	na vā kalpa virodhāt na ca etat asti gārhapate vā padārthe rājanya vaiśyau iti kalpa virodhaḥ hi syāt yajamāna camasaḥ soma mayaḥ ekeṣām phala maya camase ekeṣām tathā brahmasāma bārhadgiram brāhmaṇānām pārthuḥ aśmam rājanyānām rāyovājīyam vaiśyānām tasmāt gārhapate niveśaḥ iti etat api na asti 
[I,735,v_I,735,vi]	svāmi tvāt itareṣām ahīne liṅga darśanam atha yat uktam liṅga darśanāt iti tat parihartavyam atra ucyate ahīnam eva satra śabdena vakṣyati yatas svāmi tvam ṛtvijām vidhīyate atas ṛtvijām svāmi tvāt rājanya vaiśyānām satram na avakalpate iti tasmāt ahīne liṅga darśanam 
[I,735,vii_I,736,i]	vāsiṣṭhānām vā brahma tva niyamāt etat samadhigatam brāhmaṇānām eva satram na rājanya vaiśyānām iti atha idānīm idam saṃdigdham kim sarveṣām brāhmaṇānām uta vāsiṣṭhānām sa uta bhṛgu śunaka vasiṣṭhān varjayitvā anyeṣām iti kim prāptam sarveṣām aviśeṣāt na hi kaścid viśeṣaḥ āśrīyate amīṣām brāhmaṇānām satram amīṣām na iti tasmāt sarveṣām iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ vāsiṣṭhānām brahma tvasya niyamāt vāsiṣṭhānām satram syāt na anyeṣām kutas brahma tvasya niyamaḥ bhavati vāsiṣṭhaḥ brahmā bhavati iti atas vāsiṣṭhānām tat samāna kalpānām ca satram syāt iti 
[I,736,ii_I,736,iii]	sarveṣām vā pratiprasavāt sarveṣām vā satram syāt aviśeṣāt nanu vāsiṣṭhaḥ brahma iti ucyate na iti āha punar pratisūyate yaḥ eva kaścana stoma bhāgam adhīyīta saḥ eva brahmā bhavet iti vāsiṣṭha upadeśaḥ idānīm kim arthaḥ iti ced stoma bhāga praśaṃsā arthaḥ stoma bhāgān adhīyānaḥ avāsiṣṭhaḥ api vāsiṣṭha kāryam samarthaḥ kartum iti 
[I,736,iv_I,736,v]	viśvāmitrasya hautra niyamāt bhṛgu śunaka vasiṣṭhānām anadhikāraḥ bhṛgu ādīnām anadhikāraḥ syāt kutas vaiśvāmitrasya hautram niyamyate viśvāmitraḥ hotā bhavati iti tasmāt vaiśvāmitrāṇām taiḥ ca samāna kalpānām adhikāraḥ iti 
[I,737,i_I,737,ii]	vihārasya prabhu tvāt anagnīnām api syāt satrāṇi eva udāharaṇam yaḥ evam vidvāṃsaḥ satram āsate yaḥ evam vidvāṃsaḥ satram upayanti iti teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim sa agnīnām anagnīnām ca tāni bhavanti uta sa agnīnām eva iti kim prāptam sa agnīnām anagnīnām ca kutas vihārasya prabhu tvāt prabhavati hi parakīyaḥ api vihāraḥ sarveṣām upakartum kartavyaḥ hi tena sidhyati iti sa yadīyena tadīyena vā siddhim upaiti tasmāt anagnīnām api bhavitum arhati iti 
[I,737,iii_I,737,iv]	sārasvate ca darśanāt sārasvate ca satre bhavati darśanam para rathaiḥ vai ete svargam lokam yanti ye anāhitāgnayaḥ satram āsataḥ iti anāhitāgnīnām satram darśayati tasmāt api sarveṣām 
[I,737,v_I,737,vi]	prāyaścitta vidhānāt ca prāyaścittam vidhīyate agnaye vivicaye aṣṭākapālam puroḍāśam nirvapet yasya āhitāgneḥ anyaiḥ agnibhiḥ agnayaḥ saṃsṛjyeran iti saṃsarge agnīnām prāyaścittam darśayati saḥ evam syāt anāhitaiḥ na anyathā tasmāt api anagnīnām satrāṇi iti 
[I,737,vii_I,737,viii]	sa agnīnām veṣṭi pūrva tvāt sa agnīnām vā satrāṇi na anagnīnām kasmāt iṣṭi pūrva tvāt iṣṭi pūrva tvam somānām āmnātam darśa pūrṇamāsau iṣṭvā somena yajeta iti jyotiṣṭomasya iṣṭi pūrva tvam tat ca udaka paramparayā satrāṇi prati prāptam tasmāt anagnīnām tāni bhaveyuḥ iti 
[I,738,i_I,738,ii]	sva arthena ca prayukta tvāt sva arthena ca agnayaḥ prayuktāḥ katham upagraha viśeṣāt upagraha viśeṣaḥ hi bhavati agnīn ādadhīta iti tasmāt anyasya agnibhiḥ anyasya na siddhiḥ yadi api kratu arthāḥ agnayaḥ iti 
[I,738,iii_I,738,iv]	saṃnivāpam ca darśayati sāvitrāṇi hoṣyantaḥ saṃnivaperan iti tena api sa agnayaḥ satrāṇi upāsate iti gamyate evam liṅga parihārau aśiṣṭe adhikaraṇe anyat cintyate 
[I,738,v_I,738,vi]	juhvā ādīnām aprayukta tvāt saṃdehe yathākāmī pratīyeta kim juhvā ādīni pātrāṇi kasyacid eva yajamānasya upādāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ uta anyāni sādhāraṇāni kartavyāni kim prāptam yasya kasyacid eva yajamānasya upādāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ kutas na hi svam pātram yajamānaḥ prayuṅkte svena pātreṇa prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ iti tasmāt parakīya pātraiḥ anye yajeran iti 
[I,739,i_I,739,ii]	api vā anyāni pātrāṇi sādhāraṇāni kurvīran vipratiṣedhāt śāstra kṛta tvāt api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ na etat evam anyāni hi pātrāṇi sādhāraṇāni kartavyāni kasmāt vipratiṣedhāt vipratiṣedhaḥ bhavati kadācid tāni pātrāṇi upāttāni bhaveyuḥ atha maraṇam kasyacid yajamānasya āpadyeta tatra vipratiṣedhaḥ syāt āhitāgnim agnibhiḥ dahanti yajña pātraiḥ ca iti yadi tam taiḥ daheyuḥ itareṣām yajñaḥ virudhyeta atha taiḥ yajñam samāpayeyuḥ itarasya śarīra saṃskārāḥ parilupyeran anyeṣu punar sādhāraṇeṣu upādīyamāneṣu na kiṃcid api virudhyeta tasmāt tathā kāryam iti 
[I,739,iii_I,739,iv]	prāyaścittam āpadi syāt atha idānīm pūrva uktasya liṅgasya parihāraḥ ucyate prāyaścittam asmat pakṣe parikalpiṣyate katham araṇye kāntāre gacchatām sthitānām vā dasyu bhayāt śvāpada bhayāt vā trāse jāte dāva agninā vā saṃsṛjyeran mithas vā sa viṣayaḥ prāyaścittasya bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,740,i_I,740,ii]	puruṣa kalpena vā vikṛtau kartṛ niyamaḥ syāt yajñasya tad guṇa tvāt abhāvāt itarān pratyekasmin adhikāraḥ syāt adhara kalpāḥ udāharaṇam āgrayaṇa iṣṭiḥ paśuḥ iti evaṃlakṣaṇakāni karmāṇi yeṣu saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim trayāṇām api varṇānām ebhiḥ karmabhiḥ adhikāraḥ uta vaiśyasya eva iti kim prāptam etasyām vikṛtau puruṣa kalpena kartā niyamyeta kutas yajñaḥ ayam adhvara kalpa ādiḥ etat saṃkhyā guṇakaḥ iyam ca saṃkhyā vaiśyasya uktā tena vaiśyaḥ eva etat karma kṛtsnam kartum samarthaḥ saptadaśa guṇakam etat karma tat ca sāptadaśyam avaiśyena kriyamāṇam asādhu itarān prati hi tat na codyate tena yajeta iti asāmarthyāt brāhmaṇa kṣatriyāt na adhikariṣyati iti 
[I,740,iii_I,740,iv]	liṅgāt ca ijyā viśeṣa vat liṅgam ca bhavati yathā vaiśyasya sāptadaśyam iti saptadaśaḥ vaiśyaḥ iti tena vaiśyasya sāptadaśyam atas vaiśyasya evaṃjātīyakāni karmāṇi yathā ijyā viśeṣaḥ vaiśyasya bhavati vaiśyaḥ vaiśya stomena yajeta iti vaiśya saṃbandhāt evam sāptadaśyam tasya eva iti 
[I,740,v_I,740,vi]	na vā saṃyoga pṛthaktvāt guṇasya ijyā pradhāna tvāt asaṃyuktā hi codanā na ca etat asti pṛthak etau saṃyogau ekam vākyam saptadaśa vaiśyasya anubrūyāt iti vākya antaram adhvara kalpa ādiṣu saptadaśa anubrūyāt iti sa ca guṇaḥ ijyā pradhānaḥ bhavati na ijyā guṇa arthā kim atas yadi evam yatra ijyā tatra tad guṇena bhavitavyam na yatra guṇaḥ tatra ijyayā vaiśyasya guṇa anurodhena ijyā api trayāṇām varṇānām ijyā sā tatra guṇam ākāṅkṣati iti api ca ijyā guṇa bhūtasya aparā codanā na sā vaiśya saṃyuktā sā tu avaiśyakam guṇam pratyāyayati prathamam sa vaiśyakam iti ced na vaiśyasya pradhāna tvāt pradhāna bhūtaḥ tatra vaiśyaḥ śrūyate tasmāt sarva adhikāraḥ 
[I,741,i_I,741,ii]	ijyāyām tad guṇa tvāt viśeṣeṇa niyamyeta atha yat uktam vaiśya stome yathā tathā iha api iti yuktam tatra ijyā vaiśyasya śrūyate tatra vācanikena eva viśeṣeṇa niyamyeta tasmāt tatra adoṣaḥ iti 
[I,742,i_I,742,ii]	sva dāne sarvam aviśeṣāt idam āmananti viśvajiti sarva svam dadāti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim yāvat kiṃcid sva śabdena ucyate yathā mātā pitā iti evamādi api sarvam deyam uta yatra prabhu tva yogena sva śabdaḥ tat eva deyam iti kim prāptam aviśeṣāt mātā pitā iti evamādi api dātavyam nanu dānam iti ucyate sva tva nivṛttiḥ para sva tva āpādanam ca tatra pitṛ ādīnām aśakyam sva tvam nivartayitum na hi kathaṃcid pitā na pitā bhavati ucyate satyam na asau na pitā bhavati śakyate tu para vidheyaḥ kartum para sva tva āpādanam ca dānam arthāt ca sva tva tyāgaḥ tasmāt sarvam deyam iti 
[I,742,iii_I,742,v]	yasya vā prabhuḥ syāt itarasya aśakya tvāt vā śabdena pakṣaḥ viparivartate yasya prabhu tva yogena sva tvam tat eva deyam na itarat kasmāt prabhu tva yoginaḥ śakya tvāt itarasya ca aśakya tvāt na hi pitṛ ādīnām śakyate sva tvam parityaktum nanu ca uktam para vidheyīkaraṇam tasya śakyam iti ucyate prabhu tva yoginaḥ svasya atra dīyamānasya sarva tvam ucyate na aprabhutva yoginaḥ svasya dānam na ca etat nyāyyam yat pitṛ ādīnām paricāraka tvam yasya ca etat nyāyyam api bhavet sa dadyāt api atra āha nanu yatra sva śabdaḥ vartate tat deyam iti ukte pitṛ ādayaḥ dātavyāḥ gamyante tasmāt tān prati prabhu tvāya smṛtim bādhitvā api yatitavyam iti 
[I,743,i]	atra ucyate sva śabdaḥ ayam ātmīya dhana jñātīnām pratyekam vācakaḥ na samudāyasya tatra ātmīye sarva tāyām kṛtāyām kṛte śāstra arthe na aśakyeṣu jñātiṣu sarvatā kalpanīyā na api smṛtiḥ bādhitavyā api ca gavā ādīnām ātmīyānām ca udakena prāptau satyām avaśyam ātmīya gatā sarvatā upadeyā tasyām ca upāttāyām kṛtaḥ śāstā arthaḥ iti jñātīnām upādāne na kiṃcid kāraṇam asti tasmāt na pitṛ ādayaḥ deyāḥ tasmāt yatra eva prabhu tva yogena sva tvam tat eva deyam iti 
[I,743,ii_I,743,iii]	na bhūmiḥ syāt sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭa tvāt atra eva sarva dāne saṃśayaḥ kim bhūmiḥ deyā na iti kā punar bhūmiḥ atra abhipretā yat etat mṛdā ārabdham dravya ān atram pṛthivī golakam na kṣetra mātram mṛttikā vā tatra kim prāptam aviśeṣāt deyā prabhu tva saṃbandhena hi tatra sva śabdaḥ vartate śakyate ca mānasena vyāpāreṇa svasya svatā nivartayitum iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ na bhūmiḥ deyā iti kutas kṣetrāṇām īśitāraḥ manuṣyāḥ dṛśyante na kṛtsnasya pṛthivī golakasya iti 
[I,743,iv]	āha yaḥ idānīm sārvabhaumaḥ sa tarhi dāsyati saḥ api na iti brūmaḥ kutas yāvatā bhogena sārvabhaumaḥ bhūmeḥ īṣṭe tāvatā anyaḥ api na tatra kaścid viśeṣaḥ sārvabhauma tve asya tu etat adhikam yat asau pṛthivyām saṃbhūtānām vrīhi ādīnām rakṣaṇena nirviṣṭasya kasyacid bhāgasya iṣṭe na bhūmeḥ tad nirviṣṭāḥ ca ye manuṣyāḥ taiḥ anyat sarva prāṇinām dhāraṇa vikramaṇa ādi yat bhūmi kṛtam tatra īśitvam prati na kaścid viśeṣaḥ tasmāt na bhūmiḥ deyā 
[I,744,i_I,744,ii]	akārya tvāt ca tatas punar viśeṣaḥ syāt viśvajiti eva saṃdehaḥ kim aśva ādayaḥ deyāḥ na iti kim prāptam sarvasya vihita tvāt deyāḥ aśvāḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ yasya ca dānam akāryam tat ca na deyam yathā aśvānām teṣām hi dānam akāryam eṣa hi viśeṣaḥ aśvānām anyebhyaḥ dravyebhyaḥ yat eṣām dānam pratiṣidhyate na kesariṇaḥ dadāti na ubhaya todataḥ pratigṛhṇāti iti viśvajitī eva samāmnāyate tasmāt na aśvāḥ deyāḥ iti 
[I,744,iii_I,744,iv]	nitya tvāt ca anityaiḥ na asti saṃbandhaḥ viśvajiti eva saṃdehaḥ sarva svam dadāti iti kim arjayitvā upakaraṇāni yāvanti manuṣyasya yāvanti ca śaknoti upārjayitum sarvāṇi tāni dadyāt kṛta bhāṇḍa ādīni uta yāni eva asya vidyante tāni sarvāṇi deyāni na avidyamānāni kartavyāni iti kutas saṃśayaḥ ubhayathā vacana vyakteḥ saṃbhavāt yadi vā evam vacanam vyajyate yāni sarvāṇi svāni kāni tāni yāni puruṣasya upakārakāṇi śayana ādīni tāni sarvāṇi dadyāt iti vidhīyate yat vā yāni svāni puruṣasya dāne śakyāni tāni sarvāṇi iti sarva tvam vidhīyate yadi dānam vidhīyate tatas aprāpta dānānām kṛta bhāṇḍakānām api dānam atha sarvatā vidhīyate tatas vidyamānānām eva 
[I,745,i_I,745,ii]	kim tāvat prāptam kṛta bhāṇḍakāni deyāni iti tathā dāna vidhāne śrutiḥ anugṛhyate itarathāḥ vākyam tayoḥ ca śrutiḥ balīyasī tasmāt kṛta bhāṇḍakāni deyāni iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ nitya tvāt ca anityaiḥ na asti saṃbandhaḥ caśabdaḥ anvādeśe na aśvāḥ dātavyāḥ iti uktam kṛta bhāṇḍakāni ca na deyāni iti nityam hi viśvajiti dānam ca udakena prāptam anūdyate anityāni ca kṛta bhāṇḍakāni na śakyāni sarvāṇi viśvajiti kriyamāṇaḥ upasaṃhartum tatra kṛta bhāṇḍakānām syāt na nityam nitya vat ca tat ca udakena vidhīyate na nimitta saṃyogena tasmāt avaśyam etat abhyupagantavyam sākalpyam deyānām prāptānām vidhīyate iti śruti asaṃbhave ca vākya arthaḥ gṛhītavyaḥ eva bhavati tasmāt na kṛta bhāṇḍakāni dātavyāni 
[I,745,iii_I,745,iv]	śūdraḥ ca dharma śāstra tvāt viśvajitī eva saṃdihyate kim paricārakaḥ śūdraḥ deyaḥ na iti kim prāptam sarvasya svasya vihita tvāt deyaḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ śūdraḥ ca na deyaḥ iti anvādeśaḥ kutas dharma śāstra tvāt dharma śāsana upanata tvāt tasya evam asau tasmai traivarṇikāya upanate idam śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ dharmeṇa saṃbhantsyate iti saḥ anyasmai dīyamāṇaḥ na icchet api na ca anicchataḥ tasya sa prabhavati na ca balāt svīkartavyaḥ yaḥ tu anyāyena svīkuryāt sa dadyāt api dharma upanata mātreṇa tu na śakyaḥ dātum 
[I,746,i_I,746,ii]	dakṣiṇā kāle yat svam tat pratīyeta tat dāna saṃyogāt viśvajiti eva saṃdehaḥ kim prāk dakṣiṇā kālāt vidyamānam niyogataḥ dakṣiṇā kāle nidhātavyam ūrdhvam ca dakṣiṇā kālāt bhaviṣyat anāgatam api dakṣiṇā kāle deyam uta yat eva dakṣiṇā kāle vidyate tat eva deyam iti kim prāptam yasya api prāk ūrdhvam ca svatā tat api deyam sva mātrasya dāna vidhānat evam prāpte brūmaḥ dakṣiṇā kāle yat svam vidyate tat eva deyam na yat prāk ūrdhvam ca kutas svasya atra dānam anūdya sākalyam vidhīyate tat ca dānam dakṣiṇā kāle prāpta tvāt tasmin eva kāle anūdyate tasmāt dakṣiṇā kālaḥ eva vidyamānam deyam iti 
[I,747,i_I,747,ii]	aśeṣa tvāt tad antar syāt karmaṇaḥ dravya siddhi tvāt tasmin eva viśvajiti saṃdehaḥ kim dakṣiṇā kālaḥ eva viśva jit utsraṣṭavyaḥ uta na sarvam dātavyam parisamāpanīyaḥ iti kim prāptam utsraṣṭavyaḥ iti kutas aśeṣa tvāt katham aśeṣa tā viśvajiti sarva svam dadāti iti na ca śakyam antareṇa dravyam parisamāpayitum tasmāt tad antar syāt 
[I,747,iii_I,747,iv]	api vā śeṣa karma syāt kratoḥ pratyakṣa śiṣṭa tvāt api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ śeṣa karma syāt na sarva svam dakṣiṇā kāle deyam yāvatā tat karma parisamāpyate tāvat śeṣayitavyam kutas kratoḥ pratyakṣa śiṣṭa tvāt kratoḥ parisamāptiḥ pratyakṣa śiṣṭā viśvajitā yajeta iti viśvajitam upakramya parisamāpayet iti arthaḥ parisamāpayatā yat śakyate dātum tāvat sarvam iti arthaḥ tasmāt na tad antam utsraṣṭavyam iti 
[I,747,v_I,747,vi]	tathā ca anya artha darśanam evam ca kṛtvā anya artha darśanam upapadyate avabhṛthāt udetya vatsa tva camāt chādayati iti śeṣe sati avakalpate 
[I,747,vii_I,747,viii]	aśeṣam tu samañjasā dānena śeṣa karma syāt tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati etat samañjasā bhūtam yat aśeṣam pratīyate iti evam sarva svam dadāti iti śabdaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati iti yat tu pratyakṣā samāptiḥ iti tatra brūmaḥ ādānena śeṣa karma bhaviṣyati iti ucyate 
[I,748,i_I,748,ii]	na ādānasya nitya tvāt ādānam tu anityam nityam ca śeṣa karma na hi tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ avakalpate tasmāt śeṣayitavyam kiṃcid iti 
[I,748,iii_I,748,iv]	dīkṣāsu tu vinirdeśāt akratu arthena saṃyogaḥ tasmāt avirodhaḥ syāt tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na etat asti kiṃcid śeṣayitavyam iti dīkṣāsu tu vinirdeśaḥ bhavati prakṛtau eva jyotiṣṭome saḥ iha ca udakena prāptaḥ idam kratu artham idam bhakṣya artham idam ānamanāya iti tat iha yat ānamanāya dātavyam tasya ayam vikāraḥ sarvatā nāma kutas etat yatas svam dadāti iti anūdyate sarvatā eva vidhīyate tena na adātavyasya dānam vidhīyate na ca bhakṣya artham kratu artham ca dātavyam tasmāt avirodhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,748,v_I,748,vi]	ahar gaṇe ca tat dharmā syat sarveṣām aviśeṣāt asti ahar gaṇaḥ aṣṭa rātraḥ atha etasya aṣṭa rātrasya viśva jit abhijitau eka ahau abhitas ubhayatas jyotiḥ madhye ṣaṣ ahaḥ paśu kāmaḥ hi etena yajeta iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ahar gaṇa sthasya api sarva svam eva dakṣiṇā syāt āho dvādaśam śatam iti kim prāptam sarva svam kutas sarveṣām viśva jitām aviśeṣāt yaḥ eva prakṛtau viśvajitaḥ dharmaḥ saḥ eva ca asya ca udakena bhaviṣyati tasmāt sarva svam deyam iti 
[I,749,i_I,749,ii]	dvādaśa śatam vā prakṛti vat dvādaśa śātam vā deyam iti prakṛti vat kartavyam jyotiṣṭomaḥ ca prakṛtiḥ tatra dharmāḥ vihitāḥ na viśvajiti kṛtsnāḥ pratīyante tasmāt dvādaśa śatam atra deyam iti 
[I,749,iii_I,749,iv]	atad guṇa tvāt tu na evam syāt tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na evam bhavitum arhati kutas na eva yatas viśvajitaḥ guṇaḥ dvādaśa śatam nāmadheyena hi atra dharma grahaṇam tasmāt viśvajitaḥ bhaviṣyati na jyotiṣṭomāt iti 
[I,749,v_I,749,vi]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam khalu api darśayati kim liṅgam bhavati iti evam āha hīyate vai eṣa paśubhiḥ yaḥ viśvajiti sarvam na dadāti iti niyatam sarva sva dānam darśayati ahar gaṇe 
[I,750,i_I,750,ii]	vikāraḥ san ubhayatas aviśeṣāt viśvajiti sarva svam dadāti iti tatra eṣaḥ arthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ kim yasya dvādaśa śatam adhikam ūnam vā vidyate tasya api viśva jita adhikāraḥ uta yasya sakalam adhikam vā tasya eva iti kim prāptam vikāraḥ san ubhayatas aviśeṣāt na viśeṣaḥ kaścid āśrīyate yasya dvādaśa śatam adhikam ūnam vā asti iti tasmāt sarvasya viśva jita adhikāraḥ iti 
[I,750,iii_I,750,iv]	adhikam vā pratiprasavāt na ca etat asti sarvasya viśva jita adhikāraḥ iti kasya tarhi yasya dvādaśa śatam asti adhikam vā iti kutas pratiprasavāt pratiprasavaḥ hi jyotiṣṭome sarva svasya ucyate dvādaśa śatam vidhāya āha etāvatā vāvaḥ ṛtvijaḥ āneyāḥ api vā sarva svena iti yadi etāvatā na iccheyuḥ sarva svena api ānamayitavyāḥ iti tat yadi dvādaśena śatena na icchanti na icchantitarām tatas nyūnena tasmāt dvādaśa śatam jyotiṣṭome yat vā sarva svam tat iha ubhayam api prāptam tatra ekaḥ pakṣaḥ niyamyate sarva svam deyam iti saḥ eṣa na vidhiḥ prāpta tvāt aniyata prāptaḥ tu niyamyate sa ced niyamyate yādṛśaḥ tatra tādṛśaḥ eva iha tatra ca dvādaśa śatam adhikam vā sarva svam iha api tadvat eva tasmāt na nyūna dhanasya adhikāraḥ iti 
[I,750,v_I,750,vi]	anugrahāt ca pāda vat caśabdena anvācayaḥ itas ca adhikam sarva svam adhike hi dīyamāne tad antargata tvāt dvādaśa śatam api dattam bhavati pāda vat yathā kārṣāpaṇe dīyamāne pādaḥ api dattaḥ bhavati evam iha api iti 
[I,751,i_I,751,ii]	aparimite śiṣṭasya saṃkhyā pratiṣedhaḥ tat śruti tvāt ādhāne śrūyate ekā deyā ṣaṭ deyāḥ dvādaśa deyāḥ caturviṃśatiḥ deyāḥ śatam deyam sahasram deyam aparimitam deyam iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim yat parimitam ekā deyā iti evamādi tat na dātavyam iti pratiṣedhaḥ vidhīyate uta aparimitam nāma kiṃcid tasya dānam vidhīyate iti kim prāptam aparimite śrūyamāne brūmaḥ śiṣṭasya eka ādeḥ saṃkhyeyasya yā saṃkhyā sā pratiṣidhyate kutas tat śruti tvāt parimita śabda śravaṇāt gaṇitam avagamyate tat ca eka ādikam tasya na śabdena pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate tatra śrutaḥ arthaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati itaratha aparimita śabde prasiddhiḥ tyajyeta lakṣaṇayā bahu tvam asya arthaḥ kalpyeta tasmāt aprimitasya pratiṣedhaḥ iti 
[I,751,iii_I,751,iv]	kalpa antaram vā tulya vat prasaṃkhyānāt kalpa antaram vā syāt aparaḥ dāna kalpaḥ vidhīyate yathā ekā deyā iti dāna vidhi kalpaḥ evam eṣaḥ api dāna vidhi kalpaḥ eva syāt tena hi pūrveṇa tulyam eva idam prasaṃkhyāyate kā asya pūrveṇa tulya tā pratijñātasya arthasya avagamikā śrutiḥ asti iti pūrvatra hi deya śabda śrutyā dānam vidhīyate iti iha api deya śada śrutiḥ sā śrūyamāṇā śaknoti dānam vidhātum pratiṣedhe hi vidhīyamāne vākyasya vyāpāraḥ tat ca durbalam śrutim prati tasmāt kalpa antaram yat ca aparimita śabde prasiddhiḥ bādhyate iti samudāya prasiddhiḥ avayava prasiddheḥ bādhikā eva samadhigatā 
[I,752,i]	nanu na atra prasiddhiḥ lakṣaṇā iyam yat bahu tat na śakyam parimātum tasmāt aparimita tvena lakṣyate bahu tvam iti tat ca na anekasmin aśakya parimāṇe sati bahuṣu rūḍhaḥ aparimitam asya dhanam bahu iti gamyate yathā kuśalaḥ pravīṇaḥ iti bahuṣu kuśānām lātuḥ guṇeṣu satsu nipuṇa tāyām eva kuśala śabdaḥ rohāt rūḍhi śabdaḥ eva bhavati bahuṣu ca vīṇau ādasya guṇeṣu satsu nipuṇaḥ eva pravīṇa śabdaḥ vartamānaḥ rūḍhaḥ iti ucyate tasmāt sati api lakṣaṇātve śruti sāmarthyāt rohati śabdaḥ tasmāt samudāya prasiddhyā parimita śabde avayava prasiddhiḥ bādhyate aśvakarṇa śabda vat atas kalpānataram iti 
[I,752,ii_I,752,iii]	aniyamaḥ aviśeṣāt aparimite kalpānataram iti samadhigatam atha idānīm saṃdihyate kim sahasrāt ūnam aparimitam uta sahasrāt adhikam iti kim tāvat prāptam aniyamaḥ aviśeṣāt na kaścid iha bahu tve viśeṣaḥ āsrīyate sahasrāt ūnam adhikam vā iti anāśrīyamāṇe yathākṛtam tathā sādhu tasmāt aniyamaḥ 
[I,753,i_I,753,ii]	adhikam vā syāt bahu artha tvāt itareṣām saṃnidhānāt vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ na etat asti adhikam ūnam vā sahasrāt iti kim tarhi adhikam eva iti kutas bahu artha tvāt aparimita śabdasya bahuṣu hi imam śabdam upacaranti iti etat uktam bahu tvam ca āpekṣikam kiṃcid apekṣya tatas adhikam bahu iti ucyate asatyām apekṣāyām apraripūrṇam etat yathā putraḥ iti kiṃcid apekṣya bhavati na anyathā tatra prakṛtam saṃnihitam ca apekṣya nirṇayaḥ sahasram ca saṃnihitam tasmāt tatas adhikam aparimitam iti 
[I,753,iii_I,753,iv]	artha vādaḥ ca tadvat katham evam tatra utkṛṣṭam vai aparimitam iti tad ūnatām sahasrasya darśayati 
[I,753,v_I,753,vi]	para kṛti purā kalpam ca manuṣya dharmaḥ syāt arthāya hi anukīrtanam iha para kṛtayaḥ purākalpāḥ ca udāharaṇam yathā iti ha sma āha bakurvāṣṇiḥ māṣān me pacata na vai eteṣām haviḥ gṛhṇanti iti purākalpaḥ ulmukaiḥ ha sma pūrve samājamustān ha asurāḥ rakṣāṃsi nirjaghnuḥ iti evamādayaḥ teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim ete manuṣya dharmāḥ vidhayaḥ uta tad gotrāṇām athavā artha vādāḥ iti kim tāvat prāptam manuṣya dhamā vidhayaḥ iti kutas arthāya prayojanāya anukīrtanam etat bhavati kartṛ manuṣya saṃbandha kīrtanena kriyā praśastā bhavati praśastam ca pratipādyam saḥ eṣa vidhiḥ eva anena prakāreṇa atas paraiḥ api manuṣyaiḥ kartavyaḥ iti gamyate 
[I,754,i_I,754,ii]	tat ukte ca pratiṣedhāt evaṃjātīyakasya vidheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati tat u tathā na kuryāt iti prasaktasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ nyāyyaḥ tasmāt api vidhayaḥ iti 
[I,754,iii_I,754,iv]	nirdeśāt vā tad dharmaḥ syāt pañcāvatta vat manuṣya dharmaḥ ayam vidhiḥ evaṃjātīyakaḥ iti gṛhyate tatra tu viśiṣṭa gotrāṇām nirdeśāt teṣām eva dharmaḥ iti gamyate stutyāḥ hi ayam kartavyaḥ iti jñāyate sa ca viśiṣṭa gotrāṇām śrūyate tasmāt tad gotrāṇām eva kartavyaḥ pañcāvatta vat yathā pañca avattam jamadagnīnām iti tad gotrāṇām eva bhavati evam iha api iti 
[I,754,v_I,754,vi]	vidhau tu veda saṃyogāt upadeśaḥ syāt tuśabdāt eṣaḥ api pakṣaḥ vyāvartate vidhau eteṣām upadeśaḥ syāt vidhau vedena stuti nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ na vidhi āśraye puruṣe puruṣa grahaṇam vidhi praśaṃsā artham vidhiḥ iti kriyām āha etasyāḥ kriyāyāḥ bhāvaḥ yasmāt anena puruṣeṇa kriyate tasmāt sādhuḥ iti na tu atra puruṣaḥ kriyā saṃbandhena nirdiśyate kim tu stotavya tvena kutas etat stuti padasya anyasya abhāvāt api ca kriyā nirdeśe śrutyā vidhānam kriyāpuruṣa saṃbandha nirdeśe vākyena atas ca durbalam tasmāt puruṣa mātrasya vidhānam prāpnoti na tad gotrāṇām iti 
[I,755,i_I,755,ii]	artha vādaḥ vā vidhi śeṣa tvāt tasmāt nitya anuvādaḥ syāt eṣaḥ api pakṣaḥ vā śabdāt vinivṛttaḥ na ayam tad gotrāṇām vidhiḥ na manuṣya mātrasya vā vidhiḥ vidhiḥ eva vā iti ayam artha vādaḥ tu kutas vidhi śeṣa tvāt anyam tu atra vidhim āmananti para kṛti udāharaṇe tāvat tasmāt āraṇyam eva aśnīyāt iti purā kalpa udāharaṇe gṛhapateḥ eva agriṣu nirmathya nirvaperan iti na ca dvayoḥ vidhyoḥ eka vākya bhāvaḥ asti vidhinā hi saṃbadhyamānayoḥ para kṛti purā kalpa vacanayoḥ anyā vacana vyaktiḥ anyā tu stuti artha pravṛttayoḥ na ca ubhayam yaugapadyena saṃbhavati tasmāt artha vādaḥ iti 
[I,755,iii_I,755,iv]	sahasra saṃvatsaram tad āyuṣām asaṃbhāvāt manuṣyeṣu asti sahasra saṃvatsaram pañca pañcāśataḥ trivṛtaḥ saṃvatsarāḥ pañca pañcāśataḥ pañcadaśāḥ pañca pañcāśataḥ saptadaśāḥ pañcapañcāśate ekaviṃśā viśvasṛja āmayanam sahasra saṃvatsaram iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ye sahasra āyuṣaḥ teṣām anena adhikāraḥ uta manuṣyāṇām iti yadā api manuṣyāṇām tadā api bahavaḥ vikalpāḥ vakṣyamānāḥ athavā divaseṣu saṃvatsara śabdaḥ iti kim prāptam sahasra āyuṣām bhavitum arhati kutas asaṃbhavāt manuṣyeṣu na manuṣyāṇām etāvat āyuḥ vidyate gandharva ādayaḥ tu etāvat āyuṣaḥ iti bhavati smṛtiḥ upacāraḥ anya artha darśanam ca prajāpatim vai prajāḥ sṛjamānam pāpmā mṛtyuḥ abhijaghāna sa tapaḥ atapyata sahasra saṃvatsarān pāpmānam vijihāsan iti vispaṣṭam ca idam sahasra saṃvatsaram tasmāt na manuṣyāṇām iti 
[I,756,i_I,756,ii]	api vā tad adhikārān manuṣya dharmaḥ syāt api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ na gandharva ādīnām manuṣyāṇām eva adhikāraḥ iti kutas tad adhikārāt manuṣya adhikāram śāstram samadhigatam iti te hi śaknuvanti kārtsnyena yathā uditam vidhim upasaṃhartum iti āha nanu na etāvat āyuṣaḥ manuṣyāḥ ucyate rasāyanaiḥ āyuḥ dīrgham prāpsyanti iti 
[I,756,iii_I,756,iv]	na asāmarthyāt na rasāyanānām etat sāmarthyam dṛṣṭam yena sahasra saṃvatsaram jīveyuḥ etāni hi agneḥ vardhakāni balī palitasya nāśakāni svara varṇa prasādakāni megha ājananāni na etāvat āyuṣaḥ dātṝṇi dṛśyante nanu svara varṇa prasāda ādi darśanāt eva jyok jīvanam api anumāsyate na iti brūmaḥ kutas śata āyuḥ vai puruṣaḥ iti anuvādaḥ saḥ evam jyogjīve na avakalpate atra ucyate śatāni āyuḥ asya iti vigrahīṣyāmaḥ na evam saṃkhyā śabdānām samāse iṣyate na ca gamakāni bhavanti dvi vacana bahuvacana antānām asamāsaḥ iti ca abhiyukta vacanāt 
[I,757,i_I,757,ii]	saṃbandha adarśanāt na hi etāvat āyuṣā rasāyanānām saṃbandhaḥ dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ na ca saṃbandha adarśane anumānam asti nanu sāmānyatodṛṣṭam bhaviṣyati dṛśyante tāvat alpasya sthira bhāvasya kārakāṇi evam abhyasyamānāni vīrya vattamāni sthira śarīra tām utpādayiṣyanti śata āyuḥ puruṣaḥ iti sati api vacane adhikam jīvanam dṛśyate eva iti atra ucyate na ayam ekāntaḥ kadācid yām ca yāvantīm ca śarīra sthira tām utpādayeyuḥ na prāk api adṛṣṭa kālām yathā prakrāmantaḥ abhyāsāt prakramāṇām vṛddheḥ yām ca yāvantīm ca mātrām prāpnuvanti na tu abhyasyantaḥ puruṣa āyuṣeṇa api yojana mātram prakrameyuḥ evam iha api saṃbandha abhāvāt sahasra āyuṣṭvam prāpnuyuḥ na vā iti saṃdigdham saṃdigdham ced sāmānyatodṛṣṭam na pramāṇam na ca adṛṣṭaḥ arthaḥ pramāṇam antreṇa śakyaḥ abhyupagantum tasmāt asaṃśayam na etāvat āyuṣaḥ santi iti puruṣa vacanena uktam katham tarhi iti 
[I,757,iii_I,757,iv]	sa kula kalpaḥ syāt iti kārṣṇa ajiniḥ ekasmin asaṃbhavāt sa manuṣya adhikāra pakṣe kula kalpaḥ bhaviṣyati iti evam kārṣṇa ajiniḥ ācāryaḥ manyate sma kutas ekasmin asaṃbhavāt puruṣāṇām idam anuśāsanam na ca etat ekaḥ śaknoti pārayitum yathā śakyate tathā pārayitavyam iti gamyamāne bahavaḥ śaknuvantaḥ pravarteran anye api tad kulīnāḥ anyena ārabdham samāpayeyuḥ iti 
[I,758,i_I,758,iii]	api vā kṛtsna saṃyogāt ekasya eva prayogaḥ syāt śāstra phalam hi prayoktari samadhigatam yaḥ ca kārtsnyena vidhim upasaṃhartum samarthaḥ saḥ eva adhikriyate iti tasmāt na kula kalpaḥ avakalpyate katham tarhi saṃpradāya mātreṇa dharmaḥ iti adhyavasīyate evam śrūyate svādhyāyaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti evam tarhi etat adhyavaseyam vacana prāmāṇyāt etat karma kurvatām āyuḥ varddhate iti tat ca na pramāṇa abhāvāt na hi etasmin arthe vākyam anyat vā pramāṇam asti nanu arthāpattiḥ anyathā ānarthakyam bhaviṣyati iti ucyate na anarthakyam adhyayanāt eva hi adṛṣṭam bhaviṣyati tathā hi sāmānyena adṛṣṭam kalpayitum laghīyaḥ na tu karmaṇā āyuḥ vardhate iti viśeṣa adṛṣṭa kalpanā athavā ānarthakyam eva abhyupagamyeta na ayukti phalam kalpyam atha ucyeta ardha tṛtīyāni śatāni dīkṣiṣyante catubhiḥ varṣaiḥ samāpyante iti evam api niyata parimāṇam hīyeta caturviṃśati paramāḥ saptadaśa avarāḥ satram āsīran iti vacanasya tu ānarthakya parihārāya parimāṇam hāpayiṣyate iti ced tat ayuktam adhyayanāt phalam asti tasmāt na eṣā kalpanā iti katham tarhi evam 
[I,759,i_I,759,ii]	vipratiṣedhāt tu guṇī anyataraḥ syāt iti lāvukāyanaḥ anyataraḥ atra gauṇaḥ śabdaḥ syāt yadi vā saṃvatsare saṃvatsara śabdaḥ yadi vā pañcapañcāśataḥ iti śabdaḥ gauṇaḥ iti kutas etat vipratiṣedhāt vipratiṣedhaḥ hi bhavati ubhayasmin vihite katham vākyam hi bhidyeta yadi pañca pañcāśataḥ trivṛtaḥ na saṃvatsarāḥ atha saṃvatsarāḥ trivṛtaḥ na pañca pañcāśataḥ tasmāt virodhāt anyatarat vacanam gauṇam iti lāvukāyanaḥ ācāryaḥ manyate sma ācārya grahaṇam pūjā artham na ātmanaḥ pratiṣedha artham 
[I,759,iii_I,759,iv]	saṃvatsaraḥ vicāli tvāt etat uktam anyatarat gauṇam iti tat avadhārayitvayam tat ucyate saṃvatsara vacanam gauṇam iti kutas vicāli tvāt vicālī hi saṃvatsara śabdaḥ sāvanaḥ api gaṇita divasakaḥ śīta uṣṇa varṣā lakṣaṇaḥ api cāndramasaḥ api saḥ evaṃlakṣaṇakaḥ anuvādaḥ śakyate kalpayitum pañcapañcāśataḥ iti ayam tu vyakta parimāṇasya arthasya vācakaḥ ekena api ūne na bhavati 
[I,759,v_I,759,vi]	sā prakṛtiḥ syāt adhikārāt gavāmayane māsāḥ prakṛtāḥ māseṣu ca saṃvatsara śabdaḥ uktaḥ yaḥ vai māsaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ iti tasmāt pañca pañcāśataḥ māsāḥ iti nanu etasmin pakṣe sahasra saṃvatsara śabdaḥ na avakalpate ucyate nāmadheyam etat sahasra saṃvatsara śabdaḥ iti na guṇa vidhiḥ nāmadheyam ca na vidhīyate avidhīyamānam ca yena kenacid guṇena avakalpyate 
[I,760,i]	na eṣaḥ api pakṣaḥ yujyate atra api hi saḥ eva doṣaḥ na tāvat jīvanam asti yāvat ā etat avakalpyeta dāra agni kāla soma pūrvatva apekṣayā iti tena etasmin ca kriyamāṇe aparisamāptaḥ eva āyuḥ paryupayuktam syāt tathā ca adhyayanāt eva adṛṣṭam kalpyeta evam tarhi dvādaśa ahaḥ prakṛtiḥ iti pañca pañcāśataḥ dvādaśa ahāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti tathā ca dṛśyate dvādaśa vai rātrayaḥ saṃvatsarasya pratimāḥ iti tatra sa doṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati na evam tatra saṃvatsara śabdasya sākṣāt pratimā śabdena saṃyogāt api ca pañca pañcāśataḥ trivṛtaḥ iti uktam trivṛt śabdaḥ ca dvādaśa ahe divase dṛṣṭaḥ na dvādaśa rātre tasmāt na evam 
[I,760,ii_I,760,iii]	ahāni vā abhisaṃkhya tvāt vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na ca etat asti pañca pañcāśataḥ dvādaśa rātrāḥ iti ahāni eva trivṛt śabdena ākhyāyante tasmāt ahaḥsu saṃvatsara śabdaḥ iti athavā vā śabdaḥ pakṣa antaram vyāvartayati na pañca pañcāśātaḥ māsāḥ kim tarhi divasāḥ dvādaśa ahe trivṛt ahar prakṛtam tatra saṃvatsara śabdaḥ dṛśyate ādityaḥ vā sarve ṛtavaḥ sa yadā eva uditi atha vasantaḥ yadā saṃgavaḥ atha grīṣmaḥ yadā madhyaṃdinaḥ atha varṣā yadā aparāhnaḥ atha śarad yadā astama iti atha hemanta śiśirau iti sarvān ṛtūn ahani saṃpādayati sarve cartavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ tasmāt āhar saṃvatsara śabdena ucyate api ca pañca pañcāśataḥ trivṛtaḥ iti trivṛtām pañcapañcāśat tvam na ca dvādaśa rātraḥ trivṛt ekam hi dvādaśa ahe trivṛt ahar na tatra trivṛt saṃkhyāyāḥ dvādaśa rātreṇa mukhyayā vṛttyā sāmānādhikaraṇyam trivṛt ahar saṃbandha lakṣaṇayā syāt abhisaṃkhyam trivṛt ahar tena śrutyā eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam śrutiḥ ca lakṣaṇāyāḥ jyāyasī tasmāt pañca pañcāśat ahāni saṃvatsaraḥ syāt iti 
[I,762,i_I,762,ii]	iṣṭi pūrva tvāt akratu śeṣaḥ homaḥ saṃskṛteṣu agniṣu syāt apūrvaḥ api ādhānasya sarva śeṣa tvāt iha catur hotṛṣu āmnāyate prajā kāmam caturhotrā yājayet caturgṛhītam ājyam gṛhītvā catur hotāram vyācakṣīta pūrveṇa graheṇa ardham juhuyāt tad uttareṇa ardham iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim pavamāna iṣṭi saṃskṛteṣu agniṣu evamādayaḥ uta asaṃskṛteṣu api tathā pakṣa antara āśrayaṇam api vakṣyamānam vicārayiṣyate kim tāvat prāptam saṃskṛteṣu agniṣu evaṃjātīyakaḥ akratu śeṣaḥ api homaḥ syāt yadi api apūrvāḥ darvi homā na kutaścid dharmān ākāṅkṣanti tathā api āhavanīya ādayaḥ homa ādīn ākāṅkṣanti yat āhavanīye juhoti tena saḥ asya abhīṣṭaḥ prītaḥ bhavati iti evamādibhiḥ śrutibhiḥ evam iṣṭi pūrva tvāt sarva homānām saṃskṛta agni vṛtti tvam evaṃjātīyakānām iti 
[I,762,iii_I,763,i]	iṣṭi tvena tu saṃstavaḥ catur hotṝn asaṃskṛteṣu darśayati tuśabdāt pakṣaḥ viparivartate catur hotṛ homāḥ asaṃskṛteṣu agniṣu bhaveyuḥ tathā hi darśayati eṣā vā anāhitāgneḥ iṣṭiḥ yat catur hotāraḥ iti anāhitāgneḥ iṣṭayaḥ na vidyante ye tu ete catur hotārāḥ tasya eṣā eva iṣṭiḥ iti anāhitāgneḥ evaṃjātīyakān homān darśayati tasmāt asaṃskṛteṣu bhaveyuḥ nanu liṅgam asādhakam prāptiḥ vaktavyā iti tat ucyate 
[I,763,ii_I,763,iii]	upadeśaḥ tu apūrva tvāt evam tarhi akratu śeṣāṇām vidhiḥ eṣā bhaviṣyati eṣā anāhitāgneḥ kriyā iti evam arthavat vacanam bhaviṣyati vāda mātram anarthakam bhavati asya ca asti vidhi sāmarthyam tasmāt vidhiḥ asaṃskṛteṣu iti 
[I,763,iv_I,763,v]	sa sarveṣām aviśeṣāt āha etat gṛhyate vidhiḥ iti yat tu akratu śeṣāṇām iti tat na sarveṣām kratu śeṣāṇām akratu śeṣāṇām ca catur hotṛ homānām kutas aviśeṣāt na kratu śeṣāṇām eva ayam dharmaḥ ucyate na akratu śeṣāṇām iti tasmāt sarveṣām 
[I,763,vi_I,763,vii]	api vā kratva bhāvāt anāhitāgneḥ aśeṣa bhūta nirdeśaḥ api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ akratu śeṣāṇām eva ayam dharmaḥ na kratu śeṣāṇām kutas anāhitāgneḥ kratu a bhāvāt na hi anāhitāgneḥ kratavaḥ santi na ca kratu aṅgam kevalam prayujyamānam kasmaicid prayojanāya syāt na ca asya anyat phalam prakalpyeta pramāṇa abhāvāt vacanasya hi anyat api prayojanam asti na ca anena vacanena śakyate anāhitāgneḥ kratuḥ kalpayitum tasmāt akratu śeṣāṇām ayam dharmaḥ iti 
[I,764,i_I,764,ii]	japaḥ vā anagni saṃyogāt vā śabdāt pakṣaḥ viparivartate na asaṃskṛteṣu agniṣu evaṃjātīyakāḥ homāḥ syuḥ kutas ādhānasya sarva śeṣa tvāt nanu vacanam idam eṣā anāhitāgneḥ iṣṭiḥ iti na iti brūmaḥ japa artha vadaḥ eṣa bhaviṣyati ye japa rūpāḥ teṣām artha vādaḥ na sarveṣām catur hotṝṇām evam yat āhavanīye johoti iti evamādīnām vacanānām arthavat tā bhaviṣyati 
[I,764,iii_I,764,v]	iṣṭi tvena tu saṃstute homaḥ syāt anārabhya agni saṃyogāt itareṣām avācya tvāt yat uktam eṣā vā anāhita tā agneḥ kriyā iṣṭi tulyā iti japānām eṣa vādaḥ iti tat na na eṣā vacana vyaktiḥ yā eṣā anāhitāgneḥ kriyā sa iṣṭi tulya iti kim kāraṇam sādṛśya mātra anuvādaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt itarasmin pakṣe vidhiḥ arthavān yā iyam iṣṭiḥ eṣā anāhitāgneḥ iti tat iṣṭi saṃstavāt dhomānām eva vādaḥ katham iṣṭiḥ yāgaḥ saḥ eva āsecana adhikaḥ homaḥ yat uktam sarva homa arthaḥ āhavanīyaḥ iti tat na catur hotṝn eva adhikṛtya ucyate kim tu aviśeṣeṇa homān sa catur hotṛṣu asaṃbhavāt anyeṣu bhaviṣyati catur hotṛṣu ca anāhitāgneḥ ucyamāneṣu āhavanīyaḥ na aṅgam iti 
[I,764,vi_I,764,vii]	ubhayoḥ piṭṛ yajña vat na etat asti anāhitāgneḥ eva catur hotāraḥ iti ubhayoḥ syuḥ pitryajña vat yathā pitṛ yajñaḥ āhitāgneḥ anāhitāgneḥ ca evam catur hotāraḥ api katham avagamyate varṇitam etat yadā anuvāda pakṣaḥ tat ā āhitāgneḥ yadā vidhi pakṣaḥ tadā anāhitāgneḥ ubhayathā vacana vyaktiḥ pratīyate na ca pratīyamānaḥ arthaḥ śakyate apahnotum tasmāt ubhayoḥ catur hotāraḥ iti 
[I,765,i_I,765,ii]	nirdeśaḥ vā anāhitāgneḥ anārabhya agni saṃyogāt na ca etat asti ubhayoḥ catur hotāraḥ bhaveyuḥ iti katham eṣa hi anāhitāgni nirdeśaḥ eṣā veṣṭiḥ anāhitāgneḥ iti vacanena adhikṛtaḥ na āhitāgniḥ nirdeśa sāmarthyāt artha vāde ca upakṣīṇam tatra eva na virudhyate iti yat āhavanīye juhoti iti vacanam na catur hotṝn eva adhikṛtya ucyate iti uktam tasmāt anāhitāgneḥ evaṃjātīyakāḥ homāḥ 
[I,765,iii_I,765,iv]	pitṛ yajñe saṃyuktasya punarvacanam atha yat uktam pitṛ yajña vat iti yuktam pitṛ yajñe tatra āhitāgni saṃyuktasya punar etat vacanam bhavati api anāhitāgninā kāryaḥ iti etat vacanam anāhitāgneḥ api iti anāhitāgnau anvāhāryakam karoti iha tathā na asti vacanam niyogataḥ ekaḥ nirdeśaḥ eṣā vā anāhitāgneḥ iti na atra api śabdaḥ asti tasmāt pitṛ yajñena atulyam etat 
[I,765,v_I,765,vi]	upanayan ādadhīta homa saṃyogāt idam āmananti upanayan tisṛbhiḥ juhuyāt iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ayam homaḥ ādhāna saṃskṛteṣu agniṣu uta asaṃskṛteṣu iti kim prāptam upanayan ādadhīta iti kutas homa saṃyogāt āhavanīyasya yat āhavanīye juhoti tena saḥ asya abhīṣṭaḥ prītaḥ bhavati iti tasmāt ādhāna uttara kālāḥ ete homāḥ iti sthitiḥ 
[I,766,i_I,766,ii]	sthapati iṣṭi vat laukike vā vidyā karma ānupūrva tvāt na ca etat asti ādhāya evaṃjātīyakam hotavyam iti kim tarhi laukikaḥ eva pravarteta iti kutas vidyā karma ānupūrva tvāt vidyā grahaṇa arthāḥ ime homāḥ vidyāvataḥ ca ādhānena adhikāraḥ sāmarthyāt atas ādhāna uttara kāla tā na eṣām avakalpate yathā sthapati iṣṭyām 
[I,766,iii_I,766,iv]	ādhānam ca bhāryā saṃyuktam ādhānam ca bhāryā saṃyuktam śrūyate vidyā grahaṇa uttara kālaḥ ca dāra saṃgrahaḥ tasmāt api na avakalpate pūrva kālatā ādhānasya 
[I,766,v_I,766,vi]	akarma ca ūrdhvam ādhānāt tad samavāyaḥ hi karmabhiḥ tatra āha yā pūrvam ādhānāt dārakriyā sā karma arthā bhaviṣyati vacanāt ca ūrdhvam ādhānāt apatya arthā dvayoḥ api kālayoḥ piṇḍa pitṛ yajña vat na eṣa doṣaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atra ucyate akarma ca dārakriyā yādhāna uttara kāle kutas āhavanīya ādi samavāyaḥ hi karmabhiḥ bhavati svārthaṇ ca agnayaḥ ādhātavyāḥ iti niyamaḥ tasmāt ubhayasmin api kāle dāra saṃgrahaḥ iti etat na asti 
[I,767,i_I,767,ii]	śrāddha vat iti ced atra ca āha yathā piṇḍa pitṝyajñaḥ āhita agreḥ anāhita agreḥ ca bhavati evam dāra saṃgrahaḥ api iti yat uktam tat parihartavyam 
[I,767,iii_I,767,iv]	na śruti vipratiṣedhāt na evam śruti vipratiṣedhaḥ hi bhavati evam kriyamāṇe dāra karmaṇi vidyā grahaṇa uttara kālam śrūyamāṇam pūrvam kriyate iti vipratiṣiddham arthāt anyat eva idam iti ced na artha prāptasya eva kāla niyamaḥ eṣaḥ upanayanam ca karma artham tat dvitīyasyām vipratiṣidhyeta 
[I,767,v_I,767,vi]	sarva artha tvāt ca putra arthaḥ na prayojayet atha ucyate prāk ādhānāt ca karma artha eva ūrdhvam ca apatya arthā eva asya bhaviṣyati tena evam sati asya na kiṃcid virotsyate iti ucyate na etat evam sva arthā hi sā na kevalam apatya artha tām eṣyati tat uktam phala utsāha aviśeṣāt iti tasmāt api na dvis dāra saṃgrahaḥ api ca evam smaryate dharme ca arthe ca kāme ca na ati caritavyā iti evam sati ati caritā syāt atas na dvis dāra saṃgrahaḥ ekā eva bhāryā karma artha apatya arthā ca tasyāḥ ca vidyā grahaṇa uttara kālatā atas na ādhāna saṃskṛteṣu ete homāḥ iti 
[I,768,i_I,768,ii]	soma pānāt tu prāpaṇam dvitīyasya tasmāt upayacchet gṛhyate etat prāk upanayanāt na asti patnī iti yat uktam ekā eva patnī iti tat na mṛṣyate yathā eva smṛtiḥ dharme ca arthe ca kāme ca na ati caritavyā iti dharma prajā saṃpanne dāre na anyām kurvīta iti ca evam idam api smaryate eva anyatara apāye anyām kurvīta iti tasmāt yasya na dharma saṃpannā na prajā saṃpannā vā patnī saḥ anyām kurvīta iti soma pānāt iti ca artha vādam vyapadiśati sma somapaḥ na dvitīyām jāyām abhyaṣūyate iti dvitīyām api jāyām darśayati 
[I,768,iii_I,768,iv]	pitṛ yajñe tu darśanāt prāk ādhānāt pratīyeta atha katham pitṛ yajñasya dvau kālau iti ucyate vacanam hi tatra dṛśyate api anāhitāgninā kāri iti tasmāt prāk ādhānāt pitṛ yajñaḥ iti
