[I,768,v_I,768,vi]	sthapati iṣṭiḥ prayāja vat agnyādheyam prayojayet tādarthyāt ca apavṛjyeta asti sthapati iṣṭiḥ etayā niṣāda sthapitam yājayeta iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim ādhāna saṃskṛteṣu agniṣu syāt uta laukikeṣu iti kim prāptam saṃskṛteṣu iti katham yat āhavanīye juhoti iti evamādi vacanāt nanu śūdrasya āhavanīya abhāvāt na asti tasya śrutiḥ iti ucyate sā hi āhavanīyam prayojayet yathā prayājān aśrutān prayojayati evam ca udaka sāmarthyāt iti tādarthyāt ca apavṛjyeta sthapati iṣṭi artham ca ahitāḥ agnayaḥ tasyām apavṛktāyām apavṛjyeran dhāraṇam hi teṣām dṛṣṭa kāryam āmnātam atikrānte kārye na syāt iti 
[I,769,i_I,769,ii]	api vā laukike agnau syāt ādhānasya asarva śeṣa tvāt api vā iti pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ laukikeṣu agniṣu syāt na saṃskṛteṣu kutas ādhānasya asarva śeṣa tvāt sarva karma śeṣa bhūtāḥ agnayaḥ tad aṅgam ādhānam na karma aṅgam śruti ādīnām abhāvāt na karma prayukta ādhānasya vākya sāmarthyāt ca agni prayukta tvam yat ca darśa pūrṇamāsa prayuktam tat ca udakena prāpyate na dravya prayuktam tasmāt laukikeṣu agniṣu sthapati iṣṭiḥ iti 
[I,769,iii_I,769,iv]	avakīrṇi paśuḥ ca tadvat ādhānasya aprāpta kāla tvāt asti avakīrṇi paśuḥ brahmacārī avakīrṇī nairṛtam gardabham ālabheta iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim tad artham ādhānam kartavyam uta laukikeṣu agniṣu tat varteta iti avakīrṇi paśuḥ ca tadvat iti adhikaraṇa atideśaḥ pūrvasya adhikaraṇasya yaḥ pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ saḥ atra pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ yaḥ siddhāntaḥ sa siddhāntaḥ sarva artham ādhānam tasmāt āhitāgniṣu iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ ādhānasya aprāpta kāla tvāt iti siddhāntaḥ aprāptaḥ ayam ādhānasya kālaḥ iti etat uktam tasmāt idam api karma laukikeṣu iti 
[I,770,i_I,770,ii]	udagayana pūrva pakṣa ahaḥ puṇya aheṣu daivāni smṛti rūpa anyārtha darśanāt daivāni karmāṇi udāharaṇam upanayana prabhṛtīni tatra saṃdehaḥ kim aniyate kāle daivāni kartavyāni utoda gayana pūrva pakṣa ahaḥ puṇya aheṣu iti aniyate iti prāpte udagayana ādiṣu iti ucyate kutas evam smaranti teṣu kāleṣu daivāni iti rūpa artha vādaḥ ca etat vai devānām rūpam yat udagayanam pūrvapakṣaḥ aha iti na ca vayam deva ādīnām rūpam vidmaḥ atha tu eṣu kāleṣu daivāni kriyante tatas etena saṃbandhena rūpa vacanam avakalpate anya artham ca vākyam etat darśayati pūrvāhnaḥ vai devānām madhyaṃdinaḥ manuṣyāṇām aparāhnaḥ pitṝṇām iti tasmāt eteṣu kāleṣu daivāni syuḥ iti 
[I,770,iii_I,770,iv]	ahani ca karma sākalyam ahani ca viśeṣaḥ sakalam karma ahani eva śakyate kartum iti na rātrau kariṣyati 
[I,771,i_I,771,ii]	itareṣu tu pitrāṇi śrāddha ādīni apara pakṣe aparāhne ca smṛti rūpa anyārtha darśanāt 
[I,771,iii_I,771,iv]	yāñca ākrayaṇam avidyamāne loka vat idam samāmnāyate jyotiṣṭome dvādaśa rātrīḥ dīkṣitaḥ bhṛtim vanvīta iti tathā somam krīṇāti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim yasya na vidyate bhṛtiḥ tena vanitavyā yasya ca na vidyate somaḥ tena kretavyaḥ uta ubhathā api sati ca asati ca kim prāptam yāñca ākrayaṇam avidyamāne bhṛti dhane some ca syāt kasmāt dravya sadbhāva artham yāñca ākrayaṇam tat vidyamāne anarthakam anarthakam ca uktam api na kartavyam tasmāt avidyamāne bhavet loka vat yathā yasya loke na asti dravyam sa yācate krīṇāti ca evam iha api draṣṭavyam 
[I,771,v_I,771,vi]	niyatam vā arthavat tvāt syāt niyatam vā yāñca ākrayaṇam tat vidyamāne avidyamāne ca dravye syāt evam yāñca ākrayaṇam arthavat bhavati jyotiṣṭoma prayuktam hi tat śrūyate na dravya prayuktam tat ca nityam jyotiṣṭomasya na evam vacanam bhavati yadā dravyam na asti tadā kartavyam iti jyotiṣṭomasya ca nityam aṅgam uktam dravya abhāvaḥ nimittam uktam iti parikalpyeta kalpanāyām śabdaḥ bādhyeta atas yāñca ākrayaṇa saṃskṛtam dravyam iha upayoktavyam anyathā vaiguṇyam bhavati tasmāt sati ca asati ca dravye yāñca ākrayaṇam anuṣṭātavyam iti atha yat uktam loka vat iti loke karma artha lakṣaṇam bhavati na śabda lakṣaṇam yathārthaḥ tathā kriyate na yathā śabdaḥ vede tu śabdena eva arthaḥ avagamyate tathā eva anuṣṭheyam iti tasmāt vidyamāne api kartavyam 
[I,772,i_I,772,ii]	tathā bhakṣa praiṣāt chādana saṃjñapta homa dveṣam jyotiṣṭome śrūyate payaḥ vratam brāhmaṇasya yavāguḥ rājanyasya āmikṣā vaiśyasya iti tathā darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ praiṣaḥ prokṣaṇīḥ āsādaya idhmam bahis upasādaya srucaḥ saṃmṛḍḍhi patnīm saṃnahya ājyena udehi iti tathā vājapeye śrūyate darbha mayam vāsaḥ bhavati iti paśau saṃjñapta homaḥ yat paśuḥ māyum akṛtoraḥ vā padbhiḥ āhata agniḥ mā tasmāt enasaḥ viśvāt muñca tvam hasaḥ iti tathā yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ iti vacanam etāni udāharaṇa vacanāni 
[I,772,iii_I,773,i]	teṣu saṃdehaḥ kim yasya aparam bhojanam na vidyate sa payaḥ vratayet yavāgūm āmikṣām vā uta vidyamāne api iti tathā yaḥ preṣitaḥ praiṣa artham na pratipadyate sa preṣitavyaḥ uta pratipadyamānaḥ api iti tathā yasya sūtra mayam vāsaḥ na asti sa darbha mayam paridadhīta uta vidyamāne api iti tathā yasya paśuḥ māyum kuryāt uraḥ vā pādau vā hanyāt saḥ etena mantreṇa juhuyāt uta anyaḥ api iti tathā yaḥ dveṣṭi kiṃcid anyena ca dviṣyate saḥ eva mantram brūyāt yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi iti uta adviṣan adviṣyamāṇaḥ ca api iti tatra adhikaraṇa atideśaḥ ayam tatra yaḥ pūrvasmin adhikaraṇe pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ saḥ iha pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ yaḥ tatra siddhāntaḥ saḥ iha siddhāntaḥ avidyamāne kuryāt iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ niyatam vā arthavat tvāt iti uttaraḥ saḥ eva atra nyāyaḥ yaḥ pūrvatra 
[I,773,ii_I,773,iii]	anarthakam tu anityam syāt jyotiṣṭome śrūyate madhyaṃdine apararātre vā vratam vratayati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim niyatam apararātre vratam uta aniyatam iti kim prāptam niyatam ca arthavat tvāt syāt iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ anarthakam tu anityam syāt yadā evam manyeta asmin kāle vratam me jariṣyati iti tadā vratayet yadā tu khalu manyeta na samyak jariṣyati iti tadā tad vratam kriyamāṇam anarthakam syāt yadi hi ajīrṇena yajamānaḥ mriyeta tadā tantra lopaḥ tantra lope ca sarva lopaḥ tasmāt aniyatam tasmin kāle vratam vratayitavyam iti 
[I,773,iv_I,773,v]	paśu codanāyām aniyamaḥ aviśeṣāt jyotiṣṭome paśuḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ yaḥ dīkṣitaḥ yat agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabhate iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim yaḥ kaścid paśuḥ ālambhīyaḥ uta chāgaḥ iti vakṣyamāṇena abhiprāyeṇa bhavati saṃśayaḥ nanu ekeṣām āmnāyate ajaḥ agnīṣomīya iti sarva śākhā pratyayam ca ekam karma iti atra ucyate pratiśākham bhinnāni karmāṇi iti kṛtvā cintā kim tāvat prāptam paśu codanāyām aniyamaḥ utsarge kartavye dravyam śakyataḥ utsraṣṭum na paśutvam dravyam hi sādhakam atas atra dravyam antreṇa utsargaḥ na saṃbhavati iti dravyam upādīyate tasmin upādīyamāne aniyamaḥ yat kiṃcid utsraṣṭavyam iti kutas etat aviśeṣāt na hi paśutva saṃbaddheṣu kaścid viśeṣaḥ upalabhyate tasmāt yaḥ kaścid paśuḥ iti 
[I,774,i_I,774,ii]	chāgaḥ vā mantra varṇāt vā śabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na etat asti yatra kvacana dravye paśutvam upādeyam iti asti utsraṣṭavyasya niyama kāraṇam mantra varṇaḥ agnaye chāgasya vayāyāḥ medasaḥ anubrūhi iti chāga prakāśana samarthaḥ mantra varṇaḥ samāmnāyate yadi chāgaḥ na upādeyaḥ tatas tad prakāśana samarthasya upādānam anartha vat tena avagamyate chāgam adhikṛtya utsargam vidadhāti iti māntra varṇikaḥ dravya niyama vidhiḥ iti 
[I,774,iii_I,774,iv]	na codanā virodhāt na etat evam na śaknoti mantra varṇaḥ codanāyām pratyarthinyām dravyam niyantum yatra hi dravyasya prakāśakam na śrūyate tatra aprakāśitam eva tat kartavyam iti tasmāt na mantra varṇāt prakāśya niyama vidhiḥ kalpyate evam atra prakāśyam prakāśayitavyam iti atra punar śabdena avagamyate paśutvena prakāśayitavyam iti tasmāt na mantra varṇaḥ tad sadbhāve samarthaḥ mantra varṇāt dhi kalpyā prayoga vacana śrutiḥ iha kḷptā prayoga vacanena upasaṃhartavyā anyaḥ eva paśu śabdasya arthaḥ paśutvam anyaḥ mantra varṇena niyamyate chāgaḥ tasmāt na mantra varṇaḥ codanā virodhena niyantum arhati iti 
[I,775,i_I,775,ii]	ārṣeya vat iti ced iti ced paśyasi na paśutvam anyebhyaḥ paśubhyaḥ ācchetavyam iti yathā ārṣeyam vṛṇīte trīn vṛṇītaḥ iti sāmānya śrutiḥ triṣu eva avatiṣṭhate iti tritvam viśeṣaḥ vivakṣitaḥ na anye vivakṣitāḥ iti evam iha api paśutvam chāgam prakalpayitum vivakṣitam na anyān viśeṣān iti 
[I,775,iii_I,775,iv]	na tatra hi acodita tvāt na etat evam tatra hi acoditam dravyam utsraṣṭavyam mantra varṇe varaṇe punar ca uditam tatra tritva saṃkhyā saṃbandhasya varaṇe codita tvāt na anyā saṃkhyā kriyate ārṣeya śabdāt api na anā ārṣeyam tri śabdasya hi tad sāmarthyam yena ārṣeya śabdaḥ viśiṣṭa saṃkhyā viṣayaḥ niyamyate iha na mantrasya sāmarthyam tasmāt aniyamaḥ iti 
[I,775,v_I,775,vi]	niyamaḥ vaikāryam hi artha bhedāt bhedaḥ pṛthaktvena abhidhānāt niyamaḥ vā aikārthyam hi paśu chāga śabdayoḥ sāmānyam paśuḥ iti chāga ādayaḥ viśeṣāḥ ucyante katham taiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt paśuḥ chāgaḥ paśuḥ uṣṭraḥ paśuḥ meṣaḥ paśuḥ usraḥ iti evam sati na mantra varṇaḥ paśu śabdena virudhyate tena chāgaḥ api ālabdhavyaḥ coditaḥ mantra varṇaḥ upādīyamāne idam avagamyate chāgam vivakṣitvā ayam paśu śabdaḥ uccaritaḥ iti na anyān viśeṣān iti chāga upakaraṇam asya upadaṃśitam yat upadaṃśane paśu śabdaḥ chāga abhiprāyaḥ iti gamyate yathā yuga varatre upadaṃśite īṣā cakra ādi saṃnidhāne ced akṣamānayā iti ucyate tadā yāna akṣam adhikṛtya brūtaḥ iti gamyate na tu videvana akṣam iti yadi hi artha bhedaḥ bhavet paśu chāga śabdayoḥ pṛthaktvena abhidhānam tatas bhedaḥ syāt na chāgaḥ eva niyamyeta avihitaḥ chāga arthaḥ iti aśva upādānam api ca chāga pakṣe tam mantra varṇaḥ prakāśayet chāga artha abhidhāne punar paśu śabdasya chāga prāptau anyeṣām aprāptiḥ iti anyasmin prāpte liṅgena niyamaḥ kriyate iti 
[I,776,i_I,776,ii]	aniyamaḥ vā artha antara tvāt anya tvam vyatireka śabda bhedābhyām aniyamaḥ vā yaḥ kaścid paśuḥ upādeyaḥ artha antara tvāt artha antaram paśutvam artha antaram chāga tvam arthayoḥ atra sāmānādhikaraṇyam na śabdayoḥ katham punar artha antaram gamyate vyatirekāt śabda bhedāt ca vyatirekaḥ hi bhavati kaścid paśuḥ na chāgaḥ tathā chāgaḥ paśuḥ iti śabda bhedaḥ śabda bhedāt eva artha bhedaḥ nyāyyaḥ ekasmin vākye samavāyāt paśum chāgam ānaya iti itarathā anyatareṇa kṛtārtha tvāt anyataraḥ vākye na samaveyāt samavaiti ca tasmāt anyat paśutvam anyat śāga tvam tasmāt aniyamaḥ yaḥ kaścid paśuḥ upādeyaḥ iti 
[I,776,iii_I,777,i]	tatra utsūtrikā pakṣa vyāvṛttiḥ anya tve api sati niyamaḥ eva kutas mantrasya prayoga vacanena gṛhīta tvāt mantra sādhanam hi karma iti gamyate yadi chāgam upādāsyāmahe sa guṇam karma śakṣāmaḥ kartum mantram upādadānāḥ mantrasya āpākṣika tvāt atha anyam upādāsyāmahe mantrasya viṣaya abhāvāt mantram apajahataḥ na sa guṇam karma nirvartayema atas na ca śrutim bādhāmahe anyasmin paśu śabdaḥ vartate iti na ca anyam upādāsyāmahe vaiguṇyāt bibhyataḥ tasmāt śāgaḥ eva upādātavyaḥ iti nanu aśvam upādadānā na eva mantra varṇam apahāsyāmaḥ saḥ eva aśvaḥ chāgaḥ bhaviṣyati yaḥ chinna gamanaḥ aśvaḥ sa chāgaḥ chideḥ gameḥ ca cchāga śabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ 
[I,777,ii_I,777,iii]	rūpāt liṅgāt ca kvacid muṣkarāḥ bhaviśyanti iti śrūyate yadi antareṇa vacanam amuṣkarāḥ tadā idam upapadyate tasmāt chinna gamanaḥ aśvaḥ api chāgaḥ iti karma ākhyā bhaviṣyati atra ucyate :
[I,777,iv_I,777,v]	chāge na karma ākhyā rūpa liṅgābhyām chāge karma ākhyā rūpa liṅgābhyām na avakalpate na hi chāga śabdaḥ chinna gamana vacanaḥ samudāyaḥ hi asau pṛthak artha antare prasiddhaḥ na asau avayava prasiddhyā bādhitavyaḥ tasmāt na aśvaḥ chāgaḥ 
[I,777,vi_I,777,vii]	rūpa anya tvāt na jāti śabdaḥ syāt idam anya pada uttaram sūtram atha kasmāt na vayaḥ vacanaḥ bhavati vayaḥ vacanāḥ hi ete śabdāḥ chāgaḥ chāgalaḥ vatsaḥ iti tena aśvaḥ api vayaḥ vacanaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ucyate na etat evam satyam vayaḥ vacanaḥ aja apati gatam tu vayaḥ vaditum śaknoti yathā śoṇaḥ iti varṇa vacanaḥ aśva jāti gatam varṇam vadati na anyam tasmāt rūpa anya tvāt na vayaḥ mātra vacanaḥ kim tu jāti śabdaḥ syāt jāti āśrayam vayaḥ vadet atas chāgaḥ eva niyamyate 
[I,778,i_I,778,ii]	vikāraḥ na utpattika tvāt idam api pada uttaram iha aśva ādīnām vikāraḥ chāga śabdaḥ kiṃcid atra aśva ādīnām uccāryate na kiṃcid anyat eva tasmāt āśvaḥ api chāgaḥ iti na utpattika tvāt autpattikaḥ hi nāmi nāmnoḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti uktam na ākhya avikāraḥ saṃbhavati iti tasmāt na aśvaḥ chāgaḥ atas chāgaḥ eva upādātvayaḥ iti 
[I,778,iii_I,778,iv]	sa naimittikaḥ paśoḥ guṇasya ācodita tvāt pada uttaram eva idam sūtram atha kasmāt na chidra nimittaḥ chāga śabdaḥ bhavati evam śrūyate śuṣiraḥ vai etarhi paśuḥ yarhi vapām utkhadanti iti na iti ucyate chidra tvasya guṇasya paśoḥ acodita tvāt avyaṅgam paśum ālabheta iti hi codyate tasmāt acchidraḥ paśuḥ na ca avayava prasiddhyā samudāya prasiddhiḥ bādhyate iti uktam eva tasmāt śāgaḥ eva upādeyaḥ na aśva ādayaḥ iti 
[I,779,i_I,779,ii]	jāteḥ vā tad prāya vacana arthavat tvābhyām vā śabdaḥ avadhāraṇāyām yasmāt avayava prasiddhyā samudāya prasiddhiḥ na bādhyate tasmāt jāteḥ eva chāga śabdaḥ vācakaḥ evam samudāyasya arthavat tā anugṛhītā bhaviṣyati iti tad prāya vacanam upapadyate viśveṣām devānām usrāṇām chāgānām meṣāṇām vapānām medasaḥ anubrūhi iti jāti prāye vacanam upapadyate prāyeṇa api hi niyamaḥ kriyate yathā agrya prāye likhitam dṛṣṭvā agnyaḥ ayam iti buddhiḥ bhavati tasmāt śāgaḥ eva upādātavyaḥ iti kṛtvā cintāyām prayojanam na vaktavyam 
[II,1,i_II,1,ii]	śruti pramāṇa tvāt śeṣāṇām mukhya bhede yathā adhikāram bhāvaḥ syāt pūrveṇa adhyāya ṣaṭkena pratyakṣa vihita dharmaṇām karmaṇām darśa pūrṇamāsa ādīnām itikartavya tā cintitā uttareṇa idānīm avihitā iti kartavya tākeṣu aindra agna ādiṣu cintayitum iṣyate tatra yadi darśa pūrṇamāsa ādīnām prakaraṇe ye vihitāḥ dharmāḥ te sarva karmasu vihitāḥ bhavanti tatas taiḥ eva dharmaiḥ aindra agna ādayaḥ api dharmavantaḥ uktāḥ tathā kartavyāḥ ca iti na arthaḥ uttareṇa ṣaṭkena atha ye yasya prakaraṇaḥ ucyante te tatra eva uktāḥ bhavanti tatas adharmakāṇi aindra agnīdīni teṣu cintā bhavati kim eṣām dharmāḥ santi uta na iti yadā ca santi tadā ke kiyantaḥ vā katham ca anuṣṭātavyāḥ iti tat artham uttaraḥ ṣaṭkaḥ pravartanīyaḥ 
[II,1,iii_II,1,iv^1]	tatra saptamena tāvat santi dharmāḥ iti ucyate aṣṭamena ca ime asya iti ittham prayoktavyāḥ iti navamena daśam aikādaśa dvādaśaiḥ etāvantaḥ prayoktavyāḥ na atas adhikāḥ iti tatra idam vicāryate kim yaji prayuktāḥ ete dharmāḥ katham yajiḥ guṇavān syāt iti evam artham āmnāyante āhosvit apūrva prayuktāḥ katham apūrvam syāt iti yadi yaji prayuktāḥ tatas sarva arthāḥ atha apūrva prayuktāḥ tatas yathāprakaraṇam vyavatiṣṭhante kim punar atra yuktam apūrva prayuktāḥ iti apūrvam hi phalavat aphalaḥ yajiḥ phalavati ca prayāsaḥ vidhīyamānaḥ arthavān bhavati tasmāt apūrva prayuktāḥ dharmāḥ atas parama ācāryasya sūtra upanyāsaḥ śruti pramāṇa tvāt śeṣāṇām mukhya bhede yathā adhikāram bhāvaḥ syāt iti mukhyāni apūrvāṇi 
[II,1,iv^2]	tāni hi phalavat tvāt pradhānāni pradhāne ca mukhya śabdaḥ teṣām bhedaḥ uktaḥ śabda antara ādibhiḥ hetubhiḥ tasmin mukhya bhede sati yathā adhikāram bhāvaḥ syāt śeṣāṇām ye yasya apūrvasya adhikāre prakaraṇe śiṣyante te tasya eva bhaveyuḥ śruti pramāṇa tvāt ayam asya apūrvasya śeṣaḥ ayam asya iti atra śrutiḥ eva pramāṇam kramate na pratyakṣa ādīnām anyatamat śrutyā ca ye yasya prakaraṇe śrūyante te tasya eva bhavitum arhanti na ca anyasya uktaḥ arthaḥ anyasya bhavati na hi yat devadattasya grāmāt chādana ādikam tat yajñadattasya bhavati tasmāt yathāprakaraṇam vyavasthā dharmāṇām 
[II,2,i_II,2,ii]	utpatti artha avibhāgāt vā satva vada eka dharmyam syāt atha vā na etat evam yathāprakaraṇam dharmāṇām vyavasthā iti kim tarhi aika dharmyam syāt iti samāna dharma tā sarve dharmāḥ sarva arthāḥ kutas utpatti artha avibhāgāt utpattiḥ iti yajim brūmaḥ apūrvasya utpādanāt arthaḥ iti apūrvam brūmaḥ yaji prayojana tvāt tayoḥ avibhāgaḥ sarvāṇi apūrvāṇi yajimanti yaji saṃyogena dharmāḥ śiṣyante yajeta iti uktvā uktāḥ te yajau na saṃbhavanti tasya aphala tvāt tatra asaṃbhavantaḥ tad saṃbaddheṣu apūrveṣu vijñāyante sa ca yaji saṃbandhaḥ sarveṣām apūrvāṇām tulyaḥ tasmāt sarva arthāḥ bhavanti satva dharma vat yathā satva dharmāḥ gauḥ na padā praṣṭavyaḥ iti go tva saṃbandhena śrūyamāṇāḥ tatra asaṃbhavantaḥ tad saṃbaddheṣu piṇḍeṣu vijñāyante tasya ca go tva saṃbandhasya aviśeṣāt sarva gavīṣu śukla nīla kapilakapotikāsu bhavanti evam iha api 
[II,3,i_II,3,ii]	ucyate viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ tatra go sāmāni asaṃbandhena dharmāḥ vidhīyante gauḥ na padā praṣṭavyaḥ iti iha punar yaji viśeṣa saṃbandhena dharmāḥ vidhīyante darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti jyotiṣṭomena yajeta iti viśiṣṭa yaji saṃbaddhaḥ eva apūrve bhavitum arhanti na sarvatra iti tatra brūmaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta ittham iti yadi yajiḥ vidhīyeta na dharmaiḥ saṃbadhyeta na hi dvayoḥ vidhīyamānayoḥ paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ bhavati anuvādaḥ ca san aviśeṣāt sarva yāga anuvādaḥ tasmāt sarvathā dharmāḥ nanu darśa pūrṇamāsa śabdaḥ viśeṣakaḥ bhaviṣyati na darśa pūrṇamāsa śabdaḥ śaknoti yāgam viśeṣṭum ayam hi vidhiḥ vā syāt anuvādaḥ vā yadā anuvādaḥ tadā dharma saṃbandha arthaḥ sa ca dharma saṃbandhaḥ yāga anuvādena eva tayoḥ siddhaḥ 
[II,3,iii]	nanu nivṛtti karaḥ bhaviṣyati darśa pūrṇamāsau eva ittham kuryāt na anyān iti na evam śakyam yat kāraṇam na tasya anya nivṛttiḥ arthaḥ nanu parisaṃkhyayā kariṣyati na atra parisaṃkhyā yujyate yadi anyena vākyena yāga mātre dharma prasaṅgaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt tatas etat punarvacanam parisaṃkhyām kuryāt atha punar asati prasaṅge anena eva prasaṅgaḥ anena eva nivṛttiḥ iti atibhāraḥ ekasya eva vākyasya bhavati evam tarhi na atra yajeta iti śabdaḥ dharma vidhibhiḥ saṃbadhyate yajeta ittham iti kena tarhi darśa pūrṇamāsa śabdena pratyakṣaḥ hi tena asya saṃyogaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti parokṣaḥ dharma vidhibhiḥ kaḥ tadā vākya arthaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau kuryāt iti na evam śakyam evam sati dharmāḥ asaṃbaddhāḥ pāriplavāḥ bhavanti katham kṛtvā yā iyam ākhyātikī vibhaktiḥ yajeta iti sā darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ kartavyatām vidadhāti tatra katham yāga mātreṇa yāga viśeṣeṇa vā dharma saṃbandhaḥ syāt vidhāyikā vibhaktiḥ na asti iti asaṃbaddhāḥ dharmāḥ bhavanti 
[II,4,i]	na eṣa doṣaḥ na vayam vākyena dharmāṇām saṃbandham kariṣyāmaḥ kena tarhi prakaraṇena katham kartavyatāyām coditāyām itikartavya tā kāṅkṣā bhavati katham kuryāt iti prakaraṇena dharmāḥ saṃbadhyante ittham kuryāt iti na evam śakyam yadā hi darśa pūrṇamāsau kartavya tayā codyate tadā itikartavyatā kāṅkṣā eva na asti prajñāta iti karti avyata tvāt tayoḥ asatyām ca iti kartavyatā kāṅkṣāyām prakaraṇam eva na asti evam hi uktam asaṃyuktam prakaraṇāt itikartavya tā arthi tvāt iti 
[II,4,ii_II,4,iii]	evam tarhi na eva atra yāge dharmāḥ vidhīyante na api darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ kartavyatā ucyate kim tarhi darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti pada dvayena viśiṣṭam yāgam anūdya atra dharmāḥ vidhīyante darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta ittham iti evam api darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti anuvādaḥ na yujyate tṛtīya arthasya asiddha tvāt pūrvān anuvādaḥ bhavati apūrvaḥ ca tṛtīya arthaḥ saḥ avaśyam vidhātavyaḥ tasmin ca vidhīyamāne anyat eva asaṃbaddham āpadyate darśa pūrṇamāsau yajeḥ karaṇam iti tasmāt saḥ eva prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ astu yāga anuvādena dharmāṇām vidhiḥ iti nanu tatra api darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti etat na saṃbadhyate nanu saṃbhantsyate kāla vacanaḥ san prāyikaḥ nitya anuvādaḥ bhaviṣyati prāyeṇa yāgānām darśa pūrṇamāsa kāla tvāt tṛtīyā ca kālasya artha kṛtam guṇa bhāvam ālocya upapadyate tathā ced sarve dharmāḥ sarva arthāḥ bhavanti 
[II,5,i_II,5,ii]	codanā aśeṣa bhāvāt vā tad bhedāt vyavatiṣṭheran utpatteḥ guṇa bhūta tvāt karma codanāyāḥ śeṣa bhūtaḥ dharma samāmnāya eka deśa bhūtaḥ iti arthaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta anayā agni avādhānādikayā itikartavyatayā iti tasyām codanāyām yajeḥ guṇa bhāvaḥ śrūyate darśa pūrṇamāsa śabdaḥ yajivacanaḥ karaṇa bhāvaḥ atra yajeḥ śrūyate darśa pūrṇamāsa ākhyena yāga samudāyena anyat kuryāt iti yat tatas anyat tad kartavya tayā codyate na yajiḥ apūrvam ca tat 
[II,5,iii]	nanu phalam atra vākye śrūyate svarga kāmaḥ yateta iti tat kartavyam syāt satyam śrūyate na tu tad yajinā kriyate vinaṣṭe yajau tat bhavati apūrvam tu tena kriyate tasmāt tasya kartavyatā ucyate yasya kartavyatā tat itikartavya tayā saṃbadhyate tasmāt apūrva arthāḥ dharmāḥ teṣām ca apūrvāṇām bhedaḥ atas tad bhedāt yathāprakaraṇam vyavatiṣṭhante dharmāḥ iti 
[II,5,iv]	atha etasmin pakṣe katham darśa pūrṇamāsa śabdena yāgaḥ viśeṣyate ucyate na eva atra yāgaḥ viśiṣyate kim tarhi apūrva bhāvanā eva ubhaya pada viśiṣṭa ucyate yathā aruṇayā piṅga akṣya ekahāyanyā somam krīṇāti iti viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ tatra hi anyat dravyam anyaḥ guṇaḥ tena tatra ubhaya viśeṣaṇa tvam yujyate iha punar yāgaḥ eva tau darśa pūrṇamāsau tena iha ubhaya viśeṣaṇa tvam na yujyate ucyate iha api yajeta iti sāmānyam darśa pūrṇamāsau iti viśeṣaḥ anyat ca sāmānyam anyaḥ viśeṣaḥ 
[II,6,i]	evam api śrutyā sāmānyena bhāvanā vākyāt viśeṣeṇa na ca etat yugapad bhavati iti evam tarhi na eva atra śruti arthe parigṛhyate kim tarhi vākya arthaḥ kim kāraṇam śruti arthe parigṛhyamāṇe darśa pūrṇamāsa śabdaḥ anarthakaḥ bhavati yajatiḥ ca anuvādaḥ yajati ātmaka tvāt darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ yajati sāmāna adhikaraṇyāt ca darśa pūrṇamāsa śabdasya 
[II,6,ii_II,6,iii]	satve lakṣaṇa saṃyogāt sārvatrikam pratīyeta yat tu satva vat iti atra gavā ākṛtau dharmaḥ śrūyate ākṛteḥ padārtha tvāt na ca tatra saṃbhavati atas asau ākṛtiḥ sahacāri piṇḍa lakṣaṇa arthā vijñāyate yathā gaṅgāyām gāvaḥ iti tat ca sāhacaryam sarva piṇḍānām aviśiṣṭam iti sarva piṇḍeṣu vihitam bhavati tasmāt tat sārvatrikam pratīyeta iha tu yajeḥ guṇa bhavena śravaṇāt na eva yajau dharmāḥ śrūyante kim tarhi apūrvaḥ iti evam apadiṣṭaḥ hetuḥ tasmāt anupanyāsaḥ satva vat iti 
[II,6,iv_II,6,v]	avibhāgāt tu na evam syāt atha tuśabdaḥ pakṣa vyāvṛttau na etat evam apūrva prayuktāḥ dharmāḥ iti yaji prayuktāḥ eva kutas avibhāgāt yajina avibhāgaḥ dharmāṇām pratyakṣam kecid dravye śrūyante kecid devatāyām kecid mantreṣu eṣa ca yajiḥ yat dravyam devatām uddiśya mantreṇa tyajyate saḥ eṣa pratyakṣaḥ yajinā saṃbandhaḥ dharmāṇām apūrveṇa tu ānumānikaḥ phale api yajeḥ pratyakṣa śrutaḥ guṇa bhāvaḥ svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti ānumānikaḥ apūrveṇa anumānāt ca pratyakṣam balīyaḥ tasmāt yaji arthāḥ dharmāḥ 
[II,7,i]	nanu yajiḥ bhaṅgi tvāt kāla antare phalam dātum asamarthaḥ tatra kṛtā dharmāḥ asamarthāḥ eva bhavati iti uktam atra sthitasya nyāyasya ākṣepeṇa pratyavasthānam kriyate taila pāna vat etat bhaviṣyati yathā taila pānam ghṛta pānam vā bhaṅgi tve api sati kāla antare medhā smṛti bala puṣṭi ādīni phalāni karoti evam yajiḥ api kariṣyati kim naḥ adṛṣṭa aśrutena apūrveṇa kalpitena iti 
[II,7,ii_II,7,iii]	dvi artha tvam ca vipratiṣiddham evam ca sati sarve dharmāḥ sarva arthāḥ bhavanti tathā ca aindra agna ādiṣu prayāja ādayaḥ santi tatra saurye karmaṇi prayājānām darśanam upapadyate prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalam juhoti iti itarathā prayājāḥ ca vidhātavyāḥ prayājeṣu ca kṛṣṇa lahomaḥ tathā ca dvi artham tat syāt dvi artha tvam ca vipratiṣiddham tasmāt yaji prayuktāḥ dharmāḥ iti 
[II,7,iv_II,7,v^1]	utpattau vidhi abhāvāt vā codanāyām pravṛttiḥ syāt tatas ca karma bhedaḥ syāt na etat evam yaji prayuktāḥ dharmāḥ iti codanāyām pravṛttiḥ syāt codanā iti apūrvam brūmaḥ codanā artha tvāt apūrva artha tvāt apūrva prayuktāḥ dharmāḥ phalavat tvāt iti uktaḥ hetuḥ yat tu prayakṣaḥ yaji saṃbandhaḥ dharmāṇām iti atra brūmaḥ utpattau vidhi abhāvāt utpattiḥ iti yajim brūmaḥ utpattau yajau na asti vidhiḥ yaji arthāḥ dharmāḥ iti kevalam yajau śrūyante kriyante ca na etāvatā tad arthāḥ bhavanti yathā vāsasi rāgaḥ śrūyate vāsaḥ rañjayati iti vāsasi ca kriyate na ca asau tad arthaḥ strī arthaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ vā bhavati 
[II,7,v^2]	evam iha api yajau śrūyamāṇāḥ kriyamāṇāḥ ca apūrva arthāḥ bhaveyuḥ arthavat tvāya tatas ca karma bhedaḥ syāt yatas apūrva arthāḥ iti yat tu yajeḥ pratyakṣam phale guṇa bhāvaḥ iti na kṛtvā apūrvam bhavati iti prāṇālikaḥ vijñāyate praṇāḍya api ca yena kriyate tat kāraṇam bhavati yathā gomayaiḥ pacati tuṣa pakvāḥ bhavanti iti yat tu taila pāna vat yajitaḥ phalam bhavati iti atra brūmaḥ taila pānasya api na kāla antare phalam bhavati dhātu sāmyam tasya phalam tat ca tad kālam eva yat ca phalam bala puṣṭi ādi tat samyak āhāra pariṇāmāt bhavati tasmāt viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ 
[II,8,i_II,8,ii]	yadi vā api abhidhāna vat sāmānyāt sarva dharmaḥ syāt yadi api apūrvam prayojakam dharmāṇām tathā api sarva dharmaḥ syāt sa sa padārthaḥ abhidhāna vat sāmānyāt abhidhānam tāvat eteṣām samānam apūrvam iti abhidhāna vat dharmeṇa api asya samānena bhavitavyam vāhīka vat yathā vāhīkaḥ atithiḥ āgataḥ yava annam asmai prakriyatām iti ukte yaḥ yaḥ vāhīkaḥ tasya tasya yava annam kriyate yathā vā akṣi āmaye mudga odanaḥ bhoktavyaḥ udara āmaye payaḥ pātavyam iti sarvatra ca hi akṣi āmaye mudga odanaḥ bhujyate udara āmaye api payaḥ pīyate evam iha api ekasya apūrvasya ye dharmāḥ śrutāḥ te sarva apūrvāṇām bhavitum arhanti 
[II,9,i]	api ca aruṇa parāśarāḥ nāma śākhinaḥ teṣām paricareṣu smṛti rūpam brāhmaṇam bhavati ye darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ dharmāḥ te sarva iṣṭīnām agnīṣomīyasya ca iti ārabhya yāvat sarvāḥ prakṛti vikṛtayaḥ anukta antāḥ iti tat ca anukramaṇam etam eva nyāyam sūcayati tasmāt apūrva prayukta tve api sarve dharmāḥ sarva arthāḥ iti 
[II,9,ii_II,9,iii]	arthasya tu avibhakta tvāt tathā syāt abhidhāneṣu pūrvavat tvāt prayogasya karmaṇaḥ śabda bhāvya tvāt vibhāgāt śeṣāṇām apravṛttiḥ syāt upavarṇanā parihāraḥ tāvat ucyate yat uktam vāhīka vat iti atra brūmaḥ arthasya tu avibhakta tvāt tathā syāt abhidhāneṣu arthaḥ vā āhīka tvam tad deśa saṃbandhaḥ saḥ avibhaktaḥ sarva vāhīkeṣu anugataḥ iti arthaḥ tad nimittaḥ ca prīti viśeṣaḥ na puruṣa nimittaḥ katham jñāyate pūrvavat tvāt prayogasya pūrvavān atra prayogaḥ bahuśas vāhīkāḥ ca āvāhīkāḥ ca bhojitāḥ tatra anvaya vyatirekābhyām jñatam etat deśa nimittā iyam yavān apriya tā na puruṣa nimitta tā tasmāt tathā syāt vāhīka ādiṣu abhidhāneṣu atha iha karmaṇaḥ śabda bhāvya tvam na anyatas śakyam etat jñātum kasya apūrvasya dharmāḥ iti śabdena ca vyavasthitāḥ vijñātāḥ dharmāḥ apūrvāṇām ca vibhāgaḥ atas śeṣāṇām anyatra vihitānām anyatra apravṛttiḥ syāt 
[II,10,i_II,10,ii]	smṛtiḥ iti ced atha yat uktam smṛtiḥ iti tasya kaḥ parihāraḥ 
[II,10,iii_II,10,iv]	na pūrvavat tvāt pūrvavatī hi iyam smṛtiḥ ca udakam dharma grāhakam vakyati vidhyantaḥ vā prakṛti vat iti tena prāpitānām dharmāṇām ayam anuvādaḥ etat nyāya pūrvikā na aprāptānām vidhāyikā yat kāraṇam vyavasthā dharmāṇām etena nyāyena bhavati 
[II,10,v_II,10,vi]	arthasya śabda bhāvya tvāt prakaraṇa nibandhanāt śabdāt eva anyatra bhāvaḥ syāt idam nigamana sūtram nigamanam ca pratijñāyāḥ hetoḥ ca punarvacanam tat idam ucyate yasmāt evam tasmāt arthasya agni anvādhāna ādeḥ śabda bhāvya tvāt pratiprakaraṇam ca nibandhanāt śabdāt eva anyatra bhāvaḥ syāt yathā gandharva apsarasaḥ vā etam unmādayanti yaḥ unmādyati etāḥ vai gandharva apsarasaḥ yat rāṣṭra bhṛtam tasmai svāhā tābhyaḥ svāhā iti juhoti iti agni prakaraṇe utpannānām rāṣṭrabhṛtām udvāhe upadeśaḥ eteṣām rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ juhoti abhyātānām juhoti iti asti etasmin vacane yathā adhikāram vyavatiṣṭheran dharmāḥ iti evam ca sati adharmakāṇi aindra agna ādīṇi tad artham uttaraḥ adhyāya ṣaṭkaḥ prārabdhavyaḥ iti 
[II,10,vii]	tatra saptam ena tāvat aindra agna ādīnām karmaṇām dharmāḥ santi iti ucyate te ca ati deśena iti atideśaḥ nāma ye paratra vihitāḥ dharmāḥ tam atītya anyatra teṣām deśaḥ yathā devadattasya bhojana vidhim kṛtvā śāli sūpa māṃsa apūpaiḥ devadattaḥ bhojayitavyaḥ iti tam eva vidhim yajñadatte atidiśati devadatta vat yajñadattaḥ bhojayitavyaḥ iti ślokam api udāharanti 
[II,11,i_II,11,iv]	prakṛtāt karmaṇaḥ yasmāt tad samāneṣu karmasu dharma pradeśaḥ yena syāt saḥ atideśaḥ iti sthitiḥ iti sa ca nāmnā vacanena vā tatra nāma trividham atideśakam karmanām saṃskāranām yaugikam iti vacanam punar dvividham pratyakṣa śrutam ānumānikam ca tayoḥ ānumānikam upariṣṭāt vakṣyate pratyakṣa śrutam tu idānīm eva cintyate asti iṣunām aika ahaḥ aparaḥ śyenaḥ tau dvau api ābhicārikau tatra iṣau kāṃścid dharmān vidhāya āha samānam itarat śyenena iti etat cintyate kim ayam anuvādaḥ vidhiḥ iti yadi vidhiḥ tatas ati deśaḥ śyena dhamān iṣau atidiśati atha anuvādaḥ tatas na iti tatra kim prāptam tat sūtreṇa eva upakramyate 
[II,11,v_II,11,vi]	samāne pūrvavat tvāt utpanna adhikāraḥ syāt samānam itarat śyenena iti atra utpanna adhikāraḥ syāt anuvādaḥ iti arthaḥ kutas pūrvavat tvāt ayam iṣuḥ pūrvavān jyotiṣṭoma pūrvakaḥ jyautiṣṭomikaḥ atra vidhyante iti arthaḥ atra ca udakena utpannāḥ jyautiṣṭomikāḥ dharmāḥ santi śyenaḥ api jyotiṣṭoma pūrvakaḥ tatra api te santi ye iṣau śyene ca samānāḥ bhanti tān adhikṛtya ayam vādaḥ yujyate tasmāt utpanna adhikāra tvāt anuvādaḥ 
[II,12,i]	kim ca itarat iti ca abhāve na upapadyate itara śabdaḥ ca āsannihite anupapannaḥ sannihitaḥ eva bhavati yathā itaraḥ ādhāraḥ dīyatām itaraḥ kambalaḥ dīyatām iti sannihitaḥ dīyate na prāvāra mātram kambala mātram vā jyautiṣṭomikāḥ ca sannihitāḥ tasmāt teṣām vādaḥ teṣām ca idam anuvādaḥ vihitāḥ hi te ca udakena iti 
[II,12,ii_II,12,iii]	śyenasya iti ced iti ced paśyasi jyautiṣṭomikānām anuvādaḥ iti na evam śyenasya vaiśeṣikāṇām lohita uṣṇīṣa ādīnām dharmāṇām vidhiḥ kutas śyena grahaṇa sāmarthyāt evam śyena grahaṇam arthavat bhaviṣyati dharmān viśeṣayat itaratha anarthakam syāt sarveṣām hi eka ahā hīna satrāṇām te samānāḥ tatra yāvat uktam syāt samānam itarat iti tāvat eva samānam itarat śyenena iti 
[II,12,iv_II,12,v]	na asannidhānāt na ayam śyena vaiśeṣikāṇām vādaḥ yujyate kasmāt asannidhānāt ayam itara śabdaḥ sannihite bhavati na ca śyena śabdena vaiśeṣikāḥ iṣau sannihitāḥ yat tu śyena śabdaḥ vaiśeṣikaḥ bhavati iti vidhi pakṣe avaiśeṣika tvam doṣaḥ syāt anuvāda pakṣe tu na eva kaścid vidhīyate kim viśeṣyati jyautiṣṭomikāḥ tu sarva sādhāraṇāḥ santaḥ śyenasya api bhavanti iti anuvādaḥ yujyate tasmāt jyautiṣṭomikānām eva anuvādaḥ 
[II,13,i_II,13,ii]	api vā yadi apūrva tvāt itarat adhika arthe jyautiṣṭomikāt vidheḥ tad vācakam samānam syāt api vā iti pakṣa antara parigrahe vidhiḥ ayam śyena vaiśeṣikāṇām jyautiṣṭomikānām anuvādaḥ kutas apūrva tvāt evam apūrvam artham vidhāsyati tathā pravṛtti viśeṣa karaḥ bhaviṣyati anuvādaḥ san apravṛtti viśeṣa karaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt nanu itara śabdaḥ ayam sannihite bhvati ucyate itarat adhika arthe samānam itarat samānam adhikam iti arthaḥ 
[II,13,iii]	nanu sannihita vacanaḥ ayam na adhika arthaḥ iti ucyate na kevalam ayam sannihita vacanaḥ eva pūrva ukta sadṛśam asannihitam api brūte avaśiṣṭam ca yadā hi vastrāṇi anukramya itara śabdaḥ prayujyate devadattāya kambalaḥ dīyatām viṣṇu mitrāya kauśeyam yajñadattāya kṣaumam itarat caitrāya iti tadā vastram eva pradīyate na hiraṇyam rajatam vā iha jyautiṣṭomikebhyaḥ adhikān dharmān anukramya itara śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ tena atra api adhikān eva vaktum arhati tathā adhika vacanaḥ bhvati 
[II,13,iv]	atha jyautiṣṭomikān brūte tathā sannihita vacanaḥ tatra avaśyam anyatarat dheyam yadi adhika artha tām hitvā sannihita artha tā śrīyate anuvāda mātram anarthakam bhavati śyena śabdaḥ ca avivakṣita arthaḥ atha sannihita artha tām hitvā adhika artha tā gṛhyate na kaścid doṣaḥ bhavati tasmāt sūtrakāraḥ āha itarat adhika arthaḥ iti atas jyautiṣṭomikāt vidheḥ adhikāḥ śyena vaiśeṣikāḥ ye te iha atidiśyante tad vācakam samānam syāt samāna śabdaḥ syāt iti arthaḥ bhavati śyena śabdaḥ ca vivakṣitaḥ 
[II,14,i]	cāturmāsyānām vaiśvadevaḥ āgneya ādīni havīṃṣi sārtha vāda vākyaiḥ vihitāni dharmāḥ ca teṣām uktāḥ varuṇa praghāseṣu kevalāni havīṃṣi āmnāya yat vaiśvadevikānām brāhmaṇam tat teṣām atidiśyate etat brāhmaṇāni eva pañca havīṃṣi yat brāhmaṇāni itarāṇi iti tatra kim arthavāda mātrasya ayam atideśaḥ uta sārthavādakasya sa vidhikasya kāṇḍasya iti katham punar arthavāda mātrasya atideśaḥ bhavati yathā pampā kulāya pratimāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti ke punar vidhayaḥ ke artha vādāḥ tredhā sannaddham barhiḥ bhavati tredhā sannaddhaḥ idhmaḥ nava prayājāḥ nava anuyājāḥ iti evamādayaḥ vidhayaḥ vārta ghnāni vā etāni havīṃṣi iti artha vādāḥ tatra idam ucyate 
[II,14,ii_II,15,i]	pañca saṃcareṣu arthavāda atideśaḥ sannidhānāt pañcatāni havīṃṣi sarva parvasu saṃcaranti iti pañca saṃcarāṇi iti ucyante teṣu pañca saṃcareṣu arthavāda mātrasya atideśaḥ iti kutas sannidhānāt dhaviṣām sannihitāḥ artha vādāḥ vidhibhiḥ eka vākya saṃbaddha tvāt na dharma vidhayaḥ kim atas atas etat bhavati yat pūrveṣām brāhmaṇam iti vyapadeśaḥ yujyate tat dhi teṣām brāhmaṇam yena vidhīyante kaḥ anyaḥ haviṣām brāhmaṇasya ca saṃbandhaḥ anyatra vidheya vidhāyaka bhāvāt artha vādaiḥ ca etāni vidhīyante na dharma vidhibhiḥ dharma vidhibhiḥ tu yāni vidhīyante na tāni havīṃṣi tasmāt artha vādānām atideśaḥ na dharma vidhīnām api ca varuṇa praghāseṣu api kecid vaiśvadevikāḥ dharmāḥ vidhīyante yathā agnim mathnanti prasuvaḥ bhavanti iti teṣām atideśena vihitānām punar āmnānam anarthakam syāt yadi vidhayaḥ atidiśyeran tasmāt arthavāda atideśaḥ iti 
[II,15,ii_II,15,iii]	sarvasya vā eka śabdyāt na etat evam arthavāda mātrasya atideśaḥ iti sa vidhikasya sārthavādakasya kāṇḍasya atideśaḥ iti kutas aika śabdyāt samāna śabda tvāt iti arthaḥ samānaḥ ayam brāhmaṇam iti śabdaḥ vidhīnām artha vādānām ca sa yathā artha vādān gṛhṇāti evam vidhīn api gṛhṇāti ced tān api atidiśati yat tu vidhīnām havirbhiḥ saṃbandhaḥ na asti iti vidheya vidhāyaka saṃbandhaḥ na asti upakāra lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ bhaviṣyati kaḥ upakāraḥ yaḥ eṣām aṅgāni vidadhāti asti ced saṃbandhaḥ brāhmaṇa śabda śrutyā sarva atideśaḥ nyāyyaḥ iti 
[II,15,iv_II,15,v]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam ca vidhīnām atideśam darśayati kim liṅgam varuṇa praghāseṣu triṃśat āhutayaḥ vājinaḥ yajanti āhutīnām saṃpattyai triṃśat tvāya iti varuṇa praghāse triṃśatam āhutīḥ darśayati yadi vidhayaḥ na atidiśyeran tāḥ na syuḥ tasmāt atidiśyante 
[II,16,i_II,16,ii]	vihitāmnānāt na iti ced vihita āmnānāt iti yat uktam tasya kaḥ parihāraḥ ābhāṣā antam sūtram 
[II,16,iii_II,16,iv]	na itara artha tvāt atra ucyate vidhi ati deśe api sati na agni manthana ādīnām āmnānam anarthakam itarasya haviṣaḥ arthena bhaviṣyati dakṣiṇa vaihārikasya mārutyāḥ tasmāt na etat jñāpakam vidhīnām anatideśasya bhaviṣyati 
[II,16,v_II,16,vi]	ekakapāla aindra agnau ca tadvat vaiśvadeve eka kapālaḥ āmnātaḥ dyāvāpṛthivīyaḥ eka kapālaḥ iti varuṇa praghāseṣu api kāyaḥ eka kapālaḥ iti tatra aparaḥ aindrāgnaḥ dvādaśa kapālaḥ māruti āmikṣāḥ iti tathā sākamedheṣu api eka kapāla aindrāgnau āmnātau aindrāgne ekādaśa kapālaḥ indrāya vṛtra ghne caruḥ vaiśvakarmaṇaḥ eka kapālaḥ iti tatra idam āmnātam etat brāhmaṇaḥ aindrāgnaḥ etat brāhmaṇaḥ eka kapālaḥ yat brāhmaṇaḥ itaraḥ itaraḥ ca iti tatra idam ucyate ekakapāla aindra agnau ca tadvat yadvat pañca saṃcarāṇi atra api sa vidhikasya sārthavādakasya kāṇḍasya atideśaḥ tena eva nyāyena iti prāpti sūtram etat uttara cintā artham 
[II,17,i_II,17,iii]	eka kapālānām vaiśvadevikaḥ prakṛtiḥ āgrayaṇe sarva homā parivṛtti darśanāt avabhṛthe ca sakṛt dvi avadānasya vacanāt sākamedhe śrūyate etat brāhmaṇaḥ eka kapālaḥ iti tatra cintyate vaiśvadevikasya eka kapālasya idam grahaṇam uta vāruṇa prāghāsikasya iti kim prāptam vaiśvadevikasya iti brūmaḥ kim kāraṇam tasya vihitāḥ dharmāḥ alaṃkṛtya abhipūrya upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ āvis pṛṣṭaḥ kāryaḥ iti evamādayaḥ vāruṇa prāghāsikaḥ tu adharmakaḥ yasya vihitāḥ dharmāḥ tatra etat yujyate vaktum tadvat idam kartavyam iti tasmāt vaiśvadevikasya grahaṇam nanu aindrāgna samuccāraṇāt eka kapālaḥ api vāruṇa prāghāsikaḥ eva syāt na avaśyam eka parvaṇoḥ eva samuccāraṇena bhavitavyam nānā parvaṇoḥ api samuccāraṇam aviruddham tasmāt vaiśvadevikasya grahaṇam 
[II,17,iv^1]	iti prāpte ucyate vāruṇa prāghāsikasya eka kapālasya grahaṇam iti kutas tatas eka kapālānām vaiśvadevikaḥ prakṛtiḥ katham jñāyate āgrayaṇe sarva homā parivṛtti darśanāt āgrayaṇe dyāvāpṛthivīyasya eka kapālasya sarva homam aparyāvṛttim ca darśayati yat sarva hutam karoti sā tu ekā paricakṣā hutaḥ hutaḥ paryāvartate sā dvitīyā ājyasya eva dyāvāpṛthivyau yaja iti iti ājya yāga vidhi pare vākyaḥ eka kapālasya sarva homam aparyāvṛttim ca prāptām darśayati etasmāt darśanāt avabhṛthe ca sakṛt dvi avadānasya vacanāt avabhṛte ca avadhāraṇam bhavati idam eva eka kapālasya dvis avadyati iti 
[II,17,iv^2]	tena jñāyate nūnam anyatra na dvis avadānam iti tat ca etat sarvam vaiśvadevikaḥ eka kapāle vihitam tasmāt eka kapālānām vaiśvadevikaḥ prakṛtiḥ kim atas sākamedhike api eka kapāle vaiśvadevikāḥ dharmāḥ prāptāḥ teṣām atideśaḥ anarthakaḥ vāruṇa prāghāsikasya ye dharmāḥ vaiśeṣikāḥ aprāptāḥ teṣām atideśaḥ arthavān tasmāt vāruṇa prāghāsikasya eka kapālasya idam grahaṇam iti ucyate liṅgam etat kutas prāptiḥ iti prāptim uttaratra vakṣyāmaḥ svara sāma eka kapāla āmikṣam ca iti atra ke punar te dharmāḥ hiraṇya mayaḥ sruvaḥ śamī mayaḥ vā iti evamādayaḥ 
[II,19,i_II,19,iii]	sāmnaḥ abhidhāna śabdena pravṛttiḥ syāt yathāśiṣṭam idam śrūyate rathantaram uttarayoḥ gāyati kavatīṣu rathantaram gāyati iti evamādīni samāmnāyante tatra cintā kim iha atidiśyate iti nanu yat rathantara ādibhiḥ śabdaiḥ ucyate tat atidiśyate bāḍham tat eva tu na jñāyate kim ebhiḥ śabdaiḥ ucyate iti 
[II,19,iv]	nanu siddham etat gīteṣu sāma ākhyāḥ iti tathā siddhasya ākṣepaḥ kariṣyate saḥ eva tu nirṇayaḥ bhaviṣyati yadi saḥ eva nirṇayaḥ kim arthaḥ ākṣepaḥ dārḍhya arthaḥ sthūṇā nikhanana vat tatra kim prāptam tat ucyate sa stobha svara kāla abhyāsa vikārāyām hiṅkāra praṇava prastāva udgītha pratihāra upadrava nidhanavatyām ṛci gītau sāma śabdaḥ abhiyuktaiḥ upacaryate tasmāt saṃśayaḥ 
[II,19,v]	ucyate nanu gītau satyām bhāvāt nānā ākhyasya saṃskāra karmaṇaḥ vācakāḥ ete śabdāḥ iti uktam tat eva idam uktam ākṣipyate na ime saṃskārasya vācakāḥ kim kāraṇam akarma kāle prayogāt akarma kāle sāma prayujyate na ca saṃskāra karmaṇi prokṣaṇa avakṣepaṇa paryagni karaṇa ādīni akarma kāle prayujyante prayojana abhāvāt atha nu mantrāḥ ete tatas anu aham su ādhyaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti niyamāt akarma kāle prayogaḥ yujyate tasmāt ṛcām nāmāni 
[II,20,i_II,20,ii]	kim ca saṃjñā bhedāt saṃjñā bhedaḥ ca bhavati rathantaram bṛhat iti evamādiḥ saḥ eka tvāt saṃskāra karmaṇaḥ anarthakaḥ ekena eva hi tadā paryāptam yathā gītiḥ iti atha ṛcām nāmāni tatas tāsām bhedāt saṃjñā pṛthak tvam yuktam api ca yadi gānam rathantaram gānam ca bṛhat idam rathantaram idam bṛhat iti pṛthaktvena saṃjñā niveśaḥ na upapadyate ṛc nāma tve tu upapadyate 
[II,20,iii]	kim ca vikāra pṛthaktvāt tu pratisāma ca vikāra pṛthaktvāt pratisāma ca vikāra pṛthaktvam dṛśyate tat eka tvāt gānasya anupapannam saṃskāra bhede hi vikāra pṛthaktvam dṛṣṭam tat yathā avahanteḥ taṇḍulībhāvaḥ piṣeḥ cūrṇam na tu ekasya taṇḍulībhāvaḥ cūrṇanam ca athar nāmāni etāni tatas ṛcām bhedāt vikāra pṛthaktvam yujyate tasmāt ṛc nāmāni iti tatas uttaram paṭhati sāmnaḥ abhidhāna śabdena pravṛttiḥ syāt yathā āśiṣṭam iti sāmnaḥ abhidhāna śabdena yathā āśiṣṭam pravṛttiḥ syāt yat śiṣṭam pravaktṛbhiḥ śiṣyebhyaḥ kim ca śiṣṭam stoma ādi viśiṣṭā ṛc sāma sā pravarteta kim kāraṇam tasyāḥ rathantara ādi nāmadheyam iti 
[II,20,iv_II,20,v]	śabdaiḥ tu artha vidhi tvāt artha antare apravṛttiḥ syāt pṛthak bhāvāt kriyāyāḥ hi abhisaṃbandhaḥ tuśabdaḥ pakṣa nivṛttau na tu evam syāt ṛcaḥ pravṛttiḥ iti katham iha kavatīṣu rathantaram gāyati iti kavatīnām vā kārye abhivatyaḥ atidiśyeran kavatīnām vā upari ādhārya ādheya bhāvena tatra kārye tāvat atideśaḥ na ghaṭate kutas śabdaiḥ artha vidhi tvāt śabdānām artha vidhānam kāryam na ca kavatīṣu rathantaram gāyati iti kavatībhiḥ yaḥ arthaḥ abhidhīyate tam abhivatyaḥ śaknuvanti vaktum tasmāt na karyā atideśaḥ ādheya tve api na saṃbhavati pṛthak bhāvāt na hi śabdaḥ śabde samavaiti pṛthak eva avatiṣṭhate abhi tvā kayā naḥ iti kriyāyāḥ hi gāna kriyāyāḥ śabdena abhisaṃbandhaḥ bhavet na śabdasya tasmāt ādheya tvena api na ati deśaḥ atas na ayam ṛcaḥ pradeśaḥ iti 
[II,21,i_II,21,iii]	sva arthe vā syāt prayojanam kriyāyāḥ tad aṅga bhāvena upadiśyeran sva artha vā pravartamānāḥ abhivatyaḥ kavatīnām aṅga bhāvena upadiśyeran katham punar kavatīṣu gāyati iti aṅga bhāvaḥ śakyaḥ upadeṣṭum śakyaḥ yathā yena karmaṇā īrtset tatra jayān juhuyāt iti kim punar prayojanam kavatīnām abhivatyaḥ nirvartayanti iti ucyate prayojanam adṛṣṭam kalpyam kutas kriyāyāḥ yasmāt kriyā śrūyate kavatīṣu rathanataram gāyati iti yathā prayāja ādīnām prayojanam kriyāyāḥ ucyate ayam eva asmin pakṣe doṣaḥ yat prayojanam kriyāyāḥ kalpayitavyam tasmāt ayam api pakṣaḥ duḥśliṣṭaḥ 
[II,21,iv_II,21,v]	śabda mātram iti ced iti ced paśyasi kavati aṅga bhāvena abhivatīnām upadeśaḥ duḥśliṣṭaḥ iti tena tarhi śabda mātram pradiśyatām rathantara śabdam kavatīṣu prayuñjīta kavatīḥ rathantara śabdena abhilapet iti kim kāranam śabdaḥ uccarite tatra tāvat mukhyā pratipattiḥ śabde kāryasya asaṃbhavāt arthe kāryam vijñāyate yathā gām ānaya iti iha tu śabdaḥ eva kāryam saṃbhavati na arthe atas atra śabdam vijñāsyāmaḥ 
[II,22,i_II,22,ii]	na autpattika tvāt pūrvasmāt eṣa vādaḥ pāpīyān kasmāt autpattika tvāt autpattikaḥ hi nāmi nāmnoḥ saṃbandhaḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ yasmin arthaḥ autpattikena saṃbandhena prasiddhaḥ na sa tatas anyam pratyāyayitum śaknoti na hi go śabdena aśvaḥ abhidhātum śakyate 
[II,22,iii_II,22,iv]	śāstram ca evam anarthakam syāt evam ca sati atideśa śāstram anarthakam syāt aśakya artha tvāt tasmāt na śabdasya api pradeśaḥ yuktaḥ vṛtti kāraḥ tu mene gāna śāstram aukthikyam anarthakam syāt iti tasya abhiprāyaḥ satyām gatau na etāvān prayāsaḥ śiṣṭānām aphalaḥ abhyupagantum nyāyyaḥ iti 
[II,22,v_II,22,vi]	svarasya iti ced iti ced paśyasi nāmnaḥ ati deśaḥ ayuktaḥ iti tena tarhi svarasya atideśaḥ bhavatu svaraḥ sāma śabdena loke abhidhīyate su sāmā devadattaḥ iti susvaraḥ devadattaḥ iti svaraḥ ghoṣaḥ nādaḥ iti samāna arthāḥ sa sāma śabdena ucyate sāma ca rathantaram tasmāt tasya atideśaḥ 
[II,23,i_II,23,ii]	na artha abhāvāt śruteḥ asaṃbandhaḥ na etat evam svarasya atideśaḥ iti kutas artha abhāvāt arthasya abhāvat arthasya abhivatīsvarasya kavatīṣu abhāvāt nanu asan eva asau atideśena bhāvyate ucyate bhāvayitum api na śakyate na hi abhivati akṣarāṇām abhivyañjakaḥ nādaḥ kavatīṣu bhāvayitum śakyaḥ yadi bhāvyeta na kavatyaḥ bhaveyuḥ na ced bhāvyate na bhūtaḥ kavatīṣu rathantaram gāyati iti etasyāḥ śruteḥ pada antareṇa abhisaṃbandhaḥ na syāt tasmāt na svarasya atideśaḥ 
[II,23,iii_II,23,iv]	svaraḥ tu utpattiṣu syāt mātrā varṇa avibhakta tvāt tuśabdaḥ pakṣa antara parigrahe yadi abhivatīsvarasya kavatīṣu pradeśaḥ na upapadyate anuvādaḥ bhavatu kavatīṣu rathantaram gāyati iti katham tat ucyate iha kavatīṣu ratha natram gāyati iti asya vākyasya dve vacana vyaktī bhavataḥ kavatīṣu yat rathantaram tat gāyati iti ekā rathantaram yat tat kavatīṣu gāyati iti aparā tayoḥ yā eṣā dvitīyā rathantaram yat tat kavatīṣu gāyati iti sā svarasya sāma tve na saṃbhavati iti uktam na hi abhivatīsvaraḥ kavatīṣu samāveśayitum śakyaḥ iti pūrvā tu saṃbhavati kavatīṣu yat rathantaram tat gāyati iti 
[II,23,v]	nanu sā api na saṃbhavati na hi kavatīṣu rathantaram asti atas param ucyate svaraḥ tu utpattiṣu syāt svaraḥ tu abhivatīsvaraḥ kavatīnām utpattiṣu uccāraṇeṣu syāt katham mātrā varṇa avibhakta tvāt bahavaḥ mātrā varṇāḥ ca abhivatīnām kavatīnām ca avibhaktāḥ abhibhavatīṣu api vidyante kavatīṣu api saḥ asau abhivatīsvaraḥ kavatīṣu sādhāraṇa varṇa samavetaḥ vidyate tasya anuvādaḥ ayam ghaṭate kavatīṣu rathantaram gāyati iti tasmāt svarasya anuvādaḥ 
[II,24,i_II,24,ii]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam ca dṛśyate etasmin arthe asti rathantaram uttarayoḥ iti kim tat liṅgam bhavati evam āha rathantaram uttarayoḥ na paśyāmi iti viśvāmitraḥ tapaḥ tepe bṛhat uttarayoḥ na paśyāmi iti vasiṣṭhaḥ iti yat ca vidyamānam na dṛśyate tad darśanāya yatnaḥ kriyate yathā ghaṭam na paśyāmi iti pradīpam karoti na śaśa viṣāṇam na paśyāmi iti tasmāt asti uttarayoḥ rathantaram bṛhat ca tayoḥ anuvādaḥ iti 
[II,24,iii_II,24,iv]	aśruteḥ tu vikārasya uttarāsu yathāśruti tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati na etat evam svarasya anuvādaḥ iti kutas evam sati uttarāsu vikāraḥ na kaścid śrutaḥ bhavati tadā uttarāḥ yathāśrutāḥ prayoktavyāḥ yathā svādhyāya kāle śrutāḥ tatra rathantaram uttarayoḥ gāyati iti etat anuvāda mātram apravṛtti viśeṣa karam anarthakam eva apavadyate atas na svarasya anuvādaḥ yuktaḥ 
[II,25,i_II,25,ii]	śabdānām ca asām añjasyam rathantara ādīnām ca sāma śabdānām asāmañjasyam syāt rathantaram uttarayoḥ bṛhat uttarayoḥ iti katham tat ucyate ayam rathantara śabdaḥ bṛhat śabdaḥ vā svarasya sāma śabda tve svara samudāyaḥ ānupūrvyā vyavasthite svara viśeṣe prayuktaḥ saḥ eka deśe bhinna ānupūrvye vāsamañjasaḥ bhavati tasmāt na etat yuktam svarasya sāma śabdaḥ tasya ca anuvādaḥ iti 
[II,25,iii]	atra āha evam bhavatā sarve pakṣāḥ niruddhāḥ tatas kim apravṛttiḥ eva iti ucyate ṛcaḥ eva pradeśaḥ bhavatu nanu uktam na śakyā ṛcaḥ ṛc antare pradeṣṭum iti bāḍham deśa lakṣaṇā bhaviṣyati kavatīṣu rathantaram gāyati iti ucyate na ca śakyate kavatīṣu rathantaram gātum tatra deśa lakṣaṇā bhavati kavatī deśaḥ iti yathā agnau tiṣṭhati kūpe tiṣṭhati iti dharma lakṣaṇā vā syāt rathantara dharmāḥ vā kavatīṣu rathantara śabdena atidiśyante yathā rathantare prastūyamāne pṛthivīm manasā dhyāyet iti evamādayaḥ yathā ācārye proṣite ācāryānī bhavatām ācāryaḥ iti ācārya śuśruṣa ācāryā anyām atidiśyate 
[II,25,iv_II,25,v]	api tu karma śabdaḥ syāt bhāvaḥ arthaḥ prasiddha grahaṇa tvāt vikāraḥ hi aviśiṣṭaḥ anyaiḥ api tu na evam syāt ṛcaḥ sāma śabdaḥ tasyāḥ ca pradeśaḥ iti tathā deśa lakṣaṇā dharma lakṣaṇā vā āśrayaṇīyā agatiḥ ca eṣā yat lakṣaṇā parigrahaḥ kim tarhi karma śabdaḥ syāt rathantara ādiḥ gāna ākhyasya saṃskāra karmaṇaḥ vācakaḥ kutas uktaḥ nyāyaḥ gītiṣu sāma ākhyāḥ iti atra tatra gīti viśiṣṭāyām ṛci eṣa śabdaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ na ca agṛhīta viśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhiḥ utpadyate tasmāt viśeṣaṇam tāvat abhidhīyate viśeṣaṇa pratyayāt ca sahacarite viśiṣṭe pratyayaḥ atas na asti ṛcaḥ śabdena saṃsparśaḥ iti tena eva nyāyena gīti nāmadheyam iti brūmaḥ 
[II,26,i_II,26,iii]	kim ca prasiddha grahaṇa tvāt ayam ca gāyati iti śabdaḥ gāna kriyāyām prasiddhaḥ kā punar asau śabdasya uccāraṇa viśeṣaḥ gāyati gānam karoti iti tad grahaṇaḥ ca rathantara ādi śabdaḥ tad vacanaḥ iti arthaḥ tena samuccāraṇāt dvitīyā sāmarthyāt ca yathā āsāritakam gāyati iti vardhamānakam gāyati iti nanu śabda vacanena api samuccāraṇam bhavati gāthām gāyati ṛcam gāyati iti satyam vipariṇamya tu śabdam gānena ṛcam saṃskaroti iti yathā nipatitena arthena na saṃbadhyate gānam karoti iti ṛcam iti tasmāt gīti vacanaḥ 
[II,26,iv]	itas ca gīti vacanaḥ kutas vikāraḥ hi aviśiṣṭaḥ anyaiḥ vikāraḥ ca atra ṛgdravyasya dṛśyate hrasvānām akṣarāṇām dīrgha tā dīrghāṇām ca hrasva tvam vivṛtānām saṃvṛta tvam saṃvṛtānām vivṛta tvam saḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ anyaiḥ saṃskāra karmabhiḥ yathā avahantinā vrīhīṇām taṇḍulībhāvaḥ piṣiṇā taṇḍulānām piṣṭībhāvaḥ tasmāt śabdānām saṃskāraḥ gāna ākhyaḥ rathantara ādibhiḥ śabdaiḥ ucyate tasya ayam pradeśaḥ rathantaram uttarayoḥ gāyati iti evamādiḥ 
[II,26,v_II,27,ii]	adravyam ca api dṛśyate api ca adravyam sāma dṛśyate dravya śabdaḥ chandogaiḥ ṛkṣu ācaritaḥ adravyam anṛcam iti arthaḥ anṛcam sāma dṛśyate prajāpateḥ hṛdayam anṛcam gāyati iti prajāpatihṛdayam nāma sāma tat anṛci utpannam yadi ṛci sāma śabdaḥ katham prajāpati hṛdayam anṛcam syāt atha gīteḥ sāma śabdaḥ tatas vinā api ṛcā gītiḥ bhavati tatra etat upapadyate prajāpateḥ hṛdayam anṛcam gāyati iti tasmāt api gītiḥ sāma nanu uktam saṃskāra karma tve anarthakaḥ akarma kāle prayogaḥ iti tatra brūmaḥ 
[II,27,iii_II,27,v]	tasya ca kriyā grahaṇa arthāḥ nānā artheṣu virūpi tvāt arthaḥ hi āsāmalaukikaḥ vidhānāt tasya kriyā karma kāle grahaṇa arthā śikṣitum abhyasitum ca nānā artheṣu nānā bhūteṣu artheṣu bhinneṣu iti arthaḥ virūpi tvāt āśraya bhedāt vividha rūpam tat gānam bhavati tat prati ṛcam śikṣitavyam abhyasitavyam ca prayoga prāśubhāvāya bhūmi rathika vat tat yathā bhūmirathikaḥ bhūmau ratham ālikhya yogyām karoti sā tasya yogyā prayoga kāle saukaryam utpādayati arthaḥ hi āsām rathantara ādi saṃjñānām na laukike vyavahāre siddhaḥ yathāvahanti ādīnām kutas vidhānāt vidhīyate hi asau śiṣya upādhyāya saṃbandhena evaṃrūpam rathantaram bhavati iti na laukikaḥ vijñāyate tasmāt na paricodanā eṣā akarma kāle prayogāt iti atha yat uktam saṃjñā pṛthaktvāt iti tatra ucyate 
[II,27,vi_II,27,vii]	tasmin saṃjñā viśeṣāḥ syuḥ vikāra pṛthaktvāt tasmin ekasmin api gāna ākhye saṃskāre saṃjñā viśeṣāḥ bhaveyuḥ kutas vikāra pṛthaktvāt tulye api gāne viśeṣaḥ bhavati gāna viśeṣāt ca saṃjñā pṛthak tvam yathā āsāritakam vardhamānakam iti anyathā lakṣaṇa āsāritaka gītiḥ anyathā lakṣaṇā vardhamānaka gītiḥ evam iha api anyathā lakṣaṇā rathantara gītiḥ anyathā lakṣaṇā bṛhadgītiḥ tasmāt saṃjñā pṛthak tvam 
[II,28,i_II,28,ii]	yoniśas yāḥ ca tulya vat itarābhiḥ vidhīyante yoniḥ ca asau śasyā ca yoniśasyā yoniśasyāḥ carcaḥ tulya vat itarābhiḥ ayoniśasyābhiḥ vidhīyante yāmyāḥ śaṃsati śipiviṣṭavantīḥ śaṃsati rathantarasya yonim anuśaṃsati bṛhataḥ yonim anuśaṃsati iti kā tatra tulya tā śaṃsati śabdena abhidhānam iha etau stauti śaṃsati śabdau samāne api stuti artha tve vyavasthita viṣayau pragīteṣu mantra vākyeṣu stauti śabdaḥ apragīteṣu śaṃsati śabdaḥ yathā praügam śaṃsati niṣkevalyam śaṃsati iti ājyaiḥ stuvate pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvantaḥ iti atas śaṃsati śabdena vidhānāt apragītām ṛcam rathantarasya yonim darśayati yadi ca gītiḥ rathantaram tatas tasya apragītā ṛc yoniḥ anyathā ayam vyapadeśaḥ na upapadyate rathantarasya yonim iti tasmāt gītiṣu sāma ākhyā 
[II,28,iii_II,28,iv]	ayonau ca api dṛśyate atathā yoni ayonau ca sāma dṛśyate sthālyām saktu avadhīyate iti āhuḥ yat bṛhat gāyatrīṣu kriyate api ca enām rujati na ca asyām saṃbhavati iti bṛhataḥ bṛhatī yoniḥ tasya gāyatrīṣu prāptiḥ na asti yadi ṛcaḥ sāma śabdaḥ atha nu gīteḥ tatas sā bṛhadgītiḥ gāyatrīṣu vacanāt prāptā tasyāḥ ayam anuvādaḥ ghaṭate yat bṛhat gāyatrīṣu kriyate iti atatha ayoni ca sāma darśayati yādṛśī yasya yoniḥ tatas anyādṛśe yaḥ vai vicchandasi sāmohati saḥ ṛcam saṃśṛṇāti sāma vā viliśati sāma saṃśṛṇāti ṛcam viliśati iti yatarat varṣīyaḥ tasya saṃśaraḥ tat ca gītau eva sāmni yujyate narci ūhatiśadaḥ ca gītau eva samarthaḥ narci ṛc ced sā eva yathāmnāyam padyate tatra na asti ūha prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt api gītau sāma śabdaḥ 
[II,29,i_II,29,ii]	ekārthye na asti vairūpyam iti ced yat uktam tasya kriyā grahaṇa artha iti tatra paricodyate aikārthye na asti vairūpyam iti rathantara gīteḥ bṛhadgītiḥ artha antaram tena rathantara gītau gṛhītāyām bṛhadgītiḥ agṛhītā bhavati iti yuktaḥ rathantare gṛhīte bṛhataḥ śikṣā artham akarma kāle prayogaḥ rathantara gīteḥ tu ekaḥ eva arthaḥ tasya yonyām prayoge śikṣite punar uttarāsu na śikṣitavyam tāsu akarma kāle prayogaḥ saṃskāra karma tve na yuktaḥ bhavati tasmāt na saṃskārasya sāma śabdaḥ iti sthitāyām pratijñāyām sūtreṇa paricodayati 
[II,29,iii_II,29,iv]	syāt artha antareṣu aniṣpatteḥ yathā pāke syāt vairūpyam kutas etat arthān atreṣu aniṣpatteḥ ṛc antareṣu āśraya bhedāt yathā pāke yathā ekaḥ eva ayam arthaḥ pākaḥ nāma tasya artha antare vairūpyam bhavati anyathālakṣaṇaḥ odanasya pākaḥ anyathālakṣaṇaḥ guḍasya yena odana pākaḥ gṛhītaḥ na asau aśikṣitvā guḍam paktum jānāti tasmāt tasya api akarma kāle prayogaḥ upapadyate 
[II,30,i_II,30,ii]	śabdānām ca sāmañjasyam evam ca sāma śabdānām ṛc śabdānām ca sāmañjasyam bhavati kavatīṣu rathantaram gāyati iti kavatī śabdaḥ ṛcaḥ eva vakṣati rathantara śabdaḥ ca sāma itarathā kavatī śabde vā deśa lakṣaṇā syāt rathantara śabde vā dharma lakṣaṇā tasmāt gītau sāma śabdaḥ iti 
[II,31,i_II,31,ii^1]	uktam kriyā abhidhānam tat śrutau anyatra dharma pradeśāḥ syāt nāmnā dharma pradeśam vakṣyāmaḥ iti ādau pratijñātam saḥ ayam ucyate kuṇḍapāyinām ayane śrūyate māsam agnihotram juhoti iti tatra etat samadhigatam naiyamikāt agnihotrāt karma antaram etat iti adhunā agnihotra śabaḥ cintyate katham ayam prayuktaḥ iti tad artham ārabhyate uktam kriyā abhidhānam tat śrutau anyatra vidhi pradeśaḥ syāt iti uktam ādau kriyā abhidhānam karma nāmadheyam agnihotra śabdaḥ iti tat prakhyam ca anya śāstram iti atra tasya anyatra śrutau kauṇḍapāyinām ayanīye juhotau vidhi pradeśaḥ syāt dharma pradeśaḥ naiyamikasya agnihotrasya ye dharmāḥ te asmin anena nāmnā atidiśyeran kim kāraṇam 
[II,31,ii^2]	ucyate para śabdaḥ ayam paratra vṛttaḥ para śabdasya paratra vṛttau tadvat bhāvaḥ gamyate sa yatra vijñātaḥ bhavati tatra anūdyate yathā siṃhaḥ devadattaḥ iti yatra avijñātaḥ tatra vidhīyate yathā amī piṣṭa piṇḍāḥ siṃhāḥ kriyantām iti iha ca avijñātaḥ asya juhoteḥ agni hotra vat bhāvaḥ tasmāt sa vidhīyate māsam agnihotram juhoti iti agni hotra vat juhoti iti katham punar asati vati pratyaye vati arthaḥ śakyaḥ avagantum iti ucyate sāhacaryāt agnihotra śabdaḥ ayam karmaṇā saṃbaddhaḥ tad sahacarita dohana ādi dharmavat tām lakṣaṇayā śaknoti gamayitum śaknoti ced gamayitum pradeṣṭum api śaknoti evam anatreṇa api vatim vati arthaḥ śakyaḥ avagantum iti 
[II,32,i_II,32,iv]	apūrve vā api bhāgi tvāt vāpi iti viparyāsena prayukte api vā iti arthaḥ api vā apūrve ete ubhe api karmaṇī syātām na kauṇḍapāyinām ayanīyaḥ juhotiḥ naiyamika pūrvaḥ sādhāraṇam ca nāmadheyam ubhayoḥ kutas bhāgi tvāt ayam api juhotiḥ bhāgī etasya nāmadheyasya yathā eva tatra agnihotram juhoti iti samuccāraṇam evam iha api tatra tulye samuccāraṇe tasya eva etat nāmadheyam na asya iti atra viśeṣa hetuḥ na asti tasmāt ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇam nāma iti na asti dharma pradeśaḥ na etat yuktam kutas 
[II,32,v_II,32,vi]	nāmnaḥ tu autpattika tvāt autpattikaḥ hi nāmi nāmnoḥ sambandhaḥ yat nāma yasmin arthaḥ autpattikena saṃbandhena prasiddham tasmin eva sadā vijñeyam na anyatra ca tathā avyavasthāyām śabda arthe viśvāsaḥ na syāt uktam anyāyaḥ ca aneka artha tvam iti yadā ca na ubhaya arthaḥ tadā naiyamikam tāvat āha tad sādṛśya vidhāna artham ca itaratra api prayogaḥ upapadyate iti na asti itara abhidhāna tve hetuḥ tasmāt vidhi pradeśaḥ syāt 
[II,33,i_II,33,ii]	pratyakṣāt guṇa saṃyogāt kriyā abhidhānam syāt tad abhāve aprasiddham syāt naiyamike agnihotre pratyakṣaḥ guṇa saṃyogaḥ pratyakṣa vihitāḥ dharmāḥ santi ittham dogdhi ittham śrapayati catuḥ unnayati khādirī agnihotra samidh bhavati ittham juhoti evam pratyakṣāt guṇa saṃyogāt naiyamikasya tat nāmadheyam iha prayujyamānam dohana ādi kriyā abhidhānam syāt dharma pradeśakam iti arthaḥ asya punar juhoteḥ na kecid dharmāḥ santi tad abhāve teṣām dharmāṇām abhāve aprasiddham syāt na prajñāyeta kim artham ayam agnihotra śabdaḥ iha prayuktaḥ iti 
[II,33,iii]	evam vā pratyakṣaḥ guṇa asaṃyogaḥ naiyamikasya dravya devatā saṃyogaḥ dadhnā juhoti payasā juhoti agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyam juhoti iti etasmāt pratyakṣāt guṇa saṃyogāt kriyā abhidhānam syāt karma nāmadheyam itthaṃrūpaḥ juhotiḥ agnihotra ākhyaḥ iti atha itara juhoteḥ rūpam na asti tad abhāve aprasiddham syāt na jñāyet kīdṛśam tat agnihotram iti 
[II,33,iv_II,33,v]	nanu māsaḥ asya rūpam bhaviṣyati na māsaḥ karma aṅgam kartṛ dharmaḥ saḥ api ca agnihotram tu māse vidhīyate na māsena agnihotram rūpyate tasmāt naiyamikasya etat nāmadheyam itaratra tadvat atideśaḥ iti kim eṣaḥ eva utsargaḥ sarvam karma nāma anyatra śrūyamāṇam dharmāṇām grāhakam iti evam khalu prāptam evam prāptaḥ idam ārabhyate 
[II,34,i_II,34,iii]	api vā satra karmaṇi guṇa arthā eṣā śrutiḥ syāt gavāmayane śrūyate vaiśvānaraḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ prāyaṇīyam ahar bhavati iti asti tu dvādaśa ahe prathamam ahar prāyaṇīyam nāma prāyaṇīyaḥ atirātraḥ iti tayoḥ nānātvam tena eva nyāyena siddham prakaraṇa antare prayojana anya tvam iti tatra ayam prāyaṇīya śabdaḥ paratra api śrūyamāṇaḥ na dharmāṇām grāhakaḥ kim tarhi guṇa arthā eṣā śrutiḥ katham lakṣaṇayā nāmadheyam dharmāṇām grāhakam uktam asati ca śruti arthe lakṣaṇa arthaḥ grāhyaḥ iha tu śruti arthaḥ eva saṃbhavati guṇa arthaḥ eṣa śabdaḥ guṇena kriyā yogena tasmin karmaṇi śrutyā eva prayujyate prayanti anena iti prāyaṇīyam pravartate anena satram iti vākya śeṣaḥ ca asya etam eva artham āha jyotiḥ eva purastāt dadhāti iti yena jyotiḥ prāyaṇīyam bhavati tena jyotiḥ purastāt kriyate iti arthaḥ jyotiḥ eva purastāt dadhāti iti tasmāt na ayam atideśaḥ 
[II,34,iv_II,34,v]	viśvajiti sarva pṛṣṭhe tad pūrvaka tvāt jyautiṣṭomikāni pṛṣṭhāni asti ca pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ viśva jit sarva pṛṣṭhaḥ bhavati iti śrūyate tatra vicāryate kim ayam anuvādaḥ vidhiḥ iti kim prāptam anuvādaḥ iti kutas yaḥ hi asarva pṛṣṭhaḥ tasya sarva pṛṣṭha tā vidheyā yaḥ tu sarva pṛṣṭhaḥ eva tasya tayā kim vihitayā ayam ca sarva pṛṣṭhaḥ eva katham tad pūrvaka tvāt jyotiṣṭoma pūrvaka tvāt jyautiṣṭomikāni stotrāṇi atra prāpyante teṣu māhendra stotra ādīni catvāri santi tāni sarvāṇi asya taiḥ ayam sarva pṛṣṭhaḥ bhavati nanu na tāni pṛṣṭhāni ucyate asti ca pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ teṣu asti pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni iti tasmāt anuvādaḥ 
[II,35,i_II,35,ii]	ṣaṣ ahāt vā tatra hi codanāḥ na ayam anuvādaḥ kim tarhi vidhiḥ anuvādaḥ apravṛtti viśeṣa karaḥ arthakaḥ syāt api ca jyotiṣṭome na pṛṣṭha bahu tvam asti yasya ayam anuvādaḥ syāt ṣaṣ ahe tu tat asti tatra hi codanāḥ pṛṣṭhānām rathantaram pṛṣṭham bhavati iti evamādyāḥ tasmāt ṣāḍahikānām atideśakaḥ vidhiḥ iti 
[II,35,iii_II,35,iv]	liṅgāt ca liṅgam ca etam artham darśayati pavamāne rathantaram karoti ārbhāve bṛhat madhye itarāṇi vairūpam hotuḥ sāma vairājam maitrāvaruṇasya raivatam brāhmaṇāt śaṃsinaḥ śākvaramat śāvākasya iti viniveśa pare vākye ṣāḍahikāni pṛṣṭhāni darśayati 
[II,35,v_II,36,i]	utpanna adhikāraḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ atha yat uktam asti ca pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ iti tatra brūmaḥ na tu eṣaḥ autpattikaḥ pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ utpannānām stotrāṇām asau adhikāraḥ yāni etāni pṛṣṭhāni iti jñāte ca teṣām pṛṣṭha tve tat upapadyate na ca tatra jñātam katham tarhi ayam anuvādaḥ liṅga samavāyāt ekam tatra pṛṣṭham māhendra stotram iti ṣāḍahikānām punar pṛṣṭha tvam jñātam katham tatra hi codanā iti uktam teṣām vāde śrautaḥ pṛṣṭha śabdasya arthaḥ parigṛhītaḥ bhavati itarathā lākṣaṇikaḥ tasmāt ṣāḍahikānām pradeśaḥ iti 
[II,36,ii_II,36,iv]	dvayoḥ vidhiḥ iti ced iti ced paśyasi ṣāḍahikānām pṛṣṭhānām vidhiḥ iti na etat yuktam kim kāraṇam dvi karaḥ evam sarva pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ abhyupagamyate pṛṣṭhāni ca vidadhāti teṣām ca sarva tvam astu kaḥ doṣaḥ asaṃbhavaḥ iti āha yadi pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ pṛṣṭhāni vidadhāti sarva śabdena na śakyate viśeṣayitum atha anuvadati tathā śakyate pṛṣṭhāni tu avihitāni bhavanti teṣu asatsu kasya idam sarva tvam vidhīyate ubhaya kriyāyāḥ ca asaṃbhavaḥ atha atra bṛhat rathantarayoḥ vikalpena prāptayoḥ sāmastyam kevalam vidhīyate sarva pṛṣṭhaḥ bhavati iti ubhe api bṛhat rathantare bhavataḥ na ekam iti tatas ayam doṣaḥ na bhavati tasmāt dvayoḥ adhikāraḥ 
[II,36,v_II,36,vi]	na vyartha tvāt sarva śabdasya na evam etat kutas vyartha tvāt sarva śabdasya evam sati sarva śabdaḥ vyarthaḥ bhavati artha śūnyaḥ ayam hi bahu viṣayaḥ dvayoḥ na yujyate ṣāḍahikānām tu vidhāne na eṣa doṣaḥ nanu ca tatra api dvi karaḥ śabdaḥ bhaviṣyati ucyate na bhaviṣyati sarva tvam kevalam pṛṣṭhānām vidhāsyati na pṛṣṭhāni nanu uktam pṛṣṭheṣu asatsu kasya idam srva tvam vidhīyate iti ucyate pṛṣṭhānām sarva tvam hi vihitam tat saṃpādayitavyam na ca pṛṣṭhāni akurvatā tat saṃpādayitum śakyate tatra arthāt pṛṣṭhāni kariṣyati evam na dvi arthaḥ śabdaḥ bhaviṣyati sarva śabdaḥ ca samarthitaḥ tasmāt ṣāḍahikānām atideśaḥ iti 
[II,37,i_II,37,ii]	tathā avabhṛthaḥ somāt varuṇa praghāseṣu śrūyate vāruṇyāḥ niṣkāsena tuṣaiḥ ca avabhṛtham yanti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim dārśa pūrṇamāsike apām vyutseke tuṣa niṣkāsam vidhīyate uta saumikāt avabhṛthāt dharma atideśaḥ iti kim yuktam dārśa pūrṇamāsike guṇa vidhiḥ evam sannihita pratyayaḥ anugṛhyate sannihitaḥ hi asau ca udakena prāpitaḥ nanu na asau avabhṛthaḥ ucyate asti tatra avabhṛtha śabdaḥ iti eṣa vai darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ avabhṛthaḥ iti evam prāptaḥ idam āha tathā avabhṛthaḥ somāt yathā ṣaṣ ahāt pṛṣṭhānām atideśaḥ evam saumikāt avabhṛthāt iha dharma atideśaḥ kutas abhihitaḥ nyāyaḥ uktam kriyā abhidhānam tat śrutau anyatra vidhi pradeśaḥ syāt iti 
[II,37,iii_II,37,iv]	prakṛteḥ iti ced atha yat uktam dārśa paurṇamāsike avabhṛthe guṇa vidhiḥ bhavatu iti tasya kaḥ parihāraḥ iti ābhāṣā antam sūtram 
[II,37,v_II,38,i]	na bhakti tvāt na etat yuktam kutas yatas na asti darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ avabhṛthaḥ nanu eṣa vai darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ avabhṛthaḥ iti śrūyate satyam śrūyate na tu evam avabhṛtha tvam asya bhavati katham ucyate eṣa vai darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ avabhṛthaḥ iti etasya vākyasya dvayī vacana vyaktiḥ nirjñāta avabhṛtha tvasya padārthasya vā darśa pūrṇamāsa saṃbandhaḥ ucyate yathā devadattaḥ yajñadattasya putraḥ iti nirjñāta putra tvasya devadattasya yajñadatta saṃbandhaḥ ucyate nirjñāta saṃbandhasya vā anirjñāta avabhṛtha tvasya avabhṛtha tvam yathā ayam āmraḥ yajñadattasya putraḥ iti nirjñāta yajña datta saṃbandhasya āmrasya putra tvam ucyate tat asya apām vyutsekasya darśa pūrṇamāna saṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇāt nirjñātaḥ na avabhṛtha tvam atas asya avabhṛtha tvam ucyate na ca ayam avabhṛthaḥ nanu ayam api avabhṛthaḥ bhavatu na etat yuktam anyāyaḥ hi aneka artha tvam katham tarhi śabda prayogaḥ sādṛśyāt kim sādṛśyam apsu saṃbandhaḥ saḥ eṣa bhaktyā praśaṃsā vādaḥ apām vyutsekasya avabhṛthaḥ iva ayam iti yathā āmre putra vādaḥ tasmāt na asti darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ avabhṛthaḥ atas na atra guṇa vidhiḥ 
[II,38,ii_II,38,iii]	liṅga darśanāt ca liṅgam ca etam artham darśayati kim liṅgam bhavati evam āha na āyuḥ dām juhoti na sāma gāyati na vā gamana mantram japati iti saumikā avabhṛtha dharmāṇām pratiṣedham brūvan tad dharma prāptim darśayati tasmāt saumikāt avabhṛthāt dharma pradeśaḥ iti 
[II,39,i_II,39,iii]	dravya ādeśe tad dravyaḥ śruti saṃyogāt puroḍāśaḥ tu anādeśe tad prakṛti tvāt vāruṇa prāghāsikaḥ avabhṛthaḥ saumikāt avabhṛthāt dharmāṇām grāhakaḥ iti yuktam tatra idam cintyate kim puroḍāśa dravyakaḥ asau uta tuṣa niṣkāsa dravyakaḥ iti kim prāptam puroḍāśa dravyakaḥ iti kutas nāmnā puroḍāśaḥ prāpyate nanu pratyakṣa śrutam tuṣa niṣkāsam satyam pratyakṣa śrutam na tu śakyate vidhātum avabhṛthaḥ atra vidhīyate avabhṛtham yanti iti yadi tuṣa niṣkāsam aparam vidhīyeta tatas vākyam bhidyeta avabhṛtham yanti tat ca tuṣa niṣkāsena iti tuṣa niṣkāsa śravaṇam idānīm kim artham anarthakam saṃbandha abhāvāt evam prāpte brūmaḥ dravya ādeśe tad dravyaḥ dravya ādeśaḥ etasmin tuṣa niṣkāsena avabhṛtam yanti iti tad dravyaḥ syāt tuṣa niṣkāsa dravyaḥ kutas śruti saṃyogāt tuṣa niṣkāsam pratyakṣa śrutam puroḍāśaḥ tu ānumānikaḥ atideśena prāpyate 
[II,39,iv]	nanu puroḍāśaḥ api pratyakṣa śrutaḥ nāmnā yadi api pratyakṣa śrutaḥ sāmānyena tu prāpyate tuṣa niṣkāsam tu viśeṣeṇa bādhyate ca sāmānyam viśeṣeṇa api ca lakṣaṇayā puroḍāśaḥ gamyate śrutyā tuṣa niṣkāsam śruti lakṣaṇayoḥ ca śrutiḥ nyāyyā tasmāt tuṣa niṣkāsa dravyakaḥ iti atha yat uktam na saṃbadhyate avabhṛthena tuṣa niṣkāsam vākya bheda prasaṅgāt iti tatra brūmaḥ yadi avabhṛtham vihāya tuṣa niṣkāsam vidhīyate tatas vākya bhedaḥ syāt tuṣa niṣkāsa dravyakaḥ apūrvaḥ avabhṛthaḥ codyate tathā sa guṇa karma vidhānam aviruddham avidhīyamāne ca tuṣa niṣkāse tad grahaṇam anarthakam eva syāt tasmāt tuṣa niṣkāsa dravyakaḥ puroḍāśaḥ tu anādeśe tad prakṛti tvāt yadi atra pratyakṣa śrutam na dravyam syāt tatas puroḍāśaḥ tuṣa prakṛti tvāt syāt atra tu pratyakṣa śrutam tuṣa niṣkāsam tasmāt na puroḍāśaḥ 
[II,40,i]	ātithye śrūyate vaiṣṇavaḥ nava kapālaḥ bhavati iti tathā rājasūye pūrvasmin tri saṃyukte vaiṣṇvaḥ tri kapālaḥ iti tatra vicāraḥ yaḥ ayam tri saṃyukte vaiṣṇavaḥ tri kapālaḥ iti vaiṣṇava śabdaḥ ayam ātithya dharmāṇām grāhakaḥ na iti kim yuktam grāhakaḥ iti kutas vihita dharmake karmaṇi dṛṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ anyasmin avihite śrūyamāṇaḥ grāhakaḥ iti uktam uktam kriyā abhidhānam iti tatra ayam api vihita dharmakaḥ ātithye dṛṣṭaḥ idānīm avihita dharmake tri saṃyukte dṛśyate tasmāt dharmāṇām grāhakaḥ iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ 
[II,40,ii_II,40,iii]	guṇa vidhiḥ tu na gṛhṇīyāt sama tvāt guṇa vidhiḥ ayam ātithyasya guṇam viṣṇu devatā saṃyogam vidadhāti saḥ eṣa dharmān grahītum na śaknoti kutas sama tvāt samaḥ hi ayam ātithye tri saṃyukte ca yathā tatra viṣṇum devatām vidadhāti evam atra api śruti artha asaṃbhavāt ca lakṣaṇayā dharmāṇām grāhakaḥ kalpyate iha ca pratyakṣa śruti arthaḥ eva saṃbhavati devatā vidhiḥ tasmāt na ayam grāhakaḥ iti 
[II,40,iv_II,41,i]	nirmanthya ādiṣu ca evam paśau agnīṣomīye dharmavān nirmanthyaḥ agniḥ āmnātaḥ sādhyāḥ vai devāḥ iti ārabhya agnau śrūyate nirmanthyena iṣṭakāḥ pacanti iti tathā darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ barhi rājye dharmavatī paśau śrūyate barhiṣā yūpāvaṭam avastṛṇāti iti ājyena yūpam anakti iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim nirmanthya ādayaḥ śabdāḥ dharmāṇām grāhakāḥ na iti tatra adhikaraṇa atideśaḥ kriyate nirmanthya ādiṣu ca evam yathā vaiṣṇava śabde atra api ayam yaugikaḥ nirmanthya śabdaḥ sadyonirmathitam agnim āha tathā barhiḥ ājyam iti dravya śabdau te trayaḥ api sva artham vidhāya kṛtārthāḥ bhavanti dharmān grahītum na śaknuvanti tasmāt na grāhakāḥ cāturmāsyeṣu śrūyate dvayoḥ praṇayanti tasmāt dvābhyām eti iti asti tu some praṇayanam dharma vat tathā darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ adharmakam tatra saṃdehaḥ kim saumikam etat praṇayam uta dārśa paurṇamāsikam iti tatra sūtreṇa eva upakramaḥ 
[II,41,ii_II,41,iii]	praṇayanam tu saumikam avācyam hi itarat saumikam etat praṇayanam kim kāraṇam avācyam hi itarat dārśa paurṇamāsikam ca udakena prāpta tvāt katham punar ayam praṇayati śabdaḥ praṇayana mātra vacanaḥ san saumikam praṇayana viśeṣam śaknoti vaktum lakṣaṇayā iti brūmaḥ tīrtha śabavat tat yathā tīrtha śabdaḥ tīrtha mātra vacanaḥ san tīrtha viśeṣam dharma sādhanam kadācid brūte tīrtha yātrām gataḥ iti 
[II,42,i_II,42,ii]	uttara vedi pratiṣedhaḥ ca tadvat na vaiśvadevaḥ uttara vedim upavayanti na su nāsīrīyaḥ iti prāpti pūrvakaḥ hi pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati saumike ca praṇayane uttara vediḥ na dārśa paurṇamāsike 
[II,42,iii_II,42,iv]	prākṛtam vānāma tvāt prākṛtam vā etat praṇayanam dārśa paurṇamāsikam kutas anāma tvat praṇayana śabdaḥ saumikasya praṇayanasya na nāmadheyam na etat tasya vācakam iti arthaḥ yadi ayam tasya vācakaḥ syāt tatas tat iha brūyat idam tu padārtha nāmadheyam padārthasya prāk nayanasya vācakam yasya vācakam tat iha śaknoti agneḥ prācīnam nayanam vaktum tat ca iha asti eva tasmāt tasya vācakaḥ evam sannihita pratyaḥ na bādhitaḥ bhavati 
[II,42,v]	atha yat uktam tīrtha śaba vat bhaviṣyati iti atra brūmaḥ tīrtha śabdaḥ api tīrtha mātram eva brūte tīrtha yātrām gataḥ iti tu uktvā kānicid tīrthāni anukrāntāni yatas asau tad viśiṣṭa arthaḥ vijñāyate yatra tu kevalaḥ prayujyate tatra tīrtha mātram eva brūte yathā tīrthe snāti tīrtham eva hi samānānām bhavati iti api ca saṃbhavati śruti arthe lakṣaṇa arthaḥ agrāhyaḥ saṃbhavati ca atra śruti arthaḥ tasmāt na lakṣaṇa arthaḥ grāhyaḥ iti 
[II,42,vi_II,42,vii]	parisaṅkhya artham śravaṇam guṇa artham artha vādaḥ vā tatra āha yat uktam avācyam hi itarat iti tasya kaḥ parihāraḥ ucyate parisaṅkhya artham vā syāt dvayoḥ praṇayanti na caturṣu iti guṇa artham artha vāda artham vā tasmāt dvābhyām eti iti tatra parisaṅkhyāyām tāvat trayaḥ doṣāḥ guṇaḥ api na kaścid vidhīyate pariśeṣāt artha vāda artham nanu artha vādaḥ api niṣprayojanaḥ praṇayanasya prāpta tvāt artha vādasya prayojanam uttarasmin adhikaraṇe vakṣyāmaḥ madhyamayoḥ vā gati artha vādāt iti 
[II,43,i_II,43,ii]	prathama uttamayoḥ praṇayanam uttara vedi pratiṣedhāt dvayoḥ praṇayanti iti śrūyate tatra saṃdehaḥ katarayoḥ dvayoḥ iti aniyame prāpte ucyate prathama uttamayoḥ praṇayanam kutas uttara vedi pratiṣedhāt tatra uttara vediḥ pratiṣidhyate na vaiśvadevaḥ uttara vedim upavayanti iti na su nāsīrīyaḥ iti asmin praṇayane uttara vedyām agni nidhānam vihitam atas yatra praṇayanam tatra uttara vedi prāptiḥ prāptau ca satyām pratiṣedhaḥ prathama uttarayoḥ ca asau tasmāt tayoḥ praṇayanam iti 
[II,43,iii_II,44,i]	madhyamayoḥ vā gati artha vādāt madhyamayoḥ vā parvaṇoḥ praṇayanam kutas gati artha vādāt gati artha vādena etat dvayoḥ praṇayanam ucyate tasmāt dvābhyām eti iti ūru saṃstute vā ete parvaṇī ūru vā etau yajñasya yat varuṇa praghāsāḥ ca sākamedhāḥ ca iti ūru ca gamana sādhane tatra evam stuti saṃbandhaḥ vijñāyate ūru yajñasya varuṇa praghāsāḥ ca sākamedhāḥ ca iti tayoḥ dvayoḥ praṇayanti tasmāt dvābhyām ūrubhyām yajñaḥ samāptim yānti praṇayanena hi tau balavantau bhavataḥ aṅga bhūyaḥ tvāt iti etat tad artha vādasya prayojanam atha yat uktam uttara vedi pratiṣedhāt iti tatra brūmaḥ 
[II,44,ii_II,44,iv]	auttara vedikaḥ na ārabhyavāda pratiṣedhaḥ anārabhya kiṃcid parva viśeṣam cāturmāsyeṣu uttara vediḥ āmnātā upātra vapanti iti tasya anārabhya vidheḥ ayam pratiṣedhaḥ nanu varuṇa praghāsānām guṇa vākya prāptau eva ayam teṣām eva atra iti vādaḥ syāt na etat evam prakaraṇāt cāturmāsyānām eva yadi varuṇa praghāsānām vādaḥ syāt tatra pratiṣedhe trīṇi api parvāṇi utkīrtayet atha ucyeta dvayoḥ parvaṇoḥ vādaḥ bhavatu iti atra brūmaḥ na dvayoḥ parvaṇoḥ prakaraṇam cāturbhāsyānām vā prakaraṇam varuṇa praghāsānām vā varuṇa praghāsānām dvayoḥ prakaraṇe parvaṇoḥ utkīrtanam pratiṣedhe na syāt tasmāt cāturmāsyānām eva vādaḥ 
[II,44,v_II,44,vi]	nanu evam api artha vādena etat jñātam madhyamayoḥ praṇayanam iti kim artham prāptasya praṇayanasya punar śravaṇam iti atra prayojanam na uktam asati prayojane anyasmin parisaṅkhya artham eva bhavati tatra doṣāḥ uktāḥ tasmāt guṇa artham eva etat śravaṇam nanu na asti kaścid guṇaḥ ucyate guṇaḥ śrūyate uttara vedyām agni nidhānam tasmāt tad arthā punar śrutiḥ 
[II,45,i_II,45,ii^1]	svarasāma eka kapāla āmikṣam ca liṅga darśanāt gavāmayane śrūyate abhitas divākīrtyam ahar trayaḥ svarasāmānaḥ bhavanti iti teṣām viśeṣa dharmāḥ āmnātāḥ yathā saptadaśāḥ bhavanti santata tayā atigrāhyāḥ gṛhyante iti evamādayaḥ punar anyatra śrūyate pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaṣ ahaḥ dvau svara sāmānau iti tathā vaiśvadeve śrūyate dyāvāpṛthivyaḥ eka kapālaḥ iti tatra āmnātā viśeṣa dharmāḥ sarva hutam juhoti aparyāvartayan juhoti iti punar aparatra kāyaḥ eka kapālaḥ iti tatra eva śrūyate vaiśvadevya abhikṣā iti tatra api viśeṣa dharmāḥ kecid āmnātāḥ punar anyatra maitrāvaruṇī āmikṣa iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim svarasāma śabdaḥ anyatra śrūyamāṇaḥ gavāmayanikebhyaḥ svarasāmabhyaḥ dharmāṇām grāhakaḥ uta na iti evam eka kapāla āmikṣā śabdau api 
[II,45,ii^2]	tatra guṇa vidhiḥ tu na gṛhṇīyāt sama tvāt iti agrahaṇe prāpte idam ucyate svarasāma eka kapāla āmikṣam ca dharmāṇām grāhakam kim kāraṇam liṅga darśanāt liṅgam tatra tādṛśam dṛśyate yena jñāyate sarve ete dharmāṇām grāhakāḥ iti svarasāmasu tāvat pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaṣ ahaḥ dvau svara samānau iti uktvā āha tatra yat tṛtīyam saptadaśam ahar tat trayastriṃśasya sthānam abhiparyāharanti saḥ uttarāṇām stomānām avyavāyāya trayāṇām ca saptadaśānām anūcīnatāyāḥ iti yadi etau svarasāmānau gavāmāyanikānām dharmāṇām grāhakau tatra etau api saptadaśau tathā atra trayaḥ saptadaśāḥ anūcīnāḥ bhavanti tatra etat vacanam yujyate trayāṇām saptadaśānām anūcīnatāyāḥ iti 
[II,46,i_II,46,ii]	tathā āgrayaṇe dyau āpṛthivyam eka kapālam vidhāya āha yat sarva hutam karoti sā tu ekā paricakṣā hutaḥ hutaḥ paryāvartate sā dvitīyā ājyasya eva dyau āpṛthivyau yajeta iti ājya vidhi pare vākye sarva homam aparyāvṛttim ca vaiśvadevikau dharmau prāptau darśayati tathā maitrāvaruṇyām āmikṣāyām na vājinena pracaranti iti vājinā ijyām vaiśvadevikam dharmam pratiṣedhan tatas dharma prāptim darśayati etebhyaḥ liṅgebhyaḥ etat jñāyate yathāsvam dharmāṇām grāhakāḥ iti pratipatti artha karma vājinā ijyām su iṣṭakṛt tulyām matvā etat uktam āha liṅgam apadiṣṭam kutas prāptiḥ iti ucyate lakṣaṇayā prāptiḥ liṅgāt tu lakṣaṇa aparigrahaḥ 
[II,46,iii_II,46,v]	codanā sāmānyāt vā svara sāma tva sāmāyāt eka kapāla tva sāmānyāt āmikṣā sāmānyāt vā yasya liṅgam artha saṃyogāt iti anena prāptiḥ iti kvacid śrūyate vāsaḥ dadāti anaḥ dadāti iti tatra vicāryate kim vāsasaḥ anasaḥ ca kriyā prāpyate uta na iti tatra āha evam tāvat naḥ parīkṣyam kim karma nimittau etau śabdau uta ākṛti nimittau iti yadi karma nimittau tatas prāpyate atha ākṛti nimittau tatas na iti kim tāvat prāptam karma nimittau iti kutas karma āgame tad darśanāt yadā tasmin dravye dāruṇi sūtre vā dārukāreṇa tantuvāyena vā karma kṛtam bhavati tadā etau śabdau pravartete na prāk atas vijñāyate karma nimittau iti yadā karma nimittau tat etat ārabhyate 
[II,47,i_II,47,ii]	karma je karma yūpa vat karma jaḥ etasmin vāsa ādau dravye śrūyamāṇe karma prāpyate katham yūpa vat yathā yūpa śabdaḥ joṣaṇa ādi kriyā nimittaḥ sa yatra śrūyate tatra joṣaṇa ādyāḥ kriyāḥ prāpyante evam iha api iti 
[II,47,iii_II,47,iv]	rūpam vā aśeṣa bhūta tvāt atra ucyate na etau karma nimittau kim kāraṇam ye naimittikāḥ śabdāḥ te nimittam upalabhya prayujyante yathā daṇḍī chatrī iti imau tu anupalabhya kriyām ākṛti mātre prayujyete tasmāt na etau kriyā nimittau iti atra ucyate ākṛtyā kriyām anumāya tatas śabdam prayuṅkte iti atra brūmaḥ pratyakṣām nimitta tām gamyamānām utsṛjya adṛṣṭāyām kriyāyām nimitta tva kalpanāyām hetuḥ na asti iti yat tu uktam kriyā uttara kālam pravṛtti darśanāt iti atra brūmaḥ prāk kriyāyāḥ ākṛtiḥ anabhivyaktā sā kriyayā abhivyajyate yatas kriyā uttara kālam śabda prayogaḥ tasmāt ākṛti nimittau yadā evam tadā siddham rūpam deyam kutas aśeṣa bhūta tvāt na atra kriyā śeṣa bhūtā kriyā vācinaḥ śabdasya abhāvāt yūpe tu pratyakṣa vihitāḥ joṣaṇa ādyāḥ kriyāḥ tasmāt yūpa vat iti atulya upanyāsaḥ 
[II,48,i_II,48,iii]	viśaye laukikaḥ syāt sarva artha tvāt garga tri rātre ājya dohāni sāmāni prakṛtya śrūyate agnim upanidhāya stuvate iti tatra viśayaḥ kim laukikaḥ agniḥ upanidheyaḥ uta vaidikaḥ iti kim prāptam vaidikaḥ iti kutas sarva karma arthaḥ utpannaḥ asau yāni aham karmāṇi kariṣye yaiḥ ca asmi adhikṛtaḥ iti atas vaidike upanidheyaḥ iti evam prāpte ucyate viśaye laukikaḥ syāt sarva artha tvāt etasmin viśaye laukikam vaidikam iti laukikaḥ syāt atha yat uktam vaidikam sarva karma artham utpannam tasmāt tad upanidheyam iti atra brūmaḥ 
[II,48,iv_II,48,vi]	na vaidikam artha nirdeśāt na vaidikam agni dravyam śāstreṇa utpāditam tasya śāstreṇa eva kāryam nirdiṣṭam yat āhavanīye juhoti itīi ārabhya tasmin sarva arthe kalpyamāne nirdeśaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt tasmāt laukikaḥ agniḥ upanidheyaḥ sarva artha tvam ca eṣām sve sve kārye vartamānānām bhaviṣyati evam ubhayam aviruddham sarva artha tvam nirdeśaḥ ca iti atha dhaiṣṇāḥ agnayaḥ kasmāt na upanidhīyante atra ucyate 
[II,48,vii_II,48,viii]	tathā utpattiḥ itareṣām sama tvāt itareṣām api agnīnām dhaiṣṇyānām tathā utpattiḥ na sarva arthaḥ iti arthaḥ kutas sama tvāt ete api itaraiḥ agnibhiḥ samāḥ eteṣām api nirdiṣṭam kāryam prāk āsīnaḥ dhiṣṇyān āghārayati iti atas te na upanidheyāḥ iti 
[II,49,i_II,49,ii]	saṃskṛtam syāt tad śabda tvāt ekādaśinyām śrūyate upaśayaḥ yūpaḥ bhavati iti tatra saṃdehaḥ kim etat upaśaya dravyam saṃskṛtam joṣaṇa ādayaḥ saṃskārāḥ atra kartavyāḥ uta na iti kim yuktam saṃskṛtam syat kartavyāḥ atra joṣaṇa ādayaḥ saṃskārāḥ kutas tad śabda tvāt ayam yūpa śabdaḥ saṃskāra nimittaḥ saḥ eṣaḥ asatsu saṃskāreṣu na upapadyate tasmāt te kāryāḥ iti 
[II,49,iii_II,49,v]	bhaktyā vāyajña śeṣa tvāt guṇānām abhidhāna tvāt na vā kartavyāḥ kutas ayajña śeṣa tvāt ete saṃskārāḥ asmin kāṣṭhe kriyante etena dvāreṇa yajatinā saṃbhatsyante ittham saṃskṛte kāṣṭhe niyuktena paśunā yajiḥ kriyamāṇaḥ apūrvam nirvartayati asmin ca upaśaye na paśuḥ niyujyate tatra kṛtāḥ saṃskārāḥ anarthakāḥ syuḥ nanu vacana sāmarthyāt adṛṣṭa arthāḥ bhaviṣyanti ucyate na atra vacanam yūpaḥ kartavyaḥ iti vartamāna apadeśaḥ ayam 
[II,49,vi]	nanu vartamāna apadeśaḥ api na ghaṭate saṃskārāṇām abhāve ucyate bhaktyā bhaviṣyati yathā yajamānaḥ vai yūpaḥ iti āha tatra sādṛśyāt iha punar katham iti ucyate guṇānām abhidhāna tvāt yūpa guṇānām yūpa saṃskārāṇām abhidhāna tvāt yūpa saṃskārāḥ tatra kecid artha prāptāḥ chedana ādayaḥ tūṣṇīṃkṛtāḥ santi taiḥ ayam abhidhīyate yūpaḥ iti ayūpaḥ san yathā snātā kanyān alaṃkṛtā mālāguṇena api alaṃkṛtā iti evam eka deśena api saṃskārāṇām saṃskṛtaḥ iti stutyā abhidhīyate 
[II,50,i_II,50,ii]	agnau śrūyate pṛṣṭhaiḥ upatiṣṭhante iti tatra cintyate kim pṛṣṭha dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ uta na iti ke punar te sāmānya dharmāḥ hiṃkāra ādayaḥ viśeṣa dharmāḥ rathantare prastūyamāne pṛthivīm manasā dhyāyet bṛhati samudram iti evamādayaḥ kim tāvat prāptam tatas āha etat tāvat naḥ parīkṣyam kim ayam pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ karmaṇaḥ vācakaḥ uta dravyasya iti nanu siddham etat karma nāmadheyam pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ iti yasmin guṇa upadeśaḥ pradhānataḥ abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti atra tāsu eva codanāsu etat uktam saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni vairūpam pṛṣṭham vairājam pṛṣṭham iti idānīm pṛṣṭhaiḥ upatiṣṭhante iti asyām cintyate kim punar atra yuktam tatas āha 
[II,50,iii_II,50,iv]	karmaṇaḥ pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ syāt tathābhūta upadeśāt karmaṇaḥ pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ syāt kutas tathābhūta upadeśāt tathābhūtaḥ san upadeśaḥ yatra ayam pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ karma nāma adhigataḥ tathābhūtaḥ ayam api kim asya tathātvam pṛṣṭha śabda sāmānyam pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ tatra karma vacanaḥ adhigataḥ saḥ eva ayam tasmāt iha api tad vacanaḥ eva avagantavyaḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt yadi anya arthaḥ kalpyate ekaḥ śabdaḥ aneka arthaḥ syāt tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ śabdaḥ uccarite saṃśayaḥ syāt na artha pratyayaḥ tatra vyavahāraḥ na sidhyet vyavahāra arthaḥ ca śabda prayogaḥ kāraṇa antaram ca prakaraṇa ādi apekṣyam eka artha tve tu nirapekṣaḥ artha pratyayaḥ tasmāt aneka artha tvam anyāyyam tasmāt karma nāma pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ yadā karma nāma tadā yadi tāvat tāni karmāṇi iha upadiśyante tatra utpattiḥ eṣām anarthikā atha mā bhūt eṣa doṣaḥ iti etat upasthānam tatra vijñāyate tatas idam prakaraṇam bādhyeta tasmāt sādṛśya vidhiḥ ayam pṛṣṭheḥ upatiṣṭhante pṛṣṭha sadṛśaiḥ karmabhiḥ upatiṣṭhante iti tad sādṛśyam ca dharmaiḥ bhavati tasmāt kartavyāḥ dharmāḥ iti 
[II,51,i_II,51,ii]	abhidhāna upadeśāt vā vipra tiṣedhāt dravyeṣu pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ syāt na ca etat evam karmaṇaḥ pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ iti kim tarhi dravyeṣu pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ syāt ṛc dravyeṣu abhitvā śūra na unumaḥ iti evamādīnām ṛcām vācakaḥ kutas abhidhāna upadeśāt abhidhāna upadeśaḥ ayam pṛṣṭhaiḥ upatiṣṭhante iti pṛṣṭhaiḥ abhidadhāti iti arthaḥ katham punar ayam upasthāna vacanaḥ abhidhāna arthaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum ucyate upagraha viśeṣāt mantra karaṇaḥ upatiṣṭhateḥ ātmanepadam bhavati mantraḥ tu abhidhānasya karaṇam na upasthānasya upasthānam śarīreṇa kriyate manasā vā tasmāt abhidhāna arthaḥ saḥ eṣa vipratiṣedhaḥ yadi pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ karmasu kalpyate ātmanepadam bādhyate na hi tadā mantraḥ karaṇam bhavati atha ātmanepadam anurudhyate upasthāna vipratiṣedhaḥ tadā abhidhāna artha tā āpatati tatra ātmanepada anurodhaḥ nyāyyaḥ pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ hi lakṣaṇayā pṛṣṭha sādhanam mantram bruvan arthavān bhavati ātmanepadam tu mantra karaṇena eva upapadyate atas pṛṣṭha sādhaneṣu mantreṣu pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ 
[II,52,i]	āha na etat yuktam upasthāna artha tā hi śrutyā upatiṣṭhateḥ ātmanepadāt liṅgāt abhidhāta artha tā na ca liṅgena śrutiḥ bādhitavyā ucyate na eva atra śrutiḥ bādhyate sva artham eva upatiṣṭhatiḥ āha samīpa sthānam tat tu abhidhānāya abhidhānam nirvartayitum agni samīpe tiṣṭhet iti tiṣṭhatiḥ āha ātmanā īpadāt tatas avirodhaḥ 
[II,52,ii]	āha evam api abhidhānasya mantraḥ karaṇam na upatiṣṭhateḥ tatra asaṃbandhaḥ eva upasthānasya mantreṇa tathā pṛṣṭhaiḥ upatiṣṭhante iti samuccāraṇam anarthakam syāt ucyate abhidhānam abhinirvartayan mantraḥ upasthānasya karaṇam bhavati yatas asya prayojanam nirvartayati na hi niṣprayojanam anuṣṭhīyate tasmāt mantreṣu eva pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ mantreṣu ced na asti dharmāṇām prāptiḥ na hi mantrāṇām dharmāḥ adharmakāḥ te iti 
[II,53,i_II,53,ii]	itikartavya tā vidheḥ yajateḥ pūrvavat tvam anārabhya kiṃcid śrūyate sauryam carum nirvapet brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ iti tatra eṣaḥ arthaḥ samadhigataḥ yāgaḥ ayam ca udyate iti yajatiḥ tu dravya phala bhoktṛ saṃyogāt eṣām karma saṃbandhāt iti tathā idam api uktam karma phalayoḥ saṃbandhe karma guṇataḥ phalam pradhānataḥ iti pratyartham ca abhisaṃyogāt karmataḥ hi abhisaṃbandhaḥ tasmāt karma upadeśaḥ syāt iti idam api ca uktam yajiḥ apūrvam sādhayati tatas ca apūrvāt kāla antare phalam bhavati iti codanā punar ārambhaḥ iti atra evam etasmin sati sauryam carum nirvapet brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ iti atra saurya yāgena apūrvam kṛtvā brahmavarcasam sādhayet brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ iti evam vijñāyate 
[II,53,iii^1]	āha yatra tṛtīyā yuktaḥ yajiḥ tatra yuktaḥ guṇa bhāva abhyupagamaḥ yathā jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yaja iti iti iha tu asatyām tṛtīyāyām katham tṛtīya arthaḥ gamyate iti ucyate kim atra tṛtīyā nirdiṣṭena yajinā kāryam yadā svabhāva siddhaḥ karmaṇām phalam prati guṇa bhāvaḥ yatra api asau śrutaḥ tatra api akiṃcitkaraḥ eva gata artha tvāt tathā yatra api dvitīyā śrutiḥ yathā agnihotram juhuyāt iti tatra api vibhakti vyatyayaḥ vā īpsita tvasya vā avivakṣā kāmam vā anarthakyam syāt na tu kathaṃcid api karmaṇaḥ prati guṇa bhāvaḥ śakyaḥ apahnotum 
[II,53,iii^2]	tasmāt yāgena apūrva sādhanam atra ucyate tatra yāgaḥ vijñāyate laukikaḥ asau padārthaḥ tena tu katham apūrvam sādhyate iti etat na vijñāyate iha tu yāgena apūrvam sādhayet iti etāvat eva uktam katham sādhayet iti iti kartavyatā na uktā yeṣām ca arthānām jñāyate eva iti kartavyatā teṣām kartavya tva mātram upadiśyate yathā odanam pacet iti yeṣām tu na jñāyate te saha iti kartavya tayā eva upadiśyante yathā darśa pūrṇamāsau evam ced nūnam jñāyate yāgena apūrva nirvṛttau itikartavya tā yasmāt uktā tasmāt nūnam asau asti iti 
[II,54,i_II,54,ii]	āha yadi asti loke tatas jñāyeta eva atha na asti eva katham śakyā jñātum iti ucyate bāḍham asti laukikī vaidikī ca laukikī tāvat pārvaṇa sthālī pāka ādiṣu vaidikī darśa pūrṇamāsa ādiṣu yadi tad pūrvāḥ etāḥ codanāḥ tad apekṣāḥ saurya yāgena apūrvam sādhayet yathā ajñātayā itikartavyatayā iti tatas yuktaḥ itikartavya tāyāḥ avidhiḥ na ca vidhīyate atas itikartavya tāyāḥ avidheḥ yajateḥ pūrvavat tvam vihita iti kartavya tāka tvam iti
