[II,54,iii]	atha yaḥ āhuḥ yajeta yāgam kuryāt iti juhuyāt homam kuryāt iti teṣām kim na eva dharma ākāṅkṣā bhavati bhavati iti brūmaḥ yadi api prajñāta itikartavyataḥ yajiḥ dravyam devatām pratyutsṛjyate iti tathā api yadā phala arthaḥ kriyate tadā dharmān ākāṅkṣati na hi adharmāt phalam bhavati katham jñāyate yaḥ hi amedhyam dravyam ucchiṣṭaḥ śayānaḥ vā prauḍha pādaḥ vāmena hastena vā pādena yathā kathaṃcid devatāyai utsṛjati tasya phalam na bhavati iti śiṣṭāḥ smaranti yaḥ tu medhyam dravyam śucau deśe prayataḥ prāṅmukhaḥ dakṣiṇena hastena samāhita manāḥ mantravat niyama vat ca devatāyai utsṛjati tasya phalam bhavati iti smaranti tasmāt yāvān yajatiḥ phalāyāmnāyate sa sarvaḥ dharmān ākāṅkṣati atas teṣām api asti dharma ākāṅkṣā satyām ākāṅkṣāyām sannihitaiḥ dharmaiḥ avipratiṣiddhaḥ saṃbandhaḥ prakṛtau vikṛtau tu ānumānikaiḥ 
[II,55,i_II,55,iii]	sa laukikaḥ syāt dṛṣṭa pravṛtti tvāt adhunā evam cintyate kim aniyamaḥ laukikī vaidikī vā itikartavyatā uta laukikī eva āhosvit vaidikī iti atra viśeṣa abhāvāt aniyame prāpte ucyate sa laukikaḥ syāt sa khalu kartavyatā upāyaḥ laukikaḥ syāt kutas dṛṣṭa pravṛtti tvāt dṛṣṭā hi asya tatra tatra pravṛttiḥ yathā pārvaṇa sthālīpāke aṣṭakācarau āgrahāyaṇīya karmaṇi iti evam yatra yatra yāgena apūrvam sādhyate tatra tatra asya pravṛttiḥ dṛṣṭā atas anvayāt vijñāyate yāgasya apūrvam sādhayataḥ ayam abhyupāyaḥ iti ayam ca api yāgaḥ tasmāt asya api saḥ eva abhyupāyaḥ 
[II,55,iv_II,55,v]	vacanāt tu tatas anya tvam āha kim eṣaḥ eva utsargaḥ sarvatra lokikī itikartavyatā iti evam khalu prāptam evam prāpte brūmaḥ vacanāt tu tatas anya tvam iti yatra pratyakṣam vacanam vaidikyāḥ tatra na laukikī syāt vacana sāmarthyāt vaidikī eva syāt yathā upasatsu gṛhamedhīye ca 
[II,56,i_II,56,ii]	liṅgena vā niyamyeta liṅgasya tad guṇa tvāt liṅgena vā itikartavyatā niyamyeta katarā yasyāḥ liṅgam vaidikyāḥ ca liṅgam tasmāt vaidikī kim punar liṅgam saurye tāvat carau śrūyate prayāje kṛṣṇalam juhoti iti tathā aindra bārhaspatye ardham barhiṣaḥ lunāti ardham na svayam ditam ardham vedyām karoti ardham naḥ iti tathā pitṛ yajñena hotāram vṛṇīte na ārṣā iyam iti etaiḥ liṅgaiḥ jñāyate vaidikīti kartavyatā iti katham tad guṇa tvāt ete hi prayāja ādayaḥ vaidikasya apūrvasya guṇāḥ yadi ca tadīyā iti kartavya tā pravartitā tatas eteṣu karmasu ete santi tatra etāni vacanāni upapadyante prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalam juhoti iti evamādīni tasmāt vaidikīti kartavya tā niyamyeta 
[II,56,iii_II,56,iv]	api vā anyāya pūrva tvāt yatra nitya anuvāda vacanāni syuḥ api vā na evam syāt vaidikī iti kartavyatā iti yat kāraṇam etaiḥ liṅgaiḥ na śakyate vaidikī niyantum kutas anyāya pūrva tvāt nyāya pūrvakam hi vacanam tad sādhakam bhavati na ca etāni nyāya pūrvāṇi na hi vaidikyāḥ pravṛttiḥ yuktā nibaddhā hi sā prakaraṇa ādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ darśa pūrṇamāsa ādiṣu katham tarhi etāni liṅgāni ucyate yatra nitya anuvāda vacanāni syuḥ iha tāvat ardham barhiṣaḥ lunāti ardham na iti barhiḥ yatra eva bhava eṣyati yat kāraṇam sataḥ barhiṣaḥ ucyate na ca iha asti barhiḥ na hotāram vṛṇīte na ārṣā iyam iti nitya anuvādaḥ bhaviṣyati 
[II,57,i]	nanu nitya anuvādaḥ san anarthakaḥ bhavati kim kriyatām yasya arthaḥ na asti prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalam juhoti iti vacanam prayājānām bhaviṣyati katham punar atra prayājāḥ ca kṛṣṇa lahomaḥ ca śakyaḥ vaktum bhidyate hi tathā vākyam evam tarhi na prayājān vakṣyati prayāje kṛṣṇa lahomam vidhāsyati na ca asatsu prayājeṣu kṛṣṇa lahomaḥ śakyate kartum iti arthāt prāya ājān kariṣyati tasmāt na liṅgena vaidikyāḥ niyamaḥ yathā uktena nyāyena laukikī itikartavyatā iti 
[II,57,ii_II,57,iii]	mithas vipratiṣedhāt ca guṇānām yathā artha kalpanā syāt tatra āha atha kasmāt na ubhe api itikartavyate saha pravartete iti kim evam bhaviṣyati evam tulya apekṣā karmaṇām anyataratas na bādhitā bhavati ucyate saha pravṛttau ekayā ced karma nirapekṣam kṛtam dvitīyasyāḥ pravṛttiḥ vipratiṣiddhā atas mithas pravṛtteḥ vipra tiṣedhāt yathā artha kalpanā syāt ekasyāḥ pravṛttiḥ syāt iti arthaḥ katham ekasyāḥ pravṛtteḥ dharmāṇām yathā artha kalpanā bhavati ye dharmāḥ yeṣu kāryeṣu pravṛttau utpannāḥ te iha api teṣu eva bhavanti itarathāḥ dvitīyasyāḥ dharmāḥ ayathārthāḥ bhaveyuḥ pūrvaiḥ dharmaiḥ teṣām kāryāṇām nirvartita tvāt evam ekasyāḥ pravṛtteḥ yathā artha kalpanā bhavati atas yathā artha kalpanā syāt iti anena ekasyāḥ pravṛttiḥ iti uktam bhavet ekasyāḥ pravṛttau yathā uktena eva nyāyena laukikyāḥ pravṛttiḥ iti 
[II,58,i_II,58,ii]	bhāgi tvāt tu niyamyeta guṇānām abhidhāna tvāt saṃbandhāt abhidhāna vat yathā dhenuḥ kiśoreṇa tuśabdaḥ pakṣa nivṛttau na tu evam syāt laukikī itikartavyatā iti kim tarhi vaidikī niyamyeta kutas bhāgi tvāt vaidikī api bhāginī pravṛtteḥ sā api hi apūrvasya iti kartavyatā samāne ca bhāgitve ubhayoḥ vaidikī eva syāt guṇānām abhidhāna tvāt guṇāḥ ete prayāja ādayaḥ saurya ādiṣu dṛśyamānāḥ abhidhāyakāḥ bhavanti etasya arthasya yathā vaidikī atra itikartavyatā iti bodhakāḥ bhavanti iti arthaḥ 
[II,58,iii]	kasmāt saṃbandhāt ete hi tayā iti kartavya tayā saṃbaddhāḥ atas sāhacaryāt tām gamayanti abhidhāna vat yathā kauṇḍapāyinām ayane agnihotram iti abhidhānam karmaṇaḥ vācakam tad karma sahacaritān dharmān ānayati teṣu asatsu etat abhidhānam iha na yujyate iti teṣām dharmāṇām tatra bhāvaḥ vijñāyate evam iha api prayāja ādīnām darśanam asatyam vaidikyām na yujyate iti tasyāḥ api iha bhāvaḥ vijñāsyate nanu asati nyāye liṅgam akāraṇam satyam evam uktaḥ tu nyāyaḥ bhāgi tvāt iti 
[II,58,iv]	yat tu dṛṣṭa pravṛttiḥ laukikī iti tatra brūmaḥ yadi api dṛṣṭa pravṛttiḥ syāt tathā api vaidikī eva niyamyeta katham yathā dhenuḥ kiśoreṇa tat yathā kṛṣṇa kiśorāḥ dhenuḥ iti yadi api dhenu śabdaḥ godhenvām dṛṣṭa pravṛttiḥ tathā api abhidhāna sāmānyāt aśvadhenvām api bhāgī iti kiśoreṇa liṅgena aśvadhenvām vijñāyate evam iha api yadi api laukikī dṛṣṭa pravṛttiḥ tathā api iti kartavyatā sāmānyena bhāgi tvāt liṅgena vaidikī vijñeyā 
[II,59,i_II,59,ii]	utpattīnām sama tvāt vā yathā adhikāram bhāvaḥ syāt atha vā na eva liṅgena niyamaḥ iti kutas utpattīnām sama tvāt dharmāṇām prayāja ādīnām utpattayaḥ samāḥ sarveṣām āgneya ādi aṅga bhāvena na paraspara aṅga tvena kim atas yadi prayāja ādīnām anuyāja ādayaḥ aṅgāni syuḥ tatas yatra pradhānam tatra aṅgāni iti prayāja darśanena anuyāja ādayaḥ anumīyeran yadā tu sama pradhānāḥ ete tadā prayāja darśanena kāmam prayājāḥ anumīyeran prayāja dharmā vā na tu anuyāja ādayaḥ tasmāt liṅgam aniyāmakam yat tu abhidhāna vat iti atra brūmaḥ yuktam tatra tatra hi para śabdaḥ paratra prayuktaḥ san dharmān atidiśati iti uktam 
[II,59,iii_II,59,iv]	api ca vidhiḥ asau agnihotra vat dhotavyam iti ayam punar anuvādaḥ tena atra prayāja ādīnām eva na asti prāptiḥ kutas anuyāja ādīnām tasmāt viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ abhidhāna vat iti atas yathā adhikāram bhāvaḥ syāt ye dharmāḥ yasya apūrvasya adhikāraḥ āmnātāḥ te tatra eva bhaveyuḥ evam tarhi sauryam carum nirvapet iti anena ākhyātena pradhānasya vidhāna utpattiḥ śeṣāṇām ca vacanam bhavatu katham kṛtvā na anaṅgam pradhānam ucyamānam kasmaicid prayojanāya kalpate iti tena ca prāpitānām aṅgānām etebhyaḥ liṅgebhyaḥ viśeṣa avadhāraṇam bhaviṣyati tatra idam ucyate 
[II,59,v_II,59,vi]	utpatti śeṣa vacanam ca vipratiṣiddham ekasmin ekasmin śabde pradhānasya utpattiḥ aṅgānām ca vacanam na saṃbhavati kim kāraṇam utpannam hi pradhānam aṅgān apekṣate apekṣayā ca tāni gṛhyante tasmāt na etat api yuktam yadi ca nirvapet iti anena śabdena aṅgāni api vidhīyeran tatas teṣām api phala saṃbandhaḥ syāt tathā aṅga tvam eva vyāhanyeta tatas ayam api vādaḥ na ghaṭate tasmāt yathā uktaḥ laukikaḥ eva abhyupāyaḥ 
[II,60,i_II,60,ii]	vidhyantaḥ vā prakṛti vat codanāyām pravarteta tathā hi liṅga darśanam vidhyantaḥ vā saurya ādikāyām codanāyām pravarteta na dharmāḥ laukikāḥ kaḥ punar ayam vidhyantaḥ nāma vidheḥ antaḥ vidhyantaḥ atha vidhiḥ kaḥ yat vākyam upalabhya puruṣaḥ kasmiṃścid arthe pravartate kutaścid vā nivartate sa vidhiḥ vidhīyate hi anena arthaḥ yathā loke devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām iti tasya abhyāja ityādiḥ itaraḥ antar vede api darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti vidhi ādiḥ vidhyantaḥ api pradhāna vidhi varjitam kṛtsnam pauroḍāśikam brāhmaṇam tena sametaḥ ayam vidhi ādiḥ viśiṣṭa apūrva nirvṛttim prati puruṣam pravartayati tasmāt saḥ asya antar tathā somena yajeta iti vidhi ādiḥ saumikam api brāhmaṇam vidhyantaḥ eṣa vidhyantaḥ nāma 
[II,60,iii]	eteṣu ca saurya ādiṣu vidhi ādiḥ asti vidhyantaḥ na asti eteṣu api sa vidhyantaḥ kalpyeta katham kṛtvā aparipūrṇam yat vākyam tat adhyāhāreṇa vā pūryeta vyavahita kalpanayā vā tatra adhyāhārāt vyavahita kalpanā jyāyasī adhyāhāre hi aśrutaḥ kalpyeta itaratra śrutena saṃbandhaḥ tasmāt vyavahitaḥ brāhmaṇa avayavaḥ asya paripūrakaḥ kalpyate yathā vasantāya kapiñjalān ālabhate grīṣmāya kalaviṅkān ālabhate iti tena vaidikīti kartavya tā prāpyate 
[II,61,i]	yadi tat brāhmaṇam asya antar kalpyate tatra na bhavati tat etat mayūra nṛtyam āpadyate tat yathā mayūrasya nṛtyataḥ anyat apāvriyate anyat saṃvriyate evam iha api idam saṃvriyate tat apāvriyate na eṣa doṣaḥ pratyakṣaḥ tasya tatra bhāvaḥ iha punar ānumānikaḥ na ca anumānikam pratyakṣam bādhate iha tarhi na prāpnoti pratyakṣa virodhāt syāt evam yadi virodhaḥ syāt na tu asti virodhaḥ tatra api bhaviṣyati iha api tat etat uktam vidhyantaḥ vā prakṛti vat codanāyām pravarteta iti 
[II,61,ii_II,61,iii]	ucyate prakṛti vat iti kim āha aṣṭame prakṛti niyamam kariṣyati iyam asya prakṛtiḥ iti tat ucyate vidhyantaḥ vā prakṛteḥ iva pravarteta yā yā tasya karmaṇaḥ prakṛtiḥ iti yasya āgneyaḥ prakṛtiḥ tasya āgneyāt eva yasya agnīṣomīyaḥ tasya agnīṣomīyāt iti evam sarvatra atha kasmāt na laukikaḥ vidhyantaḥ kalpyate ucyate laukikasya vidheḥ abhāvāt vidhyante eva na asti kutas tat kalpanā iti āha laukikī itikartavya tā prāpyatām kim vidhi anta kalpanayā iti ucyate vaidikī hi atra iti kartavyatā na laukikī kasmāt tathā hi liṅga darśanam prayāja ādi samarthitam bhavati 
[II,61,iv_II,61,v]	liṅga hetu tvāt aliṅge laukikam syāt yadi liṅgāt vaidikaḥ abhyupāyaḥ bhavati tena tarhi aliṅge laukikam syāt yatra karmaṇi kiṃcid liṅgam na asti tatra laukikam syāt vidhānam yathā aindrāgnam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet yasya sajātau īyuḥ iti 
[II,62,i_II,62,iii]	liṅgasya pūrvavat tvāt codanā śabda sāmānyāt ekena api nirūpyeta yathā sthālī pulokena atra ucyate syāt evam yadi liṅga hetukaḥ vaidikaḥ upāyaḥ syāt na tu asau liṅga hetukaḥ kiṃhetukaḥ tu vidhi anta hetukaḥ vidhyantaḥ api nyāya pūrvaḥ sa ca nyāyaḥ tulyaḥ sarveṣām karmaṇām vaikṛtānām liṅgavatām ca kutas codanā śabda sāmānyāt karma codanāyām śābdaḥ samānaḥ sarvatra vidhi ādiḥ asti na vidhyantaḥ tulyaḥ ca apekṣayā anyatra śrutena vidhyantena saṃbandhaḥ tat etat nyāya pūrvakam liṅgam ekatra api dṛśyamānam tulya nyāyānām sarveṣām dharma vat tām jñāpayati yathā sthālyām tulya pākānām pulākānām ekam upamṛdyāni eṣām api siddha tām jānāti tulyaḥ hetuḥ asya ca anyeṣām ca siddhatvasya iti tasmāt sarvatra vaidikīti kartavya tā atha yat uktam dṛṣṭa pravṛttiḥ laukikī itikartavyatā iti atra brūmaḥ sāmānyatodṛṣṭam etat upadiśyate sāmānyatodṛṣṭam ca yat avyabhicāri tat pramāṇam savyabhicāram ca etat dṛṣṭāḥ hi gaṇa yāga ādayaḥ aneva miti kartavya tākāḥ tasmāt dṛṣṭa pravṛtti tvāt iti ahetuḥ 
[II,62,iv]	yat tu vaidikyāḥ bhāgi tvāt tad pūrvakāṇi liṅgāni bhaviṣyanti iti atra brūmaḥ bhāgi tvasya apūrva iti kartavya tāka tvam kila hetuḥ tat bhāvaḥ ca tasyāḥ śabda pūrvaḥ śabdena ca darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ asau vijñāyate na sarvatra iti tasmāt na bhāgi tvam atas vidhyantena eva iti kartavyatā prāpyate na anyathā atha kasmāt etāni vaikṛtāni vākyāni nyūnāni eva na anumanyante kim ebhiḥ pūritaiḥ nyūnāni anarthakāni bhavanti bhavantu kaḥ doṣaḥ śiṣṭaiḥ eṣām saṃparigrahaḥ na yujyate pramādāt bhaviṣyati iti na asti akṣare mātrāyām vā pramādaḥ kutas etāvati granthe bhaviṣyati katham tulyam ca sāṃpradāyikam iti uktam vyāmohaḥ api viduṣām yuga sahasrāṇi bahūni na anuvarteta yujyate ca eṣām apekṣayā pūraṇam tasmāt ūnāni na anumanyante atas vaidikīti kartavyatā iti siddham 
[II,63,i_II,63,ii]	dvādaśa ahikam ahar gaṇe tad prakṛti tvāt aikāhikam adhika āgamāt tadākhyam syāt ekāhavat prajā kāmā gavāmayanam upeyuḥ iti satram vidhāyām nāyate jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ iti gavāmayane dvādaśa ahikaḥ vidhyante iti vakṣyati gaṇeṣu dvādaśa ahasya iti tatra ca udakena dvādaśa ahikāḥ dharmāḥ prāpyante eka ahānām api yathā svam nāmabhiḥ prātisvikāḥ ye tatra dvādaśa ahikāḥ aikāhikaiḥ aviruddhāḥ te yathāprāptam kriyante viruddheṣu saṃśayaḥ kim dvādaśa ahikaḥ dharmaḥ kartavyaḥ uta ekāhikaḥ iti kim prāptam tatra sūtreṇa eva upakramaḥ dvādaśa ahikam ahar gaṇe tad prakṛti tvāt dvādaśa aha prakṛti tvāt vidhyantena eva prāpyante 
[II,63,iii]	nanu evam nāmadheyam bādhyate na bādhiṣyate nāmadheyam jyotiḥ ādi adhika āgamāt bhaviṣyati ye jyautiṣṭaumikebhyaḥ adhikāḥ stotra śastra vikārāḥ tad āgamāt ekāhavat yathā tasmin eva jyotiṣi eka ahe jyotiḥ śabdaḥ adhika āgamāt bhavati satsu jyautiṣṭaumikeṣu jyotiṣṭome abhāvāt adhika dharma arthaḥ ayam śabdaḥ na ca adhikānām dvādaśa ahikaiḥ virodhaḥ asti tasmāt dvādaśa ahikam dharma jātam viruddham kartavyam iti 
[II,64,i]	adhika āgamāt tadākhyam syāt ekāha vat iti etasya aparā vyākhyā ye dvādaśa ahe adhikāḥ aikāhikebhyaḥ kecid dharmāḥ ucyante abhiplavaḥ anvaham bhavati gorivītam anvaham bhavati iti teṣām adhikānām āgamāt tadākhyam syāt etat dvādaśa ahikam aharjyotiḥ ākhyam āyuḥ ākhyam vā katham ekāhavat yathā tasmin eva eka ahe ayam jyotiḥ ādi śabdaḥ jyautiṣṭaumikebhyaḥ adhikeṣu vaiśeṣikeṣu dharmeṣu āgateṣu bhavati evam iha api adhika āgama sāmānyāt gauṇaḥ bhaviṣyati yathā ṣāḍahikānām pṛṣṭhānām bhāvāt eka aho viśva jit ṣaṣ ahaḥ iti uktam tam eka aham ṣaṣ ahaḥ iti ācakṣate iti evam iha api gauṇaḥ ced na prāpakaḥ tasmāt na asti nāmadheyāt dharma prāptiḥ iti 
[II,64,ii_II,64,iii]	liṅgāt ca liṅgāt ca etat jñāyate yathā dvādaśa ahikam kartavyam iti kim liṅgam bhavati dvābhyām loma avadyati dvābhyām tvacam dvābhyām asṛj dvābhyām māṃsam iti evam ṣaṣ dvikān anukramya āha yat dvādaśa upasadaḥ bhavanti ātmānam etat nirvadyate iti dvādaśa ahikam dharmam dvādaśa upasattvam darśayati tat upapadyate yadi dvādaśa ahikam dharma jātam virodhi kartavyam itarathā ca ekāhikam ṣaṣ upasattvam syāt tasmāt paśyāmaḥ dvādaśa ahikam kartavyam iti tathā idam aparam liṅgam yasya atiriktam ekādaśinyām ālabheran na priyam bhrātṛvyam atiricyeta atha yat dvau paśū samasyeyus kanīyaḥ āyuḥ kurvīran yadi ete brāhmaṇavantaḥ paśavaḥ ālambhante na apriyam bhrātṛvyam atyatiricyate na kanīyaḥ āyuḥ kurvīta iti ekādaśinyām vihāram dvādaśa ahikam dharmam darśayati katham vihāre sati atirekaḥ paśūnām āpadyate atireka bhayāt ca dvayoḥ dvayoḥ samāsaḥ eka aha dharma prāptau vihāraḥ na syāt tatra etad darśanam na yujyate tasmāt dvādaśa ahikam kāryam 
[II,65,i_II,65,iii]	na vā kratu abhidhānāt adhikānām aśabda tvam na vā dvādaśa ahikam kāryam kim tarhi ekāhikam kim kāraṇam ca udakena dvādaśa ahikam prāpnoti nāmadheyena eka āhikam nāmadheyam ca ca udakāt balīyaḥ kutas pratyakṣa tvāt pratyakṣam nāmadheyam ca udakam tu ānumānikam nanu vidhyantaḥ api pratyakṣaḥ satyam prakṛtau pratyakṣaḥ vidhyantaḥ vikṛtau tu ānumānikaḥ nāmadheyam punar vikṛtau api pratyakṣam pratyakṣam ca anumānāt balīyaḥ tasmāt aikāhikam kāryam 
[II,65,iv]	nanu adhikāryam nāmadheyam iti uktam atra ucyate adhikānām aśabda tvam adhikānām śabdaḥ na asti ime jyotiḥ ādayaḥ śabdāḥ karma nāmadheyāni iti uktam api vā nāmadheyam syāt yat utpattau apūrvam avidhāyaka tvāt iti yat tu adhika āgamāt tadākhyam syāt iti tatra brūmaḥ vacanāt adhika āgamaḥ na nāmadheyena yat tu teṣu asatsu śabdasya abhāvāt iti na ete kadācid āyuḥ ādiṣu na santi katham teṣām abhāve śabdasya abhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yat tu jyotiṣṭome na asti jyotiḥ ādiḥ śabdaḥ iti karma antara tvāt jyotiṣṭomaḥ āyuḥ ādiḥ śabdaḥ na asti na dharma abhāvāt tasmāt aikāhikam viruddham dharma jātam kartavyam iti adhika āgamāt tadākhyam syāt ekāha vat iti etasya dvitīya vyākhyā parihāraḥ gauṇaḥ san anuvāda mātram anarthakam syāt tasmāt pūrva uktena nyāyena nāmadheyam dharmāṇām prāpakam iti 
[II,66,i_II,66,ii]	liṅgam saṃghāta dharmaḥ syāt tad arthāpatteḥ dravya vat atha yat liṅgam upadiṣṭam dvādaśa upasattva darśanam tasya parihāraḥ ucyate liṅgam saṃghāta dharmaḥ syāt liṅgam etad saṃghāta dharmaḥ syāt dvādaśa ahaḥ ahar saṃghātaḥ sa phalāya codyate dvādaśa aham ṛddhi kāmāḥ upeyuḥ iti gavāmayanam api ahar saṃghāta antaram tasmin eva kārye phala siddhau vidhīyate tasya tad kārya āpattyā dvādaśa aha dharmān gṛhṇāti na ca udakena dravya vat yathā dravye vrīhau dharmāḥ śrutāḥ te tad kārya āpanneṣu pratinidhi bhūteṣu prāpyante na ca udakena tadvat 
[II,66,iii_II,66,iv]	na vā artha dharma tvāt saṃghātasya guṇa tvāt na etat yuktam kutas artha dharma tvāt apūrva dharma tvāt iti arthaḥ apūrva dharmaḥ dvādaśa upasattvam na saṃghāta dharmaḥ kasmāt saṃghātasya guṇa tvāt ahāni atra pradhānāni dvādaśa ahena iti dvādaśa tvam teṣām guṇaḥ viśeṣaṇam iti arthaḥ viśiṣyaḥ eva kāryam pratīyate na viśeṣaṇe yathā rāja puruṣaḥ ānīyatām iti ukte puruṣaḥ ānīyate na rājā yathā ca mṛṣṭam bhuṅkte devadattaḥ iti ukte na śākam sūpaḥ vā pratīyate yat eva pradhānam tat pratīyate kim atas atas ahāni phalavanti na saṃghātaḥ phalavataḥ ca dharmāḥ tasmāt na dvādaśa upasattvam saṃghāta dharmaḥ evam ced na gavāmayane kārya āpattitaḥ dharmāḥ prāpyante atas aparihāraḥ ayam 
[II,67,i_II,67,iii]	arthāpatteḥ dravyeṣu dharma lābhaḥ syāt yat uktam dravya vat iti yuktam dravyeṣu tatra hi vrīhi kārya āpannāḥ nīvārāḥ kārya āpattitaḥ tad dharmān labhante iha punar dvādaśa upasattvam na eva saṃghāta dharmaḥ iti apadiṣṭaḥ hetuḥ tasmāt adṛṣṭāntaḥ dravya vat iti āha katham tarhi idam liṅga darśanam atra ucyate 
[II,67,iv_II,67,vi]	pravṛttyā niyatasya liṅga darśanam gavāmayane dvādaśa ahikam prathamam ahar prāyaṇīyaḥ atirātraḥ tasya dharmaḥ dvādaśa upasattvam tad upādāne mukhyasya anugrahaḥ ṣaṣ upasattva upādāne jaghanyānām jyotiḥ ādīnām mukhyasya prāpta kālam anugraham atikramitum kiṃcid kāryam na asti atas tad anugraha artham dvādaśa upasattvam bhavati tathā mukhyayā pravṛttyā niyatasya etat darśanam na ca udaka prāptyā yasmāt ca udakaḥ nāmadheyāt abalaḥ vakṣyati ca vipratiṣiddha dharmāṇām samavāye bhūyasām syāt sadharma tvam mukhyam vā pūrva codanāt loka vat iti atha yat dvitīyam liṅga darśanam uktam ekādaśinyām vihāra darśanam tatra ucyate 
[II,68,i_II,68,ii]	vihāra darśanam viśiṣṭasya anārabhyavādānām prakṛti artha tvāt anārabhya ekādaśinyām vihāraḥ śiṣṭaḥ tad ādi prabhavāḥ paśavaḥ syuḥ tathā tān eva anūcīnān aharahar ālabheran āgneyam eva prathame ahani ālabheran sārasvatīm meṣīm dvitīye saumyam babhrum tṛtīye vāruṇam antatas atha punar paryāvarteṣu āgneyam eva prathame ahani ālabheran sārasvatīm meṣīm dvitīye saumyam babhrum tṛtīye vāruṇam antatas iti tat anārabhyavādānām prakṛti artha tvāt jyotiṣṭomam praviṣṭam tatra ahnām bahu tvasya abhāvāt asaṃbhavāt aparām prakṛtim dvādaśa aham āgatam tatra api punar jyotiḥ ādīnām paryāvarteṣu iti etat na yujyate iti tṛtīyām prakṛtim gavāmayane praviṣṭam evam āgatasya etat darśanam iti
